links_reviews_text: Rented this for a cooler season beach trip. The colors were not as vibrant as I had hoped. Typically a 6, but ordered an 8 after reading reviews. Fit ok with the added size, but a very slinky material. Overall not flattering

Rented for a birthday dinner in Tampa, FL. The week prior the Washington Post reported the weather was going to be so cold to watch out for iguanas falling from trees.. my legs can handle cold better than my upper body so I wore a jean jacket after dinner but before that the long sleeves worked well. Wore with open toe suede booties & I thought it was a really cute romper (except for using the bathroom)!!
Overall it fit true to size and I loved wearing it; however, the front was a little gappy. Also, the little snap on the front kept popping open. Still loved wearing it!
Rented this for a trip to Italy and was perfect for dinner. Fits TTS but front is definitely low cut, so had a small amount of trouble keeping front clasp closed.

Seeing my husband's face as soon as I walked into the room was all I needed to feel amazing in this outfit. I am extremely bloated in my first trimester, but still felt great in this romper... and sexy again!

I have a long torso so I'm always iffy with rompers. I got two sizes up and it worked. It was still super short in the bottom section, so if I was to bend over my butt cheeks would have shown. It's pretty light and sorry so good for the spring and summer.
True to size, comfy and fashionable

links_reviews_title: So cute, but way too big
links_reviews_text: I was so disappointed to leave for vacation without the romper, but it was just way too big for me. I have a slender, athletic build and had ordered another dress in XS and S. When the S was unavailable at the last minute, I selected this as a backup. Even with my most padded bra, I couldn't make it work. The front actually wasn't the issue, it was a bit baggy but didn't look awful, but the zipper in the back ended up looking like a shark fin (I tried to get a picture of it, but couldn't capture it). I could definitely see myself trying the size 0 to see if that fits better.

links_reviews_title: Rented this to wear after my performance during the meet & greet.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, tiny shade of pink which adds great depth of color to the overall outfit, would rent again!!

Great outfit to dress up a bit for dinner while on vacation. Fits true to size. Runs a little short. I didn't have any issue with the button in the front as some other reviews state but am smaller chested. Favorite vacation outfit by far! Wanted to buy it!!
If you are curvy this outfit isn't for you. All night I struggled with my cleavage area. Other than that the outfit was cute but just not meant for me.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, flattering, perfect for weekend and nights out
links_reviews_text: The tie waist is flattering, the shorts part of the romper are a bit on the looser side. I loved that I could wear a romper out without a jacket on cooler nights. Sad to return this!

This is super cute! It fit like it was made for me. I am normally a 4 but I got a 6 because rompers tend to be too short through the crotch on me. I wore this for our housewarming party and it was perfect. I love it so much I am buying it.

Super comfortable, needed help unzipping whenever I needed to use the restroom, otherwise, would definitely rent again. I normally wear 4,6,8. This runs on the small side, I rented an 8 and it fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: GNO is always a good time!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear an 8 petite but this fit very tight in the bust (i.e. snap popped open if I moved my arms) and honestly it just wasn't flattering at all on me.

links_reviews_title: Super fun romper, wore to a concert and out in Nashville.
links_reviews_text: I only had a size 4, I should have worn a size 6. Here's what you need to know. If you have a long torso, this isn't for you. I have a fairly short torso and the length fit perfectly. I am 5'9" and this romper was SHORT on me. Also, I'm not pregnant, and you can see in one of the pics I posted that you gotta be careful how you stand. Additionally, the clasp on the chest pops open VERY easily, hence the picture where my ladies are popping out accidentally. I got a ton of compliments on this romper, but size 4 is in the past for me. It doesn't run small, per se, I just should have ordered a 6. Material is silk so there is no give. It's hard to zip up in the back.

I got so many compliments. It's something you could dress up or down. The only negative was the clasp to cover the décolletage was weirdly high and kept popping open. I ended up keeping it open. I usually wear a 6-8 and got the 6 and it fit perfectly.

I rented this romper for casual Friday work attire, but it is SHORT. Even with tights underneath it, I felt like it wasn't appropriate for a professional environment; however, I tossed a pair of white skinny pants over the shorts, and volia! I had a blouse. I took the pants off later and breezed around town in the romper itself. The fabric is light-weight, so I was cool and comfortable even in the summer heat, but the long sleeves kept me warm in my overly air-conditioned office. Overall, a fun, easy summer piece, just beware if you have long legs (for reference, I'm 5'7")!

I love this trendy dress by Parker! Running true to size with stretchy fabric, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You can totally wear a standard bra with this romper. At 5’6”, it;s pretty short and fitted but I didn't feel uncomfortable since the garment is so stretchy. The pattern on the romper is pretty chic, and the belt adds some flare making this perfect for a vacation or a Sunday brunch. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!
Fits true to size. Material is very thin and lightweight. Ended up wearing a size 2, I'm between 2 and 4 and it fit perfectly. Has to use fashion tape to keep the button from popping open.

I'm 5'9" 160lbs 36DD and normally wear a size 4 jean but a 10-12 in dresses. The 12 was a little large, so I pinned the top and tied the belt a little tighter. It was comfy and fun and i got lots of compliments. Rompers usually dont work for me because im tall with a long torso, but this worked great!

Loved the feel of this romper! The sleeves were classy and the print provided an amazing color for our Caribbean cruise without blending into a sea of summer dresses. For me, a definite hourglass, the hips were a little tight but still fit well and comfortably. However I did need about 3 pieces of fashion tape to ensure the neckline stayed in place over my DDD chest. But it was worth it and worked perfectly all night!
Super cute and a great fit!
Overall very flattering. I did have to roll up the sleeves since they are short for my arms. The material does not stretch at all.

I ordered one size up and I’m glad I did, it fit like a glove. Super cute and very sexy, however I decided not to wear it to the event which required something more conservative. I would definitely rent it again, just have to find the right event

I didn't wear this. It's so cute and the fabric is lovely but the snap at the bustline wouldn't stay snapped. The fineness of the fabric didn't make a safety pin feasible, so regrettably, this one stayed in the closet.
Extremely cute but super short
This runs extremely small. I normally wear a size 10, due to my waist, though my legs through hips are probably a 6/8 and I could not get this piece to go past my thighs.
Very nice fabric and cut, but the sizing in the hips was very tight. The thighs and bust were fine but the hips were quite narrow. Will swap for a size up.

Did not end up wearing this. For a size 6, the waist was pretty tight. The shorts are quite short (and I'm 5'3!), the button on the chest kept popping open, and the zipper seam on the back didn't lay flat at all. Disappointing!
The shoulders we too big and almost puffy which looked odd on me. Rest of it fit well.

links_reviews_title: Didn't like the way it pulled across the chest- the button kept opening up.
links_reviews_text: Wasn't what I expected.
I am 5'10" tall and it was extremely short on me. I did not wear it.
It's not for a curvy figure. Fabric is lightweight and silky

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing the romper.
links_reviews_text: I am long waisted so I would definitely go up a size.
It was way too short for my torso so I couldn't wear. Fabric is light weight, silky. I expected it would have been navy and white from the pictures, but it was really a lighter blue.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely LOVED this romper...can dress it up or down.
links_reviews_text: Fit GREAT!! I wore it for new years and got so many compliments!! Would totally rent again!

links_reviews_title: Love this romper. Great for dates. Lots of looks:)
links_reviews_text: It does run low cut and if you use the button to make it more modest it didn't look right. So I went for the more sexy look
I am typically a 2 or 4 in bottoms and jumpsuits, and the 4 fit me well. The shorts are a bit short, and the material is lightweight, so plan accordingly.
Very low cut. Needed a pin to conceal breast.
Perfect dress for my vacation! Fit well but quality was really great. A little long for my height so make sure you have a slight heel.
I'm smaller chested and that part didn't fit well so not sure if that's the style or if it was stretched out. Thought the print and style was cute for vacation

links_reviews_title: Such a simple yet beautiful dress, but very sheer in the sunlight FYI
links_reviews_text: The lacing in the back makes the dress either loose or fitted, it was so comfortable and received non stop compliments.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a beach vacation!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress! The color and print a beautiful and the back detail is a nice touch. The side slits are also very sexy!
Didn't wear because my boobs were on display. Probably would have been fine not pregnant.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a tropical beach wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved the cut and color. The high slits on both sides made it great for dancing. The lace-up back made the top very adjustable. I chose to go bra-less since the wedding was in Costa Rica (95° and 100% humidity) but still used fashion tape at the collar bones to keep the neckline in place. Great dress, would totally rent again. It did end up wrinkly by the end of the night, but I have to believe that had more to do with the weather than the dress itself.

Love this dress. The fabric is light, soft and breathable. The drape is good. Slits not too high on legs. It's pretty low cut and probably shows my bra a little. Def shows bra in the back which is low and laced up. I love the style, cut and pattern. Easy to nurse in. Would rent again.

Zipper on the side. Very pretty fabric-soft and sweet design. I'm 5'2-wore small small wedges and it hit where it needed. Wore it to work one day with a bra and a sweater-a little more low cut than I thought but still appropriate as long as I kept and eye on it ;). Overall pretty tropical maxi.

links_reviews_title: The color and style makes this dress standout in a crowd.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, but my only complaint is that it's a bit too low and didn't sit firmly on the top part. I have a bigger chest, so it felt like I had to expose a lot to be able to wear this. Also, it wrinkles very easily and shows. Otherwise, beautiful print, color, and style (ties in back, slits on dress, etc.)

Such a cute dress! It runs a bit small, so I ended up wearing the Medium, which was a bit too large, but still fit pretty well and I received a bunch of compliments! The MR was also the perfect length. I am 5'6" and was able to wear 3" heels.
The top was slightly big and resulted in me having to adjust several times out on the dance floor. Otherwise, I got several compliments on this dress!
Loved this color!!!! I got the 4L bc the 4 wasn't available but it wasn't too long! The bust was a bit big but besides that great dress!
This runs true to size but the top was just a little loose for me. The length was great since I wore 5 inch platform heels. Great for a formal event and the color definitely makes a splash.
I got so many compliments. It was so easy to wear. It's so fun. My grandmother is obsessed - she called my mother to demand I wear it to every wedding. Rent this!
Very nice dress, would rent again!
This dress was great, it was a little loose at the top but overall it fit well. I was complimented on it all night!

I was initially hesitant because the dress looked a little stiff on the model, but I was so pleased to see how stretchy and form fitting this dress is. If you have curves, they will show them off which I love! Hot pink is my favorite color and I really felt good in this dress. The top was a little big so I need to adjust it every once in a while but the bottom fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit right all throughout and received complements all night.
links_reviews_text: Would definelty wear again. I did notice that there was a seam that had been sewn up and was worried it might reopen with all the dancing at the wedding. Even though I was watchful a part of it did reopen
Loved this at the recent wedding I attended! I received so many compliments.

Fit great, it was perfect with heels but swept the ground as the night went on and I took my heels off. I was pulling it up from time to time but that can be expected with a strapless dress. Overall, I felt like a beauty queen in it and got tons of compliments. Glad I got to wear this to a summer wedding before fall came!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved the dress. The color, the fit, and the length were perfect.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs quite small. I wear a 6 six normally but fit 2R. It totally hugs every curve which I loved and the stretch was on point. The dress was a bit long for 5"5 individual but with some heels, it became the perfect length. The color was a show stopper. I would totally get this dress again and again and again.
I'm 6'2 so finding dresses where you can wear heels is great!

A super unique color and very eye popping look for my friend's wedding. I'm 5'3" and wore 3 inch heels and it hit the floor perfectly. Fits true to size. I'm a solid 4 in this one. Did not need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: I wore this before I had to put the uniform myself. Such a standout dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore heals with this and it was still a good length. Just a really classy and sleek dress and will make you standout wherever you wear it. The color attracts the eye immediately.
The color was so vibrant and the dress was very comfortable. The slit made it easy to dance in. You can't go wrong with this dress!

The color is hot hot hot pink - and right on trend! I'm usually a 4 and even the 2 was a little big up top. Was excited to get the long although the regular length would have been okay with shorter heels. Wore to a black tie optional wedding and even the bride commented how much she loved the dress!

The top was a big large for me (small busy) even with a padded strapless bra it was slipping down throughout the night. Fabrics a little thin so panty lines will show. I'm 5'2 and wore 4in heels and the dress was still a bit long so if you're petite try to opt for the shorter length. Otherwise the color is a stunner, I got a ton of compliments

Loved everything about it. So many compliments! I prob could've worn a 4, but I was very comfortable being able to wear a supportive strapless bra and spanx. It did brush the floor a bit in length. I'm 5'3" and wearing 5" heels. Typical short girl problems...
Loved the fit and length was still long enough with heels. Felt great wearing it!

links_reviews_title: The color alone just made people stop and stare
links_reviews_text: Naturally, I figured this color would work great against my skin tone. However, due to its simple design, I anticipated at a 400+ invite wedding that someone would wear something very similar. I was wrong - simply put: I received so many compliments & nobody wore a color close to this. The vibrancy is truly unique. Only downside was that it was slight too long (even wearing 4" heels as I am 5'4!) and slightly too big in the bust, so I found myself carrying it whenever I had to walk. I would definitely rent this again, just maybe add some temporary hem tape next time.
Wore this to a summer wedding, it as beautiful and completely comfortable! I wore a 10R with some shape wear underneath.
I'm 5'7 and the length could have worked with flats or heels. I wore wedges. Fabric is a little thin as there is no lining! Loved it overall.

links_reviews_title: Big on the bust, but fits everywhere else
links_reviews_text: Went to a black tie wedding. The color is definitely a very bright purple-ish pink. It fit me everywhere perfectly, but was big on the bust (I have a smaller chest) so I needed to pull it up quite often. The silhouette is beautiful though.

The color is gorgeous! This dress is super comfortable, and makes such a statement! No statement accessories needed! I normally wear a 4, and opted for the 6, because the bust fit better in the 6. In my opinion, shapewear isn't an option because you are able to see the seams, but the dress is flattering! I received so many compliments!
Fit true to size

links_reviews_title: Great color and worked amazing as a maternity dress
links_reviews_text: At 34 weeks pregnant, it's hard to tell whether it ran true to size. I researched past reviews to decide on sizing up to an 8L (usually a 2-4). The material has a LOT of stretch, which makes it a great maternity option. Also it was very comfortable to both sit and dance in. I am 5'7" and wore 4" heels, and the long was almost too long. I think I probably could have gotten away with a regular length. The color was AMAZING and I got a lot of complements on the dress all night. I would definitely rent it again, and might have kept it if it was a size that would fit me post pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: It was a beautiful color! I got so many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The fit was big around my bust area which caused me to have to keep pulling it up ALL night! The rental process was a great experience! I’ve already recommended it to a few friends! I can’t wait to rent again.
Material is thin and you really can’t wear spanx
Wore this to a black tie wedding and it was perfect. The color was so fun and the cut was simple and elegant. Wish I could re-wear!

links_reviews_title: great color, ran a little large
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 6 or 8 but the 6 was slightly large so next time I would get a 4, but overall the dress photographed really well and was a attention grabber !!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! I got a TON of compliments all night long. Showed off my baby bump perfectly!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. I usually wear a size 4 but being 20 weeks pregnant I ordered a size up and it fit like a glove!
Fit is true to size. I'm 5'5" and 130 and wore the 2. The fabric does show every line so I had to wear spanx with it, but overall good experience. Very pretty color. I received lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: This is the dress that RTR is good for
links_reviews_text: The color of this dress was the real standout quality! I say its the reason RTR is worth it bc I would never buy a dress in this color because I couldn't rewear it, so renting is a perfect way to wear something daring like this. The cut was simple and classy and let the color do the talking. The chest fit me well, no slippage but definitely wear a strapless bra with it as the material is a little thin and shows all. The slit is great, the length hit just at the floor with 4 inch heels (I am 5'4) . The only complaint is that the stomach and hips were a little loose and definitely could've been tighter. My backup size was 4 and I didn't even try it on. The 0 could've been a better fit in the stomach but I'm afraid it wouldve been to small for my chest and the back clasp to close, so I stuck with the 2.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress in a gorgeous color
links_reviews_text: Super cute and got so many compliments about this dress

links_reviews_title: I had my prom and the dress was perfect for that. I stuck out because of the color and I love that.
links_reviews_text: Make sure you get it in your true size. I got a 2L and the length wasn’t perfect but it was big on my waist. The color was stunning and very flattering. I would 100% recommend this to anyone!

This dress was so great! I received so many compliments on the fit and color! I ordered a 6R and 8R. I normally wear a 6 but this dress is very form fitting so I sized up to the 8 so it was not as tight on my stomach. The slit in the front was also not too high. Absolutely loved!

I received this dress with a couple of small stains on the front and the silicone strip on the inside was peeling off, but I ended up wearing it anyways even over the replacements they sent because THE COLOR! I was going to a charity gala where the theme was prom and this color was too perfect not to wear. The dress fits true to size - fitted but straight. Stays in place so you aren't tugging on it all night, but it does wrinkle/crease very easily.

links_reviews_title: The color and fit are outstanding! (My picture does no justice to the color)
links_reviews_text: The striking gown is true to size. It looks beautiful in person.

links_reviews_title: The dress is absolutely stunning and the color is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I wear an 8 and I'm tall at 5' 9" so I got the 8L which was great with heels and the right length. It was a tiny big snug but it has movement too it so it worked. I wore a spanx like slip under it and you couldn't see it. The 10L fit a tiny bit better however the seam on the side (right at the hip) was coming unraveled so I couldn't wear it sadly.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, standout dress for a formal!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! I received so many compliments on it and the fun pop of color. It was super comfortable to wear- it fit in all of the right places on my petite figure without being too tight. The slit makes it fun, too! I would rent this dress again! Only con was that it was a tad long even with tall wedges on for me, but it was manageable!

The fit is tricky... you really need to figure out how to wear this piece and once on, the arms can't really move that much or it gets messy on the chest. Watch your posture to make this gorgeous piece really work for you and don't move your arms too much! I wore it to a Woman's Circle and to an Elton John concert. You can easily dress it up or down. Enjoy!
Fit was true to size. Kinda complicated to put on. Lots of compliments and great for athletic body types. Highlights shoulders and upper waist

I wore this shirt for my birthday dinner to a very upscale restaurant, it fit beautifully, was snug, and once I untangled it, I was in LOVE! I paired it with the ASTR Monica Skirt. I highly recommend it! The shirt itself didn’t move around a lot, I had to readjust it maybe twice, and the sleeves were a little long, but overall, I was very pleased with the look.

links_reviews_title: Perfect crop for the ultra high-waisted bottom
links_reviews_text: Endless compliments. Size up-runs small (I wore a large). I also wore this with high waisted jeans for a more casual day then with this skirt for derby day. Starting to separate at the top but can be covered up by adjusting the sweater.
It paired well with a high wasted shirt

links_reviews_title: Felt like being wrapped in an ace bandage.
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this top. It looked very unique on the model. However, it just didn't work in person. It was crazy to try to figure out how to properly get it on. The material was pretty thin and you would definitely need to wear a bra underneath. It wouldn't stay in place either. I felt like I was being wrapped up like a mummy.

This top is more of a cream than a true white color. It's made out of a gauze type of material, a little mummyish. I paired it with a neutral skirt. I received tons of compliments on the overall outfit. It's an off the shoulder top so it's perfect for date night, not practical for a night of dancing.
A little complicated to put on, but once it's on, fire!!!! Fit well, a bit tight. Glad I got a medium!

This took me so long to put on and once I got it situated I couldn't wait to get it back off. Looks great in the photos but looks like bandages in person. Skip this one but I'd love to see more attractive crops on RTR

Not that impressed by this top. Looked so cute on the model but it's a lot shorter in person. The fabric is very stretchy so it's comfy but it's really thin and sheer and the top kept riding up so I was constantly adjusting it all night. It's a strange design. I got a lot of compliments on it but I only wore it once and it's going back. I wouldn't buy this one.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color, soft, just couldn't figure out how to put it on.
links_reviews_text: I couldn't even figure out how to untangle this to get it on. I don't know if the one sent to me was damaged, or if it was just me, but I could not figure out how to put this on correctly.
I couldn't figure out how to get this on after about ten minutes of trying so I put it back in the bag.

links_reviews_title: Great base piece for the right styling.
links_reviews_text: Great base depending on how you style it. I wore it pregnant and with the growing bust line I felt a little like a milk mammy.
Loved this top fit snug and true to size.
Cute top, super hard to get on and maneuver in. Ended up not wearing it because the material is pretty thick.

I ordered this for everyday/weekend wear, and when it arrived, it took me a good 20 minutes to figure out how to put it on. It also looks much longer in the photo - in reality, it is very cropped. I wore it out once, and was fidgeting with the shirt all night. Giving two stars since I loved the color and the long sleeves.
So tight!!!

links_reviews_title: Rather confusing to untangle, but cute once you figure that out.
links_reviews_text: This was a doozy to untangle and figure out how to put on. Seems like whoever hung it up had the same problem figuring it out too, as it arrived in a jumble on the hanger. I spent fully 20 minutes trying to untangle it and get it on. Once on though, it was cute. Warning: I have a small frame and DD cup size, and the effect of this shirt was to make me look extra busty. So, good shirt if that is what you're looking for, but not really what I was looking for. Will return without wearing.

links_reviews_title: It is WAY shorter than it looks on this model
links_reviews_text: I *really* wanted this shirt to work, but unfortunately, it was just too short and hard to move in the way it goes over your shoulders. Did not wear out

This dress would have gotten 5 stars, but I needed help getting it on and off since there is NO ZIPPER! So strange and it made it super difficult to pull down over my rib cage and too tight around just one of my shoulders. So I had a pretty strong red line after getting the dress off at the end of the night. Super flattering and killer color. Recommend, but maybe go up one size??

links_reviews_title: So tight at first and then it stretched huge.
links_reviews_text: It was so pretty at first. I wore as part of my Tinkerbell costume. It's pretty long. A few hours into the night, it was a baggy super long dress. But I loved the color.
really tight around the arms

links_reviews_title: Tight in shoulders and arm pits
links_reviews_text: It's a cute dress. Fits nice in the body. But I have a fitness back and shoulder so it was a little tight and lacked stretch in the top. I didn't like the quality of the fabric. Nonetheless I got a lot to compliments

links_reviews_title: Super sexy and slinky, surprisingly flattering even without shapewear
links_reviews_text: Was difficult to get on/off; wouldn't have been able to manage without help. Definitely do your makeup AFTER getting dressed!
This dress is beautiful and unique. It is a little difficult to get off though.

links_reviews_title: Had to call my neighbor to get this off!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a nice color and although it appears it would have some stretch to it, it doesn't at ALLLLL! I had to really wiggle into it. I got the 34. I'm 5'2" and #100... could barely get it on. Was ok once it was on... was very tight through the rib cage though and I have a small one even being a small person, my rib cage is tiny. When I tried to take it off, I stopped when I heard a couple threads pop... I put on workout tights and my lovely neighbor had to help me take it off!!!

links_reviews_title: Its stylish. The stitching is a little weird but so am I. :)
links_reviews_text: no zipper so hope you choose wisely. I have been losing weight so I tried size 8 instead of 10 and it fit. I weighed 10 more pounds when wearing size 10. Whatever size you are it should fit.

links_reviews_title: Hard to get on, tight through chest
links_reviews_text: This was quite difficult to get into, even with a small b cup it was very tight across the chest. Several people commented that they thought it was 'risqué' for work. I didn't think so but apparently that's how it reads!

Love the detail of this top. The fit is a little odd, definitely size up. It was tight in the chest, but loose in the stomach. Arms fit fine. The zipper was difficult, so make sure you have a friend to help!

LOVED this beautiful top and will try to rent again for the right occasion. I wore it for a special date night and it was perfect paired with some high-rise skinny jeans (it is cropped, hit me right below the belly button). I have a small chest and was able to wear the XS comfortably without a bra - larger chested women will probably want to size up. The front chest is fully lined, the back is just the lace material so it is completely see-through; just something to note if you do want to wear a bra with it.
Very flattering shirt. Pretty color. Fit was just perfect. So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: This shirt fits like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I am normally a small in Women's shirts but did a Medium due to the reviews. I recommend if you have a larger bust to definitely go up a size. The Medium fit me perfectly and I am average.
This top is gorgeous with great sleeves and a really flattering neckline. However it runs pretty small and the zipper is such a pain to work with
Tough to zip myself! Many compliments

I loved this top and got so many compliments. A lot of the reviews said the fit was too tight, but if you have a smaller bust like myself the fit works. I'm usually a medium in fitted shirts and this worked great for me.
Loved the color and fabric of this top. Gorgeous and would rent again!
It's beautiful. Do rent if you don't mind going braless. I'd buy it if it was more affordable.
So elegant and hot! Perfect fit

links_reviews_title: Tried on but did not end up wearing, fit snug in chest.
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous lace back. Can't really wear a bra with it. Fit snug in chest and I'm only a 34C
The overall fit is true to size except when it comes to the bust. Too small and doesn't look flattering.

My torso isn't even that long and it was super short on me. Although the lace is hardy and it's a lovely color I can't recommend this top.
The overall fit was great for my petite 5' 98-LB frame. It was a beautiful color. It was cute but I have liked other items better.

links_reviews_title: Unique shirt! But overall fit is very small.

links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect for someone with a smallish chest. No cons other than impossible to wear a coat with the wide sleeves.

links_reviews_title: Flattering on waist but arms were weird
links_reviews_text: Parts of this piece are amazing: the fit and the fabric. But the arms were weirdly wide and just were flattering for my frame. Probably best for very thin frames or those trying to hide problem area arms.
feminine fit
Size up if you're between sizes - no stretch. Beautiful detail.

Love this top! The back is sheer lace, which Somehow I missed before ordering! However it shouldn't be a problem with a tan bra a sticky bra. For being a big oversized, and thick lace...it's extremely flattering. The sleeves and color are gorge!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shade of pink with intricate details.

I have a pretty small chest but am curvy otherwise and it was crazy tight. I could barely get it on, and definitely couldn't zip it up. If I tried this one again I would maybe consider the XL but probably won't.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but couldn't wear. Runs small

links_reviews_title: No room for boobs in this top

It's a beautiful top with fantastic details. However, this thing fits so weird at the chest. You can't wear a bra so I used some breast lift tape to lift me up. That helped but really there's not enough room or support. If you have a chest, good luck making sure your boobs are where you want them to be. If you don't have much up top, good luck filling out the weird shape.

links_reviews_text: Looked good on.

Beautiful top, but runs small! Also something to note is the back is see through, so I would need to wear a top underneath to wear it to work. I will be renting again when they have the larger size available. I am hoping the large size is longer in length for my longer torso.
Beautiful skirt. True to size and great fit. Great details and color.

Beautiful skirt! The 12 looked smaller that expected, but they waistband has a ton of stretch and is very comfortable. The skirt is very flowy. Does not cling fall tight anywhere even with me being very bottom heavy. I'm 5'4 and wore this highwaisted with flats. For me it look best paired with a very tight tank. I would recommend something fitted, even a body suit.
Elastic waist and could be dressed up or down.

links_reviews_title: Cute concept, but not executed well on me.
links_reviews_text: So I have a booty and some hips on me. Didn't think this skirt was the most flattering for my body type. Nevertheless, the skirt is super cute and flows. Nice light material and that slit give me life. Perhaps, I should've sized up...?

I received so many compliments on this skirt. I could even hear people talking about it as I walked by them. The waist band is elastic so could wear at the hips or as high waisted. The flow was beautiful
Wore it to a date night and church in the same weekend :) got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty, and tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: I want to justify the $237 price tag on this skirt!!! I am not letting this one go any time soon. I loooved this skirt. So comfortable and cute. It took me forever to find a top to wear with it, but I finally found success in an Elizabeth and James navy crop top (also RTR).

links_reviews_title: Great skirt for casual or dressy
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this skirt. Perfect fit. Casual or dress up- wore to dinner twice and both times got so many compliments. Would have kept it longer, but I needed to free up a spot!
Loved this skirt! It fits true to size to maybe slightly large. I love the waistband. Doesnt pinch and is so comfortable. Def recommend!

Worn to the bridal party make up and hair appointment prior to wedding in the PM. It was humid in FL so this was ideal with flats and a tank. Fit was loose but the elastic band kept it up. Flowy and lovely

I don't usually wear skirts, so I went out on a limb and tried this one. It fit perfectly and I got so many compliments. There are so many different colors in the skirt, that I fell like I would have so many different options for sweaters to go with it, or even a cut fitted tank that I could wear tucked in or out without a sweater. The waistband was comfortable, so I could wear it high like I did, or lower on my waist. It can be dressed up or down and was very flowy. Loved it!

This skirt is lovely! Perfect for work or for a casual weekend thing depending on what top you pair it with. It can also work with heels or flats. The print is so pretty and the cut is really fun and flirty. I could've gone a size down but the 6 was just fine as well. It has a lot of forgiveness in the waist. Very flattering too!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear! Can easily be dressed up or down!
links_reviews_text: I would rent this again! Skirt is very thin material, but didn't really matter. I wore it for Mother's Day and gave it a more casual look with flip flops and a denim jacket, but could have easily been dressed up with heels and a nicer blouse. Seems like this would be perfect for any daytime spring affair, like a brunch, shower, etc.... it felt delicate and pattern was bright and beautiful.
A fun 'flowy ' skirt to wear. I just wish it would have been a warmer weekend here in LA when I wore it! I would like to rent this one again.
Perfect skirt for 70s and sunny!! Could not have had a better rental for vacation!
Wore this for a work event, was beautiful and received many compliments but didn't feel it was that flattering.
Completely stunning skirt to add a fun and flirty twist to any occasion.

links_reviews_title: WOW I LOVE THIS SO MUCH

The cutest skirt ever and will 10000% be renting again

cute

La use para un concierto. Me encanto la delicadeza del diseño y el color. Formal pero sexy a la misma vez.

Loved this top! Definitely going to try renting it in black as well. I got tons of compliments and felt very comfortable in it. My suggestion is to go without a bra which is how I wore it. There is also plenty of room in the chest which was great, the waist area does not have much give but the 4 fit me perfectly so that was not an issue. Definitley would recommend and rent again.

It was still cute though. I did not find the material to be scratchy at all like some people said. The color was beautiful, just as pictured.

links_reviews_title: Pretty top, but I did not wear it to my work event.

You could see my belly button in the portion that was see through. I tried to find a nude take to wear under it, but that did not look right. It's a very pretty top, and had I been going to a different holiday party, I would have worn it, but I did not think it was appropriate for my work environment (fairly conservative).

Fits well. Comfortable. Even has pockets.

I rented this to wear on my birthday and it was absolutely perfect!! Definitely true to size. It gave me more of a feminine figure. I felt fantastic in it. I love when dresses have lingerie straps to hide your bra.

This dress was awesome. Beautiful fitted up top with a nice full skirt, and pockets! Being tall I'm always questionable about length but this was a great length for me. The dress had some really nice functional details like snaps to hold your bra strap under the dress strap and did I mention the pockets?

I rented this dress for a work event and it was perfect. It wasn't too revealing and the colors were gorgeous. I loved the pockets and the fit. I never think of purchasing items, but I would consider purchasing this to keep in my closet!
I loved the fit. The fabric was light and perfect for a hot summer day. I felt wonderful in it.
Comfortable and colorful
I love the neckline & wore a strapless bra. The top has some stretch which was great for my ex-swimmer shoulders. The length was perfect- I'm 5'10" and the print was super fun!

Fun, tropical print. Perfect for outside. Day or evening. Cotton material. Lined. Full skirt with pockets. Runs slightly big. I'm between 0-2 but usually go for the 2 if fitted in the chest. Only 0 was available so I gave it a try. Full bottom is very forgiving. Chest was snug but fit well with ample coverage.

This dress was great. It was nice enough to wear to a party but causal enough to wear during the day. You can wear a bra with this which is a huge plus for me. There are clips in the straps to hold bra straps in place but this made the dress sit weird and my bra more visible. There are also pockets!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress but runs large
links_reviews_text: I loved their dress, the fabric is super soft, bright and fun. Although I made it work, I wish I had gone down a size, I wear a 34 DD bra and it was large in the bust and the waist. The fabric does come some give and so if in doubt I recommend going down a size. Great for everyday, vacation, at the weekend you could make it a little funkier with a leather/denim jacket with sneakers or even biker/doc marten boots. It could even be dressed up for a fun summer evening with wedges or sandals, but I wouldn't say it's a formal affair dress.

links_reviews_title: Hibiscus for a Hawaiian night out!!

links_reviews_title: I brought this to Mexico in February.
links_reviews_text: Fit as described! The fabric is stretchy, which helped since I'm a bit busty.
So many compliments! Wore it 3x!

The square neckline and bright color is really fun while fuller skirt is flattering and belly hiding. I'm large up top and it's hard to find to a dress that will fit, so while it shows some cleavage, it's in a flattering cut and may not be as low on people taller than 5 ft. I dressed down with a jean jacket and wedges but could be dressed up with fun heels easily. Intended to only wear it for a birthday party but found more excuses for it! Would def recommend, especially for curvier girls looking for a fun flattering dress.

links_reviews_title: I did not wear dress too small at the top.
links_reviews_text: Dress was too small so I was not able to wear it...pretty dress though.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress but did not love the material.
links_reviews_text: This dress hugs your top in a very flattering way. But I was expecting better material based on the price. It's a basic cotton like material. It's thick enough so it doesn't look cheap but I wanted something softer. I suppose it was necessary to maintain the body of the skirt part which was also adorable. I wore it on vacation but for dress up dinner. Size is true to size but a bit of stretch which was nice and made it very comfortable to wear. It's nice casual summer outing dress but I won't wear this on more formal event.

links_reviews_title: Dress is cute but runs a little "poofy" in the bottom half.
links_reviews_text: This dress was rented for a cruise and I didn't end up wearing it. The top part fit well and had two layers so I could have probably gotten away with no bra which is nice. The bottom part however poofed out a lot and make me look slightly bigger. Pros: well built dress, thicker material that wasn't see through at all, it has POCKETS, I feel like this is a great Mom's dress. Cons: No stretch in the fabric, ran a little bit long so wasn't as cute on my figure, and the poof pulled out my stomach / waist line that I didn't want to hide.
Comfortable, true to size, and loved the pockets.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but way too small

This was probably the best dress I have rented from RTR! It was incredibly flattering and the fit was perfect. I am regularly a size 10 and the dress in the same size was perfect. The length was so pretty and the slit added a little touch of sexy. I was able to wear my own strapless bra.

Gorgeous material and draping - made me feel really elegant. I'm 5'5", so it was more of a mid-calf length on me, but the slit on the side was definitely mid-thigh (higher than I expected). It was really nice to feel all dressed up but also covered up, so I didn't feel like I needed to keep my tummy sucked in at all times. Highly recommend!!

I rented this for an event and loved the look. It fits more snug on the bottom, with hem to the knee and a higher slit. The top can hide a sin or two. I loved the color, which matches my eyes and felt sexy. The material was just too heavy for the tail end of summer in Michigan. I'd rent it again when the weather is cooler.
The dress runs slightly larger so I was able to wear a size 10 instead of my current normal size 12. It was flattering and held me in in the middle. I received so many compliments!

Wore to work and out to date night afterwards. Lots of compliments but seemed many thought it was out of the ordinary fancy for office, questions on why so dressed up for a Friday night as well. Will rent again for the right occasion. Fit was comfortable and flattering, and color is soft and beautiful. Loved it!

This dress is stunning! The color is beautifully bright, the material is very nice and the shape is fabulous and flattering. The 2R was the size for me- although I am a little smaller up top, so I used fashion tape under the under arm. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: If you are between sizes, size down!
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. Will definitely rent again! I didn't want it to be too small so I ordered the bigger size and I should've done my normal size/sized down! Received so many compliments!!

This dress runs large for Halston Heritage. I ordered the 14 because I was worried about it being tight around the arms but definitely needed a size 12. Will be renting again in the right size! I wouldn't upsize on this dress, large or true to size.

links_reviews_title: Giving my daughter a fun distraction from the day-to-day
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and well constructed.
Loved this dress!! Perfect for a semi-formal night out to dinner for destination bachelorette party... can't wait to order again!
Loved this dress. It's a beautiful cut. There's a slip, and the top layer is thicker than I imagined. Comfortable. Compliments all night long!

First off, wore the adhesive push up bra with it and va va voom :) My husband loved it and I received compliments all night! Fabric was a bit stretchy and thick so fit well in all the right places! Amazing!
Wore to a cocktail attire gala. Paired with black pumps and a black shawl. Felt super sexy and got compliments all night. Didn't need a bra, dress fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Cushnie is always a good idea
links_reviews_text: I'm a straight and narrow so this prob wasn't the best choice for me. But it fit well and I received some compliments. If you are more of a sz 2-10 hourglass, this is definitely the dress for you.
would 100% recommend. easy to wear.

I loved this cute black dress. It's so classy with a hint of sassy due to the cutouts on the sides. It was so comfortable, it fit perfectly. It didn't have much stretch, only alittle. Wearing a bra is not ideal because of those cutouts and straps being so thin. One of my favorite pieces on RTR thus far. Don't think about it, Just. Get it!!

Stunning, sexy dress - simple, memorable and chic. Comfortable material & flattering length. It's snug, but true to size. I wore this to a gala dinner (alongside my brother). And was given so many complements that night and even had someone tell me how "amazing" I looked weeks later!

I selected this after the outfit I originally picked was not available. The dress was a great length and fabric was very comfortable, but I couldn't go without a bra (D cup). I ended up buying one of those chicken cutlet style stick on bras (invest in a good one!) and that worked well since all my strapless bras either showed through the cutouts or out the top. I would have liked a little tighter on the straps, but worked out well and I received some compliments!

links_reviews_title: Basic black dress online but KNOCK OUT in person!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress because it looked like a basic/safe dress online, but it should have been my first choice all along! Nicely hugs curves while the thick material sucks you in and is extremely confortable! Top is somewhat revealing but I had no problem with it all night and was able to dance without worrying about straps or wardrobe malfunctions--granted im a b cup. I liked the length because I dont like showing my knees. I felt sexy but covered at the same time. I felt amazing in this dress. Absolutely loved it!

I received this dress as a replacement for my original order which was returned damaged. However, I was very happy with this one! It had sexy detailing, like the cut-out sides, but still had a sense of sophistication and sleekness. Runs true-to-size, and obviously a high-quality and well-made dress.
I wore this dress for an Oscar Viewing party in NYC , it had just the right glam and just the right "whoa"!

links_reviews_title: Little black dress with stunning details!
links_reviews_text: Perfect little black dress with stunning details! This dress runs true to size, but it is a fitted style so if you are curvy, I would recommend going up a size. I wore this dress without a bra, but it can be worn with a Nubra. I am 5'11 and the dress fell a little over an inch below the knee. It may be a little longer on woman who are shorter than me. The dress has little to no stretch. It is perfect for a date night, or any other occasion where you would wear a LBD because it is fun and sexy!
Loved this dress! It fit like a glove and it's great quality.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a cocktail party or club
links_reviews_text: Little tight around the rib cage, loose on top. Overall, excellent!!!

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove - classy yet still sexy.
links_reviews_text: All around perfect for me, but if you are not comfortable showing some skin you may feel awkward.
I really liked this dress. It hit below the knee and plunged low in the neckline. The cutouts were fun detail too. Super comfortable and easy to dance in without having to fix or pull anything up.

I was a huge fan of this dress by the way it hugged my body. The only downside was that it doesnt taper to the bust and rib cage area as well as I was hoping. The waist down fit like a glove though so keep in mind if your dimensions are more hourglass shaped.

links_reviews_title: Too tight/ sexy for a wedding.
links_reviews_text: I'm petite but curvy with a large chest and the 4 was too "va va voom" for wedding.

links_reviews_title: It was sexy without being too much
links_reviews_text: Form fitted - good stretch but more like a bodycon dress - Very tasteful but I was unsure if it was too hugging for my event - did not wear it.

Cushnie is hit or miss for me and this style was a HIT! Fit was great, very true to size. It's designed to show off the woman wearing it. So if you're in good shape - go for it! The dress looks classy, expensive. You can't wear a bra but it provides good support - sort of like a decent bikini top. My husband loved it and so did all of my friends.
Fits like a glove. Runs true to size nice and snug. excellent design.
This dress is gorgeous and fits nicely around the body. The cut-outs are somehow elegant vs. vulgar. Would definitely rent again!
I typically can wear a 4 or 6. But this 6 was way to big. The material under the bust was gapping & just hanging. I would possible try it in a smaller size in the future. I'm 5'6, 32D, 125lb
The zipper was a little sticky on the dress, but beautiful print and design

This dress is rich and has great quality. The top layer is actually sheer with all of the embroidery work. It is a heavy dress but it doesn't feel heavy with the satin layer underneath. It feels Like you are wearing a slip. The adjustable straps are great if you are shorter waisted like me. While I did size down, the dress was still too big to be flattering. I could pull an inch out on all sides. If you have a smaller waist, you need 2 sizes down.

links_reviews_title: Like wearing a work of art
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a semi-formal, holiday cocktail party and loved the way it fit. It's a heavy dress...the embroidery makes the fabric thick and lush. Fall and winter would be appropriate for the colors and heavy texture of the dress. It's simply gorgeous.
Love this dress! I wore it for my sister's November shower, and I may wear it forever? Note: It is long and warm and beautiful.
I wore this for an Indian fusion wedding. This dress fits true to size- I'm a 28 waist, 34C and it just zipped. Adjustable straps were great.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress - fits like a glove and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The photos online do not do this dress justice! The embroidery and colors are just breathtaking! Perfect fit and flare without too much flare. I have no cons about this dress. Simply stunning!
This was my fourth Indian wedding this year, and I got tired of spending so much on outfits. This worked and I got a few compliments too!
Such an absolutely stunning dress, but weird length. Would definitely look better on a shorter person with bigger boobs than me.

This dress was perfect for a September wedding. It was colorful, beautifully made and formal enough without feeling like a gown. The one thing I'd note is that the zipper is delicate for the weight of the fabric so having help is critical. Loved wearing this dress to a wedding and was able to dance the night away in it as well without it feeling too heavy.

Got this for a late summer/early fall wedding. PERFECT. Fit like a glove and I have wider hips/smaller bust. Got compliments all night. Easy to move around in a little heavy but the good kind of heavy! Don't want to return it!

5'9" 152lbs, D chest. No problem with the dress size 6L. Maybe a 8 would have been ok. I packed for a trip. No wrinkles. Beautiful color for a Europe summer night. I like the thickness since it gets around 68 at night in Europe. Great rental.

links_reviews_title: So pretty and fit so well.
links_reviews_text: Loved the embroidery even though it did make the weight a bit heavier. Fit so well in all the right places. Wish I would have had a more perfect place to show it off.

Beautiful dress and runs true to size. Only issue with the dress is the fabric is extremely thick. This would be a perfect fall dress but I didn't end up wearing it on the weekend I planned because it was too hot. Would definitely rent in the future when it gets cooler out!
true to size, was comfortable and flattering !!
Wore this to garba and I fit in well without having to be in actual indian clothes. Very comfortable! A bit on the heavy side but wasn't a problem. Beautiful dress!

Wore this to a summer outdoor wedding with a "funky formal" dress code. The tea length was perfect for being outdoors and the dress was a huge hit. Was able to go braless but some lift tape helped with how things sat. The heavy embroidery on this dress makes it really beautiful in person. I did not find it to be oppressively warm as some other reviews mentioned. Black trim makes it easy to match shoes, bag, etc. This one's a winner!

Absolute favorite rental by far! Received endless compliments on this dress all night. Despite a thicker and heavier material, I never felt overheated, even in the North Carolina heat! I was able to wear without a bra. I vary between sizes 8 & 10 and had to go with the 10 on this as the back was tight to close. I'm 5'9 and the dress went just above my ankle

links_reviews_title: Beautiful coloring and detail. The perfect summer dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Usually between a 6 and 8, went with an 8 and it zipped up like a dream!

I love this dress! The fit was true to size. It was very flattering and created an hourglass effect for my figure. I liked it because it showed off my arms (and I've been doing a lot of push-ups lately haha). The dress was very heavy and felt like I was wearing a curtain. I also struggled with the length. I am 5'8" and the length was just above my ankles whereas in the stock photo it was a few inches above the ankles. I would rent again and recommend this very highly!

I wore this dress to my high school prom and it fit me to a tee! As soon as I laid eyes on this dress I knew it was perfect and I was not disappointed. In fact, the embroidery in person is even more stunningly beautiful than any photo is able to capture. I ordered a 0 and a 2 but ended up using the size 2. It is relatively heavy but not enough to be uncomfortable. The fit is snug around the top and it lays loose after the sinch at the waist. I wore it all night without any problem and was sad to take it off :( Although it says it is a midi dress, it ended up being about ankle length on me which ended up working excellently for a prom dress. Overall, fabulous dress and I was sad to send it back!!!

This dress was magical, and won the evening. I wore it for a late spring wedding at a rustic vineyard and received compliments all evening long. It fit beautifully and was so beautifully made. The weight is great and the fabric has a beautiful gold glow in the right lighting. I felt like a floral Harvest Princess!

Dress fell around my ankle so I was able to wear heels or shoes. Loved the pattern and feel. I do wish the waist had been a tad tighter to give the waist a more sinched look but that's just me. The pattern is lovely in person but watch out for loose threads on the embroidery.
This dress was perfect for a wedding in Cartagena! The dress is heavy, but it was so comfortable to wear all night long. I got a ton of compliments and was sad to return it!

This was a beautiful dress! I'm a shorty (5'0") so it was almost full length on me which was fine! I am either a 10 or a 12 depending on the cut of a garment and the 12 was good on me. I got tons of compliments, and the embroidery was beautiful.

Wore this to a Cotillion presentation. This is a thick fabric so it's very flattering to your back. However, it doesn't give and I should have ordered one size up for my backup. I was able to dance in this. The ultimate compliment was that a college guy sent my daughter a Snapchat of me and said "Your mom looks pretty"! I stood out in a sea of moms in black gowns. Note that I'm close to 5'7' and it went to the top of my heel NOT tea length but more formal.

Wore this dress for a wedding that requested colorful attire. Most of the night I kept my coat on (outdoors) which hid that it was a bit snug around my rib cage, and I am a true 10. Otherwise beautiful - would rent again!

When I first placed my order I had my sights set on this dress but it wasn't available in my size for the dates I needed. The dress I picked after came damaged in both sizes and they sent me a backup that I didn't choose. Customer service was extremely helpful in resolving the issue and to my surprise and excitement this dress was available in my size. They overnighted it to me and it got to me in time for my 3:00 wedding. Got SO many compliments on it! The embroidery is absolutely stunning and the dress was heavy enough to keep me warm at an October wedding on the water. The only thing I was nervous about was the straps being too thin to support the weight of the dress but it was totally fine. I didn't want to send the dress back I loved it so much!

I love this dress for a fall wedding. I actually wore it to an Indian wedding where a lot of other guests wore saris, and felt like it fit right in! It fits true to size, but has no stretch. I'm 5'2" and it came to just an inch or so above the ground on me- a slightly awkward length but not enough that it looked bad. I have a narrow rib cage so it was a little loose on me standing. Though I ended up being glad about that after dinner. As many other reviewers have noted, you don't need a bra because the fabric is thick and somewhat structured. I was worried the skinny straps would dig into my shoulders but it wasn't a problem.

This dress is so beautiful and fun! I got so many compliments! The dress is extremely detailed- the stitched flowers added another level to the look. The dress is slightly heavy but I did not feel like it weighed me down. The fit is very flattering. Worn to a late September wedding.
Love everything about this dress! Color fit and quality!!!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for a colorful Indian wedding, I felt amazing and was complimented many times.
links_reviews_text: The straps came broke, RTR offered to pay for the repair so luckily my seamstress fit me in! Great customer service.

links_reviews_title: So much love and dancing at a wedding of two dear friends!
links_reviews_text: The 2 fit better than the 4. Was sturdy but thicker than anticipated. Stood out from the crowd int he best way! However, the zipper broke right as I arrived at the venue and as I had no time to run home and change before this wedding started, I had to safety pin myself into the dress. Even with this issue, the dress held up just fine and I was able to dance the night away while celebrating the marriage of good friends!
The fit was a 6 but with no forgiveness. I loved the dress and the detailing work looked much better in real life
I got so many compliments on this gorgeous dress. It was perfect for Napa wine tasting on my birthday.

Okay, the dress looks pretty in the photos, but the real wow moment is when you see the embroidery. It's so beautiful and bright! Very well made dress and the fabric is heavy enough keep the silhouette. I got compliments from so many people on this dress. Great choice!

While this dress was essentially my back-ups' back-ups' back-up, it is a unique and comfortable dress with beautiful embroidery (which added weight). I found it a little loud for the wedding, but wore it anyway since this wedding in particular had some colorful Indian influences. Even at 6'1", I thought the length was especially flattering. If you have a small rib cage, size down! And a bra was hardly necessary.

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this for Indian wedding
links_reviews_text: Beautiful detailed dress in heavy embroidered tapestry like fabric. Vibrant colors. Worked beautifully for an Indian wedding.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for daughters dance recital
links_reviews_text: Love the embroidery on this dress. Very thick fabric. Not very much room in the chest area but still doable
Gorgeous detailing, but the straps are thin relative to fabric weight so they dig in a bit. Not bra needed.

Loved it. Rented this size Based on availability, but could have sized down for better support. Nonetheless pretty comfortable. Just a really fun flattering colorful and unique dress. I highly recommend it!

Like other reviewers stated, this is a complicated top and my fiancé had to help me get in it. The fabric has no stretch so make sure you size appropriately. If you have a large chest I would recommend sizing up. I did love the color and it was a unique piece.

links_reviews_title: can't go wrong with a casual cape
links_reviews_text: Admittedly, trying to put this on felt like assembling a rubik's cube but once I figured jr out it was totally worth it. I originally rented a size 8 and it fit but was right across my chest so I sized up. You can easily dress this top up or down, I wore it with jeans to a meeting and got lots of compliments

links_reviews_title: The color is gorgeous, but size up!
links_reviews_text: I'll probably try this again, it's a beautiful color and really nice fabric. Way too small.

Both my colleague and I tried to figure out how to get this top on and couldn't, the fabric is very light and it just kept falling as we tried to place it on each other. We called in back up and even with a third hand on deck we literally couldn't figure this top out or get it on! This may be too high above my fashion level ha.
Once I figured out how to get this on, it was super small and awkward. I gave up and ended up not wearing this piece.
My husband and I could not figure out where to hook the t-strap. I got so frustrated and sweaty because we were going to be late that I never wore this top. It's beautiful and seemed to fit well.
Wore this on a date and got a million compliments! It's a very understated sexy top, perfect for a date!
I really liked this dress; it was flowy and comfortable. I would size down maybe, the sleeves were pretty big and since it isn't form fitting the smaller size looks better.

links_reviews_title: Good work dress. Be careful up top!
links_reviews_text: Great dress for work as long as you're careful with the keyhole. Suggest a bandeau even if you're not the chestiest. It was a struggle to keep my bra from poking out.

links_reviews_title: Rocked this to multiple events while being fashionable and comfortable the whole time.
links_reviews_text: Fit on this one was great. I wanted to wear it to work but the key hole in the front was too revealing for me as someone who is a bit more busty. Would totally rent this again.
Wore it several times - to work, to a party, to drinks with a friend. Versatile dress. Neck seemed a bit crooked, but nothing major.
While this isnt my style, it was a nice piece to rent for work. Got lots of compliments on the silouette & pattern and it made for an easy morning to get ready. Comfortable to wear.

links_reviews_title: High school awards night dress success
links_reviews_text: Very beautiful flower dress I wore to host HS awards night. Very Flowy and super soft to wear!
I work this to work. It was just a little low cut. The cut was flattering and I loved the pattern.
I loved the bubble sleeves on this dress and the silhouette was lovely. I think it would've looked better without tights and a higher heel, but it was a cold, cold day in March.

Such a beautiful pattern to kick off the start of spring! Love the flare this dress offers. Super comfortable. I do agree with other reviews that the opening in the front is a little too revealing for work. I fixed that by pinning a black safety pin to the inside of the dress to close it up a bit. Other than that i really love this dress and will order it again!

I LOVED this dress!! Wore it three times and was seriously considering buying it! Hits all the marks - comfy, flattering, cute print and the style is on-point. The fabric is VERY light and thin so if you're renting in the fall plan to pair it with tights and/or a tank. The empire cut in the front (which drops to a natural waist in the back) was super cute, flattering and worked with my 21-week bump. Would be totally cute without a bump as well. LOVE!!!
Adorable dress and extremely comfortable but runs a bit large. I am a pretty true medium, and i could have worn a small in this dress.
Very cute dress, comfortable and airy! Perfect for the spring. The keyhole shows lots of cleavage, if you are on the bustier side.
Sleeves are big but it works. Doesnt show off my figure like other dresses but worth it for this cute dress
I got both the M and L. Both fit but it was too much clevage in the M. The L was lose and comfortable. I am renting this for a second tine next week.
Keyhole was a bit too low for me so pinned it higher for work. Bell sleeves swallowed my hands so I rolled them up to my elbows. Fit great everywhere else though.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, very flowy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Great dress, felt comfortable and pretty. Dress is somewhat sheer, so be careful if you're out in the sun. I'm not a fan of the fabric it's made of, but I knew that's what I was getting before I rented it. The keyhole in the front is low cut.
I wore this dress for a birthday party. I usually wear XL but was able to wear L without a problem. Very comfortable. The pattern is beautiful! I got a lot of complements. I would rent again!

The dress was a bit tight around the bust area but I normally have trouble with that area. Large fit great. I think an XL would have been too big and wouldnt have been as fitted. It flowed well. I received many complements on the dress. It does show a but more bust than I thought but it still looked good.

Medium fit perfectly for my small top size and larger bottom size (34B -28 - 40). If you have larger top, size up. Flowy sleeves gather at wrists, length is to knees (5'6"). Wore with tights but could be without for warmer weather. Thin enough to layer if you need a sweater. Would Rent again!

Excuse the goofy. I tried to show the sleeves in the pic. Pretty dress, but also very lightweight fabric. Don't get me wrong - the fabric is lovely and better up close, but we are also in a cold snap and Im worried I might freeze before I reach the first marker. Going to see if I can make this work with a slip, tights, and boots. Or just wait for it to warm up, I guess.

Not tight anywhere, so you might say it runs a little big. The shoulders and length hit where they were supposed to, so I said true to size. The length isn't too short. The only concern I had with this dress was how low cut the cut out is in the chest. It wasn't bad when standing, but had to be careful when sitting or bending over.
Great simple dress.

I wanted this to work because despite the material being way too thin, it was really cute. But the top part fit me much too loosely so it looked sort of baggy and unflattering. I'll try again in a size smaller than my usual!

I was surprised by how much I enjoyed this dress. I rented this for a casual November wedding, and I loved how well this works for a transitional season. I especially liked the small details in the neckline and sleeves. This suited my body type well - small on top, larger on the bottom - but I didn't end up wearing it because it ran small and made me look pregnant. Next time I would go with the M.

links_reviews_title: Really cute but runs a little big
links_reviews_text: Great looking dress with a fun pattern and cut out but runs a little big especially in the sleeves. Nice for fall but lightweight fabric.
Dress was comfy and easy to wear. I'm not busty so the slit in the front was fine for work on me. I found the colors washed me out. Overall not the most flattering, but fine for every day.
way too big... did not wear
Great profile and flow.

Wore this for a mother's day brunch and really enjoyed it! The fit is true to size, the patterns is very cute, and the only downside is that the fabric has a cheap feel to it. Even then, it's not particularly noticeable to to others thanks to the print so...rent away!

I had my eye on this one for some time. The print is vibrant and the material is nice and light. I didn't realize how much of an empire waist it was but it definitely was really only fitted under the bust. The only negative was the keyhole was very low and open on the Medium for the event I rented it for. I tried the larger size and it was way to big so I think it is intended to be a tad open. Just a FYI for bustier renters!

Though I did not end up wearing it to work. It was a bit clingy to my stomach and I didn't feel it was flattering enough. Great looking dress though! This and light fabric but thick enough not to see through. A lower cut for work so I would have worn a cami underneath for not too much cleavage.

Dress fit true to size. I wore it for a day wedding where the attire was dressy-casual. If you love wearing black but need to be more festive, this dress definitely works. Was a great spin on my usual go-to black dress livened up with a bright floral print!

Wore this to a baby shower at -7 weeks pregnant. Super cute and received lots of compliments. I didn't love the way it looked in photos though. Not very shape-flattering. Kind of boxy. I did get compliments on it though.
Super cute and flattering. Got many compliments. True to size. I think it looks cuter in person. It looks boxy in the picture but actually has a somewhat tapered waist that is flattering.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. Perfect for a fall outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: I'm in the middle of saying this runs small and this is true to size. I normally wear a size medium. The medium fit me, but I was a little bloated that day and I didn't feel that the medium was flattering on me. I decided to go with the large. I was much more comfortable in the large. I'm 5'5" and weigh 145.
This dress was cute, but not really by style. I thought the skirt flared out a bit more than shown in photos. The fit was great and true to size.

I wore this dress for thanksgiving. I'm currently 24 weeks pregnant, 5'4 160lbs. My chest size is roughly a 34 DDD. This dress fit me perfectly besides there being a little too much showing from the keyhole in the front so I wore a little bralette with it to cover. The empire waist gave me enough room for my belly and it was about knee length. I got tons of compliments and I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: This is a cute dress for work.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves are pretty puffy at the wrist, but otherwise the fit is straightforward and comfortable!
The sleeves are extremely long and made It unwearable.

Great dress. Flattering cut and material. Runs large. I'm 5'6", 180 w a weird "had a baby a few months ago but I used to be super athletic" build... Got an xl, but would have been better in a l or m. I did wear a slip under because it's cool / fall here, the dress may be a touch see thru and there is quite a bit of clevage w the keyhole neckline.

I read the reviews and it did help a lot as this dress does run smaller due to the UK sizing. So take that into consideration. I am usually a size 2 in Nicole Miller if that helps at all and I wore the 6R. What a phenomenal dress it is. By far my fav. It made me feel beautiful, sexy and confident. It is unforgiving in fit and the leg slit is high, but be confident and you'll carry it off!! It was super comfortable, no issues at all. The drop shoulder didn't budge at all and I wear the silicone bra inserts so no show for straps or worrying about adjusting every five minutes. HIGHLY recommend!!!
The dress is the perfect combination of comfortable, elegant and sexy. I wore it to a gala and was comfortable the entire 6 hours. Would recommend this dress! Size up
Loved this dress so much. It does run very small... I'm normally a 0-2 and rented the 4. It was very form fitting - I could have been more comfortable in the 6 but it wasn't an option.

This dress is about 4 sizes smaller than what you normally wear. I am 5'8' and around 150 pounds. I normally wear a size 8 and I ordered a 12Long and it fit PERFECT! I can't tell you how many compliments I got on this dress. Super comfy, elegant, very slimming. You need this dress!
Beautiful , classy and extremely comfortable.
Dress was beautiful and received many compliments all night! Length was great even with heels. Does run small so I sized up and it fit perfectly. Material is very thick

Definitely glad I listened to the comments - this dress runs small and is not forgiving! I am 5'5" 130 pounds and usually wear a 6. I wore the US8/UK12 and it was perfect but very tight. I am not a curvy person and that's the only reason I could get it zipped. Get at least 1-2 sizes larger than you normally wear . However - once on it is elegant, classy, and sexy! I got a lot of compliments!
I rented this dress for a formal event, and loved it! Fit is snug for sure, but the dress does stretch. Great dress!

Really great take on a classic black dress. It does run small as reviews say. I'd order two sizes up. I'm 5'5 and wore 3.5/4 inch heels and the Long was perfect on me. Overall it was a good dress. The neckline did lay funny after a while.

This dress was awesome! I did not want to return it. It does run super small according to UK size. If you go by the US sizing it does run true to size- I normally wear an eight but wore the 12 long. Gorgeous and flattering considering I've had a bunch of babies. No need for spanx or a bra! Easy to dance in! A little tough to get on (Do hair after!) Definitely recommend!

I LOVED THIS DRESS. It was comfy and such good quality. I ordered my size (US 0) and a size above (US 2) and ended up wearing the US 2. The US 0 could've worked but the 2 was more comfortable. Don't take a chance, get a size up just in case. Other than that, no issues. It was perfect. I'd rent again.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! Perfect for a black tie wedding. Elegant and classy.
links_reviews_text: I'm a first time renter and I followed all the reviews. The dress runs VERY VERY small. However, the black is very slimming even if you don't feel slim. The slit is a little high for normal spanx, so I wore the shortest ones I could find without there being too much of a noticeable line. The material is good thick quality. I loved the long sleeves, but the open shoulder made the dress! I received so many compliments all night. I paired it with gold earring and bangles (you can't see in the pics). I loved this dress and my experience with RTR!

links_reviews_title: I absolutely loved this dress! Sexy and Classy
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a James Bond themed symphony gala. It was perfect. The material is very high quality. It is very tight but still comfortable. I rented a 12 and 10, and went with the 12 because it was a little more comfortable. I usually wear a 6 or 8, so size up for sure. This dress is very classy. The slit and tight fit give it sexiness, but nothing is too much. I would love wearing it again!

I rented this for a "Black Tie" New Year's Eve Wedding. It was perfect! It fits SNUG. It zips up the rib cage so you have to very strategically put it on over your head while not messing your hair or make up (you will need help). Note: put deodorant on AFTER you get it on. It HUGS you, the material is thick so it gives a smooth finish. I received MANY compliments, as it's a sharp dress.

I wore this number to a gala and I loved it. It was understated, elegant, and stretchy in all the right places. I am normally a size 4, and I ordered the 10R and it fit perfectly. I'm also 5'9" and the length was good for heels.

This was my back up dress, thank god for it because my first choice was waaaayyyyy off. This dress is beautiful and looks great on and did the job but was not the best. It's extremely heavy, so hot and felt like it was pulling my ass flat. Also the sizing is wildly off. Thank good for reviews I got the 10 and I think I should've even gone up a size from that (regularly a 2 or 4). You can see in the picture it was bunching a lot and I had to be pulling it down and adjusting all night. Size up!

I adored this dress and considered buying it from RTR! The dress is such a classic and the long sleeves were great for the cold ballroom but comfortable enough to dance around in. I went without a bra. The material was thick enough and held up well. The neckline was interesting and flattering, and the slit made it alluring.

This skin tight stunner definitely makes a statement and stands out in a crowd. Highly recommend for thin, narrow, and small chested types. Euro sizing, add 2 extra sizes on your US size to adequately fit. Highly recommend for formal affairs with dancing with modest coverage but the slit allows for movement. Thick fabric with good amount of stretch allows for a warm, comfortable yet stunning statement dress. Pair with statement earrings and pull your hair back for the full effect!

links_reviews_title: Dance and move in very easily! Amazing dress!
links_reviews_text: Runs small! It was a gorgeous gown!!!

This dress was so comfortable and looks super sleek in person. I wore it as a bridesmaid in a black tie wedding and it was perfect for the occasion. I'm not sure why all the reviews were mentioning to size up.. I rented 1 size up and in hindsight wish I went with my normal size. The invisible zipper makes it easy enough to slip on and the fabric is thick and tight in a way that sucks you in but isn't constraining. Because of the high side slit I didn't use shapewear and it was totally fine.
