links_reviews_title: Felt glamorous at the company holiday party!
links_reviews_text: This dress runs small! I usually wear 2, ordered 6 and 8 based on reviews and was glad I did. I had to wear my 3.5-4 inch heel bc it was a bit lengthy, but I loved the dress! I felt sleek, modern and glamorous.

I LOVED THIS DRESS. It was absolutely perfect and I received so many compliments about the fit. Since the dress is in European sizes, order at least two sizes up. I typically wear a 4R and the 10R fit perfectly. For someone who straddles between petite and non-petite sizes the length of the dress was perfect with a modest heel. The sleeves ran a bit long. The material of the dress is a bit on the medium/heavier side, but worked very well for an early Spring outside wedding on the east coast. I was never too hot or too cold from the 5pm outside ceremony to late night cocktails. No jacket necessary.
Beautiful elegant dress. I normally wear a size 4 and had to go up two sixes. Size 8 was perfect. The long slit on the side was super sexy. Would definitely rent again.

Beautiful dress! I received endless compliments that night. Runs very very small! I wear size 10 normally. I wore the 14R and it was snug! It's very forgiving and the thick material hides everything. I was able to avoid spanx and no bra needed! Would recommend to all women with curves!

links_reviews_title: Wore to a formal wedding event at a museum.
links_reviews_text: This dress runs very small. I am normally a size 6 (us) wore the size 8 (us), but wish I had gotten one more size up size 10 (us). It fit, but it was super tight! I did get tons of compliments both in person and online when I posted pics.

links_reviews_title: This dress will make you look better than you ever have
links_reviews_text: This dress is hot yet sophisticated and tasteful. I wore it to a Washington black tie event, so I wanted to be beautiful but respectful and serious. This dress did it. I received a million compliments but still felt smart. I was not sure how well it would fit without spanx or a bra, but you really don't ned either - the dress does all the tucking and shaping for you! I am not in the shape I used to be and my breast size is still larger from nursing our second child, but rest assured that the dress covered all that up and held things up nicely. It does run slightly small and it is a bit difficult to put on. But once you get it past your shoulders it's fine. The fabric is slightly heavy, which worked great in a slightly windy spring evening but might be too thick for summer. Also, I wanted it longer so I ordered L. It was just a bit, maybe one inch too long (I am slightly over 5'6" and wore a 2.75" heel).

I usually wear a size 2-4 in a dress, but I ordered a 6L since it runs small. It was a little tight, but fit nicely! I would definitely size up 2 sizes from your usual size. I ordered a Long so I could wear platform heels. Loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: Very elegant look! Loved the material, very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I agree with other comments regarding sizing. I am typically between a 4-6 and ordered 12L and 14L. The 12L fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: I received more compliments on this dress than any other. I wore the 10R and although it is tight it is complimentary to curves. The fabric is thick and comfortable. It does get a little warm but overall super comfortable. Definitely size up.
I loved the fit and the material. Very flattering
The sizes run VERY VERY small! I usually wear a 2-4 and the 8R was WAY TOO small. The 6R was my backup and I couldn't even get it on.....
The dress was difficult to get on at first due to its shape but it hugged me in all the right places! I got compliments all night long.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Stunning and elegant. Very body flattering. The fabric is thick and well made.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 2. But all the reviews are correct. Size up at least 2 sizes. I ended up wearing the 6L but the 8L also fit well too. I’m 5’7. 138lbs. The fabric does stretch once you have it on.

links_reviews_title: Elegant/stunning dress!!! You will not want to give back!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely Loved this stunning dress and received many compliments on it! I felt super sexy and elegant all night long! I did take into consideration what other reviewers said about sizing, however, I think it was still hard to decide on which was the perfect sizing for myself. I do love the fact that Rent The Runway lets you choose two different sizings of the dress; I found that to be very helpful, otherwise, my original size would not have worked (0 in U.S. / *4R in Euro - I ended up wearing the 2 in U.S. / *6R in Euro). Also, I am 5'5, therefore, I was stuck between which length to order, either regular or long, but the regular length hit the floor perfectly with my shoes on ( 1/2 in heel); however, I would have been more comfortable with the long for the mere fact that I wouldn't have to keep pulling it down all night. I would recommend this dress any day! Hope my review is helpful for the next renter.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress!! Nicely lined!!! Lots of compliments!!!!
links_reviews_text: Runs extremely small, very fitted.

Perfect combination of classy and sexy. Felt pretty and professional. Love this dress! No need for bra or even spanx, the dress was very fitted but also stretchy, with two thick layers of material. Fitted but not revealing, due to the multiple thick layers.

Fits super snug but that's a good thing with this type of fabric. I'm very petite but this hit me in a great spot with super high heels. I love the unique cut of the top and how it held my shape in all night long. Absolutely loved this look!

I felt amazing in this dress. I wore it to a black tie wedding in the winter. It was season appropriate and the arm length kept me warm. This dress runs extremely small. I'm a size 4-6 and I ended up wearing a 10 because of the reviews. I'm 5'4" 130 lbs small chest and curvy hips. Very very flattering. I took off a star though because when I was at the wedding I noticed decent sized holes under the sleeve between my arm pit and elbow.

This dress was absolutely amazing! Non stop compliments throughout the night! It fit perfectly and made me feel so incredibly sexy. I normally wear a 2 or 4 dress size and I wore the 6L which was equivalent to the 2L. I recommend the long so it gives you extra length. I wish I would have bought it! The slit makes it extra sexy and fun to dance in!
Loved this dress! It was perfect for the black tie formal wedding we attended. I am normally a size 2-4, waist 24-25, 5'3.5" and the 8L was a perfect fit for me! I suggest to size up definitely!!

links_reviews_title: Standout piece, but not too flashy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this jumpsuit, it is so comfortable and the sequins are gorgeous. For being 100% sequins, it is really not too flashy of a piece if you're worried about looking like a disco ball. My only complaint is that the sides around the waist stick out a bit due to the back detail. Also definitely recommend the long - I am 5'6 and definitely needed the long with any type of heel. Didn't end up wearing because I liked my other RTR piece better, but would definitely rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable on a chilly NYC night
links_reviews_text: Fitted but not tight. I work with sneakers and the pants were the perfect length! Love the pockets

links_reviews_title: Easy to dance in and very fancy! Perfect for NYE
links_reviews_text: I wore this for NYE and danced the night away. It is backless but heavily lined so I could wear it without a bra. Danced and felt a little "rubbed" under the arms from the sequins that night. By morning it was gone. I made a little string attachment to help me unzip myself to use the restroom. I would buy it if I could ~ loved it.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments- very unique!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little snug, glad I got the long as I wore heals!
This was a fun jumper and comfortable. The sequence made it fancier and the fit was great. Only problem is I needed a bathroom buddy...lol.
Loved this for my Gatsby themed cocktail party
The fit was great! I wore a heel and the pant was the perfect length. Over all it was a perfect fit. Although I do have a longer torso so for me a little more length would have been better
This jumpsuit is so fun!! It's sparkly, you can move in it. If you're trying to dance the night away, this is your jumpsuit! Fit true to size. It's heavy but I was able to move comfortably in it.

The jumpsuit is heavy, but this worked well in the cool Vegas casinos. I thought it fit great and was pretty comfortable minus the underarm chafing from the sequins. Wouldn't suggest this for a long evening. Required some help getting secured. Bring a friend to the restroom! Would wear again for a party or Vegas. I usually wear a 2 and was able to size down.

Wore this for my 21st birthday and it was perfect! Had the perfect amount of drama and sexiness without looking overdone, I got tons of complements all night. I've a fairly true to size 8, and the 8R fit perfectly everywhere, it hugged all the right places to look super flattering. I was really torn whether or not to get the regular or long at 5'8", especially with plans to wear 3 inch heels, but I went with the regular because I decided a slightly cropped look would be easier to walk around in than if it ended up too long. The regular length worked well, it wasn't all that cropped and came down to about my ankles where the top straps of my heels started. I would've been fine in the long length too, and if you're any taller than I am, I would definitely go with the long. It was surprisingly comfortable all night and the pockets were an added bonus. You can't wear a regular bra with it because of the back, but it's secure enough on the top you don't really need one, I went with some pasties just in case and that held up fine even with me jumping around and dancing half the night. Badgley Mischka is one of my favorite designers because all of their clothes always seem to fit perfectly while still being flattering and looking amazing, and this jumpsuit definitely held up to those standards.

I was super worried this would be too long or ill fitted because I'm very short and jumpsuits never fit my hourglass figure but this fit like it was made for my body! The sequins did burn the insides of my arms by the end of the night but I felt so sexy, it was totally worth it. Oh, you 100% need someone to help you use the bathroom in this.

Wore this to a "flamboyant formal" wedding, and it was spot-on! The material is pretty thick, which made it a little hot. Worth it, though. I'm always wary about ordering "Long" sizes, but this one was perfect. I think the regular would have been too short.
So flattering! Great fit.

I love a jumpsuit and don't mind being kind of over the top with sequins (this is really glam) but I had some fit issues so didn't wear it - I felt like the regular was too short in the leg (I'm 5'6), which is good if wearing flats or a low heel but I felt like it looked weird on me. The midsection was tight and had no give. Note: you can't wear a bra with this one. I think it's a fun piece for the right body type; it just didn't work for me

links_reviews_title: My outfit made the event more fun.
links_reviews_text: Compliments from strangers. Extremely comfortable, I could workout in this one. All formal outfits should be comfortable like this one.
I am 5'6" and 155 lbs - I wore a size 8R and it fit like a glove!

I am 5'9" and the long was the perfect length with about 3 inch heels. I was worried that there would be chafing on the inside of my arm from all the sequins but there wasn't any the jumpsuit is extremely comfortable very flattering and I got endless complements!!
I wanted to standout without looking Vegas-y, and this jumper was perfect. The sequins added a great sparkle without being over the top. Wore to a film screening and dinner.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this jumpsuit - Even asked to dance by the father of the bride :)
links_reviews_text: I found this jumpsuit to run a size small, I thought I'd be an 8L but definitely ended up needing the 10L. Great material, high quality, and fit well. Could have used a little more length (I'm 5'10"), but overall it was fine even with a 2" heel. I was complimented all night in this outfit and would absolutely wear it again. Felt totally glam!

I rented this for one night of my bachelorette party and it was FAB. The 0 fit perfectly! But it is very long! At 5"2' i was barely able to wear it in my tallest platform heels! I would say be at least 5"3' or over to rent it - it still looked a bit long on me but it was an awesome rental! Also, no bra needed because of the sequins. The back is maybe the best part!!

I would buy this if I could wear it all the time :) Felt that it hugged all the right spots and didn't feel self conscious about my belly. The waist/pant part is definitely a size 6 but top was more like a 4 which worked perfect for me and I went without a bra. Might try a long instead of reg length next time if wearing with heels.

Loved this jumpsuit -- it was so comfortable and the inside lining is really soft! The 2 fit true to size and wasn't too tight for moving around and dancing. The legs are a bit short if you wear heels with the jumpsuit, but not high-water short. The combo of the back design and sequins is so unique!

links_reviews_title: My daughter wore this for her Valentine's Dance and it was a showstopper!
links_reviews_text: Great alternative to a dress...the pockets were amazing. It fit her typical size, 8. She does have a long torso so it was amazing to have it available in long lengths. This may be one of my favorite RTR pieces!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this outfit, I actually felt amazing!
links_reviews_text: It is a jomper, so remember you will need to find a friend to help you take it off in the bathroom.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my daughter who is a size 0-2 and 5'2". So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! Wire to a wedding. And it has pockets!!
Didn’t wear bc/ arrived too late. I’m a 4/6 & got the 8. Fit great but it was short. I’m 5’7.would try to rent again but 8L.
It fits like a glove and very comfortable
I rented this for Vegas and it was perfect! Very comfortable and looks great on! I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: A lot of sequin sparkle for NYE!
links_reviews_text: Liked the jumpsuit, just wished I got the 6L. I'm 5'9 .5 in height so it came to my ankles. It was very complimenting to my figure, a little snug in the underarm area. Got a lot of compliments too. I did sparkle with all the sequins. And who doesn't look good in black?!

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear, but not the most flattering
links_reviews_text: Overall I enjoyed wearing this jumpsuit. It was fun to wear and it was nice wearing something "different" to a wedding. It was also insanely comfortable. That said, this was not the most flattering for my body type. I'm tall and have a long torso. So even the long was too short and the waist seam hit in a strange spot (too high). It also flattened out my booty. I didn't have any difficultly taking it on and off, which others mentioned in their reviews.

Best ever!!! Felt so special in this jumpsuit! A little snug in the waist and be warned, this is like the most difficult zipper ever, not because it wouldn't fit, but because there was a lot of fabric - I didn't think it would zip but finally got it. Def recommend wearing with heels because your shoes will be 100% seen. Also wasn't itchy at all, different than most of my sequin experiences.
Loved it. It me like a glove.
Beautiful and perfect for Hamilton!!

links_reviews_title: I wish I could own this! Fun and comfortable
links_reviews_text: I was sad to return this jumpsuit. I'm an 8 and wore the 8R...it fit great. I thought it had some stretch which was nice. I had no issues with the sequins scratching my arms and also didn't have an issue with the zipper although peeing is an endeavor in a jumpsuit in general. I'm 5'5" and the length was perfect. Pockets are a plus! So many compliments, perfect outfit for a holiday party. I'd rent it again, I wish I could own it.
Loved this fitted sequin jumper! I received many compliments and it fit well. If you have a long torso, it could feel short but overall it was a show stopper!

I loved this! A couple notes- if you're unsure or between sizes, size up- I'm almost back to a 2 so this was a bit tight but the fit was stunning and hugged every curve I wanted to show. If you're moderately endowed, go for the Hollywood lift tape rather than a strapless bra, it's thick enough to provide full coverage. The long felt almost too short, but the length hit exactly how it was supposed to. I paired with 4 inch pumps but was able to wear flats with no issue. The sequins scratched the $h!t out of my back where the zipper clasp was and the side of my shoulder- also left little scrapes on my arms but was worth it. It's very warm, and felt comfortable without having to adjust much over the night.

links_reviews_title: Super flattering and comfortable. Pockets!!! I wore this to my birthday party and it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: I’m usually a 4 or a 6 and the 4 fit me perfectly. Right length and size. It’s gorgeous.
I have long legs, so the legs were a little bit short, but I just wore shorter heels. Great outfit though. I got a ton of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit fit perfectly and helped me feel like a classy rockstar. Perfect for my 5'2" height.
links_reviews_text: Not too heavy, easy to wear.
I wore this jumper to my boss' 50th birthday gala. I felt appropriately dressed and received a ton of compliments. I wore the jumper for quite a while and was very comfortable the whole time.
Wore for a breast cancer dinner and it was perfect. The fit was great, it was comfortable and IT HAS POCKETS!!!
This romper is everything. The color is so bright and fun. The details of the top make it stand out. The pockets are a huge plus!! I would definitely rent again.
I'm tall so I was worried about the length, but it was perfect- not too short, not too long.
The color was very vibrant. Fit try to size and not short at all and was extremely comfortable.
beautiful pink romper - runs TTS! Very fitting.
I'm short waisted so this worked. I would be nervous to not size up if you have a normal to long torso. I loved it! So cute!
Was not the right fit for me not my style.

links_reviews_title: More for a short waisted person but very cute!
Loved the color and overall fit of this piece.
links_reviews_text: However, the strap on the left side was too long and there was no way to shorten it. As a result, I was uncomfortable all night and couldn't wait to return this romper.
Fit was true to size - the pink was a great, rich color and the top was so fun! Strap is thick enough that I was able to wear normal bra. The pockets were also clutch!

links_reviews_title: So fun & playful, perfect for a night out!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful bright pink color. The style is so fun, especially for summer. I wore this to a concert and was planning on keeping to wear for my birthday. I ordered a size 4 based on others recommendations, but it's a little roomy and was too loose. I still wore it anyway but definitely would've worn my usual size, which is a 2.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments on the color
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly, no issues with straps falling
Really like this romper, the fabric is a little thicker than I was expecting. Could be worn for every day wear or for a semi formal event.
Gorgeous color, comfortable to wear (but not to go potty, lol!). I worn it twice in one rental. I loved it!
I should have sized up
Not as short as others, a good thing
Great jumpsuit! I loved the length and color. Bonus points for being comfortable and stylish.

Beautiful romper vibrant pink color. I would say that it mostly runs true to size however the material around the waist is a little small and cut into my ribs. Otherwise, the rest of the romper is true to size.
Wonderful thick stretch fabric and great details with slit and zippers. Definitely a favorite

links_reviews_title: Another winner from La petite robe! Fits like a glove.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a work holiday party. I got it a little early and also wore it to drinks with my husband. I probably could have swung the 48 (50 was a little loose in hips) but for work event this was best. Super comfortable and I wore a regular nude wide-set straps bra. The slit was a little odd and I did have a deodorant accident, but makeup remover wipes took care of that. This dress made me feel like a rock star! Edgy but still professional and classy looking.

Something about zippers - what a conversation piece... Rented this on my unlimited for a rock/rhythm/blues fundraiser and it was spot on for my event. Bra straps will show - go strapless or cups. This designer always run small - sized up on recommendations and it was a great fit.
I really liked this. The open zipper at the shoulder is a tad itchy. Wouldn't mind going up one size, but overall great fit.
I rented this dress for a work presentation. I felt like a million bucks!! It has an edgy feel with the zipper, but a classic below the knee length. I would definitely rent this one again.
So many compliments - it's light weight and the right length - love so much- would wear again- it rises up a little but I'm sure a larger size would have cured that
Loved this dress and details. Feels like shapewear.

Dress fit perfect. I love the zipper detail. The cutout at the shoulder made wearing a normal bra impossible, but the material was kind of thick and tight, so I went without. Received loads of compliments.

This dress was so nice. I got so many compliments and it looked great on camera. You have to pull it over your head so beware of deodorant stains (especially since it's black)! But I found myself not wanting to send it back. This designer is a winner!

Sexy and work appropriate! I love this designer! Great material that stretches and accentuates your curves. Also slimming! When I walked in the meeting, all eyes were on me. Will definitely rent again!

Love this brand and how the material hugs in all the right places. I did have a bit of difficulty making a bra work with this due to the cut out. It also gapped a bit funny at times which made it a fidgeting piece.

I love this designer and I don't mind that you have to pull on their dresses, but this one seemed a little smaller than usual and I sized up...could it possibly be due to my holiday weight gain? Anyhoo....it is very form fitting and I like the material, scuba gear, I call it and the ornamental zipper gives it a fun, edgy look. However, to me, the shoulder slit almost looks like a hole or a mistake, but it still looks great. It is definitely work appropriate and I received many compliments, but I do suggest sizing up, for comfort.

I should have gotten a 42R for my post Thanksgiving body but I'm making it work. I love the designer and the hint of sexiness this offers. Like most La Petite dresses, you have to pull it on. The material keeps everything in place. It's a showstopper.

Every dress by this designer is like wearing shape wear!! It hugs so beautifully. I love how shapely the dress makes me look. It's professional yet sexy. I paired with some knew high boots, but could rock some stilettos is for an even sexier look.

This is my 2nd rental from Chiara Boni. I loved the 1st one so much I had to try another. I was immediately attracted to the beautiful lines created by the zippers - and it lived up to my expectations. I wore my usual size, but it was difficult to put on because of its pull-on style. Still say it's worth the effort. Requires a strapless because of the keyhole, but the fabric is so supportive I could probably have gone braless. Perfect dress for work to date night - especially if you want to make a lasting impression.
Fit like a glove. Loads of compliments

Very tight fitting as intended. Could still wear strapless bra. So chic. Zippers are fixed and add such a cool element. Takes the dress from a simple, tight, black dress to a showstopper. Length and sleeves keep it classy and chic

This dress was hard to get on. I needed a little help from my husband. Normally I'd feel a little self-conscious in a tight dress with zippers but not in this dress. The fabric was thick and the length of the dress made me feel very comfortable wearing it. My husband felt like a lucky man :)

links_reviews_title: Le Petite Robe di Chiara Boni dresses have you locked and loaded
links_reviews_text: Dresses by Le Petite Robe di Chiara Boni are made from the most amazing fabric! Keeps everything secure and feels so slimming. For an ideal fit I should have gotten the 42 (for reference I'm a 6 or 4 & I think I squeezed into the 38 of a floor length version of their dresses in store), but the 44 was all that was available. It was a little loose - some bumps along the seams in the hips and waist, but was totally wearable, & I actually preferred the looser fit for the work event I used it for.
The slit near collar bone seemed like a rip; would have been much better without that but did like the dress

The material has some stretch so made it comfortable to wear all afternoon and evening for back-to-back events conservative enough for a work cocktail party and edgy enough for an art show)! The arms are a bit small, so if your arms are larger you may want to size up!
Runs SMALL. It's stretchy polyester, almost like plastic, you'll definitely sweat inside.

There's not much to say about this dress other than it absolutely knocked it out of the park. I picked this dress to wear to the office when we had corporate coming in and it totally worked. I received so many compliments on the style and the fit. The fabric of this dress is to die for - like many other women have said, it is almost like wearing shapewear, but with a little more stretch. The sleeves were super comfortable, too, even with the tight fit. There was no snagging or uncomfortable feeling from any of the zipper detailing, much to my surprise. All in all, this dress was banging and I'm totally going to rent it again.
Didn't wear it because it wasn't flattering.

I rented this dress for a late work event and my, I received so many compliments! It has the right amount of professionalism with a slight edge and the cut on the shoulder seals the deal! I will definitely rent again.
The material wasn't comfortable/dress too snug

links_reviews_title: Perfect for hosting my annual holiday charity event!
links_reviews_text: I felt sexy and sophisticated!

links_reviews_title: Have to pull over head but beautiful
links_reviews_text: I rated a 2 because I couldn't get over my head with my bust, but thought the material and dress was beautiful. Runs a little small.
Fabulous fit and gorgeous fabric, love it

links_reviews_title: The dress was too tight I did not wear it.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 10, I did get the dress on but with the cut out and the zipper décor it did not lay right. So I did not wear it.

I'm 100% sure this dress is navy, not black. It's VERY tight and you have to step into it and slide it up your body, which made me feel like a sausage link. You have to wear a strapless bra. I thought about wearing this with shapewear but ended up wearing a more flattering dress.
Did not like the slit above the chest. I'm a C cup and it felt like my breast was exposed. I wore it with a black cami underneath to cover the slit. Otherwise, it fit and looked great.

links_reviews_title: I didn't wear it. too small.
links_reviews_text: It runs small.
Very pretty, lightweight blouse. The long sleeve was a little short, but otherwise the small was a nice fit.
I absolutely loved the color and the print and the blanks and the fabric. The only problem I had is the opening for the open shoulder felt a little low for me
Love the fit, style and color! Beautiful material! Dress it up or down.

I wore this top 3 times and was in LOVE! It was unique and the colors popped. I received a lot of compliments while wearing it. I was tempted to buy it I loved it so much. The one arm detail was executed so nicely and it fit like a glove.
Beautiful material, pattern, and detail! I loved the drape and the top was plenty long. Due to the length it looked best with skinny pants.

links_reviews_title: Fun Top! Perfect for a concert
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Went with the medium because there was a significant size difference in the arm/neck hole between the Medium and Small, and as a muscular girl I was way more comfortable in the medium. I wore it to a Foo Fighters Concert at MSG. Great color, very flattering and comfortable, even in the summer heat. The wrist is very fitted so be prepared for a snug fit there. Wish I owned this top.
Skims the body perfectly. The zipper was stiff for the light material.

links_reviews_title: I ordered too small ... it's beautiful! But my arms were too long , I'll try a medium

links_reviews_text: I'm a 4/6 on the top (more like 6/8 on bottom) and ordered the M but it was massive. Couldn't wear so size down.
Love this and will rent again
Good quality but overall should be listed as petit only...very short at waist and sleeve also very short. Not good for tall athletic builds.
Fit true to size.
The fit was odd. It was looser than I would have preferred and the opening for the open shoulder was too short choking my armpit. Didn't wear.

This top was really fun and I enjoyed wearing it for St Patrick's Day. The only thing I found challenging about it was it felt a little strange to be totally sleeveless on one arm and have a long sleeve on the other. It definitely requires the right occasion.

links_reviews_title: See through and full of static
links_reviews_text: This shirt is so cute, but is totally sheer. That's usually not a problem because I'd just wear a tank underneath, but for a 1-shoulder top, that doesn't work! I'm baffled as to why the designer wouldn't put a lining in this shirt to make it wearable. In addition, the top was full of static. I tried it on and it stuck to my skin like glue. Not attractive. Such a bummer because the shirt design and color are so great. :(
I was shocked by how comfortable this top was! It was light, airy, and felt lovely on.
Very fun too for a casual date night. The green really popped!

Unfortunately this top did not work at all. It was so unflattering and quite boxy. I was excited to wear this since it had pretty good reviews and the floral pattern looked gorgeous online (not as vibrant in person and somewhat dull). Wish this one had worked out...
A bit large

links_reviews_title: Absolutely loved it! Received many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Comfortable. Stylish. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I enjoyed wearing the off the shoulder style and the fabric was beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect. Comfortable and easy to wear. Great with cropped, coated jeans for evening.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a sample sale party and loved it!
links_reviews_text: I actually wore it under a blazer at work all day and then went to the party after work. I love this top. It does seem a bit stretched under armpit from lots of use but wasn't noticeable once you got it on. I will definitely rent again, such pretty silk floral pattern.

This is an interesting cut and I liked how the one shoulder fit, but the print and the overall look just did not flatter me in the tummy area. I am thin and do not have a big tummy, but it's not perfectly flat either. I also had a hard time getting the wrinkles out of this material. I could have made this work and it probably would have been cute enough, but I decided to switch it out for something I would like even better.

I didn't end up wearing, its a beautiful blouse and would have been perfect...I was planning on wearing it to my cousin wedding dress rehearsal, however it was a little too see-through for my skin tone, had I had a strapless cami or something similar to go underneath I would have definitely worn it.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty - nice with white jeans
links_reviews_text: fits well. flow

Very nice top beautiful print received tons of compliments. This is not the first Soshana top I have worn and they all seem to run large. I should have rented the small would have for better but still a nice top.
Amazing lightweight top, a little bit of stretch and the perfect length. Will absolutely rent again
Top runs rather large and the material doesn't breathe; otherwise, very nice for a night out.
Too big. I'm 5'-1' and rented an xs. Too big.

links_reviews_title: COMPLIMENTS BY STRANGERS ON THE FABRIC AND PRINT.
links_reviews_text: BEAUTIFUL FABRIC GET THE CORRECT SIZE RUNS VERY LARGE EVEN ON A SIZE D BUST

links_reviews_title: Loved this shirt and got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: Very fun pattern & color. Really pops with white jeans and wedges.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, although a little tight through the bust for the bustier gals.
Even better in person. The colors are fantastic. I wore it with blue jeans like the model. Runs a little large. I normally take a 2 /4 in tops and the XS was plenty big.

Loved this - made me feel like a bird of paradise and my coworker said the shirt was like a "girl on fire" moment (which at least made me laugh- it's not really like that). But it is cute and architectural and fashion forward. I sized up Bc I did not want it to be too cropped. Worked out well

This was my first piece I received from my subscription. GORGEOUS PIECE! This top is so unique and can be work so many different ways. It may be slightly cropped on some. I am 5'3" so it fit me normal. Would be great with high waist bottoms for someone taller who doesn't want to show mid drift. I wore it to work and it was very comfortable. It's slightly see through which I didn't mind. Wear a nude bra and you'd never be able to tell. I would absolutely recommend this piece to anyone!
Loved this shirt because it was super easy to style and looked very effortless. Paired it with dark wash high waist jeans because it's more of a cropped fit. Looked luxe and easy breezy.
Loved this too so much. It was super unique and I received many compliments for it at work. I paired it with a pair of RTR's high waisted navy flare pants and loved the 70's feel of the combo.
Interesting pattern, fun details - light fabric. more cropped than anticipated, but easy to style.
Will rent again! So cute!

links_reviews_title: Standout top that's an attention grabber.
links_reviews_text: Loved this! Such a visually interesting top, and I've never seen a style quite like it. There are also tassels on the side which I ended up looping through the front zipper, which gave some more dimension to the neckline. This is definitely cropped, so you'll need to wear some high waisted pants with it.
Really fun top! I loved the pattern on the fabric and how well it's made. I was told I look very "Met-gala". Since this is a crop top I wore it with a black cami to make it work-appropriate.
This top was so breezy and effortless to wear. It comes a bit cropped and large so id size down

Fits like a crop top so it's perfect for high waisted denim. Paired it with black denim and white sneakers - perfect for every day. The ruffles and color are fun without being too loud, and I like that it covers my shoulders so it's a bit more conservative even though it is a crop. Highly recommend !

links_reviews_title: Would anyone like some hipster whimsy
links_reviews_text: This is a weird top but it's kind of delightful. I would never buy something like this but it was fun for a night out. The fabric is very stiff but it is lightweight. Very cropped - I had to wear high waisted jeans but it's pretty cute. Wouldn't buy this but it was a solid win and this is the sort of thing you get RTR for. Good job y'all
Loved this shirt a lot! Will probably rent again!
I used this top to "trend up" a simple back dress (wore it over the dress), black jeans, and even blue jeans. It's boxy, and on the short side, so I just made sure to wear high-waisted jeans.
Wore it to work, as well as a party! Such a fun look.

links_reviews_title: Great top for a fun night!
links_reviews_text: Great top, it is pretty sheer / see through but with a tank underneath it is perfect.
Loved this top! It is cropped and loose fitting, and has nice fluttery sleeves. Worked well at work by itself and under a jacket.
This was an amazing top. It looked great with high waisted jeans. I wish I had more excuses to wear it . I think it was a little too cropped to wear to work

Great top for work. It is a bit cropped so definitely keep that in mind when pairing with pants. There is a zipper down the front of the top. I styled this the same as the model on the site with these opening ceremony flare cropped pants. Received endless compliments throughout the day!

Fantastic print on this lightweight fabric. I wore this to ways: Once, with some high wasted medium – blue narrow leg jeans and white booties. And another time over a black tank dress with black booties. Both looked great.

I was in the Topanga store picking up some dresses for a wedding. While waiting to check out I saw this top on the rack. It was the only one. I picked it up. It said size 4 (WHICH I AM NOT...36DDD over here). I decided to slip it on and IT FIT!!!! I was going to a taping of WWHL so I grabbed it to wear for the night. It's is loose and big. I haven't worn a size 4 in 20 years. It's cropped. Stops right above the waist. Looks great over a form fitting dress. Loved it. Watch how you accessorize it because it's a BUSY top.

Loved this top! It was a little crop but I paired it with high waisted jeans and it worked perfect. It's a little bit see through but not too noticeable. Such a fun top for a night out. I got tons of compliments!
True to size. Shows just a little skin. Vibrant and feminine. Loved it so much I wore it twice!
Loose fit. Perfect for a party and great for transitioning into summer.

This ran a bit large given the general fit of the garment but I absolutely loved this. So many ways to dress it up or down. I have a bigger chest and looser/boxy items like this don't always look good but this was super flattering.
This was so cute in person. I think i got more compliments than an almost anything else that I've rented!

I love this fun and funky top from Opening Ceremony. The colors and print are amazing. This fit true to size and you can wear a standard bra. It is definitely more of a crop top so I recommend wearing this top with high-waist black flare pants or something similar to the black pants in the model photo! So cute and fashionable.

I wore this to work and was stopped over and over again. It is an unusual top and just actually works somehow...the length, the cropped style and the interesting fabric. I tried it on at the red thread my store, so I probably wouldn't of picked a size 8 but it is what they had. And it worked. I would say that a smaller size would be too short for my taste. Not sexy certainly but fashion forward for sure.

links_reviews_title: Love!! This is the first piece from RTR that I bought
links_reviews_text: Sexy, but classy... it's short so I suggest high wasted pants unless your under 40... lol

links_reviews_title: I didn't realize it was a crop, but still liked it!
links_reviews_text: Love the original pattern & look! Could be dressed up or down for a date, night out, or maybe even an edgy work outfit. Fabric is airy and somewhat sheer but does not require an undershirt. It was more cropped than expected but I paired it with some ripped black high waist jeans, slip-on sneakers, and gunmetal hoops for a night out.
This was such a fun top. It is sheer but a tank underneath is not necessary. I loved the patterns and the zipper. I wore this with black skinny jeans and boots.
Wore this as styled for event at the Stone Pony = HIGH impact, comfortable and totally different. Can't wait to rent again!
Super cute and got tons of compliments. Definitely short but looked fine w high waisted jeans
Rent. This. It's adorable. Cropped for sure- but without looking too young for someone in their late 30s

links_reviews_title: So cute. Wore w high waisted cut off shorts. Got so many compliments
links_reviews_text: Sheer, loose, but really cute
Shirt is beautiful but very short. You definitely need the right pants for this shirt.
Received lots of compliments about this statement top. Wore a black tank underneath it because I didn't want to accidentally show skin.
+ unique print and cut - didn't love the zipper

absolutely loved this shirt! so different and not typically something I would buy, but renting makes it much easier. I don't ever want to send it back! Got so many compliments. Keep in mind, it is loose and cropped, great with high waisted pants!

This is a beautiful and well made top. For me the issue is that it made my head look strangely small because the shoulders have so much volume. You also have to be ready to show your stomach in this one. It's a hard scale to work.
Very flattering.

Wore this to a gala and it was so comfortable all night long! Fit like a glove! Only challenge was that it hangs long in back (I'm 5'3" and wore 3" heels) so it was dragging behind me and some people stepped on it a few times throughout the night. Made dancing somewhat challenging. Otherwise a great rental!
Loved the fabric. It fit my waist perfectly and hid all my problem areas

links_reviews_title: This was my sister's reherseal dinner and the dress was 10/10.
links_reviews_text: I loooved this dress!! I receieved so many compliments, it looks just as pictured and it fit me perfectly.

links_reviews_title: This dress turned heads, the color is gorgeous and it fit beautifully!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this gorgeous dress for my son wedding, I was extremely pleased and received multiple compliments throughout the night. However, it runs very small. I am usually a 10-12, I ordered a 14R to be safe and it was too small, re-ordered a 16R which fit perfectly except the top was a little big but nothing a few safety pins couldn't handle. I would definitely recommend this dress, it's very flattering and the red is beautiful!

Fit perfectly, I did have to go up in size, but the color and fit was beautiful and I had so many compliments. I cannot thank enough RTR! First time I have rented and trust me it will not be the last!
This dress is a dream. The color is perfect for a Christmas event. I love everything about this dress.
Has a really nice sticky rubber around the breast area that keeps it from slipping! Drags a bit in the back.
Great dress, so beautiful!
I wore this for a gala with a "Royal Affair" theme. This dress was true to size, with just a little extra room in the bust. A strapless bra fixed that issue. I received dozens of compliments!
Fit just right lots of compliments, arms were not tight as stated in other reviews

links_reviews_title: This dress really is stunning, it was a tad bit on the small side but still gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: The dress ran small, but there was enough room for my bust which is definitely hard to come by sometimes. The length and everything else was perfect.

First time renting. This dress was not my first choice. It was a substitute for my second size. I was disappointed because it wasn't at all similar to my original choice. But time was of the essence, and I needed a formal outfit. Now onto the actual dress. It is a beautiful red. It fit very snug! There's no stretch so take that into account. No bra is necessary as the snugness around the bust area keeps the girls up. I received many compliments and I did feel beautiful but I will say, I couldn't wait to take the dress off!

links_reviews_title: the best dress i've ever worn
links_reviews_text: i super loved this dress! i was initially worries about wearing this to prom because of the reviews saying that the arms were too tight but i never had a problem with them. i loved the material, super light weight and so easy to wear! i loved this dress and wish i could keep this dress forever!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous red. Beautiful on stage against the black curtain. Perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: My daughter wore this to perform her vocal talent at her spring recital. Gorgeous. Fit her perfectly. The color was amazing on stage.
Size up so sleeves have space to actually move/ dance but know that it'll be loose in the tummy and the detail won't lay flat like it would ideally. Still so worth it !

I rented this from the NYC RTR store. The employee told me that it ran very tight in the chest. I sized up 2 sizes and barely fit into to the dress. As you can see it is so tight at the chest, so my breasts were pushed upward and I feel like it made me look heavier and chubbier on top than normal. I did receive compliments on the dress, as it is a beautiful color and the skirt portion is lovely but the fit on top was tough. If you are bloated in any way, size up or skip it.

links_reviews_title: Stunning red dress for a concert performance!
links_reviews_text: I wore this gown for a concert performance of Carmina Burana where I sang the soprano solos. It looked lovely from stage, and since I didn't have much arm-moving to do, the snugness of the sleeves didn't bother me (though I wouldn't have been able to easily reach up past my shoulder had I needed to). The dress came creased and needed a good steam. The reason I'm giving it a 4 instead of a 5 was because it showed sweat marks around my armpits very easily. I only wore it for maybe 2 hours during each performance, but needed to insert my own dress shields, otherwise there would have been visible marks. However, it was still gorgeous and I really loved it!

links_reviews_title: If you want to feel like a queen, get this dress.
links_reviews_text: Best dress I've ever put on. Im 5'3 and a little under 130 - the 4 fit PERFECTLY. Highly recommend!
This was a beautiful dress and perfect for an elegant event. I ended up wearing another dress I rented from RTR to my formal event. Unfortunately, the dress ran a bit to large.
The dress fit beautifully although the style made lifting my arms a little constricted and there were no pockets.
Love the dress. Fit well and fun to wear especially when dancing. For any age
The dress is pretty and looked great, but since the material isn't stretchy the bust area was much too small

I've rented quite a few things and this may be my favorite to date, it is stunning. Got so many compliments all night! I'm 5'4", with some 3" heels the length was pretty spot on, it's shorter in the front and almost has a slight train in the back. It's also a pretty thick material, so it's fairly structured. I'm typically a size 6-8, I'm smaller on top and have more curves on the bottom, and the 6 was a perfect fit since this dress is more fitted on top and looser on the bottom. This is weird, but it photographed way better from this angle than from the front. Sounds weird, but may be helpful for any Instagram-ers.
True to size, super elegant

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, but you cannot lift your arms at all
links_reviews_text: Nice dress, I'm 5'9" prolly didn't need the long. You really cannot love your arms at all

I wore this dress to a black tie event for the USO and it was perfect! The red was great for the military theme and it was a beautifully made dress. It is very flattering and pretty comfortable overall. I do have a larger chest (34D) and I found that I was a bit tight in that area but I wore it without a bra and it was fine. It is tighter at the waist and then looser under so it seems like the type of dress that would look great on anyone. I would 100% rent again!

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful, but not a great option for dancing
links_reviews_text: Fun and flattering dress. Wish I could give it more stars but there is NO stretch in the arms, so limited movement. The 8R fit great, but off the shoulder sleeves were just too limiting. I wore the 10R, which was looser in bodice, but allowed more movement in arms. Not so tight I didn’t wear it, and perhaps someone with narrower shoulders or thinner arms might fare better. Still felt beautiful and received lots of compliments.

The dress was beautiful. Could not zip the size six. Size 8 fit wonderful except the bust. Was painful and could not breathe. Called rent the runway and they sent me the next size they had but unfortunately it was a size 14. Ended up getting a different dress. Was disappointed but very impressed with rent the runs the runway with getting me a dress the next day.

Loved wearing this. Got it to wear to the ballet. It definitely caught people's eye and I felt comfortable all night in it and it fit well and was flattering. Wish this dress came in more colors too for other events!
Fit me perfectly. I am a true size 4.

This dress was super fun to dance in...but arm movement was very limited! Great color for a holiday party. I could’ve sized up to make it a bit more comfortable. After a big meal, the waist area felt tight.

This dress is truly lovely. It made me feel like the bell of the ball and I received many compliments at the black tie gala I wore it to. The dress itself has a full, "swooshy" skirt and the bodice is a little tight but it is beautiful and certainly shows off your waist. The only issue I had was with the arms; they're tight and you really can't reach for things or even put on a jacket without a little help or the right angle. Overall a beautiful dress, if a little limiting. I would wear it again.

I wore this dress for a black tie optional wedding. The widget is not letting me upload my photos but the dress was gorgeous. My only issues were: having difficulty raising my arms above my head (but that’s to be expected in all off-the-shoulder clothing) and the dress dragging on the ground and getting stepped on by me and others. I’m not short (5’6”) and definitely needed a couple more inches of heel height for this dress. However my feet can’t tolerate heels so I wore flats and got stepped on. Oh well, it was still beautiful and got lots of compliments!

Was unable to wear this dress because the top part of the dress that goes around the shoulders was several inches too large. For reference, I am a 30C, usually a S or XS in tops, and a 27 in bottoms. The rest of the dress fit well - might work for someone with a larger chest.

links_reviews_title: Flattering for small waist and wide hips!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress but I didn't wear it because it was a little too formal. It was very flattering - tight in the bust and waist and masked my wide hips! I would rent again for a different event.
This dress is beautiful. I'm 5'4" and this went all the way to the ground. It was a bit tight around my chest (34D). I wouldn't have been able to wear a bra with this.

links_reviews_title: the dress was a perfect fit!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 2 and it was gorgeous

links_reviews_title: The dress is beautiful it just runs small
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear the dress, it's beautiful however it fit small in the chest area

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and cut, no give in the chest area
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color and cut but no give in the chest area - which is important for me. Ended up wearing another dress
I rented this but decided to go with another option. I liked the asymmetrical hemline on the model, but it felt a bit awkward upon second thought.

links_reviews_title: Best dress I've had on RTR
links_reviews_text: This dress was the PERFECT graduation photo dress. It was flattering and the material is perfect as it is stretching but firming. 10/10 recommend. Also, RTR associates were SO helpful opening up another spot on my account so I was able to rent this dress as other dresses I ordered didn't fit well and I needed this one ASAP. Thank you💛

Wore this as my "white" night out dress for my bach party. The dress definitely runs small but you don't need any shareware or bra because it sucks everything in in the most flattering way! Dress seemed like it might be a wee past its prime, it showed signs of wear and tear. I'll probably purchase this piece in black from Hervé Léger because it was such a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this fun but not over the top NYE outfit I threw together :)
links_reviews_text: Dress was super tight, but also has a little stretch so it was comfortable all night

The dress fit perfectly. It is a tighter bandage dress so it held everything in place nicely. Length did not ride up and the dress was not too long or too short (I'm 5' 7"). The dress is a thick material and was not sheer. Definitely would rent again
This dress was perfect for my bachelorette!! Sexy but not too short. Definitely form fitting but was complimented all night!

I loved the feel of this dress: thick and high-quality, and curve-flattering and snug. This dress will show panty lines, so skip the bra and wear a thong. The fabric is breathable (I wore it in the Vegas heat), but I discovered too late that it rides up when walking. Because of this, I had to change out of it before going out for the evening, which was a shame. Otherwise I would have liked it.
Great dress. Needed help getting it zipped but it's comfortable and flattering on this curvy mother of two. Will rent again!

I wore this for My bachelorette! It felt great, looked great and made me feel like a beautiful bride For a night out with the girls. The fit is tight but it is supposed to be that way. The material sucks everything in- was not able to wear underwear with it for girls who don't feel comfortable Doing that
My first bandage dress by HL, and I'm sold! Renting more! Good length too -- not too short for this tall lady.

links_reviews_title: This dress is so sexy and flattering - wore it for my birthday, felt like a goddess
links_reviews_text: Fits just like a Herve Leger should - I'm thinking of investing in one so I needed to know my real size and it's a S. I can squeeze into an XS but it's not comfortable and doesn't look right. I wore this out in Miami and it was perfect!
Always fits like a glove but white tends to always get dirty by the end of the night

links_reviews_title: Runs at least two sizes too small!
links_reviews_text: This dress was ridiculously small. Depending on the brand/label/designer, I can order the smallest size and it will fit or rarely still be a little loose. Based on reviews I tried the XS (I'm 5'2 and 114 lbs when I tried this dress on) and I could barely get into it and definitely couldn't even zip it up. I suspect I would've needed to order at least two sizes up. My husband even said he thought I was accidentally sent a kids' dress!

This dress was so sexy and fun for my Vegas bachelorette party! However, it was quite tight (as expected) even after sizing up. I wore it anyway but was uncomfortable most of the night. Given the tightness I was unable to wear underwear. I made a strapless bra work with it but could see the bra outline a bit.
I usually am a 4/6 and wear a S in HL. I got the M because that was all that was available. So tight I couldn't zip it and when I did get it on you could see the pattern on my undies. I'd size up.
Most regular size dresses from here bunch up in the back because of my petite frame, this one didn't. It was super cute on and very comfortable. Two thumbs up!
I am usually a size 6 and rented the size medium. I could barely zip the dress. I did not end up wearing this since the fabric pulled too much over my stomach. I definitely recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: OMG the most flattering high quality dress, OBSESSED
links_reviews_text: Slimming
True to size, comfy, cute and fun!
Runs a bit big. Happy it was long enough, and flattering. Go down a size if unsure. XS would've been perfect.

I have never worn a dress that was so low cut. So no surprise that I didn't end up wearing this one. I loved the fit besides the extremely low neckline and I would've worn it if it weren't for that. Super disappointing because the dress quality was amazing. Very flattering material. Maybe if I had massive knockers it wouldn't be so horrible...
This was low cut and tight as is expected from this Designer. I'd say it's less of a tummy control bandage dress as other dresses by Herve but was still a fun wear for the concert I wore it to.

Chose this for my birthday dress and loved it! Flattering yet not too, too low-cut for my 32DD size. Perfect for a backyard evening celebration. Compliments all evening! I have an hourglass figure, so as often happens with any non-A-line, I had to pull the dress a bit here and there. Because it's a thick, stretchy material, this wasn't too bad. Highly recommend!
I got so many compliments. I'm normally a small but ended up going with the medium. Low cut but very sexy.

I typically wear a 6/8 and went with the large. I could've possibly worn a medium but felt super comfy in the large. The beautiful pattern hid my tummy. The cut was a little low so I couldn't wear with a normal bra, but it worked perfectly with a strapless. Received so many compliments all night. Loved!!! I'm tempted to buy now.
This dress is amazing! The bandage material is so flattering and the design is so unique.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, sexy and fun! Wore it on stage at my company's big event.
links_reviews_text: Fit is body hugging...comfy, stretchy fabric...I paired it with a black leather jacket at night and it looked GREAT!

links_reviews_title: Very low cut, but oh so sexy!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel like a million bucks and I got compliments from men and women alike. It was definitely revealing in the chest area, but I felt mostly like it was because the shoulder straps were stretched out some. Either way, it fit great, hugged in all the right places, and is very forgiving in the hip/butt area.
Loved the design on the dress. I really should have gotten a small, but it wasn't available, so I felt like it was a little big on me. Still loved it!
Thick fabric. Has a lot of give and is very stretchy yet textured. Can be dressed up or down. Loved wearing it.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks in this dress.
links_reviews_text: It hugged my body in all the right places! The pattern of the dress is stunning. I didn't even have to wear a bra.
I have always wanted to wear an Herve Leger and this did not disappoint. It's so comfortable too!!!
Dress wasn't as tight as most Herve Ledger dresses but the fit was cute for a fun party. The length wasn't too short or long but great for twirling on the dance floor without showing too much.

I really liked everything about this dress! The cut, length, color, pattern everything was very attractive! My only complaint was the top seemed a little stretched out although I don't think it was too noticeable to others. My husband LOVED the dress!!
Rented this for a Preakness event I attended on my birthday and loved it! Great fit and great pattern. A must rent. Unfortunately had to wear a sweater since it was a cool day.

I rented this dress for date night. As others have mentioned, the arm holes are a little loose, but if you pull the dress down it's manageable. Form fitting but not bandage form fitting like a typical Herve. It has a drop waist that really accentuates the bottom! Loved the dress.

Very beautiful dress. Not a typical Herve that is tight though. This dress doesn't hug you. It was showing a bit more cleavage than I like but it wasn't too bad. You can't wear a bra because it shows. I would recommend a Nu bra.

This runs true to size and maybe a little big for Herve leger. I've worn both small and medium and I'm 5' 7" with 34c/32D breast size and narrow hips. The only negative thing is that the top is loose under the armpits. These dresses are heavy and really need to be hung by the hangers loops inside and not the sleeves. So I would say do not size up on this one and if you have a short torso, it might not fit at the armpits and shoulders.

I rented this for a party but didn't receive it in time... and wanted to wear it so badly but thought it would be " too much" for just dinner out. Paired with a denim jacket and booties, it worked! I had never worn Herve and was worried it would run small. It could have easily worn a S because the skirt is not fitted. The M was a little loose around the belly and under the arms. But with a jacket you couldn't notice. The fabric is incredible ... such a great print and such high quality with a lot of stretch and weight. Can't wait to rent another Herve!!
The dress fit very comfortably- wish I'd taken the picture before eating like crazy. I felt really good wearing it.

The fit is perfect except that it gapes a little under the arms. I am not sure if my bust isn't quite large enough to fill out the top part of the dress. Otherwise, I absolutely love this dress. It is comfortable and unique.
Good
Extremely large and stretched out for a medium--especially for this brand! Beautiful design but unfortunately couldn't wear it!
No spanx required. Amazing.

links_reviews_title: COMFY + SEXY = HAPPY GIRL + HAPPY HUSBAND
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress and so did my husband. I was surprised to find that it was pretty big for me in my usual medium, especially for a Herve Leger. It was flattering, comfy, and can be dressed up or down easily. My husband thinks it a keeper, I am still deciding...
Fit like a glove.
Wonderful little number.
Fits like a dream... not as tight as other Herve dresses as the bandage element is missing. Long enough for a tall girl

links_reviews_title: Too big: didn’t wear. Otherwise SEXY
links_reviews_text: Didn’t wear this because I sized up, but that ended up being too big. I’m a 4 and the M was just too loose. Get your normal size! Otherwise beautiful! The cut is low but you can actually wear with a normal bra! (Which is awesome) the pattern is great. I would wear this with strapped heels or even sneakers to make it casual! Also some blue or silver earrings. The shape is great for ladies with hips! Definitely will try to rent the S next time!

links_reviews_title: Too large for me on top
links_reviews_text: I have always wanted to wear Herve Leger so jumped to rent this for a date. I am a 4 on top and 6 or 8 on the bottom. The bottom part of the dress seemed fine but the top was huge! I am 5'10 and a 36c and the straps kept buckling and slipping off my shoulders and the back was gapping. Also it was super low cut which I think was due to the straps being either stretched out or too big (though my husband would have been fine with that!!) My bottom part I don't think could handle a smaller size though without more workouts! Bummer because the pattern is really pretty as is the color.

It's a Herve leger. It curves every bit of your body. The pattern is gorgeous and reminded me of the ocean. The top has a great cut both front and back making this a great option for a night out on the town.
Wish I had gone a size smaller, was unsure as I had recently had a baby
I'm returning it immediately, the length is too long for my torso, and it didn't flatter me in the right areas.

links_reviews_title: Thick material. Not good for warm weather places
links_reviews_text: Too thick of a fabric. I didn't wear this dress as I felt I was in a wetsuit.
Super cute dress, good fit.

I rented this dress for a trip to Vegas. When we boarded the flight the two flight attendants said, "wow! What a great dress! You look fantastic!" When we were exiting the plane they called me "the model". Definitely a sweet reaction! My boyfriend absolutely loved the dress too and said I should wear it more often, so this one is a definite winner in my book!!
Really lengthy straps. Ill fitting.

links_reviews_title: Enough stretch for a pregnant belly
links_reviews_text: I took a chance on all the reviews saying this had a lot of stretch and I'm so glad I did! I was 23 weeks pregnant when I wore it and it fit like a glove! Would absolutely rent again (even when not pregnant). The sleeve/shoulder detail made the dress so flattering

links_reviews_title: This dress was a show stopper!
links_reviews_text: The reviews on this dress were right. Nothing short of amazing. I'm between a 12 and 14 and ended up wearing the 48. I could have made the 50 work but this fit like a glove and that one would have had too much extra fabric around my middle. I wore the neckline a little different for a little extra edge (and to not get that little gape at the breast some others had) and I'm glad I did. Felt like a million bucks.

links_reviews_title: OMG! Hugs all the right places. I feel hot!!
links_reviews_text: Very form fitting. Stretchy but thick material. Looks amazing on. Love it. I'm 5'4" 125

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I loved, loved, loved this dress! It fit me so well and the material, I felt, was very forgiving as it had stretch but also seemed to hold me in. It was very comfortable to wear all evening at the formal Christmas party to which I wore it. I loved the asymmetrical detail and had no problem wearing a regular strapless bra with the dress. I did put some fashion tape on the top edge of the bra cup underneath the cut out just to make sure my bra didn't peek out. I received so many compliments on this dress. I will note that when the dress arrived, it had a very noticeable stain right on the front, but I was able to hide it by pinching it from behind with a safety pin and blending it in with the other ruched folds. I let RTR customer service know so hopefully the dress gets a good cleaning because I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Very nice fabric, looks very elegant but still very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: One of my favorite rentals!

Loved this dress! It definitely runs a bit small. I'm 5'4" and 120 lbs. i wore a 40. I also got the 38 and didn't even try it on. There is a lot of stretch in the dress so it's very comfortable once it's on.

links_reviews_title: Smokin' hot dress when you need to be Lady in Red
links_reviews_text: This is a soft, stretchy fabric that is very comfortable, worn with a strapless bra. I wore it to a wedding and got compliments all around. Love love! And would rent again.

Very comfortable! Material is thick but stretchy. I wore it with a spanx underneath. Received lots of compliments especially for a holiday party. I would wear this again and is definitely one of my favorites. Rent the Runway was another hit!
Great material, flexible & flattering fit while easy to move in. So many compliments on this dress will definitely rent again (or buy)!

links_reviews_title: Bombshell dress but a little challenging to walk in
links_reviews_text: I was surprised that the dress didn't have a zipper. But it was stretchy enough to pull over my head. It's nothing like subtle, so there was plenty attention and compliments all night. But I did have to walk about a mile and the dress kept riding up annoyingly. That's the only reason I'm not giving it 5 stars.

Fits very snug, but flattering. Chest is extra tight for large bust and the the strap over the left shoulder is a little awkward. Bunches up a little from the back, but nobody notices . Got to a of compliments.

Beautiful dress that is actually pretty comfortable to wear... but a bit difficult to take off! Have rented this dress in the blue color also and loved it so much that I rented it in red again. Runs small (I'm usually a US size 2 and ordered the size 40).
My fav dress ever rented

I loved the draping on this dress. The material is thick and has stretch, which hugs your figure nicely. True to size, although give yourself the benefit of the doubt and size down because it the fit is so easy.
The dress fit me perfectly and was such a gorgeous color red! So stylish and the material was great! Perfect length too, not too short or too long. You won't be disappointed!
Loved this neckline. Very comfortable. A tad long for my short height but still loved it
I loved the uniqueness of the dress and I got so many compliments. It fit and looked great all day. The pattern was great to hide the tummy, and also highlights the curves well.

I really love this dress and so did everyone else. It fit comfortably as allowed for lots of dancing. It doesn’t have a zipper so I shimmied in and it was a bit of a challenge getting out of it but I managed. Overall, a great dress!

links_reviews_title: Soft and stylist! Great work to cocktail dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" 110 lb. 32B and usually wear size 0. Got this dress straight from RTR and 44/8 was the only size available. It runs small so I was able to wear it still. Next time will try to get size 38/2. Will definitely rent this dress again!

Material was super comfortable and the off the shoulder cut got me many compliments. As a few other people mentioned, I did have to keep pulling the dress up on the side with the off the shoulder as it kept showing my bra

I wore this for my Miss Illinois interview. It fits great if it's your perfect size. Luckily it was for me. There is no zipper or opening so you have to pull it up your body with minimal stretch. (If you have hips... good luck.) Otherwise, it's a unique, professional, HOT dress!

I wore this to sing the national anthem at a gala and loved it. I was one of only a few people in red which was really nice. There is also enough ease and room in this dress to be comfortable singing in it. It is hard to get on and can be difficult because it twists and the sleeve can travel a little, but that didn't bother me too much.

I loved, loved, loved this dress! I actually looked online to buy it. It fits perfectly. The cut and material wrapping are interesting and the off the shoulder strap is striking. I loved the length as well. I wore brown leopard peep toe shoes, larger earrings, light bangles and large ring. I skipped a necklace so as not to distract from the neckline. I usually wear a 4 or 6, I ended up wearing the 42 (6) as I do have a little more of a curvy backside and didn't want it too tight.
Loved this dress and received tons of compliments! Very comfortable. Classy and sexy all at once.

links_reviews_title: It's a very pretty, and flattering and sexy dress. All the while being tasteful.
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove. You pull it on, no zipper. I wore it with spanx to get a smooth look. Hugs your curves perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful bright dress with amazing fit !
links_reviews_text: Color beautiful! Fit is very flattering. Got so many compliments and felt great !

I've rented over a dozen dresses from RTR and this was my absolute favorite. I'm 4 months post partum and this dress made me feel incredible and I got endless compliments. I was a 2 pre-babe and feel like a 4 now. I wore the 40 but the 42 would have worked too. The material is thick but not hot and hugs in all the right places. I will say, I'm petite with narrow shoulders so the neckline fit perfectly but if you're broader in that area it might not look the same. Need seem less undies and I wore sticky boobs. Even a strapless might show.
Material is amazing, very comfortable. Style is so complementary!!! I have never gotten so many compliments as with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Felt a little bit like a newscaster in it, but it was really flattering and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: REALLY hard to get on.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for wedding..color and design pop. Didnt see myself comin in this hot piece!
links_reviews_text: Had to keep pulling down. Cause I'm hippy.
Great, stretchy dress that allows you to feel comfortable all night!
Beautiful dress, great fabric. I wore it with a blazer for work and then out to dinner. Very versatile

Stunning dress. Sexy and classy. Wore it to a holiday party for my boyfriend's company. I prefer a snug fit, and the material is thick enough to do that without showing bulges, but has enough stretch to be very comfortable. I usually wear shapewear but didn't need it as this dress has a lot of structure. Perfect balance of stretch and structure. I'd actually think about buying the dress to be honest. This is the best garment I've ever rented.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Fit snug. I received a ton of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: loved this dress. will rent again

This was my replacement order, & it was perfect! Worn to my company holiday party...classy, yet sexy without being revealing. It is definitely some sort of strange wetsuit material (& I'm still vaguely convinced I wore it backwards....) but it's comfortable to dance in & totally eye-catching!

The material and details of this dress is amazing. So elegant and unique that you only need a glance to see that it's a very nicely made dress. It felt like a glove - tight but once wearing it, the somewhat thick material gives/shows a nice shape to a body. After gaining a few pounds after holiday season(123 pounds), the 38 size felt a little too tight, but I could still wear it and feel good in it.

links_reviews_title: Great color, unusual cut that stands out
links_reviews_text: I liked the fit of this dress, the cut was unique and it was comfortable to wear. I'm 5'4, short-waisted with a 36DD. While the cut at the top is flattering on many, I felt like it showed my bra fat. I do love the designer and would rent again if I lost a few pounds!!
I wore this to church for Christmas Sunday and my fiance' kept whispering to me how good I looked lol, it's not too sexy with just the right amount of spunk & class!

This dress is amazing. I am usually a size 2 and the 40 was perfect. There's no zipper so it goes over the head and at first I was nervous it wouldn't go on and was way too small, but once I pulled it down, it fit perfect. Very flattering!

Loved this dress. It was really comfortable and easy to throw on. Definitely is a little longer if you are shorted like me, but looked great with my heeled boots to even it out. Would be perfect if it was shorter.

Fine for a day at work (even though it was a bit edgy for that) but the material and the loose fit of the top (and informal neckline) made it too casual for a party. I am a 6 and the 36 fit perfectly.

It runs big but it's meant to fit lose I've rented this dress twice now, I love it so much. The material is like a workout shirt but it's still dressy. I wish it came in more colors. One of the most comfortable dresses ever.
I like the style of the dress, could definitely wear one size down. Got compliments! Very comfortable dress and doesn't wrinkle.
Compliments. And so comfortable.

I paired this with a long midi skirt from Vince because I felt it was too short to wear to work. I like asymmetrical hems But I felt this piece to be a little off in how it fell and draped. It isn't as flattering on as I had hoped but the material is comfortable and the shape is forgiving. The material is a sporty mesh and is breathable and easy to wear in summer weather. The sleeves are boxy and large as other reviewers have mentioned but I like that, I think if you want more shape up top, size down or pair with something to change the silhouette.

links_reviews_title: The fit and color of this dress are great!
links_reviews_text: I loved the color of this dress! The fabric reminds me of Nike dry fit fabric and has an athletic feel. I wore it with sneakers but I can see it dressed up with boots or heels too! Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Easy dress to wear for simple style and comfort
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress a few times already and plan to take on vacation to Florida next week. Thin, almost work out shirt material but somehow is still easy to dress up! Could wear all days and no wrinkles which is always a huge plus!

Way more compliments on this dress than anticipated. Dress was comfortable and the asymmetrical hem made it interesting. It's got a kind of sporty nylon fabric similar to breathable workout clothes, so it didn't wrinkle easily. That said, it ran a little large and the sleeves weren't that flattering. I tried rolling them to make less boxy.

I was excited to see this pop into the new arrivals because I love these colors together. I'll be dressing this down this weekend - throwing on some moto boots and calling it streetwear. Some things to note: the colors are not as bright in real life as you can see by my (mostly) unedited photo. The top on this runs large. The material does not feel expensive but is very lightweight and comfortable. It's actually a woven mesh material up close. This brand has a super cool vibe.
One of the ugliest tunics I've ever put on my body. This looks like it was designed and sewn in a high school Home Ec class. Truly ugly. I just. I can't.

links_reviews_title: The material makes it awkwardly straddle the line between formal and casual.
links_reviews_text: Love the hemline, but the material was jersey-like and the juxtaposition of formal and casual didn't quite work for me.
It fit great as it's not snug at all. This would be perfect for a 60 degree weather day. I wore it to work while it was a bit too chilly but wore knee high boots to make it less drafty.

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt with odd, sporty fabric
links_reviews_text: This was honestly just a little weird to me. The skirt was cute and the cut of the skirt was great, but the v-neck was awkward and the shoulders were boxy with too-long sleeves. The material was similar to sportswear so it ended up feeling like a tennis dress or running shirt. Ultimately it wasn’t the right look for me so I sent it back without wearing it, though it did fit me well.
The dress was very big on top and tighter in the hips, therefore it lost the drapey effect. The proportions were all wrong for an hourglass shape.
Loved this dress. It was a lot of fun to wear. I wasn't expecting the material to be mesh, but that was nice on a 90 degree day.

links_reviews_title: Cute and sporty but runs big
links_reviews_text: I was excited to rent this dress but the top area was pretty loose. My hips/butt ended up causing the dress to lose its flair. This may look better on athletic or straight down body types
runs large in bust/arms

I generally love mixed fabrics and dresses like this. This dress, however, is made of a material most like a sweat-wicking workout shirt. I felt like I was wearing one of those horrible bibs from school gym class again, and I couldn't make this work.

links_reviews_title: I ordered a size too big, but super beautiful dress!!

links_reviews_text: The dress fit great overall. The only negative was the off the shoulder area. The nude liner was visible when worn and I had to constantly adjust and tuck the lace to hide it.

I absolutely LOVED this dress! I didn't want to take it off. The only small issue I had with it was the elastic around the shoulders. It would flip out and bunch incorrectly. Luckily I had a seamstress on hand who made it work perfectly. I received so many compliments throughout the night. It's definitely a statement dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved how unique this dress was!
links_reviews_text: The dress ran a little small. I tend to wear an 8/10 and I probably could've sized up to a 12. The 10 was comfortable while standing but the boning made it a bit uncomfortable when I sat.
