Rented this for a photoshoot/wedding. I wore it for the shoot, but not he wedding. It was gorgeous, but I was a bit self-conscious about it being fitted around my gut. It was horrible, but I put on a couples lbs and wasn't feeling my greatest. The dress itself it beautiful and very detailed. It fit true to size and hugged the body very well. IG: @noellevenegas
High high high quality. The fit was outrageous. Wish I could keep it!
Good fit! I had to size up because it does run small! Loved it!

Pros: Beautiful, thick and vibrant lace. Photographed well. Cons: I never knew that boning could break but by the time I got to the venue the boning in the front of my dress popped out through the lace. Also as is the case with the other Marchesa dresses I've rented, the zipper is stubborn around the waist area. Seems like cheap zippers with luxury fabric.

links_reviews_title: Stood out in a sea of red - compliments all day and into the next week!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear at a summer wedding, and lots of ladies were wearing red or florals. This dress got compliments all night, and they continued into the following week following my social media post (it counts because I never get comments on my outfit on social media, haha). I usually am a size 4, but rented the 2, and it stretched in the bottom throughout the evening, so I'd suggest sizing down. The arms were a bit tight but I also stitched them a bit due to the nude lining showing (which other people mentioned). My quick fix allowed it to not show that much. I would definitively recommend this dress despite the sleeves

This dress was absolutely beautiful. I wore it to a fundraiser gala that was a mix of cocktail attire and formal gowns. I'm 125 lbs, 34c so I went with the 4r. I'm 5'3" and you can see the R was long on me...other than that, it fit perfectly. The upper bodice is a corset so I didn't need to wear a bra, and the dress over all is beautifully and well made so I didn't need shapewear (about 75% of the time I do). I had to iron the bow because it was no longer attached to the belt, it looked like it had been sewn on at one point but it was no longer attached causing the bow and its tails to become wrinkled. This was an easy fix. I would absolutely rent this dress again and highly recommend.

I've been stalking this dress for a while and was so excited when my size became available. The color and lace are beautiful and was easy to dance in. I would have given it 5 stars if the shoulder straps were more comfortable. It was tight around the arm and the beige inner lining kept showing. Other than that, this was a phenomenal dress!
Beautiful dress! Tons of compliments and very comfortable. Size up!

links_reviews_title: Very sophisticated southern showstopper. Loved wearing this for the Kentucky Derby.
links_reviews_text: Fit is comfortable. Zipper is a challenge at the waist. Constructed beautifully. The grosgrain ribbon at waist was folded and wrinkled upon delivery. Took it to cleaners to press out. Lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful and fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress. It was also surprisingly comfortable! Plus, it looks like the dancing girl emoji! Ha!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper. Elegance meets sexy.
links_reviews_text: Marchesa runs small, so I sized up from my normal 10 to 12 with great success. Didn't need a bra.
I received so many compliments on this dress!! I am a 36G bra and 31 in jeans. This fit perfectly! I have another event coming up and I wish i could wear this again!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Dress for a formal Affair.
links_reviews_text: Fit was great , length perfect for my height. Sleeves were a bit tight but overall loved the style and color .

links_reviews_title: The quality of the dress was amazing. I received many compliments and request of where the dress
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable fit, the dress was very high quality and accentuated my figure well.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Beautiful paired with turquoise jewelry! I wore it for a tropical themed gala.
links_reviews_text: The ribbon in the middle was a bit creased, but the overall look is amazing! Love the details of this dress. It won’t disappoint!

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS! I absolutely love this dress! The color & fit are amazing. I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy. Runs slightly big. Easy to move and dance in!
If you want to stand out and look amazing, this dress is for you! Sexy, yet comfortable. Fits well. Gorgeous hue that will make you stand out. I suggest a red lip!

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this dress! It was a hit. Fit great!
links_reviews_text: The fabric has no stretch in it, but the dress fit great so it wasn’t a problem.

Fabulous dress! The color is amazing! And it fits like a glove. There is no room for carbs in this dress! The hem is actually a high-low which is not shown in the pictures. Had a bit of trouble keeping the elastic from showing on the ruffle sleeve- but it is nude colored and blended in with my shoulder (very minor problem BTW). LOVE LOVE LOVE this dress. No bra required. You will not want to send it back.
I needed a size 4.5. Some compliments I couldn’t bend to buckle my shoes A red statement. Thousands at the event. No one wore my dress! 5 ft 6 in. 36C Athletic 145lbs

links_reviews_title: The Most Beautiful Dress I've Ever Worn
links_reviews_text: Such a lovely dress, will make you stand out in any room. The boning ensures that the top of the dress stays up and supports you. Perfect midi length to remain classy but figure is so sexy and beautiful on your curves!! Only con is the underside of the off the shoulder piece kept showing- would suggest dressing tape!

What a beautiful dress!!! This was my first time using RTR and I will definitely be back for more events in the future; it was soo easy and I got a beautiful dress! Even my backup style dress (which was also by the same designer as this dress-Marchesa Notte) that I got for free was beautiful as well— I was so sad I couldn’t wear it but hopefully I’ll have the opportunity to rent it again. I am usually fluctuating anywhere between a 2-6 in dress sizes (usually just 2-4 but if it runs really small I get a 6) depending on the cut, fabric, fit, etc. I believe my TRUE size is a 4 so maybe this dress runs a little on the larger size because I ordered a 4R as my size and I got the 2R as my free backup size; I actually ended up wearing the 2R to my event. The 4 fit well but the 2 just sucked me in a little tighter so that’s why I went with that size. Loved the dress! Got so many compliments and everyone flooded my inbox asking where it was from after I posted pictures on Facebook and Instagram of me in the dress. Definitely recommend.

I wore this for a CMA after party and a complete stranger walked right up to me to have a five minute conversation about how much she loved this dress. It really is that stunning. Stands out as it's a bright red, but very classy. I am a 40D so it was a bit tight in the chest area but did fit. I'm also 5'1" so you can see the length here in the photo. Right above my ankles.

I have never felt more glamorous! This dress was incredibly comfortable (dancing and sitting for long periods of time) and oh so flattering (especially around “problem areas”). I received compliments ALL DAY. My only minor complaint is that the lining on the sleeves does pop out from time to time. I will absolutely be renting this dress again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a wedding in Italy, the off the shoulder ruffle and bright red MAKES IT.
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little snug at the waist with the ribbon, but still fit like a glove and looked beautiful. I wore another Marchesa dress to the wedding and wore an 8R which was interesting since this was a 10 and was a bit snug, the other dress in the 8R was more comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, gorgeous detail, so many compliments
links_reviews_text: This was one of my favorite dresses I've ever worn. I got so many compliments on this, although there was a piece of the boning sticking out from the bodice which kept poking my chest, but super cute. If you have bigger arms, the arm holes might be slightly big on you. They were very tight on me, I rented the 0 and am 5'4, 120 lbs.
Flattering and comfortable

links_reviews_title: I had continual compliments all day from random men and women!
links_reviews_text: Hugs your curves in the right places. Paired with strappy heels from Aldo, was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I've never received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Went to a wedding at the Ritz in Dallas, which called for a fun dress. I wore this, and never received so many compliments in my life. Unfortunately my photographer was v drunk otherwise I would have a good picture to submit!
Fit like a glove, the 10 was a little big, 8 would've been perfect. The only issue were the sleeves—the inside kept popping out since it was off the shoulder

links_reviews_title: Felt so glamorous in this dress
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress. It photographs beautifully and was surprisingly comfy.

This dress is stunning. I had so many people come up to me (men and women) saying how beautiful the dress was. I felt amazing. the 6R fit like a glove. Only downside is the ruffle top elastic is starting to lose shape. Other than that, this is a must rent. I'm an hourglass frame with wider hips and it fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: This dress was such a statement!
links_reviews_text: The bold red made me stand out- constant compliments! Loved it The only con is that the tan seam inside kept showing on the arms. You’ll have to constantly wrap some of the red arm material around to hid it. Other than that - it fit perfectly and let me dance all night!

links_reviews_title: Its such a elegant and memorable dress. Many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, I'm petite so the length was longer on me. But still a beautiful dress
Loved this dress. Rented for a wedding reception. Stunning detail and very comfortable. I would rent again!

This was a last minute rental and I ended up really liking it! Wore it to an outdoor wedding. I loved how the lace showed around the hem. I did not have any issues with the interior lining riding up. It did get caught on things easily, so I had to be careful not to snag it. Length was perfect for me.

Not the most exciting dress you'll ever wear but I thought it was flattering, you can wear a normal bra, and it was comfortable. I'm 5'4", 134 lbs and just had a baby (read: a little extra in the belly region and huge nursing boobs) and both the 8 and 6 fit but I went with the 6.

I'm normally a size 2, 5'7 with narrow hips and broad shoulders. 0 was the perfect fit. Also rented the 4 which was too large overall. It was appropriate for a semi-formal occasion which called for a professional appearance. It is also versatile, I think it would work for a dressy date or party as well.
Great classy dress. Would order a 4 next time.
True to size with a little bit of stretch. It was a comfortable dress to wear.

I wore this for my dad's funeral, and this was a perfect dress. It is absolutely beautiful and fit perfectly. Very comfortable. We were outside in hot Florida weather for part of the day, and the dress did not make me feel hot.

links_reviews_title: I loved the fit of this. It was comfortable and I had room to move around.
links_reviews_text: I sized up and don't regret it. I had extra room which was nice. The dress helps establish a natural waist so I didn't mind the extra room.

First try of an RTR dress! Very pleased! Beautiful dress! I would've liked the 14 - the 12 I could get in but just a little too tight so I wore the 16. It was for my stepson's last minute-date-change wedding, so I wanted something SPECIAL but didn't want to spend a fortune on Mother-of dress, so this was perfect solution. Also it was a bit of a stressy day with my husband's EX so was nice to feel good in my dress! All in all a good experience The dress did have a hole in side seam but I wore a black slip under and you couldn't see it. Also I let RTR know and they gave a little credit!
Fit really well. Was very comfortable and flattering. It was a great length.

links_reviews_title: This was for my daughter's wedding and the day was fabulous!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my daughter's wedding. I wore a size 14. I'm 5'4 , around 175 lbs, 38D . It was a TAD snug in the chest but I felt great in it . I got lots of compliments. The only MINOR issue was the zipper came down a little in the back and people kept coming up and fixing it for me :)

links_reviews_title: Cute dress - worn to a bridal shower
links_reviews_text: This was a cute dress - formal enough for the bridal shower I attended and could be worn to most weddings. I am often between an 8 and 10, and I wore the size 10. I could have likely worn an 8 with Spanx, but this was very comfortable. The dress is made from a nice heavy lace, but this one definitely does show some wear (some pulling, neck seems a little stretched). Overall a pretty dress, true to size, and comfortable.
Fit true to size. Thought dress was actually pretty comfortable. Wore to a catholic wedding so lots of standing and sitting. Would definitely rent again.
Love the fit and style of this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved sleeves on this dress. Perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit was TTS. Dress was a very sophisticated length. Perfect for work!

This dress fit perfectly. I am a tall, athletically built woman with broad shoulders and a booty! This dress fit perfectly. I wore my normal size, 4, and felt super comfortable. This is not a dress to go dancing in as the lace at the shoulders was restricting. I wore it to speak at an event as also to a management holiday party. I would own this dress if I could! I wore a normal bra. I sat down with no riding up issues.
I wore this for a work holiday party. The lace was beautiful and it fit a bit tighter than I expected it to in the mid section. Overall it was a great dress!
Absolutely loved this dress! Comfortable and classy, gorgeous lace really dresses it up. Perfect for a military dining out event, received lots of compliments!
It fit perfectly. I'm 5'3, 38DD, 169 pounds, apple shape.

links_reviews_title: Loved the detail on the dress
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, well made, lined so u can wear any bra and it won't show. Slightly loose fit but it was very comfortable. Wore it for an awards ceremony. Got lots of compliments. Very classy.

Perfect for a date at a fancy restaurant. Like other reviewers, the sleeves were tight on my arms. Not at the underarms, but on my actual arms. Just when I lifted them, though, not when they were at rest.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a formal evening wedding.
links_reviews_text: I chose runs small for overall fit, however that truly only applied to me in the chest area. The 14 fit, but I went with the 16 for more comfort and to make sure I could dance freely :) The lace detail is beautiful, and the ruffle at the neck is a great detail as well. The dress fell just at the knee for me, which was perfect. I paired this with black booties and a pop of pink in my earrings. I'd choose it again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect little black dress for a charity event.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the 12 and 14 and the 12 fit perfectly. I really loved the neckline and sleeves, it was very classy. It was comfortable to wear all night and very flattering. Would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Comfy but a little too big
links_reviews_text: Not well fitted for the petite. Runs big. I think I def could have gone a size down.
True to size. A little dressy for work but couldn't resist. It's a perfect Kate Spade dress.
I really enjoyed this piece. Great length and very comfortable. I would somehow add a pop of color next time.

This dress is fantastic! I'm right around 5' even and it hit just above the knee when I was standing. The fabric is quality material (it has no give, though) and the lace doesn't tear easily. I'm short-waisted and it was a bit baggy from the waist up, even with my larger chest. Could wear a normal bra. I will likely end up buying this one!

links_reviews_title: This dress was the perfect fit for the event I attended and spoke at!
links_reviews_text: I'm glad I had two sizes to try on in this dress. I ended up wearing the bigger of the two sizes just for comfort. I appreciated the coverage it gave me as this was an event that required a more conservative dress. It was the perfect little black dress! A nice option for a warm summer evening.
This is a really perfect dress for work. Loved the see through sleves

links_reviews_title: Nice dress. Heavy brocade but pretty.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit nicely. It's a gorgeous pattern of brocade and definitely the perfect yet more conservative little black dress.
Other than being a little right in the arms, everything about this dress was fabulous

links_reviews_title: Love. Love. Fits like a Glove
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a cocktail event in Vegas. Got more compliments on this dress, then were it to a show in Vegas. It fits like a glove and needs very little accessories.

links_reviews_title: Unique neckline with beautiful lace detail!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to a wedding. Loved the sleeve length and unique neckline. It was heavier because of the lace overlay, but not too hot for a June wedding. I got lots of compliments and felt very comfortable.

This dress fit incredibly well; I did feel a little tightness in the shoulders, but I experience that in almost every dress. The lace detailing is beautiful, and I loved that the length made it easy to dance in, but I wasn't worried about it riding up too much while spinning or sitting. This was my first Kate Spade, and I'll definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, little tight across the chest so maybe size up
links_reviews_text: Size up for bust

Very elegant dress by Kate Spade! Lace dresses are usually a little tighter on me due to the lack of stretch, however this dress fit so well all throughout, even the bust! It fell pretty straight, so it didn't look as fitted as the model. Pair it with a pair of black heels for a classy look!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress. I have a large bust and hips, this dress accentuated my figure. I wore this for NYE.
links_reviews_text: This dress was classic and very sect flr New years. I would but this dress or rent it again in the future.
It's a great dress if a little simple. Will definitely consider for other events.
I loved this dress for a friend's Christmas party! It fit well and I got lots of compliments on the look of the dress. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Conservative neckline and length but also form-fitting.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fabric and lace overlay. Wore it to a work event. True to size or size up if you want some flex, there's not much give in the fabric.
I love this dress. It's got elastic and runs large as others have said. It's also very... cleavage-forward, lol, so be aware of that if that's not your preference.

Lovely dress, nice light pink color! Wore this when I was about 7 months pregnant but I feel like you could wear it regularly. Only thing to note is that it is very low cut. I used a pin and still felt a little uncomfortable with the cleavage. Still an amazing dress with cute details!
Good fit, stretchy flattering and comfortable
Fit was great. I'm 5'5" 35 weeks pregnant and the M was perfect. Only issue is I had to pin the cleavage together.

I loved this dress! It was such a pretty color, and even though I felt very pretty and dressed up, it was so comfortable to wear. I also liked how the straps tied at the top of the shoulders. I am very short and have a larger bust now since having a baby and breastfeeding, so it made it so much easier to adjust. (Breastfeeding moms: it's SUPER easy to nurse in this dress!) Don't let the length on me throw you off - I am 4'9" so everything is extra long on me.

Wore this to an outdoor September wedding at a farm. The color is a lovely pink with a peach tone. Fabric is very light. Like other reviewers note it runs large. I got a M with S backup and wish I had had the XS to try but the small was ok. The fabric is very light - I could not wear a black strapless bra with this because it showed right through. I wore the straps as tight as possible and didn't have too much of an issue with the front but if you're smaller than a B cup or want to go sans bra, it would be difficult.

This dress was so pretty and fit me really well. The straps tie at the shoulders and are adjustable. I needed mine basically as tight as they would go, so by the end of the night my underarms we're getting a little irritated, but it was definitely minor. I got many compliments on the dress and felt really pretty in it.

Loose in the bust, could've had a hook to stay closed. Shimmied by strapless bra down a bit to prevent it from peeking thru the top. Really comfy and beautiful. Usually wear a 6 in a dresses but the small was way too big. Really beautiful and comfy for an outdoor summer wedding, kinda wanna rent again!
I think this is a great dress. Perfect for a spring wedding.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a super hot outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: I had ordered both M & L, but the Medium was almost a perfect fit. The waist fit me perfectly, I especially loved the elastic waist. I'm a little on the small side bust-wise but fortunately there was enough coverage. I got this for my mom's wedding, as she wanted me to wear a peachy-pink colored dress. I received so many compliments on this dress, for both the fit and the color.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for being 22 weeks pregnant
links_reviews_text: Was worried about what to wear for a friends' wedding being that I was 22 weeks pregnant with my second child. The dress fit perfectly, the straps can be adjusted and I got lots of compliments.

This was a fun dress but definitely order the backup size. I'm normally a solid medium after having two babies but I ended up in the small. The tie straps are adjustable but be forewarned, you may need fashion tape or a pin because the front kept gaping open. Otherwise, beautiful dress, lots of compliments !
It was a little low cut and showed my bra so I had to safety pin it. But it was a great dress, I got lots of compliments.
Really pretty dress. Fit me weird in the busy so I didn't wear it plus the pink washed me out because I'm not tan. Would be really pretty on someone more tan, small bust and long torso

Pros: light and nice fit, can wear a regular bra with it. The back is high enough and the straps are wide enough to hide your bra. Cons: The shoulder straps are tie-ons, so you have to work to get them adjusted right or you might flash someone! LOL My profile is not updating right, so to help with fitting: 5'2", 130 lbs, 34D, pant size 27 inches, wide hips, short torso

I wore this dress for a late spring wedding with an outdoor ceremony and felt like a goddess. I loved how flowing and delicate the dress is. It allows your body and face to be the main attraction. You can untie and adjust the straps so that the waist hits your natural waistline. I would highly suggest using fashion tape to adhere the top to a strapless bra. That worked for me and kept me covered all night. Overall I was happy with this dress!

The dress was cute, the vertical fanning on the skirt is flattering. The top had some excessive material and tying the straps as tight as possible was the only option and I could see if you have a smaller bust the dress would be a challenge to wear. I also went stick on strapless bra for the same reason. The color off the dress is nice but didn't look great on my fair skin tone.
I wore a size Small, 36 weeks pregnant for my baby shower. The chest area was a bit loose but not bad. It was comfortable and good fit. I got a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The dress is really great for dancing, it's light and flows nicely.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2" and the dress was a little large on top since I'm not very busty so I had to really tie the straps tight. And the picture shows the dress hitting just below the knee, but I was obviously too short for that to be accurate. The color isn't what I would describe as blush as well, but it was still a pretty color. Overall, though, I really loved the dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress for a Garden Wedding!
links_reviews_text: This was the absolute perfect dress for an outdoor garden wedding. I received so many compliments on this dress and it fit me perfectly! It moved well, it danced well, it handled shots and drinks like a pro. When I first put it on, I thought that it could have been a bit tighter (I'm usually somewhere between a 4 and 6), but you're able to tighten the straps however tight you like. It was the perfect boob amount as well. Low cut enough, but not overkill. I LOVED it! #wedding #beautiful

I really enjoyed wearing this dress to a spring wedding in California. It felt like a classic Hollywood glam dress. The color was very pretty. The pleated skirt was feminine and just the perfect length. As other reviewers mentioned, the top shows quite a bit of cleavage. I'm 5'6, 140 lbs, and pear shaped. I wore the extra small.

links_reviews_title: Ill fitting with a beautiful color and skirt
links_reviews_text: The photo is of me sitting down because it really illustrates the flaws of this dress. It's looks sloppy on top and is hard to wear in August weather while running around coordinating a wedding. The straps tie but slip and I had to keep sneaking away to retie them so I wouldn't flash the wedding guests. I'm small busted and didn't wear a bra but I still needed to safety pin the bust or I would have shown all my goods. I'm not sure how to wear this with a bra... all that being said, I still received a lot of complements, the fabric was breezy, and the pleated skirt was a nice detail. I did end up wearing the medium and think that if I had a small it may have fit better. This dress definitely runs large. I hope it works for someone else--great for a summer wedding!

I am wearing this dress at 8.5 months pregnant, and the extra small fit great (my normal size). I am small chested and the top part was tricky to work with. I ended up tying the shoulders as tight as I could stand around my arm pits and then using double sided tape to keep from slipping out in the front. Overall, I liked this dress and got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Mountain top wedding in colorado. what else can i say?
links_reviews_text: The medium was definitely the right size. The skirt was nice and flowy. The waist line felt like it fell a little high on my body. Overall, it was a beautiful dress!

Dress runs big on top. I ordered a large and a backup medium based on a review of someone with my same body type. I'm glad I did the large was big and I looked frumpy. The top of the dress runs big and I'm a 34DD. The medium was perfect on top and lose enough on the bottom to feel comfy and hide all the extras lol. It was super comfy and feminine.

links_reviews_title: Loved this costume idea...most everyone recognized us the Baby and Johnny!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for Halloween party...my husband and I went as Johnny and Baby from Dirty Dancing. It was perfect! It's a beautiful pale pink and runs true to size. I did use fashion tape because I was worried the top would slip down too far.

links_reviews_title: 80s themed party dress was perfect to be Baby from Dirty Dancing
links_reviews_text: This dress is not a style or color I would normally get, but since it was an 80s theme we decided to go as Baby and Johnny from Dirty Dancing. This dress was perfect for that. I had to tie the straps super tight in order to pick up the dress and have a form fit around the chest area. Dress is flowy and comfy and in great condition.

links_reviews_title: Doesn't fit well in the bust
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my City Hall wedding , and as you can see it is DEFINITELY not made for short curvy girls . There was no saving that neckline!

This dress was perfect for a Halloween wedding where my husband and I went as Baby and Johnny from Dirty Dancing. It was comfortable and light, and twirled nicely on the dance floor. As others have observed, there's a weird little pouch of fabric that forms on the right side of the top, but I minimized this by tying the straps tight and wearing a fabric belt with it. I could have worn the medium since the waist is stretchy, but for some reason there seemed to be less of a pouch on the large size, so I went with that.

Loved the way this dress fit and the compliments I received! Wore a shawl during ceremony for a bit of coverage but loved the way it accentuated the cleavage. Dress does need a plunge bra but was easy to wear. Very comfortable.

I liked the color, fit and fabric of this dress. Overall it was a good dress and I received many compliments. However if you do not have a chest that can fill in the fabric on top, you will need to secure it somehow. It had a tendency to fall open.
Very cute dress overall, fit TTS. Definitely had to tie the straps tightly.
I loved this dress! I felt so graceful and elegant. The top is quite big and I actually had to size down. But the pleats are lovely and the cut is flattering.

Rented this for a wedding. Read reviews and got and XS, when I wore it it was still large in the chest. Love the color and fit just not the sizing in the top 1/2. Tied the strings as tight as I could still wasn't great.

This dress is so comfy, romantic, and perfect for a wedding! Does run large-- I usually wear a Small and was very glad I ordered the XS! The top is a little booby, so some fashion tape is needed. The straps untie which allows for the top to fit differently on everyone!

links_reviews_title: A fun dress for a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. Even though I'm shorter, the length was fine! The reason I rated this dress a 4 is that I felt the chest area fit a little strangely. Maybe I was trying to be more conservative than the dress is meant to be worn, or it's meant for women with smaller chests, but the issue wasn't so bad I couldn't wear it. I loved the pleating in the dress, and the color was perfect!

I love this trendy dress by Ali & Jay! Running true to size with little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works for all cup sizes.I would recommend wearing a strapless bra with this dress. At 5’7”, the length hit at the knee on me. The color on the dress is amazing in person. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!

I wore this to my bridal shower, and got so many compliments on it! I loved how light it was, and it looked sophisticated. I ALMOST could fit in the small, but my chest was a little too large and it was very tight in the small. But in the medium, it was almost too low cut, I kept adjusting it - thank goodness my sash covered it for when I was bent over opening presents. Overall, this was a good dress!

This was my backup dress but I ended up wearing this for my friend's summer wedding. The color was beautiful and it was the most comfortable dress I've ever ordered from RTR. I'm normally a M but wore a S.

Wore this dress for a bachelorette photo shoot. The dress was overall pretty but it was pretty tight in the bust area (I am an 38DD) and also pretty revealing. I used some fashion tape to keep it in place.
It's a bit constricting but worth it! I love the fit and felt pretty in it! I also got mystery bling and the earrings were just beautiful! Good Job RTR!

I wanted to rent this shirt in a small but it wasn't available. The xs still fit but was def not as comfortable on the shoulders. It's not the easiest thing to wear, as you have to keep your arms down and the sleeves keep riding up all night. But I found it still looked good even when that happened. I got a ton of compliments and the look was very sleek. That being said, the garment seemed a bit used. The plastic coating on the inside meant to keep the shirt from riding up was stripping and falling off. Probably wouldn't rent again

This was my first choice to wear to an indie film festival event (day to night). I loved the look but it was just too small for me. I got it on but the cape part did not lay flat and I was being squeezed to much to make it comfortable. I will rent it again in a Medium! Thank goodness for back-ups!!! (P.S. I loved my back-up shirt even more...'Cascading Drape' shirt by Cushnie et ochs.)

links_reviews_title: Snug fit, but perfect! (Excuse the dirt on my mirror in the picture, oops)
links_reviews_text: This top is tight, but I think it's because I wore a structured bra with it. It could have worked without a bra too! It was perfect tucked into high waisted pants. Hard to wear a jacket with it though because of the cape detail. Would definitely rent it again!
Was a snug fit but worked fine. It is very slimming and felt great all night. I wore it a few times.

I loved this structured off the shoulder top. It was a tad bit tight in my arms, otherwise it fit true to size. I think you could totally go up a size and it would still be form fitting. I will definitely rent it again! Classy, chic, made me feel so pretty.
x

I love the slimming cut and how long it is in the torso. The back collar swoops down low which is an interesting feature. The material is a light knit with a bit of stretch and the top has a solid grip to keep the shoulders in place.
This top is cute but extremely tight. The shoulder sleeve ride up with the smallest movement. Maybe going one size up would help.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but the small was way too small for me.
links_reviews_text: Super cute but the small was way too small for me.
Plain, basic, and a little grumpy. Won't be wearing
I am usually a small and this was uncomfortably tight!
The shoulders kept popping up and I felt like I could not move in this top. I ended up changing while I was getting ready because I was so uncomfortable
fits well, classic, nothing over the top but looked like the photo
Great shirt! Form fitting - thick material. Loved it and would rent again.
It's a very nice shirt. Runs a little longer than I would like, I'm 5'2
I loved the style but was too tight on my shoulders, I wish u have a bigger size like XL

Very, very small in the shoulders- the bodice was snug but not uncomfortable, but I am relatively wide shouldered and the arms were just too tight to wear. This would be gorgeous on someone with a slight frame.

links_reviews_title: Super chic, shoulders roll up though
links_reviews_text: This top is so chic paired with black leather leggings. I wore it out for a date night and would've given 5 stars had it not been for the sleeves popping up to my shoulders every time I moved my arms.
I really wanted to love this shirt, but it did not fit at all as I had hoped. The shoulders were way too tight but the body fit loose. If you are going to rent, I would recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Cute but felt a little worn
links_reviews_text: Cute top for a night out- would wear again
Loved this top! It was a little snug on me but it looked absolutely fabulous on. Wore it with jeans for a night out in Vegas. Will rent again but will go with the Small Instead
So tight! uncomfortable!

I didn't wear. Only because I struggle with off the shoulder shirts. It was very flattering when I tried it on. Fabric is thick and concealing. However, I decided against it b/c I thought it would be difficult to dance in.

links_reviews_title: I loved this - I had no issues with the front staying down like some reviews
links_reviews_text: I wore an XS and I think you have to stay true to size because it will help keep everything in place. I didn't have any issues with the flap riding up or anything. It fit perfectly. Definitely a great top. Classy but different :)

It's a very pretty top but it is very fussy. After messing with it to get it just right, I decided against taking it with me on a weekend getaway. There is a layer underneath the cape part that kept revealing itself which was a bit annoying too. Oh well!
Very flattering. A little hard to keep on the shoulders, but overall nice.
I was super excited to wear this one but the top in general was very tight. It was difficult to lift my arms at all. Very cute but awkward to wear.

links_reviews_title: This was my first time renting. Everything showed up on time & I was impressed with the service
links_reviews_text: Very flattering structured top. Definitely form fitting. It is also snug at the shoulders to keep it in place so keep that in mind if you have an athletic build or are broad shouldered

links_reviews_title: I was uncomfortable in this - hard to keep the shoulders in place
links_reviews_text: I was uncomfortable in this - hard to keep the shoulders in place

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous top, the front fold over hen wasn't in the best condition
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit though

links_reviews_title: It fits snug but not too tight.
links_reviews_text: This top is very cute but not that easy to move in. The tummy is tight, don't eat a big meal! If you are standing around at a cocktail party this is a great top. If you are hosting, choose another one.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a small / size 4, and the arms were very constricting; it was tough to move and I didn't think the fabric sat right. I would not rent again.
Great material
It's a flattering top but runs quite small. I'm usually a size 4 but Medium was snug, mostly due to my wider shoulders

links_reviews_title: It was really pretty but it was tight around the waist i thought from the photo it wasnt skin tight.
links_reviews_text: It was really pretty but it was tight around the waist i thought from the photo it wasnt skin tight.
Wasn't a fan of the fabric (felt like heavy polyester), and the shoulder fit wasn't very comfortable. The style is very cute, however.
Loved but it smelt like smoke

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. love the way it shapes my body.
links_reviews_text: No Cons Loved it!
I have wide shoulders. It does make it a little hard to move arms and body around. Overall a great piece!!

I struggle with rompers because I have a long torso, but the fit on this romper was perfection. I would suggest ordering your standard size and the next size up for your backup size. The romper is lined so it is not see through. It's also not a true white but more of an off white. I would rent this outfit again for another summer event.
Comfortable and I loved the ruffles. Got lots of compliments. Wish there were pockets though

This romper is amazing. You can dress it up with strappy sandals or make it more casual with flip flops. I'm about 5'3 1/2 and 100lbs and it fit like a glove everywhere but the chest. I'm closer to a 32C and I was definitely spilling out. I think if I went up a size it would have been too big. Bonus for big busted women is you can wear a bra. I just wouldn't recommend anything with any type of padding. I was also impressed with how snug it was without showing any lines. If I rented this earlier in the summer it def would have been a keeper (to buy)

Wore this while bar hopping in Nashville during my bachelorette party. All my girls LOVED it & I scored quite a few compliments. My only major complaint is that the straps wouldn't stay up. I have fairly narrow shoulders, so may not be the case for everyone.
The group of girls I was with also loved this romper- enough to encourage me to buy it. The fit is great and I was able to wear a bra with it, which is always a plus. Highly recommend getting this.

links_reviews_title: Great for bachelorette party! Need the right bra
links_reviews_text: I'm a 36DD and the L was pretty tight on my chest, fit great everywhere else. Even though it has sleeves, still needed a strapless bra. Overall I felt great, will rent again for honeymoon!
The chest is a little tight and low cleavage, which makes it very sexy but the ruffles on the sleeves make it romantic. Looks very classy
Definitely rent. Very cute and flattering. Runs small though so I ended up sizing up.
Loved this romper! I received so many compliments! Felt it ran a little small for length. I am a bit taller so my butt cheeks hung out when bending over. Otherwise, awesome!!
Fits like a glove, super comfortable, fun, dressier than I anticipated.

This jumpsuit is absolutely stunning. It fits true to wise but if you're over 5'7 I doubt you can wear it. I'm 5'9 and it was really riding up my butt. I had on blue underwear and you can't see them through the fabric. Debating reordering in a Small.
Photographs well. Clean fun simple romper. Just make sure to get the right size. I could have gone with a small instead of medium.
Got the medium and large. Ended up wearing the medium. Make sure you have some spanx to smooth everything out! The material does not hide anything! Got many compliments on it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my bachelorette and it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. I'm 5'5 142 lbs and wear a Medium (size 8) and it fit great. Easy to move and dance in and the ruffle added the perfect flare to dress it up. Highly recommend for a comfortable white romper! Loved this rental!

links_reviews_title: Rented this for my bridal shower and got tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: A little long in the torso for me but otherwise fit great! I'm a size 10, 34DD.
Cute and comfy. Rompers usually look awkward because I'm 5'2 and do not have long legs but the fit is nice. I wish it had pockets

Wore this to an all white party in Hawaii for my husband's company trip. I got so many compliments and I felt fabulous! Would highly recommend. I'm petite and pear shaped with bra size at 36AA and I'm about 5'2".

links_reviews_title: Cute enough romper, but not for busty gals
links_reviews_text: Cute enough romper. Rented for a white party, and while it served its purpose, I probably wouldn't rent again. Fit was true to size everywhere except the bust. I'm a 32DDD, and could just barely zip up the small. I ended up wearing the medium even though it was a little big everywhere else. The shoulder straps in the medium were extra long so I had to sort of tuck under my bra straps so they wouldn't fall down. The romper would probably work best for someone slightly taller and with a smaller chest size.
Would definitely wear again.

Ran small so size up. Beautiful romper! Could be dressed up with heels, I wore with Tory Burch sandals and it still looked v classy. Highly recommend! And not see through at all. Wore w/o bra, just nippies.

links_reviews_title: This romper was everything! I wore it on our honeymoon and it was super cute and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: True to size
doesn't go well with my petite figure

Wore this to my wedding ceremony rehearsal and casual daytime welcome party at a brewery. Everyone loved it. I was concerned about it being too short, but it didn't ride up like I thought it would. Not see through. Would definitely recommend!

I wore this for dinner and drinks for my bachelorette party and it was the perfect outfit. I'm short, but have a long torso, so the small was the best fit for me, despite other outfits by this designer being huge in an XS. The style is highly flattering and the white is not see through at all.
The romper runs VERY small!! And is NOT white. It's cream!!!
none

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my bachelorette party, and it was the perfect outfit!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8" and 140 lbs, the M fit perfectly!!

links_reviews_title: Romper runs small but it's gorgeous
links_reviews_text: I couldn't wear it because I put on 5 lbs. It runs a little small. Maybe size up. It's absolutely beautiful
This was very cute, but ran small. I have an athletic build, and it was very unforgiving around the rib cage. I could zip it, but it would be a pain to zip and unzip if I wanted to use the bathroom.
Lots of compliments on this romper. I usually wear and XS but the S fit perfectly. Good for smaller chests!
The style is really cute and chic though the fabric is definitely not forgiving. I sized up from a medium to a large and was still too tight.

links_reviews_title: Not super flattering if you have a tummy
links_reviews_text: Not super flatting if you have a tummy. The top looked great but the tummy part didn't. Otherwise, it fit well. My friend who is 5'10 and thin wore it and looked amazing, so probably just not great for my body type.
This was super cute. It was fitted and the small was just a little tight on me. I did not have to wear a bra with it but it is bra-friendly.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear the romper.
links_reviews_text: It ran small, it was too tight to wear.

Runs small, I’m athletic build so too tight in the back area and fabric did not give at all. It zipped up but wasn’t comfortable. Also, a little too short for a classy 40 year old. But loved the style, particularly the sleeves and V cut top.
I'm usually wear XS or XXS, but the XS was way too tight for prime time.

links_reviews_title: Way small and too short for a slightly tall person.
links_reviews_text: This wouldn't even zip, and I'm a Medium to Small (size 6) and rented a Medium. I'm 5'8, but this was waaayyyy to short, my butt cheeks would have been hanging out. Still trying to find a cute romper for vacation! The material is nice, so if you're petite, give it a shot!

links_reviews_title: Worn for a photoshoot, very flattering up top.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, very flattering

I am 5'5" 123 lbs. My measurements are 35 26 35. The size small was skin tight! I still wore it, but had to suck in all night and wasn't too comfortable. The medium would have probably been cuter on me.
I loved this romper, but I am a 34DD and a pretty solid 6, and the medium was way too tight in the chest. I am ordering a size up, and think it will be perfect.
The perfect vacation dress. You will need sticky boobs or boob tape if you have a fuller chest but it's so worth it! True to size, flirty, and flowy
My mom had a small beach wedding on FL that I wore this for. The material was soo comfortable and it fit great. Have smaller bust and felt comfortable in no bra!

links_reviews_title: I was afraid it would show too much! But it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a gender reveal party (team boy!!!) & I loved it. Light weight, not see through at all, not too risky looking. I'm debating on purchasing this one!

This dress fits perfectly. The elastic waistband is so flattering, and being able to tie the straps in different ways makes it semi-adjustable and easy to fit for anyone. The dress is so lightweight even though it's nice - really just perfect.

links_reviews_title: Bridal Shower, so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit was good! I thought I would be focusing on my chest area but it stayed in pace nicely! I have A or B cups so it was easy. The length was good too!

I rented this for a casual wedding shower in Nashville and it was the best! the deep v halter can be adjusted with the tie straps but gives it a sexy feel, and it's super flattering. open back and flowy! received so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Get this dress for a beach vacation
links_reviews_text: Rented this dress for a trip to Santorini, and it was perfect. Light, floaty and very beachy. Beware if you have a large chest, as the girls will definitely be on display.

links_reviews_title: Love the cut! Dress was comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Great for vacation. If you love deep v dresses this is perfect!
Perfect fit. Light and airy. My daughter wore this for her boy friend's college graduation. It was perfect for the hot sunny day and she looked stunning in it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful light dress perfect for summer.
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress ,but it was a little awkward around the bra line because the material was so thin. I used double sided tape to fully cover the sides because it was a little loose. Probably not ideal if you're dancing or in wind! The dress was very flattering though!

I wore this to an engagement party at a restaurant on the water and it was very light and airy which was perfect for the occasion. I am 5'4 and 32C/110 pounds. The length and all around fit well. I did have to get creative with tying the back so that it was tight enough so I did not have to show any side skin. I also had to use double-sided tape to make sure the front did not move.

links_reviews_title: Very flattering, hides belly, prepare for side boob
links_reviews_text: So I just had a baby 2 months ago and with this baby I gained so much weight, back fat, huge belly. But this dress just made me feel so pretty and confident and somehow helped me forget all about that! So from the waist down this dress is amazing. From the boob area, be prepared for side boob. My husband said he loved the dress but didn't like me wearing this in public showing side boob. And also if you have breast fed like me and don't have the perkiest boobs, this dress doesn't make them look saggy but you do have to tighten the straps a lot! Over all, I loved the feeling of this dress, the material. I'm pretty short so I don't know if this dress would be too short for someone who is really tall.
Very flowy, easy to cover my pregnant belly! very low cut, you may want fashion tape! Very soft and silky feeling!

I really loved the print and the material of this dress. I wore it for a night out in a beach town and it was perfect. The low cut front and open back made it more “party,” while the flowy fit and light weight material made it perfect for a summer beach town. I would warn that anyone with a larger chest size might have trouble with the neckline. It was pretty loose on me but I’m smaller in that area, so I wasn’t necessarily worried about a nip-slip. Someone else might need some fabric tape.
Nice fit, wore this over a bathing suit. The top is very sheer and unlined. Nice material and color.

This dress fit so well. Comfortable and easy to wear. You cannot wear a bra, but nipple covers would be good if you are worried about the thin fabric. Doesn’t easily wrinkle either. I am 5 4 and it was a great length.

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to return this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my birthday and absolutely loved it! I was a little worried that this wouldn't work out because there was only one size available that might fit me, but it was perfect. It's lightweight and so comfortable. The straps are adjustable by pulling them tighter and tying in the back. I would be cautious if you have bigger boobs though, it might not have enough support.

This dress was one of the most comfortable dresses I've ever worn. The top is essentially two straps off the skirt and I would only recommend for those like me with little to no top. But for us flat chested ladies it worked great and didn't have to wear a bra.
The fit was perfect. If you're comfortable without a bra, that is the way to go. Larger busted ladies may feel somewhat exposed.

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress for a night out
links_reviews_text: Lightweight and great for a night out!

The dress is very light and perfect for hot summer days. The skirt was good length, not too short. The back is very pretty. The top is a bit risky. I ended up wearing pasties (good for small chest) and hoped for the best. Nothing fell out in the end. The fabric on the top has no extra lining. I wouldn't recommend dancing or doing anything super active with this dress on.

links_reviews_title: Love the material! Silky and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Very feminine and beautiful

Loved this dress - considered buying. So comfy and flowy - perfect for a spring/summer wedding with a light sweater for church. Beautiful color/pattern and pretty fabric layering. May be too much for bigger busted ladies but was great for me! Easy to wear pasties and dress tape stuck like a pro. Would definitely wear again. Also a solid length for taller women.

links_reviews_title: The blue and white combo is stunning!
links_reviews_text: Definitely a dress for later in the day as the boob part can be a bit see-thru when the light hits it. This dress is also made for small chested women. I am a 34A and it was perfect

Wore this to a concert, was super cute and got a bunch of compliments! The top has to be tied reallyyyyy tight or the straps start to slip down, and the coverage at the bust area is sort of minimal but it worked.
This dress is lightweight, has a beautiful light blue print pattern and is easy to wear without a bra. I wore this to an event in Miami.

I'm in love with this adorable sundress by Saylor! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend ordering your true size for your primary size. This style is fitted at the chest but the straps are completely adjustable. The waist band is elastic and the skirt part is very flowy and loose. It works best for A-C cup sizes because of how skin-bearing the top is and there can be some side-boob depending on how tight you tie the straps. At 5'3 the length hit mid-thigh on me, I also had the straps tied very tight to make it short enough on my shorter frame. The fabric on this is beautiful and lightweight. Pair with delicate heels or sandals to complete your look!
Dress was fun and light for vacation. As the picture shows -- there's quite a bit of side boob, but whatevs -- it's vacation!

links_reviews_title: So cute but not for bustier ladies
links_reviews_text: Such a pretty, light dress - I really wanted this one to work. Waist and bottom fit perfectly and length was just right. I tried and tried, but no amount of tape or creative strap tying was fixing the boob exposure on this one. I'm a size 4-6, 32DDD and got a S

links_reviews_title: The top is super loose and I wear a size D. Still was too big!
links_reviews_text: The top is super loose and I wear a size D. Still was too big!
Love this dress and it's super cute in person, but it's hard to wear with a lack of support if you have bigger breasts because you can't really wear a bra with it. Really wanted to wear it though!
Really wanted to like this dress, but the sideboob and open back was a little much on me. Wore once at the beach.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for date night with my husband.
links_reviews_text: Very cute summer dress, lightweight and comfortable. Slightly revealing if you have a larger bust, may need some tape.
Can't wear a bra, makes you look hippy
Forgiving flow of skirt. I didn't think the low cut would be to bad, but felt too uncomfortable with the deep V neck. Great for tall and thin

Dress fit as described. I am 5'8 and was a tad short for a wedding, but glad it wasn't a super formal affair. I am smaller chested and wore pedals with this dress as well as fashion tape to ensure it didn't move. Overall, great for a fun event, especially on a hot day outside. Paired with a scarf to cover chest up during the ceremony!
I ordered this for vacation and the fit was horrible, I have a C-sized chest and this dress made me look extremely large and was completely unflattering.
Rented for Memorial Day but forgot to wear, so I wore it out with friends. Very comfortable but you cannot wear a bra with it. Love the back and print

links_reviews_title: Sexy and comfortable, a little hot for summer.
links_reviews_text: I liked the cut and flowiness, but the fabric made me sweaty. Would not recommend for very hot weather.

links_reviews_title: Really cute but huge in the bust
links_reviews_text: Wanted to wear this, but it was absolutely huge in the bust. I'm a 34B and it was falling off me.

links_reviews_title: Cute color and fit but Beware of BUST
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a wedding that was ultimately canceled. The dress was very cute and fit well except the snap holding the girls didn't stand a chance at staying snapped. If I had worn it I would used a safety pin or boob tape for security. Otherwise, it was comfortable, I felt like I could move and wear it all night
I loved this dress. Beautiful color. Weird fit in the bust area, definitely low cut, wore a strapless bra, but still too big. Would rent again in a smaller size.

I loved this dress so much I ended up keeping it for two months I. wore it on numerous dates, functions, and girls night out and eventually purchased it. The only possible criticism I can think of is the very small snap on the bodice didn't stay together for me but I just put a tiny decorative pin in there instead
So I really wanted to love this dress but the top was so hard to get it to work. I had to use so much double sided tape and went a size up to try to make it work and still struggled with it all night

Length was perfect for a wedding. The dress showed a little more cleavage than I was used to so I used fashion tape to keep the girls covered, but the dress was an overall hit, with a lot of complements.

I wanted this dress to work. However there was no way I could have worn this anywhere. Way too low cut. The snap that held the top together didn't stay closed. The straps were too long and the dress was too revealing.
If you have big breasts, you may have trouble clasping the front.

This dress is a beautiful color and a nice shape. But it runs a a little large and is awkwardly cut. I do not have a belly, but the dress has excess fabric that sticks out and is sewn in a curve so it protrudes. I tried fashion tape to alter it but it didn't work. This dress would be great for someone with a thin straight figure or a curvier stomach (maternity maybe?).

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and the fit.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress a lot, but I needed a lot of double-sided tape to avoid the chest area gaping. It was comfortable and flattering in every other way, but be prepared to tape down the dress on the inside if you have a small chest!!

links_reviews_title: This dress is stunning- however, I accidentally flashed 200 people.
links_reviews_text: This dress is GORGEOUS, but the clasp on the bust is super super weak. If I inhaled, turned, or even wore a seatbelt, it came undone. Because the dress is so low cut, this meant my boobs were OUT. Like, A+ if I were a nursing mom, but embarrassing at a group event.
Beautiful color with a sexy neckline, though fashion tape a must for peace of mind for a night on the town.
Couldn't move or dance or my boobs/bra would show as you can see if the pic. When standing still it's absolutely gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on both the color and fit!
links_reviews_text: Rented for a charity event. It's not my usual color - I tend to gravitate more towards reds and yellows but this was a beautiful vibrant blue green. Straps could have been a bit shorter but other than that, it was very comfortable and just the right amount of revealing.
Rented this for a wedding. Good for girls with smaller bust. Fits true to size (a little larger in the bust area). Really pretty color.

links_reviews_title: Sadly not for the flat chested
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous fit but I would have had to have tied the straps to stay put on my flat chest.

This dress was a great color with some really great, understated details. I'll likely rent it again if I need a cocktail dress. The only issue was the sizing. I felt like I was swimming in the size 2, which is my typical size.

So it fit great around my hips and body but the chest area was real bad. It had a baby doll dress snap that wouldn't stay clasped for even 10 seconds. I really have no clue what size chest would fit in the dress. Great color and style. Glad it was my free one because I would have been very disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Weird fit-Not for the pear shape!
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this dress, thank goodness I got this as a back up and the other one was fantastic. As with what others said, the straps were really long, the dress is really low cut and it's made for a very straight frame, which I do not have!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but a bit too revealing for company party. Would rent again for Vegas or a party
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and felt really pretty when I tried it on. It was a bit too revealing for a company party and didn't feel comfortable enough showing that much skin. Would rent for a club or party that wasn't with coworkers and would likely go for size 6 rather than 8.

I wore this dress for a formal and it was absolutely beautiful and high quality. The color is also very pretty and stands out just enough in a sea of black dresses. However, it was way too large! Neither my original size nor backup fit (4, 6) and I had to get another size down to a 2 and honestly could have fit into a 0. The main issue is that the straps are very long and not adjustable. I really wanted to make the dress work and with a decent amount of fabric tape, it looked great. Once I got it set up, everything held in place and I was not worried about it. Overall, I'd recommend this dress for someone who is a bit taller (taller than 5'5'') and able to fill out the chest better. Otherwise, it's a gorgeous alternative to a typical little place dress.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't wear this dress out, my breasts kept popping out.
links_reviews_text: This dress is not for women with larger breasts. Although it fit the rest of my body perfectly, that small tiny button they give isn't holding anything back. If you are a curvier woman with more pronounced features, don't bother with this dress unless you are willing to take the time to modify it for yourself.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but hard to wear.
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my husband's law firm's holiday party, which was at an upscale restaurant. The color is very pretty, and it's a nice dress, but the top is pretty low cut. It was hard for me to get used to, as I usually do not wear anything too revealing. I recommend doing the "sit test" in this dress. Standing up, it fit great (even though I feel it runs a bit large, so I ended wearing the size 4, which I almost never fit into!) When I sat the down, the clasp holding the front together kept coming undone. I felt very self-conscious the entire dinner, but luckily I brought a shawl, which I kept wrapped around me the entire. Kind of defeats the purpose of wearing a nice dress! Also, I tried 3 different type of bras, and none of them worked. I ended going braless with nipple pasties. It was the best I could do!

links_reviews_title: You have to work to make this dress work.
links_reviews_text: The front clasp is not strong enough to get through the night. I used 4 safety pins to keep the dress on me and laying right. It was so worth it though because I felt great in it. I was worried about how it was lay on the front and it worked out really well actually.
Even with the snap button feature in the chest, this is not wearable for anyone over a b cup unless you have implants and don't need a bra ever.

I'm 5'5", 155lbs, 34D, a size 8. The size 6 in this dress fit my bodily beautifully. It was so flatter and I'm really sad the dress didn't work out. The clasp at the breasts was just not made to handle ANY amount of tension. I tried safety pinning the front closed but I couldn't get it to work. This would be great for someone with a smaller chest.

links_reviews_title: this dress was seemingly so pretty and the quality and the color were so pretty but...
links_reviews_text: the top was ENORMOUS. like you had to have had huge fake implants (no bra) to fill this out and be ok with a ton of cleavage. it potentially could have been salvageable if the straps were adjustable and you used a ton of doublesided tape but not sure... couldn't wear it, too bad!

links_reviews_title: You cannot have breasts for this dress.
links_reviews_text: The top was held together by a small snap that would not stay closed with my D cup.

links_reviews_title: The button in the chest area won't stay closed. It kept popping which exposed my boobs
links_reviews_text: The button in the chest area won't stay closed. It kept popping which exposed my boobs so I couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: The way it made me feel
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the dress. I usually wear a size 4, I'm 5'9" 135lbs but size 2 was a better fit. The slit in front isn't wonderful for sitting but I made it work just fine. I felt elegant and sexy in this dress. Very happy with my choice.
Just too big for me

links_reviews_title: The bust is just not well made...
links_reviews_text: Unless you are very flat chested, stay away from this dress. I am a small B and the top kept coming undone. That's because it is a small snap keeping everything closed when in reality it needs a hook.

Pretty color but the straps were too long. I wouldn't have been able to sit down. My hips were too much for the 10, which was expected, but I still wouldn't have been comfortable with the top on this smaller size either.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and gorgeous dress. Unfortunately, it didn't fit.
links_reviews_text: Too large in the chest for my 38B's. Hung down way too low and too large for me to move and bend without flashing others. Gorgeous dress though, wish it would've fit!

links_reviews_title: Too big on the chest area
links_reviews_text: Did not wear this dress

The dress fit wonderfully everywhere on my body except my chest. I could get the snap to button much less stay shut over my boobs. If I went up a size (or two) to fit over my boobs, the dress would be too large throughout the rest of the body. Super bummed because the dress was flattering otherwise.
Terrible cut up top. Such a shame it had so much potential!

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately the event I rented for was more casual and I didn't get a chance to wear it.
links_reviews_text: True to size and the color even more amazing in person. I would rent it again

links_reviews_title: Wasn't right for my body type. I should have listened to the other reviewers
links_reviews_text: If I had a larger chest maybe I could have made this work but it was way too low cut. I really did like the dress and wanted to wear it so badly but I know I would have been uncomfortable the whole night. Order a size or 2 smaller than what you would normally wear. It's a well made, beautiful dress, I just don't have the right body for it.

links_reviews_title: Great quality and material, very flattering bottom half
links_reviews_text: Didnt end up wearing this to the wedding I had intended, but the quality is great. Per most of the other reviews, the straps are very long and not adjustable. I wish this one had worked out because it was really pretty!
The straps were too long and the knot in the front is very unflattering. Highly disappointed.
A little short

links_reviews_title: Great color. Would look beautiful on everyone
links_reviews_text: I wore this jumpsuit to my daughter's bridal shower. It was comfortable, flattering, and the color was amazing.
Lots of great things about this but probably not as flattering as it could be for my muscular body type
I'm a true 6 and could have worn a 2 in this- size down! Besides the fit, the color was great and it's such a cute jumpsuit.

I loved this jumpsuit.. it has a flattering waistline for my post partum body with some extra baby weight to hide. It was the perfect length and quality material. I got lots of compliments at my son's Christening. Really pretty color!

links_reviews_title: Fits true to size and is super comfortable.
links_reviews_text: It's not the most breathable fabric, if you're going to be outside. It's easy to unzip/unclasp by yourself. I did need to wear a thong instead of nude underwear which I would have preferred. The top half is more opaque than the bottom half. I wore a strapless bra with a tie-dye pattern, which you could only see if you really tried. I would have gone braless, but the top was slightly too big for my small boobs, and I thought it looked better with a push up bra. I'm 5'8'' and it hit just a little lower than on the model.

Wanted so badly for this rental to work. Felt like the torso was way too long for my body and made me look awkward. Also, too long for my height. Would e looked cuter if it would've hit above the ankle like on the model. Loved the color and material.
Fun and unexpected. Long enough and comfortable for long torsos and long legs. Love this jumpsuit and have rented several times. I like it best with this Kate spade necklace also RTR

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my birthday and felt like a rockstar
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit! Very flattering around the middle, runs a little small though so I sized up.

The fit was perfect. I don't often wear this style as I'm heavier on the bottom. This hit in all the right places. The color was beautiful and can be paired with any color accessories. Great with flats, wedges or heels. Work, girls night, date or running errands - dress it up or down.

links_reviews_title: Received compliments all night long. I am so happy I rented this amazing outfit.
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove! Absolutely loved it. No complaints.
I wore this out to play Escape Room and go to dinner during vacation in Aruba. This was an easy wear that paired down well with flip flops and paired up nicely with pumps.

Material was too heavy to wear in the heat in Columbus, GA. Ended up just wearing to church in MA. Got lots of compliments on it at church. Would rent again for the fall time-frame and wear with a sweater/shawl if necessary. 8 day rental ended up being almost two weeks because the romper arrived early.

I'm usually not a fan of drop waist styles, but this jumpsuit was surprisingly flattering. The material was lightweight, but well lined. The color was not too outrageous. Just orange enough without being overpowering. I'm happy I ordered this to wear for a 2001: A Space Odyssey inspired photo.
The color and fit are both perfect. Thinking of keeping this I love it so much.

I rented this jumpsuit for work. I've never worn a jumpsuit before, and now I'm obsessed. I felt so put together and got tons of compliments. I sized up because I'm a 34 DD and thought I might need the extra space, but I think I would have been fine with my normal 8.

I wanted to find something comfortable, classy, and something that would stand out from the rest of the outfits (mostly dresses) at the Derby. This jumper was comfortable and I would rent it again. The only minor issue I had was the clasp at the neck came undone several times, but I think was due in part to the fact I was constantly alternating between standing and sitting, which caused the material to shift and the clasp to then come undone.

Rent this!!! Oh my gosh, this was a last minute add to my unlimited rental in preparation for a spring beach/tropical themed wedding. I have never owned or ever worn a jumper. It was so cute in all the reviews so I had to try it. I didn't think it would work for my athletic/pear body type, but it totally worked! I am so happy I did it! It's absolutely GORGEOUS! I felt so comfortable, a bit edgy and got tons of compliments throughout the evening. If you're trying for a look that is unique, stunning, and will garnish some attention, GET THIS JUMPER! I am contemplating buying it, i love it so much!
I loved this jumpsuit. Super comfy and stylish, can be dressed up or dressed down. I have never been able to wear jumpsuits or one pieces but this one is great for long torsos.

I have never received so many compliments on an outfit before. I wore this out for my birthday dinner, drinks, and dancing and got stopped at every venue with compliments. It is super flattering on the tush! I wore it with a strapless bra, but it is cut pretty "open" in the bust so probably would have been easier to wear a sticky bra but I didn't have one. The color is party perfect and the Kendra Scott Abalone necklace that I rented/wore with it was an excellent match. Rent this- good time guaranteed!

links_reviews_title: Recieved several compliments on this look
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a retirement party. Fit was great and very fashion forward
Very fun rental! It does need a statement necklace.

links_reviews_title: I wore this jumpsuit for my class reunion and I wanted something cute & comfy. This was perfect!
links_reviews_text: It was true to size in the hips but a little loose for me in the top. The clasp kept coming aloof when I danced but overall it fit nicely and was very comfortable
Loved this romper and easy to go to the bathroom in :) this was such a great vacation outfit. Comfortable and can dress up or down.

This jumpsuit is amazing, I may actually buy it for myself. I wish the pants were an inch shorter to be a true crop but it looked fine with my shoes. It fit well and was easily dressed up with fun jewelry. I love jumpsuits so this was a perfect option for a formal wedding.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for my bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: Love the color and this was thick enough to feel substantial. I was worried about the hit of the waist but it elongated my torso! Would wear again if I owned it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the event! Worn to a class reunion. Very comfortable for everyday wear. Would purchase!
links_reviews_text: First time renter! Very easy process for both receiving and returning! Pros: fit well, very comfortable Cons: top of jumpsuit was a little big. I am a 36 DD, 5' 6", usual size is a 10, about 170 lbs.. Probably didn't have the right bra. I am curvy so I think that helped. My back up size was a 8R but these thighs wouldn't allow me to wear it. Hope this is helpful. Overall I loved it!

Rented this for a June christening. I have big thighs so went up from the 10 to the 12 to avoid a weird camel toe. Other than that, I found it SO comfy and got SO many compliments. Strapless bra is necessary - or racerback bra. Cooling fabric and not too heavy. Goes great with turquoise accessories! Big thigh and hip girls will wanna go a size up.

links_reviews_title: Cute style, definitely needs a statement necklace as shown.
links_reviews_text: I liked this, it was super comfy, felt a bit big.
Lots of compliments. DOES NOT COME WITH NECKLACE IN PIC! I thought it was part of the jumper. It is not. I added my own.
The size 6R was my backup size! I really could have used a 4. I am 5'2", 135lbs. Loved it so much I made it work with some hemming tape!

PROS: Beautiful material; very comfortable for an outdoor graduation on a scorching day; could easily dress up or down with different accessories CONS: Runs large, both in length and fit. 5'5" with 2" heels and it still felt too big and too long. I would size down at least one size, possibly more if you have a straight figure. I would definitely rent this again, but in a different size. Shown here with a Kendra Scott necklace also from RTR.
Unfortunately, with my height the length of the pant legs hit me at a funny spot and I didn't feel comfortable wearing this. Color is really pretty and fit is true to size.

links_reviews_title: Fun, not your Seen It Everywhere Already, type style
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a charity Wine Auction event and loved it. It felt like the right mix of stylish without being fussy, the color was perfect for spring, and the cut felt flattering. It was not a cropped pant on me but that was ok. I went a size smaller after reading reviews and was glad I did, but I did get a slight wedgie sitting down if I had the top hook and eye clipped :)
I didn't LOVE it because it was a little snug in the hips and the length was a little awkward on me but the color is unique and I received so many compliments all night so overall runway success!

links_reviews_title: Rented for a charity wine event.
links_reviews_text: It is such a beautiful jumpsuit. It runs big and short, so if you are in doubt, err on the side of small and long. Great color, great material.
Perfect fit if you're tall. Waist hit just right, true to size, didn't need a "tall" version.

links_reviews_title: Fun color and style, but runs tight and is a little too thick a fabric for a hot summer night!
links_reviews_text: I love jumpsuits, but I should have sized up. What a great coral color!

I wore this for my birthday night out. We took a yacht to dinner and I wanted something special but easy to get on and off the boat in - it also had to look good with no shoes! This was perfect. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is that the top part of the jumpsuit was not as flattering as it would be on someone with a smaller chest (I am a 36D).

links_reviews_title: Stands out. Rent if you want to push your style a little further than you normally do.
links_reviews_text: I normally don't go for jumpers but decided to try it. So glad I did. Super comfortable. So many people asked about my outfit and commented on my look. Fit was perfect. I felt amazing in this outfit. Have since rented in red and other jumpsuits. Pair with a chunky necklace. Wore to baby shower and out later that night for a party. Versatile.

This formal was elegant and classy! It fit well! I was nervous that a size 12 would not fit me because I recently lost weight but it was the perfect fit! I loved the feel of this outfit! The photoshoot was for 6 hours and the material of this dress was perfect!
Gorgeous and comfy!
I was not certain how I would like this dress due to the draping, but it was very figure flattering.

I officiated a beautiful wedding at Avalon castle in New Braunfels in this most perfect dress I call " saintly and sexy " , and also attended the SA ballet in the same evening, just changed purses for the different occasion I was a bit worried because I wear a smaller size and in long , which was not available, but it still was an amazing dress
Perfect fit. Amazing option for a gala.
This dress was great for a party. It did not exactly look like the picture. It was a bit hard to put on because of all the layers, that is why I gave it 4 stars.
Gorgeous gown! Beautiful draping -feels expensive. Many compliments all night! Formal affair in very chilly venue. Love the long sleeves.
I really enjoyed this dress for a gala event. It was comfortable and elegant. You can't go wrong with black and can style it so many different ways.

I loved this dress. It was very pretty and perfect for the occasion. It wasn't loud or attention-grabbing but it was very classy. I was a little worried that it would look matronly but it wasn't at all. The slit was the little bit of edge and the extra draping helped as well. I received many compliments and it was also very comfortable.
Comfortable and easy to dance in. Would definitely recommend for a formal occasion. For other tall women, I was able to wear heels and still have this dress be floor length.

links_reviews_title: It was an amazing event and all money raised we raised went to a fabulous cause.
links_reviews_text: This dress was supposed to be my 2nd choice dress and ended up being THE dress. It was elegant and classy. I felt timeless in it. My date was stunned when he saw me and said I looked beautiful! The dress was comfortable, easy to zip up and I felt like the material was very breathable. This was my first time using Rent the Runway and I am a forever fan! It was so easy and stress free! Thank you!
