I received so many compliments on this dress! It fit so well; hugged my body and the slit added just enough show of skin. The best part of this dress is that it is somehow tight fitting, but very forgiving in any area you may have insecurities about & no Spanx undergarments are needed! Definitely would rent again for the right occasion.

links_reviews_title: Classic, sleek, figure flattering black gown
links_reviews_text: I rented this for an award show that I was nominated in. I wanted a very classic look, that was figure conscious, seeing as I recently had gained weight and was still a little insecure about getting into a dress. When I received this dress in the mail and immediately put it on, I was worried that I ordered a size too big, in order to compensate for my weight gain. To my pleasant surprise it was the exact size I needed, fit like a glove, and flattered my figure! I looked absolutely beautiful the night of my award show (pictured), and even though I didn't win what I was nominated for, I still felt like a winner with all the compliments I got on the dress! My experience with renting from rent the runway was exactly what I had hoped for and I can't wait to rent from them again!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments in this dress!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well and true to size. I am 5'09 and the long was a perfect length for wearing the dress with heels.
Gorgeous and fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but won't order it again
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful but I rated it a 3 because the fabric drapes oddly under the abdomen. I had to pin it up on the side so the drape would hang over my stomach vs cupping my stomach under it. Also, I ordered the long size vs regular because a lot of people, my height, had said was short in their reviews but I could have wore the regular length. Lastly, the front area had a weird tab on the drape which looked like it had detached from somewhere. I didn't know what to do with it so I tucked it inside so no one would see it. I felt great all evening in the dress after my adjustments but won't order this one again.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, well-made dress. You can wear a regular bra which is a convenient bonus.
links_reviews_text: I am often a size two and the size two was absolutely tiny. I can't imagine it would fit anyone over 100 pounds. The size four was a little snug but looked great. It was fitted through the thighs which meant I couldn't walk very fast but my heels were so high that wasn't an issue. Great dress for a work gala.

links_reviews_title: Wow! What a stunning dress! I felt like a million bucks! Fit like a glove and looked incredible ❤️
links_reviews_text: #glamorous fit was true to size. I got the L and it was perfect. I cannot say a bad word about this dress. I was definitely getting some looks in this!! #renttherunway came through again!

links_reviews_title: Black tie wedding for a very dear friends daughter
links_reviews_text: Full figure with curves and large breasts for my height of 5’4”. I felt sexy and I thought the gown flattered my figure. I use to look like my daughters both size 6 !

links_reviews_title: This amazing dress made my portrait session a success!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly, the ruching at the waist and hips is comfortable and looks great. I did need help zipping up the zipper, but it did not feel tight and the neckline was flattering. I would love to be able to wear it again, here's hoping an event will pop up!

links_reviews_title: Classy, Elegant Black Dress that hugs right
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a gala. I'm typically a size 8, but they didn't have any available so I got the 6P and the 10P. The 6P fit perfectly, the dress is very flattering and hides all trouble areas with the draping effects. The long slot in the front came to just above the knee, made it very easy to walk and sit without any issues or worries of showing too much. I got a lot of compliments on this dress and would definitely recommend

links_reviews_title: Very beautiful dress. Runs slightly small as I ordered backup 14 and I'm a 12. 14 barely fit.
links_reviews_text: Loved! Sexy yet sophisticated
The dress has some give from the torso down. The material is thick and I was a little warm. Would be great for a winter formal event.
This was the back up dress. I talked my friend into wearing it instead of what she'd brought. Drapes beautifully, perfect fit, loved it!

links_reviews_title: Love love love - simple but beautiful, understated but elegant
links_reviews_text: This dress is amazing. It's so simple but so gorgeous and it makes your figure look so good. Fits like a glove and no spanx necessary. Highly recommend and will rent again. Wore it to dinner on a snowy night. It has gorgeous ruching that is hard to see that accentuates everything.
Very comfortable and flattering. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Lots of formal gowns--this one was elegant, understated and rather dramatic
links_reviews_text: Wonderful fabric, design enhances the figure--softening areas that need to be softened. It was a bit clingy in the abdomen, but that is my body these days--having moved from 'Size 8-10 to a 12 over the last 20-25 years--with a 20 lb weight gain. Despite my former hour-glass figure--with a 24-25 inch waist, aging has shifted the weight to breasts and abdomen/waist. I am 5'6, 168 pounds and 76 years old. Feel pretty good!!

The dress was well fitted and I felt comfortable in it. The front was nicely designed that hid my mommy belly of 5. I did not pick this dress to wear at the event because the length was to short, it showed my ankles and it didn't look right. I should have picked a 10 R instead. Also if you don't have a butt the design to the back kind of points that out because there is nothing to hold on to the extra fabric so it will just flap down and shows the curves to your flatness. Hope this review helps you ladies !

This dress was perfect! Loved the long sleeves for cooler weather. It is short, but I feel like it's supposed to be short on purpose so I was good with it. The slit adds to the drama of the dress while keeping it classic. There is ruching on the side that is hard to see in pics.

links_reviews_title: The dress was the PERFECT combination of classy, sexy and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'10" and got the tall. I am VERY curvy and it hugged in all the right places. The slit adds the perfect sex appeal. It is pretty high, so be prepared.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Gala in Washington, DC.
links_reviews_text: This dress was great! It fit well and made me feel fancy. It was perfect for a winter event because it was long, with long sleeves and the fabric is thick. I got lots of compliments on it. The only problem is that the dress does not photograph well. It has a lot of line/draping fabric details and you cannot see that in any of my pictures. But all of those draping fabric details is what made this dress look good on me.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: I was going back and forth between the 2R and 4P and the 4P fit like a glove. I am about 5'4" and 130 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Elegant .... and the leg slit made it just a touch sassy. I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! I felt so comfortable in it. It was flattering and stately. Very regal and elegant.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! First time renting!
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress . Fit beautifully and make me feel very glamorous. I attended and host several black ties a year and always need to buy new dresses . I thought I would give this a try . I was VERY nervous thinking what I would do if it didn't fit . We had a snow storm and COLD TEMPs this week and I was worried it wasn't going to come . It actually came 2 days early and it fit !! Thank god ! Only two things minor problems : I had ordered a bigger size just in case and that dress didn't come ( it was ok because I didn't need it . Other thing is it had a rip on the side ruffle . I was able to tuck in so no one saw , I can tell the dress has been worn a lot but still looked fantastic. Thank you runway... I'll be ordering again

The dress fit great, very slimming and the length of the 8L was perfect with heels. However the fabric that crosses the midsection was missing the weight to keep it draped correctly, but since the entire dress was black it was not too noticeable.

links_reviews_title: I had so many compliments on this beautiful dress! Classy, elegant, and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I got this dress and fell in love as soon as I tried it on. If you're plus-sized like me, you know how disappointing it can be to find something that looks good that you like. I was getting compliments on the dress all night! Very comfortable, and with the right shapewear nice and smooth, no bumps or rolls. This is an easy dress to accessorize, I wore a necklace I've had for years, a glittery cuff I bought on sale, and patent-toed shoes I found on clearance. Added some velvet gloves and a patent clutch purse, and I felt like a movie star. I will be using RTR again!
I don't usually post pics in the dresses I rent, but this one was too outstanding not to. Gorgeous, comfortable, and the right amount of sexy.
Loved the fit! I got so many compliments. It hid all the right things!
I'm 5'7" and I'm really glad I ordered the 10 long. It would have been too short otherwise. Overall I got a lot of compliments on this dress and it was very comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: 8 months pregnant :: dress is lovely and worked, but wasn't ideal -- issues with length and fit.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress to wear to a black tie gala in January. I read many reviews of fellow renters who chose this dress (and a few others) because it's very bump-friendly. While that is true, and it is a beautiful dress, the length of the dress varies greatly from one size to the next. I was 8 months pregnant wearing it, and all belly. My pre-pregnancy size would probably be a 2L or 4L. I ordered the 6L and 10L (the 8 was not available). The 6L fit except for the fact that it stopped at my shins. I'm 5'6 and planned to wear 2" heels. I wore the 10L. As you can see, the dress was very loose in the back, arms, chest (34B), and hips. It was the perfect length with 2" heels. The 6L would have been much better, and I can't imagine why it would be feet shorter than the same dress, just 2 sizes up. I realize that some of that extra material was to cover my bump, but still... there was a vast difference in the length. It all worked out -- I felt beautiful and it was nice to have a dress that was comfortable while very pregnant. For the pregnant renters out there -- if you're all belly, this probably isn't the right dress for you. Definitely covers the bump, but sizing up for length and belly coverage means too big of a dress overall. Overall service, delivery, and communication with RTR was perfect. I will definitely rent again!

I love this classy by Show Me Your Mumu! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size. This style is roomy throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes.

Loved this top. So flattering and easy to wear. Can transition from wearing it in the office on a Friday with jeans to a night out! Fits true to size but I would size down if you want a more "fitted look"- it's very loose and flowy. Also keep in mind it's low cut (I'm flat so it didn't matter but if you have a chest this would show some cleavage!)

links_reviews_title: Fun and flirty top that transitions easily from office to cocktails.
links_reviews_text: I wore this top to a dinner date and to work and it worked well for both. The tuck feature in the front was very flattering especially because I have a shorter torso. The bell sleeves were really fun, but occasionally got in the way.
This was an amazing too. I wanted to keep it. So flattering

The fit is great - I loved it for a dinner date, but wish it was slightly less low cut - I had to fix it a few times to make sure my bra wasn't showing. Sleeves are bell style but not too over the top. It's worth noting that the front of the top has an elastic bottom but it just looks like it's tucked in.

Loved this top. It does run a little large/loose. I got the small and it was perfect. The v neck is a tad low cut so be aware of that. Not sure if you can see in photos but the front bottom of the shirt has a stretchy waist and and the back is longer. The sleeves are pretty long and kind of annoying to wash hands but not a big deal.
Ordered a M, which was the right size, but ended up not wearing because the bell sleeves were so large. The top was also shorter than I had expected.
Super cute and comfy! The bell sleeves are larger than they look in the photo, but I loved them! I thought they gave the top a fun, kind of boho vibe!
Wore this top at least 3 times - to church, holiday party, and date night - perfect and fun for the season!

links_reviews_title: GREAT TOP! Extremely comfortably and swanky!
links_reviews_text: Super comfy especially in the arms and waist. It has elastic at the front for a tucked in look that's easy breezy and a flowy back to keep you looking effortlessly chic. I wore this to work and dinner/ drinks after and received so many compliments! I'll be wearing to our company holiday party later this month!

links_reviews_title: I had a great day wearing this at work.
links_reviews_text: It fit loosely and comfortably. I didn't like the length of the bell sleeves. Too hard to function!
This is an easy to wear and flattering top. I'm holding onto it until after Christmas so I can wear it a few more times. Got lots of compliments too!
Fun top for Saints games. Cut a little low so I wore a black tank under it.
Runs really large and is not flattering on a smaller frame

top fit great, was well made and a little sexy. The cut is a little low but nothing crazy. The sleeves were more bell-sleeves than I expected but I loved them and thought they were fun for a night out.
Nice rayon doesn't wrinkle but the neck is so big I had to pin it and I have tiny shoulders so the dramatic Part of the dress just flops off. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Classy and perfect for fall/winter wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and length of this dress. It was very flattering and comfortable. The only thing that was a little weird was the turtle neck was super loose and I had to safety pin it back. Other than that no issues!
The cutout on the shoulder really elevates this simple turtleneck dress. I really loved the cut, but the back slit is a little high, so watch out if you have long legs

links_reviews_title: I wore this on numerous appearances. It was very comfortable.
links_reviews_text: The top part of the sleeve was hard to keep up but it kept me in a good position not to slouch.
Fit true to size. Great perfect little black dress. Love the shoulder detail.
Great wedding, cocktail hour dress. Was fitted and flattering but enough room to stretch in, dance in, plus eat dinner and dessert :)

I am a small "medium" so the fit was not clingy. It made it easier to dine and dance. I had to lift the strap back up a couple of times, but I was dancing! It's a classic silhouette but the neckline gives it a stand out edge.

links_reviews_title: I ordered this dress in a small and it was very cute but I should have gone with a medium.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the size small, I am 5'9" about 145 lbs and it fit quite snugly. Very cute but not quite appropriate for a work event. I should have gone a size up
I loved this dress so much that I bought it. I wore the medium but could've worn the small.

I wore this dress to a friend's engagement party and it was perfect! I'm 5'1" 120 pounds, and I ordered a small, which fit perfectly. I was worried about the length being too long, but it ended up being the appropriate length for the style and fell right below my knee. It flattered my frame really well without being skin tight. I definitely still had room to dance, eat, and sit down comfortably.

links_reviews_title: Loved it!!!! Very structured and sexy.
links_reviews_text: I wish the strap would have stayed up, it moved around, but was still a great dress... fit great in the hips.

links_reviews_title: Great LBD but opted to wear another dress instead.
links_reviews_text: This little black dress had a great cut. I love the high neck and shoulder detail. The body of the dress is very fitting, thought it would have a little stretch. Was scared to wear thinking I might rip it. Opted to wear another dress.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, elegant and high quality fabric!
links_reviews_text: As I am 5'2'' this felt a little bit too long (about 2 inches below the knee) but still looked very elegant! I love the detail in the shoulder, and the high quality of the fabric. It's an elegant look for a cocktail or work event.

links_reviews_title: Quality leaves something to be desired.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is so thin so it shows every bump (rather than sucking it in) this also makes it not fit like the glove you want this dress to fit like. Overall it feels and looks cheaper in person.
I am in love with these pants. They are comfortable and perfect for summer. I received so many compliments. The only drawback is they aren't that flattering.
I wore twice and the first time I ended up having to change as they were so static and clingy. The second time I only wore at home for a small gathering but still didn't love the way they laid.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable, not the most flattering, runs big.
links_reviews_text: Very long, I had to wear a heel with it. Tried on lots of shirts tucked in, but it made me look really heavy. Had to have a shirt over the pants or a cream blazer on to look decent. Super silky and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Great spring pants, tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: These pants are so comfortable. There is an elastic waistband but otherwise they hardly touch your body. The fabric is very forgiving and soft. Oh, and there are pockets! If you are really slender your frame would probably be overwhelmed by these pants, but for everyone else, rent them, you will look and feel great!
I am a size 6 and took others advice and ordered a 1. They fit great, with plenty of stretch. Dressed up with blazer for work

RTR mis-categorized the sizing on these gorgeous trousers!! US sizing is 0 (0-2), 1 (4-6), 2 (6-8), 3 (8-10). I'm a true 4 and swimming in a size 2 which was suggested by RTR. Anyhow, with the correct sizing I'm confident these lovely trousers would be flattering and comfortable! Unfortunately, didn't get to wear them.

I wear size 25 in denim and wore these in 0. They fit tts. I wish they were just a little bit longer though. I am 5'7" and the pants fit the way they do in the model pic, hitting me right at the ankle.
runs large, i would size down next time, though the size i chose fit me OK, it was a tad big. loved these.

I wore these to work and really loved them, they're super comfortable but still look dressy enough to wear in the office. Based on other reviews, I sized down by 2 sizes, but I probably could have gone one more as they were a bit more baggy than I would have liked. I'm 5'3" and these were a bit long on me in flats, I wore heels for most of the day.
These pants are so fun! I wore for work & weekend with different tops. Sizing is confusing, but I wore the 1 & I'm usually a 4/6.

I wanted to love these pants but unfortunately they didn't work for me. The pants were very loose with not much shape to them, so I felt that I was swimming in them. They were also very long, I had to wear with heels. I loved the pattern but just wish these were made a bit differently.

links_reviews_title: Amazing, Comfortable, Dress up or down
links_reviews_text: loved this - I am actually re-renting it in a smaller size. I am usually a 6, and the 3 ran HUGE. definitely go 2-3 sizes down.
Super comfortable and cute. However, accentuated my mom pouch even though wore high waisted. Made me look pregnant eek

links_reviews_title: THESE PANTS ARE AMAZING! They are so comfortable, chic and easy to wear! Highly recommend!
links_reviews_text: Great for brunch (or dinner), vacation, travel, or all of the above! Definitely recommend renting

links_reviews_title: These were super cute except the static cling was OOC
links_reviews_text: The wide leg feature was not in effect due to the terrible static cling that would NOT go away despite rubbing dryer sheets all over them.

Beautiful pattern and flow. Pants run large. I'm petite and pulled them up to just under my rib cage for a true high waist feet. The elasticized waist allows for this . With a big belt and tight fitted top I made it work but then the hip area stuck out a little bit because there's pockets on the side-just required some rearranging. Still cute but also made my butt look very flat (and it is not!) Overall beautiful fabric, pattern.
loved these! so comfortable and easy to wear, but special and fun. size down in these and expect length to be longer than in the photo.

I loved the print but the fabric of these pants reminded me of fancy PJs and had so much static that they just wouldn't work. I loved the pattern and they were certainly comfortable. Like others said, they run really big so size way down. Didn't wear because fit was too large and fabric was odd.

I wanted to try this to see if it would be a great bottom for my upcoming Europe trip. After reading reviews, I wanted to rent the 0 but it wasn't available. I tried the 1 and agree with everyone, I was swimming in them. The waistband was also twisting so the fabric was bunching in an unflattering way. PRO: - beautiful print CON: - runs huge - clings to your body due to static - probably not the best for travel, will wrinkle easily Had to return!
These pants are adorable. I may rent again, but in a smaller size
I wore these out with a tucked in white tank to a family gathering. They were super comfortable and easy to move in while still looking cool

links_reviews_title: Size way down, and they are great!
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 in pants, but based on reviews I decided to size down to a 0, which worked great. Lots of compliments, and they were surprisingly versatile for styling.

links_reviews_title: Cute but not for cold weather
links_reviews_text: Rented these with unlimited 2 weeks after having baby. Followed other reviews that they run large and sized down and they were great - but they are very long...I wanted to wear with sneakers so had to wear pretty high on my waist and roll the top over! They are super comfy and the colors are awesome but they are very thin! I wore on a cold fall day with a chunky sweater and was way too cold. Would consider renting again for spring/summer.

LOVED the idea of these pants. Gorgeous, light fabric. I knew that they would be long and more like a palazzo pant. These were VERY long. If you are on the petite side, they will also overwhelm you. It looked like I was trying something on that was several sizes too big. Therefore, I had to sigh and send them back without wearing them. RTR please get pants similar to this that are petite friendly!

links_reviews_title: This item runs extremely large. I ordered a zero, my typical size, and was swimming in it.
links_reviews_text: Runs very large.

thought these would be cute with a tshirt and flats. They are way to big and longer than pictured on the model. I was hoping they would hit at the ankle but they were dragging on the ground and way to big in hips/waist.

I'm usually a 4 or 6 in pants. I rented a 2 in these and they don't even stay up. Plus there is no detail to them at all. Just huge flowy silk pants. I thought there were at least Vertical seams or something to add dimension or detail, but no. Sending them back without wearing :(
I rented this for my graduation pictures to celebrate my PhD. And it was perfect. Classy elegant and so beautiful. Fit great too.
Beautifully made dress. Weirdly enough it fit okay from the hips down but was very loose (see photo) on the top. Would like to rent again but might try and size down 1 size.
Wore this to a family wedding. Very classy, tasteful but different style. Definitely stood out and got so many compliments. Comfy to wear, felt like it was tailored to my body.
Classy!!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and got several compliments!
links_reviews_text: This is such a gorgeous dress and you can tell it's made well! Actually has a zipper that WORKS and is a beautiful shape. I would rent this again.
Very, very classy and elegant but not over the top. Showed my figure very well. Is form fitting so if you are bigger in too or bottom, then order size up as it has NO GIVE!

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for my husband's graduation ceremony.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely adored this dress! I received so many compliments. I am flat-chested so the top was a little loose but it didn't bother me or ruin the fit. I felt beautiful wearing it. The colors are subtle but the pattern is stunning. I suggest wearing a push-up strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Second time i got marches note sexy but super class perfect fit
links_reviews_text: Communion
Great fit! Wore for Easter. Have never had so many compliments!

This dress fit true-to-size, and I was able to wear the size 10. As other reviewers have noted, the waist is banded with a ribbon which has ZERO stretch to it. If I didn't hold in my stomach, the dress in profile was not super flattering. But if you don't mind a little pouch, the overall look of the dress was very up-scale and elegant. The lace of the outer layer is light green, light blue/purple and ivory and looks very expensive and well done. The under layer is actually a light green and has stretch to it, but the lace of the outer layer prevents any significant "give." So, best to order a size that will fit and not try to squeeze into a smaller size. While I am somewhat busty (36E) I had no problem with cleavage showing, or feeling over exposed - which may have more to do with my 57 year old figure than the dress itself. But I was able to wear a normal bra with it and did not have to wear a strapless contraption. This made the entire evening much more comfortable. I don't know that my shoulders are particularly broad, but I had no problem with the sleeves staying up and did not need or use fashion tape to hold everything together - as others have said. Edited to add: As I look back now on the pictures of the event and reflect on how I felt at the time, this dress made me feel as pretty as I have ever been. A great rental of a terrific dress!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but size wasn't perfect for my body type
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my engagement photos. The color and style was perfect for the look I was going for, but the sizing was a little off for my body type. I wore the zero and I'm a 32B and the top was too large. My hips were snug in the dress so the proportion is better for someone with larger boobs or broader shoulders and smaller hips. It worked for photos but I wouldn't have been able to wear to an event because the top wouldn't have stayed in place. I'm very happy with how the pictures turned out though so it was a winner!

links_reviews_title: Everything about the dress was fabulous!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, gorgeous material, beautiful dress!!

Tried on, hard to zip. The zipper is extremely difficult. Sleeves are a tad big, nice thing is you can wear a regular bra and pin the sleeves to it. Lace had a slight tear at the hem line where it's not lined. Did not choose this dress wasn't sure I could zip it by myself in a hotel room.

I used sticky tape for the bodice and shoulders. I wore spanks and asked my guy to pull down the sheath every once in a while so that it did not gather too much. Even without spanks, the sheath needed to be tamed. The dress was very comfortable. When it arrived, it smelled of someone else's perfume. In that moment, I remembered that I am renting and while I assumed it would be cleaned before I got it, it clearly was not.

links_reviews_title: Perfect mother of the bride dress!
links_reviews_text: I am petite, only 5'2". The top of the dress was a bit long making the neck line a little too deep. I put some loose stitches in the shoulders to bring it up. This worked perfectly! The fit was great for the entire event. Not too long or too short. It hit me just below the knee. I overheard a younger man at the reception say to a friend, "Great job on the dress mom!"
Beautiful unique dress! Great for a summer wedding. A little big in the shoulders and top. I probably could have gone down a size but, I made it work.
I felt so beautiful in this dress. Colors are amazing! Highly recommend! Perfect for a Spring/Summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: A gorgeous dress that fit me perfectly - but absolutely need tape for the sleeves!
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for my college graduation - I got SO many compliments on how beautiful it was and how well it fit me. My sister remarked that it looked like it was custom made for me! The two biggest downsides are: 1) the sleeves are very loose for petite people - as other reviewers had said, fashion tape is a MUST to keep the sleeves from slipping down, and 2) I'm very petite (5'1", 120 lbs, wide hips) so the dress falls mid-calf, which can make you look very short. It's gorgeous in photos from the knees up, but if a picture is showing your full body (as in the one I shared), you look tiny. Other than that, it is BEAUTIFUL and I would highly recommend it! This was also my first RTR experience and I loved how easy everything was - if you're on the fence, I would say go for it!

I rented this for our family pictures and am super ecstatic with how it turned out. I felt beautiful and let the dress speak for itself. It's elegant and conservative but stunning all at the same time. I would definitely rent this beauty again!

I wore this to the Kentucky Derby and got so many compliments on it! It fits like a dream, doesn't wrinkle, and is actually comfortable. It's such a gorgeous color and fabric. Would recommend to anyone!
There's a grosgrain ribbon built into the waist with no give at all so it was a little uncomfortable by midday.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for A Mother & Daughter Tea Party
links_reviews_text: Very Classy and Beautiful Details. Unfortunately the Sleeves kept falling so I had to safety pin to my bra- but that was the positive was able to wear a regular bra.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my daughters wedding. It was perfect! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Perfect very elegant for daytime wedding.

This dress photographed better than it felt on. I couldn't go smaller or the bottom wouldn't fit, couldn't go bigger or the top would fall off. As it was, the sleeves are so heavy that I had to tape myself in everywhere. That said, once I got into it, the dress was really beautiful, especially for a tea party themed baby shower.

I rented this for Easter and despite the teeny peek of cleavage, it was a perfect easter dress! The lace is beautiful but mine had several pulls in it. They weren't terribly noticeable but it is pretty delicate. I am now an exact size 6 in everything and the 6 fit fairly well but the hips were a bit of a squeeze. Waist and bust fit perfectly and could almost be called roomy. I wouldn't recommend sizing up unless you REALLY think you need extra hip room. Overall, a wonderful dress! P.S. I'm 5'6" and felt the dress was a tad long. Definitely pushing tea length on anyone shorter.

It fit really well (the size 8) which made me glad they couldn't ship out the size 6, as it likely wouldn't have zipped up! A little spacious in the chest area, hence why I am wearing a cardigan over it. I was sad it didn't match the hat I had originally purchased, so I decided to go on and make my own Easter Bonnet, which turned out amazing! Lots of compliments on the dress and hat combo!

links_reviews_title: This is my first RTR dress, and now I'm hooked! I have never had so many compliments on a dress!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful lace design. Flattering fit. #spring #wedding #lace

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Everyone commented on it
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Amazing dress
This dress was so pretty & I received so many compliments. Loved the lace and colors. Bery feminine!
Got about a zillion compliments - great for church as it's long and has a little sleeve - very elegant- but was quite faint and needed the spray tan to avoid looking like a ghost

links_reviews_title: Right in the mid drift area.
links_reviews_text: A little tight in the middle try sizing up if mid area and hips are fuller the ribbon sash has no give. Get help with the zipper it's very difficult. The sleeves fall over immediately so buy dress tape for shoulders and the lace should display perfectly. Length is conservative and detailing on the lace is exquisite.

I loved this dress. It's a true light blue - some pictures made it look more frosty looking. The fit was great. I'm a 30G, 34 in waist, and a healthy full figure butt (I know that's right), so I'm always worried about online dresses, but this one was super easy. I wore with nude heels, minimal jewelry, and a purple/pink lip. Enjoy!

links_reviews_title: Luxurious dress with soft and intricate lace detailing that is perfectly elegant.
links_reviews_text: This kind of dress is exactly why I use Rent the Runway. Absolutely beautiful detailing and something that is unique enough that I would really only want to wear it once even though I loved it so much! The neckline is a bit lower than it seems in the picture so cleavage does show. There is little give in the dress so unless the band hits right at your waist point, it may not look right. The cap sleeves are a tad big but I personally liked the look. The length hit right at my knees which was perfect as we were attending a religious ceremony prior to a wedding. The dress and fit received many compliments. The dress fit my body type like a glove: 5'10", 150 lbs, hourglass figure.
The detail on this dress was absolutely amazing! I got numerous compliments. It fit like a glove however the top is slightly large and made for someone busty.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for Mother of the Groom. Complements galore. Felt very sexy and magical.
links_reviews_text: Love this fit, wore 4 inch shoe. Need Hollywood Tape to keep shoulder from falling. Assistant needed for zipper.
I ordered size 0 but they don't have it. This is size 2 it's very lovely but it's too big in the top :(
Great colors! Received many compliments! This dress has a green layer underneath the lace detail. The sleeves were a little loose and a little itchy toward the end of the night.

At first I was very upset because the dress was supposed to arrive on Tuesday and it was sent back to Rent the Runway before I even wore it. I was totally panicking but Rent the Runway immediately corrected the error and sent me the dress on Thursday morning. By the way make sure someone is home to sign for your package. Thankfully the dress fit me perfectly! I'm 5'4 so I bought four inch heels from Badgley Mischka to help prop me up lol. Everything looked stunning and I received so many compliments. Thank you Rent the Runway for your amazing assistance while I was panicking on the phone with you! Ladies this dress is absolutely beautiful and pictures can't even begin to show how truly beautiful it is. I highly recommend it! It shows your curves beautifully!!!! Thank you Rent the Runway!!

links_reviews_title: Everybody loved it!!!! Had a lot of compliments
links_reviews_text: Size 10 zipper was short

I wore this dress to a summer outdoor cocktail wedding. This dress was true to size and easy to wear. The only issue I had was that the weather was very hot and humid and the dress became itchy while I was wearing it.

This jumpsuit was comfortable and easy to move in while I was the organizer for a work event. The pockets were handy for my phone and other small objects. The only downside was the hem was VERY long. I had to create a shorter hem with safety pins in order to wear this with 2" heels even though I'm 5'6". Overall I would recommend this outfit!
Loved wearing this! It's a standout with such a bright color! Would be perfect for vacation.
Rented this for a Halloween party and it was a perfect and flattering look that wasn't "coustumey". I had to wear spandex underneath as you can see any butt/thigh flaw

links_reviews_title: Bold and great for dog days of summer
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a size 10 with my rentals and this one I got a size 12, which was right so I would say it runs small. PRO: felt great and confident in it all day and lots of coworkers loved it! CON: zipper is in the back and since it has a high neck I needed help every time I went to the bathroom to zip it back up. Great for day time but may be too much work for a night out.

So well made!! Such a stand out color. Literally gots more compliments than any other rent the runway. SO WELL MADE. I wish I would have got the long version, this one with heels was a little to short for my liking, but I wore smaller heels and was fine.

I rented this for a Clemson University event at the Library of Congress and even in a sea of orange it stood out. I got tons of compliments! I'm usually an 8 but got the 10 bc I always worry about jumpers and rompers. It fit perfectly so I would say size up. One drawback is it was very fitted around my butt. I'm 5'4 and if I was even a half inch taller it wouldn't have worked. So consider getting the tall if you're over 5'4. I will definitely rent this again!
This piece really stood out and was super comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for 60's themed party, somewhat baggy otherwise
links_reviews_text: It was perfect for a 60's themed party I attended. The fit is nice and it was fun to wear. People commented on the bright color. It came somewhat wrinkly though and it was quite baggy looking so I wouldn't have worn it for anything else.
This piece was perfect for a business meeting. I'm super shy when it comes to wearing anything outside of black and gray-- I'm so glad I allowed myself to be bold and daring.

links_reviews_title: Fit beautifully. Looked professional. Total standout!
links_reviews_text: Took a risk and thanks to RTR Unlimited I decided to take a chance on a bright romper I normally wouldn't invest in and am so happy I did! It fit both TTS and also very flattering. I liked so much, I'm considering buying and who would have guessed such a bright unconventional work option looked SO good with a fitted blazer and some snake skin booties. It seems revealing, but the back is completely covered and wasn't much different than a sleeveless shirt. Take a chance and treat yourself. Update: after wearing all say as a 5'7" woman, when I bend or lean forward, it's constricting on the neck because it has not stretch or give. Still really liked!

links_reviews_title: The color is a show stopper. A beautiful orange but doesn't look like a costume.
links_reviews_text: SUPER flattering and the perfect length. Not too long for a standard height heel and not too short (i'm 5'3" wearing a size 2.) Received a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Loved it, wore it several ways. Very flattering fit and easy color to wear.
links_reviews_text: Loved it.

Scene stealing outfit! Comfortable. Slimming. Highlights the booty curves. My boyfriend especially liked that! Ha! I got compliments all night long and felt confident, comfortable and beautiful. What more can you ask!? It's a heavier material so I think it would be too heavy for certain climates in hot months. I wore it at a chilly outdoor/barn wedding on an unseasonable cold day in Sept in Michigan with a jacket until dancing warmed me up. Legs were perfectly warm as the fabric has some weight to it. I loved this outfit so much!
A little tight for a large chest.

links_reviews_title: It really is traffic cone orange. That being said it's very comfortable and flatters tan skin!
links_reviews_text: I have long legs so this worked well for me, I liked that they had "long" in sizing options.

I wore this jumpsuit for a speaking engagement. Got compliments left and right. The color is great, not too bright but still looks fresh. You'll have to wear a strapless bra because even my racer back bra showed. I would rent this again in a heartbeat.
Great idea but the color isn't great for my skin tone and the drapery fabric felt a bit like it was swallowing me- ok but I chose not to wear it
#chasingcoral

links_reviews_title: Perfect for our outdoor charity fundraiser on the patio event.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size, get a Long if you want to wear sky-high heels or are on the tall side. Fabulous color and I got compliments all night long. If it is possible for a jumpsuit to be conservative and sexy at the same time, this is it.

This jumpsuit is very comfortable and fit perfectly. The zipper is hard to do by yourself, so I had to have my husband finish zipping me up. I also felt it was a little conservative. Overall, I loved it and even considered purchasing it!
I really enjoyed this jumper. The fit was true to size and made me feel tall and lean a day. Loved the pop of color!
This cute number really stood out in a sea of black. Its long enough to wear with heel or pin up and wear with casual flats. Tons of compliments and makes your legs look a mile long.

links_reviews_title: LOVED the color, neckline, the drape-y part in the back.
links_reviews_text: Love Trina Turk's jumpsuits, especially as a woman with short legs!
The color makes you POP in any room you're in. At 5'9" I was happy to have ordered the long to be able to pair heels with it. Regular length would have been fine for flats.
Super comfortable and easy to wear. Loved this piece.
The fit was comfortable. It was too long for me, even with heels. Getting the jumper on and off was too much of a challenge. I decided to change at the last minute and didn't wear it out.

Beautiful jumpsuit but a tad bright for my skin tone. It fit true to size and the length was great for my height. It had NO stretch to it and it fell fitted to my natural waist. Would say this is great for any cup size and can be worn with any standard bra.

Rented this Trina Turk jumpsuit to wear to work. It fit great and is very comfortable. The orange is very bright in person. Brighter that I expected. Gave 4 stars instead of 5 simply because the brightness felt a little less professional. Great material and perfect fit. I am 5'6 and the pant hit just above the floor. Too short to wear with heels for my taste but perfect with flats.
Trina Turk does it again! Loved this orange jumpsuit. Fits beautifully. Could wear with flats or a wedge. Zipper in back a bit tricky but able to do without assistance. Tons of compliments.

This was a fun jumpsuit for a summer day at work. Runs a bit large through the waist and hips. I lift so almost all clothes are are tight through my back and chest. I would probably not wear this more than once, but was a fun rental to add some pop to an otherwise boring day in the office.

Amazing construction, vibrant orange color, incredibly comfortable.....true retro vibe. I actually received compliments from strangers while wearing it. I'm 5'8 and wore the R rather than the L with 2 and a half inch heels. The length was perfect. I'm somewhat long waisted too and didn't have an issue in that department at all. Loved it. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: this is my favorite jumpsuit ever!
links_reviews_text: SO COMFORTABLE. Love how lightweight it is but also structured. VERY flattery.
absolutely perfect for work
n/a
Beautifully flowy fitting in the hips, waist, and chest - I am 5'9" and ordered the 8R, which was not long enough in the torso. If I ordered this again I would def get the 8L
Great pockets. Paired with gold accessories and shoes. Only pain was unzipping and zipping for the bathroom. Doable, but not easy.
Trina Turk runs large. I even went down a size and it didn’t work for me. WAY too long. and I am not that short.
Awesome jumpsuit! I got so many compliments for a work event

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a political fundraiser with leopard print heels.
links_reviews_text: Fit really well, even though I'm shorter ( not quite 5'4") - I wore it with 3" heels and it was perfect. Loved it, was super comfortable, and got a TON of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Orange you glad you rented this!!
links_reviews_text: Second time renting this. Always get soo many compliments. So comfortable and quite an attention-grabber!
Love this dress. So unique and light weight. Will rent again
Gorg and fun. So many complements + super comfy.

links_reviews_title: Really artsy and unique, lots of compliments

links_reviews_text: The fabric (though a synthetic) is silky and luxe, very thin but it’s like a whisper over your skin. The cut is magical - it doesn’t have a zipper or any closure or stretch and yet it slips on over your head and then arranges itself on your body as if someone sewed you into it. The neck is hard to see in the rtr photo and I thought it might have been a bit off one shoulder but it’s actually more like a slight cowl. Fit: the main thing is that the asymmetrical hemline is very long - I needed it to do double duty from work to going out so I wore ankle boots with just a small heel and it barely worked (in my pic I’m wearing socks and you can see it’s touching the floor). It’s fairly tight through the shoulders and bust and the XS will probably fit a 0 or 2 best. It’s probably a little too dressy for work but it was too amazing for me to send it back without wearing and I didn’t end up getting it in time for the Xmas party I originally ordered it for.

I loved the print of the dress and the soft fabric, but that's pretty much it. Cons: The neck is designed very strangely, it chokes at the neck and pulls under the armpits making it very difficult to move around. There is no shape to the dress, I didn't even wear it out because my friends told me it wasn't flattering at all and made me look funny.
This dress was an interesting piece. It's made of silk material and has 0 stretch. Fits a little odd up top, but received several compliments.

Literally turned heads walking into the restaurant with this one. Such an amazing print! My only complaint is that is was a little right across the chest/up top near shoulders, but I loved it so much I didn't care!

I love the pattern of this dress beware this is is a summer weight dress and requires an under garment such as a slip. It's very flowy. The top is an awkward fit. I wore this with knee high snake print boots which matched perfectly with one of the prints in the dress. and layered it with a crop leather jacket. My date loved the dress. I gave it a 4 because it's unexpected sheerness

I love this artsy, quirky little dress. Looks very hip and cool no matter how you wear it. You can put an oversized black sweater over it; wear it with a suit jacket, belt and boots for work; or wear it as is. Very comfortable and silky, although the fabric is not silk. Very thin. Super cool artsy print. I've never seen a dress like this before, so I splurged on purchasing it. One of a kind.
I was really excited to wear this, but when I got it it was much too small in the chest. Wouldn't recommend for those over DD (I'm a 34 G/FF). Really cute dress otherwise.

links_reviews_title: Awesome pattern, odd fit on hips
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this but the bias cut on the hips fell really oddly. The pattern was really great and unique tho.

Wore this for a show. Felt great in it and tons of compliments. I wish RTR would get more artsy and edgy stuff. The top is tight and neckline odd but it works. I don't see myself returning it for a bit.
I really wanted this to work so I could serve modern Miss Frizzle but the cut is weird and doesn't fit well at all. Bummer.

links_reviews_title: Was waiting for this one to become available!
links_reviews_text: OMG- was this the bomb. Must be ready to be the extrovert when wearing this dress. It's bold. The fit. It goes over the head- no zipper- that took some figuring out. The asymmetrical neckline needed futzing to lay correctly, especially if you're busty. The longest part of the hem was touching the ground without a heel (5'5"), so you'll need a funky shoe. I liked it with a lug heel- pump or ankle boot. But the compliments at the party- wow! Slay it, girl...

FYI, This dress is sheer. I was unable to wear it...I rented the XSR - it fit everywhere but the shoulders - way too small, with the sleeves beginning an inch or more too close to my neck. If you can normally wear XS/0 long sleeve dresses, you should be fine...I seem to forget every fall that my shoulders are just too large for most designers XS/O shoulder/sleeve sizing.

So, this fits weird across neck and bust. I'm probably barely a c cup on my best day and it was super tight across chest and arms making it hard to lift arms. Fabric was super nice silk and great print - got lots of compliments but was personally uncomfortable all night.
Really pretty cut and fabric but the chest area is so tiny, it made it unwearable.
Fits perfectly and feels soo good!
I wore this to my an office holiday party. Initially I thought the dress looked weird. The style is very unique so it took me several tries to decide if I liked it. As far as the fit, it fit great!
Comfy, flattering, and fun details with the gold and green accent along with the ruffle on the chest/shoulder
This dress is comfortable, cocktail attire ready with a fun pop of green and cold color. Unfortunately my event was cancelled so I only got wear around my house. Will definitely be renting again.
I work this for a political event. So I have to dress professional but still felt sexy! I would buy this dress !
I don't usually rent black dresses but this was so unique and fun! Very short ;)
So cute! Was a bit short on my frame, but totally fine with black tights.

Loved this dress. Very comfortable. I usually wear a medium and though the medium did fit I felt it was rather short. Got both a medium and a large based on reviews and went with a Large for this dress. It was more roomy and I wasn't uncomfortable pulling it down. Super fun dress and elegant at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!!! Wore for work Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: The dress runs small. I rented medium and large and wore the large strictly for comfort. The medium fit but there wasn’t much give I the waist.
This was such a comfortable dress and I got so many compliments! I loved everything about this dress!

links_reviews_title: This dress was PERFECT for my husband’s work Christmas party.
links_reviews_text: I am 5’2” , 125lbs and the small fit perfectly. I felt comfortable and confident all night in this dress. Loved it!!!
I had my eye on this for a while and finally rented it so I could wear it to an awards banquet. I definitely needed to wear tights as it's on the short side, but I really love this dress!
I got so many compliments on this dress. It did run a little snug, but squeezed in all the right places. Would def recommend

True to size. Very comfy to wear. It wasn't tight around the wait (my biggest concern). Length was perfect. I'm 5'1. Would definitely rent again. If you want to see more pictures of the dress check @missnohelia

This dress was great for a winter wedding. I wore the M because there was more room for dancing and eating! The S was a little snug but I'm usually between sizes. This dress was super comfy and lasted all night on the dance floor!

links_reviews_title: Sized up from a medium and fit well
links_reviews_text: It wasn't my favorite dress, but it did the job and was very comfortable.
Wore this dress for a fundraiser and loved it! It was super comfortable and had such nice detail to it. I loved the lace elements as it added some flirty flare without beeing too sexy.
Great length- not too short. Sleeve length was perfect and loved all of the details on this dress.
Cute dress, nothing super special but fun and comfy for a GNO. Would rent the XS if I got it again, felt a little big in the waist. My measurements are 34-27-35.
I only gave the dress 4 stars because it does run on the smaller side and is super short (even for someone who is 5'3). However, I got a lot of compliments and it was pretty comfortable!

I'm 2.5 months postpartum and about 8 lbs over my pre-pregnancy weight. I'm 5'3" and usually 116 lbs. Most of my old clothes fit, just not exactly the same way yet so I rented both the S and XS for my boyfriend's niece's Sweet 16 party. It was was an overly ambitious rental for my postpartum body! I couldn't get the XS over my hips and the S, while it looked okay standing perfectly still, was crazy short. Maybe it's because my hips haven't gone back yet but there was no way I could wear this to a family function. It's a shame too because it's a beautiful dress, well made, and comfortable too.
This dress was perfect for my charity event! I'm petite and it fit perfectly and was very flattering. I wore a sticky bra. I got tons of compliments.
It fit so perfect!! The band at the waist hit the right spot and it wasn't too tight anywhere. Enough space in the arms and chest. Cute to wear your hair up or down!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Very classy and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Loved the details on this dress. Was perfect for a women’s networking event!

This is quite possibly my favorite rental so far. I rented this for my birthday and loved it! Great material, quality, and detail, and arrived like it was barely used/new. It's so unique with the asymmetric style and lace. I fit into both the S and XS, but I decided to go XS since it had a nicer more fitted look. It was perfect. But if only the S were available, I totally would have still worn it. I was actually a little sad to mail this beautiful dress back- wish I could keep it! Rent away!!
Fulfilled all the dreams I had for a dress for my boss’s wedding. It fit like a glove but I was so comfortable in it the whole night!

links_reviews_title: Pretty cocktail dress! Loved the neckline!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a st Patty's charity event. It was perfect with the gold and green stripe! Dress was comfortable and flattering. Would rent again for sure!
The dress fit me perfectly. I got a lot of compliments and it was comfortable to dance and move in. Highly suggest!

Love Saylor so when I saw this one, I thought it would be fun for a night out with no real big bash plans. It's just so cute. It's got little details that made it cooler than a regular ole LBD and the shortness makes it sexy. Sadly it was too cold to wear without leggings so I had to but still loved it. I know this brand runs a little smaller so I did the large. could have done the medium but I liked having a little extra material as I sat. I paired it with Jeffrey Cambell heels for a little extra fun. My friend loved it and I felt super cute.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute and fits very nicely. I'm 5'3" though and the dress was short! I would size up for taller gals!

Loved this dress and it was very flattering, wore with black heels. After reading reviews I went with a small and XS backup but I could have definitely gone up a size to a medium. Even though it fit everywhere else, the middle band is pretty tight! So if you can deal with that it's worth staying with a small. Medium may have been too big anyway.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Love the asymmetrical lace top.
links_reviews_text: Cute, comfy. I sized up as recommended so I wore the large. The medium would've been too short. I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a night out on Vegas.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cute! I will warn though that it is short! I wore it with black tights though and I was super comfortable in it and the shortness didn't bother me at all. I would not have worn it without tights though. Too short for me in the back.

links_reviews_title: So much to love about this dress!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED wearing this dress! The fit was perfect- tight enough to give me a figure and loose enough to hide my post baby belly. The length was great for a cocktail party. I would describe this dress as flirty and classy at the same time! I am busty on top (36DD) but smaller on the bottom. I am very glad I got the large. Definitely recommend sizing up if you are busty.

I love this trendy dress by Saylor! Running true to size with a little stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this style so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5’3”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. The dress is amazing in person. Pair with black heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit! The material is thick and it is such an affordable rental as well!

I rented this for a black and white themed charity event, and was so happy with it! The fit is true to size, and slightly fitted through the middle where the band hits. There is some stretch in it though, so it has a little give. It is pretty short, but I'm not tall and was wearing with flats so wasn't a concern. I got tons of compliments on the dress, and it was a fun change from a lot of simpler black dresses at the event I wore it to.

links_reviews_title: I loved everything about this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfy and so flattering at the same time. I wore a small b/c an XS was unavailable. It was a little big through the chest area, but it wasn’t a problem. I received tons of compliments, and will certainly rent this dress again!
I loved this dress. Wore it to a wine benefit dinner dance and it was very comfortable and easy to move in. I usually wear a 6/8 and the large fit perfect!

Loved this dress - especially for a winter party. The ruffle and little green trim made the dress a standout from just a basic little black dress. While it was a little short, wearing black tights underneath made me feel much more appropriate at a work function.
Perfect for the occasion. I usually wear a 6/8 and the large was perfect.
Adorable, sassy little dress ! Runs a little small but I felt confident and sassy in this dress. I'm 5'2 and 105lb
This dress is the most stunning shade of red and was the perfect fit! The sleeves are so fun. I received so many compliments on this dress.

links_reviews_title: Color was great It is a true red,.the picture of me makes it look a little more pink,.but its br red
links_reviews_text: Love this dress

links_reviews_title: Small but great in the right size
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 00/0 and wore a 2 in this, which fit very well. It's really cute for someone small/short but I wore something else

This dress was absolutely perfect! Glad I took all the other ladies advice and ordered a size up it fit like a glove. Had women stopping me to tell me how gorgeous the dress was. If you order do size up! Also careful with the zipper when zipping it I felt like the zipper was going to snag on the netting/material.
Tons of compliments! Someone said I looked like I was from America's next top model and believe you me it was all the dress! Rent this, but size up for waist.
The shoulders were really small on the size 0. I am 5,6 so the shoulders in the 0 would be better suited for someone closer to 5'0. Otherwise the dress was beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks in this bright red dress!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a 6, and I wore a 6 in this dress but it felt a bit constricting. Material was amazing but there is no give, so I recommend sizing up one size. I received so many compliments all night. Beautiful bright red color.
Sized up TWO sizes for my curves. Normally a 2, the 4 could have worked but was not comfortable in a 6. I wore this to a "festive attire" cocktail party and loved it
This dress was awesome! Wore for the American heart Association Go Ref luncheon. Definitely a stands out.

links_reviews_title: This dress was the right amount of pop for a birthday party themed fundraiser I attended
links_reviews_text: Definitely would recommend for busty gals, I'm 5'11 so it was pretty short on me but not in a bad way.

links_reviews_title: SO many compliments! Felt fun and confident!
links_reviews_text: Order 2 sizes up!! Tight around hips/stomach area
Such a beautiful and flattering dress. I felt like a million bucks in this dress. A little large. Could hVe gone a size smaller but was comfortable and was so pleased.

links_reviews_title: Flattering tailoring - scale works well for petites
links_reviews_text: Wore a 2 in this size (usually wear a 0) the waistband runs very small and is not stretchy at all

I had so many compliments on this dress. I am typically a size 0 in most dresses but this one runs very small and material is not stretchy. Size up a full size you usually wear! Overall, LOVE the dress. It was stunning and chic.

This is a very well made dress - and will get lots of compliments. Definitely made of good material - thick lace and sleeves stay structured all night. I usually wear 0s in dresses, but I definitely could not fit into the 0. The 2 fit great. I believe the multiple rental use caused the zipper to get stuck. But my fiancé and I figured it out - definitely need two people and lots of patience. Only reason I subtracted one star from this review. It is pretty comfortable. I was able to dance in this dress with no restrictions. And great for petites. Would recommend though if you can overlook a finicky zipper.
This red dress is perfect for a cocktail party
! It fit well. I have a large bust and had no issues *this is when I tried it on. I received a lot of compliments at the shower.

I love this dress so much! It was constructed so well & fit my body perfectly even without any stretch. I usually avoid dresses with no give because I'm narrower on top than I am on the bottom. I got so many compliments on this dress the whole night. It has just the right amount of detail where you take notice without needing any accessories, but it's not so loud that it's obnoxious. Love!
This dress was so much more fun than I had thought it would be and it was so cute on. Very flattering. It runs true to size and a little short.
I received soooo many compliments. I felt great in this dress. So comfortable and several people told me I was the best dressed at the wedding
Loved this dress! Had the perfect fit for my hourglass shape. Was worried about the length but hit right above my knees. Everyone loved it! Loved the sleeve details
Wore this for dinner and dancing. Plenty of room in the bust, came down to mid-thigh on me (5'7"). Super flattering and fun!

links_reviews_title: A little tight fitting, but so pretty!
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments in this dress. It has such a nice silhouette. It does run small; I sized up based on reviews and it fit, but was snug!

Gorgeous red dress. It runs small so size up. Normally a 6 and had to go with an 8. Length was great even with heels and being 5'8. Strapless bar needed because of netting detail on top. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Met James Hinchcliffe in this dress so that's a win in my book
links_reviews_text: Fit was a little big. I could have gone with my usual size of an 8. Loved the sleeves! Got so many compliments.

Normally I am a 4, but in this dress the 6 was a more comfortable fit. I loved the dress, but I couldn't get past the sleeves. They reminded me of a bad 80's prom dress- huge and very shiny. It must just be me because I didn't see anyone else mention it in the reviews! The body of the dress is gorgeous. I ultimately wore the other dress that I rented.
This dress is so stylish and so flattering i absolutely loved it
Too small, uncomfortable in arms. Very tight and figure fitting but if I went up a size It would have been too long!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that makes any girl look amazing
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress for a New Years Eve party. The fit was great, made me look very slim and tall. The dress is comfy to wear and despite all my dancing, it didn't need any adjustments throughout the night. The color is beautiful and I received lots of compliments.

Perfect dress for Christmas or any formal event, really. I received so many compliments all night long. It's a beautiful dress and the details are everything. This is one rental you will not regret. Will absolute rent again if I need a red dress!
Adorable dress but size up!! It's a fun bright red dress that is comfortable if you size up! Luckily I read the reviews.

This dress is so fun! It does run a bit small. I usually wear a 4 and the 6 was even a bit too tight but I loved it regardless. I wore this for my work Christmas party and got compliments all night. With the shoulders it looks like a beautiful holiday gift and is super festive. I have an hourglass figure and it fits (and hides!) in all the right places for me. I loved wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress. Perfect for a December wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress most certainly runs small. Order one or two sizes up. Its really an amazing dress. Super comfortable and really cute.

links_reviews_title: Short - but good with opaque tights
links_reviews_text: I work in a conservative office, so I am the most daring style-wise in the office. I received so many compliments. Unfortunately I had to get dressing in a hospital room, so this was an incredibly difficult zipper to do alone. I had to ask the assistance of a nurse to get me zipped in. This would be very nice to the office holiday party as well.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress for a holiday party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a holiday party and felt so good in it! It definitely runs small. I ordered 1 size and 2 sizes up from what I normally wear due to the reviews. I ended up wearing the 1 size up from my regular size. It is form fitting but was easy enough to dance in. I loved it and got a lot of compliments all night!
Great dress! I ordered a size up as the majority of review said it ran big and wish I had stayed true to size for the bust region and the hips. Overall it worked well and I loved the silhouette!
I decided to wear something else but this dress was really fun! Overall, good fit and flattering
Loved this dress!! Oh my, it was a hit! I received a lot of compliments. My group kept making comments of how obsessed they were with this dress. Will have to rent again!!
Lots of compliments. Size up

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my Vacation in Napa
links_reviews_text: This shirt was fantastic!! For perfectly. I got so many compliments!!!

I sized down for this shirt because it looked really flowy and oversized. With a 32DD chest size, that was risky but worth it. Great fit. Very trendy. Concealed my postpartum pregnancy bump. Wore with jeans and heels

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Tons of compliments. Perfect top for summer or vacation. Light weight material and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Oversized fit, but love the sleeve detail!
links_reviews_text: I was surprised how oversized this blouse was, but did opt to wear it. It has an elastic band at the top to keep it on your shoulders, but it kind of sat on top of my bust. If I had a larger bust it may look off, but overall it worked.
the fit doesn't do anything to show off your shape as it's quite boxy, but great for a family brunch where I ate a little too much :)
I wore this 3 months pregnant - right when I was starting to show and wanted to hide it still. Mission accomplished!
The colors were perfect for 4th of July. Good lightweight top for warm days. Liked but didn't love.
This top is really comfortable and I didn't need to wear a bra. It runs big - this is an xsmall on me and I feel like I could have gone down one more size if they had it.
Rented in unlimited for a July 4th cookout! Also wore another night with jeans. Fits perfectly- not too low on the shoulders- well made, pretty details.
I love this top! It's super adorable, comfortable and forgiving! I also love that I'm not having to constantly fix the off-the-shoulder sleeves!

The bell sleeves definitely have volume, but I didn't feel like I was drowning in this shirt at all. It was super comfortable too. Compared to most off the shoulder tops, I had an easier time keeping this one in Place too. Definitely recommend it!

Rented this for a weekend in Montauk, and then wore it again to work later that week. I'm between a S and an M, but typically like Parker in a M, but wish I had gone with the S because of the volume of the shirt. It didn't do me any favors, so I tucked it in. I still got so many compliments though. I thought it was just a blue and white stripe, but it's actually blue, pink, and white stripes with blue and white embroidered smocking at the top. Really cute, and doesn't require too much fussing because the off the shoulder is all elastic. Would rent again for sure!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my 50th birthday dinner. Got so many compliments! Very comfortable, it’s got more colo
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size, love it!
Wear with a fitted bottom so you have some shape. It's super comfortable and the sleeves don't fall down which I love.
Cute and lightweight for summer. Easy to dress up or down. Runs TTS.
This is a great top for the summer! Love it at a picnic or bar-b-que. Really comfortable and so flattering! Hides the food baby! LOL!

links_reviews_title: cute look. lots of compliments. good quality and fun sleeves
links_reviews_text: great with shorts or jeans.
Easy fit, cute shirt for every day wear. Nice fabric and pattern as well.
This is somewhat true to size somewhat large. It's very flow-y and baggy in the middle, so if I were reorder I'd go for an xs! Super cute and got lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: wore this a couple of times and loved it. Paired with Jeans and sandals.
links_reviews_text: Cute, bare shoulder top. Flowy, loose-fitting, great for pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: Super cute top. I wore it to a concert with jeans and tucked it in. Looked great!
links_reviews_text: Fit great.

links_reviews_title: This is cute and stylish. I've worn it all summer.
links_reviews_text: Love this so much that I bought it. The flared sleeves are stylish. I've word it with white shorts and blue jeans - so cute.
Comfy and cute
Wore to a concert and it was great!
My rather ample cleavage looked silly below the embellished neckline.
Love this shirt. It's fun and easy.
Loose and forgiving, this eas perfect for vacation

links_reviews_title: I really liked this top but the sleeves got annoying.
links_reviews_text: Very cute and flattering! My only con is that (like any off the shoulder top), the sleeves can get annoying. I would wear it to a daytime event or lunch. Something where you don't need a ton of movement.

links_reviews_title: Fun & Flattering! Unlike most off shoulder tops, it stays up without constantly fixing it.
links_reviews_text: It was true to size. The sleeves are fun and flirty. Received many compliments while wearing it. Great top for day into night.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a summer night on the town
links_reviews_text: Loved this top. It stayed out but wasn't restricting.

Love this shirt! So cute! I'm short and curvy and looked nice on with jeans. sleeves are a little awkward length on me because I'm short, but doesn't look weird. It's more pink than it looks in the pic!
Adorable top! Wore 3 times while I had it. With navy shorts, white jeans & blue jeans. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Cute top, but a bit tricky to wear
links_reviews_text: This top looked very cute. It's a bit short so I wore it with high waisted white denim. I did have to adjust it and pull the top down frequently -- the elastic isn't very snug so it does move around a bunch. Looked cute, though, and perfect for a casual night out.

Loved this shirt! The elastic part around the shoulders is super comfortable and doesn't ride up - can also be adjusted lower or higher depending on your off-the-shoulder preference. Looks cute with skinny jeans or shorts for a warm day. Was the perfect length for my height.
Cute off the shoulder top. Would have sized down. Great colors and the off the shoulder stays put

links_reviews_title: I LOVED it!!!! Very complimentary and comfortable! I rented it again;)
links_reviews_text: It was longer and covered some of my less than desirable body parts while accentuating the my flattering body parts...my shoulders!

links_reviews_title: Perfect top to look on point at a summer party.
links_reviews_text: As others have said, the top is blue and pink stripe (hard to see in the photos). Beautifully made and fits well. I wore it to a concert and an afternoon party this summer. Tons of compliments and super comfortable!
Loved this top! Little baggy but looks great in photos
So many compliments on this! Hated sending it back.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Light and flowly for summery and looks awesome with shorts or jeans. Sleeves are fun!
links_reviews_text: Shoulders tend to rise up, but so do all off the shoulder tops!

links_reviews_title: Perfect bridal shower dress--runs a bit small

links_reviews_text: Adorable and very conservative.
Rented this for a BBQ. Really loved it - wore again the next day on a date!
The dress was a bit tight up top, but overall very cute!

Solid everyday dress to could easily be dressed up for a daytime event. Zipper was tough even though it wasn't tight on me. There seems to be so extra material under the arm with no zipper. I folded it down and tucked it in. I'm a 4/6 top and I would say that this dress is a true 6.

Cute overall design but was awkward on. Maybe not great for a larger chest (36D), the fit under the bust combined with the stripes made body appear crooked or lopsided and just awkward. Plenty of room in hips while still fitted at waist. Material wrinkles easily.

links_reviews_title: This chic dress is comfortable and easy
links_reviews_text: Felt very comfortable and feminine -- wore this to a winery day in California! Definitely recommend :) true to size
I wore this a corporate event in the summer. Loved the off the shoulder detail!
Loved the dress, many compliments

This dress was a winner. I love the fit, the soft material that was comfortable and breathable. I wore it to a beach wedding and even with the wind it held up. I received a ton of compliments and felt like I was in play clothes the whole time. Highly recommend this dress!
Perfect for a event and was really light weight. Comfortable. I wore this to a cocktail party with wedges. I am 5'4" and the length hit me mid-calf. Runs true to size.
This dress is incredibly flattering and comfortable. The bust detailing is so flattering and beautiful and the full skirt makes it comfortable. I will definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for a summer night out
links_reviews_text: Lots of fabric on top, not sure it was the most flattering.

I loved this dress, perfect for a rehearsal dinner. It is very thin, but not thin enough to need a slip. I loved the one shoulder, but there was a ton of extra fabric up top. I couldn't have gone down a size because it fit everywhere else. I ended up twisting the top tie several times to pull up the fabric around my chest.
Fit was good, waist was a little snug so I sized... Love it!

links_reviews_title: This is just impossible for a woman with boobs.
links_reviews_text: The fit around the waist and the length were super cute but the fit around my chest was impossible. Sizing up would have made the rest of the dress super baggy, so I tried but it didn't feel flattering at all.
Bust was too tight to zip (I'm a 36D) everywhere else fit great, wish I could have worn it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but tight in bust
links_reviews_text: Loved the style and color of this dress, but when I tried it on, the top was too tight and I couldn't even zip it. I'm usually between a size 6 and 8 and the even wouldn't close.

I chose a 2R because I usually have trouble zipping in the chest area and that worked out well. It was still a little bit of a struggle to get it to zip but once I got the hook on first, it was totally doable. If you have a larger chest/torso to a petite frame, I would definitely recommend sizing up so that you can zip. The skirt of the dress reaches a little below my knee in the calf area. Pairs nicely with a pair of slides or you can wear strappy heels like the model in the display image.

This dress looked very cute online and I rented it for a celebration bbq but couldn't get the chest to zip. I think it ran a little small and there was all this fabric under the chest that seemed unnecessary and made it look like my midsection was bigger than it is.
This dress has an odd fit. I couldn't zip it all the way and the fabric seemed bulked up

Very oddly fitted. The waistband seemed wavy and puckered in a non-intentional way; the bodice was poofy and unflattering. And yet it barely zipped? I didn't think I could wear this without being self conscious.

This dress was extremely light and airy. Unfortunately my shoulders are too broad and It looked uncomfortably tight in the breast/shoulder area. That's my issue, not the dresses. Would be wonderful for a casual summer wedding or picnic date.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and casual, but NOT flattering on a curvy figure
links_reviews_text: Loved the light weight material of this dress. Because the wraps and ties were decorative rather than functional, everything stayed in place, but the ties themselves LOOKED decorative and were not quite proportional to the other design elements of the dress. I ordered a size 6 based on size recommendations and other reviews, which fit me in the bust but meant that I was absolutely swimming in the rest of the dress. I am all for flowing summer dresses, but this cut looked more like a maternity dress as I moved around.

links_reviews_title: Came here to tell you to size up
links_reviews_text: I looked like a can of busted biscuits when my husband finally got it zipped. (Okay I'm being a little dramatic) I will rent again but in a bigger size.

links_reviews_title: I wore something else to the event
links_reviews_text: I was surprised that the top of this dress ran small. I am a 34DDD so that is probably why. But I normally wear a 10. I was not able to wear this dress.
This dress could've been cute but the fit was off. The waist line did not fall evenly and it ended up making the dress look crooked when worn. Returned immediately.
I couldn't get the top zipped but was swimming in the bottom.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it. Too much fabric up top.
links_reviews_text: Did not fit my body correctly.
Was too tight across the chest
Runs small size up at least one size

The fit of the top was good except that the top section had too much fabric so it was puffy at the neckline. It doesn't look like this in the photos so maybe mine was just defective. It also was not very flattering to my waistline and made it look larger than it is.
