Great dress, worn at a beachside cocktail party, supportive, flattering and comfortable!

I rented for vacation in Cabo with my family. It felt a little to conservative with a tea length cut but overall a pretty dress. The waist and bust was a little tight but was still able to zip with a little help.

links_reviews_title: Great fit. Lovely to dress up an down
links_reviews_text: So easy to wear, the fabric is very light, makes for a fantastic dress to slip on for any event
the bust area was too small and no stretch so cold not comfortably zip. But the fabric and style was very nice, i may try in a bigger size

links_reviews_title: This dress was tight and short in the body
links_reviews_text: This dress was tight and short in the body

links_reviews_title: A little long for my five foot size but wore with heels so looked fine.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a rehearsal dinner.
Tight in the bodice, I wish I would have sized up, but there was already so much material on the dress. I feel like a size up I would have been swimming in.
THis dress looks beautiful in photos, on my body, not so much. I had such high hopes for this dress. I didn't even wear it to work.

This dress was perfect for a black tie wedding in NYC. It's fairly simple but with a fun, asymmetrical twist. The fabric is thick and really comfortable. The slit is modest but fun. 10/10 would recommend!

I felt good wearing this dress. It looked really great on but I don't feel like it photographed well (Instagrammers, beware!). Very slimming. It def runs small but it's more of an issue around your rib cage (not in the waist, as is usually the case). The way the shoulders are cut it minimizes your range of movement but if all you're doing is standing around and looking pretty, you can't go wrong with this dress.
It’s a thick, stretchy fabric that held everything together super well! I’m barely 5’6” and the small long was perfect (worm with flats).

links_reviews_title: Very elegant dress. Loved the fit and the look.
links_reviews_text: True to size. Very elegant and just what I was looking for. I'm a normal 8/10.

links_reviews_title: Last-minute dress and ended up being a total success! Loved this dress!!

links_reviews_text: I had a gala to go to on a Saturday and found out about it on a Wednesday so naturally went to RTR. This dress was perfect. I am usually a 4/6 but they did not have any mediums in stock, so I ordered a small and large as backup. though the small fit and hugged my curves really well, it was a little tight for comfort so I went with the large as I'd be walking a lot. The large was looser in the shoulder and slightly around the waist but still gave me good shape! So many compliments all night!
The dress fit great and it was extremely comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Selecting and ordering the dress was easy and shipping it back was even easier!
links_reviews_text: Material was comfortable and breathable, the dress fit like a glove!
This dress was awesome! It fit amazing (no bra needed so even better!). It fit my body so well and wasn't uncomfortable at all. I got so many compliments!! i would definitely rent again!

This dress was so pretty on and a fun twist on the classic black dress! It was tight fitting so spanks were definitely helpful but not necessary as the fabric was thick. I wore the MR because the LR was too large in the chest and arms. Other reviews said to size up but I did not find this to be true. Unfortunately the MR that arrived was a little worn and starting to come undone at the seems in a few places. Must mean the dress is rented often! Overall a great rental for a black tie wedding!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress for a black tie wedding at the end of September. The material is a little bit thicker, but stretchy, which made it easy for dancing and wearing for multiple hours. It's very form fitting, so I opted for the Large for comfort. Would definitely rent again!

I attend The Wedding Festival Party in Denver and my date and I decided we wanted a west TX look for our formal wear. Aka, cowboy boots. This dress perfectly accommodated the look I was going for, while keeping me comfortable all day. I wish I owned this. It's a thick material that holds your figure spanx-like. I did not need to wear a bra. The hardest part was the zipper. I rented the SR and the MR. Both for very well but I went with the SR for a snug fit.
I received a lot of compliments of it being classy and it fit really well. I highly recommend renting!

Amazing dress, received tons of compliments. Material is thick so doesn't stick to you, off the shoulder cut out is very flattering and slit adds a little sassiness. Plan to rent again so I can buy it!

This dress is a great stretchy material. It is quite snug but all black helps cover any flaws. I received so many compliments on how elegant it was! Very comfortable and simple! If you want it to be a snug slimming fit order on the smaller end, if you aren't as comfortable with tight fitting then order up.

I rented this for a gala and it was perfect. Pros: stretchy material, comfortable, easy to dance in, you don't need to wear a bra, and it was classy yet sexy at the same time. Cons: the zipper!!!!! It was a nightmare on my hands, the dress fit and the fabric touched yet the zipper was impossible to get up on both dresses that i ordered. I had to google and watch YouTube videos and finally figured it out.
Too long for a 5'1" petite frame unless wearing 4" heels.

links_reviews_title: Great dress- Got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Stretchy fabric made it comfy -and- flattering. I am short, so it was almost too long, but with 4" heels it was just fine (the medium size was definitely too long and too large).

Perfect! Although I am very petite (4'11, 104 lbs) and it was a bit long, it still fit just fine! I wore 3.5 inch wedges. Got lots of compliments! Great material. Wore classic accessories to complete the "Masquerade" look! #Gala #Masquerade #AnAffairToRemember

links_reviews_title: This dress is super cute. I felt great and got loads of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect. The only con was that my partner was out of town and it was difficult to zip myself in! This dress was perfect for the charity gala and I felt confident in it. Would wear again / kind of want to buy it but am resisting.

I had to buy this dress after wearing - got so many compliments! It feels like wearing comfortable shapewear- helps to pull you in. I rented a size small in the short version of this dress, and both the S and M for me, one just feels more snug - because of the stretch, it will be a matter of preference which size fits you best. I'm 5'9", 150 lbs, and measurements are 32-30-36.

The fabric was thick and stretchy and pretty comfortable. I usually wear a size 10, Normally I would think that is a size large at most but the extra large fit best. My stomach is my problem area but it was pretty forgiving as far as formfitting gowns go. there is a slit up the side that goes up pretty high, keep that in mind when picking out Spanx ;) I am 5 foot 10 and the extra long was perfect with heels. I got a lot of compliments and felt beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress! First time RTR
links_reviews_text: The dress was super comfortable and I received so many compliments. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding. Something to note, it was hard to get on because of the sleeve and the zipper was very difficult to zip up.

links_reviews_title: I love this dress!! So classy
links_reviews_text: I felt so classy and pretty. Everything was sleek and fit perfect. I could not lift my arm because of the strap but I didn't care because I loved the dress
nice thick material hangs beautifully off the body and doesn't wrinkle too easily. usually would wear an M but L was perfect per other reviews. great for formal events.
I wore it to a formal wedding. I’m 5’4” and 120lb and wore a small. It was a snug but comfortable fitting fabric. Got lots of compliments on it!

I'm 5'6", 160 lbs, 36DD, this dress was great but I would have preferred to wear the Large, Long. Unfortunately, the LL arrived damaged so I wore the XLR instead. The length was a bit too short and the XLR was a little loose on me, the LL was the perfect size for me and worked great with the 2-inch heel I wore. I'm typically a size 8-10. Great material, I didn't need a bra. Since I wore the larger size, my arm wasn't restricted as other women have mentioned.
Fits like a glove. I wore the dress to my brother in law's wedding and I received compliments all night long. Worth the rental!

The dress was a little tight in the chest and shoulders, I couldn't wear a bra, but also didn't need to. I loved how unique the dress was cut and the slit made me feel a little more playful than if it had been full coverage to the floor. Definitely one of my favorite rentals!

This was my first RTR. All 3 options could have worked! I wore this one because it was easy to wear and looked so classic. I am 5' 10" and 142 pounds. I am usually a size 8. I needed the added length and the dress hit right at the ankles. I received many compliments! I found them to be true to size. Very satisfied with how it went.

I loved this dress from the minute I tried it on. So classy, I received so many compliments throughout the evening! I am 5'7" 125lbs the size S, fit well but the size XS hugged my hips better so the seem kept from riding up. Form fitting material, great for an active event!! #fundrasingevent #auction

Dress is thicker material so I didn't need to worry about wearing spanx. It traveled well in a suitcase and didn't wrinkle while sitting. The right arm is a little restricted when dancing but not too bothersome. My only hesitation was the length - I am 5'8 and wish I could have gotten the long but the regular was a nice tea length with sandals (didn't look as good when I wore pumps in the dressing room as pictured here). Got lots of compliments on the dress, would definitely recommend.
This dress was stunning! Perfect for formal events. It fit great and made me feel great all night! On the model it looks like a shorter dress but I am very short so it fit perfectly to the floor!

I'm 5'5 aprox 127 pounds, and this dress fit well! It was a tad long in 3 in. heels, but it was very flattering for an hourglass figure. Only cons were the length and the fact that the plastic straps that hold dresses on hangers were very pokey and kept coming out of the dress as you can see in the pic; little tedious.

Was hesitant since the largest size was sold out, but the LL fit like a glove for me with stretch and room to spare. I'm 5'6, and had on 3 inch heels, so the dress hit perfectly on the floor for length. Would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: So fun getting dressed up for a great cause.
links_reviews_text: Love this dress! Fit perfectly. So classy for a work event.

links_reviews_title: So elegant, felt like I was going to the Oscars!
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a grad school dance. It is a beautiful and comfortable dress. It is perfect for the winter because the fabric is thick. It runs small though so I recommend sizing up if you don't like super snug clothing. It is very slimming and flattering

Loved the dress, it fit like a glove. Thick material held everything together, no bra or spanks needed. I'm 14 weeks pregnant and have gained a few lbs and you couldn't tell one bit in the dress. I'm 5'7 158 34C fit perfect, would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous. Tons of compliments and extremely flattering material and fit
links_reviews_text: This was the first time that I had to emergency order a dress. The one I originally chose to wear was stretched out and did not fit. I used my RTRPro and had a new dress delivered ASAP. I am secretly glad this happened because I loved this dress so much more. Although I am 5'4" I wore the long, and liked it more floor length than what the stock photo shows

links_reviews_title: How many options there are to chose from and the great prices
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved the dress. It was very comfortable and perfect for New Year's Eve! Does run a little small but has stretch to it. I'm 5'5" and the dress hit the floor for me which was ok!

Got so many compliments on NYE for this dress! It is a great thick material with big pockets that fit all of my things! The straps were a little long, but otherwise it was perfect. Loved the glittery detail on the straps and that it hung the full length of the dress.
I could never wear this dress in real life because of the price but it was so elegant and amazing. Classic fit and adds a little something with the back. Loved how heavy and stiff it was!
But didn't work on my body. Bust was weird and waist was super tight

links_reviews_title: I ended up going with a different option - dress was too big
links_reviews_text: Dress runs large. There wouldn't be enough fabric tape available to make it work.
This dress is gorgeous but runs VERY BIG and was unwearable. I sized down based on reviews and it was still too big to wear. Try two sizes down.

I am between 10-12 and I've ordered the 16 and 14 - both were too big. The biggest problem was how big it was on my B/C chest. The beautiful sequin straps hung limply down my back and the sides (by the armpits gaped. I don't even think the next size deon would work. This is definitely a dress where you need to tailor it and renting it doesn't work unless your body is just so. It's super sad because the fabric is beautiful - lustrous with a nice heft that speaks to the quality. Sad to send back.

links_reviews_title: This was for a wedding, and very disappointing
links_reviews_text: Fit runs very very small. I ordered this for my daughter. We ordered two sizes up. The waist line hit her right in the rib cage, and the top portion was too loose under the arms. Wanted to like it, but the fit just did not work.
Runs large everywhere. I sized down and it was too big.
Runs really big. The boob area is all kinds of funky for large chested girls. I wouldn't recommend renting this.
Glamorous Wonderful material Pockets (great for your phone and a lipstick) Runs VERY big

I tried this on for an upcoming summer wedding. It's gorgeous, nice heavy material and great back detail. I normally wear a 6 but the 10R/6 was way too big on top for me. I plan to rent this in the future a size down. Also would be better for a fall/winter event because of the weight of the material

links_reviews_title: I didn't realize how nice this dress was. It was too fancy for the restaurant I was going to.
links_reviews_text: It is a beautiful dress. It's very heavy and definitely would be a good option to wear to a formal event in the fall. It was way too large in the bust area. I possibly could have made it work but it wouldn't have been comfortable.

I really love this dress, but the UK 16/US 12 was just a bit too big for me (I am between a US 10/12). I am hoping to rent it again in the next size down because it's a beautiful dress! The sequin down the back adds a touch of fun and it would have been great for my event!

links_reviews_title: Almost stunning but I don't know who this dress is designed for.
links_reviews_text: On the one hand the dress is made of beautiful heavy fabric and has a nice weight to it (and pockets!) and the bare back with sequined straps is stunning. But because of the open back you clearly can't wear a bra, so would be great for my sisters with smaller breasts; but on the other hand the breast area of the dress runs rather large and even my un-swaddled breasts didn't fill out the large side-boob area. Not sure who would be flattered by this but I think silicone must be involved.

links_reviews_title: GORGEOUS but weird fit for my shape
links_reviews_text: Let me just say that this dress is truly beautiful. The material is heavy and luscious. However, the shape wasn't really for me (curvy, hourglass). It's fun to try on a dress this pretty though.

links_reviews_title: AMAZING - Welcome party for Mexico wedding
links_reviews_text: Literally amazing!! I wore this for a welcome party at a wedding in Mexico and it was amazing!! I am fairly large cheated (34DD) and it was perfect!! I did use a safety pin to pin it a bit but amazing. Also not right on the stomach at all so very flattering. I will definitely rent again!!

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, feminine but not fussy. Perfect for a beachside wedding.
links_reviews_text: Usually wear a size 6, but a size 8 in this fit perfectly. Fabric wasn't as premium as I would have expected from this line, but it still worked well after a good steam.

This is my second time renting this dress - which I very rarely do! But sometimes you just need something you know works for a special occasion. Off to a bridal shower. It's a little tight in the arms (I've got big arms/shoulders) so I can't drive in it. But it fits the girls for the most part so it's a win!
Dress fit great. Sleeves a little tight so I would never purchase but tons of compliments. Used a little top stick so bra wouldn't show at the cleavage. Wore to work and great for a party or dinner.

links_reviews_title: The peplum is a perfect touch to cover up a belly/heavy bloat day. It was light and breezy!
links_reviews_text: Great for a thick girl! Colors are purple, red, navy blue and blush so I wore nude shoes with it. I have a 40dd bust so I needed to pin it because I was in a church and didn't want to be a scandal. The fabric was terrific even in 90 degree heat. The sleeves fit around my biceps which measure at 16 inches around at the largest part. I can't recommend this enough!!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a hot summer wedding. Got some nice compliments on this one.
links_reviews_text: Dress was light and flowy. Very romantic and modest without feeling matronly. I was pleasantly surprised to find that it was not sheer or see through. Would highly recommend this one!
Extremely flattering and comfortable but wrinkles easily.

I rented this for a wedding and I felt comfortable and confident. I thought it was well-made and I liked playing off the colors with an added pop of coral shoes. I also thought that the floral print added something special to the dress but wasn't too loud/overwhelming. I got a lot of compliments and was overall very happy with this rental!
This was a perfect dress for my Hawaiian vacation. It's flattering and very feminine. I didn't need a slip underneath and also went bra-less.
I rented this dress for a birthday party! The dress is so pretty, but wrinkles easily! Fits true to size and flows perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Not the best fit or color for me!
links_reviews_text: Color wasn't great for me and not very flattering and made my chest look larger than normal

links_reviews_title: Super flattering, no spanx required and super feminine. It hit all of my marks!
links_reviews_text: Peplum, deep neckline

links_reviews_title: Wish it didn't wrinkle and was more wearable
links_reviews_text: Pretty design, really liked the detail in the stomach area. However this dress was wrinkled everywhere by 9:30 am at work. Also from s fit perspective I found the body of the dress to fit exactly in line with my size. Con: The arm holes were terrible - made the dress uncomfortable and impacted my mobility. The arm holes were not made of elastic and were cut small. I've never had this problem with a dress before. I couldn't lift my arm above my head because it was so tight.

links_reviews_title: The peplum on the stomach + the low cleavage didn’t work for my body type.
links_reviews_text: My stomach looked bigger than usual given the peplum ... and the low cleavage was inappropriate for the event I was going to (a work event.)

links_reviews_title: Too Big and Too Small at the same time!
links_reviews_text: The bust was way too large, the waist was way too tight and the length was way too long!
I usually wear a 2 in this cut a dress. I sized up to a 6 and was glad that I did. I am small chested and framed, but the top would have been too fitted for my liking if I had ordered a 2.

links_reviews_title: It's a bit small but cute!
links_reviews_text: it was too small. Not true to size. Runs small small small

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear the garment because it ran so small.
links_reviews_text: I wish I had pics to share. This truly is a beautiful dress. However, it runs very small. Barely got it over my head. Once I did, I realized that was pretty much as far as I'd be able to go!
Fun and flirty. Nice for dinner out. Very comfy and fits nicely.
The arms run very small on this dress

links_reviews_title: The dress is too long to wear.
links_reviews_text: The dress is definitely too long for me

links_reviews_title: If you are busty, this is not for you
links_reviews_text: I am 38D bust and this made me look even bustier. Returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Had either a napa trip or work conference coming up that I could chose based on how dressy this was.
links_reviews_text: Nothing special, dress just hangs and was the cheap looking polyester fabric I do not historically like. Returned without wearing.
I found this dress very flattering and would rent this again. The only drawback is that the top is very low cut and needs a safety pin to keep it from being too revealing.

links_reviews_title: Fitted and flattering dress, neckline is a little low for busty ladies
links_reviews_text: Really pretty pattern and easy to dress up or down. The cut is low and I ended up having to tack it for a little more modesty. The shoulders are a little stiff / make it difficult to raise your arms.
Beautiful dress. The top of the dress is form fitting, and super duper low cut. With a simple cami worn under it, it was the perfect dress for college graduation.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so light and easy to wear with the super hot temps outside
links_reviews_text: Only problem with the fit is that there is a waist band in the back and it was positioned too high on my back -- which means that I was probably a bit too tall for the dress.

Flattering cut. tight in the shoulders/arms (which is weird because I'm short!) so opted not to wear this out dancing to a wedding but would have looked fab if I just planned on standing or sitting all night. Would wear to a formal affair where my arms wouldn't need to be swinging up in the air all night ;)
Weird fit up top

links_reviews_title: I liked it but it is cut low
links_reviews_text: It fit well
This dress can pass with flats or high heels, nice fit. Would rent again.
Really pretty dress perfect for a wedding. It was also super comfortable and Verh flattering on a big chest and concealing a baby bump (or bloat).

links_reviews_title: Dreamy, blush floral print dress for the win... but do know, the sleeves/arm holes suck.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, but the arms/arm holes and bust are very tight and constricting—barely able to lift your arms. Otherwise, it's a great print and flattering silhouette that worked well for the wedding shower I attended.

links_reviews_title: Wore to step-daughters rehearsal dinner and fashion show.
links_reviews_text: Great fit and forgiving in the tummy area.

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear the dress for my closing
links_reviews_text: tight in the arms and chest
Cute dress, runs small
As a 36B in the bust, it was a little gape-y and showed a bit of my bra, but nothing super revealing.
Loved it. Fit really well and was really flattering to my pear shape figure. TONS of compliments. Would consider buying just too expensive!
Way too small in the bust. I couldn't wear it.
This dress is gorgeous. And so comfortable. I didn't even need to wear spanx. It's heavier material, but still easy to wear. I got so many compliments. Definitely not a typical dress. Loved it!

Great fit, very flattering and comfortable. Tons of compliments! Best worn with a racerback bra (or strapless). No Spanx required (yay!) because of the thick fabric and body skimming, not body hugging, fit.
This dress was comfortable and fit well. I didn't have to wear a bra either!

I loved this dress so much! Shoshanna is one of my favorite brands to start, so I had a feeling I would love this dress. I wore it to a black tie optional wedding, and it was such a hit! The fit was great, it fit well all over (I didn't even have to wear spanx!!). Would definitely recommend this dress for your next event!!

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear for a formal occasion
links_reviews_text: I didn't find the waist quite as big as some other reviewers, at least in my size. This is a very comfortable dress. If you're busty like me, you may find yourself a bit crammed in up top. Overall super easy to wear, and not too hot for the summer.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Fit great and got tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: The pattern / embroidery on this dress is stunning in person. I have a small waist and larger hips. Normally in a dress that's form fitting like this I would get an 8 for my hips but the 6 (my normal size) fit perfectly. There is no stretch in the fabric but it was very easy to dance in all night.
Very comfortable

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress is a winner for any occasion. I wore it to a spring outdoor wedding, it was comfortable, hugs in all the right places and solicited mutuale compliments! There is no stretch to this fabric and it runs large, I sized down one size. The fabric is beautiful lace and the colors are subtle but stunning. I would definitely rent again!

Pros: loved the length and the dramatic lace. Very comfortable, and the flare at the bottom gave it that extra pizzazz. Cons: I added a small belt to my waist because it didn't accentuate my curves. But with the belt at the waist, I thought it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: New favorite dress of all time!
links_reviews_text: So many compliments! I normally wear a 4-6 and the 2R fit perfectly -- a little snug in the bust, but otherwise very forgiving. Really made me look more hourglass shaped than I am. And I could actually breathe, dance, and eat with ease!
Fit like a glove.

This felt great to wear--the heavy embroidery contrasted nicely with the swirly hem. For you other pears out there, the inner lining definitely rides up if you get the size that fits your waist. Be prepared to tug.

I'm 5'9 145lbs and usually wear a 4 in dresses. After reading reviews I decided to order both the 2 and 4, and ended up going with the 2. It fit snugly in my hips and bust, but was still loose in the waist/stomach so I used a few safety pins on the inside side seams to draw in the waist for the look I wanted. Pros: Arrived on time, and in beautiful condition. I received many compliments on it! Cons: The navy lining rode up several inches when dancing. I needed to step into the restroom a few times to adjust. Overall, a success!
This dress fit like a glove and was so comfortable. Only downside is that it was sort of an awkward length since I'm 5'2"

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Made very well and fit true to size. Very comfortable and easy to dance in.
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments. Very comfortable and pretty dress.
This dress is a comfortable fit so it does not cling. It is a beautiful lace overlay. I got many compliments and would consider renting this again! The length and flounce is very flattering.

Glad I read the reviews to go a size or two down. I liked this dress. The detail around the neck and shoulders was pretty. The texture was thicker than I envisioned and could be a wintery dress but I think it was OK for spring.

links_reviews_title: Perfect in between cocktail and formal
links_reviews_text: Definitely runs big so size down. With that info I was able to choose the right size and it worked great. I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Was snug in all of the right places. I was worried with my body type, but it was flattering!
links_reviews_text: The lining did ride up some throughout the day as I was moving around a lot. Otherwise, it was comfortable for a long day of horse racing. Would definitely rent again.
Loved the dress, got many compliments. I usually wear an 8, this was a 6 and fit perfect. Super comfortable too.

Gorgeous dress! I sized down after reading reviews and loved the dress and fit- the underlay is separate so I had to adjust it after dancing but comfortable and very flattering dress. I'd rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Dress was comfortable, sophisticated and a little sexy.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and a bit pear shaped, but also athletic. I feel like this style really worked well for me because the open shoulders showed that I've been keeping up with my yoga routine (haha) but the lacy overlay skimmed over the rest of my frame nicely. I didn't wear a bra with this (32C) and had zero issues with a potential wardrobe malfunction. I'm pretty conservative, so this dress was a fun way to stand out while staying in my comfort zone.

This is a gorgeous dress. The lace is stunning and the colors are vibrant. I'm running a 14 these days and I could have worn the 10 had it not been an eating event. It also didn't pick the 10 because it flattened the chest. Overall I liked this, but the waist is odd. The photos show a distinct seam, but the dress does not have one. That's why it's a bit baggy in the waist. Dress best for taller ladies, as it's on the longer side.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 2 and a 4, but the 4 was large in the stomach and hips. The was perfect, with the exception of some tightness in the neck/collarbone area. The dress was really comfortable and easy to sit/dance in. I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dancing dress if you gave hips
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my body. Surprising for me it was actually big in midsection so absolutely no need for spans. Accented my hips and the flare meant I was a dancing queen. I also know this cut at the top works well for my muscular not too skinny arms- overall I would get a 6 next time and hopefully there would be less extra fabric near stomach though the 8 meant for a very comfortable wedding guest!

links_reviews_title: Nice Dress Especially If You're Tall!
links_reviews_text: It felt tightest on my chest- so if you are busty I would recommend maybe a size up! I didn't have the curves for the dress but it's very nice!

Love this dress and will probably rent again! Very comfy and flattering! I usually need 8 up top but had tons of extra room all around so that's the only reason I said ran large however it was nice that it wasnt super tight :)
Loved this dress - fit very well, loved the neck line. Received tons of compliments. Added a velvet navy shawl, since it was a January snowstorm outside. Would rent again!

I'm usually a 2 or 4 but after reading the reviews I decided to order size 2 and size 0 as a back up. The dress is stunning with pretty lace details. However it's running big on me even the size 0 especially around the waist. I had to use the safety pin to make it slightly tighter but it wasn't ideal. Overall I'm satisfied with how I look with the dress but I wish it can be more fitted.
Very good quality dress. Flattering and comfortable. I got lots of compliments. Felt amazing in this dress

It was my first time to use RTRW, so as a bonus, I was able to order a back up dress. My original back up dress was unavailable, so RTRW selected this as an alternative. I don't think I would have chosen this one myself. I wore my first choice dress to the event. This one was less formal, so I wore it with some killer silver motorcycle boots and a jeans jacket to church! A little over dressed, but no one noticed. I love dresses like this .... high quality, perfect fit, kind of a thick lace fabric, very flattering. ..... oh it was just so nice. I loved it!
I found this dress forgiving and flattering. I am post partum, so it is not tight in the stomach but still has shape. The pattern and color were unique, and I liked the neckline

links_reviews_title: Special dress for semi formal wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! I'm fairly chesty, short, with post-two kids belly; it's really hard to find a beautiful dress that's not either frumpy or revealing or way to long. This dress was perfect. It was unique and a lovely shape without showing off my cleavage. And it was comfortable as well. Just beware the zipper; it's pretty tough without help! And the service was superb! I got my shipment sent to my hotel since it was an out of town wedding and then dropped it off at the airport UPS Dropbox. Easy!

links_reviews_title: I like it but will probably not rent again.
links_reviews_text: looks beautiful and comfy - size 4R is too big on me, i'm 5'4' 1130 lbs,

Wore to my son' christening. I normally wear size 10/12. I wore an 8 in this dress and may have even gotten away with a 6. The stomach was a little baggy under the breast but couldn't tell with the print. So many compliments and photographed beautifully.
Great fit, very comfortable, many compliments!!
Quality fabric. Perfect for a warm fall wedding

Runs Large. Ordered 12-10. Ended up ordering an 8 which fit perfect! Absolutely love this style and dress. Perfect shape for hourglass/pear body type. My hips measure for a size 12. That is why I ordered a 12. So this dress does run large. 2 sizes. Not a lot of stretch. My recommendations is to size down 1-2 sizes. Then you will have great results and love this dress!
Rented this dress for a special fall event - lovely navy/burgundy fall colors and fit perfectly! Was very comfortable and perfect for a semi-formal event. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Receiving this gorgeous dress that fit perfectly! So many compliments on my first RTR experience!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect! The material was great for a fall wedding! The colors in this dress are gorgeous! Paired with navy shoes and gold handbag and earrings, I absolutely loved it!
The zipper is the toughest part for this top. Wore to work with black slacks and pumps. Pretty feminine lace. Hard to zip up/down if you don't have help around!

links_reviews_title: Want to buy this top! Easy to dress up or down.
links_reviews_text: I looove this top and am considering buying it. It was easy to dress it down and it's super flattering. The back of it is also really pretty. Love it!
Wore this to bday dinner, cute and sexy. I paired with leather jacket, added a chip cool looking. True to size
Bigger breasts order up a size. I'm a DDD, 8. Maybe wish I had ordered a 10.
Gorgeous top! Would rent again.

Perfect top for a birthday brunch. The navy details are a little hard to tell except in sunlight but the top was gorgeous and fit like a glove. Am a 4/6 in most items, wearing a 4 here. There is nude colored light mesh fabric over the chest so you're not completely bare
The fit was off so I didn't wear this before returning it but it was super cute in person.

Just a beautiful top for a special night out - can be dressed up or down. I was shocked I didn't need a bra, bc I always need a bra (36DD). It is super low cut, which normally I would not wear but there was sheer lace material over it and it just made me feel super beautiful, sexy and confident. The fit is so flattering! Loved it and would buy it!! Will definitely rent again!
I liked this shirt because it was unique. Got a few compliments too. The only con was I was you have to wear a strapless bra and I was pulling it up all night.
Glam, sexy
This top is comfortable and very flattering. I loved it!
Rented to wear on a night out. No bra due to the shoulder cuts and it makes you look great. Not tight across stomach which was nice given we were eating and as soon as I eat a pea I look pregnant.

This top is an absolute showstopper. All eyes were on me! I wore this out to lunch and wine tasting for a bachelorette party. I was actually able to wear a strapless bra with it, but I could've gone without. It's a little uncomfortable to sit in because it has a hook and eye closure in the middle of the back, but other than that it was so great!
I want to keep this!!! It was so sexy and beautiful and stunning. Will definitely rent again

This top is beautiful. It does run ratber small and I feel even when I sized up because of the way the shirt goes fitted at the waistline and with no stretch, sitting down makes it uncomfortable but it's so beautiful I didn't care. My husband and everyone that saw a picture said i needed to own it😍.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top, lace detailing looks expensive!
links_reviews_text: I'm between a 6 and a 8 and I sized up, as per the other reviews. I got the 8 and I'm glad I did. I have a little belly and the peplum is obviously not an ideal style for trying to cover that, but I should have known. As for my pic, the reason I threw on the jean jacket is b/c I was going out to dinner on a wed night and felt over dressed. I disagree with the other reviews that this can be dressed up or down. It's pretty dressy for a tank top! Really beautiful lace detail. Overall I really liked it

I wore this peplum blouse for an afternoon brunch with friends to celebrate our graduation. It fit perfectly, the material was soft and breathable, and the lace falls flat and comfortably. The back has a keyhole closure. I paired it with black leggings and slides and wore it on a rather hot and humid day but felt comfortable nonetheless. Great top for date night, brunch, etc. or under a blazer for a work to play outfit.
I wore this for a wine tasting and it was a hit! It fit well--definitely a really unique look, too. Overall, would rent again!
Looked great
Sexy sexy loved everything about it Wore with Capri pants

links_reviews_title: Feeling so confident in my outfit
links_reviews_text: The detailing on this shirt is incredible. I love the peplum waist.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty style for date night
links_reviews_text: In the dead of winter, I rented this top to heat up a date night. Although it was under my jacket half the night, the flirty details could not be hidden. Definitely memorable. A little tight around the chest with the lace material.

links_reviews_title: Size up for lace peplum perfection
links_reviews_text: I rented this to switch up my heels and dress date routine and loved it! Paired with dark jeans, thigh high boots and a red lip, I got compliments from my man and was comfortable on the dance floor all night long! I sized up per some recommendations and was glad I went with an 8 instead of my usual 6.
N/A
Definitely a versatile top thet can be worn with jeans or leggings. Perfect for date night.
Loved this top and would rent again. Its fitted but not uncomfortable. Thankfully i didnt need to wear a bra

I always size up in Marchesa Notte because I find them quite tight around the rib cage/bust so I wore an 8 instead of a 6. I love the look of this top, wore a strapless bra and it worked perfectly. The little flair and the details are amazing. Definitely recommend! Best with high waisted pants since the top isn't very long.
True to size. I am a true 4 and this fit very comfortably. The lace has no stretch. It can fit a larger bust. Dressed up with Marchesa earrings. Wore it dinner and drinks. Will rent again!
Pictures do not do this shirt justice. It is absolutely beautiful in person and it fits perfectly true to size. Do not size up or down. It fits perfectly and is really just beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Fit was perfect and can be dressed up or down, I felt so feminine and chic!
links_reviews_text: The middle is a mesh but not noticeable
This is my secong time renting this top! I absolutely love the fit and style. I feel secure enough to dance and have fun without a bra but I also feel sexy and confident!
Super cute top! I️ wore it to a brunch with my girlfriends and it was a complete hit. Paired with a pair of jeans, it was simple, but sexy. Definitely true to size. Perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: wore to a wine tasting, loved every minute in this top!
links_reviews_text: purple is very dark, almost black. the lace, pleating, and cut-out detailing were very ornate/delicate (exactly what you expect out of marchesa!); definitely can't wear a bra with this. Ordered a 2 as my back-up size and glad I did - it fit like a glove.
Fits true to size. Very cute top that can be dressed up or down depending on occasion. Received numerous compliments.

This top is even prettier in person! The detailing at the neck and the peplum bottom were my favorite. There is no stretch to this shirt - I would size up for your backup. This works best for A to C bust sizes. I would wear no bra or a nubra with this because of the way it is cut.
This top I loved, however I have a size D cup and I could not zip up the back, so I will try to get a larger size.
Great quality. Sexy and classy at the same time.
Runs waaayyyyt small. Also, this was made for very short-torsoed girls. Didn't work for me at all
Loved this! wearing it again this weekend. Love the lace Little bit of room in the chest area, but I wore a strapless bra and it helped.
Lots of compliments

As many reviewers mention, this top is much sexier than you think. The tight fit and chest slit make it a show stopper. I almost thought it was too sexy for work, but I wore to work anyway. The fit is very tight. I think it is supposed to be tight so I say this is TTS. However, it a bit difficult to stretch over my head (especially after hair and makeup were already finished). But once on, it fit like a second layer of skin. Loved!
This shirt is tight but really sexy without being too much. My love told me I had to buy it so I did.
Wore to bachelorette party. Fits very well. Does not ride up. Conservative with sexy twist with the chest slit. Amazing material. Might end up buying!

This shirt is very body fitting, kind of difficult to get on and get your chest situated in. Once you over come that hurdle I loved the fit and feel of the shirt. Could dress up or down for lots of occasions. Definitely not made for large chested women. Reminds me of Lycra material and had a built in bra that I wouldn't solely rely on. I liked the way it was on my shoulders and the slit at the top was what gave it flare.
This is under the radar sexy, so unique. The material is kind of rubbery? But it's very flattering. I wore a bra with it.

Perfect everyday shirt. You can pair it with a skirt or even with jeans. It does run on the smaller side, so I would suggest sizing up. It is very fitted, and works best for cup sizes A-C, if you are busty, this may not work for you. You can wear this with any bra, standard works just fine. Pair it with a cute blazer, the cut out gives you just the perfect amount of shown skin.

This top is like a spanx you wear on the outside. It is VERY fitted. So , to be transparent, I am 56 yrs old and a 34 DD... I definitely NEED to wear a bra, a strapless bra, but if you can go bra-less this is your top. I am the worst selfie taker, but this top really is amazing. My hubby loved it and wants me to buy it. Just rent it, you will be very happy!!!

I feel like this runs true to size for the brand - which runs large overall. That said, this shirt is made to be form fitting but is made of a nice, smoothing material, so being +/-1 size from your normal is no big deal. The material in the arms is much thinner, stretchier and less compressing. I ended up 2 sizes from what I'd normally wear in this brand, and the only place I felt it was how the top piece of fabric sat when I wasn't sitting up super straight. It was really only noticeable to me, as I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing because it's too long on my torso, but love the Chiara boni fabric and cut.
links_reviews_text: It was brand new (tag on) so ran a bit small but will stretch. Very cute, great fabric, just too long on my short torso to work with jeans.

links_reviews_title: absolutely love this! super cute and so flattering. sexy but not over the top
links_reviews_text: a little hard to put on but so worth it

links_reviews_title: Another Win for La Petite Robe
links_reviews_text: I only took off a star, as I have a long torso, and I wish this would have been a little longer. A great top for a night out; classy and sexy without being overtly so...
Very flattering and sultry winter rental. Wore it to a formal event with a full ball gown but you could also wear it out to dinner with pants. Love this brand and their fabric.

The fabric is tight in the way that smoothes out rolls and wrinkles -- which is good news is you're looking for a top that acts like SPANX. I didn't have an occasion for this one so I didn't end up wearing it. Beautifully made but size up.
got lots of compliments on it. Does tend to ride up on top a little.
Lovely top a crowd pleaser!
Sooo tight on me. Wasn't very comfortable
Nice top; looked great. sexy

links_reviews_title: Too sexy for everyday - nice for a hot date
links_reviews_text: Loved the top but didn't have anywhere to wear it. It is a bit too sexy for everyday but might be nice for a night out. Do not need to wear a bra as the material holds you in. Will rent again if I have something to wear it to

This black shirt was made of an awesome material. I wore a formal like this recently. My only problem with this top was the very large horizontal slit right at the top of my cleavage. I was not prepared for that. It was the reason it didn't get worn. Other than that, the top was amazing. I would not have needed a bra because it held my form.
Wore this with jeans for a night out and liked the look. I thought the sleeve material was a little weird but once on, it looked good.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this top because it was way too small.
links_reviews_text: I love the top but it was so tight with little give so I had to peel it off! It's super cute, I just ordered the wrong size. I typically pick an xs in Vince or Joie and other tops I go for a Sm and it's great because i like shirts to have a more tailored look. This one must be an exception. I'll try again and size up a bit next time because with no zippers or stretch to the fabric you can't really make it work!
did not care for the material reminded me of scuba gear.

links_reviews_title: This is very flattering for all shapes and sizes
links_reviews_text: I didn't even have to wear a bra and I'm busty!

The fabric of this shirt was strange for me. The body is kind of scuba like and the sleeves were more flowy. It was also very tight. Ended up not wearing it bc I thought I would just be uncomfortable.
This top is way too tight and you can't wear a bra with it.
Fabrics was thick and hugged in all the right places! Turned many heads with this simple But flattering shirt. I plan to purchase this one!

I usually wear XS / 0-2 and rented this in 38. It fit, but the fabric is not stretchy, so my shoulders were squeezed in. I couldn't continue wearing it. Probably great for shorter, petit frames. It looks lovely, just make sure to size up, especially if you are tall!

links_reviews_title: The shirt was nice for the office.
links_reviews_text: The arm holes were pretty tight.

links_reviews_title: Felt like trying to get into a scuba suit
links_reviews_text: Too difficult to get on and off.

I wore this to a fancy dinner for my husband's birthday and it was very flattering. It showed off my figure without being too revealing and I felt beautiful in it. I was able to wear a regular bra with this top.

links_reviews_title: Material is very stretchy and too tight.
links_reviews_text: The material is very stretchy and too tight. The cut fit a little strange on the shoulder too.
You do not need a bra with this bad boy, but the fabric in the back tends to stick up, it was strange. Cute top, very original.
The style is quite cute, but the material is very odd (think wetsuit). I still wore it for its cute factor, but I wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Classy and sexy, but sits weirdly on shoulders
links_reviews_text: Classy and sexy, great material but runs small. Sits weirdly on shoulders. The jumpsuit version of this top seems to be made from higher quality material. Although I love the style of this top, not sure I would rent it again because I had to keep pulling it down to sit properly on my shoulders - or maybe I need to size up even more. This is a "near miss".

links_reviews_title: Tag says Large but too me, it;s more like a small
links_reviews_text: Material is a very tight lycra....shows every.single.roll. I would not recommend this top unless you have a concave stomach lol
Cute super tight and a little risqué
Its really tight, which could be a good thing. The bottom of the shirt rolls up easily as you move and since its a tight shirt, when it rolls up, it rolls all the way up! I didn't wear it in the end.

links_reviews_title: Love this top - I actually own a dress with similar detail at top and sleeve.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted and great to wear slightly off the shoulder but will need a strapless bra.
I sized up on this top and it was still skin tight. It was comparable to putting on a scuba suit. The cut is cute, but I don't like my clothes super tight.

links_reviews_title: Went well with a fun Varadero Sweater Skirt
links_reviews_text: A bit snug, but looks great.

links_reviews_title: Super classy option for Second Trimester!
links_reviews_text: This dress for like a dream! Definitely recommend maternity spanx underneath, but otherwise, it was everything I hoped for! The stretch of the dress accommodated my 20week bump without feeling right or uncomfortable! Definitely a great choice!

Showstopper. Beautiful vibrant blue color. I manage a gala event - so while it was a formal party for all the guests - it was a work event for me. Dress was super comfortable - thick fabric with just enough stretch & give. Work-appropriate coverage, yet fun & interesting detail. I got tons of compliments. Definitely recommend going for this one!

I rented this for a luncheon that Julie Andrews was speaking at and felt this style had a fun collar that would be perfect. I had so many people stop me to compliment what a great dress it was. It's very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a million bucks. Awesome & unique dress!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and I hated to send it back. Gorgeous color and fantastic design. A special dress for a special event.

Beautiful, elegant dress that's comfortable and flattering. It stretches in the right places. And you don't have to wear a strapless bra because the shoulders are covered. If you're between sizes, I recommend going up.

My friends joked that I looked like I was running for Senate. It's your typical thick, structured Badgley Mishcka fabric, which I love. It was form fitting, which is how I prefer my dresses, so it was spot on in that regard.

I sized up from my usual 12 as I wear a 36 E and am hourglass. I wore this from work to evening events with women stopping me everywhere I went. It was polished, comfortable and a superior quality. I would love to have this as a permanent edition to my closet.
Loved the way the dress fit and the color was gorgeous. I wore this dress to a tea party and received SO many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I've rented this before and ALWAYS receive compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and great fit. I highly recommend.
Beautiful dress. NOT for wearing I'm hot or humid weather. This is a heavy fabric and with the overlay on top it's even heavier. Beautiful dress If you are too heavy it's going to accent that.

This dress was the result of a last minute decision because I'd been unsuccessful in finding just the right outfit for our anniversary. As soon as I saw this dress I KNEW! I received so many compliments and it fit as if it had been custom made. I'm thrilled that I said yes to this dress!
Slightly small in the waist, but the cape took away from that. Great for a gala

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit length and color for the mom of the College grad
links_reviews_text: This gorgeous dress is perfection. The built in cape with shoulder bow adds a touch of class and makes the dress so unique. The dress is form fitting so a good shaped is recommended.

Beautiful rich blue color. Cape and bow give it a bit of sass without being too much. Fabric is thick and forgiving with a little stretch. This was the perfect dress for an outdoor fundraising event in the spring.
I wore this for a spring wedding and I received a ton of compliments. The dress fits great in all the right places and the bow and drape look makes it stand out!!! #wedding #K2_SaysIDo

links_reviews_title: Felt like Jackie O! Elegant, and lovely.
links_reviews_text: 28 weeks and a larger size fit the bump. It was snug, but not constricting. I could sit, eat and use the restroom easily. Tons of compliments. The reviews were all accurate!

links_reviews_title: OMG. This dress was EVERY BIT OF AMAZING!! I am 3-0 with my dress experiences with RTR! WINNING!
links_reviews_text: The quality of this dress was phenomenal-thick material and nice to touch. I was called elegant, timeless, luxe, and stunning all in one night! The fit was perfection. The shade of this dress resembles a Sapphire Blue hue, and luckily I found shoes that were the same color. This dress is perfection. I will continue to rent again! Bless you RTR!
I loved this dress and so did everyone else. I liked the fit of this dress in size 6; it hugged my features. Definitely suggest this dress to anyone with curves!
This dress is so great. I was 19.5 weeks pregnant when I wore it. It was flattering. The color is beautiful. That cape is a show-stopper. I felt like Fleur from Harry Potter.
Love this dress! Rented for my daughter's Baptism and then wore for my company's National Training Meeting. So many compliments!
This dress is perfect! I'm 5'3", 138 lbs. I wore a size 4.

I wore this for a pre-pageant prep seminar, received many compliments on it, and felt like a million bucks! If I owned it I'd have it altered to be a bit more form fitting but for renting purposes it was just fine. Nice heavy fabric which was appropriate for late winter with a wrap over it when outdoors and without in climate-controlled areas.
The detail of the cape all around added a great flare. The color was vibrant. The fabric felt great. I had so many complements!

links_reviews_title: This was a charity event for my daughter’s sorority.
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 4 or 6 depending on the brand, so I ordered both sizes and the 4 fit perfectly!
This dress is GORGEOUS!! Hugs in all the right places & the cape/collar makes it truly unforgettable.

links_reviews_title: I pulled this dress for my engagement photos and I felt incredibly stylish.
links_reviews_text: Obsessed! I wasn't sure I could pull off the capelet, but had to try it because of the color - and it worked! The fit was relaxed around the hips and waist and the length was below the knees on my 5'0'' stature.

This was a great dress overall. It received so many compliments. The caplet added enough warmth and made it appropriate for a winter event. The hips are tight if you have a larger lower half (like myself). A little help from Spanx and it worked great!
Rented for New Year's Eve. Very fancy and beautiful color. Fabric is heavy and keeps a good shape. Such a flattering neckline. So many compliments

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a date night with my husband to The Nutcracker. Love it. Wish I could buy it.
links_reviews_text: Fit very well. The material is very nice.
It was a bit loose but still a great fit!

If you are a house of cards far you will know what I mean. This dress is amazing! The color is very electric blue and very vibrant. The built in cape almost leans towards a mad men style. I got a 6 since a smaller size was not available. It was a bit big on me but love it nonetheless. I wish RTR had more styles like this!

This dress was the more conservative of my options but I went with it and it was a huge hit. I wore it to my office holiday party and received an abundance of compliments, starting with the doorman. Comfortable and classy!

links_reviews_title: I had a trial & felt very empowered in this dress as if I had put on my armor.
links_reviews_text: The fabric is heavy so the top is very big. I felt very "protected" in the dress; the top almost felt like armor because it is big & heavy. Not a lot of movement with the top. I enjoyed this dress. It is not very slimming, but it definitely does not add weight. The color is stunning.
Wore this dress to my son's wedding and got compliments all night. It was comfortable and looked great in photos. Will definitely rent this one again!
Dress fits good, runs big, very thick material. Nicely made. I received tons of compliments for the dress.

A little heavy for this dress but boy did everyone stare - it's really sophisticated and has an amazing color - absolutely loved it - would be great for a Sunday morning brunch or whenever you want to feel extra pretty! Loved so much! A little large but not noticeable - I just like my clothes more fitted

links_reviews_title: This was a beautiful dress to wear on graduation day as the Vice Principal!
links_reviews_text: super classy and flattering! great material!!
I wore this to a business reception and dinner and it was perfect. I was worried about the top as I have large breasts but it deemphasized my top and my waist looked small. I loved the color as well.

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit PERFECTLY. I was worried it would be small and I wasn't able to get a backup size. The pockets are amazing. I wish it was floor length all the way around, but everyone else loved the high low! My bra showed a little on the sides near the armpits, but as long as my arms were down, it wasn't noticable.

links_reviews_title: I didn't want to take this dress off! So many compliments and with pockets!! So comfortable too
I felt so pretty and it's very comfortable
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a charity event, and I felt gorgeous! It was very flattering, I could wear a normal bra, it's not thick material I didn't even wear spanx! Also orb has pockets which made it even better!

I wasn't sure about the low/high length, but it looked adorably chic. You will totally have to wear super high heels with it, so beware of that. Totally worth the rental, though. Got many compliments on it. The dress is sexy without meaning to.

links_reviews_title: People stopped me to compliment the dress all night.
I GOT SO MANY COMPLIMENTS ON THIS DRESS!
links_reviews_text: I tend to be in between sizes so I grabbed the 2 and the 4 of this dress. The 2 was comfortable and did not feel small anywhere, at all. Did not try on the 4. I am small-chested, so I may recommend sizing up if you are more endowed than I am. The "high" part of the high-low hit me below the knee as pictured, It's long, in heels it was just above the ground. The skirt is full and I loved it! Made getting into and out of the car a bit complicated but so worth it. I am not comfortable in strapless bras, so I was hoping to be able to wear a normal bra with this dress. The dress cuts just inside the bra straps, but I WAS able to cross my bra straps with no showing. Would be fine with a strapless, too, obviously. I liked this dress so much I found it at another online retailer and bought it!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing and my boyfriend was stunned by my look
links_reviews_text: The 14 fit, but I went with the 16 so I could sit and eat comfortably. When my boyfriend saw me in the dress, he was actually speechless. He couldn't take his eyes off me the entire night! I got several compliments at the restaurant and we just had such as amazing night, I just wish I had gotten a photo with my boyfriend. I will definitely rent from here in the future!

links_reviews_title: I'm a short woman and the train was just perfect.
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, I'm 5'2" 190lbs, wore a 16R. The length was perfect with 2" heels. The fabric is lovely and pockets are a major plus. This is one of my favorite rentals ever.
This dress was wonderful! Everyone loved it and it was very comfy! The dress ran just a little smaller than I usually wear, so I'm glad I got the size up, but overall I LOVED it!!

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit, comfortable and tons of compliments! Plus pockets
I wore this to a formal event.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress, it fit great and was so elegant. The metallic of the flowers pops so much more than they do in the pictures, and is really pretty in person. The pockets were also so fun, and they're a decent size - I kept my keys and phone in them all night, and it didn't affect the lay of the dress or fall out while dancing.

I got compliments all night long in this dress. It is beautiful in person! I ended up wearing the size 4, which was slightly too big in the chest area. I couldn't wear the 2 because it was slightly too small in the chest area. I'm a 34B. I think it does run true to size overall but slightly small in the chest area. The best part was the pockets! The only other thing to note, is the length. I wish it came in a tall. Being 5'8" it was slightly too short with tall heels.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a princess! Just felt glamorous and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The halter top of the dress was comfortable and secure. I am 8 months postpartum and have not been exercising as often as before and this dress was SO flattering! I felt amazing in it and received compliments all night long! It was comfortable to sit and walk around in. I am 5'6" and the back of the dress is long. I wore 4" heels and they kept it nicely off the floor. The dress would flare out if I spun around and had a beautiful flow to it as I walked. Loved everything about it!
Amazing dress that made me feel so classy and beautiful. Can't go wrong with this dress!!

links_reviews_title: My kids said I looked like Cinderella!
links_reviews_text: I bounce from a 14-16; this 14 fit, but was snug. The 16 fit perfectly and looked beautiful! I felt like a princess and got a compliment from a complete stranger at the event, so I'd say this dress was a win!

This dress fit great in the bodice and I liked that I didn't have to worry about a form fitted lower half throughout the night. Got lots and lots of compliments, and pockets are always a plus. It was a tad bit long on me since I'm 5'2, but the high low design is really helpful for that.

links_reviews_title: When the fedex chap stops delivering to stare open mouthed at you in appreciation, you chose Well!!!
links_reviews_text: Showstopping dress. Compliments all night long at the black tie Hollywood event we had to attend. I felt like one of the nominees on the red carpet! It has pockets! It is fully lined and feels expensive. And everyone gave me second looks all night thinking I was someone famous! Do yourself a favor and twirl in it and have someone take a slo motion video. Stunning. You'll feel like a movie star.

links_reviews_title: Dress was gorgeous and I received so many compliments
links_reviews_text: The dress was absolutely stunning. The colors were breathtaking (pictures do not do it justice). The top was fitted but still allowed me to breathe and the skirt had my mid section and flowed perfectly. The back was a little long but I wore a 2" heal which kept it from dragging on the ground. I wore a standard bra but hooked in the middle in order to hide the straps (a racer back bra would probably of worked but didn't have one). I received so many compliments throughout the night.
Loved the pockets, length, print...great dress!

I was hesitant to buy this dress because I wasn't sure about the colors, but this dress was so great and exceeded my expectations. The material wasn't particularly high quality, but the dress was so comfortable. I wore it for nearly 8 hours! It fit like a glove and felt super flattering. It also has pockets, which I always love. I think other reviews mention that it's short, and I agree, someone who was really tall wouldn't be able to wear super tall heels, I was fine because I'm short.

links_reviews_title: You gotta try it... at least once
links_reviews_text: I was honestly surprised by the ease of packaging. I had rented two dresses, one was this beautiful red strapless dress that I got in my true size and a size above because even though my waist is small, I have a large bust. I didn't want to deal with the hassle of pulling my dress up. Either way, it didn't zip because I like some room in my waist line and so I'm glad I had a backup which was more elegant. Many compliments received!

This dress is fabulous! Loved the way it fit and the fact it had pockets. Great for petites because of the shorter front. It does have a bit of a train but nothing crazy. There is a ball gown poof feel but nothing too crazy. Just enough.
Great Fit and very forgiving cut for my belly area. Very comfortable and easy to dance in. Loved that it showed off the legs. Got so many compliments for this dress!

links_reviews_title: Felt fabulous! Perfect fit, beautiful and pockets!
Perfect for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress! Got tons of compliments all night. The flowers stand out beautifully and it has pockets! It fit well and was the perfect length with my heels. Felt beautiful in it!
bit tight on the chest, otherwise great length for someone who is 5'8" without heels
Fit perfect! Loved the pockets!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and ended up buying it!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress and fit perfectly. So elegant and perfect for any special occasion.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an Evening Black Tie Event!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress so much I went on the hunt to buy one. It's flattering, comfortable, and it has pockets. I got tons of compliments and felt so pretty in it. The skirt is a little poofier than it looks like it will be in the photo but it didn't matter to me. It flows so nicely and is perfect for swirling and dancing. 10/10 would rent again.

This is a great dress which is very comfortable for a night at a formal event. The pockets are fairly deep and easily hold a phone without anyone noticing! I found it to be perfect for dancing and everyone complimented the rose gold metallic flowers. Enjoy your night!

This dress is very high waisted and would work great for a baby bulge or for maybe for an apple shape. It works but is not highly flattering on a hour glass shape. It has an 18th century vibe, but has a glamorous sheen. The open ankle area seems super trendy and may not work forever.
Fit's true to size
I am very busty and this dress has no give. I will say, it is even more gorgeous in person. It was my backup dress and the main dress was the go-to.
It was a good dress! Looks great on me
It was a little tight in the bust I am 36 D. It fit perfectly otherwise. Very comfortable and the pockets were amazing! I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: it was a beautiful dress! stayed put while dancing all night at a wedding.
links_reviews_text: true to size, I'm 5'4 135 lb, size 6 fit perfectly.
Easy to dance in and did not wrinkle in suitcase
Does fit tight in the rib cage, but AMAZING dress and everyone was obsessed. Photographs so well and the picture doesn't do it justice!
If I could justify keeping this dress I would in a heartbeat. I felt the most beautiful I have ever felt because it fit so well and looked amazing. A definite must rent and will be on my repeat list.
This dress is absolutely stunning in person, however it runs quite small and I was unable to wear it.
I rented this for a family holiday party. It fit true to size but I didn't like the drop waist.
I rented this for a huge work event! I paired it with blue suede pumps. It was flattering and dressy enough to not wear s blazer.

Perfect dress for date night with my boyfriend. This dress could have been dressed up or dressed down, which makes me want to rent it again for another occasion! Very versatile, very comfortable, and very flattery! I'm definitely renting this one again in the future.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a holiday gathering. Nice material.
links_reviews_text: Fits a bit big at the top which takes away shaping you.

This dress is amazing! I saw it on a RTR stylist at one of the stores and it immediately caught my eye. It's so flattering. Fits right and loose in all of the right places. I'm super self conscience about my tummy. I felt like the other curves on this dress distracted the tummy area. It was amazing to dance in!
Nice dress with a fun detail in the back waist.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a transition evening (The photo was taken from a video - sorry!)
links_reviews_text: I wore this to dinner and then the Opera, but afterwards to an Engagement Party. It was perfect for all the occasions. Smart enough for the Opera, but fun enough for the party.

links_reviews_title: A little big but cute overall for work
Fit was odd in the shoulders.
links_reviews_text: Fit was odd in the shoulders, it felt too big. The material is stretchy and the length was fine for me.
I got a bunch of compliments on this dress even though it was just a plain black dress. I love the skater fit. It's super sophisticated and flattering. Considering buying it!

links_reviews_title: Shape is a little odd, but overall its a nice quality dress for work.
links_reviews_text: The top half of the dress is designed to be looser, but its probably not good for smaller chests. The detailing also a little tummy-forward, which isn't great if you're bloated. That said, the material is nice and the quality is perfect for work.
Attempted to wear this 3.5 months postpartum and I looked 6 months pregnant. Tight in the stomach. Room for the bust.

links_reviews_title: beautiful fabric, but a strange fit
links_reviews_text: i liked the idea of the dress and its design, but the décolletage was a bit too low and the waist was too low. maybe good for someone with a super long torso? it felt like i was trying to adjust it the whole time i was trying it on, so ultimately i didn't leave the house in it
Small

This dress has a super cute hemline. However it felt a bit snug in the mid section for me which had me feeling a bit self conscious. I don't wear a lot of black so I felt a bit out of my comfort zone in it.
Fit perfectly and beautifully made
I grabbed this in the store because it was nicely made and an easy dress. Ended up wearing it both to work and out at night. Super simple and chic.

This is a great classic black dress. Easy to dress up/dress down based on accessories. If you have large hips you might want to size up, as the lower seam was slightly tight on me. Spanx did help it fit better here.

The detail on this dress is really pretty, and the length was great. But the top was very large on me. I'm not sure if I didn't have the busy to fill it out, but it simply wasn't very flattering. Didn't wear.

This dress just wasn't for me. The top was way too loose for my bust, despite the fact that I'm a 36 DD. The waist fit nicely and I liked the different cuts and angles at the bottom. But overall, it was saggy in the top.
Loved the fit and the comfort. One of my favorite RTR dresses so far.

links_reviews_title: Great variation on a black dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress is made of a heavy material with great detailing. Clings a little bit in the hip area, but not noticeable due to all the detailing. Very fun and comfortable to wear. Highlights a small waist.

Wore this dress to a couple of occasions. The 0 fit great and I usually go for a 2-4. I only knew to get a 0 because I got it from the RTR store. Made my waist look small and made me look curvy, considered buying!!
Cute and sophisticated. Perfect for a night out to a nicety dinner. I paired with over the knee boots
Perfect fit. Very comfortable and fun

links_reviews_title: The quality and fit are amazing. I received nonstop compliments.
links_reviews_text: The zipper is on the side, so it's a bit tight to get on, but once you do, it fits like a glove. Would love to keep this dress!
It fit cute but I was a little weird in the butt area
Love!
Such an easy piece and versatile dressy or casual

i'm typically a 4, but shldve sized down for this. there is a stretchy portion in the back. the top was quite loose despite my larger bust so i wld recommend sizing down. the details on this are hard to see online, but it's very flattering and looks really awesome with tights and cute booties. hit a couple of right above the knee so great for work. highly highly recommend
Cute dress, but top was large and you need a fairly flat stomach to wear. I'd order true to size. Mine was one size up and the top was way too large.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress on my Bat Mitzvah. It was so perfect and so comfy.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. There were honestly no cons to wearing the dress. If your looking for something to wear to a rehearsal dinner, this dress is perfect.
Loved the fit, and got lots of compliments. Pockets were especially great. The nude lining in the midsection was a tad awkward but not a real negative.
Such a sweet, feminine look... the dress is well made and very flowy.

Dress fit as expected. The material was thick and very good quality. It arrived very clean and did not wrinkle in the bag. No ironing necessary for me. Occasionally the middle piece would bunch up but other than that it was perfect and beautiful.
Love the style of this dress and the look! Was pretty heavy though and too hot for the summer

I wore this dress to my wedding rehearsal luncheon and welcome party baseball game and it was perfect. Pockets are always a plus and felt amazing in this dress. It looks like the cutouts show your stomach but there is actually fam fabric under there.
I always love Dress the Population! Always fits amazing! Also there's pockets! I'm a big fan of the little white dress. Perfect for a dockside afternoon at the winery.
Love this dress!! I rented for engagement pics and it was the perfect style for what we were going with. Would definitely rent again

The dress fit me perfectly except being just a little bit big in the chest. But not bad at all. I am 130 lbs and have a 27 inch natural waist. 5'6" tall. Everyone said the dress was beautiful! It was high quality material and I felt amazing in it.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to wear this for my 50th Birthday vacation to Costa Rica.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfectly! I got so many complements at the Resort.

links_reviews_title: Got this for vacay and super cute! Great material and fit - got lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a S/size 4 and got the XS so the dress was a bit snug - but I would say it fits true to size. Love the material - my issue with a lot of white dresses is they tend to be super thin and lower quality but this was not at all see through! Note the cut outs actually have a brown fabric lining so it isn't actually your skin showing through. Overall absolutely loved this dress and got tons of compliments !

I rented this dress for a "white night" party in Italy and it did not disappoint! I wish I could have kept this dress! The cut outs do have mesh behind them so keep that in mind because it won't show your normal skin color through it.

links_reviews_title: Wore to work but didn't zip all the way up (hence the blazer)
links_reviews_text: This is a really beautiful dress. It's perfect for the summer and would be beautiful for any kind of bridal event. I wore this to work, and it was great for that too. I do have a large rib cage and wide shoulders, so I was unable to zip the dress all the way up. I wanted to wear the dress anyway, so I improvised and wear a blazer to cover the zipper area.
I wore this for my civil ceremony and it was very comfy and easy to wear. I normally wear a 10/12 and the large was a bit big.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, fit well, a little heavy
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for the brunch after my wedding. It was a nice cute dress, and it fit well, was long enough for which can be hard, but the fabric was a little heavy. Cut was okay but not great.
Bright white color. Felt like it had never been worn before!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fit, compliments from strangers and many from friends. Gives an hourglass figure.
links_reviews_text: Hourglass figure, pockets, comfortable, can wear to a picnic or wedding
I used the dress for my rehearsal dinner. It's comfortable, flattering and I got tons of compliments. I'm normally a 4-6 but I think I was sent an XS and it fit perfectly.
For me like a glove! No bra needed - material was thick and structured enough that it kept everything in place. Bottom was long enough that I could wear to church. Such a fun dress
So flattering. Definitely runs large. I probably could have done an XS

links_reviews_title: Just as perfect as everyone says
links_reviews_text: This was my first time renting with RTR and I was nervous to waste money on a dress I didn’t like. I rented this for my bridal shower and it was even better than I expected, I would buy this dress if I could!

I rented this dress for engagement photos and honestly, I wasn't entirely sure if it would fit or looks ok but when it came, I didn't want to take it off! Such a lovely dress! The steel was amazing, it's heavy so there was no chance of it flying up but not heavy enough that I felt weighed down. I will definitely be renting this again in the future
Fits well

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for renewal of vows and daughters baptism. Love the dress. Love the service. Perfect!

links_reviews_text: Loved the pockets! And mine had filler fabric in the dicuts in the torso so felt ok wearing to work and church. Fabric is heavy but great quality

links_reviews_title: We went to dinner at a fine restaurant and saw Hamilton in Chicago.
links_reviews_text: The photo is deceiving--this looks like a light, cotton dress, but it is a heavy synthetic. Also, be aware that the cage-effect waist has a (white person) flesh-colored underlay. A pretty dress but less comfortable and fussier than I'd hoped.
fits beautiful, comfortable and it has pockets :)

Other reviewers said it ran big so I sized down, but this is definitely true to size in the top. I couldn't zip it at the chest. Will probably try again in a S as it was a very nice and flattering dress!
easy to dress up or down - only down side is the straps are kinda hard to adjust

Beautiful dress. Nice heavy material, great fit. Unfortunately, the dress I received was stained. I DID wear it because it is very stylish and fit my body shape well. Would have worn it more if it wasn't stained.
It has a very frumpy fit. I didn't like it at all and luckily had a backup outfit to wear. It was also too long for me. The material is very thick.
Very form fitting in the torso. The zipper gets stuck at the waist where the cutout detail is and I needed another person and was alone. Never wore it.

links_reviews_title: It was a fine dress but not great dress.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2 and the fit was weird. It just seemed big everywhere but my ribs. I didn't love it at all but I also didn't hate it. Its an okay dress.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. It was fine, just not amazing
links_reviews_text: fine
