A good fit in the waste but too long for a petite person. My least favorite thing about this dress was that the cut out is actually nude fabric, which bunched up in a weird way.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to the Pulitzer Prize luncheon, and dress code was imprecise (business formal?). Perfect
links_reviews_text: I wear a 10 and the large fit perfectly. I'm 5'5" and the dress was a little long. Great drape. And pockets!

As per usual, this dress got stuck at the seam, which is typical for dresses, but all the tricks weren’t working. It also was pretty tight in the bust area, which is where I normally have problems with dresses. I rented the XL and the XXL, neither of them worked. I wear a size 38 DDD, and it was way to tight. The dress itself, however, it’s really beautiful and I wish it would have worked because it was for my college graduation. The material is great and the middle part is a great added design!!

I rented the small and medium of this dress. I couldn’t zip up the small but it was still far below my knees. The medium was HUGE up top. It has adjustable straps that could be nice, but this dress wasn’t wearable. Also the middle part that looks like skin is fabric, so beware if you don’t have medium-tone skin!
Loved this but its too big. Other dresses from this brand fit me at a size L But this is too loose on me. So sad!

I loved this dress for the material and uniqueness and the style and length was perfect for a February wedding . I knocked off one star only because of how small it runs . I sized up per reviews but still was squeezing into this dress. I would definitely rent again but next time would go up 2 sizes.
Pretty neckline. Fit a bit unflattering in the midsection and the slit in back is a bit high for a midi length.
Compliments all night. Stunning and unique dress. Waist band was a bit tight and had no give, but other than that, very comfortable and flattering.

Agree with others to get size up for backup, the ribbon at waistline doesn't allow any grace so wore the larger. Received so many compliments, the blue shoes up more in person which is what I hoped for
The dress was form fitting and comfortable. It could be worn with a strapless bra or a regular bra. I really enjoyed the beautiful dress and got many compliments on it.
Thoughtfully designed garment has classic elegance in a color flattering to many skin tones.

links_reviews_title: I didn't even choose it and it was great!
links_reviews_text: I suppose this came bc the dress I choose in an 8 wasn't available, but I'm so happy with RTR's choice for me!! Snug fit which after 2 kids I shy away from now but it was beautiful. And with a pair of Spanxs was stunning!
I couldn't NOT write a review of this. It is absolutely gorgeous and made me feel so glamorous. I've rented a ton from RTR and this is hands down the best thing.

Beautiful dress, form fitting for sure but also flattering. I also didn't think it was too long for my 5'1 frame which isn't easy with long dresses. It likely fits more like a midi on someone taller. Received lots of compliments and felt chic all night. Ps the bag is rented too!

I love Marchesa because in my experience her dresses are so flattering, feminine, and beautiful. This dress fit true to size on me. I'm a little larger chested and had no difficulties with sizing. The blue is so vibrant..deep blue with slightly teal undertones. I would imagine this color would be flattering for most everyone.
Gorgeous dress with beautiful velvet pieces over the body. I received compliments all night from my staff and guests. A little snug hips down, but fit perfectly

The fit of this dress was just right leaving room to move around. I was apprehensive about the lace neck however I experienced no itchiness. The blue color was amazing and overall I felt formal but still professional for my business award dinner.
Even though I am short it still hit right above the ankles and it looks really nice felt really nice is really comfortable and I got a lot of compliments

Very fitted w/ no stretch. Almost didn't take this but SOOOO glad that I did. With shapewear it was perfect. Only mildly uncomfortable part was the seam below the bust -- it's narrow! But the way I felt wearing this perfect dress made the discomfort totally worth it.

Get ready for compliments. This dress is gorgeous! It has a fashion forward couture flair. Very elegant, and the fabric is so feminine and lovely with unique details. There is a bit of give, but not much. I'm typically between size 2 and 4. I went with size 4 and it fit perfectly!

This dress was absolutely gorgeous- I received compliments all night. The details were stunning. The dress runs a little small (I typically wear a 0, but the 2 was perfect). It's a slim cut through the legs, so maybe not the perfect dress if you intend to d a lot of dancing, but it I loved it for the gala I attended. Wish this dress was permanently in my closet :)

links_reviews_title: Hugs curves, gives a nice shape/structure
links_reviews_text: Had a just right fit even after eating a full meal. Beautiful dress that I would've loved to keep for longer. No stretch so if you're in between sizes, go up.

links_reviews_title: I had so many compliments on this dress. Everyone told me my dress was their favorite.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a 1930's theme party. It was perfect. I loved the dress and got so many compliments. The dress runs small. I rented a 6 and an 8 and both sizes were way to small. Im normally a size 6. They shipped me the size 10. It was small as well but I was able to make it work. The size 12 would have been perfect. I highly recommend this dress
Gorgeous dress with lace and great fit.

links_reviews_title: Loved the elegance and fit plus the forgiveness of it in all the right places.
links_reviews_text: No Cons. I normally wear an 8/10 but it's not uncommon to go up a size because of my curves. I took the closest size available to a 10 , a 12r and it couldn't have fit more beautifully or more comfortably. A 10 would have been too small.

links_reviews_title: Rented for a formal winter wedding, received tons of compliments!!!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress. I am usually A size 4, but in this brand I am a size 2. I loved the dress, and didn't have any issues with moving, however getting it zipped was impossible to do on my own, and the bust was a little snug. Hips and waist were great fit!

This one was picked for me by my RTR stylist. I took a chance and tried it on, even though it's not usually what I would pick for myself. Love it! Got endless compliments all night. Loved the color and fit. Be ready to show off your curves! A great over all dress!

My coworker actually picked this out for me at the store. I was hesitant because I normally don't wear anything fitted. I prefer full skirts. I was pleasantly surprised it fit me so well and wasn't as tight fitting as I thought and it's very light. It is supposed to be more midi but since I'm 5'1 it fell right by ankles. I've never had so many compliments in one night! I felt so elegant and glamorous!

Please check out my Instagram @carolwongnyc for more rtr styles. I love the elegance and sophistication. The details were stunning and looked so expensive. I also think it shows your figure. I love it!

This dress is stunning in person, the pattern is subtle but makes the dress stand out and the lace at the neck is a show stopper. Unfortunately I did not wear because of the fit. If you are larger than a size B cup and have an hourglass figure it probably won't work well for you. In my case the waist was a bit loose and the zipper would not zip past my bust. If I could have zipped up the top I totally would have worn this dress as it is absolutely lovely. I liked it so much I would consider finding this dress and having it tailored just so I can have it in my closet!
Fit snug around the hips and waist! Good length and beautiful color
I love this dress. Needed something for a black-tie charity event and this was perfect. It fit true to size and was very comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: Stunning details, excellent fit. Was perfect for a gala at work.
links_reviews_text: The detailing on this dress was stunning. There is piping around the waist and next in velvet, and the blue patterns on the lace really felt luxurious. The shoulders/cap sleeves were a little restrictive, but not so bad you couldn't dance in it. So many co-workers came up and said, "Oh my God, I didn't even realize that was you, but I was just admiring that dress! You look amazing!" It was a bit snug on my frame at a 16R, and I tend to take a 14 or 16 right now at 5'7" and some change and at close to 200lbs. That said, I felt like a zillion bucks. One last note. There is a layer of 'nude' tulle under the black lace on the neckline that may not work for folks with darker complexions. While I am as pale as the tulle, it annoyed me to see that, as I have many a friend who would love to wear that dress that this may stand out on. Jury is out, though.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, I would rent again.
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
great fit

I chose this dress for a church wedding ceremony. It was modest and still very stylish. The only reason I give this dress a 4/5 was the material around the neck wasn't the most comfortable, i.e. kind of itchy at times, and the chest portion was a little large on me, forcing me to wear a bra, which wasn't ideal for me because I don't like wearing bras.

links_reviews_title: Had people I didn't even know commenting how beautiful the dress was!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful and elegant.

As a lector in a family wedding, the modest top of the dress was appropriate. Only needed earrings and bracelets to accessorize. Appreciated the midi length for taller ladies, as it was at my ankles comfortably. Usually a size 6, where the 10 was great for fit & ability to dance all night at the reception. Packable without needing to steam.
Received lots of compliments--- very stylish and super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: LOVED this dress. I'm usually a size 6; however, the size 10 fit perfectly!
links_reviews_text: Runs very small.
Loved the fit, including length and style

I am in love with this dress! I rented it to go to the ballet with friends. I didn't wear it because it is really snug in the waist and belly for me. I wasn't sure about the collar but it is so pretty and feminine in person. I am looking for it in a larger size and will definitely rent this again. I want to buy this!!!

Meh. I'm a 0/2 normally and the 2 fit but wasn't a great fit. The length was long on me (I'm 5'4") and the slit in the back was cute but it was still hard to walk in, like you have to take tiny steps.

links_reviews_title: WAY too small I am usually a 4 but definitely needed top size up to a 6 on this one.
links_reviews_text: too small but cute dress

I rented this dress for an upcoming anniversary party. I'm about a solid size 10 right now - ordered a size 10 and I couldn't even zip it up. If I re-order I might skip the 12 and go to a 14. Lovely dress but I wasn't able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Flattering dress for work or cocktails
links_reviews_text: Love this black dress which is cut in a flattering way for any body type. Not too clingy in the middle and bell sleeves and ruffle at hem add interest. This dress comes in other colors also, have rented the royal blue before and also love it!

links_reviews_title: Really cute and comfy work dress!

links_reviews_text: Very flattering, appropriate for work and very fun to wear somewhere nice. Hubby loved it. I felt flirty and confident. A little short so wore w tights to the office.
Wore this for a work presentation. So cute and fun. Not too short.
For very nice ! So pretty and I love the sleeves . Not to short for work .

links_reviews_title: Can go dressy or more casual for work
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a low key charity event and dressed it up with my choice in accessories. You could totally tone it down and wear it to work. It's versatile. The only reasons I didn't give it five stars: 1. The material is thin and doesn't feel like the highest quality. That said, it flows nicely. 2. The slit on the side is super short. 3. The fit was a little snug even on the larger size.
Amazing fit- I'll probably buy it. Perfect for my work conference for all types of day/night events.
Work this to a work event and liked it. The sleeves are cute and didn't get in my way at all. The dress is a simple black dress and the sleeves give it a little something extra.

Got rave reviews on this black dress with its fun sleeves and ruffle on the bottom. I was surprised how thin the material was but the dress fit great and looked great. Not too sexy for work and can be dressed up if needed. Ended up buying it

Great dress! My original rental for the wedding I was attending didn't work out, but fortunately I was visiting San Francisco and could run to the RTR store there to find a different option! This dress was a lifesaver. I might have overlooked this online because it seems a little plain at first, but the ruffles are the perfect touch and I felt classy & pretty in it! Currently 150-155 lb, 5' 4", 34B. I'm often a size 10 now, but the store just had a size 12 and that worked out fine. I don't know how the 10 would have fit, but I'm assuming it runs a bit small with the 12 working so well.

links_reviews_title: Wore for an important work meeting
links_reviews_text: Classy, runs large through the hips. Sleeves were somewhat annoying. Just okay in terms of flattering. Likely wouldn't wear again.
i felt cute and confident
This dress is very flattering. I normally wear a 10-12. I rented a 12 and it fit perfectly.
LOVED this dress! I am usually a 12 but I wore the 14 because the dress was very form fitting and not forgiving at all. But I loved the way it looked--perfect LBD and very comfortable!

Just absolutely love this dress. The ruffles are great and really make it unique and flirty. Great silhouette, not super form fitting but very flattering. Great with tights or bare legs with heels. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. You can dress it up or down. Gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Slightly loose in the hips, fits beautifully.
Super cute fit for a work to night type of day! It hugs the right places and makes me feel slim!
Wore this for work and a client dinner. Felt so elegant in it! Dress is forgiving in all the right areas. The flare is flirty but subtle. Highly recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Such a cute and stylish dress
links_reviews_text: Great fit, right length for 5'7 work dress. Would be cute with tall boots too. Wore it to work with a blazer and then dinner without the blazer

I love this trendy LBD by Jill Jill Stuart. Running true to size with some stretch I recommend wearing your true size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout and fitted at the hips. Works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this party dress. At 5'8 the length hit mid-thigh on me. This LBD can be worn for several different occasions. Pair with a black strap sandal.

Dress was cut in a way that gave you a shape but wasn't too tight on he body. It was work appropriate in length and feel. Material was good. Didn't wrinkle much, even after being in a suitcase for a week before wearing. Received many compliments! Would rent again!

I rented this through unlimited, originally intending to wear it to work, but I ended up wearing it to my birthday dinner instead. Could have probably pulled it off for work but I think it's a little cutesy with all of the ruffles. The cut is very flattering, though the material is thin and the dress is unlined so there's nowhere to hide!

This dress is so classy. I ended up keeping it because it is versatile for any event. It hugs your shape in just the right places and its a length that can be worn to a party or work. The material isn't very thick so it will wear well in all seasons.

links_reviews_title: very classy and comfortable, short for a tall person
links_reviews_text: love the fit, very flattering, would rent again
The dress is very comfy, I wore it to work all day, and then to an event after work. It was flattering and the material was very breathable. It is true to size. I would rent again.
Cute dress! Loved it and was disappointed it ran a bit too small on me. Tight on the hips
The side splits are really short when you sit. Very thin material.
Looked great on
Fun black dress with great ruffles, but not too many. Short, but not too short. Will definitely rent again.
Cute dress could dress it up or down.

links_reviews_title: Great black dress- Fit is amazing.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work event and felt appropriate yet glamorous.
Polyester dress but comfortable. Lots of compliments on this dress!

Ordered a 2 (usual size) but I am returning for a 4. I disagree with other reviewers who noted that this dress is roomy in the hips -- the 2 was too fitted around my bum giving me that pooch effect on my lower stomach that often happens when you get a shift dress that's too small. Not flattering. Also, because of the fit, the dress was too short on the sides to be work appropriate. The dress is otherwise beautiful and I can't wait for the right size to arrive!

wore this to a celebration of life memorial event, it was a perfect dress, would also recommend this for any after work event or venue that you would like to look a little more reserved but still very stylish, the top is very fitted (thus the need to go up to size 4 for 34D), the sleeves and ruffle at bottom added a nice bit of flair and at 5'5" the length was just right for me for this type of event.

This dress is very cute and a good office dress. Nothing special. However, there slits on both sides. They are not noticeable at most times, but be careful if the wind blows, you'll be flashing everyone (speaking from experience)!!

links_reviews_title: Size up if you want more flowy
links_reviews_text: My normal size worked for me but probably fit a tiny bit tighter than I wanted for the style (think a size up would look better). But ended up not being a fan or the sleeves...awkward-looking on me and a bit annoying / gets in the way.
Sized up...usually 10-12 and wore the 14 which was perfect
Fit was great not too short and classy
This dress is perfect for transitioning from the office to happy hour/dinner plans. I LOVE the side ruffle detail and it fit perfectly. Great for petites! Will be renting again.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to work - but have it rented for a month so will definitely wear on a date too!
links_reviews_text: I love this dress!! I am petite/curvy and it fit perfectly. The only thing...and this isn't a flaw of the dress, rather my abnormally long torso and short legs, the dress would look best on someone with proportionate torso/legs or even someone with longer legs. Fabulous dress. Fit me like a glove.

LOVE this dress. Wore it for an anniversary date and a wine tasting in Greece. The fabric and rich colors were standout but the cut was just gorgeous and outrageously flattering. A bit long but isn't that what heels are for.

links_reviews_title: beautiful but not for those with a wider body frame
links_reviews_text: really lovely material and pattern, however it is held together by clasps that barely connected for me. I am a size 8 with an average-sized frame and found the size 3 (the largest) unwearable about halfway through the evening.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous but beware of one thing...
links_reviews_text: Loved loved loved this dress and was so excited to wear to George Strait concert, perfect outfit. One problem... the closure in the stomach where it comes together is super tight if you are a larger ribbed girl. I would size up for sure as the rest is flowy. I had no issues with it standing up but sitting down I had to unbutton it like when it's thanksgiving and ya gotta let room go breathe!

I loved this dress! The pattern and golden tones jumped out to me right away and when I received the dress the coloring with the satin-y finish was even more beautiful. The fit is lose and flowy and the skirt moves wonderfully. With both a smaller inner button and the large outer button the dress felt secure and I never feared it was going to fly open. The skirt separation looks particularly high in the picture but that's mostly due to my awkward hand placement and trying to balance on the moving swing; when standing the skirt closes much more than some other wrap dresses and even during some wind I didn't have to worry much about anything showing. I ended up with a size 3R as that was the only size left. If I had the choice I probably would have chosen the 2R but getting the 3 was really a blessing in disguise as the looser fit matches the style of dress much better.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable yet so elegant.
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 4, but the size 0 fit perfectly. Everyone complemented the dress and how it flowed in the wind. I would definitely rent it again.

Rented this dress for a "Burning Man" styled wedding and the color/material was a hit! The biggest con is similar to what other posts have commented on. This dress needs cover up for smaller breasted women. I hated to have to wear a bralette but needed one to hide/cover what little peoples I have. For women that are more blessed - there shouldn't be an issue. Additionally, I had to wear 6" heels and the tail did drag a bit. I am petite in nature but cannot wear petite clothes. I'm a size 0 in regular sizes. Otherwise, this dress is stunning in person.
Great color, luxurious fabric, flattering on. Snaps kept coming undone which made me a bit nervous!

The dress was so cute, perfect for wine tasting afternoon. Is very lightweight and breezy. The wrap effect makes for a VERY high slit, so I had to hold it closed when walking. As some other reviewers mentioned, the waist buttons kept coming undone and the chest area was too baggy, but nothing a safety pin and some fashion tape couldn't handle.
Beautiful color, light, flows silk. Perfect for an evening out in warm weather.
Absolute stunner. Beautifully made and felt great in it. Wore it for a winter in Palm Springs and this was perfect. Snaps are very secure.

The material on this dress was a beautiful, satiny fabric. It was definitely a little long and trailed in the back, even with heels on, but it was flowy and comfortable and I got tons of compliments. The snaps holding it shut did pop open a few times, but I just added a safety pin and that took care of it. Wished it wasn't so expensive or I would have definitely considered buying it! I wore it to work and on vacation, but it also could have been dressed up for a nicer event.

Really great dress --quality material and gorgeous colors. Moves beautifully when you walk and has a flattering fit. I had to go up a size because it snaps near the rib cage area and my usual size was too tight there and in the shoulders. The size up was perfect!

links_reviews_title: May be my favorite RtR dress ever!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is magical. The colors and style made me feel 70's retro sexy. It flows beautifully and will make women of any shape feel great. It was a little tight for me in the rib-cage, but I have that issue often. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress on a trip and absolutely loved it. The sheer bottom looked so pretty in photos.
links_reviews_text: I normally take a 2 but it was not available so ordered the 0. It was a little tight and the small clip buttons are very small and do not allow for much room for stretch. Would recommend sticking to your actual size or going up a size.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so feminine, comfortable, and I felt beautiful in it. It fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Nothing bad to say about it. I'm a DDD-E cup and didn't need to wear a bra. The fabric is so luxurious and I felt fabulous in it. I got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Imperfect fit but made me feel beautiful!
links_reviews_text: Fit large around the bust and was long! But I felt beautiful in the dress.

Wore this sight seeing in Thailand and it was the perfect (and modest enough) dress. The fabric was so luxe and bright. The dress fit well but I had to wear an undershirt and pin the side up so it wasn't frumpy.
It fits and flows like a dream. Sheer perfection! True to size and I can't say enough marvelous things about it. The neckline is a little deep so more of a party dress than anything else.
Very beautiful and fun. I'm 5'6" and the dress was a little too long, even with heals. Snaps came undone a couple times so be careful, but it flowy, elegant, wonderful fabric.
This dress was incredibly beautiful and also comfortable. I wish I could buy this, and I may even rent it again!

This dress is beautiful!!! I absolutely loved it and got so many compliments. The material and color are beyond. Perfect for a fall wedding. My only complaint is that it was very tight in the rib cage for me but I made it work!

I am 5'5" and this was definitely touching the ground in the back, even with 4" heels. I needed a belt to keep it closed and to give it some more shape. I didn't hate it, but I didn't love it. I wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress but snaps kept coming undone!
links_reviews_text: Dress is beautiful but the snaps do not stay and I had a major wardrobe malfunction! Let's just say the people in the hotel lobby got an eye full!
A little tight in the snap area under the breast for a large breasted woman such as I . Loved the material . It shimmered in the evening light . Tasteful and classy
I felt effortlessly chic in this summer/ fall transitional maxi

Another new favorite rental. The silk material was my favorite part, so high quality and vibrant. The wrap dress and ruffles flow nicely as you walk. Style very classy but unexpected in a way. Got lots of compliments. Lots o fun. I usually wear a 2 but the 0 felt good in this one.
Low top. It unclipped a couple time but other than that comfortable.
This dress was absolutely stunning in person! Perfectly flowy toward the bottom but has buttons to taper around the upper waste area, so be mindful of that. Otherwise great choice!

If you're on the fence whether or not to rent this dress...DO it. The colors are unreal, the wrap look is always flattering (there's no tie, but buttons that secure you in) and the dress was super comfortable to dance in. Best RTR dress to date! Quick tip for future renters: wear a higher heel, the back of the dress dragged a bit on me.
Loved this dress! Very flattering and so feminine. Had to be careful walking down the street because the front can blow open. The color is really lovely and unique!

links_reviews_title: Way too small - even in the biggest size
links_reviews_text: Too small - not for normal body types

links_reviews_title: Never got to wear it although I've rented this before.
links_reviews_text: Fit is tight in the waist.
At 5'2", the dress was long on me, even with 4.5" heels. But the dress is beautiful and perfect for my mom's 70th birthday party- daytime into nighttime affair.

Flattering neckline and waist. Striking, flowing fabric and pattern. Not too heavy for a spring wedding. The snap on the inside of the waist is relatively secure; the two external snaps are not so beware. Still would wear again.
Nice but ultimately too much chest
So pretty! I love this dress. The only drawback is there are only 3 snaps to hold the dress together.
Did not fit me. I am a size 6 now an 8 since I am in my first trimester and this would not even close in the front.

I am an 8-10 and weigh 165 with an hourglass shape. I rented the 2 and 3. Neither would stay snapped. It was a nightmare. I had to go buy another dress with 4 hours before the wedding. I went off reviews when ordering this and was very sadly and angrily disappointed. I’ll never rent this brand again.

links_reviews_title: sad to send this dress back
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a recent vacation but I didn't get an opportunity to wear it. I don't have any upcoming reasons to wear it, but will be renting it again the second an opportunity arises. This dress is definitely for people on the taller side due to the length. It is secured by snaps, so if it isn't the proper size, keep in mind your dress is secured by 3 snaps. This dress made me feel confident and cool. Ugh...why isn't it a *little* cheaper so I can own it???
I got so many compliments on this dress. Train would probably be a little long on shorter girls. I am 5'9" and was wearing heels.

links_reviews_title: Easy breezy gorgeous dress! Very comfortable for effortless formal! Many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Comes in a Long length which I need and top was fitted enough for a small chest. Loved it!
Very flattering and fits tts. Comfortable Received tons of compliments I would rent this again
Rented this for an awards show. It was very elegant and I loved the asymmetrical cut at the bottom. It was a little tight across the bust though but besides that I loved it.
Fits true to size. Comfortable and flattering! Was worried about the length with heal but it was perfect with a heal from my closet.

This dress was so amazing for a black tie event. I am a B cup and this dress was tight! I could have sized up another size and been fine! The slit in the leg made this roomy and added some sass! It accentuated my waist which I loved. I am a 16/18. I got the 18W and it fit small.
Great fit! I am smaller up too and curvy on bottom and it was the perfect dress for my figure. I'm 5' 6" 140lbs and the 4 long was perfect with my taller heels.

links_reviews_title: Was perfect for black tie wedding and dancing!
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. Three details I would take note of: I am a 36DD chest and did not need a bra with how the top of the dress fit me. It is very long! I had on 4 inch heels and I still needed to pick up the hem and be very mindful of it while going up or down stairs (it was fine walking). The zipper goes all the way up the back. I was getting ready by myself so had to get creative and loop a clothes hanger through the zipper go I could get it all the way up. (My friend also had to unzip it under my jacket before the end of the night so I could get out of it by myself again.) I would 100% rent again!
I'm short and curvy and this dress was perfect. The slit made it so I didn't trip and the shape was so flattering.

A stylist chose this for me when my original backup was not available. It is beautiful with the hem detail, and really comfortable. Was able to wear a regular strapless bra, not able to go bra less as the top was a bit loose. The regular length was just right for dancing, wore 2” heels and am 5’7”. Lots of compliments on this at my event!
The dress fit perfectly and I was happy to have ordered a long as the regular would have been too short. Highly recommend!
Comfortable and sexy without trying to hard. Had to remember to walk up stairs carefully with the length.
Gosh I felt good in this. I'm a curvy girl and this was so flattering. I felt like it hid my tummy and showed off my legs. Perfect dress for a night at the ballet

Obsessed with this dress. It fit perfectly, I felt amazing, and received lots of compliments. There is 0 stretch though so after dinner and cake it was tight so keep that in mind but overall I would definitely recommend!

I ended up not wearing this for the wedding because it was a little too formal. The fit is flattering and the material is thick. Great for winter events. The dress runs long and it's hard to hem with temporary tape because of the way the slit works. I normally wear a S/M and a size 6 in dresses but sized up because the hip area and rib cage area has no stretch.
It was a perfect fit and I got tons of compliments through out the night. Since my heels were a bit taller then I thought, it would have been better to go with an 8L.

I am 5'9 with an hour glass shape. I can wear between a RTR 2 or 4. Size 4 wasn't available so I opted for the 2L and this dress fit me like a glove. So glad the 4 wasn't available! I'm busty and it was not tight. I wore this to a wedding. It was easy to dance in. I got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Would not order this dress again
links_reviews_text: After reading reviews I ordered my size (18L) and one bigger (20L). I wore the 18L and it was a little too large. The long was perfect to wear 3" heels-I'm 5'10". The dress got a decent amount of compliments although I did not love it. It was too large at the boobs by the arms, not the boobs themselves though. The slit was perfect. But overall the dress just seemed too awkward. Although it is a 'safe' option I feel. Maybe would have been better with a 16L. It just didn't wow....at all!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an evening wedding. I got a ton of compliments and wish I took more pics!
links_reviews_text: A little big in the chest area, but it fit well through the hips/thigh/butt area, which is more of my problem areas. Hit at the waist just a slight bit higher than natural waist so it didn’t showcase my stomach. To sum it up it’s a super flattering dress -5’4 and wore 16R

links_reviews_title: This dress is stunning, I got a ton of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size

I LOVED this rental - definitely one of my favorites. This black dress has a fabulous silhouette with a fun bit of leg. I have an athletic build and the halter neckline and racerback showed off my shoulders without looking too broad. The dress is a stain-like fabric so it has a bit of shine - enough to give it that fancy feel. My normal dress size is between a 6 and 8, and the size 8 fit like a glove. The dress moved well and was comfortable all night. Highly recommended!
Easy to wear. I went up a size or 2 but it easily hide my 5 month pregnant belly. Very fashionable. I got complimented all night. Worn to a residency graduation.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a show stopper.
links_reviews_text: Received tons of compliments. The slit up the front is super sexy. It was right in the rib cage so I would size up if you are concerned about that area.

links_reviews_title: comfy, chic and lets a breeze in!
links_reviews_text: i wore this dress to a black tie gala and felt great in it! i followed other reviews and ordered two sizes larger than what i usually wear, and the 14L fit just right. I have a large, full breast shape (36DDD tear drop shape) and wore this dress with an unlined underwire bra, worked out just fine. the top is a bit tight, but in a good way IMO - holds everything in tight without cutting into your skin.i think a more padded/structured bra would have made me need an even larger size, so keep that in mind when ordering. i didn't try the dress on with no bra, but that probably would've worked too. no shapewear needed! i added the pearl belt to accessorize it, i felt it accentuated my waistline. my heels were about 4in tall and that was just right for the long length. didn't step on it at all during the night, even during vigorous dancing.
Loved this dress! So comfortable and fit perfectly. Complimented all night!
I ordered a size 8 in black and it fit perfectly. The style and color of the dress was so classy and elegant and was every easy to accessorize.
Tight in the bust area so I had to size up and go long. Lots of compliments, unique style (which I loved), light fabric! Pretty comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Made the regular size work for a petite body
links_reviews_text: I ordered a 10R and a 12P. The 10R fit on top, but was very long. The 12p was too large on top, but perfect in length. I really wish this dress came in a 10P. But I made the 10R work with very tall heels. Unfortunately, the illusion of have the dress shorter in the front than in the back wasn't as dramatic since I am short. lol. It was a comfortable dress and hid just the parts that needed to be hid. I got a lot of compliments on this dress.

This dress was great, length was good for 3 in heels, fabric was heavy, and a little shiny, the asymmetrical hem was interesting. Ultimately did not wear because my husband’s suit was Navy (darn it!) and not formal enough, but would rent again for another event.
Dress was great!! It was a little large in the chest for me, but was fine with good posture. Highly recommend this gown

I usually wear a size 18... I wore this dress in a 22. It was a little loose in the chest but not terrible. I bought a beautiful rhinestone belt to go with it... it really made the dress so much more beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Perfection! You should rent this dress!
links_reviews_text: I received more compliments when I wore this dress to a formal wedding than ever before! Fit true to size. The slit on the right leg is just enough to make the dress exciting, but is still very appropriate. Such a flattering dress. Rent it, you will not be sorry! I wore 3" heels and the length was perfect for me, I am 5'3".

links_reviews_title: Love the classics look for a great night!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove and was able to wear with short heels. The leg slit wasn’t to much so still looked super classy. Absolutely loved!

I wore this to co-officiate a Black Tie Optional wedding with my husband. It fit perfectly and made me feel so confident. I have a larger chest so the neckline was perfect--it gave me coverage while still being a little sexy with the tight bodice and the fun slit (there's probably a better fashion term for this, but I don't know it). I am 5'8" and wore 1.5" heels and the dress was a bit too long (not a big problem, I was just a little worried it would be stepped on), so either wear higher heels or order the regular. I usually go for black dresses and feel boring doing so, but this dress' shape and design was unique, I didn't feel like I was wearing something I already owned. And because it is black, you can go almost any way with the accessories. All in all, I loved this dress and if I had more fancy occasions (and more $), I would have seriously considered buying it. What a dream dress!!
Great fit and comfortable too! Compliments all night long!

If you want to feel like you're about to run the world, rent this dress. It fit like a dream and was so light weight. It was easy to dance in, too. The front made me slip a couple times, but after a while I got used to walking in it. I would very highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: I will definitely rent this again!
links_reviews_text: I'm sorry I can't help in this. My son is only 6 months old so I'm still in between pregnant size and regular size.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a black tie wedding. It was class with a little sexy!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress and got so many compliments! I'm 5'5" 140 lbs and I wore an 8L, I should have sized down to a 6L and it would have fit perfectly! It was a little long other than that it was perfect! I felt like a princess!

I loved this dress! Wore it to a black tie wedding. It was so comfortable, so elegant and the material was thick enough that you didn't have to worry what you were wearing underneath. With all of that being said, it did run small. I am a bit broad in the rib cage area, so that could have been why it fit me tighter there. The size 14L was a bit tight around the area where it caused "arm fat" to hang over the dress in the underarm area. I choose to wear the 16L although it was big in the chest area. I put fabric take on and a thicker bra and it worked out fine. I normally wear a size 12 to 14. I had so many compliments on this dress. From dancing all night, to eating my breakfast in it the next day (my husband almost had to put me in the UPS box with the dress), I felt amazing.
Loved the fit, fabric and style.

links_reviews_title: Simple but elegant! Lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Loves wearing this dress to an evening wedding! It was very comfortable and easy to move around/dance in. I normally wear a 6 or and 8 but the 10 fit perfectly! It was actually my backup dress and I'm so glad! The high slit in the front gave this traditional style a fun flare. I'd definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: Great cut out detailing! Loved with OTK boots but would also wear with sneakers and oversized coat.

links_reviews_text: Very nice dress for work with some style. I probably could have went with a small but I have muscular arms. Almost didn't send it back.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable fit in an unusual cut
links_reviews_text: I wore with sheer black tights and Docs on the bottom and thought it was really cute. It hit at the perfect mid-thigh length for a date, though not anything fancy. The fabric is pretty thick but it was fitted enough to show a slight line from the tights underneath - not too noticeable. Also, the turtleneck part buttons in the back.
Fits well but slightly tight around the middle
Super cute,.. hugs skin so tends to show panty lines & bra lines but otherwise love it
Material is thick. Def true to size. Im normally a Medium but Large was the only available and chose that. Big mistake! Anyways should it have fit properly it would be super cute!

links_reviews_title: comfortable, tight in the best way, simple and fun
links_reviews_text: I wore out in Miami. It was perfect!! straps are a little loose and I had to monitor slipping down.

I rented this dress for an anniversary trip to St Martin with my husband. I am 5'4" approx 130 lbs and super curvy. I had originally rented the small but had to exchange it as it was way to tight on my chest. My husband definitely loved the dress and I would rent it again for a couples trip. Probably not something you would rent for a night out with your in-laws as the cleavage factor could prove distracting but great for date night!

I loved the color of this dress - the photo does not do it justice! Overall red with a hint of pink on the edges, just lovely. The fit was a little small in the booty however, I don't have junk in the trunk but I'm not flat either, I got the tushy in but it was a little tight. I could breathe all night long, sit/stand/dance, ad move with comparability, the dress was quite stretchy. The straps were the only big problem, they loosened out the minute I put the dress on and make the front gape very low. I had to pull up the front of the dress all night long, but the dress itself made me feel just like a princess so it was a small price to pay. I would recommend this dress! For reference I'm 5'7'' 138lbs 34DD

This dress saved me after my dresses I ordered prior to now weren't delivered until after the party passed. The dress runs small so while I normally wear wear a small, there was only a medium at the Santa Monica store. It fit like a glove. I got complimented all night. I also continued to get compliments after the party fro people who came up to me and said I was the "red dress" girl. Loved it! Felt super confident!

This dress was so fun to wear! I rented it for a trip to Vegas, and it was absolutely perfect. I wore it without a bra because of the depth of the scoop, and the structure of the material held me in just fine.

links_reviews_title: Must be worn w/ out a bra
links_reviews_text: Can't use a bra with this dress since the back is so low. Fits good! I had to wear a body shaper since it would squeeze down on my butt and make it look flat.
Good fit. Fit like a typical Herve dress. It was comfortable. No complaints!
This dress fit like a glove and the compliments kept coming! Very comfortable and flattering. Hemline stayed in place while dancing too. Must have

To say that I felt amazing in this dress would be an understatement... I have never gotten so many compliments on an outfit in my entire life. I can't wait to rent this sexy dress again- Herve Leger is the way to go!!!

So it looks amazing in the photo (if you're feeling that sort of unapologetically Vegas) here but the bust was way too big on me. I couldn't get a bra, even a Demi, that wouldn't slide up the top and show half the bra. I'm very small chested (this is a padded bra) but no bras worked for it and I can't go braless in my 40s!
I got this for my bday and wore it another night out to the club. Sexy little number. Fits well and holds everything "in place."
Extremely tight. Flattened out my breasts.

links_reviews_title: A boost of confidence! Very sexy.
links_reviews_text: The straps were a little loose for me, and I probably should have gotten a medium to begin with - something to keep in mind depending on bust size.

Ordered a size up from normal after reading reviews, but wish I would have ordered my regular size. I have a smaller bust, shoulders and ribcage and the straps were slipping off my shoulders. It also felt like it got a bit looser as the night went on. Other than that it was a perfect dress! Would definitely rent again in an xs
Hugs your body very well, I didn't need to wear a bra with this dress and the material is thick enough to hold everything in.

links_reviews_title: Great fit! Vibrant color! Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great fit

Super cute and fitted. The one thing I didn't love were the straps are too long, everything is super tight and fitted but the straps were loose and anytime I would move my breasts would spill over the top because the straps gave. Obviously I couldn't wear it out because of this issue.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit and made a great body shape
links_reviews_text: The cleavage is a bit big - you can’t really wear a bra underneath (not sure if it covers the entire boob then though)
suits my body shape well
Incredible dress for date night but too tight for me. Runs small
Dress is very snug I didn’t work for me because I felt like I couldn’t move
I'm usually a size small in HL, but this was too tight. I suggest sizing up one size. Also, too low cut for me.

links_reviews_title: Red coral color is so pretty! Great quality, runs tight. Small is small but not short.
links_reviews_text: Big boobs will fit a small but my hips 31 were not fitting the small. Could zip the back. Maybe my butt is a little big too! Lol.
I always love Herve Leger dresses. This one is not too formal, red with pink trim, which made it easy to wear for several occasions. Fit is typical Herve, tight and fits the curves. Really adorable.

This dress was gorgeous.... I had ordered a different dress but it looked horrible on me. Got on the phone and chatted with customer service and we went through other dresses. This one caught my eye and it ended up being the best dress ever. I even received it the next day.... the lovely lady sent 2 other sizes just in case. I had so many compliments and felt like a million bucks all night. I hated sending it back. The top was a bit reveling so I just pinned it and you couldn't tell.... highly recommend this dress, it was PERFECT for the wedding we attended.
Maybe if you're in the first trimester or you don't pop like I do but the belly pushes up the dress and the bust part flays open. Did not end up wearing.

I really enjoyed this dress. I felt pretty while wearing it. It was for my friend's wedding and it was outside in the heat. While sweating it out, this dress did not tip off now sweaty I really was! It was long but that's my fault. I really wanted to rent this dress and took what I could. Won't make that mistake again!
Felt like a princess, very cool back detail. I do think you need broad shoulders for this one though to fill out the straps. And was very low cut for daytime office but I was able to pin it.

I rented this dress for a outdoor summer formal wedding. Although it was beautiful there are some big fit issues. I had read reviews about the strap length so was prepared to make a few adjustments with fashion tape but did not expect how many issues I would have. I had to use so much tape and safety pins on this dress it made wearing it such a chore and I was worried the whole night about my chest showing. I spent the entire wedding night pulling, tugging and fixing this dress. Super annoying! Even though it was very pretty I wish I would have picked something else so I could have enjoyed the night rather than fiddling with the dress.
Love the fabric, the flow, the length and colors. My only drawback is that this requires no bra or special fit like NuBra because of the open back. Would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Your boobs will fall out when you sit....
links_reviews_text: This dress looks great when standing up! But as soon as I sat down in the church pews, everyone around me could see everything if I wasn't sitting straight up. I don't have big boobs, but I have a broad back and rib cage and it still fell open. I was very uncomfortable sitting down. I actually changed after the ceremony

I did not wear the dress. Had a couple issues. One being that it really was too long for me. I am 5'5" and even in three inch heels, it would have drug. Probably needed the regular for sure. My issue was the cleavage. This photo of me is after I had pinned the dress several inches. Yes, I could have worn it, but I just wouldn't be comfortable. The good thing is that because of the gathering, you can pin the top and hide it. The sash on the dress gives it a more casual nod to the overall style and is why I rented it. I was sad that it didn't work, but would suggest for smaller people - it is a lovely dress.
Was really easy to wear, felt comfortable just had to tape the chest area to make sure I didn’t slip out

links_reviews_title: The back of this dress was beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The only negative thing I could say is that I had to pin the front because it was too deep for my small chest and that RTR needs to ensure that all hooks are secure because I had to tack mine down.

An absolutely stunning dress with a gorgeous skirt and pattern. Be warned, the bust is wide and low and you will need tape. It's also backless so get a backless stick on bra made for low cut tops. Ultimately I was very worried about falling out of it all night. Beautiful in pictures though!
Overall fit was perfect. Just a bit big on top...used safety pins to help support. Very comfortable. Lots of compliments!!
My boobs weren't big enough so I had to pin in front but so cute and fun

Wore this to brunch with girlfriends. Loved it!! Had to end up pinning the top though because as you can see it's revealing. Long so wear heels. And it's super thick. Lots of layers. Obsessed and almost want to buy it

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress but it didn't stay up so my boobs were a little too much out there.
links_reviews_text: Loves this dress. Had to pin the top since it was falling down too far and showing too much but I loved the back and the whole feel.
Got so many compliments in this dress! It's perfect but it does run large as other reviews point out. No complaints.

Such a beautiful dress. I'm small chested, but still felt like the dress was more low cut / revealing than I expected. I still wore it because I was on vacay with my hubby, but wouldn't exactly wear this around grandma.

The Long is very long (I'm just under 5'10) and it had to be lifted to walk up stairs to avoid tripping (may or may not have happened once or twice). Biggest complaint was the neckline is very revealing. I used double sided tape, but was worried throughout the event that I might expose more than intended. Waist is small and my back was a little big for it, but fine once hooked in. I think a C or D cup would be good for it. It may gap on smaller cup sizes and can't fully cover larger sizes (I am a 34DDD).

links_reviews_title: It's a beautiful dress. The top runs large so I was adjusting all day.
links_reviews_text: The top runs large.

I love the way it flows when you walk. And the colors are bright and perfect for any Summer occasion. I'm tall so I love the length. Definitely can be worn with heels. Will rent again. I may size up only because I'm broad in the breast area and it fit snug so I didn't snap the top together. (Thus the reason for the lite sweater)

links_reviews_title: Not ideal for girls with short torso
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful, but the straps were too big on me. I used it for a photoshoot and although it photographed beautifully, I feel like a lot of my photos came out badly because the dress didn't fit 100%. If you have a short torso, don't order it.

I love this trendy floral dress by Badgley Mischka. It ran true to size fitted on top and flowy on the bottom. The slip underneath doesn't hinder at all. Works well with A-D cups(i suggest double sided tape for the cleavage area) and I also suggest either no bra if you can help it or a sticky bra because the sides and most of the front will cover it. The dress length was just slightly off the floor in 3 in. heels. The vibrant colors are enough to flatter any skin tone. I would definitely wear this again!

links_reviews_title: So easy to wear, yet gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'10", the long was almost too long, even in 3" heels. The back is what makes this dress. I received compliments all night long! The material moved well and was easy to wear.

Loved the dress, top was slightly large and I had to pin it. Also needed help with the back! Was comfortable and beautiful! Was at a destination wedding in 80+ humid weather and wasn't to warm in the dress!

This dress was fun and perfect for a semiformal wedding. I have a small ribcage and chest - could have gone down to an 8. You do have to be careful about leaning over since you can't wear a bra. I'm tall so having the Long option was great. I don't think anyone under 6ft should order the long.

links_reviews_title: Have extra strength double sided tape
links_reviews_text: Very strange fit in the chest/back area.
Comfortable and beautiful print
This dress is so gorgeous and the Detailing on the back is so cool. However this dress is made for someone with a much smaller chest. I felt much to exposed in.

I love this feminine dress by Badgley Mischka! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and loose at the hips. It works best for A-C cup. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear no bra due to cut of dress. At 5'0", the length was long on me. This dress was fun and flirty but be aware of the low cut on the bust area. Pair with your favorite pair of heels and a statement accessory to complete your outfit!

links_reviews_title: super pretty but huge in chest
links_reviews_text: i wanted to wear this dress so bad! unfortunately, the top was HUGE. I might try sizing down again but the cute and back details were super pretty!

I am a 32 E that has nursed 2 children. This dress was less than ideal. I worse breast pedals and literally taped it to my body so I wouldn't expose myself. I though formal dresses were usually sized on the larger side but I think I may have been one of the first to rent this one. Normally I'm a 32E, size 28. I ordered a 4 and 6. Wore the 4. Wish I had ordered the 2!
I couldn't wear this beautiful dress because there was so much extra material on the chest.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, but I felt very exposed
links_reviews_text: The neckline was very 'plungy'. I basically had to tape myself into the dress because I was afraid of falling out of it when I bent over. I don't have a large bust, and this dress really didn't do me any favors.

links_reviews_title: I will not be able to wear this dress to my event. Size 20 wasn't available and 18 is too small.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful gown. Extremely well made. It was too small, but I usually wear a 20-22 and this was all that was available. Would work with strappy heeled sandals or fancy flat sandals.

links_reviews_title: Would be great for a tall, busty figure
links_reviews_text: My perfect size is usually a 4P and this dress was sent as a backup pick from a stylist without asking what I would prefer when my original order wasn't available to ship. It was far too long for even the highest heels to manage, several inches too wide in the waist, the V came past my belly button, and... I was just swimming in it. Would work for someone tall with a long torso/large bust!

Couldn't keep the straps up on this and my boobs covered. Spent the whole afternoon with my arms across my chest, trying to keep myself in. I wear a C cup and I'm not sure what cup size would be good for this. Any smaller and you'd run the same risk I had of straps falling down and exposing you and any bigger and you'd have the issue of boobs popping out the front on their own. The chest needs more security. Don't recommend.
I ordered my regular size and it was a tad too big. I still wore it but I think if I sized down one size I would have loved it!! The back detail is beautiful. For reference I'm 5'8" , 34B and 130lbs
Pretty dress. I didn't wear bc I felt the back straps gave me back fat and wasn't flattering. Otherwise, fit well. Length to the floor.

This was sent to me as a backup when my original order wasn't available. I didn't originally choose it because reviews had noted that it ran large in the busy. I tried it on and found that this was true- much too large in the bust for my size which made it unwearable for me.

This dress was beautiful, but I wound up wearing another one I'd ordered. However, if I had worn this one, I would've definitely needed pins and/or pasties. The bust on this dress is VERY roomy, like the other reviewers mentioned.
This fits sooo well! I just got it for work but I could wear it to a wedding, in fact my grandma is going to rent it for a wedding! In love!
Beautiful dress with amazing colors. Not much of a shape to it so it's very comfortable to walk around in and flows in the wind.

My 4 year old said this looks "fuzzy," but he also said it was "pretty." I have been wanting to rent this for a while, but now that I have it I am not sure it is my style. I thought it might be a better spring pick with the flowers, but the color scheme is surprisingly wintery. This is best for winter or fall. As far as what type of event I am not sure. I almost didn't wear it, but I didn't want to waste the rental and wore it to work. I received a "gasping" comment about the beauty of the embroidery from a coworker. I tried it with a belt, but liked it better without. This is a dress you wear to show off the dress, and not to show off your figure. You can see the natural light hit the embroidery in my photo to see the matte nature of the thread used.

This dress is so beautiful and comfortable to wear. I retails for like $1600 and I can see why. The dress is actually 2 dresses- a black underslip and the embroidery on top. The detail and colors are fantastic. Lots of compliments from strangers! Note that the slip is cut low in the front so a bra that isn't "Demi" cut will show. I wore this to an evening event around 70 degrees and it was perfect. Paired with the Les Petits Jouers Mini Pixie Golden Lolita bag.
Such a quality made dress! Beautiful colors, thick material, find design. Runs large and loose. Size down for a more form flattering look

This dress was amazing. I would wear this every day if I could. It was a heavy dress, but did not feel heavy on. Because it is all embroidered, it does not wrinkle. I wore it with a blazer and belt to work, even though it is fairly dressy. I guess it could be the perfect work to dinner dress! I didn't want to send it back!

Wore this stunner on vacation in Mexico to channel my inner Frida Kahlo. This runs large at the waist with a flared skirt so order down. The outer dress is flowers embroidered on black netting. It comes with a separate long black slip. A very special, elegant dress.

This dress is so pretty and the stitching on the flowers is exquisite. Multiple people stopped me to ask if they could touch the flowers because they're so pretty that they look 3D. It's a bit shapeless in the waist so I added a belt and thought it worked nicely.

links_reviews_title: The quality was wonderful-I dressed it down with ankle boots and a leather jacket. Loved!
links_reviews_text: Could have gone down a size but it was fine. Full skirt

links_reviews_title: Too big! It's beautifully embroidered but the inside slip was huge .
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautifully embroidered but made it heavy . Tried to fix the fit because it was too too big but it just wouldn't stay . Very disappointed

Amazing, beautiful, comfortable dress. My only complaint would be the low cut slip which would be fine except I was at a work event. If I owned it I would have shortened the shoulder straps of the slip. But overall so beautiful and I will rent again!
I wore this to a Christmas party. Very beautiful and got many compliments. It's rather heavy and intricately made.

links_reviews_title: I love this pattern. It's super special and fun while also cozy!
links_reviews_text: I have tried this dress in two sizes now, and it is still a bit too big, even in the smaller size. I love the material and the pattern and will probably try again in an even smaller size for more holiday parties!
The details are amazing, and this dress is very well made. It just needed something to define the waist, and a belt didn't help. It didn't work for me, but the details are intricate and lovely.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but not for shorter women
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful, well-made, and unique. I felt it was too long to pass for cocktail on me. I'm 5'4" and the dress brushed the tops of my feet.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear--fabric too heavy for heat!
links_reviews_text: If you are 5'3", expect a "maxi" fit. Low-cut slip under dress layer that is heavy embroidery type material, with delicate mesh connecting the flowers.

links_reviews_title: Did not fit me well. I returned without wearing it.
links_reviews_text: Too large un the waist and under bust.
Gorgeous dress but runs huge.

links_reviews_title: Such a gorgeous fabric but so thick and heavy
links_reviews_text: Design was an odd combination of summer sleeveless with a floral fabric, but fabric so heavy and wintery. Was nice to rent once.
runs a bit large in bodice, but really lovely dress--too big so I didn't wear it
Too large and boxy. I didn't end up wearing it.

links_reviews_title: It was lovely and colorful and great for a spring wedding
links_reviews_text: it was a bit large
I think I would've loved this had I had the right size. I'm typically a 6, but sometimes a 4 and the 44 was far too big.

Accessorizing is important on this one. On the hanger it kind of looks like an apron. But in an interesting way. I added a wide, tasseled, black leather wrap belt, green alligator skin peep toe pumps, and a moto jacket and had a lot of fun wearing it.
I definitely had to add a belt because the dress has a wide waist. But once I added the belt, then it fit great. I am 5' 9.5" and this is a good dress for tall girls.

Wore to a date night and Christmas party. Not great for busty women, but I have a medium bust and it fit beautifully. However the waist is not fitted, and I used a skinny black belt. My sister was surprised it didn’t come with the dress, since it looked great with the belt but not body flattering without it

links_reviews_title: Breathtakingly made… But not for me
links_reviews_text: The handiwork on this dress is amazing. It's a stunning piece but it just didn't work for my body type. It made me look like I didn't have any waist. I got it new with tags and I so wanted it to work.

Beautiful teal midi dress! Perfect amount of cleavage-36C and did not need a bra-nor would it have worked with a bra. Very elegant. Got tons of looks and many compliments. Wish I had another place to wear this to-would totally rent again.

The color of this dress is a lovely dark teal, and it fit true to size. I rented for work, and the keyhole neckline was way deeper than I realized. Would have to wear a tank or slip dress under or else no bra?

links_reviews_title: One of the best dresses I've ever worn.
links_reviews_text: Would buy in a heartbeat if not so expensive. This dress felt silky smooth, fit amazingly and has such a beautiful color. I loved that the sleeves are belled but not super long (I'm petite). It fit great in the chest (36D) while also fitting great at the waist (27.5") thanks to the tie. Literally perfect for me. I wore a black cami underneath to make work appropriate and that looked just fine.

Neckline was just to low to wear, and cannot be worn as is with a normal bra. It was also prone to static so was not a great fabric to wear in the winter. I think if the neckline was sewn up like 4 inches, this would make a great dress for spring or fall. I never wore out, but would rent again if it was not mid winter
Fit and color were amazing, very low cut so no bra but some tape was needed.

links_reviews_title: This is a beautiful dress. I never found an occasion to wear it though
links_reviews_text: Lovely color

links_reviews_title: color is fantastic and fr was super flattering.
links_reviews_text: super glam!

links_reviews_title: Top ended up bigger than a keyhole!
links_reviews_text: Its a beautiful dress, color gorgeous, fabric nice but the keyhole closure wouldn't close. I am a 32C and it just wasn't appropriate to wear out. Better for a small busted woman.

links_reviews_title: Stunning and flattering to the breast.
links_reviews_text: I wear a ten, but my waist was small and so the wrap around needed to be wrapped tightly.

Perfect little hi-lo hem spring dress. Loved the print and the bodice detail. Ran snug in my chest, large in hips so I'm just calling it TTS. I'm a huge fan of Three Floor and am working my way through them one at a time. This one did not disappoint. See my other RTR looks on Instagram at agentcheryl. 👋😊
This dress is prettier in person as the material is nicer than I expected. The fit is very flattering especially for small busts.

links_reviews_title: I want to buy but I'm a bigger size
links_reviews_text: Zips to the waist but the chest and back area are meant for a size 2 or 0
Wore with big gold jewelry to try to make this feel more "evening." It felt super preppy but fashionable. Got lots of compliments and also dress made my normally small boobs look awesome.
Great dress. Wore it to a shower as a bridesmaid. I ordered a size up bc of the reviews and I should I have ordered a size down. Received so many compliments !
This fit perfectly true to size! I didn't have any issues with the fit and was nervous from orevious reviews. The fabric is nice and is very comfortable to wear all day.
very flattering, perfect for a daytime event, material was a bit hot but not too bad

links_reviews_title: Stand-out color, but not a stand-out material
links_reviews_text: The color is a stand-out, but my biggest issue with the dress was the material. It does not breathe, and despite the billowy nature of the skirt-- you feel hot and constructed while wearing it. Not my favorite, but it does photograph well....so there's that.
Fit me amazing and I got 100 compliments in person and on Insta! Was a little tight in chest but nothing I would complain about!
This dress is fantastic. The fit is great. the hi-low ruffle cut skirt is flirty. It hugs and draws attention to all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors and material, hello boobs
links_reviews_text: Stunning colors and material, loved the look but the under piece was soooo tight given this dress is loose in the bottom. I had to wear the under part around my waist. I also didn't need to wear a bra as it was form fitting on the top and I'm a 32 DDDD. Loved a lot about this dress but wouldn't rent again.
I ordered a size larger then normal and didn't need to. But the color and beauty of the dress made up for it. It was so pretty for Palm Sunday and brunch!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress at 35 weeks pregnant and loved it!
links_reviews_text: The colour is slightly darker yellow and it's very silky. The chest area isn't too big which is great for girls who aren't that booby. I wore this sized up in my 35th week of pregnancy and the zip in the back was a little bit scrunched up but I didn't mind it. I'm normally a size 4 and 5'5
This is a great dress and has very favorite colors but I could not zip it up in the rib cage. Recommend sizing up!
Not worn. Dull yellow color. Tight across cleavage area.

links_reviews_title: Such a flattering neckline, not too long even for a petite 5'3" person!

links_reviews_text: The material of this dress is so pretty. It doesn't work well if you wear over a size C bra, though. I was coming out of the top and sides!! The rest of the fit was normal, just the top that was tight!
It's a cute dress but I couldn't zip it up so had to send it back without wearing it. Suggest sizing up.
Way too small. I couldn't even zip up my recommended size
I loved this dress and would definitely rent again! It's a little snug in the chest area, but I was comfortable and didn't need to wear a bra with it which was nice.

links_reviews_title: The fabric is so layered and heavy. The overall feel is really low quality and poorly made.
links_reviews_text: The overall feeling is cheap. It is not a light, flouncy, airy dress. It is layered, heavy and weighty. Really not a summer dress totally looking like one. Don't go for it.
The dress was comfortable, light and very flattering! The color was bright and made me feel celebratory.

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress. I'm 5'8" and the length was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Not for bigger chest ladies, but the color is fantastic. Highly recommend for a bridal luncheon or spring/summer wedding.

The waist fits great but the top is very low cut and lose fitting. Im only 32B but the top was literally falling down all day. Awkward. If you have a small waist and are large busted this may work for you but its gonna be a peep show.
I was really impressed with the high quality of this dress. It was a super fun dress to wear on a date night.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress but not for me
links_reviews_text: Tight on the bustline, not for ladies with C or D cup
Beautiful dress. Tight in the chest. If you have a large chest, this dress is not for you. True to size every where else

Such a fun pop of color and flattering silhouette! I wore this to dinner with my boyfriend for my birthday. Lots and lots of compliments :) definitely runs small. I'm a true size 2 and ordered the 4. It fit me perfect but I'm very small in the bust. Others may want to size up two sizes.
I could not wear this. It looks really fun online, but like a low-quality mu-mu in person.

This dress did not fit me and I was super sad about it! I couldn't get the zipper to go all the way. I thought it was still a pretty dress, but it definitely looked different from the photos. Little darker shade a yellow and a different fabric than I anticipated.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing to the wedding.
links_reviews_text: runs small and could not zip up

This is a great dress! The cut and details make it very unique, and the colors are perfect for spring and summer. The first thing I noticed is that it is a darker yellow than pictured. It's a true marigold yellow. I ordered a size 8 when usually wear a 6 because another customer noted that it runs small in the bust. This was accurate. The 8 fit perfectly. I am short and worried it would be too long, but length was not an issue. Despite how much I loved the dress overall, I didn't end up wearing it. I ordered it for a First Communion but as the neckline of the dress really highlights the decolletage I think it's more appropriate for a garden party. I went with the backup dress, but will definitely be ordering this for another occasion.
This dress feels super cheap and flimsy. The fabric is nothing special and it did nothing for my body type. I had high hopes, but decided to return this immediately.
This dress was cute, but not flattering on me. I have a large bust and it just didn't work.
I took off one star because the fabric has a sheen that I didn’t see in the photo and didn’t care for. Otherwise, it was a sweet and pretty dress.

I loved this dress and the overall style, color and fit! It was super unique to anything I would usually buy and I got a lot of compliments on the dress throughout the evening. It ran a little small in the bust but everywhere else was super comfortable.
I could not zip chest area. size up
Fit well. Wide neck - needed to wear something inside.
I am a 4 or 6, but am busty. Could not wear this. Would need an 8 to fit.

The dress was perfect for what we were trying to accomplish. It was even comfortable to wear at 35 weeks pregnant, and there is enough stretch to get the zipper closed. I'm usually a 2 or a 4, but pregnant I'm about 140 so the 6 was fine. Probably could have done an 8. I'm also 5'8", and if I were to have worn it anywhere I would have required a long size.
The size 8 fit very well! Was very happy with the dress and fit!

I am typically a size 16 or 18 but the only size available was a 20 so I went for it! It fit nicely with some shape wear underneath although the sequins did scratch my underarms a bit throughout the night. So many compliments all night long, it was fun to dress up in something so glamorous!

The fit feels a bit tight at first but does relax after you wear it awhile. Beware - if you wear your hair down and dance all night, your hair (or at least mine) will get tangled and caught in all the sequins. Other than that, I LOVED this dress. It was a perfect glamorous roaring 20s look!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for engagement photos in Eleuthera!
links_reviews_text: I typically am somewhere between a size 6 and 8. The 8R fit perfectly. Didn't have shoes on for the picture but could have worn heels and the length would've been just right. The shimmery blush color looked great amongst the sand, so if you're getting married on the beach but don't want to wear a traditional wedding gown, this would be a great option. The only hang-up was that the boning inside the dress just under the bust was sticking out and causing some irritation. I only wore the dress long enough for the pictures but had I worn it for several hours, it would have definitely been a problem. Otherwise, gorgeous gown!

In a world or black and blue at formal events go gold. This dress was absolutely beautiful. I am 5'9 and the long fit perfect with heels. It is pretty form fitting so you may want to invest in some shape wear for smooth appearance. Overall A+

I didn't chose this dress because my hair kept getting caught in the dress which hurt after a while. It was truly gorgeous and I definitely would've worn it. Also didn't wear cause I felt like I really needed to suck in my gut or wear two garments to smooth my tummy. #OhNoHunny

This dress fit like a glove. It was so comfortable and everyone wanted to borrow it from me because it looked so good. It fit true to size. I am small up too and it was very flattering for me and even helped me shape my biggest problem area of my stomach.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel GORGEOUS!!! I never wanted to take it off or return it!!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for a wedding I was attending. I wanted something that would be a little bit warm and elegant--also appropriate for a winter wedding. I love all things sparkly, and so when I saw this dress online, I knew I had to try it. I was nervous being that I am very short that the dress would be too long. However, I wore these soft pink 4inch heels with it, and the REGULAR length fit perfectly. I was shocked since I usually need to wear petite length. I was also pleasantly surprised that I did not need to wear a bra with this dress even though, I am very busty. The dress has very supportive lining to hold you in place. It would be remiss for me not to mention the quality customer service I received. Two days prior to when my order was scheduled to ship, I received an email that my "backup size" was unavailable! I searched the website and then I finally called RTR the night before it was supposed to ship. The customer sales representative I spoke to was very helpful and even sent me two additional "backups." My complete order arrived on time, which is impressive and awesome. Evidently, I didn't need the backups since the original dress fit perfectly, but it was super comforting to know I had options, and they really helped me to feel ready for my event. Overall, I love the color--it's a very subtle rose gold, the sweetheart/off-the shoulder neckline was very flattering, the sequins were surprisingly comfortable and not scratchy, and I was able to dance and move no problem! This dress really showed off my figure in a very feminine way, and just made me feel so sexy and confident. I will 100% rent this dress again when the opportunity arises!!! The pictures I took do not even do this dress justice! It is even more gorgeous in person.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress other than the sleeves!!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress and would've worn it if the sleeves were a little more loose. The entire dress is a stretchy material, fits to size and length, and super forgiving so I adored it! I knew I was going to be dancing though and the material around your arms is super tight and not as stretchy as the rest of the dress. If you're not worried about the arm part of this dress, I'd say go for it!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments from complete strangers!
links_reviews_text: This dress wasn't my first choice but I had a problem with my other dress right before the event so I had to wear this one. I was a little self conscious about this dress because of my tummy area. Even with spanx underneath, if you have a belly, you'll still see it. Despite how I felt about myself, I received compliment after compliment on this dress from complete strangers at the event and it was very comfortable.

This was my back up choice but as soon as I saw it on I knew it needed to be THE dress for an upcoming fundraiser dinner, "Bling" themed. I got compliments all night and loved the way it hugged my curves. There's a great little shaped INSIDE the dress but I threw on a bit of control for my midsection. Glad I did because like others have said, the boning in the built-in control pokes ya (like an old bra where the wiring is coming out). I'd rent another dress like this again!!!

LOVED this dress. I got many compliments on it! I was a little Leary of wearing such a form fitting gown since having my son but I felt like a queen. This was my first time ordering from RTR and the experience was so great! Will definitely be ordering dresses from here again! I am 5'6" 170 lbs. typical pant size is a 10. Dress I wore was an 8.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to the Oscars.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well. I ordered a size up based on the previous reviews and glad I did because it is very form fitting. I also recommend shapewear for girls with extra curves. All and all it was a wonderful dress and a smooth experience. I would recommend!!

links_reviews_title: Such a head turner! Made me feel like a star.
links_reviews_text: Surprisingly comfortable! It had lots of stretch, so fine for dancing, sitting and looked great all night. I wanted the 0, but there was only a 2. Was a little big, so probably runs true to size. I'm 5'5" and wore three inch heels, but my toes were a little visible as the dress didn't touch the floor.
