Was great - no tripping hazard, but longer would have been better for pictures. Beware! There is a lining and a second layer of thicker fabric. I thought that the dress was bunching up around my waist because it was too big. My date and a friend tried to figure it out, but we couldn't. Wasn't til later that I discovered the inner layer. (Maybe I'm not meant to dress up?) Please give this dress a try - you won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and attention grabber
links_reviews_text: When I tried the dress on it hurt pretty bad, the wire in the bodice. But I tried it on with spanx on and it wasn't noticable. It fit so well and I got so many compliments. I didn't want to take it off!
Absolutely gorgeous dress. It fits perfectly. Light to wear and sooo sparkly. Everyone was looking and making compliments that it was the most beautiful dress of the party
Dress was a little snug but in a good way, kept it from sliding off. Decent range of motion with the sleeves, although still a little restricting. Got so many compliments and had fun wearing it!
This dress is glamorous! There are two layers of lining and the sequins are true gold, beautiful in person. I'm 5'4" and the dress just skimmed the floor with heels on.
i received many compliments on the photo. Fits great on a large bust.

links_reviews_title: Sparkly and gorgeous, but too short.
links_reviews_text: The 6L in this dress fits like the 8L in the red matte version. The dress was the perfect length without heels (and yes, I got the long) but unfortunately was too short with heels as you can see in the photos. I'm 5'9" and wore ~2.5" heels. Still a gorgeous dress, but my fully showing ankles and feet will forever bother me.
I wore this dress for a nye wedding and it was perfect. So flattering yet so comfortable. I danced all night without a problem. Didn't need a bra. The color and fabric are perfect.

This dress was amazing! I felt like I could've walked the red carpet. I received tons of compliments and it was very comfortable. It is a little stretchy so it worked well for my body shape. I'm only 5'3" and wore 3" heels and it was the perfect length.

links_reviews_title: I ordered this for my wedding and it was absolutely perfect!
links_reviews_text: I am 5’7” and 130lbs. I wore and 8L but I think I could have fit into a 6. The 8 fit but was a tiny bit big. You definitely couldn’t tell and it looked beautiful regardless! I got compliments all night long!

5’6 1/2, 130lbs, 36/26/34.5, 34F bust. Wore w. 3 inch heels. Wish it was a little longer but it fit great. Only reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is because of a bulge in the beginning part of the zipper on the rear (it zips up in the back). It bulged out and could get it to lie smooth on my rear. I think it’s a result of the dress being stretched out by previous users. Still felt like a million bucks and will definitely use RTR again.

links_reviews_title: It's just a beautiful dress and everyone loved it
links_reviews_text: If the dress is too big, there is a strange gathering at the back where the waist meets the butt. Make sure to get a size that is right and tight so the bunching doesn't occur. Luckily I got a 2 and 2P so I was able to eat the smaller one to get rid of most of the bunching

Old glam Hollywood is my go to for weddings and this dress was it ! Hugged my curves and secured my bust ( I'm very busty ) it had a built in corset which was great. Everything about this dress was amazing.

*size 6L, not 8L like review says. I wore this for my engagement photos - I'm 5'9 and the long length was still way too short and I'm not THAT tall. It photographs beautifully but just keep in mind it's very mermaid-y (hard to tell in this picture) and shorter than expected. Was itchy like other reviews mention but definitely photographs well! I did not like how the sequins looked in person though.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing but so gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Tried on a bunch of dresses for my brother's wedding with RTR Unlimited so wanted to share fit details. Didn't wear bc I found a dress I liked better but these Badgley Mischka sequined dresses fit amazingly to my curvy body type. I've loved almost every one I've tried! Loved that this covered my upper arm scars. Didn't need bra with tighter fit. Normally a 14 or 16, but with these BM dresses, usually run a bit big so go with 14. Would also wear shape wear for smooth look.

links_reviews_title: This dress gave me confidence I typically lack at formal affairs.
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Only 2P was available, otherwise I would've ordered a 4R. I chanced it and it worked!

links_reviews_title: The most beautiful gown I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: I wore this gown to a Marine Corps birthday ball. I literally didn't stop receiving compliments from friends and strangers alike throughout the evening. I felt so beautiful and honestly one of my favorite dresses I've ever worn! Seems to be true to size, I am 5'5 and it was a perfect length with heels. Get this dress, you won't regret it!

I'm 225, 5'6"... and definitely have a tummy! I wore an 18L with 3" heels...I threw on some Spanx as this dress is form fitting, but it was perfect! I got sooo many compliments in this dress! Even by a gay man who pulled over just to compliment me! You know they don't lie about that stuff! Lol the dress was so comfortable... the boning pokes a bit, I just had to adjust it a bit. I wish I could buy this dress... so sad to return it! I would & did recommend this dress & RTR to everyone last night!
Fits like a glove, the stomach is a bit unforgiving because of the sequins, but still beautiful
This dress will make any girl feel like a princess. It is stunning in person and photographs well.
This dress is GORGEOUS! The only downside is it runs short so definitely go with the long. The sequins didn't bother my arms at all and I was very comfortable all night.

Super flattering and absolutely gorgeous, this dress is a total fave. It runs true to size but it is a bit short, which I actually liked because I didn't have to worry about tripping on it. The boning gives the dress a great shape but it can be a bit uncomfortable, all worth it tho

The fabric has a little give to it, so it's comfortable and easy to move in. The sequins didn't get itchy or irritating. Arm movement is a little restrictive, but that's the only negative. It's a beautiful dress!

This was the best dress I've ever worn! I received compliments all night. I would say it runs small because I'm a 12 normally and this was a 16 and it fit me perfectly. It has a snug layer like spanks, a liner, and then the top layer. I loved the neckline and just overall this dress.

I wore this dress 26 weeks pregnant and felt like I was Blake Lively 😍 it has a nice stretch and is super flattering with extra curves. The only issue I had was some annoying wiring on the bodice that poked me all night.
This dress fit perfectly. I wear a size 10 and a 10r fit fantastic. I felt like a million bucks. I got so many compliments. I didn't even know I was so curvy lol.
Wore for a night out / dinner with friends. Received many compliments

links_reviews_title: I received a lot of compliments from my husband and friends at my party and felt so pretty.
links_reviews_text: It fit like a glove. A little short in the leg but it looked great with strappy high heels.
Top portion runs big but made it work. Nice quality. So many compliments on back and whole outfit.

Had a work gala to attend and theme was circus. Thought this was a bit of a modern take on a "ringmaster". The bottom half fit amazing but the top, if slouching, can present a little side boob. Received a ton of compliments and loved the pockets!

I rented this sexy jumpsuit for my boy friends birthday dinner. Absolutely was in love! My only discrepancies were the zipper got stuck multiple times, and the crotch on the pants is a little baggy. For a short girl the pants do not give that tapered cropped look that the model pulls off. Over all, LOVED!

Wore this jumpsuit for my bachelorette party and received so many compliments. Since it's backless the top can shift a little and gap so it can come close to some serious side boob but didn't bother me since I'm not very top heavy. Loved the halter, very flattering for your shoulders.

links_reviews_title: The way I felt in the jumpsuit. It looked and felt amazing!!
links_reviews_text: Just a note to those women who are short waisted like me... you will need to use fabric tape to prevent the little gapping that occurs when you bend over. I also wore a sticky bra which helped keep everyone in their place lol

Loved this jumper but my post nursing boobs were not a fan. The fit was great in the waist and hips and at 5'8" the jumper did not ride up. I so wish I could wear garments that show a lil side boob but trying to pull that off on my birthday was not ideal. I wore a sticky bra which helped but did not allow me to move and dance as freely and comfortably as I'd like. Otherwise a really cute and fun rental for ladies with a smaller bust

This is one of my favorite outfits to date. The small fit perfectly (I normally wear a 2-4) and the length was perfect. I was a little nervous about the side boob, but it wasn't an issue. Highly recommend this rental!!!

This outfit is well made, quality material; it's flattering to your figure, smooth on your curves! I felt classy, sexy, and confident the entire night!! I ordered a 4/6 and a 2 /4 as a backup; and glad I did--I ended up wearing the 2/4! Be prepared to wear a strapless bra or other alternative ; I'm a 32 DD, and definitely needed something to keep the sides down...I wore a strapless and although the band showed in the back, it blended nicely... ; )

Loved the design and halter backless cut of this jumpsuit. It was a bit snug when seated as the fabric didn't have a ton of flexibility. Also going to the restroom required planning ahead to help with getting unbuttoned and unzipped. But I loved the look and would recommend this piece!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Sexy romper. My husband said I never looked better.

links_reviews_title: I used this jumpsuit for a girls night out. Sexy, and modest all in one. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: The material was great, was true to size. I'm a 36D and they held the girls in place with no problem, however, the cut on the sides is definitely very narrow, so you must be comfortable with showing off plenty of skin. The zipper was a bit hard getting up and down, so plan on having a "bathroom buddy" with you. Overall I was extremely please with this outfit!
I loved this piece because it caught everyone's eye. It also was a great conversation piece.

I really loved this jumpsuit. I rented it along with another dress for my boyfriend's med ball. Even though most people were in dresses, I don't regret the choice at all. I loved the fit and the open back. Some people had issues with the sides of the suit and needing tape but i was totally fine. I usually wear a small in dresses and wore an xs in this.

links_reviews_title: Great for a night out, as long as you have double sided tape!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to karaoke with some friends, and it was a definite hit! Couple things to note, however: 1) double sided tape is a MUST (and bring extra in case you have to disrobe to use the facilities...), and 2) there is zero stretch, so you can't size down to avoid the chest gap. I had no issues with side chest peaking out but only because I used a lot of tape. I tried to wear a stick on/backless bra but the sides went up too high, so I went without; the fabric was thick enough that it was okay to do so. I'm 5'5 and wore 3 inch heels with it. The pants fell at my ankles which I thought looked right. Got a ton of compliments!!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit is seriously the best
links_reviews_text: Oh man I really want to own this. Looking sexy and having pockets?! I've never been so comfortable while looking so fancy. It kept me warm in the chilly winter evening air too. Can't recommend enough.

I am 5'10" 150# 34DD athletic build, and the MR fit me perfectly. I wore a sticky/backless bra, as the back of this jumpsuit is low and completely open. The length cut off at the ankles (as shown on the model), but this worked as it's in style right now. I wore the jumpsuit with strappy low heels. I got tons of compliments!
I'm a hippy girl and small Chested. I'm a size 5. Worked well could move and love the open back.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful jumpsuit, perfect for a NYC holiday party
links_reviews_text: Sophisticated yet sexy jumpsuit. Paired it with a bold lip and heels. Was very comfortable and I felt like a million bucks. While it fit well for the most part, there is not a lot of material in the front.. so I would definitely invest in double-sided tape and prepare for boob slips (not nip slips). Most of the night I wore a fur vest over the jumper because I have large breasts and without it, the slightest movement would've cause a peep show. While I caution people about the top, everything else about the jumpsuit was fantastic and I got TONS of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This fit like a glove and was a great alternative to a long dress for a winter wedding :)
links_reviews_text: Personally, this fit me perfect. I have a petite athletic build and this really allowed for my arms, back, and traps to shine. No need to tape or adjustments throughout the night. Considering that I am 5'3" the jumpsuit had a full length fit. There was no need for me to roll the bottoms. I would 100 percent rent again.

My friend wore this she is approx 5'3'' with a 32C chest. Needed to wear some kind of frontal bra so that the top fit appropriately. I could not wear it with the size of my bust. Pants fit snug. Length was good for someone as short as me.

Really looooved this outfit! Pros: looks great in pictures, a million compliments, perfect to wear with heels Cons: I wish the back zipper came up a bit higher, only because I felt a little loose around my bust (total side boob if you're a C cup or above)

Fun jumpsuit to wear to a winter event. It was perfect for my NYE wedding. I did have to cuff and tape pant legs as it was a little long on me. Also had to pin the chest area to my bra so that the sticky bra didn't show out the side. Overall cute though and received many compliments.
Such a fun outfit for NYE! I got a ton of compliments and felt comfortable AND sexy. Pro tip: use some double sided tape on the bodice!

links_reviews_title: I think the romper was unique and was able to dance all night without issues.
links_reviews_text: I had to buy nipple covers to wear no bra in addition to double sided fashion tape. It wasn’t the easiest thing to wear especially because I was drinking a lot and dancing a ton which I was worried a boob would pop out because the top Is a weird cut since the back is so revealed. I have a B/C cup bra so it helped fill things out

I'm 6'0" tall so finding a jumper long enough, even in long sizes, was nearly impossible. However this Capri length pant was perfect! It is very open back so I used double-sided tape to make sure there were no "wardrobe malfunctions"
I was unable to wear this because the top was absolutely huge!

I know some people wear white on their bachelorette party, and I had ordered a white dress, but I just loooved this jumpsuit! It made my ass look great! And the back was so perfect. However, I am on the average/shorter end (5 4) and do not have a long torso and needed dress tape. And I needed to keep applying since I had to take the top off to use the bathroom. On my the girls in my party is 5 7 and she tried it and it was perfect for her. So I would recommend this for taller girls, or big chested girls who may not need to worry about the slip

This was a great rental for an evening event. The length was good for my 5'4" frame. The top did not gap for me (maybe because I have a slightly longer torso) so I didn't need fashion tape. The hook was tricky but otherwise a fun and dramatic rental.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love this jumper...it was perfect for our trip to NYC!
links_reviews_text: This outfit made my vacation! I felt like a celebrity!

Wore this to a nice charity event and was a great style for the occasion. Only drawback for me was that the top was a bit loose (I'm small-chested, 34B) so I was a bit conscious about it slipping or it gaping on the sides. Luckily the lighting was low and I wasn't doing anything that would require much movement.
Loved this pantsuit! It was totally covered and non-revealing from the front and than BOOM- the sexy open back!!! I felt amazing!

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jumpsuit for a Professional Work Event
links_reviews_text: Beautiful fit for a professional work event. The sides of the top cut in rather narrowly, so some skin showed even with the jacket, but it wasn't too noticeable. Got tons of compliments and felt great & comfortable while working all day! I transitioned this piece for going out at night...and the backlessness did not disappoint. Great jumpsuit, I was so sad to send it back!

Rented this for a birthday party and it was a big hit - lots of compliments. It runs a little right on bottom and lose on top - I continuously felt like I needed to pull on the sides. Best for a photo op than a night of dancing (or moving too much).

I rented this for a Masquerade Ball in New Orleans; wanted something a little different than the ball gowns and thought this looked chic. The top was too big. Not sure if it was stretched from frequent wearings or if it just didn't work for my body type. You probably can't tell in these pics , but I had to stand pushing my (non) chest out and shoulders back in order for the fabric to not gape ; even with clothing tape. The length was perfect (I'm 5'4).
Very flattering and comfortable. Doesn't wrinkle easily and just enough of subtle sexy that could be appropriate for many occasions. I really enjoyed wearing it.
This jumpsuit was perfect for my 30th birthday! Fit like a glove. The top was a bit loose but being busty, it wasn't a problem. Would absolutely rent again.
I have a long torso but was comfortable.
The side sleeves were handy to cover large upper arms, but you can also wear it with just the straps and have the sleeves be ruffles underneath. Back is open so bra would be hard.

I rented this for a wine tasting on the restaurant patio in 85 degree heat, it was perfect and hubby loved it. The pleating, the cut, color and interesting hem make it special. I had always wanted to try Halston and I was so pleased with this choice. I'm a true size 12 and the large was perfect. Would rent again.

This dress was fantastic for a destination wedding in Key West. I went with the Small, which fit through the body very well. The off-the-shoulder ruffles/shoulders got a bit tight when dancing, so I ended the night with removing them and only wearing the thin straps on top I loved the length of this dress, and I'm only knocking it one star because one of the tie straps In the back arrived basically chewed up without the tassel and made it difficult to properly tie in the back in a nice bow.

I'm 5'6" usually wear a size 2-4. Wore this to a beach wedding/reception and it was perfect. I wore the side shoulder straps down and no bra (size 32B). It was perfect! If you're between sizes, I'd go down. This was the XS!

Feminine and fun! I wore this for a wedding and received so many compliments. I took down the straps and wore it off the shoulder (although it was annoying for dancing) but I would totally recommend this rental

links_reviews_title: Put the Dancing Emoji to Shame
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun! I love the low back detail and the off-the-shoulder sleeves. The handkerchief hemline was also flattering and added nice movement to the dress. I wore this in 95 degree heat in Georgia and while I was sweating (obviously) the dress didn't add unwanted weight or warmth. Can't go wrong with red!

I wore this dress to a baby shower this weekend and want to wear it every single day. It is so flattering, flowy and can be dressed up or down. Great selling point was that I could skip wearing a bra with this dress as the bodice offers some support. RENT THIS DRESS.

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfortable but runs large
links_reviews_text: I loved the color of this dress. I received it in a M right before I flew out of town and needed 3 dresses for events and didn't have time to exchange it. This definitely ran large - I would rent again but in a S. (I am a S on top and 6 on bottom). Extremely comfortable and cute back of the dress.
Compliments from the flower girl to the grandmother and many in between. Beautiful details, like the delicate tie in the back. Highly recommend, will rent again!

links_reviews_title: I am so in love with this dress!! I will be renting this again!
links_reviews_text: #Wedding

The dress was great and comfortable. I don't wear red often and i'm glad I had the option for renting a dress I wouldn't wear again! I ordered a medium and large. The medium fit just fine but I wish I was taller! I feel the dress was too much for my body type and ended up looking frumpy. I was also not expecting the tie back to be so low but I made it work. Overall, cute dress, great fit, hit right on the knee.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect. Sexy but comfortable and easy to wear.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect. Sexy but comfortable and easy to wear. I received compliments all night. This is such a flattering dress. True to size. Rent this now!

This dress is really fun but might not work for all body types. It's a lot of fabric on top. I'm on the shorter side so the top fabric went close to my waist, making me look like a lampshade. I still enjoyed wearing it but it might be better on a taller person with a longer torso

links_reviews_title: Wore to a Fiesta-theme rehearsal dinner and looked perfect! Bright color!
links_reviews_text: 36DD with hips normally a size 12 and L was perfect . I was able to wear a strapless bra even though there's a low back.

Wore this to my parents anniversary party. Size medium was a little large but I wore a belt under the chest area which was hidden because it looked a little frumpy without it. But other than that gorgeous! Loved it and got several compliments.
Not my favorite, or the most flattering fit Loved the color Just ok!

Loved this dress! I am 5'2" about 125 lbs and a 34 C (usually a size 4). I wore the size small and it fit perfectly. Might have been able to wear the XS but did not want it to be too tight. I wore it with the straps down rather than off-the-shoulder, and you couldn't tell at all. The color is amazing in person! I would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Feeling like the salsa girl emoji
links_reviews_text: Love the fit! TTS/big. Very flowy and comfortable - was able to wear at the beach with a sunburn!

Loved this dress. Made you want to dance! It fit very true to size and I don't have a small ribcage & I'm a full D. I didn't tie the string across the back. I tucked it in instead. I would definitely recommend and would rent again.
I wore a Med, but I think the small would have been just fine. Fun dress to dance in!

I ordered this dress as a backup option for holiday parties. It ended up being my favorite party dress for the winter season. Feminine and flowy and surprisingly sexy! I received tons of compliments in person and on social media. Great red color which really popped. I did have a hard time keeping the spaghetti straps up but in the end I gave into gravity and let the dress hand from my shoulders.
Loved the comfortable fit of this dress. I wore the sleeves down without issue. The tie in the back of the dress was a cute touch.
Rented this to accommodate my postpartum pooch. Plenty of room in the belly area. A surprisingly comfortable dress. Love the little tie detail in the back.
Fit perfectly! Nice & flowy so you're able to eat at an event! Loved it

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: Dress was great for a rehearsal dinner! Felt very comfortable in it and there were no issues. I generally wear an 8-10 in clothes and 12--14 in formal dresses. The M fit great, did wear spanx just for extra support. I would definitely rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my sister's bachelorette party -- the theme was fiesta so this dress was perfect!
links_reviews_text: I am usually an XS/S and the XS fit like a dream -- just snug enough, but not too tight for a night out for dinner and dancing. I wore it for a bachelorette party, and it was super comfortable and the fabric was substantial and swingy, but not too heavy. I wore the off-the-shoulder sleeves down, which I read was an option from another review and I loved that look much better, and the sleeves blended in with the ruffles around the chest. Overall I loved this dress and would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Color is a total winner - stands out in the crowd.
links_reviews_text: Classy-fun dress - I wore in Cancun - dinner and dancing. Got lots of compliments! Total winner!

links_reviews_title: The compliments...nonstop! This is a showstopper!
links_reviews_text: This dress is incredibly flattering. So feminine and lovely. And it’s even comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my friend's bridal luncheon and rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: I marked it TTS, but it seems to run just slightly large if you're petite and/or have a small ribcage. I absolutely loved this dress! I received several compliments, and I thought it was so vibrant and fun. It showed off my figure while still being modest and comfortable for the occasion. I wore it for an entire day and didn't want to take it off.

Loved this dress! The fit was so easy, and I loved how light and breezy it felt. Tons of compliments all night. Nice enough to wear to a wedding, but sill fun and had a casual feel to it. Only tiny complaint I have is how the straps would occasionally fall off my shoulder, but there were tons of ways to adjust the back tie and shoulder straps to make sure they fit better.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a rehearsal dinner and loved it! It made me feel like the salsa emoji girl.
links_reviews_text: The fit is very flattering. I looked slim in pictures. I got a M and L and went with the M. There are different ways to wear the sleeves and straps

I ordered this for an early October wedding (still 80 degrees outside). After reading reviews, I ordered a Small and an XS as my backup size. I ended up wearing the XS because it fit better up top and was a good length- the small was too long on me. The top was slightly restricting but not too bad and I still had plenty of room to dance. Overall great dress and got lots of compliments!
Very gorgeous dress

links_reviews_title: Great color for an early fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color! The dress runs a little big so I am glad I opted for a small and an x-small because the small was way too big. I decided to wear it without using the sleeves as they were a little restricting but it looked very pretty with it without.

links_reviews_title: Easy to dance in and received SO many compliments
links_reviews_text: Very flattering and perfect for the hot, Florida wedding.

This dress was so fun to wear. I felt very confident wearing it and got a lot of compliments. It was also very comfortable - which in my option is key to a great night out! I was able to not wear a bra and the ruffles concealed everything. Would rent again and would size down.

The fit, color and flowiness made for a perfect boat dress. It doesn't give you much shape if you have an hourglass figure, but it is still pretty pretty. The back is a little low, so hard to not show your bra.

I loved this dress!! The color was so fun for a Santa Barbara wedding. I will admit the zipper was very hard to zip myself, I had to get help. The pleats were perfectly flattering and flowy. The reviews said the small straps fell down a lot, mine only did a couple times but I just tightened the straps so they weren't loose. I would totally recommend!
Loved this dress! Fit perfect & because of the flouncy top going without a bra was easy breezy.
Beautiful dress that i would 100% wear again. It ran a little big and I wore the small but could have gotten away with the medium.
As other reviews say - this dress does run small so get one size up. The 6 fit like a glove and was great without a bra for me. Love this dress and will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Classy lbd but runs very small
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a cocktail party. I'm generally a size 4 and I ended up wearing the 6 and it was snug! I could've used an 8 though. Pretty and classy lbd.

links_reviews_title: First time renting. Will be back!
links_reviews_text: This was the first time I rented a dress. It was a fun experience. The first set of sizes I ordered were too small and rent the runway exchanged them quickly. The size 6 fit perfectly. I'm smaller chested with a little bit of hips and booty and have a hard time finding dresses that flatter. The dress fit me like a glove, very flattering. The quality of the dress was phenomenal. I got a lot of compliments. Overall wonderful experience. Will definitely do this again.
Really cute and comfortable. Wore to a wedding and received so many compliments. A bit of cleavage but nothing over the top. Highly recommend!
Loved everything about this dress, but it did runs but small. The arm holes specifically were very tight.
Great transition day to eve - Wear a scarf blazer and boots or pumps day to a piece of statement jewelry and sexy sandals by night - staple I had to buy :)

links_reviews_title: I went to a Kentucky Derby party, and I wanted a simple black dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was pretty true to size. It was a teensy on the smaller size. It was a great dress, and I would totally rent in again.
It was hard to zipper up but fit perfectly. Wishing i didnt wear tights with it. Felt slim in this dress. Got tons of compliments.

I love a little black dress! This dress fit in all the right places. The lining wear the ruffle starts made it a little tighter but was a good fit it was wearable but a size 4 would have been more comfortable. If you're curvier deff size up! It is fitted at the bust so it works better if you have A-C cups. The fabric is on the thicker side and felt great to wear!

links_reviews_title: Fun Black Tie optional gala! Little black dress with a twist!
links_reviews_text: Ran 2 sizes too small! Loved this dress once I got the right size. I normally wear a 2 (backup 4 if top cut too small for my 32dd's). The 2 wouldn't even zip! The 4 was way too tight. Luckily, RTR was able to rush out larger sizes. The 6 fit perfectly! This is a great little black dress with an interesting hem detail that could work for many occasions!

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear because the fit was weird
links_reviews_text: Wasn't able to wear because the bust and rib area were too tight. ordered the sizes I always order...was very unhappy with this dress. I had to go buy a dress at the last minute for my event.

I'm usually a 4 but had to wear the 6 which was difficult to zip up but fit wonderfully once zipped. Beautiful, classy LBD with simple details. Length was perfect (I'm 5' 6"). Top is tight. Loved this dress would definitely rent it again!
runs small!!! defintely go up a size

links_reviews_title: Subtle sexy dress, perfect for formal but not black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Low cut, form fitting, short but could fix Spanx underneath

I really liked this dress but it was too small on top. It has no stretch to the material. I have a 34 DDD chest and could not zip it up. I typically wear a small or size 4. I would need to size up to at least a 6 and I'm not even sure if it would fit in the chest at that size.

This dress was perfect for a night out. It runs small especially if you are big busted. I wore the size up and that fit nicely. Again it is busty so dont recommend for work function. Overall the dress was fun and sexy and perfect for a my cocktail party and drinks out after.
The dress ran very small. I sized up and still couldn't zip it. Great material cute dress just very small. Since I was a first time buyer customer service was very helpful in correcting the situation

links_reviews_title: It made my night so easy.
links_reviews_text: Very booby and lowcut. Great hemline.
Did not end up wearing this dress because it did not fit as expected. The arm holes were very small, I recommend sizing up if you are on the edge of two sizes. The bodice is snug.

links_reviews_title: Too small, did not fit in bust
links_reviews_text: Beautiful cut

Good material. Top vneck was great for those who need support. But the bottom where it ruffles out. For me I have curves and this didn't work with my hips. This seems to be better for those who don't have a butt or hips.

links_reviews_title: nice dress, ended up not wearing
links_reviews_text: showed stomach pooch

links_reviews_title: Sizes up and it was too big
links_reviews_text: I am usually a 4 or 6. I ordered an 8 because everyone said it ran really small. It was weirdly big on my hips and I have hips and a butt. Too strange to wear. I'll size down to a 6 if I ever try it again
great fit and really comfortable!!

The dress was sent as an alternate option to the original dress I rented that ran longer than I thought. This dress was cute but it ran small in the chest/rib cage area and bunches around the hips because it was a bit too large. It would've been cute if it had fit. Curvy girls beware, this is for more of a pear shaped frame.
runs small
Pro: beautiful flowers Con: runs small... Thought being a vneck wouldn't squish my boobs...but it managed to do so still.
Very low cut but still classy

links_reviews_title: Love the shape of the dress. It was tight in all the right places!
links_reviews_text: The large was smaller than expected.

links_reviews_title: Great material, on the smaller side
links_reviews_text: Great dress, but showed too much chest for what I was looking for.

links_reviews_title: This was for my daughter's homecoming. She loved it and received a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It is beautiful well-made and fits and hangs beautifully.
Very small in chest. Recommend getting a size larger than you normally wear
Runs very small, I'm typically a 0 and this didn't look good at all, entirely too snug

Rented this dress in my normal size and I'm not sure why this fit so small!!! The arm holes were not big enough to fit my arms through (5'7 size 4 not huge arms haha) it was like they used child measurements for the arm holes. Was a bummer because I think this could have been very cute. Size up and take a chance!
Dress runs small, I normally wear a size 4 ordered a 8 fit great everywhere however the chest area was over flowing

links_reviews_title: Fundraising for ovarian cancer research by sampling women chefs and mixologists
links_reviews_text: This fit...weird. It may be because I'm 5'2" with DDs and a shorter torso. It may be because it's cut weird. The little ruffly part starts lower than I feel like it should, giving you a weird saddlebag effect on either hip (especially if you aren't wide-hipped enough to fill it out). I think the size might have been tricky, too, as I could have worn almost two sizes down from it if I didn't have booooooooobs for days. The top was tight while the rest of it was way too big. It's well-made and a cute style, though. Just not for me.

links_reviews_title: Rented for rehearsal dinner - this dress is very tight so order up!
links_reviews_text: I initially ordered a 4, my usual size, but it was way too small. I ended up with a 6 (which was hard to zip and tight) which looked great. Because of the tightness my boobs were on full display, but had lots of support. Very pretty dress overall.
Granted, I'm 6'1, but this dress barely covered my butt. Sent it back.

I thought this dress would be more of an A-line that was tight at the waist, but not hugging my butt or my hips. This is actually more of a mermaid fit and was super tight all the way down until the ruffled bit where it flares, and it made me look really odd. Didn't wear it. Don't rent it if you're pear shaped.
This was a great item I rented for a tropical vacation during the winter and it was a perfect fit, paired well with everything. Definitely recommend!
Wore this to an outdoor concert and loved wearing this. Slightly stretchy material but holds you in well and super comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Wore multiple times- so cute and practical!
links_reviews_text: Love love love this skirt. Perfect length for touring, date nights, or kicking back. Very comfy and true to Jean size.

I wore this to work and then out with friends. I loved the fit, and overall it was pretty cute. However I didn't love the raw edge/cutoff hem. It was uneven in a not cute way, but not a dealbreaker. I liked the skirt, just didn't love.
I don't wear skirts often, but I really enjoyed this skirt. It fit great and I got a lot of compliments.
The waist was a little big on me but so I added a belt and was good !

links_reviews_title: cute, versatile piece. great for going out!
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt multiple times! It had a bit of a tighter fit, which I loved because it showed off my figure beautifully!
Loved it considering my length n width.

This skirt is everything. I fell in love with it before I even put it on. It runs True to size but if you are curvier, I do suggest going up one size as a back up. It is form fitted, but not to tight, Great summer skirt, for the colder weather, you can pair this skirt with leggings and a cute sweater. Great overall piece.
I thought the skirt was a little big. I usually wear a size 6 in skirts but this one was very stretchy so it seemed a little large. very cute still!
Loved the skirt size was perfect! I wore this a few times! You can dress it up or down! Overall just a great rental!
I love this skirt! It is so comfortable and flattering, true to size!
This is a fun, edgy skirt.

links_reviews_title: Loved this skirt! Could have sized down.
links_reviews_text: Skirt was super comfortable and cute. I got a 29 but could have ordered a 28 or probably a 27 because it runs big and stretched out. Wore out and to work!
This skirt is super curvy-- WONDERFUL if your waist is significantly smaller than your hips. If you have a straighter figure, you definitely want to consider sizing down.
I'd buy this but I'm trying to drop weight and don't want to buy for this size. It's a really nice shirt. Lays flat throughout. Nice length. Love it.

links_reviews_title: Good Quality, Long on a short girl
links_reviews_text: never wore it -- it's cute, but i'm 5'2" and it felt a little long on me. super stretchy denim, good for day or night -- i just wasn't crazy about it

This skirt is cute. Due to the high waist, you have to tuck in your top to appreciate the cute zipper. Even though I'm short, the back pockets rested high and didn't fall quite right on my booty. It's a good color too
Fit perfectly
Loved the highwaisted fit of this skirt. It's slimming and comfortable. Versatile enough to wear with tennis shoes and a tee during the day, or dress up with heels and a cute top at night.

links_reviews_title: The skirt fit perfectly. It even had a bit of a stretch in it. Love!
links_reviews_text: Length, fit and style were perfect.
Cute skirt I plan to wear to a party this weekend. I am usually a large 2 and the 2 was a bit big so size down.

This skirt is stretchy, comfy, and not too short. The 25 size confused me. While it still fit well, I should have gone with one size higher so it could sit a little lower on my waist. The 25 fit high waisted.

links_reviews_title: Works with everything in my closet!!!
links_reviews_text: great length short but not tooooo short. Fits the hips and waist nicely

links_reviews_title: Very high waisted too much so for me
links_reviews_text: Cute skirt if your taller

links_reviews_title: Cute skirt, love the functioning front zipper and faded black wash.
links_reviews_text: A few said this runs small, I didn't find that to be the case at all. I normally wear a 29, but sized up at that recommendation, however I could easily have worn a 29. I say go true to size unless you don't want it to be too fitted or want the extra length.

I had low expectations after reading the reviews but rented anyway. I rented a size down and it was still huge and way too long to be considered a mini skirt. Looks like it does on the model other than length and fit. Could've been cute if it was 3+ inches shorter and two sizes smaller
This skirt was really fun, but runs large. The 28, which is what my jeans are, was big on my waist and longer than I would have liked.
Way tighter than expected but still fit, would need to wear spanx with this if I were to wear out.
For a taller girl this stretchy longer mini fits perfectly!
Great piece - paired w fitted tops, tights and shin heigh fitted lace boots.
Very cute, but definitely size down with you order. I wear a 24/25 normally and this skirt was way to big for me to wear!
Great look, runs large!
Loved this skirt, looks so cute with a sweater and booties
The zipper and a-line cut make it great. The skirt runs a tiny bit large. It's a good length (not annoyingly short), and very comfortable.
I didn’t get to wear! Got the size 27, 26 would have been a better fit.
The skirt is really cute and comfortable, I wore it to a concert and was able to dance all night long! It's definitely a great piece for fall, and is easy to dress up or down!

links_reviews_title: Great skirt great color and fit
links_reviews_text: Wore it to dinner while on vacay and it was very on trend and fun to wear
This skirt was huge on me and way too long (I'm 5'0). I couldn't wear it unfortunately. The quality, wash, and style are great though!
skirt is cute, but. it gave me boxy figure, it was also very long on me. on the bright side the material is very stretchy and comfortable so I would suggest maybe a size down
Only con would be the smocked waist as it can ride up.
Beautiful dress & v comfortable! Yes, the bodice is a little Bunchy but otherwise great. Received many compliments!

This was a really disappointing style especially coming from Brock. The print/fabric in person looked inexpensive. I thought I could still wear it as a "casual" dress because of that, but when I tried it on I saw how unflattering it was. On a petite frame, the way they constructed the waist it bunches out. You can sort of see it on the model picture too, but being 5'0" it was much worse. To top it off someone also cut the ties on the sleeve cuff short on this specific sample.
Very comfortable and fit perfectly. Loved it. Would give 5 stars if it was a little more figure flattering.
-abstract floral print -slightly short in body, but elevator mealies it comfortable -lightweight cotton
I wore this to fashion week and received many compliments. Sizing was perfect— I am 5'3 and 110 lbs.

links_reviews_title: the cinch waist makes it challenging if you have any weight in stomach but it is beautiful
links_reviews_text: beautiful dress would have bought it if not for high price!

This dress is very odd! I'm usually a 2/4, so I got a 4 because of comments that it runs small, which it definitely does. But more than that, the fit is just unflattering. The waist is very long and kindof poofs out between the ruching. This might work for someone with a long torso, but it didn't work at all on me.
I loved the picture of this dress but the elastic around the waist goes around in two rows and in-between those rows the fabric puffs out unflatteringly.
Beautiful, very high quality dress. Very true to size; not much leeway. I wore to work, but you could also wear for a party or date.
Beautiful dress. Nice details in person, easy to wear, flattering. I wore this for a first communion and received many compliments.

I got a 10, which usually does ok, though I can have problems in the bust. This dress was very cute but the elastic was very tight and something about the top band of elastic under my boobs made my boobs look HUGE and not in a good way. I loved the skirt and the fabric and the aesthetic of the dress, but it made me miss my 24" waist I had when I was in my 20's. (This dress would look better one a small waisted but possibly hippier person.)

links_reviews_title: I really liked the skirt of this dress....
links_reviews_text: I did not wear it .... I did not love the way the top looked on me.... the elastic at the waist fit and I loved the skirt .... so I was conflicted. I also was not a fan of the ties on the sleeves .... I found the strings annoying.
The space between the two lines of trim bunches up on me. Unwearable
Loved this dress! I got so many compliments when I wore it. It fit tts and for a short gal like me (5'2) the length was great too. The only con was the material- it kept getting super wrinkly.
Beautiful and so fun to wear! So many ruffles!!

I rented this for a trip to California and it was perfect for wine tasting. It was comfy, loose, and super cute and bright! My only complaint is that it is a lot of fabric so if it's hot out, this won't keep you cool. Definitely size down as it is a lot of fabric and is only fitted on the top
I could have gone smaller but I don't think it would have mattered. What a great dress! Got compliments walking down the street
This dress is AMAZING! So comfortable and so many compliments. I wore it to a work End of the Summer Party. Would wear everyday obsessed with this fun little dress.
This dress is so much fun. Exactly what I was looking for.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on this dress. So comfy and bright. Perfect for summer
links_reviews_text: Bright, girly and fabulous
Plenty of room for bump at 26 weeks pregnant. Perfect length to wear sandals with too (I'm 5'4", about 150lb pregnant and wore a size 2 which is my pre pregnancy size)

links_reviews_title: This dress was everything I hoped for and more!
links_reviews_text: Wore for a "Lisa Frank" themed bachelorette party and the pastel rainbow was ABSOLUTELY PERFECT

links_reviews_title: I love this dress!!! Brightens any day
links_reviews_text: Amazing dress. Only thing is that if you're short like me (5'1) you'll probably have to wear a heeled sandal of some sort so it doesn't drag on the ground

This dress was the perfect day/dinner dress for what was my casual part of the vacation. Would recommend steaming/ironing but the final product was photo ready and truly got the most praise in an outfit in a long time. Loved the dress, loved the fun, and would 100% rent again!
Rented it because it looked so fun for the warmer weather. I wore a shorter jean jacket over it to work and wore it again for a daytime festival. Although I should've maybe gotten an 8.

links_reviews_title: I couldn't go anywhere in this dress without being stopped and getting a complement.
links_reviews_text: This is seriously the happiest dress in the world. Make sure you go down a size
Comfortable and colorful, medium weight, no stretch

This is the ultimate brunch dress for a tropical vacation. The ruffles are a boomerang dream! I had at least five people stop me and ask where the dress was from. SO comfy and cute!! If you're looking for form-fitting, this is not for you, but if you want to stand out in a flower rainbow DREAM, this is for you!!
Super comfortable got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: This dress is so much fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a charity event (with wedges) and then to walk in a Pride parade (with running shoes). As other reviewers note, this dress wrinkles easily so I did steam it before wearing it. The wedges were perfect for the length of the dress. To walk in the parade, I needed to hold the dress up the entire time because the dress was too long. But I received so many compliments and everyone loved it! And it was a lot of fun to twirl around in.

I had actually ordered this as a backup dress, but when I pulled it out I literally fell in love. I normally only wear neutral colors, so I was a real skeptic, BUT the colors are slightly faded/washed, so it isn't obnoxiously bright. It is lightweight, and ridiculously comfortable. I was worried that it would make me look big because it hides my waist, but the striping is SO flattering, and the ruffles lay long, so it still accentuated my waist. To sum it up, it is impossible to not be happy in this dress. The only con is that it took me about 30 minutes to steam, but it was well worth it. Totally recommend!

links_reviews_title: Loved this so much I bought it
links_reviews_text: So comfy, stylish and fun! I wore out to dinner on a weekend away but could be worn on so many occasions. I couldn't resist and bought it.

Very flowy. I sized down from my typical dress size. The dress needs to be pressed before wearing it - otherwise it looks bunchy and sloppy. Ironing all those layers was not my favorite thing to do but once you're finished the dress flows so beautifully!!! You'll want to spin around all day!

links_reviews_title: Great fun dress. Easy to wear and so comfy!
links_reviews_text: Easy to wear! Lots of compliments
Cute and easy and looked amazing in pics!

Loved wearing this dress! It received a ton of compliments. I am usually a size 12 but the 10 was fine as it has a baggier fit. I rented it for my niece's 1st birthday and it was the perfect, fun dress for such an occasion. I was very excited to see it available to rent on unlimited!!!!

I rented this for a festival but ended up wearing it to a Kesha concert instead, and I was stopped by no less than 30 people that complimented my outfit. It's lightweight and comfortable but super adorable. Only reason I'm giving 4 stars is because it arrived crazy wrinkled and I had to steam/iron it for a while to get it looking right.

Tag line says it all! I wore this to Pride and it's a pretty hard event to stand out at but my dress made a huge splash! It was comfy, lightweight and looked amazing on! The tiers of fabric were actually quite flattering. Rent this and you will feel like a ray of sunshine!

Probably my favorite dress EVER! Rented this when I was 10 months pregnant (yes - 10!) and it made me feel incredibly pretty, which isn't common at that point in pregnancy. The rainbow stripes are definitely on trend, and the material is perfect for summer. Would definitely rent again!!!

I wore this to dinner at a resort in Cozumel. Wow, did I feel special. All eyes were on me and I felt like I owned the place. Good fit (ordered true to size), comfy (danced for several hours with the swirl effect going on) and eye catching (multiple compliments from the fellas). I would definitely rent again if there weren't so many other choices!

It's one of the most amazing dresses I've ever worn and was featured in the music festival we were at social media page. I would say to wear it on cooler days as all the fabric can start to get hot. Would rent again.
Such a fun dress. Super comfy.
I absolutely love this dress! It's so fun and flattering, easy to dress up or down. Everyone I've talked to has complemented it and the rainbow print is just cheerful. High recommend!
True to size, comfortable as wearing pajamas to a party. Sadly no pockets but still perfect!
This dress is amazing and it is so fun. I can't wait to rent it again.

Cannot tell you the number of compliments I received from people young and old! The colors of this dress are gorgeous and I didn't want to take it off. I tried on this dress in the 6R and 2R and they honestly fit the exact same. I think you can go ahead and order whatever size is available around your own if you can't get the perfect size you want!

I LOVE this kooky dress! I normally go back and forth between a size 4 and 6, and the size 4 fit me just fine. My only complaint is that the elastic around the top fit a little bit snugly, which could cause a bit of "spillage" if you're curvier. Otherwise it was very comfortable! I'm 5'9" and the length was perfect for pairing with flats without dragging on the floor. I wouldn't recommend this dress to ladies under 5'6" unless you plan on wearing heels! I received so many compliments all day long in this dress.

So fun! this dress runs true to size and is great for any cup. The top is elastic, so it is super comfortable. There is comfortable room throughout the midsection and hips. You can definitely wear a standard bra with this! Pair this with gold earrings!
Received at least 20 compliments! Best dressed hands down!
Everybody loved this!!! Love the rainbow colors! So fun and easy to wear. Perfect length. Made for a great easter dress. Definitely rent this!!!!
This dress is so beautiful in person, I got tons of compliments on the day I wore it. A must have for a tropical vacation!
I spent an hour ironing and steaming this dress and it FINALLY looks wearable. The dress is really cute, but it was been washed and worn too many times
Great fit! Statement dress!

I wore this dress to a 1920s themed ball. I got so many compliments. It is a really unique, beautiful dress! It was comfortable. I wore the 12L because it was what was available. It was too long in the front, so I had to hold it up when I walked, which was fine. 12 regular would have been a better fit on me.

Fits like a glove. I’m 5’3 and 135lbs wore a 4R. It hugs very nicely to your body and doesn’t show anything. I did not wear a bra with it because it’s nicely lined. I wore nude heels with it and basic earrings since the dress is very busy. I had a lot of “Wows!!” And many compliments. Loved this dress.
I obviously should've ordered a size up. This was too tight and not forgiving to my lady lumps. Beautiful dress though.

I was nervous this dress would be a bit much but the simple cut of it went perfect with the badazzleness (not really a word). I received so many compliments wearing it, I felt like I was at my wedding!
Easy to dance in and it fit the bride's request for covered shoulders. Got tons of compliments

I felt stunning in this dress! It looks even better in person than online. It's the perfect blend of classy, subtly sexy, and unique, plus it's comfortable. The slit is a little high when sitting, so if your legs won't be safely tucked under a table that might be a little difficult. The sequins and rose gold color look beautiful in both natural light and dim lighting. I'm already looking for opportunities to rent this again.
Gorgeous dress. The fit was perfect for my petite frame. I would definitely rent again! #gala

links_reviews_title: The dress was absolutely amazing. I had so many people complimenting it all night. I felt stunning
links_reviews_text: It is a sequence dress and with it being a rental, there were some missing. Not enough to make it noticeable but just a few. The fit was pretty perfect. I am 5'6 and 130 lbs and the 4L fit perfect
I received so many compliments on this dress. It was incredibly flattering and unique. Reviews said it ran small but I did not find that to be the case. I sized up a size and it was a little too big.
This was an understated, romantic beauty. I wore this for a fall wedding. The sequins are muted so as not to outshine the bride, but I felt so pretty. Loved this gown. Another RTR hit!

At first I wasn't sure about wearing this - the sleeves made my chest/shoulders feel wider than they are. I decided to take a couple of safety pins and pinned the sleeves up higher on the shoulder and it totally changed the feeling (in a good way!). Also, I've worn sequin dresses before and they always feel super itchy, these sequins lay flat and didn't bother me at all!

Dress fit perfect, I received numerous compliments, the only fault I found it had was the sequins kept getting caught around my hair and pulling it but other than that it was a comfortable dress, would highly recommend if you need a dress for a formal event or party. I didn't know my dress size so I went based on pant size, not sure if that works for everyone but it worked for me.

links_reviews_title: Dress was perfect! So fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Dress is a stunner and age appropriate. Hard to find this combo. Dress hangs well, skirt flows. Well made, nice quality! Loved it! I’m 5’ 5” and 138lbs. Wore 8R. Great to be able to wear a regular bra with it, back is open but not too low.
Loved this dress! I wear a size 4, but it was a little tight in the chest. I had to wear the 6.

I have put on many a gown in my day, but this one made me feel like the regal 1910s early 1920s lady that I wanted to be for the Downton Abbey Fancy Dress screening. I loved the shine, the cut, the fit and the thigh high slit for a modern edge. Would definitely rent again as I got many compliments! Was a bit disappointed that the 10R fit me so well, but I have been a bit negligent on my fitness routine of late. I was very pleased that the dress was not too long!

links_reviews_title: Felt like a glowing, rose-gold goddess.
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a work gala in NYC in July... while 16 weeks pregnant. It was admittedly a bit snug in the midsection, but not so much so that I didn't feel comfortable wearing it. I also got a ton of compliments. It's super flattering for someone who is blonde and has kind of peachy coloring like I do. I felt like I was glowing. I certainly would size up if you're wanting a more body-skimming feel, and if you have larger breasts. I have a scant B to C cup, so I went without a bra and was totally fine.

links_reviews_title: Fabric is pretty, not super flattering
links_reviews_text: The fabric is definitely pretty in person, but I didn't end up wearing it because it wasn't as flattering as the other dress I rented.

I've rented this for a wedding. I'm surprised by how well it fits like a glove, expected it to be more loose but it's fitted all the way through so size up if you're on the fence. It might be slightly short when I put heels on. The pattern is really pretty.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this gorgeous gown and it was surprisingly comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Formal dresses tend to run smaller. I normally wear a size 4 but in formal dresses I wear a size 6. The sequins were lightweight and matte so the dress was comfortable and had an understated elegance. The style was very vintage glam and flattering. The dress did arrive with a few sequins already missing but it was not noticable and to be expected with a rental garment. I would highly recommend this dress for any black tie event! Loved it!!
Please!!! If you go with this one go at least 1 size up.

Loved how this dress was made of sequins but somehow wasn't flashy or too shiny. Extremely feminine! Runs very small and I was glad I sized up. I did not wear this dress with Spanx but, that could have been a good option since it was tight on the midsection.

links_reviews_title: Comfy and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. I am a true 10 and the 10R fit amazing. I was able to sit, eat and dance comfortably all night. The cut is very flattering and the dress itself it so glitzy and romantic. Got many compliments throughout the night. Dressy enough for black tie. Loved this dress. So happy I rented it!

links_reviews_title: A million times better in person
links_reviews_text: I rented this with fairly low expectations to wear to a black tie wedding in Brooklyn Botanical Garden. It's super comfortable, light weight (despite being sequined), unique and special. I received a lot of compliments and there's nothing I would have changed about the dress.
Fits beautiful. Hugs in the waist

links_reviews_title: so comfortable and not too flashy
links_reviews_text: Despite being sequined it was both comfortable and not over the top. The fabric has a bunch of stretch and the sequins are matte. It's a beautiful rose gold color too! Note that it's a bridesmaid dress so you'll want to go one, maybe two, sizes up
Would have been more comfortable in the size 18, but it arrived damaged so I squeezed into the 16. It was incredibly flattering and so stunning.

What a gown! 5 stars! I rented this gown for a formal awards event and am so very glad that I did. The dress is GORGEOUS! Sequins head to toe! I received compliments from everyone and felt like a glamorous Hollywood starlet. I'm 5'9" tall and my normal dress size is a 6/8 - I ended up wearing a 10L because Marchesa runs quite small. There is absolutely no stretch in the fabric and it is very thin so I highly recommend spanx when wearing it. You can wear a regular bra with the gown which is a huge plus. Do yourself a favor and rent this beautiful dress for your next fancy event.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: Went into an RTR store and they brought this out as one of their new dresses. Probably would not have picked it if I had seen it online. It fit nicely and had a glamorous look. Lots of compliments.

The material is pretty thin which would make it a great choice for a summer event. It's also a stretchy fabric so I feel like it would be comfortable. The dress however runs extremely small. I usually rent 16/18. I hate when dresses like this fit too tightly (I prefer them fitted but skimming my body like the model) so I sized up to a 20L. I could barely zip the dress in the back and the slit at my hips was gaping open. I think I'd need to go up at least 2 more sizes to have it fit as desired. Not sure if small fits are standard for the designer or if these are British sizes but this was an overall 'hell no' for me. Also, since this was a clear not, I didn't try the dress on with shape-wear. This dress would definitely benefit from shape-wear though since the material is quite thin.

links_reviews_title: Runs Extremely Small Especially For Curves
links_reviews_text: I was very disappointed in the construction of this dress, along with the sizing. The size 20 I rented fit like a size 14.

Wore this dress for a 1920's themed Casino Night charity. While most of the women who flapper-esque dresses, I opted for more of a Lady Mary Crawley look and this dress nailed it! I received so many compliments. The fit was perfect, and it sparkles are beautiful!
This was a pretty dress but too small

links_reviews_title: Received many compliments on this beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a benefit, "In the Pink" for breast cancer.

links_reviews_title: Definitely a one-of-a-kind, not your average LBD.
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, but definitely size up!

links_reviews_title: Flirty, feminine stunner probably made for someone with a few less curves!
links_reviews_text: The dress was gorgeous. I'm 5'3" and wore 1-2" heels and it barely drug the floor. The sequins were soft and gave it a very luxurious feel. I wore the 10R, but if I had the option, I would order the 12 next time. It fit my bust fine, but it was difficult to zip over my rib cage, so I wore a backless stick-on bra and it worked out, but it still felt really snug. It was also very fitted in the hips. I think this cut would fit slightly better on someone with a straighter or less curvier shape, or sizing up if there is a large difference between your waist and hips. And this specific dress had started to come apart at the leg slit so I had to use tape to hold it together.
I could not zip it up. Runs very small in busy area.

Gorgeous dress the metallic sequins are hard to fully appreciate on model but in the right light and shift you sparkle. Loved the dress and how elegant it looks when worn. Unfortunately the size 6R was unavailable but i needed it for a photo shoot and it worked (slightly look but stunning photos).

links_reviews_title: I got compliments all night that I was "best dressed."
links_reviews_text: I was surprised that it was rented out because it wasn't in great shape -- sequins were missing in various places, the clasp was falling off, a few threads were pulling. It looked fine from afar, but it seemed like it should have been taken in for repairs first.

This dress is gorgeous - even prettier in person. I got a 12, which is my usual size, hoping to wear it to a wedding. It was insanely small. I couldn't zip it up because the old boobies were in the way. Runs small, especially if you have much of a bust.

links_reviews_title: My 17-year-old daughter wore this for a black tie wedding. She looked gorgeous in this dress.
links_reviews_text: My daughter wore this for a black tie wedding. She is about 5’3” tall and the dress was still long. She had to wear high heels with it.
The dress is absolutely beautiful with great detail! I received many compliments!

I wore this dress to a circus themed gala and it was so cute! I will say that I am a curvy 14 and this dress fit to the T! I was glad I ate salads the week leading up to it. The slip of the dress is not connected to the bottom of the actual dress so because I'm curvy, when I walked the dress would ride up and make the slip show. I also wore this dress WITHOUT spanks so that was awesome!

I wore this for my 21st birthday which was 20s themed. Absolutely LOVED this dress! I danced in it all night and it was so comfortable and stayed put perfectly. The sleeves are really neat. I was afraid the mesh at the neckline would look like some figure skating costume, but it was actually very nice. It matched my skin perfectly, so I don't know how it would look on another skin tone. The slip underneath kept peeking out, but that's common with RTR dresses. Definitely rent this!

I wore this for a 1920's themed company holiday party and received a TON of compliments. The fit was true to size and it was very comfortable overall. I didn't do a ton of dancing, but it held up well. The sleeves were definitely the highlight of the dress.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress for a gatsby affair
links_reviews_text: This fit like a glove and I received many compliments. I have muscular arms and broader shoulders and the cap sleeve still worked perfectly. Would definitely rent again. This dress is true to size, but if you are on the bubble, order up.
I wore this dress to a 20s gala at my daughter's school. Multiple people that I did not know stopped me to tell me the dress was stunning. Very beautiful dress- I've never had so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. I wore it to my graduation ceremony and after party and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size. I had no issues with it. I was a little concerned about the sheer part being noticeable, but it was not. I loved the gold and I was so comfortable in it!
True to size. Very flattering. Looks great if you have a large chest and wide shoulders
Wore this to emcee a fashion show (roaring 20's theme.) It was perfect. Definitely roomy in the midsection. Gorgeous details!
Fit well.
Beautiful, unique dress! Perfect for my NYE masquerade party. Definitely a stand out.

This dress was gorgeous once you got it on. I normally wear a 10, but this dress was so tight in the waist that I couldn't sit in it without risking ripping it. I wanted to wear this for a NYE party but ended up getting something else so I would be able to dance and party.
Great dress, the top button kept coming undone which was a little annoying but it was a beautiful dress.
This dress was just amazing! I wear it for our company holiday party and everyone loved it. It looks super sophisticated and high-end. Plus, I really liked that it had that kind of Great Gatsby look.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, a little worn out
links_reviews_text: Wore the dress to a work Christmas party. I could have worn the 10 or 12....but the top button on the 10 would not close - the loop was too small for the button, so I went with the 12. Both dresses were missing some beading. But overall, beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a Gatsby party!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a Gatsby-themed party - fit true to size - was form-fitting yet comfortable. When you sit down, it becomes super short - so heads up!
So beautiful. Fit was perfect

When I first saw this dress I thought it was too busy until I looked at the review photos. It looks so much better on. I received several compliments on this dress. I wanted to wear this to the wedding but decided to wear it to the rehearsal dinner instead just because the other dress I got had more room for dancing. This would be fine but doesn't stretch at all. The biggest downside to this dress was just that it shows wear easily so it had a number of threads from the beading and lace that were coming loose, not really a big deal. Overall, this dress was a hit, and I'd recommend it!

I got a lot of compliments on this dress (one woman even told me it was her fave dress at the wedding). It fit well and had a bit of sparkle and va-va-voom that set it apart. I love the shoulder detail especially.

I wore this dress to an outdoor production of Shakespeare's Othello and it definitely drew some attention! The pattern felt more wintery in person than I expected, but not so much that I felt out of place in mid-July. I loved the intricate gold lace, which is actually a separate layer from the slip. Some of the beading on the bodice and sleeves was a little roughed up, but not noticeable at first glance. I'm not sure that I would rent this again, but it was fun for the evening.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the Gatsby themed party!
links_reviews_text: I worn this dress for Gatsby themed party. I usually wear size 4 but I was glad I got a backup size. Size up when you order this dress.

links_reviews_title: Dress made me feel classy, elegant and sexy!
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress! Had it as my backup dress, and RTR sent it since they were unable to send the backup size in my original dress, so glad that happened!!! Was worried it would not look good since it has a fitted silhouette, and I am a thicker girl, but ended up loving it on. Felt very classy, yet sexy. It was a little smaller than expected, glad I had gone up in the backup size. Was also a bit worried about the mesh neck (typically hate that type of thing), but didn't mind it at all. Wore my hair in a partial french twist directing my hair over one shoulder so that it would still be down, but also show off the beautiful sleeves and back. Few loose threads, no scratchiness.

Beautiful dress. Rented for a Gatsby-themed party. The dress was perfect - an homage to the theme without being a costume. Dress has definitely been worn a few times. Had to cust some stray strings but otherwise was in good condition.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! Looks a lot better on.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I have a large chest and it fit in the chest and everywhere else. It looked really good on, even though I was not sure about it when I just looked out it out of the bag. I received a lot of compliments and overall it was a great dress.
This dress was a showstopper! I got so many compliments the entire night. It fit perfectly and I was very comfortable.
This dress was amazing! Very comfortable, easy to Zip, great to dance in.

I wore this dress for a New Years eve 1920s themed party. It was perfect for the theme but just such a great dress. The detail in the beading looked great and the cut of the dress so flattering. The dress fit true to size and was not to tight or too short.

links_reviews_title: I had a nice night wearing this dress. I was looking for something a bit unique and “royal”
links_reviews_text: I would not rent this dress again. it was a bit too conservative looking. Thankfully I ordered a size two back up when i’m most often a 4. I should have been wearing a zero. I’m generally small all over, B bust, which would matter, as the material is not stretchy. But in general, the dress had some great angles, but was all together a bit underwhelming.

This dress fit true to size and was perfect for a holiday party. The sleeves and emblishments at the top were beautiful. I also love how the lace made it very flattering since this a line dress and is more form fitting. I would highly suggest this dress for formal events.

links_reviews_title: This dress was worn in Vegas to dinner and a lounge afterwards.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit and looked great on the top-half, but the inner lining was a lot longer than the outer layer and was showing the entire night. So the whole night I was very self-conscious and thought it didn't look as good as it did on the site. Too bad I didn't have a back-up for it.
Beautiful dress but does not look good on me.

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel like a movie star
links_reviews_text: This dress was amazing. I have a large chest and was able to wear this braless. While it was a little tight, it was still amazing. I felt so pretty, which is not something I feel often. Highly recommend this dress! Will definitely rent again!
Loved the neckline on this elegant, unique dress - would definitely rent again!

I wore this as the mother of the groom to a Roaring 20s themed wedding. I wanted to go elegant, rather than flapper style. Everyone thought it was beautiful. I usually wear a Sz 4, but ended up wearing the Sz 2 backup. The 4 looked large on the hanger, so I never tried it on. The Sz 2 fit great, with a little help from a stapless bra. Without a bra, the waist wouldn't sit in the right place, since I am flat chested -- I needed some lift there. Waist was comfy in this smaller size, I could move easily. I did not experience the itch from the material like other wearers, I found it perfectly comfortable. The sheer neckline is a little weird, but the necklace I rented with the dress completely covered it, making it look like just a low cut neckline. I probably would have to go back up to the Sz 4 if I gained any more weight, the Sz 2 fit like a glove. I am small, but not rail thin. I received compliments all evening, and felt appropriately dressed as the mom of the groom. It is an elegant dress.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fancy & special occasion
links_reviews_text: Loved it! So many compliments. Unique. Looked way better than I expected and was comfortable enough to dance in all night

Wore this to a broadway show and loved the way I felt in it! I forgot to take a full body shot though while we were out on the town so this is just me trying it on. Fabric was giving and flattering. There were some stringy beads here and there but not really noticeable. I literally walked all over NYC in this and it was super comfortable. Confidence and compliments :) (32DDD wasn't an option for body type above)
The dress was so beautiful and unique. It was longer than I thought it would be and a little itchy around the neck line.

links_reviews_title: Not my first choice but beautiful
links_reviews_text: This was sent me as a back up despite having reserved my first choice more than two months in advance. This was a very different dress than my usual style and a little outside of my comfort zone. I was not in love with this dress but I received a lot of compliments on it. The detailed sleeves really make the dress special and glamorous. Unfortunately the sleeves were showing some wear - beads and sequins were falling off and there were some loose threads. The length was perfect - it came to my knees (I'm 5'2"). The lining of the dress would peek out from the dress at times, which was kind of annoying. I also did not like that the mesh lining on the top of the dress was a dark flesh color (it was kind of sheer but still darker than my skin tone - and I had a little bit of a tan). I was worried the lining would look weird (I was self conscious of it), but luckily it wasn't that noticeable in pictures. Despite all of this, people loved this dress. It photographs really well. It's sophisticated, and the details on the dress, especially the sleeves, are stunning.

links_reviews_title: All of the reviews are correct. This dress is very special. I stopped counting the compliments.
links_reviews_text: I usually run between a 4 and a 6, so I was not surprised that the 6 fit me perfectly. I was able to swing dance with my hubby and dance the night away. It was very comfortable, and isn't too tight that I felt like I had to suck it in all night. I didn't feel like the underarms were scratchy at all. I wore a nude strapless bra with it, which fit perfectly. My only issue with the dress is that it had a lot of loose strings on the cap sleeves. This was my first time and I would definitely rent from RTR again.

links_reviews_title: Great looking dress! Definitely worth renting it!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a mad men themed holiday party. It was perfect for the occasion, and I got a lot of compliments on it. The dress had more details and ornate embellishment than I expected from the online pictures. Like the other reviews said, I would definitely size down. I am usually between a size 2 and size 4, and I luckily ordered a backup size 0 after reading the reviews. This was my first dress I rented through RTR and I was definitely impressed!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to my boyfriend's semiformal in downtown Austin! I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I received many compliments because this dress is a unique version of a simple black dress! I ordered the 4&6, but went with the 4. It is a little short, but appropriate for the event I was going to. Make sure to get the correct bra to wear with it!
Wore this for a New Year's Eve house party and was perfect amount of sexy without looking overdone. Fit was spot on and it is a very petite friendly dress. Comfy material. No complaints on this one!

Really cute dress! I’m annoyingly indecisive and was nervous I would not care for all of the ruffles but it’s a very cute fit and extremely comfortable. I wore to a wedding and danced my face off with zero tugging. Flattering fit! I ordered 2 & 4 and the 2 was perfect.

Was super comfortable and not TOO short. Love all the lacy fabric. Super simple dress and fun to wear. I loved that I was able to go braless and not look saggy (I've had two kids and a breast reduction between them). I loved that it's see through on the back but without being totally backless. I loved it so much I even rented the maroon colored one a few weeks later for another party.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments. Holiday party dress.
links_reviews_text: Loooved this dress. It was a backup and I'm so glad! The beautiful back lace was my favorite. I got compliments all night!!

links_reviews_title: Loved the fit & got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This was perfect for the occasion & I would definitely rent it again!
Top part of the dress was great the bottom part of it was really short I ended up putting a mini skirt I had underneath it. If u rent this just know it's really short .
This dress fit great, was short but not too short for a work cocktail party. It was sexy but still classy- I loved it!
This dress was perfect! Runs true to size and was super comfy. I was a little worried about the back, but it offered more coverage than I originally thought. Loved the length and fit.

I ordered the 2 and 4, as usual. I could not get the 2 over my hips, yet the 4 was relatively large around my waste line. So I wore the 4. It was a great length, easy to move around in, good for dancing. Overall a great dress!
Dress was amazing gave me a great fit and was super comfortable
