Absolutely loved this dress!! This was my first renting experience and the first two dresses I ordered did not fit at all. They overnighted a few dresses and fell in love with this dress. I have a small chest (size A) and was a little to big in that area for me but overall the 0 fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: The look on my husband's face when I walked down the staircase to go on our anniversary date!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect!
Length was perfect. The material was very high quality. I wore with a bra and even though it's lace in front and back it was fine. A little loose up top but not noticeable!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so fun to dance in!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so comfortable and flattering!!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! It was the talk of the Gala!
links_reviews_text: This dress was forgiving In the yummy area. Easy to dance in! Shows off muscular legs! Great length for short ladies like myself!

links_reviews_title: My husbands reaction when he saw me in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress so pretty and sexy! I wanted something that was sexy but still appropriate. This was it. I generally where a 6 and that size did fit. However I was worried about it being too short, so I went with the 8 for that added comfort, which was a little baggy in the stomach area, but worked for me. I will rent this dress again!
Drop waist is not flattering on me, returned immediately.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this so much! Second time I have rented it. Love the open lace back and the overall feel of it.
links_reviews_text: The back is classy yet sexy and fun length. It stretches and gives in the right places. I have a small neck and I would have to adjust every now and then.

I LOVE this dress! Fun, flirty and sexy. I rented the suggested accessories ( bag and earrings) to complete the look. Everything is so cute I don't want to return them. I'm 5'0 tall and weigh 150 pounds and the 12 was perfect. Not too tight.

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments in this super sexy little black dress!! Would definitely recommend it!!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear a size 2-4 but went with the 4 (which barely fit over my hips). It is very short and shows a ton of leg although I am tall and was happy with the length. It was perfect for a school fundraiser where I was going for sexy but not inappropriate. The “sheer” portion is very subtle. The only complaint I have is that the fabric was scratchy on my neck. Other than that this dress nailed it!

This dress is amazing, super flattering fit, hugs in all the right places and I received so many compliments. Only downfall is it is VERY short. Like every time you bend over, everyone gets a show lol. I just had a pajmena I draped around my legs when I’d sit down but I would for sure rent this again.

I was very nervous that the dress wouldn't look or fit right... but it did and I was very pleased. It fit perfectly. The only thing I did not like was that it bunched a little on the zipper in the back.

Ran a teeeeeeny but large in the waist, but was perfect in the butt and chest. Granted, those are bigger on me compared to my waist. Got a million compliments!!!!!!!! Taped my boobs, not for the faint of heart !!! But overall was obsessed w this dress.
Fit perfect! Loved the sleeves, and the length was great! Very true to size!!! Would definitely rent again! Overall fabulous dress!!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect perfect perfect- fun, flirty and everyone wanted to know where I bought it!!
links_reviews_text: This dress made feel feel sassy and confident! It was perfect for a daytime Super Bowl Event... transitioned well into the evening too! I got compliments all day and still get asked where I got it from when people see pictures. I wish I could've bought it!!

Rented this dress for an October wedding in Texas. Fit my petite frame perfectly - always love a dress that hits the right length on my 4'11" body. Very comfortable - able to dance the night away. The dress was made from a thicker lace material, which was comfortable on a ~50 degree night. The dress has a see through deep cut that's covered by the lace - but good to keep in mind what undergarments to wear. The back is see through. Wore a sticky bra - but could wear no bra at all (which I probably should have done since a little of my bra could have been seen) I would definitely recommend this dress. And I would most definitely rent again.
I got tons of compliments and it was so fun to wear!! I felt a little insecure dancing though because you can't really wear a bra with this dress, but it was perfect for a casino event!!

links_reviews_title: Great dress but very short and needed a belt to give me some shape.
links_reviews_text: Fit well

Perfect fit, true to size. It's very short, like sit on a chair and you're pretty much sitting on your bare ass short. But I didn't feel uncomfortable with the length while standing. You will need some fashion tape or stick on boobs as it's sheer in the middle front and sheer in the back. I loved it, it was perfect for a party in Vegas. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: I loved the dress and hated to return it!
links_reviews_text: The size 6 was a little loose but I chose to wear it because it was so comfortable and I planned on dancing and eating all night. The 4 probability would have fit better but I never tried it on. The dress was made very well and is very forgiving.
Fit true to size for me. I looked and felt classy and sexy while keeping things very tasteful. Beautiful dress, great experience renting.

I rented this as my back up option, but I instantly loved it once I tried it on! The lace details were beautiful and it was super comfortable. The material was thick, but it was a tad short- I'm only 5'4 and was concerned, but other than that, I received tons of compliments and was able to dance all night!
I got a ton of compliments on this dress, and it was super comfortable to wear. One warning though if you are long legged and long torso this will run short

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a holiday party. Loved it so much!!
links_reviews_text: Make sure you have a great backless bra option or tape if needed!!

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and felt sexy!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. Had to wear pasties for the boobs. Wore this to my husband's office holiday party and got so many compliments. It's the LBD with a twist!

links_reviews_title: Received so many compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove. A little short but if I sized up would have been too large in the bust. Loved this dress!

Playful, fun, and flirty...this dress is all of that...plus really nice quality. The fabric is beautiful and has a really nice weight. It fit like it was made for me. I am 5'2, 110 pounds and wore a size 0. No bra needed! Cannot say enough about this dress and all if its cuteness! I wish I could own it! Even if it seems a like a departure from what you would normally wear, take a little risk and get this sweet dress!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress! It is definitely one of my favorites!
links_reviews_text: Fun and classy!

links_reviews_title: Cute idea but not for me
links_reviews_text: Dress was EXTREMELY short.. and I'm not even a tall gal. Was hard to bend over or dance at this wedding due to length. Wouldn't recommend for a wedding for that reason. The material is sturdy though. Didn't like the flouncy-ness at the bottom either. Would not rent again.
Runs large for sure, but very cute and conservative. Perfect for family vacation.
I'd size down next time, felt like a large medium. Perfect length with high waisted jeans.

Loved this precious little top, but it is definitely little! I sized up to a Medium and it was still very snug and also very short. I am only 5'2" with a small torso and it hit at the top of my pants. So just know it's cropped, but all that aside it is still so cute. I just adore the beautiful lavender color, gingham print and ruffle detail. Such a sweet top that makes you feel so girly! Will definitely rent again!
Love this shirt so much...I plan on buying it but want to wear it once since I'm concerned about the sleeves falling down since I'm petite.
This runs small like a corset so you have to zip up in front and then twist it around. However it's super flattering and incredibly unique. I ended up buying it!

The fit around the bust and waist was snug but the stretch made it very comfortable. Loved the zipper in the back. The sleeves did tent to roll off the shoulder at times, but it was not a deal breaker. Was a perfect outfit for my nieces fiesta themed birthday party.
This top is amazing. The structure is so well made. I want to keep it. So slimming at the waste. Stopped by strangers the entire night.
It was a good fit
Wore to a football game and was grabbed by gals all day wanting this top!! When this goes on sale I will be buying it without a doubt!!!

This top is really cute in person but, the fabric has absolutely no give as previous reviews mentioned. The smocked, zippered back was the only reason I could wear it to my event. The large was still snug but, the give in the back was enough to make this work. I can usually fit into a standard medium (6-8) top. I was glad that I had the back up size available because there was no way I would have been able to even zip up the medium. If you are busty I would suggest looking for another top that has more give.

Loved this top, very well made and could be worn for so many different kinds of occasions. I wore it to a brunch amd received lots of compliments. Just a heads up, I am small chested and the top was snug- so keep that in mind!
It highlights your middle and the ruched back conceals any flaws. Seriously a must!

I wish I could afford to purchase this beautifully constructed feminine top today. Rent it. You won't regret it. I recommend sizing up OR wearing high-waisted jeans. I didn't struggle too much with the sleeves falling down, but do be warned by other renters that it's possible you'll be frustrated if it's windy at your event.
Great flattering fit, forgiving. Cute gingham. Didn't like that it hit at or above waist of jeans, wished it were a bit longer.

links_reviews_title: Adorable, fun & sexy top! Favorite rental yet.
links_reviews_text: This was such a fun top to wear with jeans. I received so many compliments. My favorite rental yet. The only con is if you have a long torso, it may show to much belly.

I love love love this top!!! This is perfect for a weekend trip! This does run small, so I recommend sizing up. This works best for A to C cups since it is fitted. There is a zipper up the back. You can definitely wear this with a standard bra, and keep in mind that this fabric has no stretch. Pair this with a choker!

Loved this top! Super cute ruffles and great fabric/color for summer. I had a little trouble keeping the strap from falling down, but honestly an insignificant problem given how fun this was to wear. Very figure flattering!

This top is so cute. I have a larger chest, and it mashed my boobs down. I didn't really like that. But I still received a lot of compliments. And guys seem to be staring at my chest or lack there of... which was weird. I took it with me on a cruise. If I had my entire wardrobe, I would've worn something a little more high waisted at the bottom.
Adorable top, really fun and flirty. I would suggest sizing up if your curvy or large busted. Definitely perfect for summer

links_reviews_title: Great top. Beautifully made. So fun to wear! Loved it! Surprisingly Sexy!
links_reviews_text: I am having so much fun with the unlimited plan. I had to go to a screening and wanted a fun top. I popped into the store near me and I saw this in the dressing room. I do not normally wear this pattern but I loved the design so I figured I would try it on. So glad I did! I am a 36D so it was a bit tight on the boobs but honestly it was fine. Felt like a corset. It was much sexier on then you would think. Would rent it and wear again! Boyfriend liked it too!

This is one of the cutest tops that I have ever rented from RTR. I absolutely loved it, and would have bought it if it weren't such a statement item that I could only wear a couple of times... which is why that I love RTR so much! If you have a larger chest, size up. I lean towards the smaller side so I went with a small, but could probably wear a medium as well. The back is stretchy. Super cute top to pair with fun Summer options! Definitely recommend.
I felt this top was much when worn on the shoulder but could be worn off the shoulder as well. Once I figured that out I really fell in love.

I rented this top to wear with white jeans to a part and it worked perfectly. The back is smocked so that it fits properly. It is meant to be quite snug but it met the top of my jeans just right. The ruffles are substantial and structured in a great way- they hold their shape perfectly. I received many many compliments! I loved it- memorable and fun! I also love that it's from a lesser known designer- it was certainly "different" looking.

links_reviews_title: Love this top. Was not able to wear it though.
links_reviews_text: I have rented this top before and it was great. I ordered the same size and I weigh the exact same, the top has been extremely stretched out and the sleeves were falling off of my shoulders. I wasn't even able to wear it.
Perfect for a sunny daygame if your team is purple. Straps are a bit long and fall but besides that its perfect.
Fit great but zipper kept falling

links_reviews_title: the xs fit like a medium
links_reviews_text: not exaggerating- im normally a small or an xs and i ordered xs and it was super baggy! had to replace it with another garment all together
Cute top but kind of a pain to wear. It's really snug throughout the body but the sleeves constantly fall off.

The shirt is cute and a beautiful lavender gingham. It fit well in length and around the torso, but the straps were too loose. They were constantly falling off my shoulders. Wished I could've adjusted them somehow because the ruffles were so cute!

The shirt is cut to fit snug. I've rented it before in the same size and it was snug. This one was just too stretched out. There is a significant amount of ruching in the back and it seemed to be worn too many times to fit properly.
Pretty, but I did not wear it, it was too frilly for every day, but I thought about it the few days I held onto it. It fits quite well and has a really nice shape.

links_reviews_title: loved this top - sorry I didn't rent it sooner
links_reviews_text: loved this top - sorry I didn't rent it sooner
Beautiful well made too was very latge and shoulders wouldn’t stay up and was way too big. Very disappointed.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately I didn't end up wearing this top. It is a great piece though.
links_reviews_text: Sizing wise- Tight in the chest and pretty cropped. The sleeves fall off very easily. The quality however is spectacular. I didn't end up wearing it because my event was rain delayed and quite a bit colder than expected. I would've definitely worn it, weather permitting. I ordered the medium and large, would've ended up wearing the medium (again, weather permitting).

links_reviews_title: Adorable, very cute, pairs well with a skirt or jeans/heels.
links_reviews_text: The sleeves stayed on my shoulders just fine.
The stretchy smocked back makes this fit like a gem - 32C and no bra needed. The color is great and I have never gotten so many compliments on a top!
I thought this was super cute, but if you have a Dcup size up! It wasn't even close to being wearable :(
A bit short waisted.
Comfy, trendy, and flattering!
I am athletic and have a wider back. This fit but had to stretch so far on my back it was awkward so I didn't end up wearing it. Very cute top for the right body shape and great material.
Loved this dress!!! Fit was great!
Figure hugging without being overly tight. Shows off curves but good for folks with a tummy. Can be dressed up or down, worn out or to a work event.

I have curvy hips and felt very comfortable in this dress. Frequently, when I rent from RTR I have to send dresses back because they fit well on top but they are too right in the hips. This dress fit well everywhere! Keep in mind, the slit is very high and the neckline scoops fairly low. I loved wearing this dress!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for New Years' Eve 2020 and it was a knock-out! Red-carpet treatment all night.
links_reviews_text: This dress has a racerback so I needed to wear a criss-cross bra and the front was a bit low. It made me look very curvy but still incredibly classy. A bonus was when the celebrity host on SNL wore it in red the same week for their holiday special. I definitely felt like a star!

links_reviews_title: I felt invincible in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I received SO many compliments throughout the day/night. Wore to a wedding that my boyfriend was a groomsman in, and it was ridiculously comfortable. The slit was exactly what I wanted. It’s a jaw dropper, for sure! Tighter in the hips/thighs, and difficult to sit in comfortably, but with a sweater or jacket in your lap you’ll be fine.

This. Dress. I wore it to my company holiday party and felt like a model. I have athletic thighs and butt with a smaller waist, and this hugged me in all the right ways. It made my legs look a million miles long, and the neckline cut is soooo flattering. Yes, yes, a thousand times YES for this LBD.
Overall fit well, the slit was higher than expected so I wore a lace spanx short underneath. Looked like part of the dress!
This dress was so simple, elegant and slightly sexy at the same time. I felt so pretty!! It's very flattering

links_reviews_title: My friends called this the Jennifer Aniston dress!
links_reviews_text: Even with the 90s revival, a true Jen Aniston, clean, modern, timeless, chill cocktail dress is hard to find. This is it. Everyone called it the Jennifer Aniston dress. It wasn't quite as clingy as looks, but I did wear a little shapewear to smooth the lumps. It's very low cut and I'm pretty busty so I wore pasties to give my chest a little traction so nothing popped out. It was a fun dress that was special enough for a party but casual enough for a (sexy?) dinner. Would definitely rent again.
Great dress! True to size. Hugged curves perfectly, and beautiful thigh slit
This fit great! The slit is really high (especially when sitting) but i felt great! The material is super comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Possibly my fave RTR rental ever
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure about this dress because I'm short (5'3"...with extra short legs), but it fit so well. I have an hourglass figure, so the 4 fit better on me given that my waist is very small. There is a nice stretch to it. I wish I packed a bra, but I didn't so I went without one, which was fine. You easily could though! Highly recommend this dress!

This is a great dress for women with a big bust, medium-bigger booty, and a short-normal length torso. The booty area is definitely defined, and if you don't fill it out, there's a bit of a gap. Wish I'd sized down, as I could have gotten away with no bra.
The material is very forgiving, super comfortable and overall the fit was great!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress and got compliments all night long
links_reviews_text: When I first tried this dress on it didn't look how I pictured it, so I wasn't sure I'd wear it. But once I put it with heels I liked it so much more. This dress was so comfortable, I danced all night long and got so many compliments.

So comfy for such a sexy dress! Great for date night. The slit is VERY high, you can't see underwear when you walk but it's very very close!! So just be mindful ;) and make sure if you're sitting, you go somewhere you can place a napkin on top...ha!

I am 5'7 and 150 lbs with large chest 34G Wore it with out a bra but used boob tape, still was a little too low of a scoop in the chest. But over all fit, beautiful and sexy. Rented the 8 but went with the 10 since I knew there was going to be some eating and drinking.
My husband was like, OMG, my wife is HOT! Great LBD with a sassy slit! Love love!!

links_reviews_title: The slit was sexy for a LBD. Loved the scoop neckline and length. Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: Great for dancing, fit was perfect wasn't too body hugging

links_reviews_title: Paired with a necklace from RTR.
links_reviews_text: This is the second time I've rented this dress (first time was in red) and I love it! I am a 36DDD and can wear it without a bra and it keeps everything supported and seamless all night. The high slit is super sexy but gets a little too high when you sit down if you've got wider hips/thighs - fine if you're only sitting down for dinner and the table or a napkin can provide some coverage. I usually wear an 8/10 in pants. The 10 in this dress fits but opted for the 12 because of the slit.
Very loose around torso then fitted at hips. I'd suggest a size down if you a person that has to size down in certain woman's brands.
This is a head turner dress HANDS DOWN!!!!! Rented for my anniversary dinner and not only did my husband do double takes everyone did. This dress fit like a glove and definitely brought sexy back

This dress fit like a glove! A little bit tight across the chest so I would want to girls who are larger than C cup. Has some stretch to it so it glides over the curves. Loved the lining which made it feel buttery smooth against my skin. I felt amazing and the compliments were nonstop. I think I'll be wearing this a couple more times before I decide to return it.

links_reviews_title: I'm 5'7 and weight 186 lbs and it was a perfect fit.
links_reviews_text: Stretch and tick fabric
I loved this dress !! Got so many compliments .

links_reviews_title: Great fit and fabric ! It makes you feel put together with out much effort.
links_reviews_text: Wedding day in Jamaica

I rented this dress for my birthday party on a rooftop bar! All my friends kept telling me how perfect of a fit the dress was for me. It was tight on my chest so the girls got quite the lift. The slit was sexy and sophisticated. It was a perfect birthday party dress

I wore this to a wedding and rented a size 0 and 2. I ultimately wore the size zero which fit my body perfectly but was a little long since I am short. I still loved it and give it five stars! The leg slit added some sexiness but I was still able to wear it to a Catholic Church wedding with a shaw.

links_reviews_title: I got this dress for graduation and it fit like a glove. I am 5'6 and 165lbs!
links_reviews_text: #graduation

I wore this to a recognition luncheon. I felt so good it in- it hugged every curve. However, the slit is really high- looks amazing when standing, but I warn you, when you sit it will ride all the way up. I was able to strategically place my napkin on my lap haha! I will definitely be renting this again!

Ordered the size 4 & 6 due to reviews of it running a little small. Went with the larger size which was a little loose in the bust, but perfect everywhere else. Sexy leg slit was perfect for my long legs & heels. I got so many compliments & felt really comfortable in this dress!

links_reviews_title: Best dress ever! First Rent the Runway experience
links_reviews_text: The size two fit great everywhere but was a bit tight in the chest area. Size 4 fit my chest better but was too baggy everywhere else. The perfect little black dress! I had a hard time sending it back!
Super comfortable, understated style - able to dress it up or kept it minimal. Thigh slit was a great addition. Got a ton of compliments on this - looking forward to renting it in a different color

This is by far my favorite rental to date. I felt so sexy in it, and it turned a lot of heads. It is a little tight and low in the chest area, but it didn't bother me throughout the night. The slit was by far my favorite feature. Definitely will rent again!!
Fit like a dream and hugged curves in all the right places. Loved the dramatic slit. Was worried that the length would be awkward for my height but it looked great! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable and my husband loved it - win win!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a nice dinner/night out with my husband for our anniversary! The 6 fit great, but the slit went up too high when you sat down so I went with the 8. The dress hugged in all the right places and the slit was such a fun/sexy addition to a little black dress. The cut of the top was perfect - racer back and low scoop - still was able to wear my regular t-shirt bra - and somehow I got some cleavage out of it when that never happens! Both my husband and I wanted to keep this dress!

Loved this dress! Wore is on a date night and felt so sexy yet sophisticated. Hugged my curves and material was great quality. Probably could have worn without a bra but wore a racer back that was perfect and gave me a little extra lift and support! Love this designer and this dress did not disappoint!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress made me feel sexy! Sexy, but classy - the perfect combination.
links_reviews_text: I'm very muscular with bigger thighs so even though the 8 fit, I decided to wear the 10 for a more comfortable fit in the legs. I wore it for a charity event - would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great dress, so sophisticated, very comfy
links_reviews_text: This dress was wonderful - so soft, very easy to wear, perfect slit for a short girl. Only downside was that I have a small chest and so I don't think I quite filled up the top as much the dress was designed to hold. But I loved it and my boyfriend loved it too!
I received so many compliments on this outfit. I paired this black sheath with the Waverly Grey Jenna Faux Fur jacket. I loved this outfit! It was comfortable and stunning.
This was so flattering & the ruffle on the skirt was so fun!

links_reviews_title: Mayor's Masked Ball - first time attending.
links_reviews_text: Definitely true to fit, no wiggle room, no stretch. Beautiful fit. Very comfortable. Very stylish and fashion forward. Received a lot of compliments. Not too long, just at the top of my foot in 4in heels. Will definitely choose gown again, and look forward to trying other styles by this Designer. I'm 5'4", 125lbs.

This dress is elegant and classic. And easy wear. A bit heavy (so maybe not for an outdoor event in warm weather) and long on anyone 5'8" or shorter. I'm usually not a ruffles girl, but these ruffles were beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Get Compliments The Moment You Walk In!
links_reviews_text: I'm not exaggerating when I say I was complimented no less than 10 times in the first 5 minutes I arrived at the event! The material is amazing...this looks and feels like a high end designer dress (because it is!) There isn't a ton of stretch so I went with the 4R. Fit like a glove. Flatters in the right places and downplays the mid-section! This designer is always a win for me! Strapless bra...no spanx needed because of the thickness of the material. At 5'7 the regular was perfect in heels.

Pick your original size and one size up runs small around breast and torso area can be worn with a strapless but there is def side boob don't need spanx heavy material def. hides belly pouch . Great material for winter wedding too hot for the summer events.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue for a formal affair
links_reviews_text: The over all for was very nice. I had tried the 12L and it was too big around the chest and mid section. The 10L got very true to size and was long enough for 6' ladies. Easy to accessories with and got lots of compliments all evening.

links_reviews_title: This dress was simply elegant. My favorite ever!!
links_reviews_text: The dress does run on the smaller side, but if it is just snug on the smaller size, I would go for it as it does give a bit as the night goes on. It's beautifully made and honestly so comfortable. I received so many compliments too. I would have splurged and bought this if I had seen it in the store, but thankfully I did not have too which made it even better!

This was a great dress! I'm short and muscular, especially in the shoulder and arm area and this dress showed off those assets and still left me feeling feminine. The dress fit true to size. I wear a 6-8 in clothes but wore the 10 dress because I just wanted to feel comfortable for the long night.

I have loved my RTR experiences, but this dress is just breathtaking! I have never received so many compliments. I LOVE THIS DRESS. I'm pretty much a 10 regularly and a 12 in designer. This is the 12 and it fit perfectly. I felt fabulous! I want to keep it lol

links_reviews_title: This dress reminded me how fun it is to dress up and be fancy.
links_reviews_text: I was not a huge fan when I first put it on, but it grew on me and I was in love by the end of the night! It was a bit snug in the hips, but it was fine after I put some spanx on. The rest of the fit was absolutely perfect. The bottom skimmed the floor with medium height heels on. Not a complaint, just an observation. I definitely recommend this dress.

links_reviews_title: They dress looked and felt amazing.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove but if you have a large bust you might want to go up a size. I received sooooo many compliments on this dress. Very elegant. Everything was great. From the ordering process to the delivery. Even the return was seamless. I will be ordering again.
Got was perfect for this 108lbs, 5'4 lady! Also, I had to pack it and the wrinkles easily came out-just left it in the bathroom while I showered and it steamed out wrinkles. Great dress!
Dress fit perfectly. I got it in a 10 Long. I received so many compliments on it.
I'm 5'6" and usually wear a 6/8 and the 8R fir perfectly. I wore 4" heel and the length was just right, about 1/2" from the floor. Just loved the fit and the ruffles were beautiful!

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for what I needed!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" so the dress was about 1-2 inches too long but everything about it fit perfectly. I received so many compliments! Dress was perfect for the gala I needed it for.
The dress was eye catching and I received a lot of compliments. The fit was great. The ruffle added an extra wow. I have no cons to this beauty !

links_reviews_title: Felt fabulous in this gorgeous dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress is high quality material and flattering. It runs a little small and I was surprised that the long size worked for me. I received compliments all evening. The ruffles and the dark blue color made this dress unique. The cut around the arms are flattering. I felt beautiful and love the dress!

links_reviews_title: One of my Favorite RTR dresses!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress and got SO many compliments on it. I am 5'9" and the long was perfect because I could wear heels...which for a taller person is great! The ruffle is gorgeous and the silhouette is on point. I have a little bit more of an hour glass figure & the only con to this dress was it fit wonderfully everywhere but was a little snug in the hips. I wore the 6L, however, I think the 8 would have been too big. Although it was snug through the hips, it was still comfortable!

The fit of this gown was absolutely perfect. It hugged my curves and the neckline was incredibly flattering. I received so many compliments. I'm 5'9 and ordered the regular length. I wore it with a higher heel and the length was perfect. I didn't need to hold up my dress to walk which was so nice.

links_reviews_title: Literally the best dress I have ever worn!
links_reviews_text: When you look at this rental on the website, it is totally understated, but in person, it is a showstopper. I felt like a million dollars and got compliments all night. It was form fitted in all the right ways and I do not do form fitting dresses ever. The cut is slimming and the ruffle and thick luxurious fabric hide any imperfections or bloating or "mom pooches." If you want to feel your absolute best and have a classy dress at the same time, this is your dress.
Rented for a gala. The pictures don't do it justice. This dress is super comfortable and very thick material.

links_reviews_title: Sexy and Comfortable in Navy Blue!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so beautiful and so comfortable to wear. It was very true to size and so easy to put on. I felt gorgeous and confident. This dress has enough give to dance, sit and party with ease. A great choice for any shape!

I loved this dress! Very elegant; thick fabric that holds everything in place. I am normally between a size 6 ans 8 but the 6R fit me like a glove, just a little tight in the hips, but the 8 would have probably been too large. Got so many compliments! Definitely recommend it.

Gorgeous dress, lots of compliments -- it holds its form making it very flattering. I ordered the 6L and the 8R - I can often fluctuate between the two sizes. While I could have fit in the 6, it saw pretty snug and I ended up going with the 8 very comfortably -- even in the larger size, the fabric is thick and fitted & I didn't have to wear a bra (which almost never happens for me). With 3-4" heels, the L would have been better but the regular length wasn't too bad since the slit in the gown makes any extra length super easy to trip on.
Gorgeous!!

links_reviews_title: Side ruffle is so fun, and the dress is beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Rented this as a possibility for a wedding but ultimately didn't end up wearing. Loved the fit and the color, the dress is unique, beautiful and very well made. Conservative neckline with fun leg slit.

I LOVED this dress, the solid navy color was understated but the drama of the ruffles in the skirt was fabulous! I literally got compliments all night long and didn't want to send it back after the event! As a note: I was a little hesitant about the dress because of issues folks mentioned with how the top fit. It is a very odd cut that really didn't allow for a traditional strapless bra. A Nu Bra (adhesive) worked well for me (32C).

links_reviews_title: Dress fit perfect. Received so many compliments. Dress arrived ahead of schedule! Was easy to return
links_reviews_text: Ordered 10 and 12. Had to wear the 12. Usually wear 8-10. 5’6” 150 lbs. 36D

links_reviews_title: This dress was appropriate for the grandeur of this wedding
links_reviews_text: The bustline was a little loose but the waist and hips fit beautifully. It was a tad long, so a petite would have been better if any had been available. I felt fabulous in this dress and received many compliments. Even my wedding dress wasn’t this glamorous!

links_reviews_title: If you want a show stopping dress, this is it!
links_reviews_text: I ordered both the 2R and 4R and ended up wearing the larger size as it was more confortable in the rib cage area. I'm rather small busted so I needed to wear a little extra padding to fill the top of the dress out... It is a lovely dress and I received a ton of compliments. I'd love to own this dress. :-)

I loved wearing this dress and hated to return it! So many strangers commented on this dress at the black tie event we attended. I usually wear a size 4 in dresses, and I found this to fit very true to size. It was a teeny bit big up top (small boobs!) but the 2R was too snug through the hips/thighs to downsize.
This dress for a stunning. Loved the ruffle and deep navy color. Definitely fits tight from the chest through the hips.

links_reviews_title: I floated through the night in this dress! It's one of my favorite RTRs. Compliments galore!
links_reviews_text: Don't be scared of the cut out arms. It's very flattering to someone with a smaller waist and curvier hips/butt.
Loved the dress. It wasn't too tight but had enough structure not to have to wear a bra. I'm 5'3 and the dress was still grazing the ground with 4" heels.

links_reviews_title: Truly spectacular! I felt so fabulous in this gown!!!
links_reviews_text: This gown is amazing! I'm wearing it to a formal gala. The top fits tight, therefore had to size up. The 6 fit very snuggly, which left little room for dinner and dancing. I sized up to be more comfortable. I'm 5'2" and the dress is very long, even with heels. Overall...truly in love with this gown!!!

links_reviews_title: That is was actually snowing in April and I wore open toe shoes!!
links_reviews_text: Dress ran a bit small mostly in ribcage area. Length was perfect (i'm 5'9" and wore 3" heels). Received lots of compliments. Felt elegant and sophisticated.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a Hollywood movie star!
links_reviews_text: Usually my daughter wears a 14 so we got the 14 and 16 long because she is 5'10. The gown was AMAZING. Had a small amount of stretch and fitted nicely and the fabric didn't wrinkle easy! Can literally wear right out of the bag! We love this designer and received so many compliments!! Can't say enough about this dress. You can't go wrong!

links_reviews_title: This website & this gown are amazing!!! I LOVED the gown + ease of ordering & receiving it.
links_reviews_text: I am normally a size 12, but they only had a 16 available and I am so glad they did cuz it fit perfectly!! So I would just suggest always size up.
Daughter wore this dress for her freshman Spring formal. She looked so classy and received so many compliments! What a great way to feel fancy for a fraction of the cost!

links_reviews_title: Felt glamorous and got compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie wedding, and I absolutely loved it! I got so many compliments and it was so flattering. I ended up sizing up because my original size was too tight in the chest - made me feel and look totally squished up top. The size up was a little too long, but it was workable and the overall fit was much more comfortable/flattering. I wish I had more black tie events to go to because I would wear this gown over and over again!

I was excited to wear this one! Unfortunately, the wedding we were scheduled to attend was cancelled due to the pandemic, but the dress is cute and comfy! I'm a 36DD but the L was actually a little loose around my chest. I think it would have held up fine with a good bra! Cute asymmetrical cut and beautiful deep green color.

Great dress for a winter wedding! Fit me well and the material was a nice quality. Had a small range of motion due to the off the shoulder sleeves, but so worth it! Received a bunch of compliments too!

links_reviews_title: Belle of the Ball without the Ball Gown
links_reviews_text: This dress is a head turner. I was not in a floor length gown like most of the other women but this dress made me feel confident, sexy, elevated and stood out from the sea of black. Loved this dress!!
I rented this dress for a work gala and it fit like a glove. Being 18 weeks pregnant it fit perfectly.

This dress was stretchy, but held its form through the night. The asymmetrical skirt and off the shoulder features gave it a fun and sexy vibe. I felt really good in this! I'm 5'8" and wore a small. I have narrow hips so considered an XS but am happy with how the small fit. It was flattering around the stomach and stayed put on my shoulders well.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit so well and was very comfortable. Got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable; fits true to size and very forgiving; it's long enough that it doesn't ride up, but it does bunch up as you're walking around so you have to pull it down; still easy to move your arms around and the shoulders did not fall down

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a winter outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: This dress kept me warm all night. Great quality, very comfortable and fit great! I got a lot of compliments on this dress. The color is beautiufl! I normally wear a Medium in dresses, but the small (my backup size) fit me better.

I love the fit of this dress, and was surprised by how flattering it was. It was actually a backup dress but I ended up loving it more than the other dresses I ordered. I'm short (5'0) so I was worried about the length, but it hit me right just above the knee on the shorter side and the long side went past my knee a bit. Overall, I would totally order this dress again and highly recommend it!
I enjoyed wearing this dress. The color was beautiful, and the cut of the dress was nice. Gave this 4 stars only because I had to keep pulling it down.

I didn't get as many compliments as I would've thought but I felt great in it! Chic and classy. Perfect for a winter wedding. It ran a little small in the hip area and I'm hip heavy so I would pull on the dress a little cause it would ride up a little.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress and a text for holiday parties
links_reviews_text: Great fitting and comfortable dress. Sexy and classy. Gorgeous evergreen color with long sleeves perfect for holiday parties and chilly weather. I'm 5'7, 150, 34 D and wore the medium.
This dress was incredibly flattering. The asymmetrical hemline of the skirt added a flare with class.
Rented this dress for a holiday party and received endless complements. It is soo flattering and beautiful and fit me like a glove. Highly recommend.
First, I adored the color of this dress! The green was beautiful and perfect for a winter wedding. I would say the fit is roomy but still very flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great for a semi formal event.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering fit. Great color for winter. Wore it for a December wedding rehearsal - big hit!
I received so many complements with this dress. For the ceremony I work a long wool coat over my shoulders and I loved the look!

I wore this to a family wedding in Chicago and despite the cold temperatures this dress kept me warm and confident all night! I loved the material, although the texture of the material was a bit different from what I imagined (hence the 4 stars). The fit was perfect and the off the shoulder was super chic.
Loved this dress. Great for a fall/winter wedding . Will rent again! Flattering fit!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: Form fitting, gorgeous dress. Heavier material so would not recommend wearing anywhere warm. Although the ceremony was 80 deg and outside and I was okay for that time period!

Loved the fit and feel of the dress, great material for cooler weather. I didn't really have any issues with the fold up top, rarely had to adjust it- only after dancing just to make sure the hanger straps stayed inside. Awesome color! The thicker fabric means it's not clingy and possibly unflattering like some dresses, doesn't show everything. Great dress- highly recommend!
Beautiful fabric - a little stretch, lined. Great for a fall event - too warm for summer.

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The fit of this dress was so flattering, true to size, and extremely comfortable. I wore this to a wedding - the dress is both simple and elegant. I received so many compliments! I would definitely rent this dress again.
This dress was great for a fall wedding! No need for a coat, the long sleeves will take care of you (:

links_reviews_title: Classic dress, the shoulders are annoying
links_reviews_text: My husband wanted me to keep this dress. Classic design great color for a fall wedding. The shoulders need more construction. They ride up and it makes the back look weird. Also the slip peaks through the bottom at times. Maybe it would have fit better if I sized down.
The dress was flattering, comfortable & classy.

links_reviews_title: It was the perfect dress for a cold, outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: I needed a long sleeve for an early October outdoor wedding in Michigan. It was COLD and RAINY and other than my legs being cold, this dress was great! Form fitting (great for a big booty gal like myself), comfortable, and thick material to keep me warm! I loved everything about it and got so many compliments asking where I got it from! I would highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Just the right amount of sexy and classy
links_reviews_text: Love love loved this. Rented for my mom's wedding and felt amazing in it. Loved the off the shoulder look (which shockingly completely stayed put) balanced with long sleeves and the asymmetrical hem. Wore spandex because it was very fitted, but the fabric is thicker so a bit more forgiving. It also has some stretch, but definitely didn't stretch out through the course of the night. Sad to let this one go but loved wearing it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a big gala and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Super comfortable and flattering. Got tons of compliments on it. The only problem was that the lining fell below the hem line so I had to pin it up underneath. I just noticed the same problem on at least one other review.

links_reviews_title: Understated on the hanger but really flattering on!
links_reviews_text: The fabric is stretchy and forgiving - I'm typically a 4-6 depending on cut and the medium was a tad bigger than I would have liked in the waist and hips but the small may have been a little snug in the rear. It was really comfortable. Flattering off the shoulders and the asymmetrical hemline gave it just enough to be interesting.

links_reviews_title: Classy and beautiful color and cut dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was a big hit, for lots of compliments. The material is heavy, so not for a hot day, and you will need some help getting the zipper up, with the long sleeves, but this is a great dress.
I wore this to a rehearsal dinner, it was great! Received a lot of compliments, it's slightly form fitting but very flattering. Beautiful deep shade of green.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments. Dress was gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: Selves a little tight, but dress was amazing. True to size with little stretch.

The style of this dress is very different than my usual style but not so different that I felt uncomfortable wearing it. The slanted bottom edge is definitely edgy but probably my favorite part of this dress! The sleeves fit well, almost a bit tight, but that was necessary for the off-shoulder to stay in place. The fold down for the off-shoulder look was a bit tricky but some fashion tape helped out. Just don't try to raise your arms above your shoulders. Would wear this again.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my brother's wedding rehearsal. It was a great dress for the event and time of year.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well. I fluctuate between a medium and large and the medium fit great. I loved the length and it was a perfect style for a formal winter event.
Love love the cut off this dress. Perfect for a holiday party. Not a dress you'd want to do a lot of moving in though.

Dress was SO comfortable. Stretchy fabric that was thick enough that I didn't feel like spanx was an absolute necessity. Asymmetrical hem and off the shoulder look felt dynamic but classy. Both of my Lyft drivers (to and from the party) commented on how I looked great (not something I usually get). I think it was that off the shoulder look that popped. Very happy with the dress! Pretty dark green color too!

links_reviews_title: Perfect choice for early spring wedding in New England!
links_reviews_text: This dress was a great choice for a chilly spring wedding - long sleeves for warmth, but the neckline and bias cut still allowed for the right amount of skin. Medium was a touch too small for me, but the large was waaay too big. Would recommend!

links_reviews_title: I ended up matching the bridal party which worked out since I had to carry my son as ring bearer!
links_reviews_text: Fit very well, very comfortable and I didn’t feel like it was falling down even while holding my son.

I loved this dress so much, I ended up buying it! It was very comfortable and flattering, and I received a lot of compliments on it. I ordered a medium and a large, and ended up wearing the large, mainly for length (the seam was hitting my waist wrong on the medium).

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a night out in London!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a date night on our London trip! Love the fit and my boyfriend fully approved too! It was way more of a comfortable fit than I was expecting. Very easy to wear.

I loved this dress. RTR was awesome and sent this after my first dress didn't work out. This was the perfect mix of fun, flirty and perfect for dancing the night away. I loved how it had a bit of stretch to pull you in at the waist and the fun and funky top and sleeves just pulled it all together. Get this dress. You will get so many compliments and feel like a million bucks!

I wish I would've listened to the reviews before I ordered my sizes. Definitely order two sizes up. I normally wear a 4, but for this dress I needed to wear an 8. However, I was able to get the 6 to zip and couldn't not wear it. Such a great dress. I got so many compliments. Loved it!

I don't usually go for sequined numbers, but when you have an event in Vegas to attend; GO BIG! This is comfortable, easy to wear and for sure eye-catching...only thing to be aware of is the side openings are big/wide, so watch for a wardrobe malfunction!

links_reviews_title: I loved wearing this dress! I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_text: I listened to the reviews and sized up two sizes and it fit perfect, I little big on top but it's blousy anyway. I couldn't wear a bra because of the open back, and had to make sure the spanx stayed below the waist line but otherwise a perfect dress! Loads of compliments

I wore this gorgeous dress during a trip to Miami and loved it! It's definitely tight and I had to fast before wearing it but it was worth it. It was short even on my 5'2" frame so tall girls beware but other than that it's perfect for a sexy night out!
What an awesome dress. The fit was a little tight in the hips and a little loose in the waist for me, but I felt so confident in this dress. Perfect for a casino opening/cocktail attire!
I'm 5'10, 140lbs, and 34C chest. Dress was great! Sexy and comfortable. A little short, but it's meant to be.

This dress runs very small if you are a curvy girl I'd suggest going up 2 sizes. I loved this dress so much it was the best edgy, formal dress. I wanted to wear this to my event but couldn't get the right size soon enough.
You will stand out and sparkle. Great dress for a party or going out to the club. I wore on stage. Great for a rock look too. No stretch and runs a little small. But nice quality.
Sequins, yes. Cheesy? Not at all! Felt super elevated, futuristic, and fun!

I am absolutely obsessed with this flashy, fun dress by Iro!! It runs true to size so I would recommend wearing your usual size as your primary and going one size up as your backup size. This style is fitted throughout the mid section and form fitted at the hips, however it is not too tight so it is definitely a comfortable piece. The dress is great for any cup size and could be worn with a standard or strapless bra. In regards to length, this hits me at the mid thigh. Again, I love all the sequins and how flashy this dress is! Just add a pair of black or nude heels, a pair of earrings and a little black handbag and you are a good to go for a night on the town!

This is so fun and sexy but holy cow, the skirt is tight. I am a true 0 and my husband had to shove my butt cheeks down into the skirt to get it on. Totally cute once i had it on but I could hardly walk and definitely couldn't have danced. Sadly sent it back without wearing.
Cute dress but I sized up as other reviews mentioned... I usually am a 6 or 8 but the 10 was unavailable... I probably could have used the 12 which would have been to big in the top. Zero stretch.

links_reviews_title: Too small in the hips for me.
links_reviews_text: I should have gotten a larger size. Would have been a fun dress if it fit.
So tight on bottom, big on top. I was afraid a size up would be too big on top and unflattering. Wish it worked!

links_reviews_title: Not a great option for curvy hips
links_reviews_text: I sized up after reading other reviews but still couldn't get the dress over my hips.

Beautiful dress, and loved the fit. nicely fitted in the skirt and blousy on top. I'm about 34" hip and this was well and snug but not uncomfortable. Only thing is not really a dance party dress since you are sucked in like Jessica Rabbit. Would be a GREAT date night dress!
Tight fit
It fit me well, and I felt great in it. Just be careful not to unzip all the way. Had some trouble getting it to zip again.

links_reviews_title: I ended up not wearing this as I didn't feel comfortable
links_reviews_text: This dress is fully open on the sides under the sleeves. So it was very revealing of the side-boob.
Couldn't wear it because it was too small on the bottom. Very cool dress, though!
This is a gorgeous dress but sadly it didn't fit

The fit of the dress is tight in the hips/thighs, but lose at the waistline as someone who definitely has hips. However, the fit was still flattering despite the waist being so lose thanks to the cut. My typical size zipped but barely, and would have been uncomfortable to wear. Go with a size up! The armpits are quite large and show a bit of side boob if your arms are raised. Also, know that as these dresses have been worn by others the sequins are now more of a dark grey color rather than black.

I usually wear a zero on top and a two on the bottom. This fit tightly on top with not much wiggle room. Didn't go past my waist going down. I would say go a little bigger or get two sizes to be sure. It will DEFINITELY not be too big.

links_reviews_title: The bottom portion runs VERY small. I am a usual size 4, could not even zip up the back. Returning.
links_reviews_text: The dress is gorgeous! Unfortunately, it fits SUPER tight in the bottom area and I could not even get it zipped. I think the next size up would be too large in the top and just right in the bottom.
Love the texture and fit of this dress. It's short but you feel covered and comfortable in it. Very fun.
A little tight and short but overall fit was true to size.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear the original size but hope the larger one works. I think I'll look amazing!
links_reviews_text: Runs super small in the lower half. I'm normally a 4-6; I could barely get it over my hips. Called and ordered another one two sizes up! Wish me luck!
Heavy. Extra tight midsection. Runs small

links_reviews_title: couldn't even get it partially zipped
links_reviews_text: I was SO SAD when I tried this dress on because it runs SO SMALL. I admittedly have fuller hips, but I couldn't even begin to get the zipper going. I wish I could just size up, but I know that with only one larger size than what I tried it still wouldn't work. I would either size up a couple from your normal size or just skip this one if you have a round booty! If you're more narrow through the hips though this might work great for you. It's really a shame for me as this dress is beautiful.

I read the reviews and ordered 1 size up and it fit perfectly! The dress looks great on - there's not a lot of coverage on the side from the large arm holes/ sleeves but the way it draped his the girls well (no side boob). Love the silhouette of this dress - not like everything else you see on the racks!

links_reviews_title: Way too small - order at least 4 sizes up
links_reviews_text: I read the reviews and ordered this 2 sizes larger than usual and I would say it was still 2 inches away from being able to zip. It's a shame because the sequins around the zipper are very delicate and these dresses are all going to get destroyed from people trying to cram themselves into a dress that doesn't fit. I ordered it 2 more sizes up hoping that might fit as it's really cute but I ordered something else as backup because I am not optimistic. Will update the review. Update: I also tried this in a 40, and weirdly it was plenty big - it seemed way more than just 2 sizes bigger than the 36, and I probably couldn't have worn the 38. The top on the 40 (unsurprisingly) was a little overly voluminous, and I had ordered a second dress as backup which I ultimately decided was more my style. This is a beautiful dress, but definitely be careful about the sizing.

Well after reading reviews I knew I should have sized up but the only size available was a 4 (36) and so I went for it. The bottom has Zero give. The top is loose and great for big busted but wanting to look more conservative. The dress wouldn't zip on first attempt.... but try again I did and I was able to squeeze in. Size up for comfort! It's a beautiful dress still!

links_reviews_title: Its a gorgeous dress but was too small & had to send back
links_reviews_text: Definitely size up
Rented this for NYE- runs small and unflattering. If I size up, the top would be too loose. Returning for another item. Again, another dress best for thin, tall women with no hips/curves.

links_reviews_title: Tiny but cute - order two sizes up
links_reviews_text: I usually wear a 6, sometimes a 4 and after reading the reviews ordered a size 10. It fit well. Be sure to size up and you won't be disappointed! Upper expensive looking and chic. Wearing for New Years Eve.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress, runs extremely small in the skirt portion!
links_reviews_text: Dress was adorable. Very heavy and the skirt portion runs extremely small. Would be perfect for someone with a large chest, skinny legs and small bottom!
runs small especially around the hip and butt area.
I couldn't even zip it and it was super short. Never wore it
I am 5'9" and this dress fit the floor for length perfectly in flat sandals. Loved that! Absolutely needed safety pins for the straps as they are long.
Loved this for fall. Very pretty. True to size but slightly tight in the rib cage area. Needed bralette or tank under if large breasted

I loved this dress! I wore it to a rehearsal dinner and threw on a jean jacket. It's easy to dress up or down - the print is casual but the material is elevated. I went braless but needed double side tape to keep everything in place. I'm usually an 8 or 10 in dresses depending on the fit across the hips and the medium fit well. This dress is bold so be ready for the attention!

Perfect summer dress for any occasion! The straps were a little long for me but a simple pinning solved the issue. It's a great length especially for someone like my height. Very rare I get a maxi dress that touches the ground. It's fun and comfortable. Highly recommend renting it!

links_reviews_title: I have no idea how this hasn't been rented more
links_reviews_text: Great for tall girls. The fabric was absolutely gorgeous and felt as expensive as it was. Planning to rent again. I felt sexy but not too revealing. Beautiful cut. No stretch i it was a little tight on my rib cage but I feel like sizing up would be too big. Worth a little discomfort for how great I felt in it.
Definitely size down in this dress and you will need double stick tape if you are smaller chested but a great dress overall!

This fit great around the waist and the length was extra long and I'm over 6ft with heels! I had to pin the straps around the chest area because you couldn't wear a bra and it was a little loose for me but it was easy to fix and still wear and look great!

links_reviews_title: Everyone turned around when i passed, and complimented me
links_reviews_text: Im flat chested so I used tape to put everything in place. Overall is a beautiful dress, it has an amazing flow. Is long (and im pretty tall, even with high heels it was an inch or two too long) I surely recommend it

Lovely fit, very flowy, several layers underneath. I didn't mind it but a little revealing if you're big busted. Definitely an amazing dress for a party, night of celebrations, a wedding, or a date night. Will be renting again.

So many compliments!! Very flowy, perfect for our friends' hot outdoor formal wedding. Runs long, must wear heels. I'm a B/C cup and I could've used some boob tape with this dress. All in all I felt so beautiful and comfortable in this.

Absolutely loved this dress! So flattering and I loved the fit. I wore a size small because it was the only size they had in store-it was a little bit more snug than I'd like but I'm usually a medium and I thought it looked great on. I'm pretty small chest though-this dress may pose an issue for bigger chested women. Would absolutely rent again 11/10
Love this pattern and fit- a win!

links_reviews_title: It's black, orange and white, a little too Halloween-ish to wear in Sept/Oct.
links_reviews_text: It's black, orange and white, a little too Halloween-ish to wear in Sept/Oct.
Loved this dress for the fit, wish the print were different, but the cut more than makes up for it. Many compliments received.

Very pretty but was too fancy for a casual occasion. The XS was too tight for athletic build but if sized up I would have been swimming in the dress - the length hit the ground and the shoulder straps were falling off.

Beautiful dress! I took the advice of the other reviews and sized down and it fit perfectly. Pretty snug at the waist, but comfortable. I'm tall, but only needed the regular length and it touched the floor.

links_reviews_title: Great dress and good for nursing
links_reviews_text: Dress is gorgeous. Loved wearing it and it was great for nursing/pumping.
Party got canceled, I will re order for next time, fits great

The fabric was pretty but it didn't fit right so I did not end up wearing. It was fitted/snug around the waist but the straps were so long and did not stay on. Which left the bust weirdly puffy and just awkward. This dress might work if you have a long torso.
The dress fit a tiny bit too big. The material and color is awesome and fun!
Runs large in the chest. Had to use fashion tape to secure it
It was too long and baggy in my shoulders, had trouble keeping the dress on.

I was actually sent this dress when my original order didn't arrive. And it was a hit! Very forgiving but flattering shape... I probably more of a 6/medium but the small fit great due to the jersey-type material. Neck line is PLUNGING... like to bra plunging but the material and shape makes it fine to not wear a bra. Comfy, classic, sexy without going over the top.
This dress was so comfy and flattering. There is a slip that rides up but other than that this dress was perfect.
I'm normally a small, but went with XS per the suggestion, which fit perfectly. Nice thick material, elegant slit, all around classy!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Really comfortable fit and fabric. Loved the details that made it stand out (hard to do with a formal black dress). Not my favorite rental, but would probably rent again.

This was my third choice dress. I had originally ordered it in a small and it looked big. I last minute added the XSR and so glad I did! At first I thought it was too plain, but I got a lot of compliments and I was able to really accessorize it so it looked very elegant for the black tie wedding I attended. It was so comfortable to wear and I only needed minimal shape wear. It was very forgiving but if you are smaller than a size 4 I wouldn't get this dress. It runs large.
This dress is spectacular. Accentuates all the right places and is ver forgiving in spots that i didnt want to accentuate. Drop dead gorgeous.

links_reviews_title: Hiccups, but RTR did everything to make up for it.
links_reviews_text: Had shipping issues. First dress was delayed, RTR overnighted 2 additional dresses for no charge which also got delayed. Desperate I drove to Santa Monica which happened to have one of my selected dresses on site . It was perfect. Staff on site was more than willing to help me find the perfect dress. There was no additional charge as they knew my situation and they actually credited me back the price of my original rental and threw in a clutch. Despite issue I would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable and good for shorter/bustier ladies
links_reviews_text: Dress was extremely comfortable. I am 5'1 and wore three inch heels and the fit was perfect. I usually have a hard time finding long dresses on here bc Im so short but the fact that they have a petit size was perfect. Wore the dress w sticky boobs because a regular bra won't do! Material is lightweight so good for a fall/ spring/ summer black tie.
Loved this dress. Neckline is low and slit is high but still manages to be classy. Got lots of compliments. Looks baggy in the photo but is form fitting in person.

I rented this for a formal affair and I was 3 months post-partum. The fabric was perfect because of all the stretch and the slit was amazing; HOWEVER, golly gee my boobs were so exposed I had to wear a cami to hide them as this was not that kind of event. I wish I had a photo to show, but if you have breasts larger than a C or you are breastfeeding--be aware that they will be on full display.
Dress fit well and was true to size. Only hold up was the low neck line. As a mother I must wear a bra...must! So the neckline was just a bit too low and showed by bra.

I rented this dress for a black tie Christmas party and I absolutely LOVED it! The material is gorgeous and also stretchy so it literally fits like a glove. I didn't have to wear a bra (which is always a win in my book) and the detailing is extremely flattering. I'm 5'3" and the length was perfect with a heel. This is by far my favorite rental yet!

Gorgeous dress, didn't end up wearing because I found another I liked better. VERY low cut chest and very high slit up the leg. Also, from the side you can look a little "full" in the stomach area due to the way the fabric falls, but it's still really beautiful
I usually wear a medium but ended up wearing the small. The detail in the front is very flattering and not tight on the stomach. I loved it and will rent again!
I LOVED this dress! I wore it to a formal dinner on vacation in Mexico. The weather was hot and humid but I felt so comfortable in this dress. It was very flattering, fabric wasn't too bulky.
Lots of compliments. Bright, airy, someone called me a modern Hobby Holly. Ha! Runs a little big.

The seam at the true waist made this drop waist less shapeless--it was fitted through the torso and came to just below knee on me. The color and pattern are super cheerful. The neckline is probably a little low for conservative offices, but workable for others. Would rent again!

Wore this to an outdoor event with a yellow dress code. Perfect for sitting on a blanket in the park in August. Pockets were clutch (as usual) and held my phone without dragging down the silhouette. The opening was a bit low but I didn't mind. the center of my bra peeked out a bit but it was flesh-toned and not a huge deal to me. I thought the waist was cute, albeit a little big. Nothing a small belt couldn't handle. Lots of compliments. Easy to wear. Would definitely rent again. Someone should tell this company that a 14 (my usual rental size) is NOT a 3XL!! Sheesh.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely adorable dress and good for various occasions!
links_reviews_text: Was unsure about the yellow at first, but ended up loving it! The fit was flattering and I got tons of compliments. Only downsides go with the other reviews that it wrinkles easy and pretty low cut, but I just wore with an under shirt and worked great. Fabric is nice and light so perfect for summer!

The yellow cotton sateen fabric is really lovely for summer. It does wrinkle, but not in a sloppy way. I wouldn't buy this, but glad ai had the chance to wear it to a town block party. I am pretty sure this runs true to size.

This yellow is gorgeous! I love the ruffles on the sleeves and, of course, the pockets. The torso definitely fits more like a drop waist, even on my 5'9" self. Just something to keep in mind for anyone shorter than me! The neckline is also pretty low, and can flare out a bit depending on how you move. That said, love this dress for summer and love the color!
Loved the dress for an outdoor summer event. It does wrinkle easily.

I couldn't wear because it was so low cut. I mean scandalously low cut. Totally deceiving. I loved the color and really wanted to wear. But no appropriate for a family function. Sigh. Maybe for another event.

The length was closer to a maxi on me rather than a midi. Due to that, it looked a bit dowdy and the middle panel hit me oddly--but I could see how it'd be cute if it were just a bit shorter. Wondering if the next size down might work for me. The material was a little cheaper-feeling than anticipated considering the price point.

links_reviews_title: Great Color/Pattern, Large in the Chest
links_reviews_text: Pros: rich colors and thoughtful details like pockets. Cons: tightly fitted over the tummy and very large around the armpits and chest.

It was huge. I had to return it and won't rent a smaller size. It was also very low in the neckline. The pockets and gathering at the waist are not complimentary. The lightweight fabric and colors were nice.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress, unique but great for the summer
links_reviews_text: Glad I got this. Wasn't sure about the torso section but it's actually fun and the pockets are a plus. Fun summer color and design.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but too low cut for me
links_reviews_text: I wear a 16W , 18 or XXL and I was pleased that the 4XL in this brand fit me. The dress is really cute but the V neck was so low it would have been hard to wear IRL.
It fits large and fairly low cut. The dress arrived super wrinkled. I had to spend quite a bit of time ironing it.

Colorful, flattering, slimming in all the right places. I was nervous about the cut and the pockets but they did not make my already generous hips seem larger! The fitted tummy panel really is slenderizing. This is one of those dresses that gets random people to stop you in the street and compliment you. I had expected as it was casual it would not be the case, but it calls out to people. Perfect in summer!!
This was not flattering.
Loved the fit of the bust however the rest was a bit loose. The pockets made it look like I was wearing an apron. Not the afternoon tea attire I was looking for.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous fabric and cut, especially for taller girls.
links_reviews_text: I hoped to wear this at a professional conference, but it was a bit too sweet. At 5'6", it hit me a little below where I'd hoped it would, but taller shoes would probably fix that, and the overall style was super flattering. I'd recommend it for a wedding or date — just didn't work for my needs.
Looks more flattering in pics, not a good choice for apple shape
Love it !
I'm a bit short for the sizse of this dress so my chest was complety hanging out. i"m 5'3 and size 12

This dress is a cute concept, but the chest and midsection are quite large. The styling has a vintage flare which is something I usually love, but the large midsection in combination with the vintage look has the unfortunate effect of making you look like you're a little girl trying on a dress from grandma's closet. I sent this one right back, despite the adorable color and styling, this one just didn't work for me.

So I love this dress. It's flowy and comfortable while still giving me a waist. Be careful though, sizing is way off! I'm a 12 and in a 2XL. It's a little loose in places, but otherwise fit is fine. If a 12 is 2XL, 14 is 3XL and 16 is 4XL. Obviously this company doesn't design for all women, which is very disappointing. Still, the dress is nice.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is fabulous! The fabric is lightweight and flows. The cut is super flattering. It is a bit low cut but it make me look even taller which I loved. It is a tad bit low cut but nothing fashion tape couldn't solve so I didn't have to worry all day. For anyone with a smaller chest it might be a bit loose on top. I have a bigger chest and it fit nicely. I didn't want to take the chance of it not being available when I want to rent again so I bought it.
Short but hot! Head turner. Super comfy too

links_reviews_title: Being that it was derby week, it was just a weren't fit.
links_reviews_text: It fit great and I'm large chested. Great flow to and definitely turned heads.

I love this flirty dress by Yumi Kim! Running big with no stretch, I recommend wearing a size down for your primary size. This style is loose throughout the midsection and at the hips. The bust is roomy and works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a standard bra with this dress. At 4’8”, the length hit just above the knee on me. The floral print is fun and the material is light, making it the perfect summer dress. Pair with the Pink Disco Soiree Crossbody by DVF to complete your outfit!
Wore this for Thanksgiving dinner and it was a hit. Absolutely beautiful dress. The waist runs a touch small. I rented an XS and my waist is ~24.5.

links_reviews_title: Despite mixed reviews, I really like this dress
links_reviews_text: Runs a bit big but is still flattering; tad short but sufficient for petite frames. Would rent again; overall very cute.

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Feels like a robe!

I'm not sure who this dress is designed for, as the sizing seems disparate. The Medium fit very tiny through the waist (it fit my tiny 14 year-old daughter who wears a 0/2) but fell off of her through the top. I couldn't zip it up over my rib cage, but it probably would have been still large for me through the shoulders and chest and I'm busty.

links_reviews_title: Super cute, but short and very low neckline (you can add a camisole!)
links_reviews_text: I'm 47. This dress is PROBABLY for someone younger than me, but it's on the verge of being something I can pull off, so I am wearing it. Probably for someone younger primarily bc it is so short. The black skirt under the flower print one does hang down a little, which I'm not sure whether it is supposed to or not. It's OK, but does kind of look like your slip may be showing. Very low plunge neckline. Black camisole is appropriate if you want to wear it to work.

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Size up if you're between sizes
links_reviews_text: I'm between a 6 and an 8. There wasn't a L available so I gave the M a shot and it was just a little bit too tight. It was incredibly flattering, though and if it was just a little bit bigger in the chest, it would have been an incredible dress!

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing it this time.
links_reviews_text: It was my birthday weekend dress, but I ended up not wearing it at all. I have a larger bust and it didn't think it looked quite right on me up top in either size. The pattern was gorgeous and I liked the lightweight fabric, so I was bummed!

links_reviews_title: Ordered M Waist a size small with no give
links_reviews_text: Ordered size M but Waist is a size small with no give

Not at all as pictured I didn't end up wearing it. The v is very deep and the length is so short. It isn't flattering for large chests. This is a vacation party dress not at all appropriate for an occasion.
Very narrow skirt that doesn't flow very well for well rounded booties. Medium fit on top and not bottom. Large fit (kinda) on bottom and was too large on top.

Very pretty but ran tight across the bust. And I also didn't read about the fabric. It is silk and I had issues with static. I ended up not wearing it because the neckline was REALLY low cut. All my fault for not reading reviews.

links_reviews_title: It was nice to change up my work wardrobe from the usual pencil skirts.
links_reviews_text: This dress fits very nicly and is incredibly flattering with the fitted top before it drapes loosely. The print is fun, but still looked good for work. Lower cut than I thought, but I wore a camisole underneath and it was fine. This could also be as I have a smaller chest so less to fill it out.
It's really baggy on top. The V comes down pretty low. I think it would work for someone with a bigger chest but it's not for small ladies. Lovely and cheery print, though!

links_reviews_title: Easy wear, beautiful floral pattern, shows off the legs
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress. It fits nicely and has fun floral pattern. The 3/4 length sleeves flare out a little, but don't bell out. The neck plunges down a bit low so I had to wear a cami under it.
The v, is a deep, deep v.

links_reviews_title: Much more casual than expected and short. Not very happy with rental.
links_reviews_text: Runs shorter and skirt is fuller than expected.

links_reviews_title: Much more cleavage then expected and also it was baggy- so it wouldn't be good for work OR an event
links_reviews_text: Too much cleavage, baggy, not flattering, flimsymaterial. I'm 5,1 and 120 lb and the XS hung off me

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top to pair with anything.
links_reviews_text: I'm a large and ordered a large but it was still a bit snug. I have a small chest so I didn't expect that. However it was easy to wear and style. Would rent again.
Beautiful but not for the medium/heavy chested. This might look better on a flat chested woman. It felt very tight on the cup even though the band size was right. Not my vibe.

I originally rented the top and matching skirt, but the skirt didn't work on my narrow figure. The top, however, was a major win. I wore it with denim cutoffs while in Mexico and received so many compliments. It's also adjustable like your bra so the medium fit perfectly on my size 36B cups.

Loved this adorable set! I rented both the top and skirt and wore them together. The top is definitely true to size/ small so if you have a larger chest I would rent true to size or size up. It's adjustable and comfortable! I wore this out in Miami as a day to night transition outfit and got so many compliments. 10/10 would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Adjustable like a bra and fit securely, super cute.
links_reviews_text: I'm a 32b and it fits true to size.

links_reviews_title: It was a cute addition to a Hamptons weekend, but to be honest a little too small.
links_reviews_text: Too small.

If you want something simple, modern and elegant, this is your dress! It's comfortable and flattering. I got compliments all evening. It does not have a zipper so you do need to put it on prior to hair and makeup. Built in liner for the chest so didn't have to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, beautiful on and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: This is the most amazing dress! it was so comfortable (has just the right amount of stretch) and looked great on. I am busty (36 DD) and did not need to wear a bra with it. I received tons of compliments on this dress at the event I attended.

links_reviews_title: This brand makes me feel beautiful
links_reviews_text: This started as my back up dress. I was glad I hung on to it another couple weeks because I ended up needing it for another event. It has clean lines and looks great. I've worn 3 or 4 dresses from this brand and they all worked for me. I love it!

links_reviews_title: This dress was incredible!! I received so many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: The length was perfect and the shelf bra was strong enough to hold my 36DD chest. The back of the dress was gorgeous!!
