The only bad thing was there were small holes on both of the seams of the arms near the end of the sleeves, I was able to cover them up so they weren’t noticeable.

The dress hit perfect floor length on my 5 foot 2 frame and 3.5 inch heals. The fabric is heavy and forgiving so it doesn't show bumps or cellulite. The criss-crossing in the back gives beautiful detail without grabbing back fat. I was able to wear this dress without a bra due to built in shelf bra and without spanx. It was very comfortable and flattering.

The material of this dress is perfection. Thick enough to provide great coverage and support (didn't need a bra) and stretchy enough to provide total comfort. 40R was a great length and fit for me (5'4" 130 lbs and wore 100ml heels). Note: There is no zipper and you have to pull the dress in over your head. Something to consider when thinking about hair style and makeup application.

links_reviews_title: Love the back of this dress!
links_reviews_text: Wore the 38L. I'm 5'8" 145 lbs. fit perfect. Lots of compliments on back of dress.

The dress was simply amazing and beautiful on! I received many compliments during the gala. This was my first time renting with RTR and I can say I will definitely be renting again from RTR. The only disappointment was the length of the dress. I got a long to have it cover my shoes, but it did not. Other than that the dress was gorgeous!!

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, easy to wear elegant dress!
links_reviews_text: Super supportive thick yet comfortable fabric made this dress so easy to wear. I didn't need to wear a bra and was so comfortable all night! You will not be disappointed with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved that it came on time and I was in London and I was still able to return it on time.
links_reviews_text: I'm normally wear a size 8 in dresses. I'm 5'7 and I weight 170 34DD and both fit amazing but the larger one would gather in the hips area so I went with the smaller size.
Very slimming and elegant. I wear a 2 or 4 normally and the 40L was perfect.

This was my Morticia Addams dress for Halloween. It's super stretchy and comfortable. It was not long enough to wear with heels, FYI. I am 5'11". You should size down if you want a super fitted look. It was elegant and I loved the feel of it.

So nervous to rent this gown because I have a little pooch. I trusted the reviews and wore this gown to a black tie wedding. Did not disappoint! Comfortable and gorgeous. I'm only 5 feet tall and the dress was stunning. I felt classy and dressed appropriately for a black tie. Loved it.
This was the perfect dress to celebrate out 10 year anniversary -- at the top of the contemporary hotel -- watching the Happily Ever After firework show!! So perfect for the special occasion!!
This dress is beautiful! True to size and absolutely stunning. I can't get over how beautiful the silhouette is!

I didn't end up wearing this to the event, but I think it had potential to be really nice. I ordered a size too small and it was REALLY tight and short. I'm pretty tall though, next time if I were to reorder I'd get the long. The back was really pretty though, and the fabric was nice (yet a tad unforgiving).
Beautiful dress that hugs your curves! Lined so you don't need undergarments. I sized up as a backup but my original was perfect. Compliments all night.

Love love love this dress!!! Almost bought it, but won't wear it enough to justify the price. The pictures really don't do it justice. La Petite Robe dresses are the best form fitting dresses out there and they come in Long which I always need!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and figure flattering.
links_reviews_text: I loved that the front was plain and the detail was all in the back. The dress was very warm but that is to be expected with long sleeves. I added the red belt but it was pretty without it too.

This dress fit well, yet has enough "give" to be extremely comfortable for an all night gala. The back is stunning and I received lots of compliments. I liked that it hid my broad shoulders and made my waist appear more slender. Would rent again!
I absolutely loved this dress. Sucked it in in all the right places and I got a million compliments and felt so comfortable! #glamorous #classy

I found RTR by accident online and it is the best thing ever! The items were quality and one dress fit perfectly and looked amazing! The lace detail was high quality and flowed nicely as I walked. It fit very well and the material was thick and not see through. The other dress had boning that had been bent and didn't fit properly. I contacted customer service and they helped me find another dress in my size AND shipped for free overnight! It was a perfect fit as well and absolutely beautiful! I will definitely use the service again! Easy return shipping! Thanks RTR!

links_reviews_title: Classic, elegant and stylish! It makes you feel fabulous!
links_reviews_text: LOVE this dress! The fabric feels great and holds you in at the same time. I didn't have to wear spanx or a bra! I got so many compliments the whole evening. The only thing I would have done differently is rented the "long". I'm 5'6 and the "regular" was a little too short with heels.

links_reviews_title: Classy dress for black tie event
links_reviews_text: Loved the soft and stretchy fabric of this dress. The back details were beautiful—I got lots of compliments! The length was perfect for me with 3" heels.
Used this dress for maternity photos and it fit perfect. Very stretchy material. 29 weeks pregnant and did not have any trouble putting on or removing.

links_reviews_title: The fit of the dress. Customer service
links_reviews_text: Loved this gown! Stunning, amazing fit!! Will likely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: easy to travel with. Material is very well made.
links_reviews_text: The dress was very comfortable. I wore it to a black tie winter wedding.

links_reviews_title: Most complimented dress at the ball!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! I didn't even receive this many compliments on my wedding dress. I am short (5'4") but the length was great with a 2 inch heel. The arms were a little tight, but I have big arms. So graceful and lovely! I wanted to keep it!

links_reviews_title: Business in the front, party in the back!
links_reviews_text: This dress was elegant! I received tons of compliments and it fit perfect for me. I am only 5'2" and I wear a size 6/8. The size 42R fit perfect!

links_reviews_title: Feeling confident and comfortable in my dress really made it easy to enjoy the evening!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3" 118lbs, the 38 R fit perfectly even on my shortwaisted frame! I wore less than 2" heels and the dress just skimmed the floor. I received many compliments on the dress! It was sooo comfortable to wear as it was stretchy thick fabric with no zippers or any fasteners at all. I didn't find it difficult to put on, I just stepped in and pulled it up. It was super classy and minimal. Even though it covered a lot, it also hugged all the right spots so it was modest but still sexy. I loved it!
Great fit , added pink accessories and got tons of compliments! Back is stunning!!! Only downfall another RTR gall liked it just as much as I did and wore it to the same event ....
Great fit, good condition, wore to a Mardi Gras ball! Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I have not worn it for an event yet.
links_reviews_text: I had to get a LONG because the regulars were out of stock so it is longer than I need. I like how it fits although there is no zipper or buttons making it a little tricky to get on and off. It is a firm stretchy material and I love the design on the back. The back however is the only real character of the dress besides the scoop neck so I will be sure to wear statement jewelry for sure.

links_reviews_title: Fits like a glove! The most comfortable garment you'll ever wear, easy to walk and just stunning
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. With heals glad I got the long

I am 5'2.5" and a size 6 and the 42r fit perfectly. The dress holds everything in place without feeling restricted. My heels were about 4 inches high and the dress fell just right on me. I felt very sexy in the dress. The simple elegance of this dress is just what I was looking for. #glamorous #sexy #formalaffair #elegant

I wore this gown to a gala and felt so elegant in this simple yet sophisticated gown! It was hard to get on as the fabric does not have much stretch but once on, it was amazing. This dress has gorgeous detailing in the back! I don't like how it photographs in front because it is plain but a large necklace or earrings can help with that.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful! The material felt amazing and fit lovely
links_reviews_text: The material of the dress was amazing perfect for a curvy girl!

links_reviews_title: Amazing black tie wedding on NYE in Boston
links_reviews_text: The fit was pretty much true to size for me (40 R) but had I not read the comments section, the dress would have been too small. I am both petite, have an athrletic build, and curves, but this dress made me look and feel amazing! My weight is 135 lbs. first time user of rent the runway and they did a great job, even sent me my dress two days earlier than the date I put!

links_reviews_title: The comfort of this dress. 35 weeks pregnant and the fit was phenomenal! Has compliments all night.
links_reviews_text: Extremely comfortable! This dress had no zipper but was easy to get over my head and pregnant body. All night I received complaints from strangers how beautiful I looked. Highly recommend spending the extra on this dress for the beauty, comfort and fit of this dress. Loved the back of it too!! Would highly recommend this dress especially during pregnancy.

links_reviews_title: So much more than a black dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress was incredibly comfortable. I loved that I didn't have to wear a bra! The back of this dress makes it anything but your simple black dress! I felt like a princess!!

links_reviews_title: Cute but a bit long for petite ladies
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'2" and even with 3.5 inch platforms, this was a tad too long. Was also a bit big up top, but everything else fit well. I wore a stick, backless bra

I rented this for my birthday because I'm very into 70s/retro clothes. Seriously such a statement piece, everyone noticed it. I was worried the full jumpsuit wouldn't be flattering but it was alright. Only thing - it was SUPER tight on me and I struggled to sit down, even though I got the long!

I'm usually a 4, but they didn't have my size so I decided to try the 2l. It was too short and too tight and I think the 4long would have been perfect. Otherwise a super fun jumper and would rent again in the right size!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a recent Vegas trip. Love the way it fits. Received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The denim was very comfortable. My hips are wide and this jumpsuit fit perfectly.

Ok I loved this but my only issue is it sorta stretched out a bit after sitting down in it. I found after a couple hours it looked sorta baggy. I am a true 4 and it was a 4. I def couldn't have gone smaller would have been too short. I am 5'4 and the 4R was perfect with 2 inch wedges. Any higher may have been too short. Worth a rental. Tons of compliments.
Such a cute 70s style jumpsuit that is perfect for happy hour or a party. Unfortunately it is a bit short, so tough to wear with heels if you are over 5'7".

Definitely the most popular outfit I’ve worn to work. I got quite a few “Foxxy Cleopatra” references too. (I’ll take it!) it’s very easy to put on, isn’t tight in the torso for my almost. 5”9 frame and doesn’t pull at the neck. The only issue was that there was a noticeable inch of space in the chest area, where it had been stretched out from larger chests. I anticipated this since I am a B cup, so I just tightened the strap as much as I could to at least stop my chest area from showing past the seam. Overall, this jumpsuit was very comfortable and fun to wear! - jasleigh

links_reviews_title: Cute but fit wasn't the best
links_reviews_text: Loved this denim jumpsuit but the long wasn't quite long enough at 5'10. Fortunately, the piece stretches out a bit so we were able to do that with the legs. You can't really wear a bra which isn't the end of the world, but I did have to tie the top a few different times to keep it tight enough and flattering. Wore it once and liked it but probably wouldn't wear again because I wasn't totally comfortable
This jumpsuit puts the bad in badass. The fit was great albeit a size too big, and the texture of the denim was not too overwhelming or uncomfortable. A must have!

I wore this to a 70's themed semi-formal party and it was the PERFECT choice! It ran just a tad large around the waist and seat, but that made it very comfortable. The legs were the perfect length for ~4 inch heels (I'm 5'5"). Would definitely rent again!
At 5'10" this runs short, even in the long. Super cute and great for an hourglass shape - super stylish and sexy!

links_reviews_title: very form fitting but comfortable material
links_reviews_text: my only dislike was having to go to the bathroom. it is relatively easy to zip and unzip, by also requires you to untie the halter.
It fits nicely but if you have small boobs would suggest it
Fabric felt great and got many compliments. Would rent again!
A great jumper and very flattering, but the length is way too short (and I had the 4L)!

Wore this out for date w my hubs. Fit was great - but guessing it runs short since I’m only 5’5” and I got the ‘long’ - and it wasn’t that long. Used fashion tape on sides of top to avoid any embarrassing shifts or gaps. Wore it with a high pony tail, statement earrings and bracelet, and 4” heels. Overall I would rent this again.
This is my absolute favorite outfit. It's flattering, sexy, and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear (needed a Long) but would rent for another occasion
links_reviews_text: I was nervous about renting this one but it fit really well for a jumpsuit let alone a denim one! I am very short waisted, though, and found that even then it wasn't long enough, such that there was (a tasteful amount of) side boob.
great going out outfit

Loved this jumpsuit. Definitely recommend sizing up as with any jumpsuit. Not sure why they always seem to be way to short in the torso if I go with a regular size. (I'm not that tall. 5'7) My only complaint about this jumpsuit is that I would have liked to wear it more than once but it doesn't hold shape very well so by the end of one wear it was starting to get slouchy looking all over which is not my aesthetic at all.
So cute! So sad the jumper came with out the strap for the neck. I am so bummed because it is adorable! Fit perfectly!
Wait for the right size on this one- I think it runs a bit large- the 4 regular was too short and big-

links_reviews_title: Too short for a long torso.
links_reviews_text: This is so cute and I was so disappointed when I couldn't fit the length. The halter was just to low and it was cutting me off too much in the butt if I tried to pull it up. I often have trouble finding rompers that will fit my long torso . I really liked it so I will try to go up one size the next time and hope it will fit better .

links_reviews_title: So so cute! Cant go wrong with this.
links_reviews_text: There is nothing I didnt adore about this.
Looks Fabulous and fits really well
waist was a little big

I really liked this jumpsuit, but when I received it the top half was hangin on my a thread which caused me to safety pin it all together. The flared pant leg was really flattering, overall still really enjoyed!
The length was good with flat shoes. Easy to wear without a bra. Just make sure to have fashion tape for the sides of the top.

links_reviews_title: Best piece I've ever rented. Stylish, comfortable and FUN
links_reviews_text: Loved this piece. Low back, so need an altered bra (or go without for some of that side action look). Unbelievably comfortable and shows off all parts without any of the usual jumpsuit issues (saggy bottom or wedgies anyone??) I felt amazing.

links_reviews_title: I have never felt more confident in a jumpsuit!
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments wearing this jumpsuit! I thought it was the perfect outfit for the Elton John concert I wore it to - and could not have felt more confident wearing it! It fit great on top and stretched throughout my hips/thighs. My only fault with it was that the jean strap to tie it with didn't come in the garment bag. I wore it with a handkerchief I own instead, but would have loved the finished look. I highly recommend!
I love wearing this and get lots of compliments. So comfy and chic
Legs to short. I have a big butt and little waist and it did not fit well on butt
Make sure the halter neck tie is included, mine was not.
flattering and comfortable. 8 was a little large but the style of the jumpsuit makes it forgiving and I was able to double twist the neck tie to make it tighter around the top.

links_reviews_title: It was great, but was coming disconnected at the top. I looped it around the keyhole. Wear flats.
links_reviews_text: Flat length for a 5'6 5'7 girl.

links_reviews_title: Very sexy and cute! Just wasn't my size.
links_reviews_text: Although I didn't wear this as it was just a bit too small but still saw this would look awesome on me. I will definitely try to get the next size up before the season ends! Super cute and sexy. Returned it today and hopefully the 6 will be available soon!

links_reviews_title: cute, I wish it had pockets. legs are rather flared, FYI
links_reviews_text: true to size, needs pockets, neckline can feel a little bulky, after a while

This pantsuit is so sexy...and because it's denim, it's an everyday piece so a great balance. Loved it. the only irritant was the huge fabric bow that ends up at the back of your neck. It's bulky. You get used to it. Very fun piece.

links_reviews_title: Great fit - very form fitting, and flattering.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size and is very figure "hugging". It is thick enough that you don't need spanx. Very flattering neck and you can make it as tight or loose as you want. Low back is sexy. Zipper is a little hard to get up alone. Wish it had pockets. Would rent again.
I'm 5'7 and the long was perfect w wedges! Just wish they had sent me the neck wrap so I could have worn it

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit, but not easy to walk in.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit just right. I usually wear a size 4. It was received with a hole in the seam. The skirt part is a lot of fabric and very long, so it's hard not to step on it. It is definitely a different dress, which is why I like it. It's also warm. I originally ordered this for a more formal event. I dressed it down for my date with a jean jacket. It was cute together!
Had a hard time with the zipper but otherwise super comfortable and very flattering. Material on the skirt is heavy and there's a lot of it but it looks super cool when you're walking. Loved it.

links_reviews_title: Not as wearable as I had hoped
links_reviews_text: I was hoping to wear this to a bday dinner with friends and possibly to work (ha!), but ended up way too risky for either. I think I’d only wear this on vacation. It looks like a wrap dress, but it isn’t—I thought I’d be able to just wrap it more to minimize how low cut it is, but it is not adjustable. One pro of it not being a wrap dress is that you don’t have to worry about the bottom flapping open—it is sewn all along the hem. It is very short—I’m 5’6” and it was hard for me to sit without fear of flashing someone. It comes lined with a silky soft slip, but even the slip is incredibly low cut—so much so that there’s no way I could wear a bra. I am small chested but the structure of the neckline is very flimsy, scoots around, and I know if I wore it out of the house I wouldn’t be able to focus on anything or enjoy myself because I’d be so self conscious about checking my dress. Last thing I had a problem with is the sleeves. My arms are a normal size and the hem from the sleeve to wear the fabric “flutters” is kind of tight. It bugged me just in having it on for a few minutes. Sad to be sending this back because I love the pattern and overall style, but just was a total flop for me. I’d recommend it to someone shorter that me, and would advise using some safety pins to secure the chest area. Bigger busted girls beware and good luck.
This was such an odd fit. Soooo big up top that it gaped open, but too short in the body. Can't imagine a scenario where this would be flattering
A little short, but I'm 5'10, so pretty much everything is. The wrap dress made me able to eat a million croissants, while still looking cute!

links_reviews_title: The fit was perfect, and even though I am short so was the length. Great with flats and heels.
links_reviews_text: I am obsessed with this designer. This is the second piece of hers that I absolutely LOVE!

I wore this dress to a food festival at local winery. It was perfect light and airy dress for summer outdoor celebration. The Under navy slip was a nice touch. Didn't have to worry about covering the sheer fabric. Lots of compliments!

Loved this dress, especially on a hot day. The dress was light, flattering and the style was very complimentary. I only have to pin up the chest area to not show too much in a work setting. Overall would rent again.

This dress was solid. Nothing extremely unique, but was flattering and features nice bright colors. There is a slip that goes underneath and the fabric layer is a tiny bit sheer that goes on top. Nice light material that's good for hot weather. I would not get this for a special event but it's great for work or a nice spring day.

Loved this light and airy dress for summer. So comfy and runs true to size. The arms run a little tight. If you have large arms you may want to try a size up for comfort. Work this to work with heels and dresses it down after work with sandals. Great dress for work or play.

This one of my all time favorite rentals, so comfortable, flattering and fun to wear. I felt that it was true to size, the tie in the back makes it nicely adjustable. I did have to pin the front as it was too open in the front. This is one I would buy! LOVE!

Cute! It's short if u have boobs but such a hot flirty dress!! Loved it highly recommend for dates or hanging with friends! I rented it for a senior week graduation ceremony and loved it. Tanya Taylor stuff is normally on the bigger looser side but I found this to be a lil tighter or like "true to size" than usual
Beautiful. Has a slip that's attached to and can't move the neckline for less/more cleavage.
There is a slip to this dress and it fits great! The top part is a bit low cut so need a safety pin or under tank but otherwise loved it!

This dress was beautiful! The material is light and flowy, and the dress is TTS. The only downside was that when I got the dress, it appears the fabric has been discolored in the armpits from people's deodorant. It is almost a whiteish color. Yuck! I wore the dress and no one noticed the discoloration, but I still don't think that RTR should have this dress in circulation if it is discolored!!!
I liked this dress more online than I did in person. It photographs nicely and is very comfortable. I wore it to my friends rehearsal dinner. Can be dressed up or down!

links_reviews_title: Everyone compliments every dress from RTR.
links_reviews_text: I am a true size 18. This dress fit perfectly. I am 5"9 and it was the perfect fit.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Love the colors and fabric!
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments while wearing this dress! The fabric is beautiful and the bottom is connected so you don't have to worry about the wrap style opening up on you. The inner slip didn't fit me the best and the top was a little difficult to keep together. Nothing some fashion tape couldn't fix.

links_reviews_title: A beautiful sunny afternoon bridal shower.
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress! Wore it to a bridal shower and felt comfortable and festive.
Comfortable, flattering and super cute.
This was too tight for me in my regular size and was not good for a large chest
Really small and short.
Fits true to size but is pretty low cut and slightly short (but I'm tall). Loved this for a fun day out with friends.
Love the fabric and print, but I would need to go up two sizes to fit my boobs. Fit well everywhere else.

links_reviews_title: Second time renting! Love this dress!!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print

Very pretty and feminine dress but just didn't fit me. Not the fault of the dress. I'm a 10 on the bottom, but full busted, so the size 14 was tight across the bust, and the bottom portion was too large.
Open up top, but feminine and flirty! Love this dress!

links_reviews_title: Was cute, different than anything else at the wedding, comfortable for dinner and then dancing.
links_reviews_text: I liked that it had lightweight sleeves-nice for a spring wedding. Great color story.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this dress. Too small!
links_reviews_text: The dress is very cute up close, it's just much thinner than worked for me. The top portion is sheer though the bottom is lined. It also seemed a bit small and I went with a different option.
Dress ran big and the material was just ok. Thought it would have better structure to it, but the ties were really just for show.
Nice fabric but tight in the busy area

links_reviews_title: This dress is adorable and the perfect amount of sexy.
links_reviews_text: I put a clip on the back of the slip so it would fit right.
The Fit was true to size. It was a 16, not a 16W. The dress was cute and flirty and I received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a funeral. It was very comfortable, the print was not loud. It worked out well
links_reviews_text: The dress itself fit well. I have to order up because of the bust size (38DDD/E). The only issue I had was slip dress attached on the inside. The straps are so incredibly long. I actually had to pin the slip dress to my bra cups to ensure it stayed in place and that I was guaranteed coverage. Simple fix and you couldnt rell! Loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: I liked this dress a lot, however, was big in the chest
links_reviews_text: I liked the look of the dress, but was a bit larger in the chest
not for larger chested women

links_reviews_title: This dress was too low cut. It has a camisole slip underneath, but that too was too low cut.
links_reviews_text: I never got to wear the dress because it was too low cut. It's very cute in person.
Not good for a tall person or a larger bust. Very short and low cut in these circumstances. Pretty fabric though

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear this cute but youngish looking dress.
links_reviews_text: Super cute, loved the sleeve details and print. But, couldn't wear this. Somehow, no matter how I accessorized, it was too young for me. Note the sash becomes a bow somewhere. Try it- just not for me.
The lining of the dress is intended to act as a camisole, but it cane close to my naval. I put a navy V-neck cami with the dress and it looked really cute.
Couldn't barely get it on. Not as forgiving as it looks in the picture.
Fits great but looks very much like a robe. I tried dressing it up with heels and couldn't make it work. Really wanted to love it!

links_reviews_title: Prairie chic and sexy all at once!
links_reviews_text: I loved this skirt!! I'm tall, and the ruched side of the skirt was definitely a bit shorter than I anticipated, which I actually kind of loved. I felt the sexiness created a real cool contrasts with the skirt's little girl/prairie vibes. I found it ran a bit large, especially if you want to wear it high up on your waist. Nothing too crazy, though, so your normal size will probably be fine, just no need to size up.

links_reviews_title: I am obsessed. Want to purchase.
links_reviews_text: This is my favorite thing I have ever rented. I am obsessed with it. I got so many compliments and it was so comfy and cute. Wore it twice on vacation.
The skirt fit snug on the waist but was more loose than I would like at the hips and in the tummy section. Overall I lied it. I wore it wine tasting. It is cute and flirty. I would recommend it.
So… I may or may not have worn this skirt wrong… But I actually think it's cuter with the tie in the front! Loved this skirt.

links_reviews_title: loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: this skirt is so flattering and feminine, I wanted to wear it everywhere. Looks great with a basic white tee and sandals or dressed up with some wedges. I can't wait to wear this all summer and beyond. As a tall girl at 5'10" I love the length and how it is adjustable- I was able to wear it at the longest length to work and shorten it a bit before dinner and drinks with some friends. Can't recommend this enough!

links_reviews_title: Love! But order size down if wearing high on waist
links_reviews_text: Love this skirt- lightweight, feminine, perfect for a hot summer day. I normally wear a size 10 in pants so that's what I ordered for this skirt, but since it looks better worn sitting at the waist, I would recommend ordering a size down.

Fit well, I sized down due to other reviews and I'm glad I did. Slit was a bit high but I untied/loosened the scrunch a bit so it was fine. Looked great with a white tank top tucked in and some grey suede sandals/heels. Wine tasting fun
The first RTR piece that I thought about purchasing. Such a standout piece that's easy to dress up or down. Fits true to size, definitely wouldn't go up!

links_reviews_title: Runs big, worked as a swimsuit cover up.
links_reviews_text: Cute!!!!! Originally I thought my mom could easily take in. But she said it was going to be more complicated than it looks. Still a cute swimsuit coverup. I bought it.
I got a lot of compliments and my husband loved this skirt, it was very fun to wear and i felt very sexy, although it was a little big on my i made it work

Took this on my girls trip to Key West and I loved it. Perfect mix of flirty, fun, and laid back beach boho. The waist has no give but I did find this dress to fit true to size. I cinched with a wide belt to cover the waistband which was plain. The eyelet print on the skirt is feminine and pretty.
This skirt is gorgeous! I'm usually a 4 but the 2 worked perfectly. Definitely size down
Wore this out for my bday. Loved it! Feminine and sexy. Runs slightly big though but I was comfortable in it all night.

I love this girly, boho style skirt by by LoveShackFancy! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend ordering your regular size and sizing up if you have full hips. At 5'3 the short side hit at mid-thigh and the long side hit beneath the knee on me. I love how flirty and fun this eyelet style skirt is. Pair it with strappy heels and a simply white top and your ready to go for a perfect summertime look.

links_reviews_title: wore it to different events - a hit
links_reviews_text: a little tight on the waist but overall so pretty
loved i bought it

I received a lot of compliments on this dress, and would have purchased but the one I rented was a little too worn to justify the cost. Paired with a white tank and wedges - super comfortable and cute for summer evenings out.
Fun and flirty.
Drapes beautifully and the perfect slit height
Wish I could've worn this skirt, but it was too large to wear high-waisted and looked odd sitting at the waist on me. Size down!
baggy fit

Very cute skirt, comfortable. It flairs out a bit at the hips and nips in at the waist. It's fairly short where the asymmetric hem is shortest, but still not too revealing, only about mini skirt length, and it's adjustable. Super cute tucked into a black tank top.
I wore this for Easter and felt so fun. Color is great and you can adjust the length so it worked well being 5'2"
4-6 normal size. Ordered 4 b/c reviews said big but still WAY too big.

This skirt is adorable. I am usually a 4-6 and ended up getting the 2 which was a perfect fit to sit high waisted. I turned this a little bit so the ruffle cut on the side sat more on my thigh than on my side, loved it!
It was slightly big on me but I still loved it. The cut was very flattering. It is a little hard to pair if you don't have the right top.

links_reviews_title: Runs large; returned for next size down
links_reviews_text: The 8 ran large; I didn't wear it as it looked like a sack on me when normally I am a solid 8. I am returning and getting the 6 to wear because I just think this is so cute.

This skirt is in idea and generally, however, the muted color coupled with it running very big just made it feel frumpy. I rented this to try out for every day wear and just never felt like wearing it compared to my other clothes so it was returned. I should mention that I did really like the side ties. You can make the skirt shorter or more modest on the side which is a good touch.
Fit is a bit large but still ok. I like how versatile this is. I may have it for awhile...
Beautiful skirt. Hard to wear because it runs large and hangs kinda funny.

I LOVED THIS! It's definitely a little different from the picture - I am a 4 and I rented the 4, and it was longer on me than the model. The lowest side hit near my ankle so it was a much longer/bigger piece than I expected, but it was super comfy. I may have sized down but the 4 definitely worked. I love love love how this skirt moves when you walk, it's very feminine and made me feel great in it.
SUCH a cute skirt!!!! One of my all time favorite orders!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful skirt but was way too big
links_reviews_text: I only gave it stars because it's so pretty :( wish i could've worn it for a mini vacation I'll be going on. I'm really petite, 5 ft 110 lbs and the skirt was too big for my waist n hit my hips a little too loose. :( would look great on someone who's thicker and taller!

links_reviews_title: Size was way too big on me, but it's my fault for ordering it anyways. Skirt is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!

So, so sweet and chic! Pair it with boots and a biker jacket to launch it a whole new way. I wore it with lightweight, sheer, billowy camisole top in cream to keep it sweet. Great fit, true to size, but not a whole lot of stretch or give, so if you're well endowed in the derriere or hips, consider sizing up one. My size 8 fit my narrow hips and average rump just right with a little room to spare.
I love this skirt. In fact, I am keeping it.

links_reviews_title: Cute shape. Gathered side a little shorter than expected .
links_reviews_text: Very unique. Pretty and flows nicely. I wanted to wear it to work but the gathered side was a bit high so I just wore it out. Again lots of compliments as it's a unique skirt. Wrinkled a bit easily. Pretty color.

Absolutely loved this romper! Very unique with the double ties in the front and the cute sleeves. Fit almost perfectly-- the top tie is on the smaller side in terms of coverage, but still felt okay to wear without a bra. Loved this so much, I ended up purchasing!
Loved the way this outfit made me feel. Lots of compliments.
I'm a 36d and this worked great on my boobs! As u can see in the pic there were a few underboob moments but overall it was fine! Such a great romper

links_reviews_title: Would rent again and again!!! Colors are better in person!
links_reviews_text: This romper fit me best in the small size, but be weary the bust area is very small and the fabric isn't stretchy. I have a 32 A/B and it covered me up completely, but I can see it being an issue for some. My item did come with the elastic popped on one sleeve, but I was able to salvage it to wear for one day. I've never had that issue with RTR before and I'm sure if I had tried it on earlier I could have gotten a replacement. I received so many compliments and it was my favorite bday outfit so far.

Perfect little romper for vineyard tours in Barolo! The top of the sleeves are a little big and fell down often but the rest of the outfit was perfect. A little stretchy, which was great for all-day wear. The ties are adjustable so that helped customize the fit as well. Definitely recommend

links_reviews_title: Had to doctor up the ties to cover my boobs, but it worked out
links_reviews_text: Better for small chest.
The top is interesting, as it runs fairly small so those with a bigger chest will fall out of the bottom. I opted to tie both together as one piece so there was more coverage

links_reviews_title: I got to try a style I never would have before dared to before. Renting takes pressure off!
links_reviews_text: It is very revealing if you have a large chest which made it was perfect for Miami vacation! ;) I could never wear it in everyday use given my busy size but really fit my body nicely as the ties are so adjustable. I tied the middle one behind my back for a different look.
It looks odd on the hanger but don't judge! It's very flattering and super fun!
The tie details on this are so cute! This was easy and comfy.

links_reviews_title: It looked great at our friends beach wedding reception! so many compliments and my man loved it ;)
links_reviews_text: Honestly if fit really well, I have a SUPER small bust so I liked that I could adjust the top to fit. I wish there was elastic all the way around the shoulder so you could have the option to wear it off shoulder, but I cant say enough good things about this!

links_reviews_title: Be prepared to show some underboob!
links_reviews_text: Rented this romper for a Saturday with friends checking out the Ukranian festival in nyc. The ties are functional which makes it customizable! Awkward to get on and off though. No pockets :( but perfect for the afternoon!
sleeves fit well, tie section revealed too much and looked awkward

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Be weary of quality
links_reviews_text: I loved this romper-- so perfect for my summer vacations to Italy and Cartagena this summer. However, i didn't try it on until i was actually out of the country, and only them realized that the sleeve elastic and neckline elastic on the right side was stretched out... so much so, that one sleeve was tight against my body and the other sleeve was loose like I had a wing! I used a safety pin to secure the arm hole better, so it still looked great in vaca photos.
Love love love this romper! Comfortable, cute & unique with the cut out in front. Fit perfectly, no complaints! Will be renting again

I rented this because some of the other reviews looked awesome. It did not do that on me. The sleeves were too big, chest was too small, waist was too big, but fit in the hips was okay? The waist was so big I had a kangaroo pouch that was not going to work. Kudos to those who made it work but it was not for me.
Cute, but it was a little bit and longer than I expected. If you're between sizes, I'd size down

I was so excited to try on this romper, but when I put it on, I was convinced I had put in on the wrong way! The stomach/waist area was HUGE and gaped off my body, but the front ties were not large enough to fill cover my breasts or to help tighten the the loose waist. Maybe if you had this tailored to your own shape it would work, but otherwise,'I'd recommend skipping this one.
Just a weird fit. Tiny in the boobs and huge in the waist. I'm short though. Could look good on someone with a long torso and small up top. I loved the pattern.
This is not for anyone with a large bust. Couldn't wear.

I gave this 3 starts because it is a really cute romper and very nice quality. Wanted it to work so badly!! I am a 34 DD and was oozing out of the top. I thought the tie across would be wide but it is not at all. The waste was also loose on me. I probably could have got a medium but that still would not help the bust area.

links_reviews_title: Really fun romper, but runs large.
links_reviews_text: This romper is so cute! Unfortunately, it didn't work for me - I have an hour glass figure with a very small waist, and the lower half of the romper was big enough that it drooped to show my belly-button.
Love the fit of this but if you have a slightly large chest it is very revealing.

links_reviews_title: THE OBSESSION IS REAL. May end up buying!
links_reviews_text: In my opinion, the model doesn't do this romp justice. It is AMAZING!

My favorite thing right now is wearing sequins with jeans and athletic shoes. I had so much fun at a Super Bowl party wearing this outfit. The shirt runs true to size so the L was a little big. The M would have been better. The lining was extremely soft and the shirt was well made. I looked great dancing with Shakira.

links_reviews_title: Fun top! Dress up or down!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable!!! I wore a tight tank underneath (I do most sweaters in winter anyway). Rec'd tons of compliments! Perfect for your unlimited monthly rental!
This is such a great top! So comfortable and easy to wear. Great fit. Sleeves were a little bit large. The silk lining is so soft! I highly recommend this top

This top was the hit of my holiday party! I felt great in it and received compliment after compliment. While it's obviously black and sequined, fit was light and airy and felt heavy and expensive. I'll definitely rent again!

This top is the perfect party top!! I wore it to a holiday party and got all kinds of compliments. I would have saved it for NYE but we are staying it that night cause of kids:( It runs big so I sized down to a medium and it fit great. The fabric underneath is super silky so nothing itchy about this sequin top at all. It's called the Tennessee Top which is perfect cause that's where I live! Maybe my favorite piece I have worn from RTR so far!!!

Caught my eye in-store originally. Good quality. Classy. When I ordered for a party they only had Small available...it was a little too constricting around neck/short so decided to return...my regular size Medium would have been perfect.
Beautiful and comfy. Easy glam, lined. This is a winner. Night out to a play. Want to buy.
It fit perfectly! I wore it with faux leather leggings/jeggings to my husband's work dinner with fancy heels and it was perfect. It wasn't cocktail, but a little more casual, but festive.
Nice lining made it not itchy at all. Quality of sequins was great! Sleeve made it super fun
loved the sleeves. It was festive but not over the top and cheesy!! Loved the high neckline. Wore it tucked in to black jeans with heels! would def rent again
The RTR picture does not justify this blouse. Festive and sparkly! Great with leather leggings. The sleeves are the highlight!
I received compliments after compliment all evening. You will need to be okay with not being able to lift up your arms...no slow dancing :) but you will feel great otherwise

I tried both size 0 and 2. My hips/butt are my biggest features, but surprisingly the size 0 still fit all over. It was actually tightest in the chest area. The size 2 was too loose in the chest area. I did not wear a bra. The sequins seemed to provide enough coverage. I am 5'5" and wore my comfy 2" heels. The dress might look better on someone a little taller than me due to the hemline.

This dress fit like a glove!! It was an absolute hit at my 20s themed NYE party! I was worried as Nicole Miller dresses sometimes run small, but the dress was snug on my shoulders and roomy in the arms, waist and hips. The 6 fit everywhere except for my chest (34D), but a woman with a smaller bra size could probably size down.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a movie star! Loads of compliments...Fits well!
links_reviews_text: Tight fit...not very forgiving but beuatiful dress. I had to work on my belly bloat for a few days before wearing it. Hard to lift arms up.

Definitely a stand out dress! I felt like the dress was true to size and didn't have any issues with the arms being too tight. I could move my arms around. The dress was slim fitting but not too tight.

Rented this for a 1920s themed party. I'm 5'9" and it fell slightly below the knee. As a pear-shaped individual, it was a little iffy trying to get it over my hips, but once I did it flowed down nicely. Material is HEAVY, which is great for a chilly weather event like mine, but might be too much in warmer months. Very elegant and classic. Looks stupendously flattering on curves. Received compliments all night long.
The dress was a bit tight, but all in all it was absolutely perfect!! I got so many compliments throughout the evening. Loves it!!

links_reviews_title: I wanted the dress to be tight so the size 8 was a little big but I loved the dress!
links_reviews_text: It looks best with black shoes in my opinion 😉

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous Brocaded Gold Material, Very Elegant, Great Neckline!
links_reviews_text: This neckline is so flattering and the gold brocaded material is so elegant! Really loved this dress, got so many compliments on it! Love RTR!!!
Fits well true to size, little difficult to zip in back , inside straps would come up from time to time that was my only complaint.

A few notes: 1. I am not tall, and so the lower half cut off at an awkward point for my legs. 2. Unlike other reviews, I had no problem lifting my arms to dance (and I have larger arms than usual for my size), and the fabric had enough of a give to feel like I wasn't going to damage it by having a good night. 3. The sequins made it heavy and feel dolce-quality. 4. The only thing I would say is that if you're self conscious of your stomach, you want to spandex it up! Overall, I would recommend it to anyone!

Fit a little large in sleeves but overall ok. I didn't love the length (too long) but all in all a great rental. Loads of compliments and photographed well. My first RTR experience was definitely a success!

I'm unsure of my measurements as I'm in transition and 6 months postpartum, but at the time of rental: 5'7", about 180ish, and a 36DD. I gambled in the 12 and it fit well without a bra. I did need help getting it zipped up and down. Many compliments on the style and it was comfortable enough for a form fitting dress. Once you get the arms adjusted where they sit comfortably, it was a great dress.
I'm 5'7 174 pounds wore size 10... loved this dress!
This dress garnered so many wonderful compliments. I'm on the border of size 8 or 10 usually and went with the 10 on this one. The sleeves were a little baggy but the rest fit like a glove!

I wore this dress for a NYE wedding and loved that it was sparkly without feeling that I was standing out too much. The material was heavier and the forgiving cut of the dress would make it flattering on almost any body type. The only reason I am giving this dress 4, and not 5, stars is that the neckline and sleeve placement make it difficult to lift arms above your head (for dancing) and it was difficult to fully zip on my own.
Fit like a glove! Only take-back was the arms are a bit tight. Otherwise it was a hit!

Wore this to an outdoor winter wedding. The sleeves were comfortable and I was still able to lift my arms to hold my baby and eat. The material is thick and forgiving. I wore the 8 to fit comfortably, I probably could have worn the 6 but didn't want it to be soo snug on me. The boning was sticking out on the chest so poked me a few times but not terrible. I got a handful of compliments from women of all ages ! I would definitely rent again!
When my husband said he wanted me to keep the dress, I knew it was a success! Fit my curvy body style perfectly. I did flip the sleeves under to make it more of a mid length sleeve.
Another outstanding RTR dress! Amazing color. Easy to wear. Just beautiful.
This dress was pretty. I wore it 5 months pregnant. Arms so tight pretty impossible to eat or move in- but worth it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, unique dress. Received many compliments!!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size, although back/hips loose maybe due to wear? Minimal accessories needed- great pair of heels and earrings, and a clutch did it. I received many compliments on fit, sparkle, and length.

links_reviews_title: Everyone at the party knew I was the "Woman in Gold" from the painting
links_reviews_text: Great dress for the costume I did, but it was a bit long on me, and not the most comfortable. I wouldn't rent it for a regular cocktail event. The neckline and shoulders are not comfortable, and the waist was a bit big.

links_reviews_title: When a stranger came up and complemented me
links_reviews_text: True to fit. I wear a 10 normally, I rented 10 and 12 and 12 felt like I could move and eat comfortably. I'm a 36DD, I almost felt like I didn't need a strapless bra because it was so right at the chest. Heavy material, definitely a winter dress. Sleeves were a bit loose on lower arms, not a big deal.

I LOVE this elegant dress by Nicole Miller! Running true to size , I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted all around and gives you a nice classy look for any formal occasion. It works best for all cup sizes and can be worn with a strapless bra . At 5’2”, the length stops me at tea length and with a black color pair of heels will complete your outfit! Adding a nice handbag and light jewelry accessory will give it its fashionable touch.

Beautiful dress. I liked the gold sequence pattern, and length. The sleeves were a little restricting as commented by others, and took a while to get used to. I rented this dress for the opera, and thought it fit the bill to a T but probably wouldn't rent again.
I adore this dress! So many compliments, elegant and classy with a little edge... just dont plan on reaching over your head as the sleeves are tight.

It was a little long on me, but I'm 4'11" and didn't mind the extra length since I was attending a winter wedding in northwest Pennsylvania. Fit perfectly otherwise -- got a ton of compliments on the fit. Favorite design element is the neckline, hands-down. Was a bit nervous it'd be too Liberace for my event, but it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: LOVE, but beauty is pain with this dress
links_reviews_text: I loved loved loved the way this dress looked! Dramatic, a little sexy, and classy. I wore this to a Chinese New Year symphony and gala/charity dinner with one of my clients and it was perfect for the occassion. However, and this is a big however, this dress was a PAIN! You can barely move your arms (my coworker had to put food on my plate!) and you need someone to unzip you. It looked so good though so I just had to wear it.

This dress was gorgeous and unlike anything else in the room. It fits like a glove, so expect it to hug every curve. However, it was easy to move and dance in - although a bit difficult to lift your arms overhead. Im a pear so the top could have been smaller, but it was hard to tell with this off the shoulder style.

I rented this for NYE, but it didnt really wow. Luckily, it was 10 degrees outside, so at least i was warm. The dress is not very fitted through the waist, so it didnt give a slimming effect. A bit boxier fit compared to normal nicole miller dresses. Cute, but wouldnt rent again.
Runs small. Size up one size up. Nice shape; does limit arm movement a little!

This dress is a showstopper! I ordered the size 6 and size 8 for my backup. I ended up going with the size 8 because the 6 was snug especially around the arms. Everything about this dress said classy and elegant. The dress was very comfortable to wear and I received compliments all night!
Beautiful very complimentary dress. Longer than i expected (and im very tall). Off the shoulder look was divine. Felt like a goddess. Right amount of sexy and classy!

I had to wear the size four due to the arms being very tight on the two. I got compliments left and right all night. The fit was amazing and the sequence did not bother me. Would definitely order again!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a black tie New Years party and it was the perfect combo of class and sequins.
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’4 and the dress hit below the knees/upper calves. I said the sizing runs a little small because there is no give in the material. If you want a tight fit then I recommend going with your true size but it’s you want a little room to move, I say size up. The sequins didn’t bother or rub my arms, the only issue I had was that I didn’t have full range of motion in the arms and shoulders because of the style of the dress. Overall I was happy with the dress and would rent again.
This dress was absolutely fabulous for a Christmas time wedding. Super flattering and showstopping. The arms were a bit tight but I am more on the athletic side so that was expected.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, best I've ever rented
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove, which is often tricky when you're a girl with curves. I received so many compliments all night, most said I looked stunning.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for hospital staff holiday party, tons of complements
links_reviews_text: I rented size 6 with 4 as backup, rent the runway for me has always fit me perfectly but 6 seemed to be baggy across my belly (and I do have a belly) it fit otherwise - so I wore the 4 which fit my belly perfectly but was a tiny tight in the arms. It was fine. Warning - this is definitely long - at least mid calf and I am 5'5". Those models must be really tall.

This might be my favorite RTR dress yet. I wore it to the opera and it was bold and sparkly, yet somehow comfortable, even after sitting in sparkles for a long period of time. I'm usually a size 6 or 8, but the 6 was roomy. It might not be the best dress if you want to go dancing since the off-the-shoulder look limits the arm range of movement, but it's attention grabbing. I got compliments all night and wish I could keep it!

links_reviews_title: Worn for a family wedding at 29 weeks pregnant. The color is beautiful.
links_reviews_text: Take this review with a grain of salt as I wore this at 29 weeks pregnant so I'm not entirely sure how to describe my body. I am 5'7" and usually wear a size 8 pre-pregnant. Based on sizing info from other pregnant reviewers I ordered that size and one size up in a different color as a backup. The fit is very forgiving except around the chest band. I had a bit of a panic getting the zipper up, but once it got past the band and fastened I was not too worried about busting out. I wear a 36 B-C and did not feel the need for a bra. I love that it had adjustable straps. I wish I could have worn the size up in the pink color I ordered, but for some reason that size 10 dress fit smaller (I could not get the zipper up at all) than the blue size 8. The color was beautiful (it's not really navy as it appears online but more of a gem blue), the dress had a nice flow, and was fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: Really pretty dress that was just what I was looking for.
links_reviews_text: Really pretty and loved the flow of the skirt. The top was a little bit tight but otherwise got great. Would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue for a rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: I rented this for my best friend's rehearsal dinner. It was so comfortable for dancing and I got so many compliments! Would def recommend!

I really like this dress. I was attending a friend's wedding and I was about 17 weeks pregnant. This ended up being a great option for maternity because of how flowy it was in the belly area. This is actually my backup dress but I'm so happy that I had it. I will say that I am currently wearing a 32c bra and the dress was a little snug under the breast. But it wasn't snug enough that if I sized up to a four that it would have worked, the four would have been too big overall, I was really happy with the dress and if you are trying to hide your belly this is a good fat but if you're trying to show it off I think it can work too. I was overall comfortable. I am 5ft 6 and pre pregnancy about 120lbs

Had to go to a New Year's Eve black tie optional wedding ... this dress was perfect (size 6, 150 lbs, 5'8) It was very simple and elegant. One bad thing I could say about the dress would be it made me look a little wider than I wanted. Otherwise - first time using rent the runway and it was SO EASY.
This dress was great for my 26 week belly. It was flowey and comfy. Felt fancy even when I didn't really feel fancy. Not sure what my weight was during. Probably around 155lb.

This dress is beautiful, I am 8 months pregnant and the dress would not zip. I could not get a replacement in a bigger size so I added a jacket. I zipped the dress as far as it would go and added the jacket! I got a tone of complements!! I should have gone with a size 10. I have a 38 in bust right now being pregnant.

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and the best dancing dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit in all the right places and the skirt allows for a lot of twirling on the dance floor. Simple yet elegant, this dress is one of my favorite rentals so far

links_reviews_title: Ladylike 70's vibe with unstoppable dance floor flair
links_reviews_text: The 4 fit me TTS (5'4, 130 lbs, hourglass) and I wore heels, although when I kicked them off the dress was still tea length on me. Incredible skirt for dancing. The fabric is heavier, so perfect for fall weddings. I wore a strapless bra but regular underwear otherwise. Simple gold accessories and nude heels finished the look. Elegant and wonderful to dance in!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and hugs all the right places!
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely hugs everywhere you want it to but I would say it runs on the smaller size so get your regular size and one size up! Gorgeous color!
Wore this dress to a November wedding in Arizona and it was great. SO MUCH FUN as you twirl on the dance floor. Tons of room to breath, but never felt baggy. Pair it with a fun pop of color!

Wore this to a black tie wedding. I'm shorter so I was concerned about finding a dress that was long and formal but not too long. This was about ankle length. Great because I didn't have to wear spanx but this dress was a lot of heavy fabric.

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress to dance all night in!
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit. Super high quality. Crazy comfortable. Got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: It was actually the time of my life, and the dress has tons of spin capabilities
links_reviews_text: It hit perfectly at my ankles, i am 5'3 and fit me perfect in all the right places. The straps were adjustable, and fit by boobs really well. I am a 34 triples D so it was easy to hide them but still have such a fun look!

links_reviews_title: The dress was so pretty but the color was a little more teal, not navy.
links_reviews_text: The dress waist was way too big and did not fit. I don't think I am a 0 in regular size, but I should've ordered the 0 instead of the 2. I am definitely not the smallest girl height or weight wise, so this surprised me. But, I still wore it since it's not very noticeable.

links_reviews_title: Flirty, comfortable, great to dance in!
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect, wore a strapless bra although didn't need to even wear a bra. The material is heavier than expected so I was a little hot for the outdoor wedding. It was a great dress and great color. So comfortable one of my favorites I've worn. Lots of compliments!

Wore this for a rehearsal dinner. Beautiful and rich color, great pleating, longer length just above the ankles. Worn without a bra as it was not necessary given the way the top is designed. Pre pregnancy size around 2-4; 6 fit perfect with 7.5 month bump. Would happily rent again!
Amazing dress! I usually wear a 4 and ended up wearing the 2R but probably would've been fine in either. Such a pretty and comfy dress, great for the dancing!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress! It was really elegant but still fun!
links_reviews_text: The tightest part of the this dress was the bust around the rib cage. I am a 36C and it was very tight. Luckily it being tight up there didn't make it entirely uncomfortable and I could still sit and move in it. The zipper was also very difficult. Overall, I would probably rent this again or buy but in 1 larger size.
Dress was a bit heavy for FL weather but it fit perfectly on my 5' frame and I would consider renting it again. Straps are adjustable. No bra needed. Flowy bottom. What else could you need?

I am OBSESSED with this dress. I wore this for my engagement photos. I am 5'5", 145lbs, 34DD bust, and this fit me like a dream. It hit right above my ankles, showing off my shoes. The material is so luxe and I felt so beautiful in it. I've gotten so many compliments! This was a backup option and I'm so glad I chose the right size!
I rented this for a black tie optional wedding. It was super comfortable and flowy. I received many compliments on it!

This dress fits perfectly, I didnt have to wear a bra, and I got a ton of compliments. Would love to buy this dress! I loved where it hit at my ankle too. It was the prefect combination for a black tie optional wedding.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on the dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved it! Fit just right and was perfect for the occasion. Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable, cute, & fun to dance in!!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress!! I use RTR for every wedding I go to & I always love the dresses, but this one stood out because it was so comfortable & fun to dance in!! I wore this to a Spring wedding in Birmingham, AL. I brightened it up with yellow earrings & bright lipstick to make it feel more springy & I loved how it looked! The top was tight enough that I didn't have to wear a bra. I loved the tea length, the fact that it was flowy & I didn't have to worry about spanx, & the pleats were super fun to dance & twirl in. 100% would recommend this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Wanted to keep this dress FOR-EV-ER
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress - great quality, color, and I felt great wearing it! True to size and I wish I could wear this to every future formal event.

Lots of material to the dress! But it made it fun to wear. I wore the 8 a little snug around the chest area but nothing I couldn't handle for the night. Danced the night away in it wearing my matching rental earrings and bag and a pair of nude heels. It's a brighter blue than the picture, I thought it would be navy. Best emergency backup dress!

I received so many compliments! I tried the 6 on but the bust was waaaay too tight. It fit everywhere else because it was so flowy. RTR didn't have an 8R so I opted for the 10R. I didn't wear a bra, but would have had enough space for one. I was on a time crunch and it was the best fitting option. The dress was perfect for dancing.

links_reviews_title: Ordered as a backup dress for a FL winter beach wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress fit totally fine, hit around the ankles without heels. It didn't seem to flatter my figure too much so I went with another dress. Also, the fabric is rather heavy!

I was comfortable all night and it's an elegant feel to it. I had so many compliments and it could go with many shoes/jewelry. I personally wore maroon shoes with the dress. I feel like the fit was true to size as well.
Lovely dress, true to size. I am a 34ddd and I get very contained in this dress. Usual dress size six with athletic legs, big butt

links_reviews_title: It was a gorgeous wedding with my best friends from college. Go Terps!
links_reviews_text: The dress is great--actually the second time I've worn it for a wedding, just a different color. Last time I wore the 2, this time I wore the 4 so I could eat more comfortably haha. I LOVE this dress. Very flowy, classy, and I got lots of compliment on it.
Super comfortable and true to size

This dress was a DREAM for a short lady with big ol boobays. I went bra-less in public for the first time in years, and I looked great doing it. I ordered it on a whim as a backup dress and ended up loving it way more than the dress I had originally chosen. 10/10 would recommend.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, flattering fit, so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Although the 10R was a bit tight in the rib age, the fit was more flattering than the 12R. The color is gorgeous and stood out at a fall wedding. Easy to stand and sit during a long catholic service, and even better to dance the night away in. Fit ran true to size, would definitely order again!
I liked this dress a lot, the dress has a fun skirt with the pleats but it is very heavy/ a lot of extra fabric.

links_reviews_title: I LOVED this dress. If I could buy it I would. I wish I took more pictures.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so flattering. Pros it definitely conceals my mom belly and I didn't really need a bra since it's tight up top. Cons are that it's tight up top and at the ribs so I couldn't breathe all that well with a bra on and ended up taking it off. Much better without. I got so many compliments on the color and style. Wish I could buy it tbh.

links_reviews_title: This dress is elegant and fun!
links_reviews_text: Wore this to an afternoon wedding at a cathedral. The bottom pleats and "flowiness" of the dress make it elegant, comfortable and allow you to dress it up or down (I accessorized with very simple gold accents). It fits true to size, a little snug in the chest area depending on how top heavy you are, and the bottom did a great job hiding my "mom pouch". I find with EVERY RTR dress I've had...the zipper is very stiff and requires two people and a few seconds of holding your breath, I think because they are plastic and maybe the dry cleaning stiffens them. Would definitely recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: A classic wedding with a twist at a historical Tennessee train station
links_reviews_text: This dress was great for my 26-week maternity bump. I wore between a 10-12 pre-pregnancy, a 12/L in maternity clothes, and ended up going with the 14R for this dress. The main fit factor for me was the bust--I was a a 36D pre-pregnancy and the girls have grown a bit, so the 14R in this dress worked with a strapless bra underneath. Because it's an empire waist, if you're comfortable with it you could probably get away with no bra. The best part about this dress for maternity is that the skirt is all expanding pleats, so it should fit over just about any sized bump. I'm on the short side, just barely 5'3", so this fit me like a full-length gown rather than ankle-length, as shown on the model. That wasn't a problem for my event. My one complaint is that it's unlined in the skirt, so I was self-conscious about my giant maternity undies showing panty lines through the skirt. Overall, it was beautiful and comfortable.

I wanted a dress that would be forgiving to my post-baby bod- this was the perfect mix of modesty and fun. I was very comfortable with the fit, though as others mentioned the fabric is heavy. I wore it to a wedding in New Orleans in humid 90 degree weather, so that wasn't ideal. It was almost ankle length at 5'9", but I found the length flattering and the swing of the fabric was fun. The fit was true to size, I did not feel at all squeezed in the 10 and was able to wear a strapless bra.
The easiest and the most fun dress! Perfect for summer! And it has pockets!!

links_reviews_title: I loved the color of this dress. It was cool and comfortable on a hot night.
links_reviews_text: Runs large. It is a great color for summer and super comfortable.

I have rented this dress twice and I absolutely love it! It's perfect for vacation. I love the color and the fit is very comfortable. It runs a little bug. I'm usually an 8 in most brands but the 6 fit me perfectly.
33 weeks pregnant and felt like it in this dress. While comfortable, it felt very large--almost made me feel bigger than I am! Size down, ladies.

I wore at 28 weeks pregnant to an Indian wedding event. The dress is amazingly comfortable and flattering. It's snug in the chest and flows out at the rib cage. The length is also perfect for moms chasing after little ones - can easily bend over without any concern of shortness! I paired with large pink crystal earrings and couldn't have been happier with it.

links_reviews_title: Amazing color and fabric. Fun dress to wear.
links_reviews_text: Loved the flowy cut, great swing dress. The fabric is incredible, cut out flowers. The pink color is very fun. Easy and comfortable to wear.

This dress fit my 31 week bump perfectly in a size 6 (I am now about 5'5" 170lbs). The color is so beautiful and it has plenty of room for a growing bump. Will def rent again. Great for maternity! I would probably go with a 4 if I were not pregnant.

As others have noted, it’s fairly loose-fitting and long-ish (the 0 wasn’t available so I got the 2, but I really don’t think the 0 would have fit all that much snugger), maybe a little overwhelming for petites but a breezy, fun summer look that is comfortable enough for casual beach and lawn wear but pretty enough to dress up. The color is SMASHING and very bright. For a summer dress, it isn’t the lightest – it has a full cotton/opaque lining and a totally see-through eyelet layer on top. The arm holes are low but not so low that they show your bra – the looseness of the dress may result in a peek here and there, and it’s slightly racerback so your straps may show a little on the sides.
Wore this to my baby shower. 5’9” and 34 weeks pregnant. Actually sized down due to the billowy shape. Loved the color & weight of the dress on a warm summer day!
Bright and fun
Dress ran large but was beautiful. Compliments galore because of the color. Would rent again but in a smaller size.
Runs large. Nice length for a tall person. I wore it for a business meeting in Cuba and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Perfect summer dress for a art museum visit
links_reviews_text: Wore this to visit a museum with my daughter. Very comfortable and easy.
Great Easter dress. Ran a bit big, but not terrible.

links_reviews_title: Super comfy and great paired with a jean jacket.
links_reviews_text: I have rented two sizes in this dress (10 and 8) and have found it to run a bit large.
I am a fan of the trapeze look but this style and color was too juvenile. Wasn't very chic.

I'm petite 4'11 and 155lbs (7 months pregnant) and it's a bit on the long side, by my shins but it still looked nice. The dress was comfortable and had plenty of space for my 7 month pregnant belly. The dress also has pockets which are such a win

LOVED this dress (and the pockets)! Wore it to an engagement party with heels, but then with a denim jacket to work. It does run quite large-- I'm typically a 4-ish, and the 0 fit me perfectly. The tent silhouette isn't the most flattering in photographs, but I got TONS of in-real-life compliments and felt fabulous. Would definitely rent again.
Unless you're looking for a maternity dress I have a hard time seeing how this could be flattering. It was so much fabric and just overwhelmingly big and tent-like.

I rented this for Easter when I was 20 weeks pregnant. It was the perfect roomy dress to move around in, and I even ended up wearing for a date night and to work twice. Definitely a great dress for pregnancy. I normally wear a 4 and probably could have worn it later on in my pregnancy.
I should have ordered a smaller size and will probably order again because it was so cute and summery!
Was hoping to wear for Easter but was too large
Great dress for third trimester but small hole in the back
This is a really cute dress and is true to size. It didn't work for me simply because I'm pregnant (25 weeks) and it was too tight in the bust.
I'm 5 months pregnant, rented my pre-pregnancy size, and this is still a tent on me. I love the color and fabric, but recommend people size down at least 2 sizes from what you think you would wear.
Runs big, wore to work with a linen blazer. Fun pink color and with pockets!!
I'm usually a 4 or 2, but, the zero fit great! Love the oversized look! Great color.
Typically wear a size 2 or 4 and the 2 fit perfectly. 20 weeks pregnant I was surprised to be in the smaller of my usual go-to size range. Love this dress for daytime easy pulled together look!
I was expecting resort wear TTS and this was a little bigger in the top half than expected. (I'm a 6/8.) It's lovely but overwhelming on a petite frame without perfect sizing.
Loved the vibrant pink. So comfortable to wear.

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I ended up renting it the entire summer season, and wore it a ton! Easy to throw on with a pair of sandals and feel put together- but still comfortable. Order your normal size for lots of extra room if you are looking to cover a baby bump. I received so many compliments every time I wore it!! So cute!

links_reviews_title: The color is gorgeous, but the dress doesn't have a lot of shape.
links_reviews_text: Minimal shape... kind of hung like a sack, but the color is unreal. I didn't end up wearing, but for the right occasion, it could work. It has pockets! :)

Loved this dress! Wore it multiple times. Thick material. You can wear w a regular bra. Very forgiving fit for the tummy area. Runs big, I went down to a medium & still slightly loose. Great for the summer & the color is vibrant pink!

Love the bright pink of the dress. It is not clingy anywhere so, it's very comfortable. I am normally an 8 but after reading the reviews I went down to a 6 and it fit perfectly. It's just a really cute work dress for a hot summer day.
Runs HUGE

links_reviews_title: super cute and most gorgeous color ever!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. Color amazing, length perfect, very big in middle. Understand the style, but midsection almost looked maternity

links_reviews_title: Love the color of this dress and also that it has pockets. Can dress up or down, great for everyday.
links_reviews_text: Runs VERY big. I am normally a size 4/6 and so I got the size 4 and was swimming in it. Probably should have gone with a 0. I was still able to wear it but it was definitely really big.
Adorable dress. Got a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Pretty color; fits like a sack.
links_reviews_text: This dress has a fantastic, vibrant color and is quite comfortable. Unfortunately, it fits like a potato sack, and if you try to belt it, it just goes marshmallow man on you. I ended up sending it back.
I tried this on and was swimming in pink. Sent back without wearing
Dress fit perfectly. However, I'm a 34D and one wrong move would have resulted in a boob popping out.
The bust cut is low but not too low! The color is a bit brighter than mustard yellow! The sleeves are shaped with a flare and the ruffles are so feminine! Felt sexy and girly! Great party dress!!!

Loved this. Perfect for my trip to Peru. I was nervous about showing too much cleavage, but the dress stayed tight to my chest making me feel secure! Wonderful color & the lace trim detail is the icing on the cake. So so so cute!!!
Waist is tighter than I though. And the sleeves are a little odd. Still super cute

links_reviews_title: Very cute and flattering but very low cut
links_reviews_text: Fit well, true to size. The top was cut very low, so you will want fashion tape!
Loved this dress! I wish every dress was this flattering.
Normally a size 2, but wore a size 4! Super cute dress

The fit is SO CUTE. It is a true fit and flare style dress. It is great for a vacation. The dress is very low cute and great for small chests. Not sure if this would work on someone with a larger chest. I would wear this to work with a cami underneath

Perfect dress for hourglass figures. Super fitted under the bust, which was perfect for me (my underbust is ~30in). Not too short ... 3 or so inches above the knee on my 5'5 frame. Wore for Cinco de Mayo party and got tons of compliments. Only drawback was that it was super low cut and would have looked wayyy too revealing for me but was easily fixable with a bralette
This dress is amazing looking on. Delicate lace details & the fun print makes it perfect for Spring or Summer outings. Super flattering cut. If you are between sizes, size up.

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly to size - comfortable, cute yellow print and love the white lace design
links_reviews_text: Beware - the neck is quite wide! I'm a C and no way could I have worn the dress without something under. Not ideal because I think it takes away from the look a little But overall cute comfy wear
Solid springtime dress
Super flattering, true to size. A little on the fancy side
Fun dress that is perfect for transitioning from summer to fall. It mainly fit TTS, except for around the rib cage where it was tight.
The dress is beautiful and it fits like a glove around the chest and waist. I am short so it was long and kinda looked awkward at the length it is. Short girls beware
Perfect fit through the waist, print and fabric are beautiful. The v-neck was very low/big though, and usually I can fill out a top (32D). Wish this one worked out better.
The dress barely covered my bum.
The fabric is breathable, puff sleeves with a line silhouette compliment my petite body shape well. The pattern is great for summer!
I like a plunging neckline and boy did this one deliver. If you are modest, pick a different dress. Super cute.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing this.
links_reviews_text: The dress looks and feels cheap - couldn't believe its retail price is so high.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too tight in chest area. Didn’t wear.
links_reviews_text: Was just too small.

I brought this dress with me to Hawaii to wear on outings. The fabric is 100% not breathable at all, so it leaves you feeling a bit warm and uncomfortable. Despite that, I loved the fabric pattern, the lace, and color of the dress. I'm normally around size 6-8, but chose an 8 and it fit perfect. A 6 would have been way too tight for me. I think if you have a bit of a belly, definitely size up. It is a unique look for a tropical vacation!
This dress is beautiful, flirty and fun. Perfect to dress up or down and it is so flattering on. Wouldn't suggest for bigger busts because it is very low cut.
Such a pretty dress!
Loved the dress. Ended up wearing the back up option as it fit a better. This definitely fits small as others have mentioned as well.

This dress was gorgeous but it had very little stretch. Also, DO NOT wear nylons with this dress! The sequins are hemmed up inside the dress and it will tear your nylons to shreds. Otherwise I absolutely loved this dress and received non-stop compliments.
this was my back up dress but I loved it as much as my first choice and will rent again in the future so I can wear it out!

links_reviews_title: Stunning!! Be sure to size up at least 1 full size.
links_reviews_text: Stunning! I am usually a size 8-10 in dresses and this size 12 was snug, especially in the upper body.

links_reviews_title: Classy and fun sequin dress for holiday party
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress and comfortable for being covered in sequins. No problems sitting in the dress but some limited arm mobility with the sleeves. I wore this for a work holiday party and received lots of compliments. I loved the festive sequin look while still looking elegant. Highly recommend! #holidayparty #sequins
I received so many compliments wearing this dress. It's very structured and keeps everything nice and tight. Would definitely rent again!
