Like some of the other reviews, the off the shoulder sleeves were very attractive, yet very constricting. I had a hard time putting my shoes on. Otherwise, I literally got a compliment every 10 min. Just enough sparkle without being too flashy!

I'm normally a 10/12 and got the 14 based on reviews but wished I would have gotten the 16. It's gorgeous but super fitted and scratches your arms a bit. It's pretty restricted in the arm area so don't plan on raising your arms. Received compliments all night!
This dress was absolutely gorgeous! It was extremely well made. Fully lined so no itchiness from the sequins, shoulder lace stayed in place. Just perfect!

I rented this dress for a work award ceremony. I felt amazing and received multiple compliments! I usually wear a size 0-2 but the 0 was unfortunately unavailable for the slotted time frame so I went with the 2. It felt fine but I probably could've went down to a 0. It was loose around the arms and shoulders but nothing too noticeable. It also was a bit loose around the waist and hips but maybe it was bc of the stretch of the fabric due to multiple wears. Overall, great dress!!
Great dress for a full bust. Photographs really well.

Received many compliments on the dress but it is very fitting and has no give. I am between an 8 and 10, wore the 10, but needed the 12. My chest was spilling out of the top when I sat down but managed. It's a gorgeous dress and I would rent it again but in a larger size. I'm 5'6, 155 pounds, and 34DD.

I love how this dress fit! It was extremely flattering and I received compliments all night long. I was about to return it and decided to keep it for a last minute event. Its snug in all the right places.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Dress is beautiful. As I'm 5'2 and not used to wearing gowns, this was great for black tie wedding. Sequins are not typically my thing, but the fit and style was stunning. The arm bands were a little restrictive, but otherwise more comfortable than I anticipated.
Got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Hollywood Glamour and a whole lot of SPARKLE!
links_reviews_text: Wore this dress to an evening wedding. From the detailing to the color to the fit, I felt fabulous. I typically wear a size 6 in dresses but with this one, I went with my backup size of 4. It was a little tight, but not unbearable. It fit in better places and felt much more secure. This dress is gorgeous, very form fitting. It is not the easiest to maneuver: driving wise, standing up, sitting down, but I managed, The off-the-shoulder look was beautiful but it really restricts your arm movement. Overall, I would recommend this dress. Quality of materials was well done. It was elegant and beautiful. I got many compliments throughout the evening.
This dress made me feel like a celebrity. Worn to a gorgeous estate wedding. Loved it and didn't want to take it off!
It's gorgeous, although I am smaller in my waist and bigger hips and it wasn't too cinched at the waist. Definitely not a stretchy dress. Overall would definitely rent again!!

I felt like a million bucks in this dress. I received so many compliments! It is definitely very form fitting and has little give since it is made out of sequins. It was hard to sit in, but other than that I loved it! I would definitely recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Broke my insta! Never had so many compliments on a dress / photo.
links_reviews_text: I’m a pretty true 8, straight figure, busty... this dress is SNUG. But almost has to be to show off its glam. Loved it!

This dress was nothing short of amazing. It was comfortable and so much fun. Was perfect for the wedding. I am so grateful I read the reviews though I normally wear a 12 and ended up in the 16 for this dress. The waist was very roomy but the bust runs extremely small. It was thick enough and supportive enough to wear without a bra which was nice. I would definetly wear this dress again. It is 100% covered in sequins and sparkled very nicely.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! I got so many compliments on it. It was a little snug around the waist.
links_reviews_text: Really enjoyed wearing this dress. Definitely go a size up with your backup size. Got a to. Of compliments and felt amazing in the dress!

I loved this dress and so did everyone else. It's very snug but still flattering. My only complaint was that the rhinestones under my arm rubbed me raw. However, bc of how I felt in it and all the compliments I received - it was totally worth it!

This dress is so fun to wear and it made me feel glamorous! It was tight...and I mean TIGHT. My husband had to really work to zip it up but once it was on, it really held in place all night long. No pulling or tugging or adjusting. The fabric is heavy because of the sequins so it's very flattering- even on my apple shape :) So many compliments all night long! I wore bodice-style shapewear underneath but because it's such a sturdy dress, it wasn't necessary.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful in this and would I wear again!
links_reviews_text: It was very form fitting and I could barely sit but it was worth it lol! There is boning so I did not need to wear a bra. Lots of amazing compliments on this one!

This dress was incredibly flattering and drew only compliments from all of the party guests! This dress is NOT stretchy (and that's probably a big factor in why it's so flattering), and runs a little small, so I recommend you size up. I'm usually a 6-8 in formalwear, and I went with a 10. I didn't experience any scratching on my arms and I thought the arm holes had plenty of space.
This was the most beautiful dress i have ever worn and felt like a million bucks in it! Snug fit, perfect length and a beautiful neckline! Received endless compliments!
Wore this for nye and it was perfect for our party at the country club. It has boning so it held up and tucked in. The sequins were comfy too.

So with RTR unlimited there wasn't a huge selection for NYE in Mid December. I chose this dress which wasn't my typical style. I normally wear an 8, which I wore but it was extremely uncomfortable/tight. I got plenty of compliments but I don't know if the style was best for an hourglass type of body. My chest was a bit squished. Overall, very pretty just not sure if it was the best fit for my body.
Runs smalls and fits tight but held everything in including my 3 month baby bump!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress! Shi sad to send it back! Definitely recommend this dress for a formal event.
links_reviews_text: Amazing form fitting fit

links_reviews_title: Can not even count how many compliments I received! Such a beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: Fit was snug but true to size. The off the shoulder lace made for a little limited movement in arms, difficult for certain dance moves! Would wear it 100 times over as it was the show stopper in the room!

Felt like a modern princess in this dress! It is definitely true to size, maybe a little smaller than normal. The zipper is also VERY hard to pull up on your own, so have some help. Otherwise a beautiful dress. Felt sexy and modest. Compliments all night.
I loved everything about this dress. I wore it to my corporate Christmas party and it was the perfect fit. It was the perfect length and I got compliments all night. I would for sure rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Celebrating love with family in a fabulous dress which was perfect for a NYC wedding at Chelsea Pier
links_reviews_text: I received so many compliments. It was comfortable, not too tight or itchy. I am usually a size 6 and the 6 fit perfectly! I wish I owned this dress!

This dress made me feel like Dita Von Teese. Classy yet sexy! I thought the material around the arms would bother me or prevent me from dancing, but it was perfectly fine. There's not much give to the dress, so if you have larger breasts you might want to size up.
Really liked all the sparkle. It's a classy sparkle. But I didn't feel like it was particularly flattering.

This might be a lengthy review, but worth the read. This was my backup dress after my first choice didn't work. I am SO glad my other dress didn't work, not to mention that I saw someone wearing it at the event I was attending!! I have had my eye on this dress since it was released at RTR. Until now, I hadn't had an event that I thought it was appropriate for, plus it didn't have many reviews or pics of anyone wearing besides the models (shout out to all who review these dresses and post pics!). I took a chance on this dress and so glad I did. I am very busty (38 F/G) and this dress fit perfect. Also, I am hippy as well, but still fit great and I felt even better with good shape wear. I typically wear a 12 -14, mostly 14 in designer unless it runs large. In this dress, I wore a 16 and it fit perfectly. This has to be one of if not the most complimented dresses I have ever rented from RTR. I even had men stop me and compliment my dress! I wore this to a black tie optional event and it was perfect. Everyone loved it and I hope I can rent this again. Curvy girls, do not hesitate to rent..it will show off your shape fantastically! Loved everything about this dress from the lace detail, to the length and the color of the sequins. Rent this now!!
Runs a little small but it is beautiful
This dress was amazing! I received so many compliments and felt great in it. I highly recommend renting this dress.
Such a fun dress, easy, great fabric. Will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit. I wore this to the derby and it was beautiful!

links_reviews_text: This dress is great for busty girls and is also made from a lovely soft and sturdy fabric. It warning is not to wear it if you plan on doing a lot of movement. For example when I got into my car a lot of the lower buttons snapped open.
I love this dress! It does run small but it looked so good on my figure and I felt so confident in it, definitely a must rent! Also the fabric has a bit of stretch to it.

links_reviews_title: Extremely flattering and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and Hugged every curve. Perfect for a daytime or spring/summer event. Honestly might buy that’s how much I loved it.
Tons of compliments on this dress! It's beyond comfortable with a bit of stretch to the soft denim fabric. Love the ease of wearing this button up dress. It's can be dressed up or down!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Hugged my curves very sexy.

links_reviews_title: One of my favorite RTR dresses. Tons of compliments
links_reviews_text: #weekend summer dress
This dress was a great fit and super comfortable at the same time. I wore it to work and got so many compliments!

Love this dress. Simple enough for Houston style. I had to size up to a 4 and this is just perfect. I am normally in a 2 but since the dress Hutton's all the way up, the bust area is more snug. I am a 34, 27, 35 with an athletic build.

Wore it all day from brunch to a low key night out and it worked for both. Beautiful dress and fits great. The material is pretty stretchy so makes for a snug fit. Only thing to watch out for is all the buttons are snaps so at first I kept being afraid my whole dress would open up. But the worst that happened is the bottom few snaps popped open when I took a big step once.

links_reviews_title: Loved wearing this dress! The print is very springy, and good for both daytime and date night.
links_reviews_text: It was super stretchy and comfortable. The medium was perfect all over for my size.

I LOVE THIS DRESS! It has snap buttons all the way up but they're really secure. I packed it to change into at work for date night and forgot a bra and honestly, it wasn't too bad. the material is thick enough that it wasn't too noticeable. It's beautiful fabric and perfect length. I love it.
This dress gave me all the spring feels. The floral print, snug fit, midi length, and sleeveless jumper style were such a fun and flirty combo. Loved.

The dress was cute but it ran probably two sizes too small. I am usually a size 4, I ordered the size SR and it was so tight I couldn't even but it up the front. I was disappointed I wasn't able to wear it on my vacation. Be sure to size up if you rent.
Unfortunately this dress fit me perfectly EXCEPT for my chest. As a normal 6/8 dress size, it could barely stay buttoned with my D/DD bra size. Super bummed, because otherwise it fit like a dream.

I loved this dress but it was impossible to wear it. I'm sometimes a size 4 and sometimes a size 6 but trying this dress in a medium was impossible. It's somewhat stretchy, but even with the stretch, I could barely button it up. I looked like a sausage so it wasn't going to happen. Did it shrink in the wash or something? I might try this in a size L maybe.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress but unsure if I will wear.
links_reviews_text: This dress is very cute in person and fits everywhere but the bust. Fits very tight around the chest and armpits. Wish I had known so I could size up.
Super tight, but still comfortable to wear all day

links_reviews_title: Great dress just not for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute but it’s denim and I didn’t feel that was appropriate for the wedding I was going to. This was sent as a backup by rtr because my other dress was not available to ship out. That did a great job of getting a similar looking dress to my original and they offered free over night shipping if they didn’t like the dress they picked which was greatly appreciated.
couldn't wear, too small
This dress is SO cute but also sexy and perfect for so many occasions. It does run small but the snaps are strong.
I'm busty so the top buttons pulled too much that I couldn't wear it.
I didn't end up wearing this, as it was big enough but the really stretchy fabric was too curve-hugging for my style. It is really cute though!

links_reviews_title: Pretty design but material too heavy for hot and humid summer weather
links_reviews_text: I am usually size 8-10 in dresses and ordered an XLR and found that it fit perfectly. Although the design is pretty for summer, I had to immediately return the dress without wearing it because the material is quite heavy and not at all fitting for the oppressively hot and humid summer weather.

Thicccccc fabric! I wore a nude strapless bra with it just in case but I think the fabric is pretty thick and gives the dress a lot of structure. I am 5'4 and the dress is about tea length for me. I have a larger chest (32DD) and the size SR fit perfectly. Easy to wear and even easier to take off! Very cute for a brunch date. My one complaint is that there is clearly space left for the butt but since I think I have a longer torso, the butt space sat on the small of my back instead of where my butt is supposed to be. Aside from this little problem, the dress is super cute. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to work a few times and weekends. Got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Love the snaps, although every time I get in a car the very bottom snap comes undone (not really a huge issue but it happens). It was a little tight on me around the lats (I am between a small and athletic build) it would kind of rub in that area, but I only noticed this the second time I wore it.

It runs pretty small and buttons all the way up. The buttons are the click in place ones so you never know when you might move the wrong way and up snap the whole dress. I would definitely recommend going up a size
The snaps up the front seemed impractical, and the floral pattern was less interesting in person.
Pretty dress to show off your figure. Didn’t fit me well, the straps are long and won’t adjust.

links_reviews_title: Loved the style, ran a little tight
links_reviews_text: I'm a 4/6 in dresses usually and the SR size was very constricting in the belly and ribs area. I also am a 34A and it was SUPER tight in the bust so I don't know how a normal sized person would manage this. I did end up wearing it once out to dinner, but I wore a duster sweater over it to cover up a little and not feel so revealing in a tight dress.

I love this dress. It is versatile - I wore it to work with a white blazer, then out to a nice dinner. I got a lot of compliments on it. I like the shade of blue and the design is fun. It's flattering and not too form-fitting so I felt comfortable.

This is one of my favorite rentals and I've been waiting for it to come back all summer so I could buy it. Shoshanna is so good for a large bust, and this is one of my 2 favorite dresses from the brand. It hangs perfectly on me and actually accommodates my 36F bust. It may need to remain in my permanent collection. I get so many compliments any time I wear it.
Fits wonderfully and is easy to wear. Tons of compliments!

I wore this dress twice- once for brunch and then the next day to work. It was super comfy and I loved the fit. It was not tight around waist or in the arms. Cons: very flowy at the bottom, so any bit of wind made it fly up. It also wrinkled incredibly easy. Overall, I would rent again!
Was so flattering in the body area, but was a bit tight in the arms.
Very flattering dress but wrinkles quite easily as you can see from the photo.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments on the color.
links_reviews_text: The color is bright and pops out. The fit was flattering. The only negative is that it wrinkles easily.
Love the look. But could not zip! :(
Just adorable. Wearing to work and to dinner with friends Friday.

links_reviews_title: Fun a flirty spring dress that actually fit!
links_reviews_text: I'm very small busted and often have trouble finding v-neck dresses that fit. This one fit great. I wore this dress to a spring bridal tea. The dress was comfortable and flattering.

Two daughters, two graduations, two towns one long hot day. This dress was comfortable for prolonged sitting. Great for those who are thicker in the waist. I liked that it was fashionable but not to trendy for those of us middle aged ladies. Loved the colorful floral print. If your between sizes, go down. Considered purchasing but it felt a little shapeless after wearing all day I’m 48, 5’6 140 lbs Usually a size 4 or 6 Apple shape

links_reviews_title: Comfortable fun dress for a daytime wedding
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a 2 pm wedding on a farm and it was PERFECT. It was light and comfortable and didn't require any sort of strapless bra. I usually wear a 6 in designer clothes and the 4 fit me with room to spare.
This fit amazingly, had a little bit of cleavage for my size c but not too much that I felt uncomfortable wearing it to work. I got a lot of compliments.
Great spring dress with vibrant color and print. The fluttery skirt was so fun!

Really loved the colors and hem line but didn't love the way the shoulders and arms looked on me, made me feel like a linebacker - but other than that liked the neckline and buttons detail going down front. Very pretty dress
Very cute and fun dress to wear to a baby shower. The dress is short for work but otherwise nice for a day time outing. The material is thin and a little unforgiving. Would rent a second time
Pretty spring like print. Nice cut.

links_reviews_title: Super summery - don't rent unless it's warm
links_reviews_text: This thin silk-like fabric screams spring and summer. It is still cold where I live so I don't recommend it unless you live somewhere sunny. I didn't like that it showed some cleavage but otherwise it's very forgiving and didn't show my belly - fit was great. I will return and wear when it's warmer out. It feels great for a daytime event but not work.

links_reviews_title: Loved it! Made me feel like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Favorite RTR dress so far. If you're between sizes, size down.
Looked super cute and fit well everywhere. Received a lot of unsolicited compliments. Very comfortable as well.
This is the second time I have rented this dress. I just love it and get compliments from strangers when I wear it. Perfect fit, so flattering,
Loved the dress just didn't fit great! needed to be altered in some areas. really pretty colors.

links_reviews_title: very flowy and loved the color combination
links_reviews_text: it was nice

links_reviews_title: Absolutely love this dress and will definitely rent again.
links_reviews_text: The colours are super vibrant and the fit is so easy. The dress, despite being knee length, actually flows really nicely. The material is surprisingly light despite being synthetic and is perfect for summer. I may buy this one.
All that needs to be said is that my husband loved it. It runs a little large, but that works for the style.
The dress was a super cute fit and was perfect to wear to work. Runs a little large so I'd go down a size.
such a great dress for work, a party, or just everyday wear

links_reviews_title: Great color and fit. Shorter than I expected (for a tall lady).
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color. Sleeves are puffy but not in an obnoxious way. The dress fits so well and effortless. It moves nicely with you while keep a structured appearance. It was a tad shorter than I would have liked (at 5' 10") but that didn't stop me from wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for going out to dinner on a hot summer night!
links_reviews_text: Feminine, Flattering fit true to size. Looked good, but pattern was a bit busier than I like. The beauty of RTR, is that it affords us the ability to experiment with new styles and patterns and push beyond our respective comfort zones so....mission accomplished!
Loved this dress! The colors are soo gorgeous and it's perfect for work. I wore it with gorgeous red patent sandals.
Loose in chest and arms; off, unflattering cut
Cute dress. Shoulders are a bit too fluffy, but fit and material are great.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress with a slight retro vibe
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. I wore it with red pointy flats and it was adorable for work.
Fit perfect great for work and play Great rental!

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a day at the county fair. A perfect mix of fun and casual.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, and was long enough that I didn't feel 'exposed'.

links_reviews_title: Felt professional at work and cute afterwards.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering, comfortable, easy to wear to work and out afterwards.
I rented this for an event, but the material was a lot more casual than I expected. I ended up wearing it to work instead and got a lot of compliments
Really cute, but the arms are tight for a size 4. I don't have large arms and it fit great everywhere but there. It was wearable but a little snuck around the biceps.

links_reviews_title: Intended to wear this for work but didn’t fit right on me.
links_reviews_text: Cut a little too low in the cleavage.

links_reviews_title: One of my all time fav rentals
links_reviews_text: Flirty pattern silky luxury fabric, beautiful buttons sexy slit, I love it! Great for shooter girls like me!

I wore this dress to a rehearsal dinner in Miami. The material is thin and flowy so you don't get hot at all! I felt so comfortable all night. Only annoying part was the zipper in the back. The top of the zipper at the neck hangs down because the material isn't structured enough to support it. I wore this dress without a bra because when I had one on it pulled on the material in the front. 1000% recommend renting it!!

I rented this dress in a much larger size than I normally would bc it was the only one left, but it actually worked out well. The tie allows you to tighten it to your body so I would size up. It was a total showstopper and I'm seriously considering buying it. It's super short so I would be aware of that but was perfect for a night out in Miami.

links_reviews_title: Wore it for New Years was a hit
links_reviews_text: Fit pretty well got the larger size as I heard it ran small. Fun, flirty, great.
This dress fit perfectly. If I could buy it, I would. It's a total show stopper!

links_reviews_title: Head turner!! Compliments all night long
links_reviews_text: This was true to size but a little bit short. I had to be careful when bending or sitting down
The print and colors are so pretty, the cut is perfect. I love the long sleeves and short hemline. One of my favorite rentals this year!

Absolutely beautiful. Rented for a wedding but the fit around the armpits is a little restricting so I didn't think it would be the best for dancing. Wore for a day at the races in Kentucky on a work trip instead. There is absolutely no give in the material.

I had so much fun wearing this! Great print, pretty colors, flirty length. I got compliments from complete strangers! It was chilly the night I wore this, so I wore it with tights and booties, which also made the shirt length feel less scandalous. It was perfect for the party I attended.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. It's short but that balances out with the print and blousy sleeves.
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size. Length was short. Fabric was soft.

links_reviews_title: Felt so fashionable in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this dress! It definitely stands out because of the pattern and style and was so fun to wear. Fits true to size, but material doesn't give much. As another review said, you'll need someone to help zip you up!
Vivid colors and beautiful yet unique fit

links_reviews_title: Fun and flirty, length not for the faint of heart
links_reviews_text: A beautiful dress with lots of style and personality. Super short, I found myself checking to make sure I wasn't flashing the room all night. Runs a little small, I'm a typical 0 and this was constricting.

Dress runs small. Typically am a 0 but rented the 2 as that was what was available. Very cute, extremely short even on my 5 ft frame. Sleeves were very long and because of that I had to return without wearing.
Bought this for travel and it was perfect

links_reviews_title: Beautiful fabric and fit. Very flattering
links_reviews_text: This dress runs very small. For sure follow the reviews and size up. It's also super short. I wouldn't recommend it for anyone over 5.5

I liked this dress a lot but you have to have a specific body shape for it. I am 5'5 so this length worked pretty well but was borderline uncomfortable sitting down. If you are taller this is probably not going to work for you. Overall, the dress is a nice material and I would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear this so bad.
links_reviews_text: The dress is as beautiful as other reviewer comments have said. The colors are bold and bright and the dress is super fun. Unfortunately for me, the dress was too tight in the hips and way too short for my liking. I would have been uncomfortable attempting to make this work. I am sadly returning without having worn it.

I wore this to film something so wanted to stand out in bright colors -- it worked. The details like the princess sleeves, side sash and buttons on the front are really nice. This can be worn to something formal, on a date or with sneakers for street style. Very feminine and classic in the cut.

I have work this dress a couple of times since it was so hard to let go. I always get so many compliments and it's so sexy. However the top of the dress runs small so I would size up if you have larger breasts or wider shoulders. Overall I would have bought the dress if I could afford it.

I wanted to love this dress and had it on my list for a while. Unfortunately, I was disappointed. The material was extremely thin and easily wrinkled. I am 5'7 and this dress was far too short. I had to return without wearing.

links_reviews_title: runs small, the worse fitted dress I have ever rented at RTR!
links_reviews_text: I did not use it! It is really a strange fit.

So many compliments, I began to blush. The dress may be a tad short for some, but not for me. I am 5'3" and rocked it with heels! The zipper cation is a tad difficult to zip up and down, so make sure you have a PIC on hand to assist!

I rented this dress on a whim - normally I'm one to wear all black - and boy am I glad that I did! The colors are absolutely amazing and the fit of the dress is surprisingly very flattering. The wrap-front was a little tricky to navigate being 5'10" tall - it was super short! All in all, if you appreciate 80's style with a more modern take, this dress is totally for you.

chose this without tights for NYE! it was so beautiful when dressed up, made me feel glam. the top allows you to push it down off the shoulders more for a deeper neckline. i think this could be a great wedding guest dress, it's easy to dance and move in.
Fit amazing, cut was flattering.
Loved this dress!! Comfortable fit!
Got so many compliments on this dress!
Such a great dress for a fancy event. It's extremely sliming but the best part is the ruffles placement cover all of the bumps and lumps you wouldn't want to accentuate. Loved this dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful weather! Airy, fun dress! Got many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Fit runs slightly large. Dress is comfortable and easy to move/dance in. Shoulders/front and back V are a bit wide and would have slipped without using double sided tape. Dress will drag if heels are not high enough, but I chose wisely. Ruffles around waist needed a quick steam as they were stuck in a "winged out" position likely due to shipping. Overall quite lovely and fuss-free while wearing, and had a unique look. Definitely recommend!
I wore this to a wedding and it was perfect. I'm 6'2" and the length was perfect, so this may be too long for women on the shorter side.
Great dress for an outdoor wedding! I received many compliments and stayed cool in the 100 degree afternoon ceremony.
This dress was comfortable and fit perfectly. I received nothing but compliments.
Super comfortable and elegant, lots of compliments
This is such a cute dress I wore it a lot. I want to own this.

LOVED THIS DRESS! It was actually my third back-up dress because the first two I ordered were unavailable! RTR overnighted the dress to me (so thankful) for my boyfriends Red Leg Military Ball. I am 5'3", 135 lbs., 34B bust and with the maybe 3-inch heels I had on, it was the perfect length and fit great. When I first put it on I thought to myself, "Do I kinda look like a salsa or cabaret dancer...?". I didn't! It was an elegant, yet SUPER FUN dress. I felt like my dress stood out over the other dresses at the ball...and my favorite, it was so early to dance in! My boyfriend and I tore up the dancefloor and bars afterward with no problems! 11/10 would recommend this dress! Don't need a lot of jewelry either. I nice pair of earrings and you're golden!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress, got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable, easy to move around. The shoulders slip off a little bit, but overall great fit! Perfect for a black tie wedding as a shorter person who doesn't love long dresses.

I LOVE this dress!!! First of all, it is EXTREMELY comfortable! I would say it fit true to size and was very figure flattering. I have hips and a butt and the way the ruffles are sewn was very beautiful and accentuated my curves in a very feminine way! This was such a good choice for the event I went to. It was a Hindu wedding, so it had to be more conservative than my typical choice for a black tie event and when I placed the order, I was nervous it wouldn't really be a show piece, but I can say I was surprising wrong! The pictures don't do it justice and I had people coming up to me all night asking where I got the dress and telling me how stunning it looked! Definitely a show stopper!! I actually am considering buying it because you can never have too many good black dresses! Such a staple!

I love this dress. I rented it early to see if it will be something I'd like to wear to a black tie event I have latter in the month. LOVE. Perfect for my curves and flattering in all the right places. I'm on the taller side (5'7") and have a longer torso. The L was a perfect option for me and will be even better with the heals I anticipate wearing.

I loved wearing this dress to a spring black tie wedding! It was incredibly comfortable while also extremely flattering- and even showed off my shoes :). It was a bit low in the front but in a good way- though I could probably have sized down and been just fine. I'm 5'7 and the long was a perfect length. Would definitely rent again!

Super flattering at the waist. It was tight in the chest and waist so I wore 16 instead of my usual 14. Only 14L and 16L were available but it worked with heels despite being only 5’6”. Dress was very pretty but I feel it was not worth the price of the rental.

links_reviews_title: It was a fun dress and I got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: I would say this dress is true to your regular size. I am 6'1 and the length was perfect. The ruffles hid all my "trouble" areas and made me feel confident all night. It was easy to dance in and I received a ton of compliments. I could not recommend it more! The only thing that was kind of annoying was that the zipper was difficult to get up in one section because of the ruffles.
Perfect fit! Got so many compliments on this dress. It wasn't right so didn't worry about eating or drinking at the party! :) yet it was still streamlined to show off every curve!

links_reviews_title: This gown worked perfectly for an upbeat formal affair. The tiers were gorgeous.
links_reviews_text: I attended a fundraiser gala for an arts school. The theme was "Let's Get Loud" highlighting Latin music. I felt festive and beautiful.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a formal dinner gala for work; looked elegant and was super comfy.
links_reviews_text: Wore this to a formal dinner gala for work; looked elegant and was super comfy; cut made it so I wasn't self-conscious about my belly. Got lots of compliments. Wore with gold earrings and gold heels.

links_reviews_title: Flattering and comfortable to dance the night away.
links_reviews_text: Hugs curves in all the right places and the ruffle accents are flattering. I'm 5'8" and wore a 3" heal. The high-low hemline is dramatic and got me a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Adorable dress a bit long since I’m 5’1 so wear higher heels. A bit loose the breast area. Loved!
links_reviews_text: Train in back - west higher heels. Loved dancing like a salsa girl in it :) Elegant black dress. A bit loose in the chest area so get double sided tape. Recommend renting it it was a fun dress.

I didn't wear this, but kept it as my backup through several rounds of Unlimited shipments. The fit was nice, it was comfortable, but it just wasn't quite as WOW as the top choices I ended up with. It felt a little frumpy until I pulled the shoulders down. The longer flowing back of the skirt was a bit short for a Long. If you want ease, comfort, and to disguise problem areas, with a bit of flirty style, you will love this!

links_reviews_title: It looks so great! I don't even want to return it!
links_reviews_text: I'am 5'7, without pumps, the tail will be almost on the ground. I did wear heels, so it works well. Size 4R fits me well, but still a little loose on the waist. My friends said it looks even better from back. Received a lot of compliments. I really don't want to return it!

This is one of my most favorite rentals ever. It's so glam but still comfortable and effortless. I was worried about tripping over the train (or having someone else step on it) but once I put heels on, it was no problem. I didn't need to wear shapewear for this dress - it was pretty well constructed and hid all my main problem areas. I did wear a strapless bra - I think the shoulders are too wideset for a normal bra. The picture doesn't do the dress justice!!

I was invited to attend a fundraiser event and did not realize that it was formal until shortly before the date! Thank God for RTR! I was hesitant about ordering online since I am a plus sized girl...but this dress could not have fit any better! The ruffles helped me feel flawless and covered troublesome tummy spots. The sleeves gently covered my batwing arms! I felt fairly flawless in this dress! The only teeny tiny problem I had was zipping it up- and that was only because ruffles tend to get in the way. Would I recommend this "little black dress?" Oh MY GOSH YESSS! RTR was so easy and effortless that I'm planning to attend another black tie event I wouldn't have dreamed of going to (since I don't have the struggle of dress shopping anymore)!
This dress fit well and was very comfortable. I didn't wear it because I just wasn't crazy about it on me.
Very flattering gorgeous light weight!

links_reviews_title: Cha cha cha times with ruffles
links_reviews_text: I have weak shoulders so I wasn't surprised that the sleeves would not stay up, but I don't think anyone could tell with the ruffles and high/low style of the dress. I think it looked natural.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Beautiful look and feel!
links_reviews_text: Tried this dress at the NYC - RTR store location because my stylist recommended it! Loved it from the moment I tried it on! Playful, comfortable, feminine, flattering! Great dancing dress!

links_reviews_title: Gives you shape. Waist fits true to size.
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress. Unique style. Got true to size. Lots of compliments.

I absolutely love this dress. It's so flattering and the length was perfect. I had to order a long because it was the only thing available, even thought I'm only 5'6''. With a moderate size heel the length was fine. I got compliments all night!
Fit like a gloooove! I got compliments all night from both men and women. Felt like sexy, classy and comfortable. Danced the night away!!
I wore this for a shoot to promo something and it added a ton of style and movement to the pic. It for very well and I received a ton of compliments. Such a great dress!

links_reviews_title: the high low was a nice touch very fun to dance in received many compliments would rent again
links_reviews_text: was tight on my middle (problem area) felt like it was twisting on me all nite
Flirty but fun dress for a formal nighttime wedding

I guess it runs a little big I usually wear a 10. Have to buy it - it works for any season and event - I wore it with a jean jacket and combat boots to take it casual but sexy, a slouchy sweater for a weekend vibe, this pic a classic RL blazer and boots for day-to-night

links_reviews_title: This dress felt both elegant and fun!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size on the larger size, it gives you a nice waistline

links_reviews_title: The dress flows beautifully and has an incredible fit. The fabric is gauzy without being revealing.
links_reviews_text: It's a gauzy fabric with little stretch and a fit that is very true to size. I ordered the 18R and 20R and wore the 18 with shapewear to get a smoother look. The fit and the flow of the ruffles were flattering to the body- especially the waist, bust, and arms. I'm 5'3" and wore metallic booties with a .5" sole and 4" heels and the back of the dress was probably a little less than quarter-inch from the floor; just barely grazing the floor at times. My partner was worried about stepping on the dress and there was a moment or three when the dress got caught on something but it wasn't a distraction. I did need to pin the dress in order to keep it from slipping and revealing my bra at the bust and in the back but I was able to wear with just a regular pushup bra. Lots of compliments and a lot of fun to wear.

I loved this dress!! I wore it as a bridesmaid dress for my friends wedding and it was perfect! I'm 5'2 and 115 pounds, my heels were about 4 inches high and the length was perfect! I would definitely rent this again!
Dress was classy and elegant. The fit was prefect and dress was well made. The fabric has a little stretch to it and it’s fully lined. Nice one!! I wore a regular strapless bra.

I haven't worn a formal dress in years. I started with a 12R and while the length was great, it was a tad too big. I wanted it to be more form-fitting. The only size available was 10L. It ended up being perfect with the shoes I picked. It was comfortable and flattering. I would definitely recommend it for a formal event. Very classic!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a red carpet themed work party and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The fit ran very true to size. The quality was excellent. It is a flattering dress even on a fuller size figure.

Perfect floor length dress for a black tie holiday party. Great fit, had to buy Commando brand thong so there weren't any panty lines. True to fit, and length worked with 2.5/3" heels. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: A great night out with my husband
links_reviews_text: Dress fit beautifully, and was extremely comfortable. Although it was form fitting, it was not restrictive at all, and the fabric allowed for great movement.
Perfect fit, felt amazing. Wore 3" heels with a 4L and was great length. Easy to move, so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: This dress is a dream. So comfortable and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress. Was great for a formal wedding, was comfortable wearing it all night long.

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly even though I was expecting it to be too small
links_reviews_text: They ended up not being able to send my usual size, 2R, so I was nervous the 0 would be too small but it ended up fitting perfectly and wasn't even too tight, very happy I was still able to wear the dress!
Beautiful, form-fitting dress that held up well to my dance moves!
Loved this dress for my gala event. It was form fitting but stretchy enough for a bigger bust. I was able to move around in it without hassle. I am short so the length was perfect.
Thicker material to keep you warm. Super flatter but does show some side boob so you may need some fashion tape.

Loved this dress so much I want to buy it! I got so many compliments! I should have gotten the 4, but it was sold out so I went with the 6. A little big in the body of the dress but still get amazing. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a formal wedding in Chicago. The fit was true to size. It was simple, yet elegant. I received many compliments throughout the night. Highly recommend!

Fits true to size, is a beautiful and comfortable dress. I've worn it in blue before and I think RTR may have sent me the regular length... there wasn't any L on the tag and it was too short to wear with higher heels (I'm 5'9). I wore 2.5 inch heels and it was fine but the dress didn't touch the floor in the front, which I would have preferred. Other than that, this is a great dress and would recommend!
This is not the most flattering picture, but I can assure you - this dress was on point! The fit was just right and very elegant. It was long so I did wear 4" heels.
Nothing like a simple black dress that makes you feel sexy at 11 weeks postpartum.
The fit was a little large in butt and hips, but overall a great dress. Very elegant, sexy and definitely gives your body some curves!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable dress! Danced the night away!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! Highly recommend.

I. Love. This. Dress. It fit every curve so nicely and Hugged my shape. I got the dress in a 20 & 22, I'm usually a 18/20. The 20 was super nice and tight, it did hug my body so you definetly need some spanx. The 22 was more comfortable but bigger in the best area and was looser. I felt like a bombshell and wanted to show the curves. It was comfy, and I got so many compliments!!!
Super comfortable! Super gorgeous! Many compliments :)

I wore this to a military ball and was hesitant about ordering a plain black dress, thinking that it would be very boring. The fit was amazing and hugged curves in the right places. I did wear Spanx underneath which was needed to keep things smooth. I am small chested (34A) but felt like the top fit ok despite that - it may be an issue if you are top heavy. I am 5'7" and 145ish pounds and the 6L fit perfectly with 3" heels.

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for the black tie wedding - I felt great!
Classically elegant bridesmaid's dress for all body types!
links_reviews_text: This dress was selected as the bridesmaid's dress for a wedding I was in recently. Initially I was very skeptical, as I don't tend to choose a form fitting mermaid-esque cut on my "pear" body type (especially without being able to try it on in advance). However, the dress ended up being an amazing, very elegant choice. It was simple and elegant and gave the bridal party a very chic, formal polished look. Everything from the cut, to the thickness of the fabric, and the stretch in all the right places made this dress a hit. It looked fabulous on all 5 bridesmaids, all with different body types. As a bonus the black was extremely flattering for photos -- just watch out for marks as the black shows everything (our bouquets left some pollen on the fabric that showed up in some of the photos).

I wore this dress as a bridesmaid 4.5 months after having my daughter and I felt great in it. It's very fitted but has some stretch that makes it incredibly comfortable. I'm 5'9 and the long was perfect with 3.5 inch heels. Highly recommend.
Pretty true to size and comfortable
This dress was incredibly comfortable and I loved the neckline! Perfect for the black tie optional wedding I wore it to

links_reviews_title: I will rent this one for my next event!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so beautiful. It was my backup dress for my event, which I'm glad I had the chance to try it on while glammed up before sending it back. I'm saving it in my favorites for a future event!
This dress was so classic and elegant! It was unbelievably comfortable and I loved wearing this! Everyone said I looked gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Last minute rental and couldn't have been happier!
links_reviews_text: Ordered the day before the wedding. Things never fit me well so this was a fingers crossed kind of move. The dress was SUPER flattering and classy. Loved the material - it hugs you without squeezing in and making you feel self conscious. Couldn't recommend this more, especially for hour glass shapes.

For those that have hips and a small top this isn't the best dress. The 8 was too big on the top but the 6 tight on the hips. The picture is a 6. This dress this shows everything! Too bad it didn't fit better though because very pretty. As for length this was good for those that are short both the 6P and 8P were fine with my 2.5" heels

This was actually my backup dress to wear to an awards show, but the first dress didn't work so I ended up wearing it. It runs a little big (especially the top if you're not busty) but I added a belt and used some fashion tape to fix it. The fabric has a nice weight and finish, but also had stretch so it was very comfortable to wear through a 4+ hour show.
Fit true to size. I'm 5'2" and the petite length just swept the floor perfectly with heels. Received many compliments! Classic, but sexy.

I could have worn a 4 in the top (34a) but needed the space through the mid section. Overall it was an awesome fit. The racer back looked awesome. It was just heavy enough to hang properly and I felt very well dressed. I'm 5'6" and wore a 3 inch heel. Perfect 6p.

links_reviews_title: Elegant, comfortable, fuss free for black tie
links_reviews_text: Loved wearing this gown, felt beautiful and it was flattering in every way

links_reviews_title: The dress is very comfortable and fit perfectly.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! Great material. Didn't need to wear a bra.

links_reviews_title: I didn't realize how good I looked until after someone took this picture.
links_reviews_text: I am glad I got the backup size. I am 5'1 ish and ~112lbs, 34B. I wore the petite 0 which just grazed the floor with my 2.5 in heels. The dress was a flattering fit, and I was able to get away with no bra and some nip covers. Make sure to wear seamless undergarments as the bodice has only a slight stretch and will show ALL the lines.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress for a wedding! Felt great all night
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it as a bridesmaid in a friend's wedding and it couldn't have worked out better - very sophisticated, flattering cut and super comfortable for a long day of wearing it. One of the other bridesmaids also wore the same dress (see photo - I'm on the left, she's on the right) and it looked great on her, too. I chose a slightly looser fit by going with the 4R, though I could have worn the 2R; she also wore the 4R, which was slightly tighter for her. It looked great both ways :) and I wore a strapless bra which worked out fine. Highly recommend!

Stunning dress!! I'm curvy and busty and this hugged in all the right places. Showed off my figure without being too clingy and showing off places I didn't want to share. And BONUS: it was crazy comfortable. Danced the night away! Compliments galore. Class LongBD.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal cocktail party
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and great fabric that lays nicely over hips and has a small amount of stretch in it.

Loved wearing this dress! It is surprisingly soft and stretchy on the inside despite the sequins. I am wide in the hips so it did not hang on me like on the model, and i liked it anyway. Super fun dress for a party if you like the attention!

links_reviews_title: Happy New Year 2020 going 70s Style! Loved this Sequin Cheetah dress!
links_reviews_text: The bell sleeves are adorable. Neck hooks are three hook and will need a friend or SO to help out. They were challenging to clasp. But it got me lots of compliments!

Size 2 fit loosely. The dress is fun and sparkly and hit mid-thigh. My only complaint was that the neck sequins left scratch marks and the sleeves stuck together a bit when pulling on due to the sequin stitching - so I was nervous the sequins would pop off.

I loved this dress! I got it as a backup for my birthday party not thinking it would fit but it did and I fell in love. The wide sleeves are very fun. I love that it has a slit in the front and a low cut back BUT with some rejiggering you can easily wear a bra under this if your someone who needs to (it's lined well so you don't HAVE to but I wanted some oomph). It was definitely a little tight around the middle and it will show flaws but YOLO. I wanted to keep this dress for NYE!

links_reviews_title: Smelled like cigarette smoke and the material was not flattering.
links_reviews_text: Thick clingy material and shorter on than it appears in the picture and I’m likely shorter than the model (5’5”) but curvier so that might have been why it was riding up. Does not look the same in person.
At 165 and 5'7" I found the dress slightly snug. Would have rocked a 12 a little better. At 160 (about a month ago before my parties started haha) it would have been perfect! Highly recommend.
Wore this for a wedding. Lots of compliments! While it's fitted, it floats away from the body so you can breathe. The sequins is fun but be prepared it catches on the dress here and there.

links_reviews_title: Perfect amount of comfortable and blingy. Got so many compliments! (A little short when you sit.)
links_reviews_text: Loved the ballooned arms and loose but still complimentary fitting. I wore this for my 40th birthday dinner with friends and wanted to be comfortable while also the most sparkly thing for miles around and I think this dress nailed it. Wore with leather jacket and booties to tone it down (just slightly!).
Fun for a party. Comfortable with beautiful sequins.
Overall great fit

links_reviews_title: I decided to wear long dress but will rent this again if its in stock
links_reviews_text: all sequins so flows nicely.
This dress is super fun! It felt a bit suffocating with the sleeves it felt hot and uncomfortable. The key hole in the front didn't fit me properly and left a gaping hole. I didn't end up wearing it.
Love this dress. So many compliments. Runs tight with a zipper up the back - when ordering, choose one size up from your usual and another two sizes up. Trust me! Would definitely wear again.

This dress is absolutely show stopping. I rented to wear to a rehearsal dinner, and it was perfect! The all over lace is gorgeous. My only issue was that the dress does run slightly small and doesn't have much give.

links_reviews_title: Loved the detail in this dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a dream. Very unique, yet classy and elegant. I'm 5'4 and I loved the length.
I rented this for a black tie event but wound up wearing something different. It's incredibly comfortable and flattering for petite women!

links_reviews_title: Comfy choice for black tie optional!
links_reviews_text: A little windy in this photo but I loved this dress! Good length for petites
I wore this to a rehearsal dinner... I'm typically a size 10, but that didn't fit so I got in a size 12. It was comfortable and I felt so glamorous!!

Rented for wedding. This runs extremely small. I am usually a 2 and wore a 6 (did a fitting in-store) - it fit perfectly. The dress is a bit long, but worked for me with heels. The front paneling on the waist and the entire upper back are illusion lace, so be careful if you don't like things that are more sheer!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments wearing this dress!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'9 at 155 lbs, and the size 8 fit perfectly. It is fitted through the waist and hips, but not tight. This dress was super comfortable too. Perfect for a black tie optional wedding in Chicago

This dress was amazing! I wish I owned it. My biggest advice: size up at least 1 size! I would say 75% of the time I wear a 4, and 25% of the time I wear a 6 - I got the 6R in this and desperately wished I had the 8R! It was a tight zip, but I was still able to sit down and eat at dinner. I will be renting this dress again!
Wore this to an evening wedding in September. I loved it! So pretty and such great details. Got so many compliments! Would definitely rent again.
Loved the detailing of the open lace. Overall this was a classy shape and a classic black dress with just enough interest to keep it fun. A little fitted in the waist but TTS and flattering shape.

links_reviews_title: Fun spin on a classic LBD
links_reviews_text: Easy to dance in. Probably would have been fine in the 8 but the 10 wasn't baggy, just a little roomy. I was able to wear without a bra and felt fine.
Fit is great and super comfortable to dance in. Looks prettier in person because you can see all the lace detail.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: comfortable, stretchy fabric, very flattery hugs all your curves. The sleeves are lace so your bra strap shows through.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: And it was perfect! It fit really well, and I got a lot of compliments on it! You definitely couldn't see the lace panels on the side. It looked like it was closed, and it was hard to tell from pictures that the dress is actually black lace and not just plain black. The dress was stunning in person, and was really easy and comfortable to wear.

This dress was absolutely perfect! It was my backup and I loved it so much more than my first choice. I listened to the reviews and sized up from a 2 to a 4 and I'm so glad I did. The dress fit like a glove. The detail was beautiful and I felt gorgeous. I didn't want to take it off. My husband was super impressed by the quality too.

links_reviews_title: This was for my grandmother's 103rd birthday.
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this dress. So many compliments!

I rented this to officiate a friend's steampunk seaside wedding. The design wasn't what I eventually went for during the event, but it fit me wonderfully. I wore it for the rehearsal dinner and got so many compliments both of the family and restaurant staff. I have another edgey event to go to and kept it for that, then decided that it fits so nicely and would work in a fun cases, so I ended up purchasing it. It was my first purchase on RtR!

links_reviews_title: The style of the dress was gorgeous and so unique!
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect, very true to size for me. I loved the style, design, lace embellishing and pretty much everything about it!!
I'm nursing so I had to size up for it to zip but it was bunchy is a couple other spots. So comfortable and flattering.
Fit great, especially good for shorter girls. Got so many compliments
This fits very snug but is really flattering.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress. Fit like a glove
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, expected look. Gorgeous
Loved this dress. Very easy to wear. I am in between a 10 and 12 and the 12 fit great. Did not need to wear a bra, which is always a plus in my book

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: Fit great! I have a large chest and am short, so finding a formal dress that fits without having to make any alterations is usually a challenge. I usually wear a 10, but needed the 12 to zip all the way up in the back. Got a ton of compliments all night and felt awesome. Was easy to dance and move around in as well, probably because I had a little extra room in the bottom half.

links_reviews_title: My sister and i showed up to the same event in this dress
links_reviews_text: My sister and i showed up to the same event in this RTR dress on accident LOL -- it ran a little bit small, it barely fit me. It wasn't the most flattering or my favorite... but i still wore it
This dress is beautiful! It does fit slightly smaller so I would recommend going up a size. I received so many compliments the entire night. It was comfortable and perfect for the occasion.

links_reviews_title: I loved being able to wear a fashion statement dress without breaking the bank
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly
I really loved the details in this dress. The slip underneath does not stretch ... so I would suggest sizing up if you are between a 4 and 6.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to an "emo prom" in NYC and got tons of compliments! My date loved it!
links_reviews_text: The zipper caught the first time I tried to put it on but then it was fine. I usually go between a 2-4, and the 4 ended up being the ticket. If you tend to go between sizes, I would go with the larger.

links_reviews_title: Great for a work event 20's party, covered up but still cute!
links_reviews_text: Slim fitting but good coverage! Loved the lace and neckline- flattering and great for taller girls

the dress is very fitted with not too much stretch through the hips. If you've got curves definitely size up! this dress would be great for an intimate event where the details of the lace and ruffles can truly be appreciated. Felt a little goth, but in a grown up fashionable Wednesday Adams kinda way. I'm trying to find looks for a busy month of events ahead and this one will definitely be on my short list!
This dress is a real show stopper - formal, chic & great quality. I wore it to the Magic Castle in LA. The fit is a bit tight so I'd size up if you're in between sizes.
Fit perfectly. True to size. We perfect length. Would have worn with strapy sandals but it was snowing!

links_reviews_title: This dress looks even more amazing on!!! I usually wear a zero, but the size 4r fit great!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!
Had to order up a size from my normal size.

links_reviews_title: a great spin on a long black dress.
links_reviews_text: Amazing fit and super comfortable! Great for a non profit gala.
This is a beautiful dress and got lots of compliments all night. Rented for a wedding. Very comfy, has a little stretch so you can move and dance!
So pretty and feminine. Very flattering. Stunning really. Rides up a little on me so that the sheer stripe in the middle of the bodice isn't super visible but still looked good ...

links_reviews_title: Wore this to my husband's holiday party and liked it so much I reordered for my cousins wedding!
links_reviews_text: Dress is super flattering! Got compliments for days. The sheer lace overlay in the mid-section is subtle but sexy. Was able to wear a regular bra. If you have a large chest your cleavage might show a bit in the peephole at top.

links_reviews_title: Obsessed! The perfect mix of sweet and cute! With just a little sexy...
links_reviews_text: Material was amazing Structure of dress was amazing I was complimented each time I wore it! Great work to play look I'd buy if I could afford it!

links_reviews_title: Super cute! Made me feel like a princess at work
links_reviews_text: It was snug in the chest but fit like a glove. The sleeves were a little big on me so I wore them strapless and loved the look! Got so many compliments!

Love this dress because it accentuates your waistline while giving room in the hips with a cute poofy skirt. The chest is just low enough to be attractive but not too revealing. Super feminine and sweet and it has pockets!!!!!
I loved this dress it's super cute and fit well
This dress fit absolutely perfectly. Loved it and got tons of compliments.
3 people told me how young I looked in this dress-the ruffle sleeve, print, voluminous skirt and back cut out make this dress feel youthful!

SO I wanted this dress to be perfect, as it has a great shape, is fairly light and has pockets! It looks like it should fit an hourglass shape like a dream. The size-8 was perfect in the shoulders, chest and hips but I literally could not breathe if it were zippered; there is no give to the middle band. The size-10, which I ended up wearing, fit better in the rib cage but was large in the shoulders and skirt. I had to pin the back of the dress in order for it to fit and not move around. Overall, it was still a great rental and fit the late summer wedding theme perfectly.
This dress was perfect for a friend's wedding. I got so many compliments. Also, the dress has pockets - huge plus.
Very cute pattern, but a little bit on the poofy side. It did feel a little like "toddlers in tiaras takes on adulting".. not gunna lie!

Love the fabric. It is very structured and flows away from the body. I love this and would rent it again. It was a touch low cut for a school teacher but I wore a black cami under and it was still cute.

links_reviews_title: Cute, but barely zipped up due to a sticky zipper and tight fit around the ribcage.
links_reviews_text: The fit was pretty tight around the ribcage, but the dress overall was very flattering and cute!
Fit was great. A little fancy for work, but I got compliments on it.
This dress was almost perfect, you could see my bra from the side, but otherwise good fit, comfortable and cute. Lots of cleavage.

The zipper was a bit difficult to do, but once it was zipped up it was fine! It was super comfortable and the color was so cute. I got many compliments, even from a food delivery guy! :) And it has pockets, so you can't go wrong with that!

I rented this for a long weekend in Charleston and the fit was perfect! My only complaint is the side zipper - I’m a bit bigger in the chest and I wasn't able to zip it myself. Other than that, I loved it and would definitely rent it again.
Very cute sun dress with purple and brown pattern. 36.5" long which is right on the cusp of too short for work for me. Comfortable fabric. Pretty deep V neck.

links_reviews_title: Cute but flare doesn't work on taller girls
links_reviews_text: Loved the material and pattern. Great quality - the top part was more stiff so the ruffle area didn't droop. I am a full C and the bust fit perfectly. And it has pockets! Swoon! However since I am taller the flare came out at an odd place on me. Just didn't work. But such a cute dress.

I was excited to finally rent a Kate Spade dress! It was flattering, has pockets, was nice & lightweight on a hot summer day, and I love the ruffles. I wish there'd been a half size between the 8 & the 10, but the 8 worked fine. Would rent again!
The only comment is that the cutout in the back was larger then I thought. I couldn't wear a bra or wear it to work.
This dress was so cute! The size 4 fit well and was the perfect length. I got tons of compliments and will definitely be renting it again!

I loved this dress! It was so classy, fun, and flirty. Great for a wedding guest. The only thing was the fabric around the rib cage was pretty snug. I stayed with the 2 because there wasn't a 4 available. I'm in between those two sizes so I would say it runs true to size. Beautiful tailored fabric with stunning pleats! I would highly recommend!
Beautiful dress - little tight around rib cage. But very flattering and comfortable
It fit perfectly when I got it two weeks before the event. Then stress and hormones kicked in and let's say it fit a bit snug. The pockets were a bonus touch

links_reviews_title: No bra needed and very supportive!
links_reviews_text: This was a backup dress sent to me after a RTR mistake and I loved it!! I didn't have to wear a bra and felt supported all day and night and through hours of dancing! It was very flattering and also had pockets that were fun for pics. Would definitely recommend. It fit true to size!
Got this for the US Open golf tourney! It was so bright, cute, and classic! I got so many compliments, and it was the perfect length (I'm 5'10).
I could live in this gorgeous dress! I got so many compliments and felt so comfortable in this amazingly crafted frock! I was sad to send it back!

The waist was true to size and form fitting! I loved this dress and would purchase it! I wore it 3 times in the month and got a ton of compliments. I wore for an awards dinner, date, and rehearsal dinner.
I felt sophisticated and pretty in this Kate Spade dress. I went some places too and people knew what it was! It's a very flattering shape!
I loved the pockets and it was FUN! Great color, fit, style, and flirty.

This dress appears to be a "dress next door" at first glance, though don't be fooled, the dress fit and flare is flirty, fun and glam! It's also flattering to curves. I love it, and wish I could buy it.
Kate Spade dresses seem to fit me like a glove. This was no exception. Wore it on Mother's Day for church and to a show and I felt beautiful the whole day. Would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: I usually love Kate Spade but this was a no.
links_reviews_text: I usually LOVE KS dresses. I've bought two from RTR. This one was just off the mark by quite a bit. Too big, too long, too stiff. The keyhole in the back was perfectly placed to show my bra. A little higher or lower and I could've worn a normal bra with it. Strange snaps I couldn't figure out in the shoulders. I thought they were maybe to hold your bra in place and not show but didn't really work for that either. Mystery snaps. It was also somehow a tad frumpy and a bit childish at the same time.

This is my favorite RTR piece yet! It fit perfectly and I loved the ruffles, back detail, full skirt and the pockets. The fabric is thick and it's made really well. It's somewhat low cut in the front, and there were times I had to adjust it to keep it appropriate for work. I think I'll be renting this one again!!

This dress has a retro feel with the fit and flare look. Stiff cotton material that defines the waist well. The top was a tad big on me. Need to wear a cami underneath. It fit perfectly in the waist so there was no way I could have sized up. Love the pockets too.
Love this dress! So comfortable and very flattering! It is a bit tight in the rib cage area though. Would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: Wish I could keep this forever
links_reviews_text: Love love love this dress! The fit and pattern were so flattering and the material was perfect for dressing up or down. Just enough cleavage to be hot but not worried about a wardrobe malfunction and length made it acceptable for a family event. Only criticism is that the placement of the zipper was a little strange and hard to do by yourself. Rent this, you'll be obsessed.
While I like Kate spade, the material of this dress did not work well. It flared out at the waist making the waist appear much larger than needed. The fabric is very stiff and does not flow.

links_reviews_title: Wonderful dress! Super cute and fashionable
links_reviews_text: The side zipper is tough - so I had to order a size up so I didnt pinch my skin! The bigger size fit perfectly!
Loved the cut and pattern but it was too small.
The dress was a little snug but worked out great. I got lots of compliments at work.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous detail on top, tiny waist!
links_reviews_text: I cannot stop looking at the top and all the detail. If you are a lace girl, this dress is for you. It also gave me a tiny waist! The only let down was the bottom half seemed to be for a less formal affair, so I didn't end up wearing it. Fantastic dress though, & my first Marchesa dress on my body. A dream come true!!!

links_reviews_title: This brand is my wedding go-to!
links_reviews_text: Fit is so great! I am btwn a 2-4 but I always go with 4 for MN dresses. No bra needed- just some pasties.

links_reviews_title: I would wear this as my wedding dress fr
links_reviews_text: Actually the most gorgeous thing I've ever put on my body. I only wish that it came in a 00P but I was able to adjust the back of the dress so it would fit better. It was perfect!

links_reviews_title: The details of this dress is beautiful!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress. It was perfect for my friend's black-tie wedding! I received many compliments and it is definitely a show-stopper. However, there were times throughout the night that I felt uncomfortable. My arms and chest were a little restricted. I definitely could have used a size up for comfort! Other than that, it was perfect!

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a gala to raise scholarship money for high school students.
links_reviews_text: Overall I loved the dress; it was classy and chic. I am 5'3" so I wore the dress longer than what's shown on the RTR model photo. However, I loved the longer length. It did not drag the floor and ended up being a "perfect" length. The fit was spot on, but the range of motion in my arms was slightly limited mostly due to the lace detail around the arms. This was not a major issue

Ended up going with my backup dress because the event was a little less formal. This dress is absolutely amazing though. Photos really don't do it justice, I highly recommend if you're looking for something unique!

This dress was very flattering and I received many compliments! It's different than what most wear, which I loved. My only complaint is I felt a bit restricted in my arms - I do have broader shoulders than most so it's likely my own issue. And I always struggle renting a dress short enough, this was perfect!

links_reviews_title: How many compliments I received was nice!!!
links_reviews_text: Wish the fit were a little bit tighter around my frame but still was a very nice fit. The length was absolutely perfect and the coloring was changing depending on the lighting (it was gorgeous). Darker lighting was a midnight blue but changed to a purplish navy in direct or soft lighting; absolutely fascinating. Almost everyone noticed when I came into the room and was receiving compliments throughout my whole presence in the event.

links_reviews_title: Perfect and unique for an art museum fund raiser
links_reviews_text: I was skeptical about this dress because of the lack of reviews and full availability of sizes around the holidays, but it was PERFECT. I wore it to a black tie fundraiser for an art museum. Im 5'4" and wore 3" heels and the length was much longer on me than the model, but not too long. The lace is unique and definitely a show stopper. The only negative part was it was difficult to raise my arms because of how tight the sleeves were, but the comfort was 100% there! I did have to wear a sticky bra, so might not work for bustier girls. I wore the earrings they suggested with it and they were perfect.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments, lots of fun
links_reviews_text: Unique and unforgettable - it isn't great for serious dance moves though as there isn't any give

The dress fit great. It was such a fun get away from all the regular teepee style maternity options out there. I got a ton of compliments on it! My only criticism is that the top sheer layer is very sheer and I wish it had been a little darker.

links_reviews_title: Such a comfortable dress! I received many compliments on it. So chic! Love it!
links_reviews_text: Super fitting, I wouldn't recommend wearing this on a cold winter night though!

links_reviews_title: I felt great in this dress!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a gatsby party/vow renewal. It was perfect and I got so many compliments because it was unique, unlike the typical flapper style dress most wore. It was also comfortable and very flattering. I could see that for some it might be a little restricting in the arms and hard to dance in, but I didn't have a problem. I would definitely rent it again.
Didn't wear to the event but would order again in a larger size.
Amazing dress, fit perfectly, floor length I got so many compliments.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress but was unable to wear it because it was too small.
links_reviews_text: beautiful color and detail
Wore this for my sister's rehearsal dinner, also to work and a few other days. Beautiful pattern and I love a great wrap dress.
The fit was perfect!
This was a beautiful, comfortable and flattering dress. Because it's a wrap dress the front is very open. I wore a black slip dress for coverage

Rented for a tropical relaxed wedding and it was perfect! Super comfortable and lightweight; I got lots of compliments from guests and the bride on the print. Will definitely rent this dress again; it was super fun to wear!

I was excited bc this dress has a fun print and stellar reviews, but it fell flat for me. It actually felt very plain and modest, which was good for wearing to work and drinks, but it didn't wow me. I also felt that the waist of the dress was lower than my natural waist and I likely could have sized down (I was nervous because wrap dresses need to have a little extra coverage but I actually felt more nervous swimming in fabric.)
Loved the Dress, But has a Busty women I had to add a tank under to cover my breast. I loved the flow and ease of the dress.
Originally my backup but the other one I ordered was too small. So glad I went with this one, I got so many compliments, even from the photographer!

I wouldn't recommend this for people with larger than DD busts. I'm a 36H, so it would probably work for most people, but the top has to be sooo open for me that I think it spoils the look of it. Obviously if I was wearing it out of the house I'd put a nice top underneath, but I still think it's overall not flattering on my body type.

Received so many compliments on this fun dress! I'm 5'10" and it hit right at my ankles. Top was low cut and I'm busty so I wore a cami underneath. Was comfortable and great for dancing! Great dress!!
Loved the way this dress fit! I am 5'5" and even with heals it was a bit long. However, I had so many compliments on it!

I had read the reviews about this dress being super low cut before renting it and decided to go for it anyway because occasionally I like an extremely low cut. I rented it for my honeymoon in Europe and definitely didn't mind the cleavage as much as I minded the bottom half flying open in the slightest breeze. Only wore it once to dinner because it was impossible to walk down the street in without flashing the locals. Might be a good dress if you wanted something to wear over a bathing suit at the beach but pretty impossible to wear in any other situation. It's a pretty dress when you're standing still though! My husband was obsessed with it.

links_reviews_title: With I had a better photo
links_reviews_text: This might be my favorite rental of all time. Compliments abound! Wore to dinner, brunch, and the pool! Looks good with denim, leather, heels, sandals, all variety if jewelry. An absolute winner!!!
Great dress & perfect for a destination wedding in Mexico. Was very low cut, so I sized up for comfort and more coverage. Highly recommend!
I loved the design of this dress but it was very low cut. I needed to pin it. It ran a little longer than I thought but I wore some sandals that were an inch and it worked perfectly.
I rented this for a girls trip. It was large, I had to pin it everywhere!! Length was good, I wore platforms and it grazed the ground. Would definitely size down.

links_reviews_title: Worn for a Havana Nights party. Perfect for the theme.
links_reviews_text: I ended up with a 2X. It was a little big but I was able to wrap it tighter. The 1X would have been perfect but it was not available. Longer than I expected but so fun.
Cute dress. Fit works for busty girls. Breezy and comfy resort wear!

This has a bug of a weird fit on top as I have no chest, but I wore a black bralette with it and it was perfect. I love the colors and the simplicity of the cut and wrap around. Was perfect for a Panamá rooftop our last night of the trip!

This dress is so airy and light. The color looks amazing in photos! The cut is very low around the chest so I had to safety clip it to a length I was happy with. The dress is a wrap so it also can unravel with a strong breeze, although it doesn't happen often.

I loved the pattern of the dress. However, the fit could've been better. The right side of the dress at the bustline was much too large and wouldn't lay correctly. I had to use a wardrobe tape to tape it down to my skin so as to prevent a wardrobe malfunction.
Everyone loved this dress the day I wore it, people on the bus, students at middle school. Wish I could have kept it.
Wrap does leave a lot exposed so make sure to invest in fashion tape or wear a cami. Perfect with heels or flats.

The picture does this dress no justice. The Print and feel of the favorite make this the perfect transitional dress. I however could not wear it as it was cut entirely too low. The front continued to gap no matter what I did and I was nervous that it would completely expose me

I loved wearing this dress. I felt confident and received so many compliments. I ordered both the 1xl and xxlr. The xxlr fit much better in the boobs and is the one I ended up wearing. I did have to use double sided tape on the bust to make sure everything stayed in place while dancing. I would order this dress again! So fun and flattering for my body type!
Well fitted, form flattering ... perfect length with heels or flats

Wore this to a friends wedding. The print and quality is excellent. I was so comfortable in it even when the temperatures were from 70 to 58 or so degrees. I'm 5'11" and the length was good in flats for me.

I rented this dress for one evening of a multi-day Indian wedding. I felt great and felt it was festive enough among the beautiful saris. I did have to pin the neckline to prevent too much cleavage. And the dress was a bit too long. But I would definitely recommend!
I loved this dress, especially the fabric, the colors and the fun slit. The bust was huge though and needed to be pinned.

links_reviews_title: Great casual dress for baby shower/brunch etc
