links_reviews_text: Overall I liked this dress, it is flattering and yes lots of compliments. Lost a star b/c the insides of the sleeves do not have any pattern, so if your arm was in certain positions you could see that, I think that makes things look cheap....not a deal breaker but if you are a detail nut like I am worth noting. I also sized up a size, I tend to find with wrap dresses if you just get it large enough then you don't have any issue of it flying open b/c there is so much material....because its a wrap dress I could just pull the top part tighter so it stayed closed.
Loved this. Fit well and very comfortable.
There was only one size available for this dress and luckily it fit! I got so many compliments and the fit was perfect. I am 4 months postpartum and it made me feel skinny!

I haven't wore a lot of wrap dresses so I was a little surprised to find that it wanted to blow open in the wind and I nearly flashed a lot of people! I wore it with a tank top as it's a little small in the check area if you don't want a lot of cleavage but probably should have worn with a full length slip. I loved everything about the colors in this dress. So many compliments!
This dress is a true showstopper. The pattern is very eye-catching, and it's perfectly cut to be subtly sexy.
A little long and careful on a windy day as the wrap can definitely expose the nether region. I had to safety pin the top to decrease the deep V. Otherwise super lovely dress
lovely dress. recommend wearing it with heals. I wore it bra-less, it was a little loose but it worked.

I almost don't want to give this dress such a great review because I'm afraid it will always be sold out and I definitely want to rent it again! I can't tell you how many compliments I received on it. Total strangers came up to me and said they had to tell me how great I looked in it! It's a really stunning dress. Just be careful that you wear something underneath because the top can pucker away from your body and show your bra.

Material: light, incredibly comfortable, high quality with liner. Fit: long, just off the ground with heels, deep V, for professional event I had to tape down the neckline and make it more shallow. Summary: I loved this dress, best I've rented, it's beautiful and effortless

I couldn't wear this as the fabric gaped wide open at chest...and there wasn't enough fabric to pin it closed either. Maybe it would work for someone with a much smaller ribcage than me. I'm 5ft 7 and it dragged on the ground in bare feet. It's a shame it didn't fit me as it's a lovely dress.

I'm generally a size 10, but had to size up from a L to an XL to fit my large chest (36 F). The dress was super comfortable and easy to wear. I pinned the top to make sure I didn't pop out. The fabric is also nice... it is light and airy, so although it is long, it was very wearable on a hot day. I received several complaints.

links_reviews_title: The Perfect Dress for Cinco De Derby
links_reviews_text: Super feminine and fun to wear with lovely, rich, and somewhat unusual colors. The XXL was too tight in the bust and the 1XR too loose, so I fought a bit of rogue cleav for the day, but what are you going to do? Silky fabric and stunning flow - perfect for a summertime soiree!
I wore this on a recent trip to Mexico City. It was vibrant and really fun in person. Definitely a stand out! I found it ran large (and I'm 5 months pregnant) and looked best styled on one shoulder.
Loved the color on this top. Would rent again in a heartbeat. Fit was perfect, really enjoyed the off the shoulder style.

links_reviews_title: Took a piece of my heart with it when I sent it back. I'm obsessed.
links_reviews_text: I loved this top from the moment it came out of the bag!! It was one of the most fun and unique items I've rented through unlimited. Loose fitting and breathable, comfortable, and bold! While it was a hit or miss in photos (depending on angle), I felt amazing in it!! Wore to the Ariana Grande concert!

My favorite rental ever (and I am a RTR frequent flyer!) Would have bought this vibrant, delightful blouse if it weren't so expensive and if I hadn't worn it to every imaginable event! Love, love, love! You will for sure stand out on a crowd!
What a fun blouse to dress up a pair of skinny jeans or shorts. Very fun and flattering
Cute cute cute ! Sleeves have a little more puff than I thought but no matter! Fits great. The material is a lighter cotton. Got a complement as soon as I got in an Uber !! Yes

links_reviews_title: Fun top to wear in Mexico!
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were really large but it was a fun top for vacation. The colors were a bit worn and not as bright as I expected.
Fun statement top goes great with jeans. Perfect for dancing or enjoying margaritas! My favorite colors! Many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great bold colors and cute fit
links_reviews_text: Fits well and stays off the shoulders with the elastic. It can creep up a bit at the bottom but not so often that it's annoying.

links_reviews_title: It was just a regular day
links_reviews_text: Fit was cute. Very unique.
Fun top, fit TTS. The shoulders and bottom of the top stayed in place easily and did not ride up or down.
I thought it might be silk or rayon and flowy. But it's cotton and just really poofy. Sent it right back
Runs large. Size down 1. So I wore this on 3 occasions. Once to the Century City mall in LA. I literally had 7 people stop me to ask about this blouse in one day. Memorable !
Arms are very large. Order one size down bc it's super stretchy and a comfy fit
Fit was super flattering, really adaptable, easy to accessorize and a jacket fit perfectly over it. Wore it 3x and would rent again

I wanted to love this dress, but it was just ok. I thought the fabric and layering were gorgeous, but the fit wasn't super flattering. It was loose in the chest and waist, and the straps were just a little too long so that the top rolled at times. I still wore it for a shower, but I wasn't wowed
Confortable and very flattering

When I think of the perfect summer, spring or fall dress, I think of this dress. It was sexy, feminine, romantic, and trendy all at once. This is the kind of dress you could wear with heeled summer sandals, fresh sneakers, or a leather motorbike jacket and boots. THE OUTFITS ARE ENDLESS *inserts flaming Elmo GIF*
Flattering fit, easy style, interesting design, and the compliments just kept coming!
I wore this with a denim jacket and chunkier shoes to dress it down. The skinny spaghetti straps really made the dress and they don't dig into your shoulders.
love the thin straps and flirty details

links_reviews_title: I Wish the Underskirt Was A Different Color
links_reviews_text: This was a very pretty and comfortable dress but there is an under layer in a beige material. On one side on top and part way around the back, there is no fabric covering it. It looks like something is missing. The front falls in a handkerchief style and the under layer shows straight across the middle. It looks like you are wearing a slip that is too long. If this was a darker color taken from the pattern on the dress, it would be lovely.
I'm Between a size 2 and 4 and wore the size 2. It wasn't flattering at all.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but didn't work for me.
links_reviews_text: Straps too big. Too much material in body. Unflattering for athletic frame.

This is a super comfortable dress, some could easily wear this without a bra as the top is lined and a little fitted. The fabric strips are an interesting look and the print is very pretty. The shape of it overall isn't that flattering; it's pretty loose and doesn't show off a figure. That said, I still found it very comfortable to wear going out with friends.

The dress was pretty, but the attempt to be edgy fell short. The areas where there were no ruffles looked like a mistake more than a style, especially in the back. Wore it with a light cardigan so it looked ok but won't rent again.

links_reviews_title: As comfortable as a silk night gown!
links_reviews_text: This dress is extremely light and comfortable. I wore it many times in the hot Virginia summer heat!
Loved wearing this, but wish it was a bit shorter. Wore it over a white t shirt and paired with sneakers. Got many admiring looks!

I think the quality of the dress is beautiful but it wasn't my favorite. It was a little snug around my hips but loose on my bust. It was also oddly long on me but I am short. Overall it's a really pretty dress but would probably look best on someone tell and slender.

I loved everything about this dress! The fit, fabric and pop of color. Great summer dress. The straps are adjustable which is great for my small chest. I normally have trouble with such large necklines. This stayed in place and showed nothing even when I bent over. There is stretch in the waist for all day comfort.

links_reviews_title: Got a lot of compliments on this dress
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly
Good fit overall
Very comfortable and pairs well with a navy jacket for work
Very comfy dress and pretty. Love the pockets, got many compliments

I wore this to a beach party and loved it. It's super comfy and lightweight. I loved the pockets too! Lots of compliments. Only problem is that with the wind and the dress it kept blowing up which made me feel very uncomfortable. My friend let me use her DressWeights though - such a life savior. They keep dress hems down on windy days and are reusable. I have to buy her a new set but definitely work it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an outdoor baby shower, super comfortable and fun!
links_reviews_text: I decided to size down like all the reviews were saying and Im so glad I did. I worn an 8 when I am usually a 12. This dress looks good on short people too! I have always strayed away from Midi's because im not the tallest but im obsessed with this dress. It is so comfortable and super cute with the colors and design. Hides the tummy perfectly too! Wish I owned it.
This dress was very comfortable and cute. It is a little big overall, but probably not worth sizing down. Definitely perfect for a summer picnic!

I wore it to church with a jacket and a low wedge heel. Would have also looked cute with flip flops or a fancier heel. The waist was an elastic, so it did stretch a little. I'm normally an 8 in dresses. Based on the reviews, I sized down and the 6 was a perfect fit. I liked the little ruffle on the bust, I thought this dress was very sweet. I would rent it again.

I wore this to a graduation. The flap over the chest looked a little weird but I used a safety pin to pin it down and it ended up looking fine. It did make me look a little hippy but other than that it was very cute. Recommend sizing down.
The dress fits very nicely, and is the perfect summer dress. It can be dressed up with heels or down with flats.

I love this dress on other people. On short people, negative. It does run very big too. Maybe, maybe I could have pulled it off if I sized down a lot. I just don't think that length was doing me any favors.

Wore this to a winery event. Had great coloring and the vertical stripes were flattering. I had to wear a strapless bra with this, and the straps worked well even though I'm on the shorter side. Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Not great for show torsos. Didn't wear.
links_reviews_text: I didn't wear this dress. I have a larger chest and a short torso. This dress was not flattering on my body type. I'm 5'6" and the dress was a little longer than expected, too. It just wasn't right for me.

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable + received lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable and received lots of compliments. Wore to a day after wedding brunch. #weddingbrunch #summerdress

Loved this dress. Perfect for anyone who has a smaller chest. No need for a bra either! It was the perfect combination of almost seersucker and big eyelet lace that knocked it out of the park for an Annapolis, MD wedding. Will be renting again in the future!!

links_reviews_title: Fun dress - tons of compliments - but won't make you look skinny
links_reviews_text: I thought this dress was very cute ass I guess others did because I got a lot of compliments. However due to the type of material and cut I don't think it makes you look any thinner. Perhaps add a few pounds but I understand that could be more of the cut

links_reviews_title: Super cute and comfy. I was 15wks preggo and the elastic waistband was a really nice surprise.
links_reviews_text: True to size. The straps lay right where bra straps are so you can wear a normal bra which is good. Lots of compliments. Would for sure order again.
I absolutely love this dress! I wore it to wine country on a beautiful day and got lots of compliments. Would rent again!

Where are my fellow shorties? Being 5'1", adjustable straps are my friend. I am petite and often these types of dresses are too low - this is perfect for everyone as you could adjust. Would recommend for someone with a smaller bust.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress- wore it to a baby shower, brunch, and also to work, very versatile!
links_reviews_text: Great fit with adjustable straps
This dress is so cute! The eyelets in different colors are beautiful. It fit great too and was quite flattering! Awesome dress!
Perfect for hot ny summer day. Fits perfectly. Unique colors and pattern. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. The eyelets are super cute and dress is fun and flirty. Length was great!
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Top was fine. Loved that the straps were adjustable.
Loved this dress. Wore it on a super hot summer day. It was perfect while we were out and about at different breweries. Loads of compliments.
Great dress- very comfortable and flattering
Kind of resembled a muumuu. Lots of fabric.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful eyelet summer dress and paired with jean jacket
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments --again great for 1st tri to hide the belly. Well made and comfortable!
Fit well but Rubbed a little under the arms.
Elastic on waist so very comfy

links_reviews_title: Casual style, dress up or down
links_reviews_text: A little spacious in the top. Would have preferred a size 4. Really cute nonetheless, wore several times. Pockets!
Cute dress and would have been a good Option for an afternoon party or day drinking but wasn't super exciting for an evening date/party. Runs a little big so size down if between sizes!
Loved this dress. Easy and breezy.
This dress was adorable and I got tons of compliments! Very flow fitting in the breast area, but overall I enjoyed wearing this.
true to size. made me look busty which I'm not.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress for garden tea charity event
links_reviews_text: Good fit - runs big so size down.

links_reviews_title: It's the perfect fit such great quality
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a brand session for my blog.

I remember when Shoshanna first started designing and how her emphasis, at least at the time, was to make garments that not just accommodated but also supported the bustier woman. Not since I was 15 have I considered not wearing a bra with a dress and, despite the size of the girls, I may just be ready to try it again with this dress. Length on me is perfect-- short enough to be cute but not too short as to have to worry when sitting or walking up stairs. The colored eyelets are adorable.
This dress has a nice relaxed vibe. The weight of the fabric is enough that it is not see-through, but it is lightweight and flowy. The fit worked great for me, and I love that it has pockets.
Very cute in the picture but unflattering on.

I typically need to size up for my chest which made the rest of the dress a little looser and longer than I would have liked. The material is heavy and the zipper is so small which made it really tough to zip up. I did not end up wearing it because I did not love the fit and the event was cancelled.
Beautiful! Fit well!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for girls with curves! So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Large on top - hard to figure out how to not get sleeves to fall.

I wore this dress to two events today and received many compliments! Very figure flattering, and no need for any shape wear. It's like this dress had built in Spanx! Highly recommend, and true to size :)

This dress fit perfectly! I am usually a 0 in dresses off the rack, and that's what I ordered in this dress. It was a little hard to zip even though there was enough room, but I eventually got it. Very flattering and body-hugging

links_reviews_title: This dress is amazing quality. I did not even have to wear a bra! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. I felt so comfortable in the dress. I paired it with black open toe heels. There are absolutely no cons to this dress. I did not have to wear a bra which is huge! Highly recommended!

This dress was everything! I ordered the 2R and 4R since most designer dresses run small. The 2 was perfect. It fits like a glove, but it was still easy to dance and have a grand time. The lace overlay looks fabulous in photos. It was perfect for the wedding. I didn't want to take it off or give it back :) I would rent again!
Got so many compliments all night!! This experience made it easier than going to any store searching for that perfect dress. Highly recommend!!

Amazing dress! Fit like a glove. Received tons of compliments. Only negative is that it is difficult to go to the restroom. The zipper is hard to get up and down...other than that I would highly recommend!
Got a billion compliments when I wore this to a wedding! So flattering and classy! Def recommend!!

Loved this dress for my senior formal at college. I almost didn't wear it but I'm so happy I did! I'm usually a 6 or an 8 and this was a 10 so the sizing was a bit funny, I could have done the 8 I think but the 10 was available and definitely worked!

I received no less than 15 complements on this dress. It hugged my body perfectly, and the boning for cinching the waist. The lining around the shoulders did show, and some tried to help fix it. That was the only con of this dress. Also, a part of the boning was sticking out of one area, and I think that it from multiple wears of my dress. Otherwise, this is a great dress and should be considered for your formal event.
Fit well. Length was full for me since I'm petite. Recieved many compliments.
Incredibly comfortable! Loved the fit and shape.

This is maybe the best dress I have ever worn to anything ever! I loved how it fitted and the gorgeous details. I received compliments all night long. Some have complained about the lining material on the sleeves showing but I used double sided fashion tape in between the lace and lining to hold it in place and it worked perfectly. I was hesitant on how to rate the size. The 8 was perfect but I probably could have squeezed into a 6. Since my normal size is a 6 I rated as runs small.
I ordered this dress for a photoshoot and it came out beautifully. The built in corset did make me have to wear the 6 instead of the 4.

I love this dress! I got tons of compliments, and I loved that it looked just as pretty in pictures as it did in person. I sized up because the zipper on the smaller size wasn't working smoothly, but other than that it was perfect. I am short and this style still fit as I felt it should. It was extremely comfortable too, I would recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress is beautiful and I felt like a goddess! It runs extremely small
links_reviews_text: I went to a gala and rented a few dresses from RTR... I decided last minute to go with this one because I LOVED it from the beginning. My only concern was that it was not very comfortable for me. It was extremely tight.. runs very small. I am usually an 8 and I couldn't even get it over my hips. My sister who is a size 4 fit into the size 8. This is a beautiful dress and received so many compliments all night but it was very tight on me and I had issues with the zipper. Otherwise, rent this dress! Just size up maybe 1 or 2 sizes!

I have admired this dress for so long! With the black Friday discount, it was within budget reach. It was as amazing as I thought it would be! Looked so great, felt relatively comfortable, and got tons of compliments! Highly recommend, and will be renting again!

links_reviews_title: I rented this for my engagement shoot and loved it. It's fabulous and I didn't want to take it off!
links_reviews_text: This dress fits true to size. Be aware of the slit in the back. Also, I had to safety pin the sleeves to the elastic bands because they would not stop falling down and showing the lining, but no big deal! It's a show stopper!
Has a corseted fit so feels a little snug on ribs but not to the point that is uncomfortable. Danced the night away in this dress!

The Good: This is a stunning dress and fit perfectly. I wore it to a Decades-themed party and it was a great choice. I got tons of compliments on it. The Bad: my specific dress had some of the boning poking through the stitching. The ends are sharp, so it was seriously uncomfortable and I had marks all over my rib cage from it scratching me. I ended up putting some fashion tape over where the boning was coming out to cushion it and that helped, but was still uncomfortable.

This dress was perfect for a black tie wedding. Tons of compliments all night. The lining at the arms rolls over and is a little annoying but didn't take away from the dress. The boning makes for a perfect fit. It runs a tad large but the next size down would have been too tight. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Great fit! And so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress fit well, there is a corset/bodice built into it. Flowy, off the shoulder arms of the dress were comfortable. Appropriate for work party, no cleavage even with a larger bust, very classy!

I usually wear a 10-12, and I'm so glad I was able to get a second size for free. I ordered a 12&14 and ended up wearing the 14. There's no way I could have fit into the 12 with my pear/hourglass shape. There wasn't enough stretch to accommodate my lovely lady hump ;-). The 14 was even a squeeze, and I had to put it on over my head. But once it was on... bombshell! Loved it, loved the experience, will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a destination wedding
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect for a destination wedding in Colombia. The fit is true to size. I was concerned about my chest (since I'm a 38DD) but it was perfect. It was very comfortable and had some boning inside which helped give a slimmer illusion. I wore a strapless bra and spanx thigh shapers. My only complaint is the zipper was temperamental and the dress had some signs of wear. Either way it was perfect for the occasion.

Like mentioned in other reviews the lining in the arms is annoying. I tried fashion tape but nothing worked. It's really pretty though. I am 5'4" 139lbs with a curvy body style. I went with the 6 because I have a " booty" and fit better through hips.

This dress is stunning!!! The details are even more beautiful in person. I am a 2R in most things and could have sized down in this dress. It is comfortable and easy to dance in. The tan part at the sleeves does show, and I tried fabric tape but ended up taking it off and just letting the fabric show. The dress is stunning regardless! Endless compliments and people asking where the dress was from. Do yourself a favor and RENT THIS DRESS!

links_reviews_title: Classy dress with a modern twist
links_reviews_text: Elegant dress perfect for any formal evening. I love the lace detail and certainly stands out from the generic crowd. Dress was very comfortable and the off the shoulder was not restricting at all.

links_reviews_title: This was my first RTR experience and everything went perfectly smooth. Great quality and timely.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. It is gorgeous and classy. I think the dress fit was true to size, maybe slightly large. I am generally a 2-4, and the 2 fit perfect. For reference, I am 5'1" about 120-125lbs. Definitely will receive compliments on this beauty.
This dress was great wore it to a black tie gala event. It fit great I wore an 8R. Was not too tight or too big. Got lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: So much love for this dress!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress. So flattering, good fit with some stretch. Nice ribbing for shape, but not so much it hurt. Tons of compliments at the wedding I attending. I want to own it!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that is super flattering!!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress from the moment I tried it on! I love the off the shoulder look and received compliments all night long on it. The only reason I give it 4 stars is because as others have said, the nude part of the off the shoulder straps would not tuck away and it really did annoy me but other than that I really did love tbis dress and felt absolutely beautiful in it!!

Can't say enough about this dress. Total show stopper. Very comfortable, received many compliments. Perfect for a black tie wedding. I wore the 2 as opposed to the 4 because it fit better - wasn't too tight. (I didn't even try the 4 on because the 2 fit great) However I have to agree with many of the other reviews that the beige liner inside the dress was turning out on the arms. This was annoying as it's an expensive dress. Tacking with clothes pins was not that easy but we made it work.

links_reviews_title: Showstopper!! But beware of the zipper!!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a black tie high school reunion/fundraiser and absolutely loved it --once I was able to zip it. I'm a 12 normally but I ordered the 14 as a backup and I'm so happy I did! The 12 was wayyy too tight to be comfortable in and the 14 was easier to move in. BUT the zipper. The zipper would not budge over the middle after an hour of trying I had two friends working on it and they were finally able to get it. The dress fit me but the zipper with the lace isn't a good combo. I loved the dress and got compliments all night but I was really frustrated that such a nice dress had such a horrible zipper

links_reviews_title: Most Comfortable, Elegant dress I've ever worn!
links_reviews_text: I could not believe how comfortable this dress was to wear! I had it on for 6+ hours and received a TON of compliments on it. The drop sleeves were not too tight and the body of the dress allowed my body to move and not feel constricted. I usually wear a size 4 in dresses due to my long torso, but I wore the size 2 in this dress, and I felt it hit me in all the right places. I'm 5'8 though, so this may not be recommended for petite woman.

The fit of this dress was comfortable for the most part. The only part that bothered me was the arms, the sleeves had elastic so they were a bit tight. Beauty is pain they say. I would rent this dress again because it was comfortable to dance and sit in. I loved it! I felt like I was wearing it somewhere in Spain!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress!!! It was so sexy but still classy and appropriate.
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly! Flattering, comfortable, and great length. Totally what I hoped for!

VAVAVOOM! I got so many compliments in this dress and felt super sexy. I could have gone a size down, there's decent stretch through the hips, but I was very comfortable the entire night. Some folks mention the nude lining, it's definitely a bit of an issue but I somehow got it to hide after some strategic tugging and tucking.

links_reviews_title: The lace detail and slit up the back
links_reviews_text: I'm typically a 6 but wore the 4 - gorgeous and very flattering dress - received many compliments
This fit amazing as an XL at 27 weeks pregnant, I'm not even sure this is a maternity dress?! But by sizing up two it fit perfectly around my bump! The slits were cute and sexy, not too high.
The dress was wonderful. Could wear with or without a bra, depending on your preference. If you're a little shorter like me I would suggest heels or hem tape. Would absolutely rent again
Looks casual but fits formally! Great quality! Highly recommend!
Great fit, very flowy. Came with a ton of wrinkles but easy to iron.

links_reviews_title: I really enjoyed this dress. Lots of compliments and made me feel super feminine and romantic!
links_reviews_text: Fit was comfortable. Definitely a "flowy" fit!
Very sweet dress, the slits on both side made the middle panel a little awkward when walking. Nice length for a maxi for tall girls. Pretty print.
Wonderful material, very pretty pattern and flattering, received lots of complements
I loved this dress so much more than i thought I would. I received so many compliments all night. It fit like a glove and made me feel beautiful.
The fit through the bust is very good, straps stayed up. Good fit in the torso. Love the slits... very sexy in a subtle way. I'm a shorty and it was along on me so I had to pull it up to walk.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress!! Fit perfectly, even the length with heels
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress!!! It fit so perfectly everywhere. The length was perfect with heels (I'm 5'5ish). Got so many compliments. Especially loved the slit on the sides. Would def rent again!

This was so cute and forgiving for a sunny, outdoor baby shower in Baltimore. I got tons of compliments and even at 5'7" it skimmed the ground. I wore flats but could easily have gotten away with wedges.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a warm weather baby shower
links_reviews_text: Long, wore heels. Slits run high so be aware w/size of your bump. Super comfy!!! Top is stretchy material to accommodate. Wore at 36 wks

links_reviews_title: I actually rented this for my 24 year old daughter to wear to a graduation & vacation.
links_reviews_text: The material makes it dressier. My daughter added a jean jacket & made it more casual. Very beautiful! She is 5’7” and a size small.

links_reviews_title: The fabric is soft and does not feel cheap. The colors on the dress are exactly like the picture .
links_reviews_text: The dress runs a little long so you will need to wear high heels or wedges.
Very pretty dress but it just didnt look right on me

This is one of the first dresses that I've ordered and it's been spot on fitting everywhere. It's one of my favorite dresses I've ordered so far for just an everyday dress. It fit my chest perfectly and wasn't uncomfortably tight at all. The best part is because of the slits on the side it's breezy so you don't get hot at all in it!
Nice fabric and pattern. I would like to have been able to dress this down with flats but too long for that.

links_reviews_title: It was comfortable and seemed to fit TTS.
links_reviews_text: Fit well, slim through the body, great length.

links_reviews_title: Could not wear the dress as it was too small in the chest area
links_reviews_text: If you are full busted choose a size up.
I would rent this again. Fits perfectly. Fabric is great. Its definitely long so you can only wear it with heels and not flats.
Would have had trouble keeping fashion tape up to hem. It was around 3 inches too long. Gorgeous dress though and wish I could have worn. Fit everywhere else.
5'3 so was a bit long even with 3-4 inch heels. Was able to tuck it under the seam to lift it up which wasn't ideal but still looked cute/normal. Otherwise fit perfectly on the bust etc.
Fits true to size

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bridal shower and absolutely loved it I was comfortable and feminine
links_reviews_text: Flattering, was barely small in the chest but I have a bigger bust. Loved the double slit in the bottom.
A little bit long if you're petite!

links_reviews_title: Pretty, comfortable, and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I would have taken the medium but it was not available. Still a very pretty dress and flows nicely.

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for our Italian vacation!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit and length with a heel!

links_reviews_title: Was hoping to wear at a baby shower
links_reviews_text: Not cute for small chested, didn't wear!
Fits well in bodice but very, very long for a petite woman. I had to tuck it in the elastic to try to even wear it with heels.

links_reviews_title: This dress is extremely see through!
links_reviews_text: It's cute but unless you're at the beach and you're using this as a coverup this is VERY see through
Fit was fine but material is thin and somewhat see through. It showed every lump and bump and bra straps show - even if you can get away without a bar, nipples are very much on display
the fit was great everywhere but length, i love the patterns but this brand just runs really long...so if you're tall, this would be great

links_reviews_title: I didn't wind up wearing this bc of the fit
links_reviews_text: This fabric is pretty and in theory, its a great dress, but the neckline and shoulders are not flattering. It is very long. I'm 5'7 and it dragged the ground too much to wear.

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing the dress
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a graduation party. It was a bit fancy for the occasion, so I didn't end up wearing it. But the dress is cute! I love Show Me Your Mumu, but like all of their dresses, it is long so I needed to wear heels, which just added to it being too fancy. Cute dress, I would rent it again for a different occasion.
This shirt went great with the Gucci Floral theme party I was assisting with!
The material is cut so beautifully! I felt unique but not to dressed up! Definitely try, especially if your not really into patterns. It's a good one!
Wore it without a bra, really hard to zip. Super cute, especially with the Derek Lam checkered pants. But you can't relax at all in it because it is so tight if you are a size 14.

This top was adorable and so flattering!! It made my chest area look amazing and was perfect for going out with friends this spring. It does run on the smaller side in the rib cage area so I would recommend sizing up.

links_reviews_title: Great print and fun mixed materials
links_reviews_text: Pros: print, colors, hemline Cons: shoulders too wide, zipping it up I already have wide shoulders so I think this style was just not flattering for me, personally. If I was wearing something over it, like a blazer, this shirt was perfect. The print is too cute and the material feels very soft. It's daily hard to zip, but once zipped didn't feel too tight.

I loveeee this top! Very flattering and hugs in the right places! I will say if you have a bigger chest area itchy fit better bc there's space for boobs and may be a little loose if you are more flat chested! Otherwise it's a gorgeous blouse!
Deep v all day!

links_reviews_title: It was easy to be active and still look out together
links_reviews_text: Very tailored fit which I like as a curvy girl with a small waist. The bust was more revealing than I prefer. I love not worrying if my crack was showing when sitting Indian style and full range of motion with arms
Perfect for a date or ladies night out. It is super fitted but very flattering. It also arrived with a hole in the armpit but R2R sent me a replacement out immediately!

links_reviews_title: Like your tinder date....Better in person than online!
links_reviews_text: In the RTR pic this shirt looks shiny. In person it's a gorgeous, matte cotton. Such a fun winter piece to add a pop of color to the cold weather wardrobe. There's no give in the fabric. It's sexy and low cut. Runs small...had to ditch my bra and get my friend to help me zip into it lol.
Perfect for wonderful weekend wear!!

This is a very fun blouse however it does run small. That being said I accidentally rented the extra large when I should've rented the large. Normally I would wear a medium as I'm always a size 8. I wore this anyway because I like the fabric. It was a bit low cut for my body shape but I would definitely rent this again.

links_reviews_title: It's true to size UNLESS you're heavy chested!
links_reviews_text: It's pretty booby for work but I wore anyway-it's hard to put on if you don't have a small chest! So be careful if you want this top for work. Wearing something underneath like I had too doesn't look cute. It is super flattering though and goes with anything!
It runs small, but very cute design. Love it!

links_reviews_title: Cute for work and out with friends
links_reviews_text: Love the colors and the waste was cute made my chest look great.
Could have been so fun... but you are much too small... my fault, I should have read more reviews before renting!

This runs small. Rented a M the first time and then a L this time but it was damaged in the zipper area so I didnt even put it on. Super disappointed. Will try again perhaps as I'm obsessed with this top!

links_reviews_title: It is a very nice top but the top does not fit very well if you are on the bigger bra size.
links_reviews_text: Not made for bigger bra size (32DD). Also it looks like it has been around for a long time. The material was very dated.

I try to rent one thing a month that is out of my "comfort zone". This month, this shirt was it! Turns out, it's awesome. The patterns are bold, the bodice is fitted, and it's low cut. I ended up wearing a camisole underneath to make it more "daytime". Also, the floral fabric is more light weight and flowy than I thought it would be. Overall, and surprise winner!

links_reviews_title: Not made for women with boobs.
links_reviews_text: I first got this in a medium -- it was so tight I couldn't zip up the side. Then I got the large. It zipped, but was way too small in the chest. Even if you wanted to go for a lot of cleavage, the black band was halfway up my boobs instead of sitting around the waist. It looked so ridiculous I couldn't wear it. I am sure it would look great on someone with a smaller cup size but it was, sadly, an unwearable rental for me.

links_reviews_title: Not great if you have boobs.
links_reviews_text: Reviews said to size up so I did an XL and it still was pretty tight. Couldn't even zip it.

links_reviews_title: Cute top, great colors. Looks great with Jean's. My daughter loved it.
links_reviews_text: I am usually a size 10, medium on tops. Selected a large and fit just right. For reference I am 150 pounds, 5'6. - 36' 28' 42'
Ran small... normally a medium would be fine, but was tight in the wrong places around my chest

links_reviews_title: If you have B size cups and above, forget this top. I couldn’t even zip up the XL.
links_reviews_text: Runs ridiculously too small in the chest.

links_reviews_title: Cute top! Loved the mix of prints.
links_reviews_text: Good fit! Makes your waistline look smaller!
Cute fun shirt. Wore with jeans. Can mix and match fun jewelry. Would wear again.
I found this ran a bit small in the rib cage. Was super cute, tho!

links_reviews_title: Cute pattern combo could be perfect but isn't
links_reviews_text: Like other reviewers have said, this runs small. Ah, how this top could've been SO perfect! Cute mix of patterns and great shape and cool sleeves. BUT the fabric has NO stretch and it's SUPER BOOB-y!

Love this top. Super super fine cotton and beautiful pattern. I got everyone's compliment on a party. The neck line is lower than it looks like, so it's sexy. The only thing is that it's really really tight on the busy. I don't have big boots at all but it was hard to zip up the side zipper. Anyway, that wouldn't stop me to rent again. I seriously considered to buy the top! My mom loved it and asked me to buy it.
This runs really small due to the fit. If you have large breasts it is definitely snug and may show too much cleavage for everyday wear.

links_reviews_title: couldn't even get over my head.
links_reviews_text: too tight

links_reviews_title: It fit well although a little tight. Zipper needed two people.
links_reviews_text: It was a little tight and still had an odor.
This top runs small but a M was perfect.

As stated by other renters, this is smaller than the size, particularly in the chest. The rest of the top was ok - it wasn't great where the black band is, but I think that's also due to the cut and chest sizing. Otherwise, I totally would've worn it. I wanted so badly for this piece to work, but I just couldn't do it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top, I got tons of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect but it was a little difficult to zip up the side.
The top was super low cut and blousy. I couldn't make this work. You would need some gazunga-zungas to fill this baby out.

Rented this top for everyday dressier look. Material is made of breathable cotton. Print is bright and colorful--very beautiful. There is a side zip zipper that allows for easier on/off. Waist is very tailored so if you are a little thick in the middle, you might need to size up.

Unfortunately I read the reviews after this shipped. I'm a 34DD and while I could get it over my head (barely) all I could see was boobs. I have an hourglass shape and the flare on this over accentuated that. I have a small waist but this was still uncomfortably tight around my rib cage, and I got a Large! Returning without wearing outside the house.
It is very low cut, which I am find with but bags out in breast area and does not lie flat
Cute shirt but I couldn't get it over my 34D bust.

Fitted in the bust area but over all a good fit - I squeeze into it , so if you like your clothes tight your size or if you want more room, I would suggest sizing up Stunning and received a lot of compliments It's romper length- they are short so it'll be short but nothing was peeking out in the back Loved and will rent again and again
This romper was so cute! I wore it a few times while I had it & I would have bought it if it weren't for the small stain it arrived with. I'll definitely try this one again! Highly recommend!!!
Got so many compliments on this romper! Fit well, tight across the upper half, and legs were loose. Worried about flashing my behind, but did not have any instances!

links_reviews_title: Fits perfect really enhances ur curves
links_reviews_text: Loved it fit snug in all the right places

links_reviews_title: Great romper for a fun night out.
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a bachelorette party, and loved it. Super fun color and the fit was great. I went with the size 2 and it was a little loose in the bust area but overall fit fine throughout.

This romper is so fun and bright! I wore this to a concert and got a ton of compliments. I have a long torso so most rompers/jumpsuits don't fit well, but this was just right. With boning in the bodice, you could go without a bra, but I wore a strapless and had no issues with it showing. Would def rent again!

links_reviews_title: Wish I owned this signature summer piece!
links_reviews_text: Sooooooooo flattering on your legs! Don't need a bra just pasties. Super breezy in the desert heat. The neon green color is unbeatable . SUPER PHOTOGENIC. Every photo came out great!

I loved this romper! It was very easy to wear and the color is great. It does run small in the top, I did not wear a bra with it, which was fine by me but some people prefer who to wear one should size up. I loved the pockets and the flowy feel of the shorts!
I was very unsure about this romper, but have received nothing but compliments. Comfortable, cute and great color for tan skin. Would be best for those with long legs. I didn't wear any type of bra.
A bit too small, but a lot of fun. I'll try renting it again in a bigger size
Received so many compliments, glad I sized up! Top would have been to small in smaller size. Great color and has pockets

I generally liked this romper, but it wasn't my favorite. I loved the color and the neckline, but the bottom was a little billowy for my taste. The bottom also wrinkled super easily - I steamed it while I was wearing it to take pictures! The top fit a little snug (32DD) but the strapless were loose on me. At 5'2" and typically a size 6, I thought the 8 fit well but ran a little small. It was cute overall for a party, but wasn't too upset about returning it!
Loved it. Wore to Disney's Magic Kingdom. Dress is very tight and wore without a bra. Difficult to zip but worth the wear! Sizing up would be better

This romper was perfect! I wore it for a low-key, outdoor summer wedding and got so many compliments. It was so freaking comfortable, super flattering, and no bra or spanx required which is always a plus! Plus, pockets!! It’s true to size— both the 4 and the 6 fit me, but the 6 had more room around the chest area which is why I ultimately went with that one. I wish I owned this!

I wore this all day today. Super comfortable and my butt didn't hang out. Strapless bra fit well under. I looked like my normal figure in this and the color was very fun. It's only wrinkly in the photo because it was after a long day.

links_reviews_title: The neon green is the newest color trend of 2019! Makes your photos most memorable.
links_reviews_text: 5'6, 128#, 34A for reference. I'm usually a size 4 but 2 was the only available size and it fitted just perfectly. I wear it on a vacation trip with 3 other girls. I stood out from the group picture so much with this lovely sharp color.
amazing romper, it's so colorful and I got so many compliments on it! I had a great first date in this romper and it shows off your legs in such a flattering way. considering purchasing !

Was so happy to see the same romper I rented before in this color! I knew it would fit great as it did before, and it didn't disappoint. Love lime green color! Love the top front and especially back. It had some room for bigger chest, but didn't look loose on me. Love rompers that are not too short! Just right length for my height. Would wear again (maybe polka dot for next one?).

Super comfortable and a fun color. Loved it for a music festival I went to. If you have a booty watch out when you bend down! But the shorts are loose fitting but the top is fitted which I really liked. And POCKETS!!
Fun romper. True to size and very flattering. Perfect for spring and summer events. Rent it.
Comfy fabric, flattering shape, and fun beautiful color!

Got this just to test the color on me--surprisingly good! Unfortunately, I'm too short for this dress as the straps do not adjust. It was about an inch above the nip when I pulled so the straps would be on my shoulder. Couldn't wear it but it was lovely and comfortable !
Fit perfectly. Super comfortable! So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: LOVED! Extremely flattering and the color was gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Rented this romper for vacation and absolutely loved it. Only downsides are the traps are a bit baggy so I had to worry about everything falling down and the hanger straps kept popping out, but definitely nothing to hold me back from renting again! I'm a true 6, but the 4 fit (a bit tight, but a 6 wasn't available) and it runs true to size.

I love love love this romper. It's seriously one of the cutest things I've ever worn. I got tons of compliments and felt super confident wearing it. It's definitely on the short side so if that's not something you're comfortable with I wouldn't suggest getting this romper. It's also pretty tight, so that's something else to consider. I felt sexy and amazing and I wish I owned it! Will rent again 100%.
Bit too tight so I didn't wear it. Could be fun on the right person

I wore this dress to drag brunch at Palace in Miami and it was perfect for the occasion! I love the fit and it offered good support for my chest. The zipper was a little finicky but it was super cute!

While it originally arrived with a stain, I loved this dress so much I wasn't ready to give up on it. I was able to get it out at the dry cleaners, and RTR sent me an extra outfit! I wore this on a trip with friends to Mexico and got SO many compliments. The silhouette seems a little plain on the model, but is incredibly flattering in person.

links_reviews_title: Decided not to wear it, was very short in the torso area but super cute romper.
links_reviews_text: Fit everywhere but was short in the rise and torso. Just a little too uncomfortable for me. Had to send it back.
Very cute romper! Fit perfectly (snug but not too tight). Love the color. Would rent again
Fun romper that is easily dressed up or down. The only issue is the bust area is very tight. I stuck inserts from a sports bra to give some coverage.
I fluctuate between a 4-6 so I got a 6, and it was still too small. I couldn't zip up the back and it was butt cheek city. It woulda been cute had I could have zipped it.

This is a unique outfit. It's very bright and looks great if you have a tan. The fabric is a little on the thicker side but still appropriate for summer and very high quality. I found the fit around the busy & waist to be very flattering. May be tough if you have a large chest. It fights well for a romper but the legs flake out some making it almost like a skirt. I liked it but it was too fancy for my evening plans so I didn't end up wearing it. I feel like it would be great for Miami etc.
Soooo amazing! The fit was great. The pleats in the front makes it look like your stomach is flat. Def a fav!

links_reviews_title: Couldn't wear it because the bust was too small
links_reviews_text: Too small in the bust - couldn't wear it. Fit perfectly everywhere else, but the straps were too long and the cups too small
This romper is BEYOND small. I barely got it on, but then it wouldn't zip. Back in the bag it went. Sizing is super off, size up at least 1 or 2 sizes.

links_reviews_title: order up a size if you have broader shoulders or a broader full bust
links_reviews_text: did not fit at the bust size 40 C

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfortable piece. Great for weekends!
links_reviews_text: Fit amazing through the waist and accented my bust without looking cheap. Didn't ride up the back as some rompers do and the crossover straps kept them from falling.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this jumper! Amazing color.
links_reviews_text: I wore the size 8 and it fit like a glove. I normally a 6, but couldn't get the back zipped up on the size 6. I'm 5'8", 129 lbs (36,29,36). I liked that it was tight at the chest. I didn't need a bra and it gave me some cleavage. If you are larger than a C, I think you'll have a problem getting the girls in comfortably. I loved this so much I looked it up online to buy it. If it wasn't $300 it would be hanging in my closet now.
Wanted to love this but it just didn't fit right. The top was fitted on my small chest but the crotch was a tad too long and even with a booty and thighs I was swimming in the shorts.

links_reviews_title: I love never wearing the same thing twice
links_reviews_text: This dress while heavy oddly is light and I'm saying this in the middle of a Miami, and hot girl, summer. While i think the turtle neck highlights my already fat face i love the way it fits and feels. Even though it's black it shows all bumps and curves and also has no give i struggled to pull it down. Would suggest for a fall look bc material is breathable light and heavy at the same time.

links_reviews_title: Dress fit beautifully and was incredibly comfortable
links_reviews_text: The material held perfectly the entire evening

Loved this dress. Definitely is very tight especially in the arms when you first put it on but as other reviews said it loosens up throughout the day and just becomes comfy and form fitting. Very nice thick material and so elegant.
Fits snugly but with thick fabric that is fairly forgiving. Turtleneck and midi length but doesn't look old fashioned, the ruffle at bottom and sheer detail on sleeves keep it fun.
Great stretch, beautiful fabric, love the tea length (I'm 5'10"). Sleeves are a little tight but it's ok. Overall worth it.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, work party-appropriate, great for cold weather
links_reviews_text: Tight fit but still appropriate for a work party given the style of the dress. Also suitable for petites - was the perfect length for a cold winter night. Fabric is textured and matte , which reduces the formality of the length. Love this piece.

I needed something a notch dressier than your everyday work outfit and something that wouldn't be wrinkly to take out of a travel bag and put directly on and this did not disappoint. Professional and sexy for a creative office - it's very fitted (I went with the S instead of XS to keep it from looking too painted-on) but also very covered up. The quality is outstanding - very thick material that keeps its form/doesn't stretch out, several different knit patterns which are beautiful close-up, and the cut of the hemline is fantastic in how it swings around when you walk. Could literally be crumpled up in a tote bag and would look great when you put it on. Slightly itchy especially in the sleeve area (bothered the inside of my elbow a bit by the end of the day). Will show lines and bumps underneath a bit so tights or shapewear are recommended. Turtleneck is quite long/high but it can be fit more normally than the scuba-like look on the model in the picture would suggest.

This dress fit perfectly . The only issue was that the sleeves could be alittle awkward and tight because of the lace . Otherwise, this dress was amazing . I'm 5'9" and it was tea length . The material was very stretchy through the body . I felt great

links_reviews_title: Great fit but please have your undergarments in check.
links_reviews_text: The dress is amazing but it fits like a glove. Very subtle details that make the dress incredible

I loved this dress! The different lengths at the bottom, the turtleneck, I felt so classy and elegant! It's definitely form fitting, so I would recommend putting it on at least once or twice to loosen it up a bit. It is a stretchy material, but since it is pretty thick, its a little tough getting it on the first time. After I got it on it felt fine! I probably could've sized up and got a large if I wanted it to be a little easier. Since the sleeves are somewhat of a lace-like material, they don't have as much give as the dress does. Nonetheless, the 2nd time I put it on, it went on much smoother and wasn't a hassle. You'll feel amazing in this piece!
Fits true to size, very form fitted. So pretty, would def rent again.
I loved wearing this dress. Very sexy yet classy and extremely feminine. Tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Sexy and form fitting for a cool climate!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, but knit material is very constricting! I'm a true 4 and the size small was way to tight to comfortably wear. Will reorder in a medium. Skirt is gorgeous!

Wore this dress to work. My office dress code is business formal so this was a nice alternative to a suit. It felt easy to wear with black boots and gold jewelry. It was extremely comfortable which is something I think is difficult to find in terms of work attire. I received several compliments as well. This piece can also be dressed up with some more blingy jewelry and pumps. Highly recommend.

This is a definite close fit, and warm, and in my case both were welcome. The event was in a cold climate with snow on the ground, and it's fairly typical to be chilly in dresses in this climate. The tight fit has stretch and give, so this dress was like wearing couture shapewear. The long lines in the dress were great for making me appear taller instead of looking like a short person wearing a tall person's dress. Would rent this again in a heartbeat.
tough to get over head

The dress was beautiful but very tight, like wearing spanx without spanx. As a shorter woman (5'2"), it was too long on me and nearly became a ballgown. I loved it, but I would probably not order it again unless they made a shorter, petite size and I'd go a size larger.

links_reviews_title: Too long for a petite frame
links_reviews_text: It's so long even the smallest would be sweeping the floor. It might be pretty for a tall slim figure
A bit heavy and with no zipper it's awkward to get into
Beautiful dress, but was too conservative for what I needed. Perfect for the right event though!

links_reviews_title: Fab dress- very form fitting and quite sexy
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous material and interesting shape. This dress is quite form fitting - be ready.

I wanted so much to love this dress but it runs way too small. I wear a small/4 in most RTR dresses, including Temperly. but even the M was crazy tight. I think maybe it's supposed to be skin tight but it wasn't comfortable at all so I didn't end wearing.

Bummed as I had my eye on this for some time. It is really tight. I could have worn but felt that I would have been uncomfortable, especially in the arms. Material does have a lot of give. I probably should have sized up. Also with no zippers or buttons it's a workout to get on and off
Usually a 4, Ordered a medium. Was too tight, returned without wearing. Seems like a cool dress if it fits.

Wore this for a work holiday party. Perfect for winter event with the turtleneck and thick fabric. Runs small so ended up wearing in L. It did loosen some throughout the evening and was very comfortable. Paired with gold heels and the Alexis Bittar gold feather earrings. Classic, elegant and sexy all in one. May rent again!
I can't wait to wear this to the party. Stunning in every way!

Wore this to work then a holiday party and it was fabulous! I normally am a size small but sized up based on reccomendations from other reviews. It fit perfectly and was not too tight in the arms (though would definately reccomend doing hair and makeup after putting this on). Wore with nude heels and statement earrings

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress that looks great on!
links_reviews_text: Hugged in all the right places.

Very form fitting with a beautiful flattering flare at the bottom. Material held its shape nicely. Order a size up as it runs a bit small. Arms and waistline are very fitted. I may buy it! It is amazing on.
This dress was so tight! I did not wear it because it showed every dimple (or Spanx line) and the sleeves are so hard to get straight. No bueno.

Beautiful, sleek and sophisticated. You may dislocate a shoulder getting this thing on but it's totally worth it. No zipper or buttons and the head hole is tight. Do your hair and put your make-up on AFTER. I usually wear XS/S, and I wore the M. I dont know how I could possibly pull on a smaller size... Jet black textured material over the whole dress minus the sleeves, almost waffle-like pattern, but not (I couldnt see this in the pics). Length was just above the ankle.
Will rent again. High quality, made well. All I could hope for (I wore pregnant so sized up). Will definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: Nice dress. Slightly itchy. Forgiving fabric except for sleeves.
links_reviews_text: If you have thicker arms, think twice

links_reviews_title: It's figure-flattering. The material is incredible. and the design is dramatic elegance!
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove!
Truly awesome, form fitting. if you have belly you probably won't like this. really elegant and incredible dress

links_reviews_title: A great, sophisticated dress for a winter event.
links_reviews_text: I am so sad that I didn't get a shot of myself in this dress. It's SO sophisticated and gorgeous. Thick material means you won't be cold (there was a huge snowstorm the night I wore this). Pair with some kicky earrings as the dress is very simple (in the best way). Just a note that the sleeves have almost zero give.

links_reviews_title: Dress was made beautifully and showed off stylishly.
links_reviews_text: Runs a little small and must put on before you put on makeup or fix your hair as it pulls over your head. Need to wear a Spanx-type body suit under the dress. Difficulty when having to use the restroom! (sent picture separately to RTR)

links_reviews_title: OMG, this dress is fabulous!!! I wore it to 3 different events in 4 days!
links_reviews_text: This is one of the highest quality, highest style outfits I have ever worn! Its very form-fitting, which made me happy I had requested a medium as the backup, because usually I'm a small. The lines are just beautiful. If the retail price wasn't so high I would try to find it and buy it, very very special!!!

This dress is a knockout! I rented fior Paris trip. I never ended up wearing it because we ordered room service one bight after a ling day at Louvre instead if keeping a reservation. I was truly disappointed I didnt get to wear it. It fits like a glove...very body con dress with enough stretch to move. Thick, rich knit. Another winner from RTR that I eould rent again or buy! Get this dress!!!

Wore this to an awards show, sit-down dinner for work. Hugs the curves, flattering on full figures, sheer sleeves give it some sex appeal, love the thick fabric that helps to smooth everything out. Went for a minimal look, paired it with J Crew suede pumps, diamond earrings, and a colorful bag.

links_reviews_title: It wasn't my first pick but it should have been. RTR sent this to me overnight and saved the day!
links_reviews_text: Very lightweight and flowy, it was the most I've ever been complimented in a single night. The under skirt was a bit tight but I just folded it up into my spandex and it didn't even matter.
So flattering and comfy. I loved that it has a high neck so I didn't have to worry about showing cleavage. It's also the right length so I wasn't tripping over it all night.

This dress is PERFECT for a summer wedding, graduation or anything for that matter! For me, it was a wedding! Very light and breezy! And it's gorgeous when you walk! It flows behind you, and people can't help but watch you! I received many complements at the reception too! Wish I had better pictures, but the one my daughter took cut the bottom of the dress off, and the one I posted as taken by my husband...blurry! I'm 5'5 with a 36DD chest and the 12 gave me plenty of room on top. You can wear a regular bra no problem! Unf my only option was a 12L...and with 3in heels was still dragging a bit behind me. The 12R would have been much better...regardless, it's a GREAT dress, DO NOT HESITATE ON THIS ONE! I'll be looking to purchase this one!

links_reviews_title: Super cute fun print and cut
links_reviews_text: Beautiful print and cut moves beautifully. Wish I had a more formal event to wear it again. Sized up and fit great. Under skip is very short but never felt exposed.

This dress was so fun to wear. It's colorful yet romantic. I wore this to my bridal shower and had tons of compliments on it. I loved the high low look and it was light and flowy. A little snug in the chest but other than that it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, pic doesn't do it justice
links_reviews_text: I wore this in Vegas to a Cirque show. It was very pretty and my boyfriend loved it. I was self-conscious though that it was riding up in the back and I was flashing people (I wasn't) because the slip underneath had some weird bunching going on. It worked for the occasion but I doubt I'd rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Felt beautiful and comfortable all night
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. The lightweight material was perfect for the outdoor summer wedding we attended. The high low cut was also just what I needed to dance the night away. I got some many compliments on this dress throughout the night. It is so easy to accessorize, I picked a color pop earring and some bright shoes in pink, but you can pick any color from the dress. I also had the 10 as my other size and would have gone with that but it was a little tight on the ribs where the blousing detail is. I am also 5'10" and wore 2.5" heels with the long it was just above the ground. I wish I had a reason to rent this one again!

Rented for a White Party fundraiser party and got tons of compliments. Easy to wear with a regular bra, lightweight and flowy on the skirt. Definitely hides stuff on your lower half if that's concerning. I wore with gold flat sandals and it just reached the floor for the regular length and I'm 5'9".

Loved this dress!! Had a bit of trouble with the zipper halfway through but finally got it to zip up. Loved the cut, ruffles and colors. So fun and you can style this so many ways with the color scheme. Will definitely rent again next time I have a spring/summer party!
Beautiful dress. Tons of compliments. Very comfortable to be in all day and night. Easy to dress up and down
This dress was so cute and I loved the way the fabric moves. It's fit true to size. Absolutely no problems!

I absolutely loved this dress. I saw it at the RTR Topanga store. Seeing it on the hangar I didn't care to much for it. I tried it on for kicks and I fell in love with it. It's very flattering and comfortable. I got many compliments, at the award show I attended.

This flowy dress is my favorite rental so far! Got tons of compliments on it on casual Friday (lol) at work. People said I looked like I should be on a beach. I love how the fabric moves and how flattering the dress is. I would totally rent it again!

links_reviews_title: Rented for vacation, wore to a wedding!
links_reviews_text: I got this dress initially for my vacation coming up next month and wanted to have enough time to ensure the rented pieces worked (or didn't) beforehand so I could exchange if necessary. I pulled this one out and loved the rainbow of colors in it. The fit was great, and it's super light and airy! I ended up wearing it an LGBT wedding reception for which it was perfect - the brides had requested that all their guests wear white, and I loved how this worked so well into that request! I got many compliments on it, and I'm definitely holding onto this one for a while!
I really liked this dress. Pattern was lovely and the dress was really comfy. I didn't love the way it was layered as it can make you look a bit "fluffier" than you are.
Went to brunch with the family and this was a pretty and comfortable dress!
Really pretty summer dress. Wore to work and received tons of compliments. Loved the high/low aspect. I always trip over maxis so that helped me out ;).

links_reviews_title: Perfect for the occasion & very comfy
links_reviews_text: Beautiful flowy & lots of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Pretty, feminine, and flowy! This dress was made for dancing
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect. This dress is lightweight, comfortable, and just gorgeous on. I wore this to my cousins wedding in Denver. As one other reviewer noted, you could pair any color shoe with this dress. I have a pair of blue snakeskin heels and matching clutch that worked perfectly. I could have gone with either the 8 or 10, but I chose the 10 because I am a busty girl. I also could have gone without a bra, but I wore this with a sticky strapless bra because it gave me better shape. This is a great dress that can go either formal or casual dressy and was perfect for an evening wedding in June.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my niece’s graduation. I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It is a little tight around the bust area and there was a small gap in the back. Overall the dress was perfect for me and the occasion.
So adorable- colors, florals, different lengths - so many compliments & requests of where to buy! Dressed down with a jean jacket for a summer party.

I rented for a family photo shoot and it is one of my favorite rentals so far. Fit like a glove and still feminine and flowy. I'm typically a 4 but the 2 fit just a bit better so I ended up wearing that but 4 would have been fine as well. Super flattering on my small bust/pear shaped frame. A must rent!

Wore this dress to my rehearsal dinner. True to size and with wedges was a perfect length. I'm usually a 12 petite and somewhat short-waisted (so can have extra fabric in the "sleeve" area), but this dress fit well and I had no gapes in the shoulder area.

links_reviews_title: No one had a dress like it!
links_reviews_text: The dress itself was beautiful and flowy. However, it made you look bigger than you are. The worst part was that the slip underneath the dress only comes just below your bum, and constantly rides up.

I rented this for a Mother's Day Tea event and it could not have been better picked for the occasion. The dress was light to wear and very comfortable. Even though it's white, it was not see through so undergarments were easy! The only notable detail to this dress is the under layer is very short--mid-thigh max! It would have been more of a concern for me if I had my children with me because of bending over. Bottoms line, this dress was amazing for me and I'd highly recommend it for any and summer events.
I wore this for photos and you can use ANY of the colors of the rainbow as accessories. I chose red shoes. The blue would also be amazing to accessorize with.
Perfect for wedding Alittle tight in the top but not bad.
I felt like a princess in this dress. Great fit, even through bust. It's long, so I had to lift it to walk the stairs. Very pretty and feminine.

This dress is perfect for a spring formal event. The fit is great and even pretty comfortable. A little sheer, so just stick with nude undergarments :) I wore this with Gorjana tassel earrings and Rebecca Minkoff clutch - they all went so well together! I really loved the dress and it made me stand out in an event full of black or other dark-colored dresses.

I thought this dress would be amazing! I ordered the size 4 (I am between a 4-6, so 4 is usually tight-ish) and this was massive on me. Felt like it was just too much fabric in all of the wrong places for someone with hips. From the front I looked like I was wearing a tent and just much wider than I am. Would recommend sizing down!

links_reviews_title: Modest dress that I felt comfortable in
links_reviews_text: The dress fit as expected. I normally wear 6 or 8 and rented this in an 8R. I could have gone down a size, but was happy this fit a bit loosely. I would not say the dress itself was extremely flattering, the ruffles sort of hid my shape, but that could have been due to my sizing up. Overall, I was happy to feel very comfortable in this dress, but I probably would not rent again.

Wasn't in love with the print when this arrived. It looks very juvenile in person. The fit was very sophisticated though and I got a lot of compliments at the dinner I wore it to (outside, in the vineyards). The slit right up the middle of the dress, however, was a bit of a pain. Always had to hold it closed or make sure it was covered while I walked, as the slit goes right up to the goods on my 5'11" frame.

links_reviews_title: This dress was just "eh" and boring. Also was a little big. I didn't wear it.

links_reviews_text: Slip was very short and very tight. Would have constantly had to pull it down if i wore this dress.

links_reviews_title: Great for a summer wedding event!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and so comfy!
I legitimately couldn't walk anywhere without being stopped and being complimented. My boyfriend loved this dress on me and I felt so effortlessly gorgeous!

This dress is very pretty. Was sent as my back up and I did not wear because I was going to an outdoor garden party, and the top of this dress is lined and fairly heavy. It was 90 degrees and humid here and I thought I would melt. However, great dress for a party or an outdoor wedding - if it's not too hot!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, would work best for smaller chested people but I loved wearing it!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Don’t hesitate to rent it.

links_reviews_title: Rented to potentially wear to my post-wedding Brunch, didn't end up wearing, looked awkward.
links_reviews_text: fit great, just wasn't really my style.

links_reviews_title: Very nice and light. It's just very long in the back it felt like formal.
links_reviews_text: Print nice. Flows well. Short front and longer back but too long for me and I'm 5-7
I needed to iron it a little bit, but it was really comfortable and easy to wear.
Loved the fit. Rented for vacation and it was breezy and comfortable. Really a deep pink even though pic doesn't show that.

links_reviews_title: Favorite dress I have ever rented from RTR.
links_reviews_text: So so comfy! If your looking for short get a size smaller
vivid raspberry color. loved the fit, fabric and style of the halter neck and the way the waist gathered. Perfect for a May wedding.
Loved the color and feel! Great if you like hip cinching!!

links_reviews_title: Thus dress was SO COMFORTABLE! I wore it to an event on the first night of our vacation in Hawaii.
links_reviews_text: I like the fit. The only problem was my bra was visible under the armpits. I tried to tape it but that was hard to do since the material is so silky.

links_reviews_title: Comfortable, but not as flattering as I had hoped
links_reviews_text: Didn't think it did my waistline any favors

links_reviews_title: Great dress. Very comfortable. Lots of compliments.
links_reviews_text: Simple and elegant. Can dress it up or down. Light weight so better for warmer weather.
A cute dress, not so flattering in certain areas. It was just ok for me.
The fabric is fantastic. The fit is so comfortable.

I know it sounds strange, but it was too revealing for me -- I would've had to wear a strapless bra and you would totally be able to see the outline of it through the dress. It was too sheer for me to feel comfortable even attempting to make it work. It went right back.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my daughter's wedding brunch. Fabulous color and style
links_reviews_text: Fits loosy, but comfy. I am 107, 5ft and I wore an xs

Super cute but you can see through the material. I wore nude shape wear under it and it worked great. I wear a 38D bra and the top was a bit big on me in the size large. Goes perfect with the RTR Elizabeth Cole Pink and Green Multicolored hoops!
Great fit across chest

This dress is very comfortable. The elastic waistband combined with the silky, light fabric makes this a piece you can wear all day long. The color is also bright and fun. However, it isn't as flattering on as I'd hoped as other reviewers had mentioned. I think it's because of how the fabric is so large in the top and billows out over the elastic waistband.
I wore this to a rooftop bar crawl. It was perfect for the warm day.

links_reviews_title: Fit a little large on me
links_reviews_text: Don't order a bigger size.

This is a super feminine cute dress, but it would have been completely see thru in the day light. You could wear it ay night and probably be fine. The material is very thin, I was worried if I sweat that the dress would show the sweat, which sounds gross but I live in AZ so during the summer that's something to think about. I wanted to be able to wear this dress because it's gorgeous, just didn't know how to pull it off in AZ.
This dress is more of a fuchsia pink, died not have a lining so you will need a short slip, very comfortable and I received a lot of comments.
I receive several compliments every single time I have worn it! Super fun style and flattering fit.
Fit well. Very light and flows well. Make sure to wear spanx or full butted underwear since the dress will rest between your butt cheeks and is noticeable lol

links_reviews_title: This is an amazing dress, great color and very flexible with the size.Kinda like a one size fits all
links_reviews_text: This is an amazing dress, great color and very flexible with the size.Kinda like a one size fits all
VERY comfortable and flattering and the fit was perfect for any shape. The silk is a little transparent though so nude undies is a must.
Comfortable to wear. Nice fit. The fabric made it feel like I wasn’t wearing anything. Perfect for hot weather because of the fabric being able to flow in the breeze.
Great color - the silk material wasn't forgiving enough for my undergarments
loved the fit and the length. Wore it out to dinner and drinks - was perfect

links_reviews_title: I loved it! It was so comfortable and beautiful! How do I buy it?
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect. I felt like I was in my most comfortable pajamas, but looked beautiful!

links_reviews_title: Can be dressed up or down for a date. I wore it with a black jean jacket.
links_reviews_text: Amazing material. Very comfortable and flattering.
great fit
The color is beautiful but the fabric is super thin - see through. It runs big.

The material is very lightweight and I feel this would definitely need a slip under it. I didn't wear it because it was way too big. It was also a bit too casual for the event I rented it for. This is a dress for warm weather!
Really awkward fitting dress - the top was so oversized but the waist fit, and it was also super long. I didn't wear it.
Beautiful dress, flowy fabric and very comfortable but it was just too big on top for my petite frame
Fit felt a bit large, but overall nice fabric and beautiful color.

links_reviews_title: Great dress but definitely hot pink!
links_reviews_text: Fit beautifully!

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing this. It is not yet warm enough weather for how light weight it is.
links_reviews_text: This dress is made of an extremely light fabric, so better for very hot weather. The elastic waist was a bit too loose for me, making the dress not sit well on me.

links_reviews_title: So cute but short for work (I am 5'4)
links_reviews_text: Loved this. I am 5'4 and 125lbs. Fit like a glove but short for work.

The original dress I picked out for a work holiday party did not fit quite right, so this was a backup dress. It was PERFECT and I received many compliments. I loved the sleeves and the pattern on the dress. It was so comfortable and very feminine. Sophisticated, but also really fun and unique. Rent this if you're looking for something different than a traditional little black dress. :)

Incredibly comfortable dress that is perfect for winter parties. Great details that got tons of compliments, plus it's warm with the sleeves! It's a bit short, but in a good way given the conservative neckline. Wore to several different parties, once with OTK boots and once with heels for 2 different looks. Almost bought it and will be renting again!
I rented this for my engagement party and it was a hit! The fit was perfect and the lace detail made me feel bridal in cold weather.

Short but not too short on petite., navy and grey Crocheted/lace style dress with black silk lining. Very comfortable. Sleeves and underarm fit nicely. With a small puff shoulder. Fitted in torso but didn't feel tight then skirt flares. Quality fabric and zipper. Ruffle down the length of the sleeve. Dress up or down. Possibly a little too short for work. I loved this dress for the holidays
The print is cute and it doesn't wrinkle! Major plus for travel

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Rented for a baby shower and received constant complaints!!
links_reviews_text: Shorter than expected but with a lower heel it was fine. Fit pretty true to size

LOVE this dress. Especially the sleeves. So fun and a bit whimsical. The fit was super flattering and TTS. It is pretty short though - not appropriate for a conservative office. I wore blackout tights though and it made it acceptable for my office. And if you take the tights off, then you've got a flirty and cute short dress for the evening. Would rent again.
