I love everything about this great dress!! It's flattering and the color is beautiful. A little short but I paired it with knee high boots. I loved it. I got so many compliments

links_reviews_title: Got TONS of compliments on this dress!!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to my sisters baby shower. Over all it fit true to size. I'm 5'4, 130lbs with an athletic build and the small fit perfect. If you have a larger chest (i do not) it may be a little tight) It is a little short, I probably wouldn't have worn it without some kind of stockings/tights...but with them I was very comfortable in it! So many people complimented it!

links_reviews_title: Cute, Didn't Love the Sleeve Ruffles
links_reviews_text: This dress got lots of compliments but I didn't love the ruffles on the sleeves although they gave it a little something extra. I felt it made my shoulders look wide. The body of the dress is very flattering. It has a nice drop waist and flouncy skirt. Nice length for me, I'm 5'2" and weight 115. I wore the medium. You can wear a regular bra which is always a bonus. I think it's a dark navy blue, not a true black with dark silver. I paired with black tights because it was cold and wore blue shoes. It would also look cute with silver shimmer tights. Silver jewelry too and a simple necklace would work. Good for Fall.
Comfortable fit, flattering to figure, && flirty length! My husband loved it 😊

links_reviews_title: Great fit - easy to wear and got so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: A bit short - but fun!

This dress is the perfect combination of fun and flirty. It runs true to size. Def go up one size as a back up. Works best for A-C cup. There is not really any give in the material. comfortable amount of room in the hips, if you are curvier. This can be worn with any standard bra.

Really cute statement sleeves. Dress is very flattering. Runs short so I paired it with tights. Didn't want to send it back but it was so different it would be hard to wear it frequently. I received so many compliments that it would certainly be remembered. Wore it to 2 different nights out.

links_reviews_title: Fun sleeves and great fabric texture
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this dress, except the fact that the loose sleeves made it look a little bit like I have Hulk arms. I'm five feet tall and wouldn't have been able to wear this to work without the black tights, so I'd be cautious with this one if you're a taller girl. Loved the fit and got so many compliments - my boyfriend said it's his favorite rental to-date!

links_reviews_title: Avoid any dancing that involves twirling and spinning!
links_reviews_text: Such a beautiful dress, and the detailing in the lace is so nice. With that said, I am a fairly tall girl and the length of this dress is borderline. I almost did not wear this, and also stuck to slow dancing.

links_reviews_title: Fit me like a shirt, not a dress!
links_reviews_text: I read previous reviews about length, but was still shocked at how short this was when I put it on. It fit more like a shirt than a dress, barely making it over my hips, let alone covering my whole bottom. Fun sleeves, but a definite no.

links_reviews_title: I’m only 5’4 and couldn’t even bend over without exposing my rear
links_reviews_text: Too short 😕 but was a gorgeous dress wish I could have worn it

Well made dress just overall too much. Material was a little too heavy for my taste. Thought it would have been sheerer. Sleeves are a little too much. Especially. Rent one time if desperate like I was not many options available in unlimited rentals. Didn't wear... sent back immediately

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a cocktail party and received a lot of compliments. Perfect with a strappy heel.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a little short and a found myself pulling it down quite a bit. Other than that it was very cute and perfect for a cocktail event.
Fit TTS- fabric does not have much give but otherwise was perfect. Nice lace detail, endless compliments.
This dress was just gorgeous. Mucho compliments!
Very cute and stylish.

Loved this dress! I'm usually a medium but got a large and it fit great - not too tight. Great length for a "short" dress - didn't feel like I was going to flash anyone but was able to still show off some leg.

Very glamorous dress. I wore for a party at Nordstrom with black stockings. A very mice look. The dress was stretchy which was a nice surprise especially in the sleeve area. It was a tad bit short stopping a few inches after my butt which I didn't mind. But, if you're worried about length just wear tights! I loved this dress and so did everyone else.

links_reviews_title: oh, the flare! Lovely dress and great fit. I wore my usual size and still had some room in the torso
links_reviews_text: has some see-through lace on the sleeves.
Nice material but ran very small. Also would probably be very short in a tall person so be careful!
Perfect fit. Stylish and comfortable! Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and unique dress, just a bit too big
links_reviews_text: Loved the color, style and look, I just wasn't crazy about the fit. I'm a little curvier than most and I really wanted this dress to accentuate that. Next time, I would definitely order a size down (usual size is 4, probably would've been fine in a 2).

I ordered a romper but it was not available for the time my order shipped so they sent this. It was similar enough to the romper so I thought I would give it a try. I'm very busty (36DD) and the dress was an absolute no go. Very restricting and way too tight on the chest. I'm also only 5'3 but the dress was way too short. Would have to be very careful/wear leggings with this dress. It's cute but absolutely not for curvy girls with a large chest.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for a fall wedding. Fun yet conservative.
links_reviews_text: Drop waist fit, sleeves were a little long on me, runs short as i'm petite and it was well above my knee

links_reviews_title: This will be returned without wearing.
links_reviews_text: The body fits well but the sleeves were too big. On top of that, having ruffles made the sleeves even bigger. I think if the sleeves themselves were fitted, the ruffles would have looked cute. Love the color and concept; sleeves were a big miss.
Beautiful dress! It was so comfortable, I got tons of compliments, loved its unique look and best part, no bra needed with the ruffle!!
Dress is gorgeous!

This is my absolute favorite RTR dress I've gotten so far! I loved the style and color. Looks great both in person and in pictures. Also extremely comfortable and easy to move around in. It does run slightly small but my backup size fit perfect. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Dress felt great and I received lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Love the fit and style of dress. It was very flattering.
I loved this dress!! super comfortable although is a little tight.
I'm usually a size 8, I ended up wearing a 12 so I have endless wiggle room. I felt secure in this dress and could dance all night long with no problems! Color is gorgeous and the fit was nice.

links_reviews_title: It fits me perfectly! I was all day comfortable !
links_reviews_text: I am 32DD didn't need a strapless, dress is so well made that keeps its shape all day, love it!

links_reviews_title: Feeling confident and beautiful all night!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It is extremely flattering and received so many compliments! Both sizes fit but the 8 allowed for appetizers, dinner and cake haha!

Dress fit perfectly (definitely true to size) and the fabric was amazing. Slightly thicker than what I expected, but did not wrinkle during travel and was stretchy! Would definitely wear again/recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress was super comfortable and fit my small frame fairly well. Because of the way the fabric flows in the front of the dress, I didn't even have to wear a bra! The fabric is a bit heavier than I expected, but it did not get in the way of me dancing all night. Perfect color for a summer wedding.

I wanted to get the size 2 and 4 after reading reviews that it runs small. Unfortunately the 2 wasn't available but the 4 fit perfectly! Very classy, comfortable material. Would definitely rent again!
I absolutely loved everything about this dress, fit like a glove as soon as I put it on. The fabric and color is amazing. I would definitely rent this again and compliments all night!

Such a flattering fit and beautiful color. I wore this dress to a wedding and the color is gorgeous! Wore it without a bra with no problem. I would rent this dress again. Definitely one of my favorite rentals.

links_reviews_title: Stunning Color. Perfect for a summer wedding.
links_reviews_text: Great dress! It was a little tighter than I was expecting but overall great. Lots of compliments. It was absolutely perfect for a Saturday evening wedding. The color was fabulous!!
This was perfect for a summer wedding! Nice material and the color is great

Initially rented this as a back up dress for a previous event and knew I'd be renting it again to wear! Not usually one for anything with ruffles but this was perfect. One sided shoulder stayed in place all night. Fit was a solid size 0. Only warning I might give is length was a little bit on the short side when sitting down, but otherwise stayed put the rest of the night. Temperature of dress was also great! Went from warm outside to AC inside and never needed a jacket or sweater or felt too warm.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! Would rent again
links_reviews_text: I rented a size 4, they didn't have my back up size 6. Luckily it wasn't necessary. It was lightweight enough for a 85 degree outdoor wedding. It rose up slightly when I walked but nothing too drastic. The size 6 would've been too big, I was able to get away without a bra.
Cute, comfortable, a little unforgiving if you don't have patience for spanx
Excellent fit! Came in tome as schedule and got so many compliments for the different style!!

This dress is so comfortable!! It has a nice thick, stretchy material that made it so easy to wear. And the color is so beautiful that it was definitely eye-catching. There are nice details in the back that provide a really nice shaping effect to the mid/lower back area. I will definitely rent again!
It was so comfortable. The fabric is thick and soft and it's very flattering. The edges of the ruffles were a bit jagged but I didn't mind. Awesome dress

links_reviews_title: Perfect rehearsal dinner dress for bride to be!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress for my rehearsal dinner! Even though it was a one shoulder style, it still felt totally appropriate for the time we spent in church. As the bride, it seemed like people expected me to be in white, but I got so many compliments about the color and style of this dress! I'm between a 0 and 2- 0 was a bit tight but 2 was the perfect fit. Couldn't have been happier with this dress!

links_reviews_title: Easy to accessorize and figure flattering!
links_reviews_text: I found it ran a little small. I ordered the 4 and 6 and ended up wearing the 6. I am a true 4, but because I'm a 32DDD, I had to size up in this one to be able to zip it through the bust. I was able to wear just a sticky backless bra, which was great and comfortable. Since the top is so fitted, I somehow got away with that for the first time ever. A regular strapless would be fine too, but again, I didn't have much extra room through the bust. Overall, I felt pretty confident and comfortable wearing it. The color and style was easy to accessorize with fun gold drop earrings, gold clutch, and nude sandals.

This was my first rental and am so happy with my decision! Being petite (5' 1" 107 lbs. 32/24.5/32) with a apple shape my size usually ranges between 00 to a 2. After falling in love with this dress I decided to select 0 and 2 sizes. So glad I did! The 2 fit perfectly, felt like a million bucks and got compliments all evening. Can't wait for my next event to utilize Rent The Runway again!

This dress was perfect for a wedding! Beautiful and comfortable I received so many compliment. I ordered both a 2 and a 4. Both fit well, but I decided to go with the 4 as it got better around my butt. Wish I could rent it again!

This dress is gorgeous and has thick material; I did not have to wear a bra. It stayed in place but was flexible and allowed me to dance all night! I'm 135 lbs and 5'5" and the 6 had a little wiggle room. Received a ton of compliments!
Favorite dress I've rented so far! Super comfortable and fit very well
Beautiful fit and color. I loved that I didn't have to wear a bra because of the ruffle detail! Does run small as reviews have stated and glad I got the size 2. It fit perfectly!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: I wore it for a rehearsal dinner. It was so flattering and I loved it! It ran a bit small so I'm glad I read reviews and got a size up. I normally wear a 4 but ordered the 6 as a backup and definitely needed it. I wish I could own this dress I loved it so much!

links_reviews_title: Love this dress! Got so many compliments throughout and after the event!!
links_reviews_text: This dress is definitely more form fitting than I expected, despite reading other reviews. It does not appear to be tight on the model, but in person it definitely is. My regular size fit no problem but the size up was much more flattering and comfortable. Other than that, I loved this dress and would 100% rent again. Just be prepared to wear a size up :)

I followed the reviews that said it ran on the smaller side. I typically wear a 2 as I’m smaller on top, however 4 was the only size available for the date so went with it. It’s a little more form fitting than I typically go for, but not too tight or short for a wedding. It was comfortable to sit and dance in, and plenty of people asked where it was from/ complimented it. I would definitely recommend for a wedding or similar event.

This dress is true to size. The fabric is a bit thicker which I always like with form fitting dresses. My only con is that it's a big short when you sit. Other than that it's extremely comfortable. The single shoulder neckline and fringe really makes it stand out, I received a lot of compliments and felt great all night!
The color was beautiful and fit like a glove. Definitely would recommend to others.

links_reviews_title: I wore this as a bridesmaid dress for a friends wedding.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I usually wear a 6 (I’m 5’4 and 132lbs, the website won’t let me update that for some reason) but sized up to an 8 because that’s all they had available. It was good because the dress runs small! The top was still a little big so I wore a strapless bra to fill out the dress, but didn’t really need it because the fabric is thick and the ruffles cover your chest. I did feel a bit naked all night! This dress is quite form fitting and shoes everything you’ve got going on!! (Hope people liked the outline of my belly button because they saw it all night!!)

links_reviews_title: Great for a spring wedding at a winery!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to a wedding at a winery. I ordered the 2 and the 4, but there was an issue with the 4 so I had to squeeze into the 2. This dress is cut really small but loved the color!

I loved this dress. Like other renters said, the material is nice and thick and the color is beautiful. I sized up one size to a 4 and felt it fit really well. I would say it is a tad short, I am 5'8 and wish the dress was an inch longer, but it was fine for a wedding.

links_reviews_title: Everyone complemented my dress all night! It was an amazing style and color!
links_reviews_text: Pros: beautiful color, simple and elegant design Cons: More of a body con dress than a straight fit, if you don't like tight dresses, size up
Loved this dress. It fit tts for me. Snug fit but not so tight it looked weird. My waist is 28" and hips 38". Well made and gorgeous color.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for my MBA spring formal!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. Loved the ruffle (it wasn't too much and bc of its placement, I didn't have to wear a bra!) and the built-in spines down the back. If you have any minor bumps, consider wearing spanx. Definitely not an issue with the dress, but because it hugs around the midsection, definitely something to consider.
It is professional with personality. I would buy it if I had more occasions to wear it to. You should definitely rent it!!

I loved the fit of a Likely dress I ordered in the past so I ordered again and wore to a wedding. I opted for the one shoulder look which was interesting, and eventually changed it to the strapless option. Was a hit for dancing!

links_reviews_title: Loved that I got to pick 2 different sizes and picked the one that I felt the most comfortable in.
links_reviews_text: SUPER CUTE AND COMFY! 4 and 6 fit the same on the waist but the 4 was noticeably smaller on top.

I absolutely loved this dress! I wore this to a spring time wedding and I got compliments on it for weeks after the wedding. As other ladies have mentioned, the material is super thick and stretchy which adds a nice sliming affect (kind of like spanx). Even though it was very tight, it remained very classy and elegant. I order a size 2 &4 and I ended up wearing the 2. The color is beautiful and perfect for the spring or summer. I would absolutely rent this dress again.
I felt super confident in this dress and received many compliments! I recommend ordering you back up size as a size larger than what you normally wear!

I have a rather curvy figure and was afraid this dress would not be as flattering as the pictures make it look, but I was WRONG! This dress was stunning! I received so many compliments all night. It was easy to dance in and perfect for a warmer fall wedding. I can't wait to rent this dress again in the other colors!

I loved the style, length and color of this dress. It was very pretty and photographed well. It just wasn't my favorite fitting dress. The 8 was too big in my waist but fit my hips, I went with the 6 so accentuate my waist but that made it uncomfortable to eat in. Also, the top dug into my armpits giving me some muffin top. Overall, I liked it but didn't love it!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Fit was a little strange.
links_reviews_text: Received many compliments on this dress, however the fit was a little strange. The bust was VERY snug, and the hips very loose. Overall it was perfect for my even and very comfortable, but I could have used an inch in the bust.

links_reviews_title: Wore a size 4 for my baby shower. The dress is a Thick stretchy material. It was very flattering.
links_reviews_text: It can be worn two different ways. It was comfortable, and the perfect color for a baby shower.

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments! The material was high quality & felt great!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great, the top was a little loose but I never felt like I was pulling it up. I was worried it would be so tight it would show all of my imperfections, but the material was perfect and hid those things! I loved this dress and may even rent it again in another color!

links_reviews_title: Great dress for an outdoor wedding!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress. I was very upset originally to hear the size I wanted was not going to be shipped, but the backup size worked. It was a little loose on top but better than not having the dress at all. The shade of blue was gorgeous!

So many compliments on this dress. I wore it for my bridal shower and it was the perfect color/shape. It was the perfect length and not too tight. The only thing that I can critique is that I kept having to pull the top up, which you have to do with all strapless dresses.
I loved this dress , the only annoying part was the top of the dress by the boob area that kept rolling down

This dress was great and I was so impressed with the easy process. I ordered both a 2 and a 4 and went with the 2! I’m about 5’5 and weigh 125 and carry most of my weight in my hips. The dress was very flattering and the length made it still appropriate for the occasion. I’m super pleased with my experience and will definitely be using RTR in the future!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a summer evening wedding!
links_reviews_text: Fit to size. Very flattering and comfortable.

Dress is a bit longer than I expected. I am tall, but the dress hit below my knee which made it hard to walk since the slit in the back is slight. Great color though and didn't have to wear a bra, which was a nice plus on the comfort level.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit like a glove and I received so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Definitely fits true to size, but I did have to keep pulling up and adjusting the top like many other small-busted reviewers mentioned. Also- if its hot out and you're sweaty from the dance floor, it is HARD to get on and off to use the restroom. Overall, I LOVED this dress. the fabric is forgiving and the style is sexy yet modest. I don't want to return it!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliments on this dress. It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The fit is very flattering. Felt I was a bit in between sizes. 0 fit but a little more snug than I wanted. Ended up wearing the 2 which was a little more generous but comfortable for me! I received so many compliments!

rented for a backup for summer wedding dress but didn't end up wearing...found that the fit was great through the body but the chest was smaller than excepted / would've liked. Did have a grip around the chest to hold from folding down but was too tight with and without a bra...color and style was cute wish the top was a better fit

links_reviews_title: This dress looked amazing on!! I wore it for my niece's wedding & is got a ton of compliments!
links_reviews_text: It was very form fitting but extremely comfortable! I loved the color & that it was strapless!! It fit perfectly on me! Would definitely rent this dress again!! Perfect for a formal summertime wedding!

I loved this dress! I went up a size per some of the reviews. I'm normally an 8/9 so I selected an 8 and a 10. I ended up wearing the 10. The dresses came a few days early, which was great! Returning them was effortless! I will be using RTR again!

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The size 4 and size 6 fit similarly in the waist and hips but the size 6 fit much better in the bust so that is the size I went with. The dress is great quality and the style is super flattering! I might have to buy this to have in my closet!
Fit perfect and stretchy fabric made it comfortable!

Loved this dress and received many compliments! I chose wearing the larger size to fit my baby bump, but otherwise I would say it is true to size. The material is thick which makes the dress look smooth even though it is a pencil fit. The color is gorgeous and is not too blue, just classy. Paired with neutral shoes and accessories for a summer country club wedding. I would highly recommend dress.

links_reviews_title: Got so many compliments about this dress! Very fun, flirty, and perfect for formal weddings.
links_reviews_text: The fit was as expected for the type of dress it is. I am usually a size 4/6 in dresses and this size 6 was form fitting and a little snug in some places, but I know if I sized up, it would have been too big. I got so many compliments and had a great night attending a friends wedding.

I got so many compliments on this dress. The fabric was such a sturdy and well made material. The dress stayed put all night for my cousins wedding, even through many dance moves. I’m 5’6”, around 145 pounds, 34C, and an athletic build. Size 8 and 6 both fit me fine. Pictured is the size 6.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, great color & fit for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: I LOVE this dress. The length is great, the top fits perfectly and doesn't have to be pulled up all night. I would absolutely rent this dress again.

I tend to stay away from lighter colors, but this dress was a hit! Ordered sizes 4 & 6; wore the 6. There was a significant sizing difference. The size 4 would not zip up completely (perfect length for 5'2") and the size 6 was almost a little too roomy (and long) for my taste. I wore spanx to flatten out some unforgiving bumps. It has a rubber lining on the chest area, which helped it stay put. Overall a comfortable dress worn to a summer wedding.
STUNNING!! I received endless compliments on this dress. I felt sexy because of how it hugged my body, yet conservative because it covered my chest! 10/10 would recommend!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a spring or summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous color- received compliments all night! I would say it runs a little smaller than true to size, material is quick to wrinkle- but nothing a good steam can't fix!
Loved this dress!
I've worn this dress in two other colors. Great for someone with curves and a chest. Very flattering. Got compliments all night
The fabric was really nice & thick enough that I didn't need to wear a bra. I'm only 5'3 so it was longer on me than shown in the model's photo. I absolutely loved this dress!

links_reviews_title: loved the color of this dress and fabric had a good give.
links_reviews_text: too long for a 5'2" person. i had to fashion tape hem it and it did okay with that (wasn't perfect, because there's a slit in the back). stayed up the whole night with very few adjustments needed! super comfortable and flattering. felt great in it and got some nice compliments :) the hips were a little wider than i am, but it wasn't super obvious. FYI: i'm 5'2", usually wear a 4P (Loft, J. Crew, etc.), 127 lbs, 34C (ThirdLove), straight body type.

I ended up wearing the larger size and I'm glad I did. My usual size was quite form fitting. Ladies with a belly pooch beware--this dress will make you look like you're closing in on your second trimester. It was much more flattering from the front and back than the sides. As you can tell in the photo it also creased from sitting. Nevertheless it was a very pretty dress and it was comfortable. The top did roll down but that wasn't a huge deal. Overall I am happy with it.

links_reviews_title: A gorgeous wedding for two of my best friends.
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and the fit is truly perfect. The side zip is a little difficult to maneuver solo, but once it's on it stays secure all evening. I highly recommend this dress for weddings or any formal occasion you have.

Beautiful and flattering dress. I rented it a few weeks ago in the cerulean color and loved it so much I rented it again in light blue. The 2 fit like a glove in the hips but the top was a little too snug. I wore the 4 which fit great up top, but was slightly loose in the hips. I'll probably rent again in yellow at some point!

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a summer wedding! Fit me perfectly
links_reviews_text: #wedding

This dress requires a strapless bra. The 4 would have fit me well, but I couldn't zip it anymore with the bra on. The dress is comfortable, easy to dance in, and I got compliments all night. I didn't have to worry about pulling it up at all.

links_reviews_title: Love this dress and the color!
links_reviews_text: This was my backup dress for a wedding and I ended up LOVING my first option so I did not wear this dress, but I definitely will rent it for another wedding/occasion. The color was my favorite. The only thing was the top felt a lot bigger than how it was fitted through the body and waist area. I was concerned that if I wore it I may be hiking it up all night, but then again I didn't wear it so who knows.
Although this dress was a bit snug at my hips, it was a pleasure to wear. The highlighter orange color made me pop in a room full of people, the sleeves were fun, and the compliments kept coming.

links_reviews_title: This dress is a must! Wore it to a formal event and got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: Dress is a must if you're 5' 5" 140 pounds, 51 years old and trying to look 10 pounds thinner and 10 years younger. I was worried that it would be too short (wore a 2" nude heel) or that the slightly elastic fabric would cling too much in the wrong places. Got a size 10 as back up but didn't need it. Turns out it was very flattering for a pear shape and super comfortable. I wore this to an Oscar's party at The Breakers in West Palm Beach and an ex-professional Tom Ford model who was stunning stopped me to tell me she loved the dress! The color is bright but not tacky and was very fun to wear too. Felt like a million bucks.
Confidence booster.. loved it!
I wore it for a Halloween party and got so many compliments! Very comfortable dress.

Hot orange with bell sleeves! Such a hit!! I had so many random strangers stop me to compliment this dress. The hot orange is so vivid and gorgeous! I was sad to return it. It was a little short for me, but the long sleeves balanced it out. It would probably be suited to someone with a little shorter torso than me because the hips were cut a little high...but for a rental It wasn't that big of a deal. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: LOVED the pop of color. Shorter than expected but I was able to pull it off for work event.
links_reviews_text: Super Comfortable. It wasn't so snug which I liked. Although it did ride up a little bit when sitting down. I would definitely rent again!!
This dress was beautiful. I wore it to my rehearsal dinner. I received so many compliments.
I've rented this dress twice and love it. Get so many compliments. If you want to stand out this is the dress. Note the arms do run small so size up.
Love the color! I thought the dress was great and I got a ton of compliments. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Bright, fun, statement dress
Lots of compliments but it fits a little weird in shoulders (small chested)

Absolutely gorgeous color and the sleeves are amazing. I didn't give 5 stars only because the fit is a bit tight in the arms and sometimes can be larger in the bust. Other then that so many compliments!
Little tight in chest but overall great statement dress with fun sleeves.
Love this dress so much! Perfect fit, fabric and color. I received so many compliments while wearing it.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for a Garba ceremony (meant to be very colorful!).
links_reviews_text: Very tight in the arms. Runs small overall (I sized up from a 4 to a 6 and it was still tight). Color is intense and great. Lots of compliments. Was sad to see a bit of a stain on the front though :( but it wasn't bad enough to not wear.
I loved this dress, the color was exactly what I expected and it did not disappoint it was perfect for a summer wedding. I loved it so much I wish I owned it!

This dress was perfect for the tropical elegance theme (whatever that may be :)). The color is super bright and the dress form and fit was perfect. Like many other reviewers, I found it a little tight across the shoulders and upper arms but the next size up was too loose through the body. The event actually had a black light and the dress glowed. I received loads of compliments throughout the night. I would definitely recommend due to style and color...you just can’t throw your hands in the air!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color, flattering fit, and amazing details!
links_reviews_text: The color on this dress is a gorgeous shade of orange! The sleeves are beautiful. I never opt for this loose fit because my body type doesn't favor this style, but it tapers nicely at the waist and still loose enough to be really comfortable. I will definitely rent this one again or buy it.

There's no fitting in with this dress on... You will stand out in this neon orange! Wore it for an amazing dinner date while on vacation in Florida and kept getting stopped by women wanting to know where I got it! It was perfect!!! It runs a bit small as the 10 fit me well and I normally wear a 6/8. The dress has a little bit of stretch and it's quite short, but since it was not tight around the chest/waist, it wasn't too revealing for me. Definitely size up if you have wide shoulders like I do.

I absolutely loved this dress. So much so that I hated to return it. The fit is great showing just enough leg to feel sexy. Like other reviews it is tight in the bicep area. If it had a little more stretch in that area it would have been nice. It was a bit like putting on leggings, but I managed ok. I would definitely rent this dress again. It is bright orange (think day glow) and makes a statement when you walk in a room. Very confidence inspiring!!!
The color the feel and the style of the dress is amazing. It's extremely flattering and was perfect for an outdoor wedding would highly recommend for anyone.

Now let me tell you, I have never received so many compliments. This dress DEMANDS attention. Other reviews do state this is neon or traffic cone orange and it most certainly is, however it is absolutely gorgeous. It does take some confidence to wear, but it was perfect for my best friends bridal shower in April!
Great dress. Definitely bright, but perfect for what I wanted. Not too short and the v cut is not too deep. Stretchy material. Fun dress overall!

links_reviews_title: It's as orange as the reviews say it is!
links_reviews_text: Fun dress, it was tight in the arms and gapped quite a bit in the chest. I sized up, but maybe should've done 2 sizes up.
The fit was amazing. The material is very forgiving. Very bright orange color. I loved every second in this fun dress

This dress is much too short, I even ordered up a size and it was much too short for me to wear. The dress fit loosely up top, which is odd, since I am a size c cup, and the hem was not sewn properly. It would bunch up at the top and I had to constantly pull it down to make sure it wasn't riding up my legs. It also was snug around the waist. Pretty dress, but much too short for me to wear to a cocktail occasion.
the orange was a show stopper;Fit well and was fun for a night out.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color, small in the shoulders
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to birthday dinner. I really loved the color and the drapes of the sleeves. I ordered a size up after seeing it looked tight on the hips. The hips were fine, but as some reviewers mentioned, it's super tight across the shoulders. The actual bust fit fine (darts where they belonged, etc.) but I wasn't able to put my shoulders back or stand up straight without it gaping and pulling at the neckline (hence the slouch in the pic). Raising my arms even to parallel was out of the question. It was fine for a dinner but I wouldn't want to wear it to a wedding or a club with dancing! Beware if you are also broad-shouldered like I am.
This dress is beautiful!! The reviews are all accurate - tons of compliments, very comfortable, beautiful!!

This dress is a show stopper! I wore this for my birthday celebration and it was perfect. The color is bright and you will definitely be noticed. The fabric is so comfortable; hugs in all of the right places. I was stopped multiple times on the street and told how amazing it looked. I only wore the size 8 because I've got some junk in the trunk and wider hips and wanted a little extra room to dance in. HIGHLY recommend.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for my 30th birthday party
links_reviews_text: Got SO many compliments on this fantastic dress. It is VERY orange, beautiful and bright, so if you don't want to stand out I would skip this one. However, on my 30th birthday party I definitely wanted to stand out, and this dress was a show stopper!!!
Fits nice, very comfortable.
Great fit! A bit form fitting but fun non the less! So much fun and loads of compliments! Wound rent again for sure!

This dress was a huge hit at an auction I attended with the dress code "Citrus Cocktail Attire". It's definitely bright orange as the other reviews suggest, but was actually a very flattering shade. The two biggest issues I had with the dress were that the sleeves were too tight (I couldn't really move my arms higher than my shoulders) and the chest was a little too big for me, I had to pull out my VS bombshell bra to make it work. Neither thing stopped me from enjoying the night and rocking the dress.
This dress is dayglo neon orange and it's AMAZING. Fits well. Great option for our evening musical of Lion King.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments and felt like hot stuff in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Very flattering dress! I didn't even need Spanx! Yes, it is neon orange and your date will never lose you in the crowd but it's such a fun dress. Arms are tight, so difficult to dance in but the sleeves are worth it! I wore the size up for looser arms and longer length! I wore this to a wedding during a Tennessee Vols game to show my school spirit and received the most amount of compliments in this dress! I was so sad to return this dress because I felt as if we became one the night I wore it! Rent this dress!!!

links_reviews_title: The most ICONIC look of all time.
links_reviews_text: So I ALWAYS appreciate a bright color, and this dress did NOT disappoint. It was fitted and flattering, the sleeves were incredibly glamorous and I was voted Best Dressed at the opening night party for my broadway national tour. Also incredibly comfortable and stretchy, cannot recommend enough!

This dress was bright and I received so many compliments on the color and style of the dress. I would size up (I may have got the 6) if you are pear shaped like me just to give extra room on the bottom!

links_reviews_title: Unbelievable fit! This one is a showstopper!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my work conference party in Madrid.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for wedding or rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: Love this dress but unfortunately it was too snug and I didn't end up wearing it. Orange is BRIGHT but I loved it!

I could have gone with an XS on this one - i was able to get it on and off without unzipping. Fabric is super stretchy and the color is beautiful. However, the front is WIDE OPEN. I wore a strapless bra with it which didn't show at the outset, but the front just kept opening more and more throughout the night and I had to keep adjusting it and pulling it closed. Pretty color, but I wouldn't rent again.
Tape a necessity. Not an outfit for moving around a bunch, but a definite head turner! Fun and flirty. Runs short and beware of cleavage!

links_reviews_title: This color is a total head-turner!
links_reviews_text: If you are tall or long legged you may have a problem with butt coverage. If you have a lot of booty, this may be a bit tight in the crotch's you will need fashion tape as the straps kept slipping off me. It's quite low cut as well but I wore it in Vegas so it didn't matter. I loved it overall!

links_reviews_title: Super fun but fit a bit odd
links_reviews_text: It was a little too small in the chest but otherwise it was beautiful! Super comfy
Neckline had to be pinned. Lots of cleavage.

links_reviews_title: Wearing something different that I normally wouldn't but or wear
links_reviews_text: The romper was super cute but a bit over worn on the top. It felt loose after tying it and had to double stick tape it down on my bra. Otherwise it was adorable and fun

I absolutely loved this. I don't typically wear this kind of stuff, but Vegas, so...!! This romper is beautifully fitted, a nice solid material, but not hot. I have big boobs and small shoulders, so I was able to wear a normal bra, with the straps pinned to the romper straps, and loooooots of fashion tape. I would absolutely rent this again for the right occasion.

I wore this romper out to a very fancy dinner date with my boo on vacation. (Restaurant has a dress code.) It was ever so slightly short in the torso but definitely felt I could get away with it. And it was GORGEOUS. I received compliments and the color is so vibrant and beautiful. Could be worn with or without bra, but I went with bra for the supported look. I am 5'7 and find that formal wear ALWAYS runs small on me. I normally wear a 14, but 14/16 in formal wear. This XL was perfect. I'm tempted to buy :)

links_reviews_title: Torso is pretty short! Stunning color!
links_reviews_text: This romper was perfect for a night out to a dinner & play during a super hot Houston summer evening. The material was thick enough to not show sweat & resist wrinkles but thin enough to breath. The color is stunning in person! But beware, I'm 5'6 & a usual size 4 (130lbs) & the torso fit very tight. I kept having to pull it down to avoid a camel toe look. The romper was cute enough & most of my night consisted of sitting so it didn't bother me much. My dad, as dads do, did make the comment that it was too short, but I didn't feel it was too short to wear.

Rented this for my sister for a surprise for a concert we were going to. She ended up in the small, not the true size medium, and she loved it. It was a little short, but she felt great and danced all night. Lots of compliments!

This romper is super cute and I got lots of compliments! I wore it to a casual wedding reception. I'm typically a size small, but I felt like the small was too short when worn with heels for me. I am 5'4" and 130 lbs. I have a curvy body type with a small natural waist. The medium romper made me feel more comfortable with the length and because it has a wrap top I was able to tighten it enough where the torso didn't feel too big.
Saw reviews that it was too short, but it was the perfect length for me! (5'1"). Top does sometimes expose a lil too much, but I just tied the bow tighter, so it is adjustable. Loved!

links_reviews_title: Perfect romper for a rosé picnic!
links_reviews_text: This is such a cute, sexy little romper! Loved every minute in it. Fits true to size, lightweight and comfy so great for summer! Highly recommend!

This romper was really cute and flattering, but definitely had some drawbacks. I am 5' tall, wore the small and it was pretty short on me so if you're tall I would not recommend this. I had to use a safety pin for the top as there was no support to the fabric and it was just flopping open without it. Was slightly uncomfortable with the amount of cleavage this romper had so just be aware that it's quite revealing (I am size 36C). Received a lot of compliments, but overall probably wouldn't rent again.

This is one sexy little romper and the best part is its incredibly flattering. I will likely rent this again in the future. The color is amazing, you can wear it with a bra which I love and it is just so, so flattering.

I rented 4 items for my birthday and chose one of the other options. This romper is cute and structured, but a little short for me (I don't like wearing short shorts though). Color is really vibrant and pretty.

links_reviews_title: This was such a fun flirty pierce!
links_reviews_text: I loved this for outdoor brunch on a sunny day. The straps are a bit long so had to use a bit of dress tape to keep things in place. Otherwise it's such a good piece! It's definitely short, but I'm comfortable with that.
Super cute adjustable tie waist. I am a 10 and a 36D/DD and the XL was too big. L would have worked much better. Hot vibrant pink. You can wear a regular bra as long as it's low cut.
Loved the fit of this romper. Was a bit to big in the top but overall was a great fit. Received lots of compliments.
Great cute romper! Wore for out to drinks for my birthday. Definitely low so be prepared to show some boob! Small fit me but was a little big in hips/waist/ butt area. Would try XS next time.
Pros: super fun, good thick fabric, loose fit, the bow is the right size. Cons: minor camel toe situation.
a little short in the torso but overall a great item!
Gorgeous color but way too short to wear. The top fit great but it was just not wearable on the bottom.

links_reviews_title: I packed one outfit too many!
links_reviews_text: ...that's the only reason I didn't wear this. Otherwise, it's super cute! but I returned home and it's too cold to wear here. I would rent this again in the future.
Fits true to size. Lower cut than expected and short. I am less than 5'ft tall and curvy. It was very short on me. Those with longer legs might want to be aware.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fit for someone with a normal length torso
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this romper but I had to return it. Size was perfect, but I have a long torso = wedgie. :(

I wore this during a bachelorette party in Miami. It's classy but still sexy. My only complaint is that it is a tiny bit short for my taste (but not so much that I wouldn't wear it out) and I had to safety pin the cleavage area to keep it from coming open too much. Other than that, it's bright and fun and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: This ran very short in the torso and I did not wear. Pretty color and quality fabric.
links_reviews_text: Short in the torso, nice quality, did not wear.
One of my favorite things I've ever rented!
I'm 5'7" and ordered a large based on the reviews. I couldn't wear it because I had half my butt showing. Might work for the shorter ladies...

I'm 5' 1" and have long legs with a shorter torso (for my height) Typically this works perfect for rompers but the sizing on this was just off. The fit bunched around my waist and then was very short on the back. Ultimately loved the color but went with another option that fit better.

The color is amazing but the fit was really awkward. It was very large in the chest - so much so that even fashion tape wouldn't work because there was just too much loose material. It's also very short, which I expected, but if it's short on me at 5'4, it's probably going to be too short for taller women. Overall, probably best for someone curvier than me.
Runs short waisted- I was bummed it's super cute for great on top but short waisted so I couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: Loved this romper! So flattering and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Beautiful color, got a ton of compliments. Was able to wear a bra as well because the straps were thick enough.
Cute, a little short.

links_reviews_title: great romper, love the color, very fitting
links_reviews_text: runs small, the fabric is a little stretchy but the butt was cut high so be careful :)

I love this romper & I did end up wearing it out but it was too short! Annoying to be constantly adjusting yourself. I am usually an xs/small but only had xs available to rent. Small probably would have been better

links_reviews_title: It fit really nicely and really flattering.
links_reviews_text: I had trouble finding a bra that would show so I ended up wearing it bra less
Beautiful & fun romper. Like most rompers, this one doesn't work very well if you have a longer torso.
Sadly the shorts were too short for me! Otherwise very cute
The dress fit nicely. Was made of very nice material but the wrap looked bulky and unflattering.

Felt comfortable and sexy all night. Great dress! I'm larger busted(38D) and this dress was perfect for me..the sash added some "fun" to the dress! My only complaint was that it's not "bright white" anymore -probably from many rentals.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for my bridal shower. Great dress and super comfy! I received so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Pretty but a lot of people asked if I was going to a toga party.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size, can wear a strapless bra if you want. I didn't, there was enough support within the dress. The tie is a little tricky but it never fell off.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments and a look of class for a wonderful event.
links_reviews_text: I initially rented this dress as a back up for an all white affair where the invite said to dress elegant. However, I was not able to wear this rental because the bust was way too large to be a Medium giving me an awkward fit. I am a 34D. So this dress would have worked if I was bustier and all around more shapely. I also wasn't able to wear the initial dress I rented either. Neither side I ordered fit. To my surprise, I ended up swapping dresses with a friend of mine who also rents from RTR and she fit the dress perfectly. See the photo. She is on the left wearing my rental and I am on the right wearing her rental. This dress is beautiful, unique and classy. It has this tie on the side that sets it a part from other dresses but please note if you are looking for a White Dress, it's actually more along the lines of an ivory, cream or off white than a pure white. RTR never fails me though. I can't believe we fit each other's dresses!
I wore this for a Toga party and it worked great! I'm a 32C and I felt the bust area was a little big but the fit overall was great.

links_reviews_title: Steeplechase races at Monmouth Park, NJ on the 4th of July!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress so much, I bought it! Matter of fact, buying another one for my middle daughter because she likes it better than any dress I've ever worn, and that's high praise. I tied it at my waist, though, to make it a bit more form fitting.
Fits perfectly. Great material

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for an all white event!
links_reviews_text: I must admit I was very nervous renting this dress because I wasn't sure it would look right. I absolutely loved it! I wore it to an all white wedding and it was perfect. This dress is very classy but also sexy. I received a lot of compliments!! I would definitely rent this dress again.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a party where I was the guest of honor. It was very flattering.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4" and weigh 118 and the size small fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear, not right for the event
links_reviews_text: Rented this to go out to a bachelorette party, but felt more like I should go to a toga party. The fit was a little big above the bust, so it felt like it would fall down. Overall, not right for what I wanted.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress as a back-up style for my Bachelorette party.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit true to size. I am 5'2" and it hit me below the knee, not a good look for someone as short as I am. I did not end up wearing the dress.

I loved this dress. Pros: The fabric is soft the style classy and sophisticated, yet still sexy. Wore for my birthday dinner! Cons: The bust is very large and bottom on the size 8 was probably a little looser than it should have been. I weigh 130 (36B) and the chest was huge! I had to use bra pads and pull the wrap around top piece very tight. The 6 did fit but was every tight....could have worn it if I didn't want to sit down and eat! Perhaps someone with different proportions (larger bust and smaller waist...my waist is 30, hips 36). Loved the jewelry from RTR that I paired with it.
Pretty Dress. I am chesty so it is hard to find things to fit me right.

links_reviews_title: Elegance and Sophistication is what you will feel in this dress
links_reviews_text: The dress was beautiful! I am petite with a large busy so it is hard to find dresses that tailor to my shape. I did feel that the dress to accommodate my bust was a bit larger everywhere else. However I got so many compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing this choice.
links_reviews_text: I was excited to wear this dress, but ended up wearing my back up choice. Given that I have a large bust (32DD), I expected that I wouldn't have an issue with this top, but it was still HUGE. Also the piping inside the top stuck out. Poor, sloppy fit.
I got so many compliments and was able to wear without a bra. The tie on the side kicks the strapless silhouette up a few noches.

I love this classy dress by White Raquel The Label! Running true to size with some stretch. I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. Curvier women should consider sizing up for full hips. This style will well for all cup sizes. I would recommend wearing a strapless bra due to the one shoulder style. At 5’7”, the length hit at the knee your outfit! This dress is perfect for any formal event!
This dress offers the best of both worlds, sexy & simple...great rental for Diner En Blanc
The dress fit perfectly, I generally wear a size 34 - loved the dress ! It really stood out in an elegant way .

Fit was comfortable and not too tight. The should/wrap part is a forgiving piece that ties the dress together! The bonding of the breast/chest area protruded a bit on me (32B bust) but came together once I wore a push-up strapless bra. Lots of compliments, unique but simple.
Great dress, definitely form fitting so be aware of that when deciding on size.

I am a solid 4 with healthy hips and toned upper body. The small pulled all of my imperfections into place and i felt flawless. Because I have good muscle tone, the right arm hole was mildly uncomfortable at first, but the medium swallowed my breasts up, so I stuck with the small and quickly got used to the fit. I never took an individual photo in the dress, but would like to mention that i covered both breasts with the sash and tied the knot high on the dress and was very pleased with the clean line it produced across my chest. If i had the opportunity, i would purchase this dress. Its a timeless piece.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an all white party/affair
links_reviews_text: Great fit, easy to put on. Can tie the side a few way, i actually didn't do a full tie, just one strap over the other and tighten it. Worked perfect and it didn't move. Beautiful material, easy to iron to get the few wrinkles out. Would definitely recommend for all white party, formal , cocktail, even as a wedding dress.
Loved the fit and material of this dress

I love this feminine dress by Grace Willow the Label. Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing a size down for your primary size. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra. You should wear a strapless bra since its such a cutoff dress.

links_reviews_title: This dress fit well, true to size lots of compliments
links_reviews_text: Dress fit true to size. I'm short and was worried about length but it fell very nicely. Awesome material. Not see through. The top is forgiving as you can tighten or loosen the tie piece and make it fit. I did not need to wear a bra. Overall loved this rental. Lots of compliments. I felt good in this dress and would absolutely rent it again!!
Wonderful dress to celebrate sisterhood in Jamaica. Although I'm small, I have wide hips. The dress fits like a glove if you have hips.
Perfect and comfy - conservative
Fits perfect and so elegant!

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove! Felt amazing in this dress
Not the best dress for athletic girls.
links_reviews_text: I wasn't a fan of this dress. It didn't flatter my figure in the least bit. A lot of the reviews claimed it ran true to size, I went with a 4 or small and it was very large on me.
This is a beautiful dress and beautiful fabric but it is not lined and runs very tight so it shows every dimple.
Gorgeous dress and got compliments
Not quite what I was looking for. Did not fit well with baby bump at all

links_reviews_title: Very cute, but sizing is very large.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a Small and Medium. The small is labeled US 6/S and medium is labeled US 8/M. I tend to wear a Small and size 2-4, so I was surprised to see a 6 labeled as small. Being wide at the hips, the small ended up being ok but the chest was still very large. Luckily I was able to fake it with a padded bra and the tie over kind of distracted from the roominess of the chest. But there was no way I could even attempt to wear my backup size, the Medium.

links_reviews_title: Was perfect for a whit party. Fit amazing and extremely comfortable! Would absolutely rent again.
links_reviews_text: Pro- Fit perfect

links_reviews_title: Friends told me I looked like a movie star! Very slimming and comfortable dress.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable and fitting dress but a little difficult to figure out how the strap tied. This dress got a lot of compliments and is great for any formal event.

This dress is beautiful and I would have worn had I gotten a 4. I ordered a 4 and 6 for my backup, but received a 6 and 8. Luckily RTR overnighted me two more selections and one of those fit. Another con is the material isn't thick nor lined enough so you can see everything in the rear. I might try this one again in the future.

links_reviews_title: The wrap and tie are a bit awkward. It looks beautiful on some but just not me.
links_reviews_text: This dress was very large for the size. I am a 2-4 and ordered an S and M and was swimming in the small. I have a small bust and the structured top was popping off my chest it was so large on me. Went with my alternate dress and was very happy. Wish RTR had more white options for bridal events.

Loved this wrap dress so so much! You can appreciate the quality of the dress through just the rich colors alone. It fit perfectly! I pinned the top just a bit but loved this dress! It's so flattering!!
I loved the pattern and quality of this dress - but I'd be lying if I said I didn't feel like I was wearing a fancy bathrobe. The wrap is super flattering though! Would definitely rent this again.

I have to admit, the fabric was so much lighter than I expected. I was wary until I put it on--and then I loved it! It's a flattering and feminine fit and the print is cool Too. Larger-chested women will likely need to pin the cross at the chest, or wear a tank underneath. Also, while the dress does have a lot of coverage at the front opening, and a short hemline underneath, if the breeze is too strong, you may reveal a lot of leg!
Such a cute dress for day to night - will definitely be renting again this fall!

links_reviews_title: Get compliments every time I wear it
links_reviews_text: Very cute dress for work or date night. Wore this to one of my first sales meetings and I got compliments from even the airline staff. I love how comfortable it is but also beautiful. I wore this at least 4 times and will be renting it again.

I wore this out to dinner and drinks with a friend and felt super cute! If you sit cross legged or walk outside on a windy day the slit will open but I didn't have too much trouble with it. The deeper V-neckline made me rethink wearing it again to work but I would definitely wear this dress again.
Super cute and flattering!!

links_reviews_title: Pockets, bell sleeves and so much more!
links_reviews_text: this dress has a lot going for it. Wrap closure makes it cinched at the waist, the neckline is flattering but not too low cut, the material has this cool matte sheen that feels high end and the bell sleeves add subtle flare (sometimes I find these can look ridiculous, being short). And best of all, pockets! Wore three times and would definitely rent again!

The perfect work to dinner dress. I felt amazing in it. I have a small bust and large hips so I had to pin the top but that's something I have to do for every wrap dress. The pattern stands out and I got compliments all day long!
I love this dress. It really does fit like a robe, which means it is comfortable and flowy but somehow still looks put together. My only criticism is that it was super-staticky.
I loved this dress. It can be worn in any season. The print pretty and the wrap dress is very flattering for most body types.

links_reviews_title: Kind of see through but layered and it worked!

links_reviews_text: The dress is very fun and cute, but the neckline is very low. I am not large-chested or particularly conservative, and even I had to pin the dress to keep the top from spilling open. It looked fine with the pin. Would probably rent again.

links_reviews_title: Wish I had loved it more
links_reviews_text: Really loved the look of this dress but the top area ran pretty small and I am pretty small chested. The dress has pockets and while I usually love that, the placement of them just made me look hippy. So between the tight fitting top and the adding padding on the top, it wasn't for me.
Received so many compliments. The fit, pops of color and quality were perfect. I wore with low ankle booties. For a 5'1 37 year old, this midi dress was flattering and stylish.

links_reviews_title: A true wrap dress - be mindful if wearing to an office or somewhere conservative!
links_reviews_text: Didn't realize that this is truly one sheet of fabric that wraps around you - I may not have rented it for the office. That said, I wore it anyway and made it through the day without flashing anyone. The wrap/tie are strong enough to stay put, more or less. If you went outside on a breezy day, however, it might be another story ...

Wish I would have taken a picture! Lovely fall colors, loose but flattering with the wrap dress style. Slightly low cut so maybe larger chests may show more cleavage. Loved the pattern, colors, fit (jcrew 8 normally, got the 6 in this): great dress for a long night at a wedding!
Can size down as it is mostly a wrap dress.
Great lightweight fabric that flowed. Nice quality and fabric and quality stitching. Great length and cut of the top. Would have considered buying if it weren't so expensive.
I love a fancy bathrobe dress and this was not that. Pattern was kind of dull, material was kind of dull, and the cut was nothing special. Returned without wearing.

links_reviews_title: Amazing wrap dress. Well tailored and flattering
links_reviews_text: Not your average wrap dress. Had a button that kept the waist in place. The fabric is quite thin but there is lining in the butt area so your underwear doesn't show through.

Very pretty print and comfortable. Liked that it was midi length - wore with ankle boots. Given the color I thought this dress might be great for the winter - but I was wrong. Super staticy, and generally unlined. The top part is very low so I had to wear a tank top (and I am small chested). I found the pockets to be weirdly balloon-ish on my hips. Cute in theory but wouldn't rent again.
Gorgeous comfortable dress
This was a great year round wrap dress. It was a bit low cut for work though and troublesome on a windy day

I received so many compliments on this dress! It wraps around and needed to be pinned so as not to show off too much chest area, but overall, it was such a cute and chic dress! It is a midi length and I'm tall so probably not the best fit for a shorter gal.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, comfortable. Not my favorite.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress to work and it was super comfortable and pretty. The material wrinkles easily which is not good for sitting all day. I liked this dress but wouldn't rent again.
This is a lovely dress that is much prettier in real life. It has a beautiful cut and a unique silhouette. The fabric also feels expensive, and the print is very pretty.

Great dress, I got lots of compliments. Beautiful in real life and wearable for work. Watch out on windy days or sitting cross legged at your desk - since it's a wrap dress, I was exposed a few times!

links_reviews_title: It was just a little low cut for work but I went for it anyway.
links_reviews_text: The fabric was very thin, but it was lined on the bottom. It wasn't a WOW dress, but you also can't really go wrong with it.
I rented this for a fun photo shoot with my best friend and it was so comfy and photographed so well. It is long so I had to wear heels since I'm short but if you don't mind, then it's perfect!
Cute, but wrinkles easily and will show your underwear lines. Wore once.

links_reviews_title: Add blazer for work/take it off for Play
links_reviews_text: I loved the color! It felt modern and trendy. I have a large chest, some love handles and long legs but this was SO very flattering! Without the jacket it was perfect for brunch/lunch with the hubs or friends. With the jacket you can see I put a little professional spin on it. The only thing that wasn't perfect was that the arm straps were too big even when tightened the tightest they could go so the straps fell down on my shoulders every once in awhile but I would still rent this again for sure.

Wore this to a food and wine festival and loved it. Was large in the waist and hips, but the tie in the back makes it adjustable. Wish the inseam would have been a tiny bit longer. Will wear again while I have it!
Tight when I first opened it but walked around to loosen it up. Short on me due to thighs so could only wear flats. Would rent again! Cute.

Wore multiple times, very comfortable and surprisingly a little forgiving for a jumpsuit. Straps were a little long even tough tightened all the way so slipped off shoulder a few times but otherwise loved this jumpsuit. Wore with a beige lace bandeau. Perfect length with a small wedge heel.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for dinner at the beach!!
links_reviews_text: Such a great fit!!
I wore this for a Cinco De Mayo party. I can't even count the number of compliments I received. Sizing was perfect!

Felt great in that case once I figured out how to wear it with a little precarious getting tied into it needed help from my daughter to tie in and then realized I probably wouldn't be able to go to the bathroom without taking somebody with me but absolutely adorable the shoulder straps even taken all the way and we're a little bit long for my 5 foot for torso and figuring out what bra to wear with that was a bit of a challenge for boobs in their 40s. But once I was strapped in felt great
The material was cheaper than expected. It is a little see through. I wanted it for a party and decided it would be better suited for a beach vacation.

The weather changed for the event I was wearing this outfit for, so I paired it with a light cardigan. The fit was a bit awkward at first (XS for my size 2, five foot frame), but after steaming out the wrinkles the fit was perfect. I did have to use some fabric tape for the hem, folded once, to be the right length with my four inch wedge heels. Since the back is exposed, using a nue bra worked well, especially since the fabric will visibly outline your breasts and areolas if you go bare. Using the restroom was a challenge, but as expected when wearing a jumpsuit.

links_reviews_title: Cute color, but ill fitting and worn.
links_reviews_text: The color is adorable, but the fabric is really worn. I have a large bust (34D), and this top of the size small was falling off me, and even with the straps tightened all the way, it was about two inches too long in the torso. Also the waist was really tight, but the butt/inseam was really dumpy. Maybe that's just because I have narrow hips (35) and a larger waist (26), but I'm pretty much a straight up size 2/XS/26 with boobs, and this just fit me weird. I'm 5 ft. 4. for reference, so almost average height, though my torso is short. The back was super cute, though!
It's cute, but see through and impossible to wear a bra. I could not wear it out.
I couldn't get this up to zip the pants completely. Smaller in the bottom half than my normal size
I didn't end up wearing this, however it is cute on. I was wanting to wear flats with it but the pant leg is really long.

links_reviews_title: Loved the back, not the front
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was way too tight and short which was disappointing because I've had good luck with the RTR fit recommendations so far. The back looked cute, but the front emphasized and clung to my hips and thighs and NOT in a good way.

links_reviews_title: Fit a little snug in the tummy area on me! It fit a little large in the chest.
links_reviews_text: It was super cute and would have been perfect with some spanx, but I was getting it for vacation and didn’t really want to wear spanx with it.
Definitely gives u some length
I loved the style and color. The fit was good except that it did stretch out after a few hours and the straps were big on my frame, but overall a great jumpsuit.
I really liked this dress, so much that I purchased it. I wore it many times and to different occasions and got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my birthday. It was perfect for my surprise party !
links_reviews_text: True to size but was a little baggy in the middle

links_reviews_title: It worked for a night out
links_reviews_text: I could have ordered a 12R or 8, I could have went a size down 10R/6 and I believe the dress would have been perfect. The underlying slip was beyond annoying! It is about half the length of the skirt and kept riding up. The fabric of the dress is stretch and very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress and would rent again! I wore for a charity event.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size and was very flattering. I didn't opt for spanks but it is very form fitting. I was able to not wear a bra; the material is very spandex like and a little thicker (in a good way) so was very forgiving.

links_reviews_title: The wedding was very personal and touching, but also fun!
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress! It has the perfect amount of stretch, while still holding everything in. It was formal enough for a wedding, but was a fun/ unique choice. The dress felt true to size- I am typically a 4.

It was pretty tight. I weigh 140 lbs, 5'6'' and normally wear a 4 or 6. It also came up higher than I expected. All that to say, I still loved the dress. It was stretchy enough that it wasn't too tight and looked great on me. I would just go at least a size up from your normal. One of my favorite parts was how thick the material was, which was great for a winter wedding.
I'm normally between a size 4-6, the 6 for best (10). Loved the dress, felt comfortable and sexy!

This was so comfy and glam for a winter gala. I loved the one shoulder and cut out -- sexy but low maintenance. Only warning for this is that it is a bit long for short girls. I ended up folding it under to create my own mini hem, so it's about two inches shorter in my photo.
You can't go wrong with this dress! Classy yet sexy, fit true to size! Lots of compliments. Highly recommend!! Just note that sizes are in UK so I got the 12R which is US size 8.

Beautiful dress, fabric is nice and heavy. Fit is great, but the style of dress requires a certain type of bra. I worried a bit about revealing boob from the top or side cut out but it worked out well. I felt beautiful and classy but a little sassy for a work party :)

links_reviews_title: Absolutely LOVED everything about this dress!
links_reviews_text: This was one of the most comfortable dresses I have ever worn. The cutout added a sexy flare without being too revealing. The bottom fabric layer did want to stick to the dress and I felt like I had to keep pulling it down. I'm only 5'2 so I was a bit worried about the length but it ended up working fine!

I wore for a semi-formal wedding. The length of the dress was perfect for a winter wedding and the fabric/thickness of it was stretchy enough to both eat and dance (and stay warm). The fabric fit really well and was true to size. It was the perfect mix of comfy and subtly sexy. I would highly recommend!
Wore this to a black tie NYE wedding and it was a showstopper! So comfortable to dance in. It is very form fitting, thick and stretchy so don't be afraid to size up one.

This dress was perfect for a semi-formal occasion! It was the right length for me. Some ladies had on long dresses. Some had on short. I was right in the middle. I only wish I had ordered a size smaller. I am 5 ft, 167lbs and I wore a US10/UK14...I think. Overall great choice!! Get it!
It fit like a glove and I got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Black beauty! Cute cutout showed off tattoo.
links_reviews_text: Normally I wear a size 10, got the 14R based on other reviews and it worked very nicely!

The fit was perfect but the length was too much for my 5'3" self. Fabric is thick, stretchy & comfortable. The only thing I didn't like was that the seam of the lining wouldn't lie flat & I felt it emphasized my upper thighs. If I didn't have better choices I would have worn it, but this just wasn't right for me.

I'm 2 months postpartum and am larger in the chest than waist and hip, which makes finding a dress hard. This had enough stretch to accommodate my boobs and still feel fitted enough in the body. Heavy enough fabric that it was warm. I got lots of compliments and felt like I wasn't trying too hard to look sexy after having a baby.

I wore a size up from my normal size and it fit perfectly. I'm size 6-8 and 34DD so it's important a dress fit in the busy area and not show much cleavage for work type events. This dress is great and shows just the right amount of skin. Fabric is nice and thick and very forgiving. I highly recommend.

This dress fit perfectly. It was a snug, comfortable fit and I didn't even have to wear a bra!!! I felt amazing at my event & this dress gave me all the confidence.... received lot's of compliments too!

The one shoulder design and cutout makes elevates this simple black dress. The material is stretchy and comfortable, and the cutout is placed low enough that you can actually wear a bra. Wore this dress to a Christmas party, and also to dinner with friends. Worked perfectly for both occasions.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress great fit even for big hips curvy body
links_reviews_text: Glam Great for Think fabric
The dress has a great fit. A little bit of stretch which was good for me chasing after a toddler at this event. The cut out on the side was flattering. I am so glad I rented it!
I didn't end up wearing this dress to my event but it was a hard choice !

This dress is serious understated sexy. Be aware you need a strapless bra but double sided tape is better. Make sure you get your exact size or even a tad smaller because it needs to hug curves. The material is stretchy but also lifts. Love this dress; got compliments all night!
Great dress. Thick fabric with a good bit of stretch! Was complimented all night!

I really loved the length of this dress. It is form fitting but the length means you never have to worry about this dress riding up. However, I do have to say that the lining inside the dress is a shorter length than the actual dress, so that does ride up.... which was a bit annoying. But overall I loved the look of the dress and the peekaboo side.

This dress was so beautiful on and really hugged your body. The fabric was thick enough to hold in all the right places, but not too thick to be sweating all night. I love the length of the dress and the cut out, it was a nice little sexy detail. I got so many compliments at the wedding and would definitely recommend it to anyone wanting a sleek and chic look.

The edges of this dress were not finished properly. They were rough with loose strings. It was tight on the top, but loose around the hips. The fabric would bunch and looked unflattering. The pros are that the material is thick and comfortable.

I rented a 6, which was the size recommended to me. I usually wear smalls in dresses, for reference. This was almost impossible to zip up. And the right fit made the cut out not very flattering. But I loved the one-shoulder/sleeve design

This dress is amazing! SO many compliments. I usually wear a size 4 & the 8R fit just right. The fabric is thick (no spank needed) and has a really nice amount of stretch. It was perfect for a fancy wedding & going out dancing afterwards. The cut is super flattering, very sexy, but provides full coverage. Loved it so much I wish I owned it! One of my all time favorite RTR dresses!

links_reviews_title: Great dress thick fabric. I wear a M 125lbs 5'6 ordered a 6R too small should have gone for a 8R
links_reviews_text: Great dress thick fabric. I wear a M 125lbs 5'6 ordered a 6R too small should have gone for a 8R

Wore this dress to a wedding and it was perfect! I was nervous I usually wear a 6 and would have been a 10R but it was not available so I got a 8R and it was a little tight but worked! I got so many compliments!!
Fits perfect! So beautiful, sexy and elegant...!

links_reviews_title: Bodycon, but material thick enough to be forgiving.
links_reviews_text: When correlated to US sizes, the fit was true. Only draw backs of this dress were the liner (way too short, barely hitting below the underwear line), and the hanger loop just under the cut out (tried to peak out all night long). Otherwise, another head turner from Bec + Bridge.
It fits perfectly! Great material with a glamorous look.

I LOVED this dress! Really comfortable and flattering, I received compliments all night long! Thicker, stretchy material kept me nice and warm for a winter wedding in PA. Was nervous it would be too long on my 5'4" frame but length was mid-calf. I wore the 10R (typically a US 6) which was TTS based on size recommendations. I also got 8R as backup and it was too tight on my chest and hips (I'm 135 lb, 36B, athletic to hourglass body shape & 1yr post-partum). Might be too long for girls shorter than myself getting the 8R or 10R.

I loved this dress and really wanted to wear it to my event. It's super stretchy and comfortable and there was great potential for an awesome outfit. The length, however, is what put me off. It's not quite tea length, though well over knee length, which gave my body shape a super wide hip illusion. If I owned the dress I wouldv'e brought the hem up to the knee and I'm sure I would have loved it. I'm 5'6 so if you're my height or shorter and have curvy hips, just be aware that the dress might not flatter. (Worth a try though!)

links_reviews_title: Great fit and flattering without being too much
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit. Great for a special look for a party or event. Probably would rent again. My only thing was that the underskirt was riding up a bit all night.

This dress is perfect for a casual summer day. The material is a little heavy, but the dress is still very comfortable. The wrap feature allows you to make it as tight as you'd like, and the eyelet design adds just enough design. The color is perfect and I felt pretty. The shoulders were a little tight, but I think that was due to my bust more than the dress.

links_reviews_title: Great color and being tall, this was a really nice length. Beware petite gals.
links_reviews_text: This was the perfect dress for my daughter's graduation celebration. It tends to be a bit low cut but still remained classy.

links_reviews_title: The fit irritated me all day
links_reviews_text: Overall it's a pretty dress and I received a lot of compliments. It was too big up top and i was constantly having to pull it shut to not expose my bra. It dips down awkwardly in the front and just made me look matronly. I was so excited about this dress but the fit was just off.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful but needed a lot of work to get it right
links_reviews_text: When I first put this dress on I wasn't excited about it. It was very wrinkled and didn't lay right, and the top part of the dress was too big on me. But after multiple runs of the iron, and some temporary last minute tailoring on the top, it finally felt right but it was A LOT of dress.
