At the evening event, I wore a different dress, but people came up to me and complimented that green dress I wore earlier in the day! I was 19 weeks pregnant, have a larger waist, and smaller bust.
This didn't make me feel young and pretty. Very matronly. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Great color but too much dress for a small body.
links_reviews_text: Too long for me at 5'2" in heels.

This is a beautiful wrap dress, but wasn't for me. I sized up to an XL to accommodate my chest (32G), but the resulting volume at the waist and hips wasn't particularly flattering. The fabric is bulky, so I wouldn't worry about any wind, but the bulk ones of the fabric exacerbates the fit issues. It's also very long. I'm 5'6", and it came down to the floor. So if you're looking for a very feminine, spring dress and have a less exaggerated hourglass than I do, it would be a great pick.
Practically perfect in every way. Don't miss the unique dress.

I wore this to work, had to press it upon arrival. I had to add a cami for appropriate work cleavage. It was perfect length, longest lace point hit just above ankle. I power work my NYC commute. I noticed a bit of holding the wrap closed. But not tripping, a bit of hiking for the stairs. oo and pockets!!!

links_reviews_title: I was unable to wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: I sadly had to return this dress for another option. The wrap-around top was far too revealing and barely closed, and I am barely a B. Otherwise, I loved this dress, and I wish it fit! However, the customer service was OUTSTANDING as usual, and I had a new dress within 24 hours.

The fabric was nice but there was way too much of it. Way too low cut to wear alone (unless without a bra). Unfortunately I didn't have the opportunity to take photos because I immediately tripped over it and fell, ripping the hem too much to wear. Had to scramble to change into something else. It was weird because when I looked at myself in the mirror, I didn't think it looked that long on me at 5'8". The chest was small.

I wanted to like this dress, but there aren't many positive things to say about it beyond the color. I felt like I was drowning in fabric. The length was much longer than pictured. The neckline was waaaaay too low - and I'm not even large chested. It also wrinkles easily.
Looks beautiful, but it was shapeless.
Too Little House on the Prairie

Cute dress for summer. I am tall and it hit pretty long. Love the wrap. Would be very difficult for anyone who is larger chested - I am smaller and still had to wear a sticky bra low and use a safety pin.

links_reviews_title: It is a pretty dress but would probably be better suited for taller girls (I'm 5'3).
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little longer than I would've liked and felt heavier on than I anticipated. Pretty dress, but just not what I was expecting.

links_reviews_title: If you have a larger bust, I would go up a size!
links_reviews_text: For a larger bust, I would go up a size. It's also longer....I'm 5'5" and could get away with the S for the LENGTH but the bust was too small. I'm afraid if I wore a M, then it would have been to long to wear with sandals!

links_reviews_title: Fun night out with my husband.
links_reviews_text: Bust is low, the fabric is warm works well for cool evening. It bunches some around the waist, did not feel super flattering. Must be steamed upon arrival.

This was a beautiful dress with such a gorgeous green, but I should have gone with a medium instead of a large. I have a small waist, but a big bust and a huge bum, which means I sometimes fit nicely into a size 4, 6, and 8. This size felt like a true large and a medium would have been a better fit for me, especially up top.

links_reviews_title: Pretty, just didn't pair with the outfit I envisioned
links_reviews_text: Beautiful skirt, period. I had an idea in my head to pair it with a white crop top (like model), or a tucked in tshirt and sneakers for a super casual look, but it just didn't work for me. I'm in between a 12/14, and where the skirt hit was just a little too high on my torso to pull off either look. Threw on a dressier top just for this pic... it's beautiful, just not what I was looking for in this moment. I'm sure will rent for a more formal event in the future.
So comfortable and effortless!

I have a small waist and am curvy. I usually wear a 6 in jeans, an 8 in dresses. I had to take the large in this skirt bc it runs very snug. (Thank u to previous reviewers) The waist was perfect for me. I'm 5'6" and wore 3" heels and the length was just at top of my toes. I paired with a belt bc the ribbon waist seemed unfinished for me. I bought this bc I could see it working for a number of purposes. It's extremely flattering but would be very fitted on someone who typically wears a large.
Great fit, not to tight, comfortable to move in, so many compliments on the sparkle!

I am 5'3 and about 128lbs, I wore really y'all wedges and then it was perfect. I didn't have a second size, bc it was unavailable. It wasn't right at all, I prob could have done a small but bc I wore a cropped top I was thankful for it being loose! Had compliments all night it was very comfortable and effortlessly elegant! I rented the top I wore on RTR also! Would 10/10 rent again!

Would usually wear medium but for high waisted skirts I always tend to size up. This was perfect when sizing up. Wore it to a wedding with a fun top and received many compliments. Definitely happy with this one timer.

Wish it were a bit stretchier, but still a standout piece. I'm always a size small and the small felt a tiny bit too small. Pinched me a bit at the top. The medium was definitely too big though. I was worried it would look more unflattering in photos, but it looked just fine. Because it was a zip up and not stretchy, wasn't as comfortable to sit in. Beautiful skirt though. I'm 5'6 and wore flats. Probably could have worn a modest heel if I wanted to, though.

links_reviews_title: Received tons of compliments wearing this skirt
links_reviews_text: I paired this beautiful skirt with a crisp white dress shirt and a black statement necklace for a fundraising gala. It was comfortable and fun to wear. As others stated, it was right in the waist so I wore the XL. I recommend ordering a size up, but highly recommend renting this!

links_reviews_title: It was our annual holiday work party.
links_reviews_text: Lots of compliments on the skirt. However, I almost didn’t wear it. The band was so unforgiving that I had to wear it higher than my natural waist line and I was wearing the XL. I got that squishy kind of extra pooch and even with spanx I felt like it digged in a bit to much especially for sitting. Standing it was fine. Even if I could have worn it on my natural waist line I would’ve had trouble with it dragging on the floor b/c I ended up wearing 4 inch heels.

My first RTR experience and I loved it! So easy and organized. I usually wear a size 8 or 10, and can often fit into size M. However, with this skirt, I could not even get close to zipping up the size M! So glad that you can add a backup size to your order. Size up, ladies! Size L fit comfortably. I am 5'7" and wore 2-inch wedge heels, and the hem was a bit higher than I wanted - would've preferred it brushing/touching the floor, but it was an inch or 2 higher. I got great compliments on this skirt and it is a great price! If you have sensitive skin, just be careful - my arms got a little scratched from the sequins, but that's the risk you take when wearing sequins. Otherwise, it was very comfortable and fun to wear.

links_reviews_title: perfect maxi. Uber sparkly. Can but dressed up or down, if you're daring. I wore this to NYFW
links_reviews_text: I found it to be somewhat but small. There is no stretch in the waist. Must wear heels for length.

This really is a gorgeous skirt! I ordered the MR and the LR, wore the LR but could have done the XLR. It fit everywhere except the waistband was pretty tight and created a bit of a roll when sitting down. Length was perfect with heels! Would rent again!

This is amazing!! I may end up buying just so I can keep it hanging in my closet. Loved it. Heavier than what you think, the beaded pattern is gorgeous. Fully lined. I dressed this down with plaid. Worked perfectly!! One of my favs, for certain!
Gorgeous with a black turtleneck, not too flashy with a subtle top. No give in the waist of the skirt but fits TTS.

links_reviews_title: This skirt was so perfect for a black tie event with my co-workers. Felt classy but professional.
links_reviews_text: I ordered the M but ended up going with L because of how it fell around my stomach and hips. Very comfortable to wear and drapes well. Had to wear heels with the L because of length but wouldn’t have had to with the M. I really want to purchase this skirt. It’s very versatile.
Compliments ALL night long! True to size, wore it with a plain tank top

I wore this to a formal movie premiere. I am 5'-11" and 142 lbs. I usually wear a size 8. The large/regular fit perfectly. The sequin pattern is gorgeous. I wore with 2" heels, a black tank top and leather biker jacket. For the less formal evening event, I changed into flat booties and a knotted/cropped concert rock T-shirt. Overall I would say the fit runs a bit small and if you are tall and want to wear super high heels, it may not be long enough to graze the floor. Thanks RTR for helping me look my best XOXO -C
Elegant skirt. Wore to a cocktail party, and it was very comfortable to move around in, i was a little worried the beads would get caught on my shirt but there is lining.
The lining of this can get caught in your shoes if you're not careful. Otherwise, one of my favorite RTR rentals!

It's the second time I've rented this skirt and I absolutely love it. The sequins detail is just beautiful. I'm a violin player so I have regular performances and this skirt just stands out! It is a bit heavy because of the embroidery detail but nothing too hard to manage. True to size. I also went with it to a dinner and received multiple compliments. The perfect alternative to a dress.

links_reviews_title: A fabulous skirt for a fabulous evening!
links_reviews_text: I wasn't sure how wearing this skirt would go - to be honest, I'd seen other reviews from folks my size that said it wouldn't fit me, but I needed to have hope, as I was attending a gala and needed a 2-piece outfit to hide a medical device I was stuck wearing at the time. I got both the large and extra large and the XL fit like a glove. I did not try the large because of how perfectly the XL fit. As a shorty, I *did* have to wear it with 3" heels and pulled up to just under my bra-line for correct length, but it was just perfect. It stayed put all night with no trouble, including during fairly active dancing. The only downside to wearing it like I did is that during the sitting portion of the event, some of the sequins were rubbing on bare skin over my ribs. Next time I think I'll wear some sort of light shapewear to prevent chafing from the sequins.

Absolutely loved this skirt, rented from RTR and for the first time truly did not want to send back. I'd say it was slightly on the smaller side only because it didn't have any give, so I definitely went with my larger back up size. Length was great, wore flats bc I wanted to be comfortable and was fine, although I could have worn heels and been fine too. The quality was amazing and it moved and sparkled beautifully. Would definitely rent again (or purchase)!
I paired with with my fave leather sneakers and denim shirt for a casual chic vibe.

I could have worn the small but since it was New Years and I knew I would be walking around a lot I wore the medium to be more comfortable. I think the glitter is the right amount of shine without being over the top. Id rent this again!
Beautiful shirt, was a little heavy and long but not bad, would defiantly recommend

links_reviews_title: The Perfect sparkle for New Years Eve!
links_reviews_text: It does run a little smaller. I ended up going with the up size because I wanted it to be a little longer as well as some more room in the waist. It is supposed to fit at your natural waistline. Received some amazing complements!

Beautiful sparkly skirt, fits true to size, perfect length, worked perfectly with a velvet top and belt to give it more shape! All of the ladies in this pic are wearing RTR too! I'll definitely use RTR again!

I paired this skirt with a simple black crop top for a formal holiday party. It fits very true to size, and with me being only 5'4" it allowed me to wear heels, but I didn't have to wear the highest ones I own, like I typically would with a long dress/skirt. I received compliments all night long and we had a blast! I was sad to give it back!

The skirt sparkles so much, really making a statement. I wore it as the conductor at a choir concert. However, the small was a bit big and too long for me. I wore 3 inch heals and it still was dragging. I'm 5' 6" and thought wearing heals would be enough. I probably should have ordered an XS, but that size wasn't available for the time I needed the skirt.
Worked well with a button down shirt.
I wore this skirt for an Oscars party in LA and matched it with a RTR top. It fit perfectly, and the black sparkle added a nice touch. Highly recommend!
Skirt fit perfect. The sequins really stood out and in the sun looked amazing. This was my bridesmaid outfit and I loved it. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great Skirt! got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: High waisted. A little snug but fit great over all. I am only 5'2" and length was perfect with heels
I'm a 12/14 and the XL fit at my natural waist, but at 6' it was a little too short

links_reviews_title: Choosing this skirt allowed me to customize my look, ensuring I was wearing a unique outfit!
links_reviews_text: The skirt fit well overall and I love how it sparkled. I'm 5'6" and 172 lbs. I usually wear a size 10 dress and ended up wearing the large. I wore the skirt with 2" heels, which was just right to prevent it from dragging.

links_reviews_title: I wore this skirt to Prom
links_reviews_text: I wore this skirt with the Elizabeth and James Black Perla Top, and they paired very well together. I ordered a small and medium skirt, and ended up wearing the small as the medium skirt looked too baggy. The only issue, however, is that when zipped all the way, the waistband felt very tight and made my stomach unflattering, so I solved this problem by simply rolling the waistband of the skirt over once. Looked perfect and got a lot of compliments on this classic look!

This skirt was perfect for a company Christmas party. I received tons of compliments. I wore a petit skirt underneath to give it more volume. For the top, I grabbed a white crop top from Forever 21. This skirt runs small in my opinion. I usually wear and 8 or Medium in most clothes, I couldn't even zip the Medium in this skirt.

I loved the skirt as it paired very well with button down shirt and I got so many complements for it. I think you can go very formal/ fun party look or classic and semi formal depends on what you are pairing with it. Very Versatile piece! The length was slightly long for me - i was wearing 4.5" heal, and after wearing heal, it was less that 0.5" on the floor... So it could be just way I am standing. But other wise it was perfectly fitting me! I usually have hard time that fits me well without alteration. I would definitely recommend it!!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: The fit goes best with a tight top. It made my waist look tiny and the way it flows from the hips is perfect. The length was perfect for heels and flats. I have never been more comfortable and looked formal ready. I highly recommend this skirt.
Love this skirt! Very flowy and flattering fit. Skirt was at belly button, but was still long enough to wear heels
Usually a SM or XS, but RTR suggested that I size up. The M Was super comfortable but maybe a little too roomy, especially up top. I think the SM would've been more flattering!

I loved the adjustable straps! This was super cute for my sons Winnie the Pooh themed birthday party in late summer. So comfortable which allowed me to host and move around . Only flaw is there are no pockets but it's a win. I wore it with simple white keds sneakers to keep it casual.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a big college football tailgate. Could be great for brunch, baby shower, etc.
links_reviews_text: This was really cute but it did make my booty look flat. Could be user issue. :) It was comfortable and the top was really cute.
I have a longer torso and this was not uncomfortable like some jumpsuits can be. The gingham material at the bottom can wrinkle easy but nothing a little steam didn't fix.

Fun spring jumper. I'm a 34C/D - the chest is cut very oddly as it's tight up top and flattens your boobs down to your belly button. The girth was a too long and gathers awkwardly, but still got several compliments

This romper was so cute and classy. Few things that bothered me was; the boob part is weird, it flattens your boobs and makes it look saggy, but this can be adjusted and manipulated, no one could really notice. Also, there is no hook at the top of zipper, so my zipper kept unzipping someone whenever I sat or bent over. Overall though, I liked it and got many compliments

Other reviewers suggested sizing up in the jumpsuit and I definitely agree! I am 5'9 and usually a size 6. I ordered a Medium and Large, the medium was small, especially in the butt. But the large fit perfectly with enough room to be comfortable! I got so many compliments on it too!
Loved this! Fit so perfect and felt great! Wore this to my best friends bridal shower. Will rent again. Paired with nice heels

links_reviews_title: Cuter in theory than on so didn't end up wearing it
links_reviews_text: The location for my boobs to go was kinda confusing. The darts were lower than I thought they should be so i tightened the straps but then it looked a little silly and gave me a cameltoe. If I tried to loosen the straps and make cleavage, the bodice didn't have room so I got flattened. The outfit was so cute in theory but since I had a few more flattering options I didn't choose it. In this pic I am wearing a Medium and am 5'8", 140, 34D.
The peplum was fun and I got a lot of complements on this outfit. Not great if you have large boobs. It was fine for me without a bra.

Rented this for vacation but it was a little snug for me to zip at the top (I have a broad rib cage). Ended up not taking it because I felt like I wouldn't be very comfortable and after all, vacation is vacation!

links_reviews_title: True to size. Perfect outfit for summer vibe!
links_reviews_text: Better have a jacket to go with this
The fit was true to size. Straps are adjustable as well
I love how your can dress this outfit up or you can dress it down! Th colors and fabric perfect. Thinking of buying it.
So cute! It was the perfect length for my torso. Ran true to size. Only complaint was that it arrived wrinkled and I had to iron it out, otherwise I really enjoyed this! I wish I had kept it longer,
I'm obsessed with this jumpsuit! It fit perfectly in all the right places! There is no stretch, but the straps are adjustable! I want to wear this every day, I wish it came in more colors!
Loved! I could have worn the small, but it was out of stock. Loved it anyway! So many compliments!
Absolutely loved this outfit. I got so many compliments and felt great in it. I wore this for my stock the bar party!!

I wore this outfit to an outdoor party in June. It was perfect! I received a ton of compliments and it looked great in all my pictures. Loved the blue and white colors. I usually wear an XS and went with the XS on this outfit but it definitely was a little tight in the bust. The pants part fit fine, it was only the top that was slightly tight. I know other reviews said they had some wrinkling in the pants and that's to be expected with the fabric, but at my event I was standing a lot so I didn't experience that issue. Overall, it was a super cute outfit and I would definitely recommend it!

Love this jumper so much. It is super flattering and I got tons of compliments. My only complaint is the zipper slid down (which I had read in someone else's review) but as long as you have good friends to watch your back , it's great!

I rented this romper for a Mother's Day brunch I went too. It was perfect for a day time event! The fit was cute but this romper definitely runs on the small size so definitely size up when ordering. The only con to this romper would be the way it easily wrinkles after sitting down. Otherwise it was a great rental!

Cute jumpsuit for cinco de mayo / kentucky derby weekend! Bottom was a little snug - the large fits like a six. Normally a 6 dress and 8 pants and it was a snug bottom fit. Overall, cute. Lots of compliments!

Amazing fit. It is super slimming and perfect for casual to formal events. I wore this to my sister's engagement party outside and it was a hit. I loved how it looked in person and it photographed well, too! I did have to size up from the XS last minute because I will say the top is a little tight. I did not wear a bra and the S just zipped. I am usually a XS-S no problem. The outfit is lightweight and the white lace top is super cute.

This piece was so perfect ! I was so worrisome about renting this because jumpsuits will sometimes make me look like i have a "kangaroo pouch" and i don't like that . But this, was great ! It was a very comfortable fit and hugged in all the right places. If you're thinking about renting it, do it (& size up for back up)!!
Worn to a big, family brunch. Loved the seersucker bottom, but it does wrinkle easy.
Wore this to a daytime birthday party. The chest/rib cage area was a little tight and uncomfortable was my only con.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments for summer wedding by the sea
links_reviews_text: Great fit, very flattering and wedding appropriate. Comfortable to dance in all night long! Breathable material. One negative is that the back zipper kept coming undone - there was no clasp, so I had to improvise with safety pins. Luckily nobody really noticed, but the back zipper is definitely a flaw. I'd recommend sizing up to avoid the zipper from popping open, or be prepared with a solution.

links_reviews_title: Loved the material but it was entirely too tight and wouldn't zip.
links_reviews_text: Fit was too small.

links_reviews_title: Runs very small! I couldn't wear it
links_reviews_text: Definitely size up
I wore this jumpsuit to a friend's Derby themed rehearsal dinner. Worked great with a fun fascinator.

links_reviews_title: Zipper needs to be replaced. Kept sliding down every time I moved. Disappointed
links_reviews_text: Top quite small
If you have large thighs or hips, this may not fit. I had trouble getting it over my hips and I'm tiny! Once I pulled it over my hips, it was comfortable and very flattering!
Didn't love the way it fit

I could barely get into this. I usually wear a size 10 and this was just so unflattering. I have wide hips and it looked like my front area could not breathe! It looks so cute in the pictures and I'm so sad it didn't fit. Just beware it runs really small.
Should've sized up
I wear a 6 sometimes 8, and this wouldn't come over my hips. This is extremely small cut and better for thin straight bodies.

links_reviews_title: Super cute/good fit for short girls
links_reviews_text: Wore to my friend's bachelorette party--Fit true to size and great for petite ladies! Only complaint is I needed a bathroom buddy all day because the zipper kept getting stuck.
i loved this outfit. easy to dress up or down.
Great fit and very flattering. wore with heels for a complete outfit
Back up size up! There's no class on the zipper so it likes to run around. I'm a trusty size 4 and the small is a little tight. Medium would've been a tiny bit more roomy and comfortable.

links_reviews_title: The Perfect Dress for a Birthday Party l!
links_reviews_text: Rent the runway came through in a clutch with this dress. I found out about a surprise party for me! This dress was delivered the next day and fit like a glove! I felt like a million bucks and was proud to turn 40 while wearing it. No complaints!
So sexy and I felt so confident all night. Fit like a glove

Super cute and very well made. It was a little too wild for the party I was going to, so I went with something else, but would be fun for a night out. I'm usually a 0 or 2 and the 2 fit comfortably. The 0 probably would've worked too.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress! Wore it to dinner in Cancun. Print is slightly on the pink side.
links_reviews_text: Fit very well. Print is on the pink rather than tan side.
perfect

links_reviews_title: Wore to wedding after 6 weeks postpartum and felt great
links_reviews_text: Wore this to my brother in law's wedding. Beautiful and comfortable!
My boobs were too big for the back to zip. I am a 38DD cup. I wore a cardigan to cover the back. Other than that, it was an amazing dress!!

Received the dress a day late, but all worries were alleviated once I tried it on. It's a beautiful color and the lace detail made it unique. It was tight around my rib cage as the night went on, so I'm glad I went with the 10 (they couldn't send my backup size 8). Didn't have any issues with the lace puckering as others have mentioned. Beware that the dress is a little lower cut, so if you're looking for conservative, you might want to pick something else.

links_reviews_title: One of a kind dress at the event!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress to have as a third option and ended up loving it! It quickly became my first choice!
Beautiful dress.! Very comfortable and classy. Plenty of room to dance.

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on this dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! A little tight fitting on the bust area so I had to move up to a 6. Fit perfectly and was so flattering!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a special event!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly (which was a blessing considering that I waited too long to order and they didn't have any backup sizes available). Beautiful color and very lightweight/airy - which made it perfect for a summer wedding. I was initially worried about the slip of the skirt riding up too much and being a hassle when trying to fix it (re: dancing at the wedding), but it was never a problem! Would highly recommend this dress to your next formal wear event!

This dress was great! Perfect for a summer wedding in Seattle! It wasn't too low cut and hugged my curves in all the right ways. I will say that the zipper was tough to zip up. I got a lot of compliments, very comfy, 10/10 would recommend to anyone!

links_reviews_title: Fit perfectly with no need for spanx or bra. Very comfortable. Tends to catch on jewelry.
links_reviews_text: Does accentuate the girls so could be a problem if you do not like a low cut dress, but not too low.

This was my first experience with RTR. I was very nervous about getting the right size and actually having a dress to wear to the wedding. I couldn’t have been happier. The dress fit perfectly, I could actually have worn either size. The size 2 was a little more comfortable. It needed minimal accessories and I got lots of compliments all night long. I added tiny pins to hold bra straps in place, worked perfectly. I will definitely RTR again!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a black tie optional wedding. I received many compliments!
links_reviews_text: The 8 fit perfectly. I loved that I could wear a regular bra and that the skirt hid my stomach. I felt comfortable and beautiful and that’s a win!

links_reviews_title: This dress was elegant and comfortable. Perfect for the wedding I went to.
links_reviews_text: I have a wide back so I usually get dresses with stretch...this does not have any but fit like a glove. The shorter lining made it a little sexy without having to worry about your dress riding up. I danced all night in it ! You just need to be patient when zipping up..it can get stuck a little so hold the bottom and go slow. I would def wear this again !!

Great dress for weddings! I got so many compliments. My size was off because the original size I needed wasn't available so I needed to wear the second size and wear a belt to fix the extra fabric. This dress was so comfortable and I received so many compliments! It's true size, but be weery of the zipper. It sticks so be careful when zippering toward the middle.

Loved this dress! A little bigger in the chest area. But nothing major. I did notice it was a bit stretched out (the areas between each circle ) on some areas of the dress when I tried it on, but I forgot about it by the time I was done getting ready. I received SO many compliments. Would definitely rent again!
Great fit
This dress was perfect for engagement photos! It was very comfortable and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Loads of compliments in a dress that made me feel so comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit of this dress. Very pretty yet modest for a southern wedding. I got loads of compliments on this dress.

This dress was a gorgeous choice for my cousin's March wedding. I felt glamorous, refined, and very comfortable in this beautiful and flattering dress. So many compliments (and zero fidgeting!!) while I danced the night away with my family. The only thing I would have changed is the strange seam in the lace around mid hip. It seemed to create a bit of a "bump" on each hip. It seemed to flatten out as the night progressed (or I got used to it). Also there were no snaps (lingerie straps) inside the shoulder which would have helped the dress be truly fidget-free. LOVED IT!!!!

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and true to size. I am 5’4 about 140 and a 36C.
links_reviews_text: My husband loved it - the color, and the style. Just an all around sexy dress.

This was my back up dress but it fit like a glove! True to size. Note, the lace has a seam around thigh height that sticks out a bit. Not enough to bother me too much. It is a little low cut as well. Perfect for a winter wedding in the south.

Great length dress for any type of wedding. Now the fit is a little weird, I am 5'5 165 pounds and curvy I fit in 8-10 depending on the clothing and I ordered an 8 and a 10. The 10 fit big around the waist and the back but felt comfortable but looked too big and the 8 fit pretty good but tight around the waist, but perfect on the back and everywhere else so I went with the 8. The dress also shows a lot more cleavage than the picture I am a 36C and with the size 8 my breast were a little squished in there, but it wasn't uncomfortable. The bottom portion of the dress slides up when you are sitting down so you have to adjust it every time you stand up and since it does that the material of the actual dress does hurt your skin making it uncomfortable to sit on. overall a beautiful dress and I would rent again!

I loved the look of this dress, however it wasn't the best for my body type. I am small on top and have long legs. The "inner" part of the dress was extremely short when I sat down. However, I couldn't size up because the top was already pretty big. Overall, beautiful dress but I would not rent it again.

This was my first RTR experience, and I will absolutely use it again. The whole process was so easy! The dress was gorgeous and I got several compliments on it. I requested sizes 6 & 8 and ultimately wore the 6. I had wondered if the smaller size would be too tight around the chest, but it was perfect - it was just fitted enough that it stayed in place and did not droop, while still being comfortable.

When I first tried the dress on, I was really upset about an unfortunately placed seam that landed right at my midsection. Initially, I thought this focused attention to an area that I don't like to highlight and maybe even made it look bigger. But my fiancé took one look at it and absolutely loved it, so I decided to go with it and got tons of compliments throughout the night and ended up feeling great in it. To top it all off, it was one of the more comfortable dresses that I've ever worn.

links_reviews_title: I liked how different this dress was. Formal and professional with a little sass.
links_reviews_text: The dip in the bust does run low. It worked for me, but could be busty for other women. Also the pattern on the dress makes it flare a little on the hips, under the ribbon bust line, which was a little unflattering for me, but the dark color hid it well enough.
Tight in the ribbon at the waist. Beside that, very cute. Just had a baby and it hit what I wanted it to hide :)
The dress is very simple and can be dressed up or down. It does flare out a bit at the hips like the other reviews mentioned, but couldn't really notice. It wasn't a show stopper but it worked!
This was an amazing dress. I was complemented all night :) True to size

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress & felt beautiful in it!
links_reviews_text: I felt great fun & flirty in this beautiful dress! Very true to size. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: The be venue was back tie optional. Dress fit perfectly with venue.
links_reviews_text: I ordered 4 and 6. Was able to wear 4. Zipper was tight but very comfortable and flattering. I am small chested but if your larger cheated could be snug loved the neckline and fabric. Beverly elegant and got lots of compliments. Is a dark navy.

Rented this dress for family pictures and I was in love with the way it all turned out! This dress is perfect for an hourglass figure and small waist! It photographs well, and was very comfortable as well.
Super easy service which made traveling from out of state for a wedding incredibly easy. Dress fit and looked great. The fine crochet detail beautiful.

I got so many compliments in this dress! Loved the midi style too! The only thing is that the 10 was a little big in the chest but the 8 was too snug around my ribcage. Definitely for someone a little bustier than me but it worked!

links_reviews_title: I felt quite glam in this dress. Perfect for a cocktail-style wedding.
links_reviews_text: This was my first time using RTR. I'm so happy with how it worked out. Fit perfectly, great length. I used a regular bra. Be careful, tends to catch on things.

I loved this dress. It was perfect for an early fall wedding. The only reason I gave it four stars was because the top part was a little tight and become uncomfortable after 8 hours of wearing. If I could take the top of the size 2 and the bottom of the size 0 it would have been perfect. Other than that, I got so many compliments and the pictures came out beautiful.

This is a very elegant and beautiful dress, but it definitely has a shelf life. The 8 I received was so noticeably damaged (it was clearly torn during cleaning or by the last person who wore the dress), so I had to squeeze into the 6. The overlay is beautiful. It's a bit tight in the hips, but that could have been because I wore a size smaller than I would normally wear.

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful & so comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so incredibly comfortable & fit perfectly. I am 5'9 and the length hit perfectly at mid-calf. I got so many compliments on the dress as well! So glad I got this.

links_reviews_title: This dress is SO elegant with a beautiful fit and color
links_reviews_text: I love everything about this dress except it's a little tight around the underarms. The fit was great, the dress itself was very sturdy/well made and the color looks great on paler folks like myself. The length is modest and so is the cut but if you have larger breasts like me, they may be on display.

The overall fit was good. The chest was tight and also very low cut, so not a real modest dress. The seam in the middle of the skirt is quite noticeable, but doesn't look terribly bad. Very comfortable and classy dress for a wedding.
I have a straight and fit body. This fit was a dream because I could bend down to chat with the kids yet still feel pretty and composed.

Such a cute dress. Received compliments all night! The top is very flattering. The waist area is more loose/big which was unexpected (I have a very short torso) so I found it a little big, but nothing to stress about. The sleeves are so unique and dress can be dressed up or down. I wore it to an engagement party!

I rented this for a formal wedding and loved it! Got a ton of compliments and it fit perfectly. I tried both the 4 & 6 and went with the four with room to spare. The color is a bright blue with silver accents . I am 5’4”, 132 lbs
The fit was great

links_reviews_title: Beautifully made dress for a fun evening!
links_reviews_text: There were other reviews about the strange cut of the body of the dress. The elastic band falls in a funky spot. And the length was too short for me to pull it up to a better spot. Overall a ton of compliments and because of the pattern, couldn't tell that it was a little tight around the midsection. I was the only one nitpicking.
I rented this dress for my friends birthday party and I felt so cute in it all night!! The details are super pretty and the tie neck and open shoulder was my fav part! Would definitely recommend!
Had a great night out with my husband for his birthday. Felt just like when we met!! (lol 10 years and 3 kids l8er)

This dress is short! I'm 5'4 and have curves and I kept pulling the slip down. Beautiful dress and I loved it though. Sleeves were great they didn't itch and the wrist elastic was fine. The back kept falling down so I kept adjusting it through the night. It's a used dress so I felt like there were holes in some of the seams but it wasn't noticeable in the lace. Fit pretty true to size, maybe I could have gone down a size but I don't know because of the length.

Great for a late summer formal wedding with dancing! The elastic waist perhaps runs a bit small if you don't enjoy tight dresses. The sleeves and short length keep you from raising your arms too much, but it is still great for dancing so long as you don't get too wild! It's a beautiful, unique dress and I got tons of compliments all night! Really good if you want to show off a long neck and great shoulders.

links_reviews_title: different and one of a kind!
links_reviews_text: wasnt tight at all great fit

links_reviews_title: Such a comfy and beautiful dress!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit, not too tight or loose. Hid my strapless bra super well and looked absolutely amazing!
Back sagged a little. It was short to size
The blue in this dress is really pretty. I felt like the elastic waist wasn't super flattering. Rent the Runway has spoiled me because there are much more flattering dresses to choose than this one.

Great dress. Loved that it was a little unusual with the tie neckline and exposed shoulders and back. The embroidery is a very bright blue and eye-catching. The stretch in the material made it very comfortable to wear. Heed the other reviews that it is quite short. I was comfortable wearing tights with it and it made for a cute winter date night look.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a 40th-anniversary business party for my best friend's parents jewelry company.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and the style was fun. I kept getting compliments on the dress! I felt great in it.

I wore this dress to a girlfriends rehearsal dinner & a country concert after. It looked great with heels or cowboy boots! I was 2 months post partum & 170lb, this dress looked great on & helped hide the baby tummy.
I rented it for my family member's birthday celebration. I wore it with black tights and tall black boots. It was so easy to move in and dance. I would definitely recommend.

links_reviews_title: So cute but a little short
links_reviews_text: Flattering style but a little short. Had to wear tights.
This hits in some odd places. There is some ruching in the midsection that is unflattering. This runs large and would recommend going down at least one size.

Wore this dress to a bachelorette party. It's a great option for those wanting to show some skin but not be too modest. Wonderfully comfortable. I'm 5 ft 5 in & 125 lb: size 2 and 4 fit me great with room to spare for a food baby in both dresses. I went with the 4 from a comfort perspective- it was slightly longer in length. Wore this with black tights in October with statement earrings- it was a splendid night!
The colors, lace, and silhouette of this dress make it a must rent! The sleeves are so fun. It's extremely comfortable too!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful coloring but sizing was way small.
links_reviews_text: Awkward fit all around. The top was loose causing the sleeves to fall down too far and the body was skin right and short. Couldn’t wear because of the length and tightness. I’m 5’2 and 210 so if your curvy don’t bother.
This dress was super cute. The color was gorgeous & vibrant! Just way too short for my curves I guess. Did not wear.
A little big in back but otherwise perfect fit

I wore this dress for two different social outings. I'm short wasted and I don't like things with a defined waist. I didn't realize until this dress arrived that it does have a waistband, which I kept pulling down all night. Other than that I loved the off the shoulder detail and the embroidery on the fabric. It was different and fun and I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: This was a replacement dress that I ended up loving more than the original!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the occasion of partying in Vegas, however, I'm not sure if I would have been comfortable wearing it to a wedding or something more formal. I am very tall and this dress was super short to the point where I loosened up the neck just so I could gain an inch at the bottom. I felt sexy and it was super flattering. I added a belt and ignored where the elastic banded waist was meant to fit. The dress is super forgiving! I loved it for a fun sexy night out!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my 10 year high school reunion and it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great and true to size. I rented a size 4 with a size 6 being my backup size, and ended up going with the size 4 because it was a little more snug in the bust and waist. The elastic waist is comfortable and does lay flat. My most favorite part was the back - the little bow tie is adorable and allows for any type of messy bun or relaxed updo, which I appreciate because hair takes forever. The color is beautiful, vibrant, and really makes this already unique dress stand out. I loved it!

links_reviews_title: I got lots of compliments on this fun party dress. I wore it for a Derby themed event.
links_reviews_text: This was a super cute and fun dress! Simple accessories are all you need to complete this look!
This dress was so comfortable and i received so many compliments. It's extremely light fabric and stylish. It is short so be careful bending over.

The dress was a tad tight on me, but the silhouette is flattering and it didn't show. Overall, I was comfortable in this dress all night. (The elastic on the sleeves bothered me a tiny bit.) I got tons of compliments!

The fit was perfect. I'm only 5' 1" and the length of the dress and sleeves was just right for me. The elastic around the waist of the dress made it comfortable to wear. I received lots of compliments on it. I normally wear a 12/14 dress and the 12 fit me perfectly. Sad I couldn't keep the dress!!

links_reviews_title: Extremely comfortable and fun! I'm 5'9 and I wore a 4, length was no problem.
links_reviews_text: Runs true to size, tall girls length isn't an issue!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments! It was really comfortable and I was able to dance the night away!
links_reviews_text: The wrist elastics were a little tight but throughout the night you get used to it. It's very comfortable and easy to dance in. So many compliments! Overall an amazing dress.
This dress was super cute and comfortable. Great color! Was easy to wear a strapless bra with is. To dress it down a bit I wore booties.

I wore this dress for a christmas party. It was so fun to wear and everyone loved it. I had planned to wear it to my work christmas party but decided the halter back was a little innapropriate. I decided to wear it to a party the next day.

I wore this to go visit my girlfriend's new baby, so not a lot of people saw it, but she and my husband both loved it. I felt it was very flattering. It adds some fancy flair for a dinner or night out, while still being super comfy! I wore it all night. I wish I had a full length photo because it was so flattering!
Very nice and comfy. I was wearing it for my bday and it was very light fabric. I just think it runs small becauSe my size is 12 and I wore the 16 comfortably.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and sexy back, but the shape is boxy.
links_reviews_text: The back of this dress is very sexy. I loved the tie halter neck. There is plenty of room in the top for busty gals, and if your self consious about your figure, there is enough fabric to hide all of your flaws. I did find that the shape was a little boxy on me.
The dress was a little big in the back, and the 0 probably would have fit better but RTR only had a size two. Really cute, flattering and comfortable!

This was an awesome choice for NYE! I paired it with black tights, black velvet booties, and a leather jacket. The cold shoulder was an awesome surprise when we went to dinner and I removed the jacket. Love the ribbon tie neck. Only drawbacks? It was super short and see thru... so at 5'9" this meant tights were a must (and I felt a draft all night!). All in all -- good rental. Size up for length and comfort if youre on the fence.
Fit very comfortably! The only "con" was the elastic was tight around the wrists. Otherwise dress was comfortable- length was short but classy!
Got so many compliments at a semi-formal garden party. It was a bit loose especially on top, but I'm curvy and it was comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Nice dress. Very comfortable and lace detail is very flattering
links_reviews_text: Length is pretty short but dress is nice. Little tight around waist and hip area.
Great for a warm summer night out or a dressier brunch
My lei covered up the lace in the bust but I have a small chest and just wore pasties. The back is lace. Fitted in the waist. A little short, wore shorts underneath. Was a perfect birthday dress
the dress is cute; however, it is pretty tight in abdominal area and loose on the top, so i feel like even if i size up the top will just be more loose

links_reviews_title: Unusual dress, feels a bit boxy..
links_reviews_text: Looks quite nice here & it's definitely unusual but I didn't really enjoy wearing it. Large sleeves make you look (front-on) a bit big & 'football player'! Plus the material gets sweaty quite quickly, so if you're out in the sun all day it's not ideal. Lace is a little see-through at the front but I wouldn't really call it risqué. Perhaps not the best to meet your grandparents in! But good for an informal garden party.. I wouldn't rent again, but try it - might look great in someone else, ideally who has a tan!

I rented this for a trip I took to Nashville. I surprised my husband with tickets to the grand ole Opry so I wore this with boots. It totally fit the vibe of Nashville and I loved the detail and the fit! It is very short on me though (5'10") so I'm not sure if I would have been comfortable wearing this with heels so I'm glad the boots worked. Would totally rent again!

This dress was perfect for my sister's graduation! I'm 5'5" and 125 lbs and the xs was just right in the waist and pretty tight in the hips- just barely got it on. Would go up to a small next time! The lace made it feel light and airy- perfect for a hot day.

Rented this for a graduation party on the beach. Was so cute and zipped perfectly. Was very short but I wore it because at the beach I don't mind wearing short/more revealing things since everyone is in swimwear. I think despite the shortness the rest was modest yet fashionable. I also received a lot of compliments! Such a fun piece!
Unique dress, lots of compliments. It is a bit short so can't wear to work. Must wear slip with, top has holes in areas wear would see bra without.
Great for spring/summer! One thing I didn't like was the lace below my waist, it was tighter than than I would have liked. Also the chest area was a little big on me.

links_reviews_title: Cute on the hanger but cut weird
links_reviews_text: This dress is super cute on the hanger but cut weird and did not look at flattering on. The bottom half is cut weird so it looks like I have a little pouch.
The fit of the dress was a little awkward. Big on top and tight around the hips. It was also very short. I chose not to wear it.
I loved EVERYTHING about this dress except the length. I had to hold it down with my hands at times. But other than that it was adorable.
Perfect for a beach vacation or a wedding!

links_reviews_title: Bridal luncheon- lots of compliments but a touch scandalous
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my bridal luncheon. The fit was slightly off- the sleeves were a bit loose. I received a ton of compliments and it was so cute in person. However this is not for every event. There is no lining in the back- so the lace is see through. The front is only lined at the chest and unlined at the waist and going down the middle. It’s pretty short also. Not for a conservative event at all. But if that isn’t the case it was a win! Size reference 5’3 120 lbs and wore the XS

I love this trendy dress by Saylor. Running true to size, I recommend going one size up for the backup. This style is fitted at the midsection and straight at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are able to wear a strapless bra with this dress. Love the lace and floral detail! Pair with heels or wedges to dress it up or down.

Love this! Fits TTS, likely fits better on a taller person. I'm 5'9" with a longer torso and I thought it hit perfectly. Absolutely adorable. The lace and detailing are lovely and I thought it was very flattering. Very appropriate for a shower or brunch. Also didn't need a bra so loved the open back, but if you have a bigger chest a super cute bralette would look cute too.

links_reviews_title: Cute For A Bride To Be
links_reviews_text: Really cute dress! Im 5'3'' 32B and wore an XS. The top was a somewhat loose but I made it work. Was a great dress for one of my wedding showers. Received so many compliments !

links_reviews_title: I really wanted this one to work!
links_reviews_text: I loved the photos of this on RTR, but in person it's a strange shape- made me look bigger, just wasn't very flattering. I really wanted to like it because it's so girly and the pattern is so cute, but because of the shape and placement of cutouts in lace, I never wore it.

links_reviews_title: It was classy and dressy without being uncomfortable.
links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and true to size. The material and the design is absolutely beautiful.

links_reviews_title: The back of this dress is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: The back of this dress is gorgeous! If I went a size smaller I don't know if it would fit me in the ribcage, but the bust area is very roomy, and the sleeves are wider. Everyone l loved this dress. I would rent it again maybe in a size smaller just to see the difference of fit.
The size runs small for my body shape. I am Latina and have wide hips.
It looked cute online but when I tried it on, it was just too much fabric for me.
It has so much potential but it's so awkward. Couldn't zip because of the material and it was SO short. I'm not conservative but felt like both my front and back were coming out. Couldn't wear.

links_reviews_title: A little too short for work and only good for summer.
links_reviews_text: Cute for maybe a summer party

I loved this dress online however I felt the detailing was a little over the top in person. I didn't end up wearing it when I was in LA with my friends. Very cute for the right occasion. Runs small in the midriff area & butt area but larger in the top
small
Dress was heavier than expected. Cute and great quality

links_reviews_title: I didn't end up wearing it because it was too big.
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress but it was WAY too big in the bust area.

The lace and floral detailing of the dress are gorge, but I'm 4'11 and felt super box in the dress. the sleeves drowned me out. I tried it on and put it back in the bag. But I think this would be SUUUPER cute on someone taller with a longer torso!
To small

links_reviews_title: Too small I normally wear a size 14 could not zip it up.
links_reviews_text: Too small
The dress fit like a glove. Received so many compliments
I wore this dress twice to church. So pretty, feminine, flattering. Loved it!
The fit was okay. It wasn't for me. It reminded me of a table cloth.
I don’t know who this dress is made for, but it didn’t fit properly, and it looked weird. I’m usually a 4 or small, and I ordered a small. It barely covered my butt, and the top did not fit properly.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately the shape is a miss
links_reviews_text: I loved the detail and color of the dress but it gave me a weird shape around my hips I couldn't wear it

links_reviews_title: This dress fits very large at the top but tight at the hips. The fit is very odd.
links_reviews_text: Didn't like the fit of this dress. Runs extremely large in the bust but very tight around the waist.
The top runs really large but the bottom is true to size. Not meant for women with hips.
I rented this for a dinner, but I didn't end up wearing it because the collar is super weird. Material is nice, and the dress fit well, but the style was off.

links_reviews_title: Great in grey! Previously rented in pink which is great too!
links_reviews_text: Great dress for many occasions. It is fitted but with the long sleeves and neckline and the length it doesn't come across as inappropriate for a work cocktail event but could also be dressed up for a date or night out. Great color to style- you could wear gold, silver, nude or black shoes and accessories with this and it would work. I have rented before in the light pink color and I like the grey just as much!

links_reviews_title: I love a body con with thick material...but a belt is almost necessary to keep from folding
Beautiful Dress, But Prepare to Constantly Fix Shoulders!
links_reviews_text: Love the look of this dress. Great fix and looks great on pics, but as others said, be prepared to adjust the shoulders several times while wearing.

Ordered this originally in an XS and it was way too tight in the arms. Felt like a sausage suit. Then ordered a S and it just wasn't flattering and still was tight in the arms. Wanted to wear it to an engagement party but never worn it. I wanted to like it but it just didn't work.

Form fitting in all the right ways. Had no problem with the off shoulder style staying in place as I normally do with these types of necklines. Loved the color and not too short for me being so tall! The material did not ride up at all. Loved this dress.
Fit great

I ambitiously wore this during my 31st week of pregnancy (currently at 145 pounds) and paired it with black leggings. At 5'4", the sweater ended up just above my knees but came to mid thigh when I sat down. I liked the heavy material for winter (didn't wear a coat, but it was only 59 outside) but didn't like the fact that the collar kept riding up. I had to keep pulling it down

links_reviews_title: Heavy fabric, nice fit, soft color.
links_reviews_text: As above, heavy fabric, nice fit, soft color which is a nice alternative to black. I love the fitted arms. The off the shoulder is trendy and pretty but of course not functional under a winter coat or if you have to do anything other than stand with your arms at your side. I found that the collar did not stay in place through dinner because every time I lifted the fork to my mouth, the dress rolled up. Still enjoyed it.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty off the shoulder dress
links_reviews_text: Fit well, made from a good heavy material.

Running true to size with some stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and fitted at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or strapless bra since its off the shoulder. At 5’6”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. Pair with nude heels and fun earrings to complete your outfit!
Love the fitted form and thick material. Perfect length for thigh high boots
Body con fit without looking like you're going out clubbing. The color wasn't anything spectacular -- wouldn't get again.
The neck does not stay down no matter what...like the reviews said. It is ichy. Looks so much better on the online photo.

The material of this dress is great. Heavy duty and almost like a body con material but the fit runs big. It's a great fall/winter material dress. The off the shoulder fold did ride up and need a few readjustments. But overall went perfect with our family photo colors.

links_reviews_title: I wore it for a photoshoot and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: I wore the medium and it was a little baggy on me. It was a nice, thick material so not good to wear on a hot day. The color is gorgeous and can be worn many different ways based on how you accessorize it.

links_reviews_title: Was nice, kept having to fuss with the top.
links_reviews_text: Material is pretty stiff. Definitely better for colder weather.
Too large for petites

This dress is not sweater material, it's like Herve leger material that's thick and hugs your body. It's very tight and short--I would not comfortably sit down in it. Very cute, but more for the club than dinner.
The fabric was too itchy to wear.

This dress is really pretty on, but my husband had to help me roll it over my head. Because there is no zipper and it's bandage material, it's very stiff. I didn't end up wearing it because I had more comfortable options. It would be tough to dance in this, but could be cute for dinner.

Didn't care for material and i wouldn't have been able to dance in it because your arms have to stay down for the top to stay in place. Did not end up wearing it. I think it would great on a taller person with legs.
Uncomfortable material and way too short to wear even for me being 5'5
High quality fabric... I bought it!!!

links_reviews_title: I was not able to wear it
links_reviews_text: Thick fabric. Very uncomfortable to wear

I got this dress for a family birthday party. I ended up not wearing it because it was shorter than I thought it might be, and I would have been tugging it down all night. It is super sexy and shows off curves nicely. Better for a hot date than a conservative family gathering;)

I ordered this sweater dress for a night out. The fabric is quite heavy and it ran large so I ended up not wearing it. The Medium bunched up in the back and made it look as though I had back fat. I would've worn it had I rented the small.

links_reviews_title: Fabric was rough and made the overall fit of the style feel off.
links_reviews_text: Fabric was rough and made the overall fit of the style feel off. I would’ve kept it if I thought I could survive a night with the fabric not annoying me.

links_reviews_title: i didn't end up wearing the dress.
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit; very flattering.
As other reviewers said, the top does not stay down. But enjoyed it other wise.

links_reviews_title: Good for an occasion or for a night out.
links_reviews_text: TTS, thick material so good for winter.

This dress was a bit too short for my 5'7" self. If I were ten years younger (I am 45 and don't mind dressing sexy), maybe I would feel more comfortable in it. I was not crazy about the fsbric. It was heavier material than it seems in he photo and a bit stiff...not soft. It was a bit tight for me at the bottom hem. I didn't end up wearing it after trying it on.
On me this was way short but also kinda loose. The fit was weird for my shape. I'm pretty slim with a big butt...didn't work for me. Very nice material though.
The fit on this was just weird, too tight, folded collar was awkward. Thankfully I liked two of the other things I rented, so it's no big deal that this didn't work out.
The small was very large for me I couldn't wear it
It was very heavy so I didn't want to try it on - it wasn't soft, more like a hard knit material... I didn't think it would be comfy.
While very cute in the picture, this is a body con dress, not sweater dress and runs very small.

links_reviews_title: Nice casual dress, but arms are annoying and ride up all night
links_reviews_text: Pretty, casual dress for a night out. Wore it with knee high black boots. Only reason I disliked it was because it ran a bit big and I wanted it to be slightly more form fitting. The arms and off shoulder portion are also annoying and don't stay down. You have to keep your arms down all night. I was also always fixing my dress. Nice dress, but wouldn't rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I'm a small but only large left it fit nice.
links_reviews_text: Shoulder slide a bit
Beautiful! Tons of compliments.
This dress is gorgeous but the 12 was snug and I usually wear a 10/12 in a dress. It's a showstopper for sure.

Fit.Like.A.Glove. And I didnt even need to wear a bra! The fabric and lining were thick and smoothing all over and the length was a great compliment to the deep neckline. I ordered a 4 & a 6 and liked the fit of the 4 better. I was able to eat a large meal and not feel uncomfortable.

Perfect black dress. The 2 was a little too tight and the 4 did feel a little stretched out in the hip area but it wasn't noticeable so I'd say this is true to size. length still looked great even though I'm only 5'3.
This dress was perfect for New Year's Eve. I was looking for something sexy, yet classy and this was both. I don't have much of a butt or hips. It may be tight for women with a booty.

links_reviews_title: James Bond themed gala for a bowl game.
links_reviews_text: The dress was incredibly flattering in the bust. I did not need an additional support. The dress was very well structured. If I had gone smaller, it would have fit more snug throughout, but I wouldn't have fit my chest. The only drawback for me, being so short, was the length. It was a little longer that I would have liked. Overall, I really loved the dress. I felt very sexy, but the length kept it from being too much.

I loved this dress, received so many compliments on it throughout the night. Only problem was lifting it up to use the bathroom, it was a little snug!! Otherwise, amazing in all other aspects. Also my measurements are off for this review, I wrote this review late and I've since lost weight, but I was around 160 in this picture! Made me look flawless!!

links_reviews_title: L I K E A. G L O V E
links_reviews_text: Wonderful fit. Sisters stayed I place while dancing :-)
Looked and fit amazing. I'm 120 pounds, 34D and could not wear this with a bra without making myself look cheap. Without a bra it was the perfect amount of class and sass!

Amazing dress, shipped overnight the night before which I was nervous about but it ended up coming on time and was absolutely perfect. Great quality dress, I got so many compliments! Super easy to return as well. I was nervous about the mixed reviews I have heard but it was overall a great experience I'll definitely do it again!

I rented this dress for my birthday and I felt amazing in it! The dress perfectly hugged my curves and kept everything in place. I would definitely rent again. The only issue is that it was a little too tight for serious dancing, but it was worth it for how many compliments I got!
I am curvy with a small chest and large butt. The dress was a little big but the size 4 was too tight. I think it looked great and received a lot of compliments.
Fit as expected

The entire process was perfect! I was skeptical of the whole rental but was so happy with the outcome. Dress arrived in great packaging in time for the wedding. Dress was great quality, clean and ready to wear. Fit like a glove and made me feel like I was wearing a tailored dress. Big show stopper and got compliments all night! My husband was a huge fan as well! Will rent again!

I wish I owned this dress! I wore this for a #wedding that wasn't exactly black tie but was on the dressier side. I ordered a back up in a size 4 because I can differ depending on the fit. I ended up wearing the 2 and loved it. It was a bit tight in the butt and thigh area for me because that's where I'm gifted. It made everything look great and very slimming. I'm a 32 C and there was just enough cleavage to look sexy but not over done. My boyfriend loved it and I got many compliments from girls as well. The 4 could have been ok but there was a lot of excess around the stomach area and it was loose in the back as well. So I felt more comfortable wearing the size 2. You won't regret this rental!
Beautiful dress with thick fabric which helps with the flattering overall appearance. Super low cut - but a lot of great support built in!
Fit was amazing. It did ride up here and there but was still fun to wear and looked great!
This dress is so flattering! I got so many compliments! The dress runs slightly snug throw the chest/midsection, but it also helped keep the girls in. So, no complaints!

This dress is the perfect combination of sexy & classy & it worked out so well! The only thing I would say is I did end up taping it up 3+ inches because it fell way below my knees since I am short. I would say this style is better for taller people, but overall it is a beautiful dress that fit well everywhere else!
Wore this for our anniversary dinner; I recently found out I am expecting so this dress was perfect. No bra necessary and enough give to accommodate my bloat. My husband absolutely loved it!

links_reviews_title: Perfect LBD, was the star of the show at my 10 year reunion.
links_reviews_text: Felt very confident in this dress. Didn't have a ton of give to it but comfortable. Definitely give this one a try!

links_reviews_title: Easily my favorite LBD I've worn.
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my birthday dinner with friends. It's sexy while still feeling classic and tasteful. If you have larger ta-ta's you will have cleavage, but the dress has beautiful lines and thick/rich feeling material. The length adds a nice balance to the dress. It's an extremely flattering and despite the number of LBD's I've owned, this one is truly special. I'd buy it!

I wore this stunner to a winter wedding at an art gallery and felt comfy and chic all night long. The fabric was super stretchy and flattering so it was great for dancing, sitting, eating and just hanging out. I would recommend this dress very highly. Check out all of my rental outfits on my YouTube Channel - I also share tips and tricks for RTR. Channel Name: Pointe Boutique
Great material and fit.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a friend’s summer wedding that was black tie.
links_reviews_text: I am tall (6’1) and dress fit very well hitting just below the knee. I’m usually a size 8 in dresses but the size 6 fit me perfectly I think because the material is a bit stretchy. The shoulder straps are short so they dig in a bit but I liked that it kept the bust secure so you weren’t worried about a potential wardrobe malfunction. Very comfortable otherwise. Perfect for a black tie wedding.

The dress was longer than I expected especially with me being 6' but I actually loved the longer length for the formal wedding I attended. The dress fit like a glove and the neckline never budged. Beautiful dress with thicker fabric. Would rent again.

I fluctuate sized dependent upon designers. I wore the 8 in this dress because I felt more comfortable in it than the 6. It does show a bit of cleavage if you're top heavy but nothing too revealing. I felt super sexy in this dress and got tons of compliments! Would definitely rent again

links_reviews_title: I had so many compliments on the dress!
links_reviews_text: It was a little loose in the bust, but the material was amazing.

This dress is AMAZING. I ordered it last minute because I had ordered from other online companies and they were awful. This dress is great! I received so many compliments and the material was so thick that not only did i feel comfortable but felt like I was tucked into the dress. Only thing is the boob area pops up on the top a little bit, but not bad! Great dress. Get it! I usually am between a 6-8 and I wore the 8 so I would say it ran normal. I am a 36 around the bust, 5'3 height, 135 lbs if it helps?
Brought out my curves!
The dress fit true to size. The length offset the low cut in the bust. The dress was a show stopper- I got a ton of compliments and felt so sexy in it.
The material is great and holds you in everywhere. Plenty of support for my 34DD chest!
I normally wear a 4 but there wasn't one available so I crossed my fingers that the 2 would fit! I was able to wear it and it looked great!
I'm a size 4 and this fit me like a glove. I wore Spanx underneath to smooth everything out but I didn't totally need them. I felt beautiful!
Very flattering twist on LBD. Compliments all night. But must be ok will the girls being out. A little more revealing than I planned but loved it.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a wedding I planned and officiated.
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect and I felt really pretty wearing it. I am a mom of a two year old so I do not get dressed up a lot anymore. This hit the nail on the head of what I wanted to wear. I will warn Pear shaped women that the size up had a lot of extra fabric in the stomach so I went down a size, which was probably a bit tighter than I am comfortable with these days, but worked just find throughout the evening.

This dress fits like a glove is and gorgeous. I got so many compliments! Did not need a bra, and the length was just right. Showed off my curves without being lumpy. The fabric was stretchy and "thick" in a good way and had a smoothing effect. Love this dress, might have to go buy it! Rent this dress, you won't regret.
The dress was difficult to zip on my own, but once I had someone to assist me it fit like a glove!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable and the neck line stayed secure with the wiring...so easy to go #braless
links_reviews_text: Black Tie Wedding in Miami. Perfect for the occasion. Danced all night and never felt uncomfortable (well besides the heels :) )
Loved the neckline, form fitting, and length. No bra needed. I would definitely rent again or purchase!
Fit like a glove. Perfect for ladies with small chest!!! I will rent this again.
This shirt is not nearly as memorable as a rose gold sequin shirt should be. I didn't hate it, but I also wasn't conflicted about sending it back.

links_reviews_title: It was perfect for a disco party!
links_reviews_text: The sleeves were a bit puffy but it photographed really well.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful top for my birthday dinner!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this top! I wore the L because the M was just a little too tight in the shoulders and I wanted to be comfortable. It sparkles so much, and I got so many compliments! It's not itchy or hard like a lot of sequined clothing, it is very soft and comfortable. I want to buy it!

links_reviews_title: A bit of fun and glitz for a night out with friends.
links_reviews_text: The overall fit was great. I generally wear an 8 so it was very true to size. The sequins were sewn on quite well so I wasn't worried about snags and loose bits all night. I had fun dressing it down with jeans and a blazer, keeping it from being "too much" for a more casual night out.

The little puff to the sleeves and the rose gold color really make this a sweet top. Super easy to throw on and go out, I wore it out to a happy hour with some friends and the shirt definitely got compliments. I'm debating buying this one. True to size.
Fun top for a dinner date or party. Perfect for a cooler night as fabric is a little thick with lining.
I should have purchased this top! It is SO fun and unique. I received compliments all evening long! Perfect for a work event or out with friends downtown! 100!!
Really cute and flattering. Only downside is that the sequins can get stuck to each other.

links_reviews_title: Silent auction shimmer in rose gold
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed wearing those comfortable top to my kids fundraiser and school dance.. it was as comfortable as it was fun! Styled with white skinnies and cowboy boots because pf the pouring rain. Also did rose gold earrings and a jeweled belt bag.
Eye catcher for sure, Lots of compliments
Fits true to size. Much more easy to move in then I would assume given the material. Comfy while also flashy and fun
Wore to Vegas and it was perfect and very comfortable I typically wear a size 8 and the medium fit perfect
Great too! Fits true to size, fun, and sparkly!

It's a bit loose/boxy around the waist, which doesn't make it super flattering but it was good for work holiday party. The zipper in the back was easy to use and it was a pretty rose gold color. Probably wouldn't rent it again though. Also I wore the size small and I'm usually between a size 2 and 4.
Wore this for my bachelorette party. It was a fun too to wear for a night out! The shirt seems to run big. I got P (petite) when my normal size is M. Otherwise I loved it!
I was afraid of wearing something this bold to the office... received so much attention haha It's cute, you can dress it up or down, and it will bright up your day

links_reviews_title: I got engaged in this top!
links_reviews_text: I knew my (now) fiance and I were having a special date night, so I wanted to rent something fun and festive. I just didn't know HOW special the night would be! But the top was the perfect thing to be wearing. Sometimes sequins can be itchy but this wasn't at all. It was the perfect blend of fun and sophisticated. I wore it with black pants but it could definitely also be paired with jeans :)

links_reviews_title: Wore this for engagement photos--just the right pop!
links_reviews_text: I wore this for engagement photos and loooved the sequins! It's nice and festive. I'm taking one star off for the fact that the arm length on the top was way too long, and caused the shoulders to look bigger than they needed to. It was quite annoying, but other than that I loved the top! Highly recommend for taller people or people with long arms.

We went to a friends house for new years so I still wanted to be festive, but not in a dress. This top was the ticket! I got the M and L and ended up wearing the M. I was worried about it being tight through the chest since I am 34D but it was spacious up top and not uncomfortable. I could move my arms very easily in it. Only reason I am not giving a 5 is because some of the sequins were coming off so the strings got caught on my jewelry and other things throughout the night. Would definitely rent again and recommend.
Great fit and just the right amount of sparkle. Wore for a NYE dinner date and got tons of compliments.

Fun and comfy shirt- even wore on a flight and it was not too heavy or hot. Fit semi-loose, true to size. Could dress up or down. The only reason its lacking a star is bc it wasnt super special. Cute everyday shirt though!

links_reviews_title: I received so many compliaments! The perfect amount of dressy sparkle without being too much.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a holiday themed drag show fundraising event. The fit was perfect and true to size. The material was thick without being hot. The liner insid was so soft and luxorious.
This top was so fun! A great fit and received numerous compliments. Perfect for the holidays or just a fun night out!

I loved this top! The rose gold color is perfect! The fit is great, wore it with high waisted jeans, tucked in the front. It would look great dressed up with black pants too. I bought it and can't wait for the quarantine to be over to wear it again!

The fit is a bit boxy but otherwise very stylish. I thought it was comfortable. Looked great with black jeans and heals. It was warm enough for a cool Kentucky evening. I felt the color was more gold than rose gold but still felt sexy and beautiful wearing it.
You can dress it up or down!

I wore the large. There is no give to the fabric, and it felt better for a long evening. But! I loved this top! Will rent again. There are small black details at the neck and cuffs which break up the sequins nicely.

links_reviews_title: It was a little too itchy and uncomfortable for me to wear.
links_reviews_text: I felt the fabric was super uncomfortable and the sequins snagged on everything!!

links_reviews_title: Cute but hard to wear twice in a short time
links_reviews_text: like the top but it was hard to wear twice in a short time - too memorable
Unfortunately I was unable to wear because it was just too big. I have broad shoulders and the large was much too big on me

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing this
links_reviews_text: Not very flattering on me. Very thick with sequins so no movement.

links_reviews_title: Did not end up wearing the shirt.
links_reviews_text: It was too small and a little itchy with the sequins so I did not end up wearing it.
Sequin can get snagged be careful, zipper down back made it easy to put on

links_reviews_title: Got a ton of compliments on my sparkly shirt!
links_reviews_text: Wore this for a New Year's Eve party with a pair of jeans and heels. Was the perfect amount of sparkle. Fit a little bit boxy but it worked for me and I enjoyed it for the evening!
Loved this top! I'm normally a S and got the XS since that was the only size available -- happy I did because it fits perfectly!

links_reviews_title: Just enough to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Fit was slightly boxy so I would suggest tucking it in. Sleeves were a little short however overall great top, lots of compliments
Fantastic top, fits very well, flattering and super cute.
Comfortable and cute but a little boxy.

links_reviews_title: Wore with black pants for dinner
links_reviews_text: Fit was comfortable while a bit loose. Not my favorite rental as it is a bit blocky

I had such high hopes for this top but the second I put it on my husband was like noooooooo. If you have big boobs, this is not the top for you. The shoulders poof up and with that and my chest, I looked ridiculously wide. So sad!!!

links_reviews_title: Men love it, women hate you.
links_reviews_text: Rent it. You'll look awesome and it's kind of nice not to wear a bra - as long as you are careful not to let it seep its way down. Completely worth it.

I LOVED THIS JUMPSUIT! I also have never received so many compliments on a single piece ever. It is a little revealing on the side with a little bit of a peak a boo but makes up for it with its conservative length and high neckline. This did run smaller than anticipated with the band that connects in the back and was very tight but otherwise fit like a glove. HIGHLY recommend!!
Found myself saying "it's pants" and "it has pockets" all night. Sooo much fun.
