This was such a fun dress to wear for my annual service league Fundraiser. Our theme was "under the BigTop" and I wanted something that would stand out. This dress works well for pear shaped, flat chested women like me. It's also a great dress for showing off your back!

Wow this outfit alone made RTR UL worth it! Attended a design gala and have never received more compliments- everyone was amazed that it was pants! Heavy, very high quality material. I usually wear a 2-4 but sized way up due to availability and past reviews and it fit great. I have an athletic build and this dress complimented my figure and made me feel confident. I was worried the sides would be too revealing but it was very classy. Would definitely rent again.

Both the 10 and 12 fit, the 12 was just a little easier to get in and out of (you need a bathroom buddy for sure). Tons of compliments - I will note however that this is VERY HEAVY so it may not be ideal for warm outdoor events

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it- better for shorter gals?
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is very unique and beautifully made. The front bunches up on me and the length was too short for me making the leg opening ride up (though pleats prevent any camel toe). Ended up going with something else just because of comfort.

links_reviews_title: Love the idea of this jumper, unfortunately not for short people
links_reviews_text: This is such a unique piece and fell in love with it in photos on other women. That said, I was rather disappointed how it fit on me. It was a very awkward length for someone my height (5'2")-- it fell between mid-calf and ankle. The top portion was slightly tight and constricting, and the bottom felt too baggy. Overall it was less glam, more Oompa Loompa.

links_reviews_title: Perfect Jumpsuit! Bold Statement, Tons of Compliments!
links_reviews_text: Glad that I read the reviews because the sizing for this one was odd (I'm typically a 4-6 and rented a 10 & 12; the smaller size was perfect!). The material of this romper (yes, it's a romper even though it looks like a dress in the photos and in person; no one could believe it) was so thick and beautiful. I went braless comfortably, even though I am rarely comfortable without support. This fit like a glove, the quality was obvious, and the cut and style were bold and made a great statement at a very nice event. I was covered up yet able to show some of my best features. Wish that I owned this one; fantastic outfit that made me feel distinctive, elegant, and confident.
Loved the way this looked on the model, but looked ridiculous on me - like clown pants! And it was very heavy. No thanks.

Everyone loved the jumpsuit. They thought it was a dress. I'm a 34D and the bust fit a bit small. However, I could not have fit a larger size because the waist fit to perfection. The top of the jumpsuit is difficult to fasten on your own so you'll need to buddy up for bathroom trips. The material is heavy so it very well could be worn in fall or winter. It weighs about 3lbs.
I wore this for opening number at a National Pageant. I got so many compliments and ended up wearing again for our queens Photoshoot.

links_reviews_title: Perfect to dance all night in at my best friends wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress/pantsuit or whatever you want to call it was the best outfit I've worn all summer to weddings. I received so many compliments and I was comfortable the entire time. No one knew it was pants until I told them too. About the outfit: it's heavier material so don't wear it if the wedding is outside or unless it's later in the season. I'm on the shorter side so the straps were way too long for me. I ended up pinning them back so that they wouldn't fall off my shoulders and then it was perfect. I went bra-less because all my strapless and backless bras could be seen from the side but it was still very comfortable and I felt supportive even with all my dancing (and during the dance off)

links_reviews_title: Classy yet sexy and still comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Loved the unique cut of this dress/jumpsuit. It’s a head turner yet still manages to be comfortable. Would recommend to the smaller busted ladies like myself.

links_reviews_title: This dress/romper was amazing - I got compliments on it all night!
links_reviews_text: Fit really well, although I think if I had a larger chest, that area would have been too tight, since the material doesn't give much.

Wore this to a welcome reception for a black tie wedding and it was perfect. The fabric didn't wrinkle, the open back was sexy without being too revealing and I got compliments from just about everyone -- including the staff! This jumpsuit is a knockout. Rent it and you won't regret it!

links_reviews_title: Looks like a dress, but it's a secret Romper!
links_reviews_text: I wore this outfit for New Year's Eve last year in Baltimore. I'd note that I wore a size 10R, even though I'm a regular 4R, because I was a bit heavier at the time I wore this (it's been 10 months & I'm just now writing a review). I ended up sizing up because it's a little tight in the upper body & you can feel a little bit constricted if you have a larger bust (which, I don't but have a larger rib cage). This outfit was unbelievable! I was expecting a dress but when I tried it on I realized that the "dress" was a perfectly designed flare romper! You couldn't tell either way once you put it on anyway! It even has concealed pockets in the front to stash your phone, money clip, etc! I had a wonderful time dancing the night away & never once felt uncomfortable.... even in the cold (well, I needed a coat because it was Maryland in January but....) because it's a heavier fabric.

Rented for a black tie event. It was an amazing alternative to a long dress. The length hit around mid-shin (I'm 5'8"). The top is a bit of a hassle to get on/off, and has to be undone any time you use the restroom. Definitely worth it though! Wore it without a bra but probably could have fit a strapless under the top.

Totally my style. It was perfect for the party: Elegant and sexy. The only problem is to clasp on your own or go to the restroom but still Loved it. I got a lot of compliments from friends and guests that were at the party; )

links_reviews_title: How come no one mentioned this?
links_reviews_text: It's really really really difficult to use bathroom by yourself when wearing this gorgeous JUMPSUIT... lol. The jumpsuit probably weights 10lbs, it's hell a work out to walk around in it too!

I made the mistake of not reading the sizing chart or the reviews before ordering this jumpsuit. Thankfully, RTR is amazing and overnighted the correct sizes to me. This jumpsuit is definitely made for small busted ladies. I'm by no means large chested and while I squeezed into the 10UK okay (the waist fit better), I felt way more comfortable in the 12UK. That being said, I'm SOOO glad I rented this jumpsuit. I had so many compliments and I couldn't be happier.

I absolutely loved this so much. It was perfect for the event I wore it to. The best part was that it looked like a beautiful flowy dress but I'm fact it was a romper. Definitely hard to clasp on your own but besides that I would rate this 5 stars!

The reviews are right. No one would ever guess this is a jumpsuit. And while I enjoyed wearing it, it probably would be better if it was actually a dress, as trying to use the bathroom requires work and help in and out of it. But the back was amazing and for an evening out, it's definitely worth it. It was extremely heavy in the hanger but felt fine on. And I loved the pockets. The only negative, the top was a little too big for me and I had no way to fix it. If I had a slightly larger bust or could somehow shorten the straps, the fit would have been perfect.

links_reviews_title: Amazing jumpsuit that looks like a dress
links_reviews_text: Everyone thought it was a dress. It's a great outfit for smaller busted females. I absolutely loved. It's true to size and the material feels rich and heavy!

links_reviews_title: Big Brothers Big Sisters Most Wanted
links_reviews_text: Loved this jumpsuit. Not only is it pants, but it also has pockets. Need higher heels if you are short. Runs small in waist and chest. Typically a 2 in Banana Republic size land, but had to do the 6 in this dress. Kept me warm in December despite the cut outs. Fabric is heavy and beautiful. Received lots of compliments.

My friend who was getting married in beautiful Narragansett LOVES jumpsuits and I knew she would love this. Literally, no one knew this was a jumpsuit until I pointed it out. The cut is amazing, I wish my arm wasn't covering the fun cut out. The only downside, which I was anticipating, is you cannot go to the bathroom alone. Someone definitely has to unclip and reclip you back into the jumper but hell WAY WORTH IT

links_reviews_title: Such a cool outfit. I loved the back and the material.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size. Loved everything about it.
I received tons of compliments on this outfit. Getting in and out was a little tricky at first, but ended up being fine.

this baby was beautiful, no doubt about it. however, it was waaaayyy to tiny for me and I couldn't breathe. it created love handles for me. I may have underestimated how weight I've gained, but this one definitely runs small. if you take a chance for on this one, be sure to have a backup.

this baby was beautiful, no doubt about it. however, it was waaaayyy to tiny for me and I couldn't breathe. it created love handles for me. I may have underestimated how weight I've gained, but this one definitely runs small. if you take a chance for on this one, be sure to have a backup

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love this dress/jump suit! I got lots of compliments!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely love this dress/jumpsuit! I wore a size 2 and it for like a glove! I imagine with gals with a bigger bust, they would have issues would side boob but not so for me! I would just make sure you realize that the bottom portion is very wide pants rather than an actual skirt. I wore it to a black tie attorney prom and no one even knew it was actually a jump suit!

links_reviews_title: Unique Jumpsuit, Everyone thought it was a dress.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is very unique. It is made of a heavy fabric which gives it its shape. This jumpsuit is not meant for warmer climates, fortunately, the night I wore this the humidity level was low. I did not wear a bra because I am only a 32B I had enough coverage pick just the right amount of the pick-a-boo factor to provide a sexy edge. The only problem which for some can be a deal breaker, it requires someone's assistance to get in and out (I don't know how I managed to get into alone but I was determined) I had to ask a friend to accompany me to the restroom. But I loved the look and feel of this jumpsuit.

links_reviews_title: SO ON TREND, COMFORTABLE, AND STYLISH
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit gives me life. It is amazing. Very pleased with the rental - I was receiving complements all night. Fabric does not stretch but "settles" to your figure and gives a bit as you wear. I am 5'3" 135-140 lbs, 38"hips, 32" waist, 35" bust. The size 10R (which is a size 6 US) was perfect, it runs perfectly true to size. Length hit me slightly below mid-calf. I wore with a nubra. IMPORTANT TO NOTE: The US sizing on the website is incorrectly labeled. The 10R is labeled as US4 when it is ACTUALLY US6 per the label on the jumpsuit. For US sizing, subtract 4 from the UK size, NOT 6.

links_reviews_title: The jumpsuit passes for a cocktail dress!
links_reviews_text: It's difficult/impossible to hook the back without assistance. You have to plan all your bathroom visits with a buddy

I wore this for a surprise date night with my boyfriend, he planned a special dinner and the symphony. I usually wear between a size 6 and 8 depending on the dress, and I wore an eight for this. The dress is actually gauchos though it doesn't look like that for the most part. The fabric was beautiful, but a bit heavy. The "pants" sit very high, though overall it was very comfortable. The top part of the dress is very elegant and a bit sexy. You cannot wear a regular bra so I wore one of the stick-on ones from Victoria's Secret, though I noticed it kept falling down (and therefore so did the girls) so that was a bit uncomfortable. Overall, I did feel very beautiful and sexy in this outfit, though I would not rent it again.

This jumpsuit is everything! The thick material and sleek silhouette make it appropriate for a more formal event. Running true to size we recommend sizing up for backup especially if you're bustier. Although there is room in the bust, the open back provides minimal support so you must go bra-less or wear a nubra. The thick material is pretty supportive and the open back is stunning! The waist fits more snug, so again sizing up is best. Hips have lots of room and the jumpsuit cut is very comfortable. Pair with strappy heels and and sleek updo to show off the entire silhouette.
Beautiful fabric. Everyone was stunned to find out it was a jumpsuit. Was a little snug up top even with a smaller bust

links_reviews_title: Not flattering for girls with hips
links_reviews_text: I wanted to love this. Love the back. Formal material. Extremely heavy material! Pockets are a cute idea. I agree with some of the other reviews. NOT flattering if you have hips!

links_reviews_title: I felt amazing in this dress for my best friend's wedding.
links_reviews_text: I absolutely LOVED this dress. I did not get any good pictures in it but it was 100% a knock out. I got so many compliments and felt like a super model. I would definitely rent this again. It was heavy on the hanger but did not feel heavy on. Do not rent this for an outside wedding because there is a lot of fabric and you will probably be hot. It was also difficult to refasten after using the bathroom but dont let that deter you from renting it.
This was making my breasts too flat and they would come out of the sides, and I don't have a big breast I'm 34C. This is good for flat chested people. It didn't sit well on me.
Love this top so much, well made material.
This top is gorgeous! So feminine and flattering. I received so many compliments when wearing this top.
Runs a little small but it's a beautiful top
It's slightly tight
Great fit- I got so many compliments and it was super comfortable!
Loved this shirt! It was comfortable. I was able to dress it down with blue jeans. True to size.
Loved this girly top! Flattering and comfortable. Beautiful color. Only downfall is the sleeves are a tad bit short
Warm! Stretchy but very fitting. Not gonna work if you have big boobs
Flattering fit Will need another person to zip you up

links_reviews_title: I forced myself to like it, and it grew on me.
links_reviews_text: When I got this blouse I immediately tried it on and felt "meh." It wasn't until the final hour of my rental that I decided to force myself into wearing it into work. I got compliments throughout the day, mentioning how I looked very boho or victorian. As the day went on, I was feeling more confident in it and really enjoyed it. My gripes would be the material has absolutely no give, not that I was trying to do jumping jacks, but I have a 4 and 1 year old at home, so you know I took this blouse off as soon as I walked through the door and slipped into my pajamas. I would have liked the top to be longer in the sleeves and overall, but it worked with high-waisted jeans.

I wasn't sure I would like this top, but after reading reviews and everyone raving about it, I can now see why!!! It's fantastic! So many compliments, lovely fit, and beautiful details. U won't regret it. I'm a 36D and wear a 12 typically in bottoms. The large fit me perfectly.
I rented this for a photoshoot for my blog, SassandSweetness.com. It was comfortable for a day of shooting but I felt very girly and pretty! It was perfect for my postpartum body :-)
Loved this top! I got so many compliments on it! It does run a little bit on the smaller side but nothing that would make it uncomfortable. Would rent again!

The fit was true and the flares of the peplum and sleeves were fun and flirty. The ruffle around the top of the neck didn't sit that well but after the initial try-on I forgot about that it realized it didn't make any difference.
Great fit, nice fabric- worn with no bra and still looked great
Wore for my birthday party. Love the sleeves!

Really flattering top for hourglass shapes, though a bit more revealing than I expected (couldn't wear to work). Warm but lightweight. The sleeves are dramatic and a bit of a pain to eat with, but they don't hold a structure so you can fit them under jackets which is a plus. Will rent again.
It fit well except the sleeves were really long. I tried this out because it's something I don't normally wear. I tried it and it just wasn't me.

I ordered this top for an Easter brunch with my family. It was perfect! I loved the pink color, it is not as bright as in the picture online and I liked that, it is a little more of a soft muted pink. I went with the XS because the arms fit me better on that one. The top was a little short so I paired it with a white tank under to give some more coverage. I received SO many compliments on this top! It is the perfect top for any spring special occasion.

I received so many compliments on this top, typically I would have ordered a small but it was not available so I tried the XS. It was a bit tight but I honestly didn't even need to wear a bra since it was tight around the chest area. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great, easy to wear, flattering top
links_reviews_text: I wore this to work and then again to a birthday dinner. This top is very comfortable and very flattering. I received lots of compliments both times I wore the top. It's a little less pink (more dull pink) than some of the RTR photos showed.
Beautiful top! I planned this work work and ended up wearing it for some pictures. Very comfy, runs a little bit small.
This top was so feminine and pretty, and received so many compliments wearing it. The details on the top are amazing, and the bell sleeves make it even better. Definitely recommend renting this one!
Very cute shirt..fits nice and snug. The zipper kept snagging though.
The shirt is a pretty color but it was not quite my style. It is true to size and kind of tight at the top.
I loved the fit. It hugs your curves and the soft pink & lace combo is so pretty. My husband loved it too. Many compliments.
This is a cute top. You need help zipping. I could have gone up a size. Sleeves are nice and fabric is a bit thin for winter. May rent again.
beautiful lace detail, perfect shade of pink.

links_reviews_title: Loved this top! Fit like a glove and so comfy!
links_reviews_text: Loved everything about this top! Dress up or down! Fit perfectly!

Worn to a holiday family function. This was such a flattering top, from the bell sleeves to the color. Loved it all! It is a fitted peplum style, however it was a comfortable fit and true to size. You need to rent this for your next occasion!
The top was very pretty but unfortunately could not accommodate my bust (34DDD) and athletic frame.
This shirt is interesting-it has something like a delicate lace overlay with a camisole tank under it. Some seams no longer lay flat, but overall still very pretty

This top is flirty, pretty, and well made. Perfect amount of stretch and the peplum was very flattering. I loved the bell sleeves. They weren't too long or big. This too made me feel delicate and pretty.
Wore with strapless bra bc of the sheer lace on top. Very fitted top and the peplum was too. The sleeves added a nice flair.

There's nothing not to love about this top. The color is so pretty. The fit is flattering and I loved the lace detail. I would have purchased this top but the one I received was very worn so I opted to send it back.

links_reviews_title: Pretty but tight in the bust area
links_reviews_text: Seemed a little worn, and was too tight in the bust for a family event.

links_reviews_title: Fit very well and hugged all the right places. comfortable and fashionable.
links_reviews_text: Shirt hugged around my hips well and arms fit well, didn't feel constrained at all. Detail was lovely.
Beautiful top
Tight fit couldn’t wear
Loved this way more than I thought I would. It's also a very flattering blouse, which I wasn't really expecting,
Black turtleneck elongates your neckline looks great with your hair up and earrings. The ideal mix of classy and sexy. Slight crop makes you look skinny. You need a good bra to wear right.
True to size. Something different
This sweater is a nice balance between sexy and classy. It's super stylish and I felt like a runway diva in this piece.

I paired this sweater with the JOSIE BY NATORI Platinum Faux Leggings and it was perfect for the party. I didn't notice much difference in size between the M and L but I wore the L for a little more room. Wore it with a strapless bra. Got tons of compliments. It's sexy without being too revealing. Super comfortable!

I loved this top and wore it twice. Only complaint is that I had to wear it backwards as the cut out didn't hit in a good place in the front. It was too low and revealing. I loved the cut out shoulders and it was a perfect top for going out in the city in the cold weather!

I have always loved ALC and this didn't disappoint. Well made, true to size. I would say tho that it could be a little short for taller women. But, I am bustier so hard to say. I loved this! Def will wear again before returning. Perfect for chill winter date night.
Loved this cute turtleneck and the cutouts made it feel special
alas no date to wear it on due to social distancing....
Very clingy. Maybe should have sized up. Needed smoothing garments .
Fits well. Keyholes and shoulders are interesting. Very sexy top. Nice material.
This sweater was sexy yet warm and comfortable. I wish it was a little longer but otherwise it was a great rental

links_reviews_title: was a little too small for me
links_reviews_text: would try the size small
Little snug. Low cut. Flattering!

links_reviews_title: Love this top, sort of sexy but tasteful
links_reviews_text: Hard to wear a normal bra with, but otherwise SUPER cute.
Great sweater very sexy and flattering runs small

links_reviews_title: Sexy sweater. I got a lot of compliments on this.
links_reviews_text: Fits true to size.
Was not flattering.
Great quality sweater. It's perfect for a night out.

links_reviews_title: Wore it to the office so far.
links_reviews_text: Fitted ribbed sweater and on the short side. Loved the cold shoulders ...the opening in the center is a bit low so be prepared for that.
This would look good with high waisted pants or skirt but it was more cropped on me exposing my midriff a little. I didn't mind that it was tight it was just super short
Love this top super flattering and fitted but comfortable at the same time. Will definitely rent again.
A lot of compliments. It was comfortable and different.
Fit great and loved the cutouts!

links_reviews_title: Comfy and perfect to dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Super comfortable! I thought it would be a pullover but there is a side zipper to give you shape. Perfect length for tennis shoes or heels.
Such a beautiful dress! Can be worn for multiple seasons, a little bit short but very sexy and chic!
Worn it on a trip in Portugal and a work event in NY- cute for both, has a loose fit and a little short so works with tights underneath

links_reviews_title: Flirty length was perfect for a party with friends.
links_reviews_text: Very flattering cut. Could not imagine wearing this without pantyhose, however, due to the flirty length.

I really liked wearing this dress. It had a cool bohemian feel to it. I'm actually considering purchasing it. The color made it great for fall, but I feel like I could wear it in warmer weather as well. It has a weird hook button thing near the neckline that I guess you're supposed to button, but I left it open. Buttoning that makes it more conservative.

I love this flowy dress by IRO. It runs true to size so you should size up for your back up. The fabric is very loose and comfortable throughout mid section and hips. This style is great for any cup size and should be worn with a standard bra. At 5ft, the dress hit tea length on me. Pair with strap heel and necklace.
This dress was adorable. I sized up to a 40 since the brand runs small. Super light weight and the print is great.

links_reviews_title: Cute style, wish it was a little more fitted
links_reviews_text: I wore this for my birthday. It's super cute, and the length worked well for me because I am short. However, the straps/shoulders are a little too long and so I had to pin it up a bit so that the waist/bodice fell in the right place. It's also not quite as fitted around the waist as I would have liked. Overall was fun to wear and comfortable!
The dress was beautiful but it barley covered my crotch! So so short, not for tall girls unfortunately.
This was HILARIOUSLY short. It's a shirt. I'm 5'4 and this was a shirt. It fit perfectly (as a shirt). I wore it with jeans, and it was a cute boho top.
This dress is really cute and fits well other than the fact that it's so short. I'm 5'10" but it was uncomfortably short. I was panicking while walking up the subway steps

Was so looking forward to wearing this dress because I'm obsessed with the brand and happy that RTR carried it! Unfortunately I wasn't able to wear this because it was just wayyy too short on me. It was more like a tunic than a dress - definitely requires bike shorts or something underneath. Sadly wasn't able to wear even though it fit perfectly everywhere else.
Rented this dress twice. Easy to go from Wearing with white sneakers to heels. Feminine, flowing and sleek at the same time.
Very cute dress. Somewhat sheer at the top but very comfy and flowy

Rented for a bachelorette party in Scottsdale. Went well with the western vibe. Very flattering but I did need to pin the straps as they were a bit long. There is a button on the top you can button to make it more high neck, but it took away from the overall look (more matronly). I was between a 38 and a 40 and glad i went with the 40. Nice, loose, flowy dress. Great quality. Looked cute with black booties!

links_reviews_title: I did not end up wearing the dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was way too short. It looked like a long blouse. I tried the dress on with tights, however, did not feel like it was appropriate to wear to work with the length. I think the dress would be great for someone that is petite. I am 5'6 and it did not work out.
It was so flattering. I wore it with brown suede thigh-high Stuart Weitzman boots and it was adorable.
Didn't end up wearing bc of the length

links_reviews_title: Bold florals perfect for the Winter
links_reviews_text: Great dress for the cold winter days. The red floral was perfect for my holiday party and i was able to dress it up with my over the knee boots.
Ressy shape is great but the fabric is dull and muddy
Love fabric. And great for petite body but neckline was a little low for work. Would rent again for holiday potentially
Nice dress but a little short and too big. Didn't work for me
Looked suppeer sexy with thigh high leather boots and tights. Love love love
I wore this dress to a friend's birthday party. It's lovely. The colors are so beautiful and I received a lot of compliments. It's an easy, relaxed and flowy style. Will definitely rent this again
Very flattering and great for date night. Pretty top
This dress is very cute, but it is incredibly short. I couldn't wear it.

Loved the dress but got very short with my bump. And because I had to size up, the sleeves were way too baggy. I still got plenty of compliments on it and I did add a belt around the middle which helped give it a little more shape.
Fits great, although if you have a fuller bust, you may need a cami. I wore to work then out for a dinner and got compliments all day

I rented this for work and it was lovely! The fabric is light and airy. Definitely fits true to size. I ordered the 38 because European brands tend to run small, but I wish I had ordered the 36! Will definitely rent again in the smaller size.
I normally wear a size 4 and I got this in a 36 (which I think is equivalent to a 4?) but it was definitely really loose.
Great dress, my husband loved it and I received many compliments. It was fun to see reactions once people realized it was backless. Easy to wear and comfortable. Would rent again!

I couldn't love this dress more! I wish I had a pic of the back. Fashion tape is a must! Along with cup bra or no bra. The dress packs so easily, no wrinkles. Classy front with tasteful but sexy open back. Plus it is so comfortable and not restricting! The inner lining does ride up a bit when you are dancing but not in a major way. I will totally rent this again!

links_reviews_title: It was a show stopper! So many complements esp about the back
links_reviews_text: Good length, good feel. The lace looked pretty up close. The hook for the neckline was a bit hard to put on and I felt like if I pulled too hard it would rip. But other than that the dress made me feel beautiful!!! I wore it to a black tie wedding.

Gosh I want to love this dress. It fits true to size and the lace detail and open back is gorgeous. However it's not quite there- there's no stretch to the fabric so it does not make the most of your shape (tighter on the hips than waist). The lace also gapes a bit making wing thing coming off the back- not great for photos (you can see it happening in a few review photos).

I loved this dress! Wore it to a charity auction. I have an athletic build, larger butt and thighs and small waist and bust. it wAs a little tight but didn't ride up. Received many compliments! Very comfortable. I didn't quite fill out the top so I wore a stick on bra with a bit of padding.
I loved the fit and it was very comfortable

links_reviews_title: This dress was gorgeous, I LOVED it! Perfect for cocktail attire.
links_reviews_text: This dress worked great with a sticky bra and fashion tape to lay down the scalloped edges in the back. I did have to re apply tape a few times in the back, but I would still choose this dress again...and again! It was very elegant. Overall I was very pleased with my first RTR experience.

links_reviews_title: Great New Years formal party dress!
links_reviews_text: Fit great. I usually wear a 4 but saw that a few had sized down on fit. The 2 was a little sung but overall better fit. Def needs fabric tape to hold the lace in place but that worked well. Overall fun dress.
Loved this dress! Perfect for a dinner party. Super comfortable and not too short. Would highly recommend!
This is my favorite dress! Got so many compliments and felt beautiful in it. I highly recommend renting this dress.

It was an ok dress. Not a show stopper. It didn't fit me like it fit the model or other women my size. It was very baggy in the back and the neck was not much of a mock neck. I rented it because mostly everything else was already gone. I ordered a 0, and I'm typically a 0. I just wasn't blown away.
Loved the dress! It ran a little long because of my short height, but it didn't bother me as long as I could wear heels. Also loved the back details of the dress :)

Very flattering dress and fit true to size except for the back. The back cut out was a little big and was gaping throughout the night. I just had to keep the dress pulled down and it was fine though, not a big concern. Pretty dress, I would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I loved this classy, sexy little black dress!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. I have a small chest and large hips, but the dress still fit my curves just right. I wore a sticky backless bra and had no issues at all. The under slip was a bit snug and would ride up at times, but wasn't really an issue. I wore a size 8 and it was very true to size. I do have to say if you have bigger hips it may be snug.

links_reviews_title: Proper in the front, risqué in the back
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress! Received many compliments and was really comfortable. I want to buy this one! If you need a LBD, but want to stand out in the crowd- this is the dress for you!
Received a lot of compliments on what I called a 'business in the front, party in the back' dress. Very comfortable. Hit right above the knee. Would recommend wearing with a sticky bra.

links_reviews_title: Did not wear. Was pretty, but not what I was looking for.
links_reviews_text: Very fitted. Definitely need a backless bra for it and some spanx for the curvier gals to suck it all in because it will ALL show. The details and high neckline were very intricate and beautiful. It made the little black dress that much classier with a bit of sex appeal.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I received many compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Fit was good! I ordered an 8 for the fit in the hip and butt area and it was perfect. The top was a little loose in the bust area, but I’m sure that’s because I have a smaller chest and it was backless. Overall I was extremely pleased with the fit and will definitely order again!

Pros- overall pretty and comfortable Cons- I am more pear shaped and had to wear the larger size to fit my lower half. It felt like the back was too wide or stretched out. It didn't fall nicely on my back at all and gapped at my traps making me looked like I had wings. The lace on the neck was all chewed up and also did not fall nicely. It's a pretty dress but way too worn out and should probably be retired.

links_reviews_title: The event was a good friend's wedding!
links_reviews_text: Overall, the dress was great for an outdoor September wedding in Seattle! It was comfortable, forgiving, and breathable (the fabric was very light). I ordered both a 4 and 6, since I didn't know what size I was going to be in a Rachel Zoe dress. I ended up wearing the 6, because even though the 4 fit, the 6 had a little bit more room. I will say that, based on the first product picture, I thought the floral applique was going to be a bit wispier, but it ended up not being the traditional lace material (probably for the best so that the dress doesn't get ruined easily). Also, as other reviews have stated, the lace in the back doesn't lay flat - but if you're standing straight, the material doesn't flop around.

Dress fit good, except for the back, the lace did not lay close to your back. My husband had to use double sided tape, and it kept coming up. The dress may have been worn too many times. I still had compliments.

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments, great twist on the LBD!
links_reviews_text: I was comfortable all evening dancing, only 1 con I can think of- had to sit up very straight or there was a little gapping in the back...otherwise LOVED it!

links_reviews_title: Super classy and sexy dress. So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: Great dress for a formal wedding. The front is beautiful and the back is a stunner. I am 5’2 and like most designer pieces this is made for slightly taller women. The torso was too long for me, so the lace in back was bunching in a weird way. I just threw a few darts on either side to tighten up the back, and it worked perfectly, laid nice and flat. I would recommend ironing the lace in back before wearing, though. Beautiful, flattering dress. I got so many compliments!

It was my first time renting a dress from RTR, but I couldn't be happier! The dress arrived when expected and the fit, design, and look overall was stunning. Don't ask me, ask everyone who paid me a compliment... The condition of the dress was immaculate. It fit very comfortably, no pulling or tightness anywhere. The neckline lace was so complimentary.

This dress was beautiful as well as comfortable. Seemed to run just slightly large. I read reviews and sized down accordingly. It fit great and I was able to sit, stand and move around comfortably all night. The lace was a little worn looking, especially in the back, but I know this dress is a very popular rental. It had a small tear in the lace on one side (likely from someone putting their finger through the lace) but not at a seam and not at all noticeable. Overall one of my fave rentals!

links_reviews_title: Great but the inside liner rides up and is short
links_reviews_text: Fit great and received so many compliments. Definitely a fun dress but don't plan to dance because that's not happening. There's not much give for movement and the lace puckers out in the back. The liner is really short and shows more skin than I planned. Very flattering and sexy

It fit perfectly, though the lace back did wing out a bit under the arms. That is easily fixed with some dress tape. I loved the length, and it was just formal enough for a wedding. Definitely recommend this dress!!

I rented this as a back up dress for a formal affair and loved it so much, I wore it to a fancy brunch the next morning when I wore my original dress for the event. It's very flattering and sexy, my husband loved it. There isn't much structure to the dress, and not a lot of stretch so make sure you order your normal size and not too small. You can only wear tape or stick ons in the front for your chest, as obviously the back doesn't allow for a bra. Also, as the other reviews mention, the lace in the back doesn't always lay flat so double sided tape might be a good option for a long night.
This dress was very comfortable. No tugging or pulling. No adjusting. I'm a little busty for my petite stature and the 0 fit fine. Defiantly Recommend this dress. Super classy and sophisticated.

This dress fit perfectly! The size down fit as well but I decided go with the 12 as I wanted to be able to dance comfortably. Loved the lace and as others have said the lace on the back didn't quite lay flat but a couple pieces of fashion tape helped that just fine. Would definitely rent this dress again. The wedding started at 97 degrees and I stayed comfortable in it. Highly recommend!
Awesome fit ! Dress was comfortable and flattering in all the right places. I felt amazing! Definitely recommend
Beautiful dress! Hugged in all the right places and still comfortable to dance in. LOVED the open back and the silhouette it created.
Overall it was a great dress. As others have mentioned the lace on the back doesn't lay flat against your body, but that wasn't a big deal for me. Fits pretty true to size.

This dress is really beautiful. Though it didn't fit me correctly in the back area because I'm smaller chested. The back detailing opened as I moved. I did use fashion tape but had to reapply during the evening.
The fit was perfect, it did bow out in back in pictures, but didn’t have to wear a bra!

I could have worn either the 4 or 6, but you could definitely tell the size 4 was heavily worn. I opted to wear the 6 because of this and dealt with the fact it was just a bit loose. I also used extra of the double sided tape from my strapless stick on bra to tack down the scalloped edges of lace on the open back which worked perfectly. I loved wearing this dress and got plenty of compliments!

links_reviews_title: The open back was the best part!
links_reviews_text: I liked the dress because it was conservative in length and overall cut, but had a fun, open back. However, lace was thick enough to go without a bra so there was no need to try and figure out something backless and strapless. I will warn you that when giving hugs, I think people were surprised to touch skin ha.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments all night long.
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size. Light weight and very comfortable. Length fit perfectly for my tall body. I felt very secure in the dress all night even with the daring back. Make sure you have someone to help you clasp the neck, if it wasn’t for my 8 yr old daughter, it may have stayed in the bag and that would have been a shame.
This dress was beautiful! The large opening in the back really made the dress. It fit exactly to size for me. Will definitely be renting this one again.
Probably the best dress I ever wore to a wedding. Wish I could wear it again.
Perfect gown for tall women. Classy and comfortable.
I really liked how the dress flowed!! I rented this for a winery trip. I received many compliments and it fit great!!

links_reviews_title: I loved the flow and the colors! Such comfy material too!
links_reviews_text: It was very low cut, I had to pin it to keep it together. Other than that, it was great!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, sizing a little strange.
links_reviews_text: In the end, I really enjoyed this dress! It was light and flowy and everything I was looking for - I wore this for a July baby shower when I was 35 weeks pregnant, and I wanted something gorgeous that wouldn't make me hot while still covering me up, and this fit all those criteria. Overall, I was very happy with this dress. The issue I had was that I'm not sure what size of person this dress is for! The bodice over my bump was a little snug - nothing uncomfortable, not tight, just snug. However, the chest area was HUGE. If I had sized up to cover my bump, the top of the dress would literally have been falling off. Even as it was, I safety-pinned above my cleavage so my boobs weren't completely falling out. My bra size is larger than normal right now (35 weeks pregnant...) but it was still way too big! Just be aware of that when ordering. Overall, I would recommend!! Just be ready to pin the front if necessary, and maybe not the *best* option for maternity, although I made it work!

I ordered this dress in my regular size and a size down because some reviews said the top was large. It is, but the waist isn’t. With a safety pin the top fit perfectly and I was able to wear a strapless bra. I’m 5’6 and ordered a 16 long. I had to wear it with sandals because the dress wasn’t long enough for heels. It is very flowy, so I wouldn’t recommend it if you have to navigate a lot of stairs.

links_reviews_title: Very revealing, had to be pinned.
links_reviews_text: This guy's pretty true to size. Was a little tight around the middle and a bit long for my height (5'3"). The straps are way too long. The top was very revealing. I ended up pinning the straps behind my back and pinning the front together to hold everything in.

I rented this specifically knowing that my friend and I would go shoot at this rose garden. This dress is an ephemeral fairytale. The details of this dress are stunning and the way it flows in the wind makes this dress so incredible. The sun rays shine through the material a little bit so be prepared to show off some leg even in a fully covered maxi. The skirt is very big so you can take some awesome shots like this and still fully be covered. The fit is nice and comfortable and it would make a perfect garden party dress!

links_reviews_title: More beautiful on than I thought!
links_reviews_text: The top is loose and straps are way too long, had to twist the straps in the back and put a fancy piñon to hold the dress up. Also, wore a strapless bra. The dress did look beautiful and classy! Wore it to a girls weekend at the beach. Easy, breezy and got really beautiful pictures.

links_reviews_title: Too low cut for the Opera
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous gown but made for bigger chested gals who are comfortable with lots of cleavage. This was a bit too much chest for the opera.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, needs many makeshift alterations
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful with comfy and flowy material. I always look for dresses that can accommodate a 34G. While I was able to wear this dress without a bra, I needed extensive safety pins and boob tape to hold the dress in place. Additionally, I'm 5' 7" and wore 3" heels, but I was still tripping over the dress all evening. While the dress looked great, I would prefer to rent a dress that didn't need so many make shift alterations.

This dress is really pretty. As others mentioned, the boob coverage is minimal. I used some tape to help create a last line on defense. Fit is large, I'm glad I sized down. Wore sneakers and it was just trailing on the ground. Other annoying thing is that the bottom of the zipper is just on the lining and theres a gap in the outer layer and sometimes the lining was poking through that gap. Otherwise, fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Great for date night in Bermuda
links_reviews_text: Fun print. The top is a little big for small busts

links_reviews_title: Head turner! Went to dinner with the hubby and got so many compliments! Such a fun dress!
links_reviews_text: Loved it!

I wore this to my brother's florida spring wedding and I felt so elegant… Even my father gave me a complement which is rare. The color was just right for spring and it went well with the Decour. It felt slimming but had room when I ate too much! It was a hit!

I thought the dress fit was pretty great! I would say I'm between a 14-16 so I wore the 16 and it fit really well. My only flaw with the dress was the length. I ended up wearing flat sandals with it because if I had worn heels it would have been way to shorts like almost ankle showing. I'm only 5'5. Otherwise the dress was perfect!

links_reviews_title: Great dress just too big in the bust
links_reviews_text: Nice length and fit in the waist, just too big in the bust and not enough coverage for my strapless bra.

links_reviews_title: Too large and too long for petite
links_reviews_text: Flowy. Would work if it were a bit shorter.
Was perfect for Valentine's Day! Got so many compliments. Was able to wear without a bra.

I didn't want to take it off! I kept twirling in it. The dress is pretty busty but it seemed easy to pin if you want more modesty (I didn't). It was a bit long but I expected that being a shorty. The waist was flattering on my bigger tummy.
Tons of compliments, really flattering - a bit heavy so I wouldn't wear on a hot day.
Great dress. I usually wear 8, glad I got the 6. Could have gotten a 6R. It was too long. But I just put on some very high heels.

I'm typically a size 4 but the 2 was the right size for me. I needed something that was black tie yet light enough for a day time wedding in the dessert and this fit the bill. It isn't really my style but the dress worked well, the chiffon was airy but i was still pretty hot. it fit nicely.

This dress was a dream! So flowy and pretty with gorgeous colors and a great fit. I am usually a 10 and have a broad rib cage so I was nervous that this dress would fit. 5'6 and the length was maybe 1/2 inch below my feet with sandals which was great with the flowy look and not too long to trip me. Other reviews mentioned lots of room up top but I had more trouble keeping the girls in and ended up using a safety pin. Also, I didn't think it was too white to wear to a wedding which was something I'd worried about! Rent it!!

This was my "just in case" dress for a beach wedding in June. There was some confusion at the house where I was staying and the dress I had initially ordered was returned before I arrived. After relaying the situation to RTR, they immediately overnighted this dress and it arrived just in time for the ceremony- thank you RTR for the exceptional customer service! The 8L was a perfect length for me (I was wearing flats). You will definitely need to go braless. I was able to manage without dress tape being an extremely flat chested individual, however I really wish the straps had been adjustable and would have been more comfortable with a little more coverage. There are many layers to the skirt making it a bit toasty- especially when dancing. While I'm bummed I was unable to wear my first choice, this dress did the trick and I received compliments throughout the night!
The straps were a little long.
So comfortable and made me feel fancy at the same time. A bit long, but I wore tall wedges. Tempted to buy...

Rented this dress for my baby shower & it was perfect. Light and flowy so I wasn't too hot, and plenty of room to accommodate my 30 week bump and growing boobs. I did go up a size because of the bump. The only issue (which is stated in pretty much every review) is the straps are super long so I had to pin them. Highly recommend!!

links_reviews_title: A dress that flows with the breeze as you move and feels great on!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a date night on a warm summer night in the city. The material is lovely, soft, and flows beautifully with every movement. Gorgeous colors. The dress is very long and very low cut; I had to use fashion tape in the bust area to make sure it stayed in place (though no bra or anything needed for a small chested person) and to shorten the dress so I could walk without tripping. Worked great. Received tons of compliments. I think if I had been dancing or moving a lot more, I would have been worried about tearing the dress at the bottom or about it coming open in the bust. For dinner or an event with standing and socializing, I would highly recommend, just have fashion tape on hand so you can customize the fit a bit as needed.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress for my engagement photos. It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun to wear. It was too big for me in the front, as I have like no bust, so I was constantly pulling it up throughout the day. I am tall, 5'9", and it was the perfect length for me. It was so flowy and beautiful and perfect for these pictures.

Pretty flowy dress but it's VERY low cut and I'm quite ample in that area so there were a few brave safety pins really pulling their weight with this one. Overall got many compliments on it. I'm 5 9 and wore the long with chucks.
The fit was great but was a little lower cut than expected. Wore this for family pictures and it was perfect! Loved the soft colors and how flowy it is.

links_reviews_title: Wearing this to a formal masquerade event
links_reviews_text: Perfect length, and very sexy top. Loved the colors!

This was actually my back up dress. I ordered a size up and it fit but I think my actual size would've been even better. I am full chested and did not even have to wear a bra. This was my first time using RTR and I am obsessed!!!!

It was such a beautiful dress. Just like the other reviews, the straps were really long and the cut was really low and revealing. I couldn't figure out how to pin the straps, so I pinned the front so my bra wouldn't show. A strapless bra worked fine. The dress was very comfortable to move around in and sit down and eat. The only piece that was awkward was the low cut and making sure everything stayed put. I gave it 4 stars based on the slight discomfort of the low cut and long straps.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a masquerade party at 37 weeks pregnant.
links_reviews_text: The fit was ok. I had to upsize 2 sizes to fit the bump which made to top too big and loose, but safety pins fixed it. I received lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Great dress for my engagement party!
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for my engagement party. The chest was a bit big, it looked like someone had rented it before and stretched it out but otherwise it was really pretty and fit nicely. I'm almost 6'0 and the 8 Long was perfect and on the ground just like I wanted. I was sent this dress because my first option wasn't available last minute so I would've picked a 6 Long if I could choose again.

I rented this dress for my daughter to wear to homecoming, she is 5'5". I rented a 6R with a backup size 4R. So glad I got the 4R, only con to this dress is... the straps were a bit too long, and would allow the dress to hang lower than I liked. We bought a cute rhinestone hair clip so that straps would be tighter. Overall fit was perfect.

I loved this dress and felt like a princess in it. I was able to wear flats without tripping over the material. I did have to pin it because the cleavage was a bit much. Overall, I loved how I felt in the dress and got many compliments.

This dress is so beautiful. It is flowey and light and pretty. It does run a little bit big in the top. It is cut very low. I had to pin it and my strapless bra still showed which hindered my dancing. I also had to tie the straps in the back to keep the top up. Other than that it was perfect. Both sizes fit but I went with the bigger size because it was more comfortable. I would recommend this for a day time wedding, I wore it for a night wedding and I felt a little weird since it is so bright and happy. Lovely dress.

links_reviews_title: My baby brother got married in Las Vegas!
links_reviews_text: Overall, the dress was lovely to wear. It was light, and comfortable in the Vegas desert heat, but formal enough for me to be Best Sis/Witness/GroomsPerson at church. Since the neckline was as deep at it was, I opted to wear a simple black cami underneath and a black bolero to cover my shoulders. I also wore black strappy heeled wedges and took care with my steps, with the length of the gown and my short 5'2" stature. My one concern with this dress is the zipper (it may have been the two dresses I just so happened to have received, but, just in case); it stuck at the black waist accent and wouldn't budge without a second person carefully nudging it through the rest of the way, as to not damage the outer fabric. But, once that was handled, it's smooth sailing! This is a beautiful dress and I'd love to wear it again, should the occasion arise.
Stylish and comfortable. What more could you want?

links_reviews_title: Retro pantsuit with a modern twist
links_reviews_text: I rented both pieces on unlimited. I wore this for a birthday party and then brought the ensemble to a work conference. Very stretchy slip on pants and comfortable top. Recommend this one!

links_reviews_title: A new age twist on the professional suit
links_reviews_text: The fabric. The fit. The comfort. This look was everything! The material is stretchy and super movable. I got stopped every few steps I took to receive a "YASSS GIRL!" or "that outfit is life!" Such a fun piece to wear.
Loved how comfy and stretchy the fabric is. Would love to order the set but styled mind with a button down and black denim!
I LOVED this outfit! I got so many compliments throughout the day and it was so comfortable to wear.
Really sweet work set. Didn't expect the stretchy material. Pairs great with the bottoms.
This was a fun top to wear. It didn't seem appropriate for work until I added a jacket. It's true to size. I would order again.
Stretchy and comfortable. Got so many compliments from total strangers!

Loved!! Ended up keeping a lot longer than expected! This is a super comfortable piece that I could just throw on and go. Some of the stitching is actually orange up close but not really noticeable. Wore it with some high waisted flare jeans to play with the proportions of the top.

I loved this unique top - wore it to a gala with some Uniqlo leggings and felt very confident and fashion forward wearing it. Runs true to size or possibly a little large. I'm usually a 10 and could have sized down due to stretch.
Super soft and true to size

Absolutely love this chic and unique statement top. The material is soft, hugs the body and has stretch. It fit like a glove. I felt fantastic in this top. I'm petite so it was more of a tunic on me which was perfect as I could wear leggings or pants. It is so striking and will turn heads. I wish I could buy it! This top is amazing.
Runs big

So well made, great cut and materials. Wore it for a regular night out and got so many compliments. Feels super luxurious but pairs awesome with white or light grey jeans to make it more casual. Felt awesome wearing it, very flattering.

links_reviews_title: So Fabulous I need to rent again!
links_reviews_text: This is a gorgeous top especially when paired with the matching knit pants. It's very unique and beautiful. You'll put it on and won't want to take it off it's so comfortable!

Although I liked this I did not wear due to not having a bra that looked right with it. The lining kept coming out which was annoying as it was a different color. My hubby hated it for some reason so I decided to not wear it
The RTR app suggested the XL (I'm usually a 10, maybe a 12 for bust reasons) but this was WAY too big. Want to rent it again ina smaller size because it's so wonderfully different!

I wore this shirt out on the dinner date and the compliments rolled in. This transitional weather top, made of soft, thick material is fitted around the bust and rib cage. Then it drapes away from the tummy and hips. The one sleeveless side gave a sexy edge to this piece. Could not recommend this more.

links_reviews_title: Easy and didn't have to think of what to wear
links_reviews_text: Cute and comfortable. Just make sure you read the details. The color is navy. I wore it with black pants. Oops! But it still worked out

I kept fiddling with this shirt because of the side zipper. I'm not even sure why there is one because the top is stretchy enough you can put it over your head. The zipper kept bunching and I kept adjusting. It was so annoying in fact I almost went home to change tops.
The material is stretchy and nice but the fit was totally off for my large chest.
Didn't quite work on it's own but I paired it with a white blouse underneath for a layered look. Wore it with jeans.
Could be dressed up or made casual. Fun look
This fit me really well but I would say size down for an ideal fit.

links_reviews_title: Best RTR ever. Incredibly flattering and comfortable.
links_reviews_text: Perfect amount of stretch in the top and pants. And hides all the right places too.
I wanted to like this too, but I rented it for work to wear on top of a white button down, and there was weird bunching / creasing at the top of my chest. It was not flattering.

This is a great piece. Rosetta Getty runs very small. I wore it to an investor dinner and it was the perfect combination of party and business. I then wore it to a nice dinner with different pants. It's very versatile.

LOVE Rosetta Getty. And just learned about her from RTR. I rented both this top and the matching pant. About the top: The fabric is a thick, stretchy and gorgeous knit. The plaid is surprisingly muted and has enough color ambiguity that you'll have lots of flexibility coordinating shoes and accessories. Based on the RTR guidelines, I ordered the XL. I usually wear a 10 or 12 or L or M top. The XL was perfectly fitted in the torso and draped exactly like you see in the model photos here. I'm full hourglass and it was flattering on. Surprisingly, the cut and fabric are such that you may not need to wear a bra with this top, which is great considering that it would be a convertible one and those rarely work well. I love this very unique piece and am dying to keep!

links_reviews_title: This is a super unique and fun piece that goes with everything from leather pants to jeans.
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size and, since it is fully lined, it is super comfortable. I could not figure out how to wear a bra with it so I wore it without one because it is snug enough across the chest to provide support. Every time I wore it, I received a ton of compliments and questions about where it was from.

links_reviews_title: Cute but wasn't right for me
links_reviews_text: Fabric is really stretchy. Fit true to size. Just wasn't flattering on me
Gaps at the top

links_reviews_title: Flattering fit, weird silhouette from afar
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress, rich color. Sleeves not too long for petite girls. Fit my 5'2" frame perfectly (and yes it's short). In side view pictures, the ruffles gave a weird big-belly looking shape to the silhouette. This was the only reason for 4 instead of 5 stars. The silhouette was not a problem up close because the ruffles were visible (and pretty)! Rent it!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but the folds are a little weird
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful dress, very comfy, a bit short, but you can wear hose or stockings. However, the folding on the front is a little weird and doesn't like to stay folded if you have larger than an A-cup. I found myself fixing it all night long. Other than that, a very sexy, good-fitting dress that resulted in lots of compliments from strangers.

links_reviews_title: I got tons of compliments but...
links_reviews_text: I probably should have sized up even more than normal. I am about 9 weeks pregnant so not noticeably pregnant but still have a little belly. The dress covered my belly perfectly and the color was perfect. The neckline was quite low, however, so a tank top was a must. I felt really pretty and would rent again-- in the right size
It's a little tight on the arms but I still wore it to work and really loved it! Tons of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Came late didn't get to wear...
links_reviews_text: Dress was cute but too short and too booby for me to feel comfortable at a wedding where I would be dancing.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, but too deep of a neckline.
links_reviews_text: This dress was VERY low cut - the bottom of the neckline sat beneath my breast bone. I thought this was ok as I am relatively flat chested, so not overly sexy - but my grandma disagreed. :) Otherwise the fit and length of the dress was very flattering on me, but I would not wear it again due to the neckline. I am broad-shouldered and while the shoulders were a bit tight, they were not unbearable.
The fit was perfect- many compliments. Loved it easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Unfortunate gapping in chest area, but cute otherwise
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my anniversary dinner and unfortunately the fit in the chest area was very awkward. It kept gapping and my bra was showing all night. I had to keep pulling it. Eventually, I resorted to using bobby pins which I happened to have with me for my hair, which looked a bit awkward but were still better than my bra showing. The fit was otherwise super cute and flirty, but I couldn't personally rent again unless I had some kind of cami or fashion tape

Very short so I wore tights underneath. If you don't want to show boob then this isn't the dress for you. I was very self conscious all night ... I'm a 38D and as you can see the dress is meant for smaller busted women.

I loved this look because it made me feel sexy, but almost more than my liking. It was a good thing I had a bra the same color because the material was so silky that it just kept peeping my bra out a little. I'm sure fashion tape would have fixed this but it didn't start happening until later in the night.

Cute and comfortable dress. I usually wear a size M but sometimes a S. The M fit pretty well with only one issue. The issue being that the shoulders are rather broad and the sleeves are big. I felt like the sleeves were falling off my shoulders but this didn't keep me from wearing it. Received many complements, my husband even asked if I could keep the dress (probably because it is short and low cut). Sorry my pictures aren't that great but you can see the size of the sleeve and in my 2nd pic you can see just how low cut the dress is.

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a fashion show, perfect dress for it!
links_reviews_text: Great fit and very flattering, but this is low cut! I had to wear a black tank top underneath. Also a very short dress, couldn't wear it without tights.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress for a formal function! Not safe for work without a cami.
links_reviews_text: I am 5'4, 160 lbs and I am muscular in the upper body area and these sleeves fit wonderfully. I looked amazing and I was extremely comfortable all night. I wore a lacy black Bralette (36c) which did show a bit and my girls were appropriate all night. This was a function where I didn't know many people, I wouldn't wear this to a work function without a good cami or body suit on underneath to cover the cleavage. The back is longer than the front, and it was NOT too short for me at all, but I am short.
Goes fantastic with over-the-knee boots. Wore for valentines day dinner. I did need to wear a special bra though, the cut is pretty low.
Cute dress. Definitely low cut. I had to learn how to use tape! I liked it other than having to tape everything!

I LOVE THIS DRESS. I wore this for my best friend's wedding. Her family is very conservative so I paired it with a black cami because the dress was a little too low cut for their taste. I wore this dress for basically 12 hours of running errands, doing different craft projects, and everything else on the day of her wedding. This was the best dress ever.

links_reviews_title: I wore this for a date function and absolutely loved it! So many compliments!
links_reviews_text: It fit well I didn't feel the low cut was that big of an issue. The only thing for me was that I have larger built shoulders so it was a little tight, but I still managed to have fun which is all that mattered. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress. Received tons of compliments.
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable on. So cute and a great length for my 5'2" frame. The only reason I didn't give it 5 stars is because it is definitely way more low cut than is depicted in the stock photos. Even pinned it was very boobsie and didn't lay quite right. Still really cute and I felt great in it.
Loved this dress! The skater skirt cut is so flattering and receive a ton of compliments! Neckline is plunging, so you definitely have to be ok with showing off the girls:) would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Flirty & Fun, but Short & Low Cut
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a work event and loved it, BUT be careful... if you don't like to show lots of cleavage have a backup plan (I wore a black tank top under this dress). Additionally, I'm 5'4 and this was a little too short for my liking for "work"... thankfully it was cold that day and I could get away with wearing tights (problem solved)! If you're hot natured, know that this dress is thick, but i wasn't "hot" - of course it was CHILLY that day! This dress creates a waist for those who need it and it has a fuller A-line"ish" skirt, which I never wear, but I have to admit it was super FUN!
Great dress. I had to pin the v-neck bc it was a little scandalous for the work dinner I was attending. The back zipper was missing it's little pull tab. Would rent again.

Rented this dress for a NYE party and absolutely loved it! I rented my usual size (large) and it fit perfectly. I will say that the waist didn't have a lot of give or stretch to it, so if you're in-between sizes you may want to size up. Also, the dress was definitely more low cut than I anticipated but I just put a cute bralette underneath and used a pin to keep it a little more closed. Overall loved this rental, got so many compliments and would definitely rent again!

Fit was good, I have broad shoulders so that was the reason I picked the extra large instead of the large. Overall, I had a great experience. Dress was fairly short but still long enough to cover my tights seam & I'm 5'10".

links_reviews_title: The dress was perfect for my Holiday Party! I did wear a cami because low cut, such a fun dress!!
links_reviews_text: Fit was true!

Loved this dress in every way! The Burgundy red is perfect for the holiday season. Length was great in the arms and above the knee. The fabric was comfortable, not too thin, not too thick or stuffy. Personally I have a small bust, if I had a fuller bust I believe I would have filled it out a bit better. I was able to wear a regular low cut bra with this which was great. Although I also used double sided tape because when I sat down it allowed for the fabric over the bust to loosen and allowed for the dress to be a bit more revealing. Over all, if I could have kept it.. I WOULD'VE! I wish I had this in my wardrobe. This dress is SO Versatile!
Very low cut in front but stunning!
Loved this dress!! Pretty color and loved that it was long sleeve for a December wedding. A little lower than what I thought, but it was still okay. I received a ton of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Great Dress for a Holiday Cocktail Party
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect for a holiday cocktail party. The only issue I found was that the chest area was an awkwardly deep and wide v-neck. I tried using fashion tape to keep it in place, but it was pointless. Thankfully, I packed a black cami to wear underneath.

I have mixed feelings about this dress. I love the flirty cut and design in the skirt, but it was a little low cut for my taste. I tried pinning the top but it was still a bit busty for me. Overall the material is a little thick and "heavy" but it was great for a fall wedding.

I almost did not wear this dress because the sleeves were extremely tight. I could not lift my arms while wearing it. In addition, like other renters have said, it is very short, but I added a crinoline underneath to add length and love the way it looked! It was totally one of a kind with my temporary alterations and I received so many compliments. I would only recommend this dress to those who are not broad shouldered and those with thin arms.

Wore this in Vegas for my birthday celebration. It was chilly and the long sleeves were perfect!!!!! The V neck is extremely low but I just safety pinned it. Tooooons of compliments and I felt so stylish. The dress made me feel like a million bucks and I wished I was able to keep it. True to size! Ordered a medium as well but too loose in chest and shoulder area so stuck with the small. Will rent again.

This dress was such a success. It's flirty, elegant, and makes you feel extremely confident! The upper arm is a little snug, sorta annoying to dance in, but I worked with it and was fine. The chest is low cut and it's hard to pin it together if you have a bigger chest (I wore a cami and it looked perfect). The color is beautiful and I literally received nothing but compliments on it! Im a medium/large, and the large worked best. It cut out my figure perfectly. 10/10 would highly recommend!
I had a great date night with my husband. I felt line a princess sexy but elegant. I loved the dress it was a little tight on my shoulders but overall accurate size
Loved the color and the skirt of this dress. It was a bit low cut. Very sexy & flirty.
Comfortable and flattering.

I rented this for a fancy birthday dinner. The material is very nice and thick - definitely could be worn in cooler weather with tights. The bust did not fit well; I couldn't even tape it. I had to wear some kind of fancy bra letter to keep me covered and the length was pretty short too. Overall a nice dress, but nothing to write home about.

Fit: Perfect except I have muscular arms and it was a bit tight, but not too uncomfortable. Sleeves fit well on me too, some people said they would be too long, but there were not for me, I must have average length arms? Color was beautiful and perfect dress to spin in!

The dress did not fit well overall. The top was very drapey, but tight at the same time. There was no hope for pinning the top because the two drapey parts wouldn't reach together, so I was forced to wear a cami underneath. The back and arms were tight, to the extent that I could not raise my arms to dance with my husband. It was also quite short, but this was okay with tights. Overall, the dress fit more like a M than an XL. If you don't expect to move much and are okay with wearing a cami and tights, it works fine.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a fall wedding
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'8 and this was defiantly short. Low cut makes for a sexy neckline but be ready for some adjusting all night.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a ball. Very flattering neck line and comfortable!

links_reviews_text: Flattering shape and pleats in the front are helpful when eating/drinking a lot. My shoes kept getting caught in the bottom corners of the slit because the hem is somewhat pocketed... almost tripped a few times. Would've been a good length with higher heels.

This dress definitely runs small. I am normally a 00 in dresses and the 0 was a little snug around the chest. Personally it fit me great, but I can see how it would be frustrating for a true size 0. I am 5’5 and 115lbs for reference.
Very formal, but little too tight would recommend for anyone with no curves.

This dress is really gorgeous, and I felt like a star all night long. I received a TON of compliments the entire day. Here's the catch- You need to get it AT LEAST one size up, and likely 2. I'm normally a 6/8 in dresses, so those are the sizes I originally got. I had to reorder a 10 and 12 (shout out to RTR for getting those replacements to me QUICKLY) and the 12 was the one that fit. If you have any kind of curves or hips, you'll likely need to order 2 sizes above your normal size. If you want the dress to hit the floor, you plan to wear heels and you're around 5'5 or taller, you need to order a long. But WOW is it worth it!

links_reviews_title: Size up in size, very comfortable all night
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress, but definitely consider going up at least one size. I am super glad I ordered a 6 as my back up size, because I couldn’t even zip up the 4 half way! Dress was easy to dance in and very comfortable for the whole night.

Wore this to a formal wedding, sized up 2 sizes from my regular (normally a 6, because reviews said ran small got an 8 and 10 ... 8 would have been okay but pretty tight for dancing so went with the 10 and was comfy perfect other than a tiny bit loose in the chest). Loved it so much, I was complimented all night!! Would buy it if I could!!

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for curves and tits!
links_reviews_text: I'm curvy with a full bust and a not so instagram model tummy. This dress was perfect in all the right places. Shoulder straps don't adjust so make sure you try it on! I thought I'd be a 4, but ended up being a 6. Wore to a winter wedding. Perfect fabric for keeping warm.

Ok so this was a weird order- I ended up getting the 12 long in a totally different dress, must have been a handling issue. BUT the 10R in this dress was the PERFECT FIT. I have been on a massive weight loss journey and this wedding was the first time I was gonna see some family in a while. The dress is so flattering and the fold pleats in the most flattering place. I wish I had gotten the long- i'm 5'7 and was wearing 2 or 3 inch block heels. I might go back and buy it- that's how amazing it is. I also tacked up the straps a bit so my décolletage wasn't so in display- as it was a family affair.

links_reviews_title: Runs a little small for my chest 34D. Would have fit perfectly if size up.
Fun dress for Black and White Ball
links_reviews_text: This dress is very pretty and unique. It does run very small. I usually wear an 8, but even the 10 was small. It is very low cut, but because it was so tight I didn't feel like it would fall down while dancing. The material is pretty thick but wasn't too hot.

I normally wear a size 12 and occasionally have to go up to a 14. I ordered a 14 L, which fit almost like a glove, but only when standing. There is no give in the thigh area, and I am a true full-figured hourglass with real curves, including my thighs. I really, really, really wanted to wear this dress, but unless I pulled it up (so the split sat very high on my thigh), wouldn't have been able to sit AT ALL. But otherwise it was my favorite dress. I have not yet found the one I will actually wear, but had to return this one.

links_reviews_title: I wore this dress to a black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: I am 5’2”. I ordered a 2P which is my regular size and a 4P for backup. The 2P was too small to get on so I wore the 4P which was very big up top and a little too long. The difference in fit was strange to me. I am a B cup. I would suggest another dress if you have similar measurements.
Fun dress, but it was way too small to zip in the back for me, and too tight in the bust.
Beautiful dress but couldn't even get it zipped and I ordered a size up.
Liked the thicker material and quality of the dress but it was too tight and it was too low cut. I probably would've had to go up 2 sizes

links_reviews_title: The style was elegant and fit well.
links_reviews_text: The dress is thick so it kept me relatively warm in the cold room that I had to sit in. The bust on the dress was actually slightly higher then where my actual breasts were, but no one noticed b/c I'm a 32A. If I had larger breasts, the bust probably would have been a problem. I didn't have to wear a bra. I wore 2-3 inch heels and the dress did not drag at all.

I wore this for a black tie. Got tons of compliments, but it's definitely tight and low cut. There was also a small rip near the slit, but material covered it, so all was fine. I felt beautiful, but could barely breathe.

links_reviews_title: You must size up if curvy but it's worth it
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a size 14 but the stylist picked 16r for me--fit like a glove. It's a beautiful dress that's a little more interesting than your average gown because of the jacquard and waist frill. No bra needed if you are c cup and above. Highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: Runs really really small. I loved this dress when i tried it on, but it was way too tight
links_reviews_text: Pros - stunning dress. hides belly with the bow Cons - it was really really tight. I ended up wearing a size 8 in a different dress and the 10 was sooo tight. My boobs did not fit at all. I had to pull them up and they were popping out.

Absolutely amazing jumpsuit - you will get attention in the best way all night! I rented this for my bachelorette in Vegas and wish I had an excuse to wear again. It does run at least a size small and I definitely would have been more comfortable in the 8, but it wasn't available. The fabric has some stretch and holds you in nicely once you're in it. Zipping in was a two person job and you're not using the restroom at all, but still so worth it!
I usually wear a 2 or 4, but size 6 fit perfectly! Im pretty athletic build, 34D Breast and I'm 5'5"

links_reviews_title: So bold and beautiful. I've been using RTR to step outside my comfort zone + experiment with colors!
links_reviews_text: Love this jumpsuit but it runs very small. I am a bit bustier so everything fit like a glove until I reached my mid-waist and bust area. Super cute and love the fun color. If there was a size bigger it would have been perfect!
Love love loved this jumpsuit. I got a ton of compliments the top and sleeve were a bit tight, but I made it work. Definitely avoided going to the bathroom though! Lol

links_reviews_title: Loved this! Got so many compliments makes such a fun statement!
links_reviews_text: It was right around the mid section and I couldn't wear a bra!

It runs a little small so I'm glad I got the size 4. I wore 4in wedges and it was still a little bit longer than I expected but it didn't drag the ground. Wore it out for my birthday, as with all jumpsuits, it's a bit of a challenge to go pee.

Felt like a million bucks in this jumpsuit! Paired it with wooden wedges and a skinny leather belt. Perfect for the theme, the event, and dancing! Would definitely rent again. I had also rented the size up, but it was too big. The size I ended up wearing was a liiiiiiittle snug, but not uncomfortably so. The fabric is stretchy and forgiving.

links_reviews_title: This Jumper is FIRE! I Felt Fantastic!!!
