links_reviews_text: THIS JUMPER RUNS VERY SMALL. I usually wear a 2 or 4. I ordered a 6 & 8. Wore the 8. I have a wide rib cage and luckily a small bust. If my chest had been any larger, it would not have zipped. The one I received had a zipper that was VERY difficult to slide up or down. When using the restroom, my husband or a girlfriend had to go with me to get the zipper up because it required two hands! This may not be the case on all of the jumpers. Also, the sleeve is lined. This makes it pretty tight on the upper arm. I have muscle definition and it was extremely tight in the bicep/shoulder area. Overall though, I loved this outfit and received SO many compliments. The color is bold, bright and rich. It really was beautiful.

I love RTR! Please check out my IG For more of their wardrobe: www.instagram.com/carolwongnyc I am normally a size 2 and fit into some 0's. I a size 6 in this so please size up! ENDLESS compliments. Stopped by strangers. I felt like a million dollars. Super comfy. Love it. Rent it!
It was a tight squeeze but this jumpsuit is luxury. So pretty, fun and the perfect color. I got so so many compliments when wearing. Def would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Made my disco dreams come true!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was perfect for a disco theme party! The color was beautiful, nice thick material, and such a show stopper. Make sure to SIZE UP at least 1 size, maybe 2! I'm usually a 4 and the 6 was a tight squeeze. Thank God for Spanx!

links_reviews_title: I wanted it to happen, but it was a bust over the bust.
links_reviews_text: I really really really wanted this to fit. The color is spectacular! I was going to wear this to a 70s themed Fundraising Gala. I even had white platform heels to plan for the length. :( I tried wearing Spanx which allowed it to zip easier, but the zipper had no chance once it got to my boobs. I'm not sure if a size up would have been much better since this size fit over my hips just fine. Disappointing, especially at the price. Glad I got a backup dress!

links_reviews_title: A show stopper pantsuit worn to a charity event
links_reviews_text: This pantsuit is amazing. It definitely runs small as I normally wear a size 4 and I'm 5 ft 3 3/4 inches and weigh 130 lbs. I'm Athletic build. You truly can only wear this if you are in shape or thin. It just will not work out for you otherwise. It's very very form fitted Definitely order at least one size up or 2 sizes up especially if you are large busted or a bit muscular in the upper back because it zips to the side and you won't be able to get it on and off if you have to go to the bathroom as you have to take the sleeves end out and pull the entire pantsuit down. But it's a show stopper. I kept getting compliments all night. You will he noticed in the dress so you must feel confident to wear it. It's a spectacular bright bold pink color as you can see. It's truly a one of a kind outfit. One you can only wear once because everyone will remember you in it and will talk about you in it for days and possibly weeks on end. It was perfect for the Motown themed charity event I attended as a Board Member. Love this so much. It's now my profile picture on Facebook. Superb!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful one of a kind comfortable piece!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is gorgeous. The color in real life is so vibrant and the design is so interesting and very flattering. I wore it with just a pair of mid-thigh spanx under it and the thick stretchy fabric was so flattering. I also have a very long torso and because of the stretch of this fabric it still fit comfortably. It does run 1-2 sizes small, I'd normally have ordered this in a 4 if I hadn't read the other reviews, but the 6 fit perfectly. I described the vibe as if David Bowie and a flamenco dancer had a baby, this is what they'd wear. My only complaint was that the outer fabric seemed to gap a bit from the lining fabric which made some weird wrinkles in places, I was able to kind of smooth them up to a place under the ruffle so they weren't so noticeable but for a piece that would cost $1650 I'd expect it to be perfect.

links_reviews_title: Just like that, the Queen transformed me.
links_reviews_text: Hot and sexy with my preppy style! LOVED!

This is without a doubt my favorite rental of all time. The jumpsuit does run small--I sized up, as most others suggested. I am typically a 2-4. I rented the 8 and it fit perfectly. I'm 5'4" and the length is also perfect with average height heels. There is a little stretch in the material, so it's forgiving in the best way. Do not pass on this rental!

Rented this for my company's holiday party, but didn't show my hubby until I walked downstairs with it on. His reaction was perfection. This piece was worn with confidence and thankfulness that it fit. I had ordered two back-up sizes as a just in case after reading reading reviews that it ran small and that the fabric didn't have much give to it, which I found to be not true. While there wasn't a ton of give, there was a stretchiness to the fabric. I received a ton of compliments. Such a fun piece to rent.
Fits very small. Do yourself a favor, order 2 sizes up.

links_reviews_title: The exact reason to do RTR
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is the epitome of why RTR is amazing!! I would never pay $1,700 for a hot pink one shoulder jumpsuit but the fact that I can rent it for a night out is amazing. I loved it and got so many compliments. The zipper was a little wonky though but it was great quality and is definitely recommend it

This jumpsuit is GORGEOUS! I'm a size 4, and this was the 8 on me. I ordered 6 and 8. It wouldn't zip up the side past my rib cage. I would definitely try another size up. The pictures don't do it justice.

You will feel fabulous and get compliments all night if you can just get the zipper up. I wore this for a Halloween party. If a size up had been available I probably would have gotten it but the material has some stretch so it's not so unforgiving. Rent this and go have fun!

I LOVED this jumpsuit!! Wore to a wedding and got so many compliments! I could tell this jumpsuit is very well made. Material is skin tight but does not look trashy. I would definitely size up because of how skin tight the material is. My waist is 31 inches and I usually wear a size 2 in jumpsuits, but the 4 fit like a glove on me. Did not ride up in the crotch which is a huge plus for tight jumpsuits! I wore the regular length with 3 inch heels and it was perfect for my height! Would definitely rent again and strongly recommend!
I rented this for a Disco Prom and wish I had the guts to wear it on an average day. Comfortable and beyond gorgeous. I sized up.

links_reviews_title: This was a gorgeous outfit worn to Hamilton. I was stopped 3 times to find out info.
links_reviews_text: #sexy #classy #fun

links_reviews_title: Perfect Anniversary outfit! So many compliments
links_reviews_text: Super fun fit and so comfortable and easy to get on off

When you wear this jumpsuit, be prepared to receive endless compliments ! It's a showstopper! It fitted me like a glove, and was comfortable (could squat, bend, maneuver with ease). Because it's so fitted, beware of wearing Spanx as you'll likely see the elastic band.

links_reviews_title: Dancing all day and not having to worry about pulling up the jumpsuit every minute!
links_reviews_text: Everybody complimented my outfit that day! It fits like a glove and exentuates your figure. It especially makes the booty look good🙌. It made me feel like a million bucks that day!

Stunning color! Received so many compliments! Super well made and fit beautifully. I sized up as others said to do. I am small up top thankfully or would have needed 2 sizes up. Wore for a 70s themed party and was so happy with this.
Absolutely loved this. Definitely runs small - I ordered two sizes up and it was snug around the bust area. I wore sticky cups and if I wore a bra I feel it would have been too tight or not fit.

Wore to a dinner event that was 70s themed. I had so many strangers complimenting me on this jumpsuit all night. It's an attention-grabber, for sure! I read the other reviews and ordered two sizes up, and it was perfect. The fabric is thick, flattering, and the cut shows off all the right curves. The color is rich and brilliant. And the ruffles are to die for. I would rent this again in a heartbeat if it weren't so immediately recognizable!

This color is a show stopper! It fit too snug to get zipped over my wide back, and I am afraid the 6 would have gapped in the chest. I may go up a size and try again. I recommend going up 2 sizes from normal, unless you have a slim/straight build. If you can make this work- you will be the belle of the Ball!

Ok ladies - I'm back for a second review - the 4 fit perfect - needed heels to keep the pants from dragging on my short frame - arms are snug and I have an athletic and straight and narrow body and large busy and I was able to zip it up on my own after I went to the rest room- order 2 sizes up, I am usually a 0
I'm between and 8and a 10 with big boobs and I couldn't zip this up in the 8. Disappointed because it is fire

Listened to reviews and ordered two sizes up. Fit me perfectly around the chest (I have a wide rib cage) but was a little loose around my waste and hips but looked fab, nonetheless. A very fresh look. I loved it.
For curvy taller girls, the pant leg won't cover your shoes like the listing photo.

links_reviews_title: This color really POPS. But it's definitely a tight fit.
links_reviews_text: I chose this jumpsuit after the dress I had selected to wear for an award show wasn't going to arrive on time. I read all the reviews and was VERY nervous about this fitting...even though I had ordered a size up (I fluctuate between a 6 and an 8..I went for the 6). I needed help zipping up and zipping out of this jumpsuit, but honestly it was worth it because I looked and felt AMAZING. Seriously though it is tight. Also, with the shape of my body, I did have to tape my breasts in place so that they wouldn't splay out to the sides and the jumpsuit not fit at all. Honestly, a minor problem considering how great this piece was.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to wear this to an baby shower but it was too tight
links_reviews_text: Has nice stretch. Recommended a 4R but needed a 6R
So bright, so fun and comfy BUT RUNS SO SMALL!!! I typically wear a 2 or 4 and I barely fit in this 8!!!

links_reviews_title: I almost got tired of all the compliments. This was thrilling to wear.
links_reviews_text: Order two sizes up. I'm a 2/4 but could barely fit the 4 and had to do a crash diet to make it work. Also, it fits long, so if you're 5'4" and under, you better have some high platform heels.

I was skeptical about this dress originally, but it ended up being the best dress EVER. I got so many compliments on this dress, random ladies were literally coming up to me just to tell me they loved it. Great statement piece, unique, comfy, and tasteful. I wore a leather jacket with it since it was a winter wedding and it was a match made in heaven

The reviews are correct, the fit model for the arms must have been a twig. The dress is beautifully proportioned otherwise. Truly a stunning option for the cocktail party charity event we attended. I normally wear a small or a 4 in anything form fitting, but tried the medium first and since the arms were already tight, h never even tried the small. I am definitely pear shaped and this dress was perfect for my small top and larger hips and butt. Couldn't have found a better dress!

I rented this dress for a Gala and it was stunning. The arms are tights like they say in other reviews but not uncomfortable. I received so many compliments from so many women at the Gala. In the bathroom and girls walking by.

links_reviews_title: S T U N N I N G
links_reviews_text: I cannot even get over how gorgeous this dress is. I've used RTR quite a few times for wedding and special event dresses and have never gotten more compliments than I did wearing this piece. Like many others have mentioned... the arms are unreasonably small. Like so small that I had to have someone zip me up and unzip me or else the dress would have ripped. I stuffed towels in the arms to help the lace "give". But still, all that being said I wish I could own this dress!

links_reviews_title: Got lots of compliments on the dress
links_reviews_text: Felt very classy and elegant in this dress. Got lots of compliments and it was a perfect fit for the gala I attended.

This dress is my favorite dress I've ever worn. However, the lace is snug with little to no give. I thought that with a large I would some give in the arms but it just fit. The dress I received did have a tear in the lace in the back upon arrival and I notified them right away. They weren't able to get me a new one before my event so I ended wearing a black shaper underneath to conceal the tear. It made me feel amazing! If there hadn't been a tear in the one I had I would have kept the dress!

Went into the RTR store in DC when the dress I ordered originally didn't show. The staff was great and this dress is classy, elegant, and fun. I wore it to my boyfriend's grad school formal and it was perfect. I have a small frame and it fit in all the right places. Good for petite, great lace detail, and I got lots of compliments.

This dress is absolutely gorgeous - I was sad to take it off and send it back! It fits pretty true to size and was comfortable to wear dancing and dining at the wedding I wore it to. Definitely recommend renting this dress - you won't regret it. Super glam and unique!

5'6" 135lbs. Small bust / big butt. I'm l a DJ and I rented this dress for a marketing promo shoot. This dressssssss omg Feel like a Queen. It's so classy, sexy and just perfect. The only thing I didn't expect is that while I ordered a large based on the reviews (I wouldn've ordered a medium) the sleeves and top are extremely small. My arms aren't small. I do have issues sometimes because my breasts are very small and my arms are kind of athletic and kinda big. But I couldn't even get this dress zipped up because it wouldn't go over my arms. I went ahead with the photo shoot anyway because I loved it so much and I wasn't attending an event so it didn't matter my wings hid the zipper. But i literally could not fit into the arms so if you are thinking about this dress I would go one if not two sizes bigger. Loved it though and was perfect for my shoot. - hope this helps. @soundsbyshelly
Worn to a formal gala event. A little big in the bust area but the dress fit amazing. Both men and women were coming up to me to compliment the dress. It's different and beautifully detailed.
Backless design with sleeves make everything seem covered up and proper. The top is slightly small.

I highly considered buying this dress after wearing it out for a nice dinner and drinks. The pattern is super unique and the dress is really comfortable. The sleeves were a little tight, but they loosened up during the course of the evening. The slip skirt rides up a bit as you walk, which was a little annoying, but it didn't stop me from loving this piece.

This is the most incredible dress. Its sexy, sophisticated, unique... People told me it was amazing, and I felt like a star. It was great for my rehearsal dinner. Notes: I went without a bra (34d) because I hate backless bras, and it was fine. The arms were REALLY tight, and they don't budge, so if you lift or have bigger arms, this won't work. I managed to get in, but it was so close, and you have to be careful of the lace. My bicep is 12", so measure your arm! The rest fit like a glove; my measurements are: 38, 30, 43 and I'm 5'7".

I received multiple complaints and felt confident in this dress. Overall the dress fit true to size except the arms. Arms were very tight and quite difficult to even get on. I would highly recommend this dress to anyone

This dress was gorgeous and I got compliments all night. With that said, it ran small. My arms would have definitely not fit into the medium and I normally wear a size 6. The large fit perfectly everywhere else but was still tight in the arms. The slip road up throughout the night (thank god for the lace). Overall beautiful dress and very well-made.

I read reviews that this dress runs a little large, so I ordered the medium and it fit perfectly. I normally wear a small/4. The dress was stunning and I got a million compliments. My one complaint (and it's a big one) is that the dress arrived with the smell of body odor in the armpits! Totally gross. This was my first RTR experience, and that was a huge turn off for me. I have many friends who swear by RTR though, and they said they have never had that problem. So perhaps it was a fluke? I did have to hand wash the dress myself because I absolutely could not wear it with that smell. And I will say that when I brought this to the attention of the RTR staff, they handled it amazingly and provided excellent customer service. Because of their service, I will give RTR another shot for my next event.

links_reviews_title: Never wanted to give this back!
links_reviews_text: Ok I loved this dress in the photos but trying it on, it reached a whole new level of love. I felt like a princess! Dress fit me to a T! I have hips and curves and it fit in all the right areas. Definitely get a size up. Arms are tight and hard to lift arms over head. This event had dancing and it was a bit tough to dance in. The material is beautiful and I got many compliments. This is my favorite dress I have ever rented.

links_reviews_title: People raved all night about this dress!
links_reviews_text: I'm normally a medium and I fit comfortably in a large. It's gorgeous and totally body con. I felt really pretty in it.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress, especially the length. I wore it to a cocktail party and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit well however, the sleeves were a bit snug.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress - sexy due to lace, but minimal skin exposed
links_reviews_text: So constricting in arms and shoulders that zipping it up oneself is impossible
Dress has no give but it is not uncomfortable. I was nervous to wear no bra but it was totally fine, very forgiving on the mid-belly area. Nice dress overall
Rented this for a gala and it did not disappoint. So many compliments. It is a bit tight in the arms and you have to keep your eye on the slip - but it is a showstopper!!!

The dress fit great and was very comfortable! I could have worn the medium but it would have been tight so I opted to wear the larger size. I got so many compliments on this dress. I would for sure rent this again!!
This dress was an absolute show stopper. I am usually a 4/6 and wore the Large- the arms were really tight but it worked.

Amazing dress, a ton of compliments. Black underskirt is short so i wore nude spanx which worked great. Can’t wear a bra but the dress fit great so it wasn’t necessary (i wear D cup). Very classy but a little sexy with the lace. Arms were tight, couldn’t move them too high. I wear 2-4 and got a small and medium. Small was too tight so glad I went up a size for back up. Medium fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: This dress was absolutely beautiful it's just difficult to get into
links_reviews_text: Difficult to get into it runs very small on top I read one review that said stuff the sleeves with towels overnight that seemed to help
This dress was amazing!! I will definitely rent this again!! I felt like a million bucks and i had people all night complimenting me! Definitely rent this dress! You won't be disappointed!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: I'm 5' 102lbs and the dress is very fitted and hugs all your curves. I wore it to my husbands company holiday party.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful Dress! Perfect for a Christmas work party. So many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: I rented a small and medium. I'm a 34 DD so the medium fit perfectly. I didn't need to wear a bra. It was a little difficult to dance in because the arms are a bit tight and when I would raise my arms the dress would ride up. But other than that I Loved the dress and felt pretty all night.
So elegant and classy, yet so comfortable. So many compliments! Didn't want the night to end. Fit perfectly!
Received so many compliments on this one of a kind beauty. Be forewarned, it gets very warm , especially in the sleeves, once you start dancing and whatnot. Fit like a glove.

I wore this dress to a wedding, and it was stunning! Perfect for cooler weather - even though there was a lot of lace, it kept me warm when the rest of my table was freezing. I will definitely echo most reviewers' comments that the arms and chest area are smaller than size would indicate, but the rest of the dress is true to size. Definitely not for someone who has a large chest (small chest for the win this go around)! I received so many compliments and felt great in this dress. For reference, I'm 128 lbs and 5'3".

Pretty lace. As others said the arms are tight, but if I went up a size the waist would be too big I think. Just can't do a lot of reaching up high :) Doesn't feel revealing even though a lot of it is sheer.
Definitely size up - I typically wear a 2 or 4 and the medium fit perfectly. Not a ton of give but very flattering.

I rented this dress for a gala, and I got compliments the whole night. It's a real show-stopper with the see-through lace panels, especially the back. The lace fabric is high-quality, but as many others have mentioned it is quite tight with almost no elasticity. I followed another reviewers rec and put a rolled up towel in the sleeves for a couple days beforehand, which helped stretch them out a bit, but my range of motion was definitely limited (not ideal for dancing, bending over, lifting your arms up high, etc). I have a slim waist and wide hips, and this dress accentuated those aspects beautifully. I am a 34B and did not need to wear a bra. I would usually be a size S in dresses and went with the medium, which was definitely the right choice. Overall, a stunning, high-quality dress that made me feel sexy and elegant, but I wish it was more comfortable.
I loved this dress. My one complaint is that the slip kept riding up while I was dancing. It was not sewn to the dress which is why it did that. Great dress for us shorties!

The top part of this dress was a tight fit for me, particularly the arms. There was definitely an art to getting this dress on and zipped. Once I did however it was very comfortable. I loved this dress and was able to dance in it all night. Received many compliments. Rent this dress you won't regret it, but beware if you have muscular arms or a large upper frame, it may not work for you.

This dress is gorgeous! Received multiple compliments all night long. Of course I told them I rented it and nearly all of them said you have to buy that dress! It fits true to size and since it's lace it is snug, there's not a lot of give in the arms. There's a panel in the front to hide the front of your bra, either wear a sticky cup type bra or if you need more support, I would suggest a strapless black bra with clear shoulder straps and know that the back of the bra can be seen, but it's pretty camouflaged by the lace. I love renting new dresses and have not considered renting a previous dress. But this dress could be an exception!

I wore this dress to my cousin's black and white themed wedding. The dress runs small, after reading many reviews I opted for the Medium. I normally wear a size 4. I did need help getting into the dress as it was tough to zip given the lace and flowers. The dress it pretty heavy and is of good quality. I found that the sleeves were pretty tight and the inside lining kept rising. I would tug at it through the evening to make sure I was not exposing myself to anyone, this proved to be a big annoyance. Other than that I enjoyed this dress. I felt special and beautiful.

The fit was great, I loved the style, I received many compliments, but the dress smelled like B O so bad when I received it! I had to use a lil stronger perfume to mask the smell, and I was self conscious for a bit until my husband kept reassuring me I was fine. Just small hugs the whole night. Beautiful dress...poor cleaning job. Thanks
Perfect for my event, easy to wear, flattering, sexy. Can't say enough good things!
My favorite brand!! And fit
It was flattering and perfectly fitted, the quality of the material felt really nice
This dress is a stunner!!! It is INCREDIBLY form fitting but oh so flattering. The material is very stretchy and comfortable.
Great dress! Everyone, including my date loved it. Fit snug but was still comfortable.
I'm short and very thin and this fit like a glove. This dress will hug any curve you have. I have a small chest and it still fit, if you are bustier you may risk a wardrobe malfunction

I rented this dress for my daughter to wear to homecoming and she loved it. When she showed me what her friends were wearing I said oh heck no and was determined to help her find something stylish AND appropriate for a teen to wear out in public. This was a great option for way less than we would have spent on one of the strappy satin numbers her friends wore.
Love the dress even if it's sexier than what I'm used to wearing. Needed to add flat boots, tights and a sweater to be able to wear it.

This dress fit so well, I always size up so I am a standard size 2 in this brand. The length made the dress classy and I Was comfortable in it all night. I would recommend sizing up as it is extremely fitted.
It's fits snug, but I loved how it holds everything in. Love this designer , and i will definitely be renting this dress again

Be prepared for gawking and cat-calls, ladies! this dress SCREAMS sex appeal and hugs you in all the right spots. its so well made that i didnt need my spanx. Perfect for date night, LOTS OF HEAD TURNING!!!

links_reviews_title: Vegas dress! Fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: This bodycon is a TRUE bodycon. No spanx necessary.

I'd been eyeing one of these dresses for a long while and finally ended up renting one expecting it to be flattering to curves but in reality the dress bunched at the waist and flattened my butt. I do have a short torso so I wonder if that led to the bunching. I was so disappointed but ended up loving my replacement wrap dress.
Super form fitting. The material is heavy weight and the stretch it perfect. Received so many compliments.
Hugs curves in the best way. Size up
This bandage dress sucked you in, I wore it without a bra and the straps didn't move at all. This dress did not ride up either. Highly recommended for a formal event or nice dinner.
The fit is lovely and the material is durable. In spite of being a bit heavy on the hanger it's weightless when worn. If eye could afford it eyed buy it!
Very flattering! It's tight and runs small.
Very flattering, a little on the shorter side for a formal event but dark blue classes it up

links_reviews_title: So many comments on my dress
links_reviews_text: Fit great. Very flattering back. Received so many comments on how others loved my dress.

links_reviews_title: Loved the dress, but get the right fit...
links_reviews_text: I've rented ML before and should have went two sizes smaller, the 18 wasn't available. With this dress, it's very important that the bodice fits well, otherwise the back straps and the neckline won't lay flat, also important since you really can't wear a bra. The 22 (my usual size) was far too big, I tried adjusting the 20 with fashion tape but the material has enough weight to overcome the adhesive. Having said that, I still received a ton of compliments and will definitely rent this again.

This dress was perfect for a gala I attended! I got SO many compliments! It was beyond comfortable! The top was a little roomy for me, the adhesive bra situation was new for me...so it could be that I did not fill it out properly!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous print, bust area is a little funny
links_reviews_text: The shape is amazing & flows beautifully when you walk. The fabric is gorgeous & a great weight. The cut of the dress was funny though, when I tried on the 0 it fit me well from my stomach down, but the top was strange. I have larger shoulders so I sometimes have issues but this was beyond that. It was far too tight around my neck/underarms but had tons of extra fabric on my chest that gave me weird crevasses. The fit was similar in the 2 but I put on a chunky collar necklace & it really helped.

links_reviews_title: The dress was super comfortable and the colors just popped.Stood out in a sea of black dresses
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and could have probably gone down a size. It was a bit big on the top and I am blessed in the boob category. Overall very comfortable dress and loved the pockets

I loved wearing this fun, colorful dress to a recent charity ball. I paired it with rose gold bling for my formal affair, but you could also dress it down for more cocktail. It was a little big in the bust for me but it fit true-to-size in every other way. Comfortable and FUN! Would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: Don't be afraid to stand out
links_reviews_text: Perfect dress to stand out in a sea of black at a formal affair. The pattern is modern and beautiful, and the cut is gorgeous AND comfortable. Get ready for the compliments.

This dress was everything I had hoped for! I wore this to a formal wedding in DC and had so much fun dancing in it!!! I am 5'9 muscular but with a lean upper body- so this sleeveless cut can fit me funny sometimes. I did not have room for a bra, so stickies worked well. The material was heavier but flowy to dance in. I also loved the pockets and the high low cut style! I wore a 3.5 inch heel and the back of the dress barely touched the ground. It was absolutely perfect!
Felt beautiful, comfortable, and fashionable

links_reviews_title: It's amazing. I wish I could keep it. It has POCKETS.
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. I wore this to host the red carpet tonight at a John Wayne Film Festival. I'm very tall. Almost 6ft. The 8L was perfect. Teeny bit tight when sitting down in the upper waist but overall very comfy. I am so happy I rented this dress, it's amazing and I wish I could keep it so much.

links_reviews_title: Never wanted to take it off!
links_reviews_text: I LOVED this dress! The colors were bright and fun, the cut was flattering, and I felt like a rockstar wearing the dress. I got so many compliments. The dress was very comfortable and had pockets! I wore it with a Nubra, though probably could have gotten away without it.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with great fabric. Got tons of compliments. It runs SMALL!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'4" and 120 lb., 32DD now that I'm pregnant (!) I usually wear a 0 or 2. The 2 wasn't available so I got what was-- a 0R and a 4L. There was NO way the 0R was going to close around my ribcage. The 4L BARELY shut around my ribcage. It was also a bit long for my height, even with 3" heels. I wish I had been able to get a 6R or 8R. The neck part was weirdly tight and had extra fabric around the chest, which seemed like part of the design? Anyway, once I got into it and adjusted, no one else noticed the weirdness and I got tons of compliments. I loved the fabric and the skirt. If I had been able to get a bigger size I think it would've been perfect.

links_reviews_title: Great color for outdoor fall wedding.
links_reviews_text: Loved the colors. Was still too long for me but I was able to pin up the back of the dress to wear flats. Was worn without a bra, but only a strapless, backless stick-on bra would work with it. I gave it less than 5 stars because I thought the fit across the chest and just under the neck was poofy and unflattering.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress that looks nothing like anyone else is wearing!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It is bright and original and was very comfortable. I am 5"8 and 135 pounds, 36C. I wore the 8R with a lower heel and it was a great length. I probably could have worn the size 6 as there was a bit of extra fabric in the bust area and some give at the waist. But the 8 still looked great. It is a heavy fabric that looks expensive and hangs beautifully. I would rent this again in a heartbeat! Don't hesitate!

links_reviews_title: Slightly complicated at first, but worth it!
links_reviews_text: I was self conscious about wearing it at first, plus I forgot to get sticky boobs & didn't have time to figure anything out, so I actually went without a bra at all & you couldn't tell. I got more compliments than ever & ended up glad I wore the dress even though I came close to changing my mind. Worth the wear!
Loved this dress and how it made me feel amazing . I do t tend to dress up and this was just the perfect dress for me

The dress fit perfectly, length was just what I wanted touching slightly the floor. Best feature for me was the pockets, so I could go around the party taking pictures and handsfree :) print is really beautiful.
It was a beautiful dress! I was 10 months post baby and loved this dress. Made me feel pretty again.

links_reviews_title: Loved the floral patterned dress with the open back!
links_reviews_text: #wedding #danced the night away. It was a great dress! It fit true to size, while simultaneously being comfortable. The pockets were a bonus! I ended up wearing a neutral shoe, but I think it would go with lots. used the sticky cups for a bra. It was a different print and I received many compliments! But was easy to dance in. It was not too long in the back, so it was easy to walk and to dance. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I loved the fabric and colors!
links_reviews_text: I have a broad chest and shoulders as well as big boobs, and this was very tight across the chest for me. Im a very standard size 12, but would have been better in a 14. I'm 5'7" and with 3 in heels, I definitely needed the long!

links_reviews_title: I was a 53 yo flower girl. Perfect dress.
links_reviews_text: It was super comfortable. Bunched a little at the neck, otherwise perfect.

I loved this dress but the top was a little big. I wish there would have been the smaller size available. I still wore the dress even though it was a little big on top. The back of the dress is what sold me on wearing it.

I loved this dress. I'm 5'2" so I definitely needed heels. I think it runs true to size for designer clothing, I'm normally a 4 or 6 & the 6 fit perfectly. I wore it for a 6pm wedding (cocktail attire) and felt like it was perfect for the occasion. The back is so pretty.

links_reviews_title: This dress is INCREDIBLE! I received countless compliments and heads turning all night.
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! It wore the size 2 and it was a bit snug. I am 5'2 and 116 lbs. It is a gorgeous dress and I highly recommend it

This was actually my backup styles My first choice fit strangely and I didn’t like it. This dress, though, was incredible. I chose it because I was avoiding wearing black YET AGAIN and wasn’t disappointed. The colors are gorgeous. I had a 14WR. Could have done a 14 but that was all they had. It was fine though, because it was SO comfortable! It wasn’t tight or stretched anywhere but I was still able to wear it without a bra. Which is perfect because I didn’t have to worry about anything showing in the cutout in the back of the dress. And it was comfy but didn’t look loose or sloppy anywhere. The material is rich and luxurious feeling without being too heavy. And POCKETS! Every girl knows how great that is. The back of the skirt came down to just above the floor with some pretty high heels and the front of the skirt is long enough that you can wear spanx or shorts underneath for extra comfort without them showing below the skirt. I recommend wearing a bold statement necklace with this dress and you will steal the show! I got so many compliments all night- I was sad to take it off! You’ll feel like royalty in this dress!

I wanted to love it. It looked frumpy and was a bad fit. I am 5’11 and got a long. It didn’t hit the floor in the back of the dress. The waist was tight and the top was too big. The straps hung out at my sides.

I wore this dress to a black tie fundraiser at the zoo and still managed to get compliments all night with so many guests wearing bright patterns as well. I'm 5'7" and the long was perfect with 4" heels. The bust area ran a bit large but with the thick fabric it looked fine. There's little to no give of the material at the waist so make sure you size up for a backup size. It was so comfortable and unique, I loved this dress!!

links_reviews_title: Lovely formal gown worn at 18 weeks!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to a recent black tie event. It ran very tight along the waist bend- above my actual uterus so I'm not so sure I can blame being 18 weeks pregnant :) Other reviewers have commented similarly, thankfully I ordered a size up. The bust was not particularly loose in doing that. It was slightly uncomfortable but I still had a great time and could easily move around/sit/dance. Pockets are a huge plus. Overall would definitely recommend this gown with a size up!

So different and beautiful. Pockets are awesome ! Forgiving if you have less then perfect belly. It did kind of feel like it was choking me because the criss cross in back. Also bra was a little tricky if small busted definitely a backless sticky one. I was able to wear the clear halter strap too& it gave more support. I did wear 4 in shoes. I'm 5'8 length was good .

So many compliments! Super fun dress. The straps do bulge in the back so I wore the 6 instead of the 8. It was fine but the middle seam does not stretch, so it was a bit tight sitting down. Overall, I loved the color and the fit. Was very fun to dance in!

links_reviews_title: The fabric was beautiful and the back is stunning. It was a great hit at the wedding I went to!
links_reviews_text: I have a small chest so it was roomy in the bust, and I'm on the shorter side (5'3) so I had to wear 3" heels to keep the dress from dragging too much. Overall though the dress fit quite well given it was a regular and not a petite. The fabric felt great, the pockets are AMAZING, and as long as you hold up the back of the dress, dancing is a breeze!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful colors & pattern. Satiny fabric. Pretty criss-cross back.
links_reviews_text: I was too short for this dress. I'm only 5'0, and a bit plump in the middle. The 2 was too tight in the abdomen so I went with the 4 even though it was too long for me. It looked a bit frumpy from the front because you could tell it was hitting my frame a few inches too low in the hem/waist. The back was so long it was like a train (which I had to pick up when I walked to avoid dragging) which felt a bit ridiculous but did look pretty fabulous when standing still. Despite the ill fit, I still got compliments, and every time I looked down at the gorgeous rainbow-like colors, it made me smile!

The dress is beautiful, the low back is fresh and modern without being too showy. However, you need to have a BIG chest to wear this. The 2R zipped up nice and snug in the rib cage but the amount of bunching fabric in the chest looked like a deflated punching balloon bib. I sadly returned this as it was completely unwearable for me.
I loved this dress and it was perfect for a spring wedding. The top was a little big so I went down a size. The waist does not have a lot of give. Beautiful dress that I'd rent again!
This dress fit really well, except for the straps sincr Imm so short, but took care of that with fashion tape ;) Super comfortable for dancing all night long.

links_reviews_title: PERFECT dress for the Kentucky Derby!
links_reviews_text: Cannot say enough about how much I LOVED wearing this dress! I thought the floral would be great at Churchill Downs, and it was! I got a bunch of compliments, and the fit was great! It is a nice, heavy fabric, and the high-low cut was wonderful for keeping a little cool as well. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: Hit of the derby themed party
links_reviews_text: I paired this fit and flare satin hi-low with a fascinator and matching satin straply heel sandals. I wore it for a derby themed school fundraiser. Super comfortable and IT HAS POCKETS! Fun backless design- may not work for bustier women.

Great dress! Fitted top makes it possible to wear without a bra (and necessary due to backless cut!). Had to wear the 8L because 6L wasn't available and 6R was too short. Pockets can store lots of stuff without altering the look. Soooo many compliments on this dress. A real winner!

This dress was so comfortable to wear! The style and fit was perfect for my height. Loved the simple design and bold snakeskin pattern. The colors were vibrant and made this dress stand out. The material was soft and light. Perfect for the Miami heat!

links_reviews_title: Too Hunchback of Notre Dame for me. Did not wear.
links_reviews_text: Comfy, though! If it weren't for the back-lump or if the back lump was less, I would have worn it. My shape-size can lead to this issue,. Usually I can get away with keeping the extra material around my waist, but this zip was super springy, so it just created a lump towards my head. It looked worse in person, than was captured in this photo... though in the photo it, I feel like the lump accentuates my arms in a way I would not prefer. Ultimately, the way this fit me did not make me feel happy and confident, so it will be returned unworn. For your reference - my Size/Shape in these photos: 5'1", 145 lbs, 34DDD, "curvy" in the belly and bum, with a short torso. Pant size: 8-10 depending on the cut, they get stuck on my thighs or bum, and then can end up loose on the waist. OverBust: 38.5" Waist: 33.5" Hips: 40.5"

Light and easy to pack along this dress works hard day or evening. Lots of compliments -- worn with flats during g the day for sightseeing and with heels for a nice dinner. Fit is quite flattering and there is an adjustable pull string in front to create more ruching and a slight hem heightening in front --allows you to flatter or cover what you want. A bit low cut and I needed to add a safety pin to the small snap that is there.

Wore this for my 28th wedding anniversary dinner. Dress is very low cut so get a plunge bra. Love the hem and snake print fabric. Very head turning dress. There's this weird gaping at the neckline in the back that we could not figure out. I don't think having a longer torso would have fixed it although would have helped some. Fun rental.

links_reviews_title: Great for many occasions - size UP!
links_reviews_text: Based on reviews I decided to size up for "the girls" (32DDD) - and it worked out perfectly. I probably could have worn the 4 but the fabric is much better suited to a looser fit. The ruching at the front makes it perfect for hiding a tummy if you have one & the fabric flutters as you walk. I wore it with flat sandals for a casual look as well as the high-heeled sandals in the photos.
felt like a rockstar. love this so much
Great fit and not too sexy to wear to the office but still works for going out after.
Couldn't find a bra for such a deep plunge. Unfortunate because it was a great dress.

Unfortunately I wasn't able to wear this one in the size 10. It fit well everywhere except the bust. I tried to pin it, but it looked strange and I was afraid of it popping open. Beautiful colors and ruching.
Fits fine and nice material. The hem was longer that I wanted.
Beautiful and feminine. I am larger chested and did not have issues with it being tight like some of the other reviews.

links_reviews_title: Bombshell print and ruching made me feel like a rockstar!
links_reviews_text: The fit is so flattering on this dress. I wear a 34D so the chest was a bit tight and the girls were definitely "out" but as long as you wear a plunge bra it's nothing too crazy. The print is definitely a statement so I was glad I wore this to the rehearsal dinner instead of the wedding so I didn't steal any thunder on the big day. Looks great with a jacket too.

links_reviews_title: Amazing fabric, beautiful fit and style!
links_reviews_text: It is very feminine and flattering

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a rehearsal dinner. LOVED the adjustable length.
links_reviews_text: It was a little low-cut but nothing a small safety-pin couldn't fix. The adjustable length made it perfect for a rehearsal dinner (where you're never sure just how casual or formal the atmosphere will be). I probably would have been better in the 0R but it wasn't available.
Great for work. Many compliments and I love the pattern. I had to tape it so I didn't flash my coworkers during the day.

From prior reviews, I expected to need a safety pin at the top to reduce the cleavage. However, the real problem was that short waisted women can't wear this. The fit was quite nice, except that I had a fistful of material bunching up between by shoulder blades because the waistline didn't drop down far enough, because of my short frame. If I was 5ft 5 inches and wore a 12, it would work, but not at 5 ft 2 inches.

links_reviews_title: Cool dress but weird fit in back
links_reviews_text: I would have liked this but the back had weird extra material that poofed out so I couldn't wear it. I have a small rib cage so that could have made it worse, but it did seem like a weird fit
fit well for a large bust

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments and loved the flirty style.
links_reviews_text: The print and ruffle details make it a fun dress. It is low cut so if someone is bustier, might be an issue.

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, but just didn't fit right.
links_reviews_text: The fit and fabric pattern accentuated my muffin top. Also, very low cut.

Beautiful fabric and colors but it just didn't fit me right. I sized up but still was snug around the hips. But the real reason I couldn't wear it was it was huge in the chest and I wear a 32 DD. Couldn't make it work so it went right back in the bag.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous, very flattering and comfortable. Loved it!
links_reviews_text: The biggest advantage of this dress is the fit. It is snug where it needs to be and loose where it needs to be. It is a little low cut but not unmanageable.
fits like a glove, cute, eye catching, photographs well
Such a beautiful dress, but with no give or stretch this didn't work for me. Wish it came in a size up!
It runs small so I ordered up. Fit nice still a little tight.

links_reviews_title: so cute!!! had to order up in sizing!
links_reviews_text: really like dthis and got a lot of compliments, and i am not a snakeskin fan. def need to size up as parker runs small (I also have very broad back/shoulders and boobs.

links_reviews_title: Wanted to love it but very unflattering!
links_reviews_text: It's not obvious in the photos but there is heavy ruching that makes this dress unfortunately not flattering around the hips

links_reviews_title: Pretty dress, tighter than it appears
links_reviews_text: I like the look and pattern of this dress, but it is more of a slim fit than it appears in the photo of the model. I would suggest going a size up. I normally wear 4 in Parker and couldn't get the zip all the way up because the stomach area of the dress is very restrictive. Otherwise tho, it is a cute dress!
Unique, colors worked nice together. True to size.

links_reviews_title: Not get the chance to wear it
links_reviews_text: The bust was way too small

links_reviews_title: Dressy and flattering! New with tags when it arrived.
links_reviews_text: What a fit! My husband was over-the-moon about this one. It has a gather on the left side, so you can adjust the ruching on the torso. Incredibly flattering. You'll need a plunge bra, and it's probably too much boobs for work, but it's a date night winner. Light weight silk with a poly lining- looked best with navy blue heels- black was too severe. Looked great with the Furla Lino Diva mini shoulder bag. Killer dress- might be my favorite in 6 months of renting.
I rented this dress for a family photo shoot and I didn't want to send it back!! I felt so beautiful in it and it accentuated my hourglass figure perfectly.

So I loved the comfort of this dress--however the zipper was VERY difficult. I literally had a back up dress in my closet due to the difficulty of the zipper and possibility of not getting it up. So proceed with caution!

The size 2 fit perfectly, except it was only available in Regular and I definitely would need a Petite length. Even with my 5 inch heels it was dragging the floor. But truly this dress is classy and stunning.

I wore this dress for my baby shower and absolutely loved it! I usually run a size 6-8 in regular, at 8 months pregnant I sized up and a size 12 fit like a glove. Colors are vibrant and the dress gave me a flattering shape. I absolutely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Great dress! A stand out from the norm!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! Looked great on my skin tone and with my husbands uniform! I got a ton of compliments :) The dress is actually a pale teal/baby blue mix...the color is blown out in the pic, bc of the flash. Super light and comfy...but I would size up if you have a wide rib cage. I’m 6’, 195 and 13 weeks pregnant, in this photo...wearing a 16wL. The 14L, wouldn’t zip over my wide rib cage.

links_reviews_title: Small in chest, so size up
links_reviews_text: This dress has been in my hearts for so long! I was excited to finally hav an event an event to wear it for. I got the dress in a 16 and it was great around the waist but couldn't zip around my chest. I got the next size and it had plenty of room. There was a little too much room in the dress after sizing up, but since it was an outdoor event in warm weather, it was nice to have a loose dress! Got a ton of compliments! Also you don't need to iron!
Loved wearing this dress. Wore to a wedding rehearsal dinner and received so many compliments. Hung beautifully over my 6 1/2 month baby bump.

links_reviews_title: Color and style were perfect for a shabby chic spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: Ordered the 0R and 2R, and the 2R fit like a glove! I'm short but with the right heels this fit great and I had so much fun dressing up! I don't often wear long flowing dresses because I feel like with my size they are overwhelming, but this couldn't have fit any better! Would have bought it if I had the option!
Fit flawlessly, everyone loved It, so elegant! Only ever want to wear this dress!!

Overall, I liked this dress but I didn't love it. It's not a maternity dress and the waist band has no give and was tight over my ribcage, but I was able to fit into a 12. Normally I'm an 8/10 in dresses, so I probably should have sized up to a 14. I did receive a lot of compliments on the dress, it was just a little tight and I thought it made me look very pregnant. I'm 5'10", so the long was the perfect length with flats.

This dress is AMAZING!! I wore the same dress in red about 3 years ago for a black tie wedding. Recently rented again in this pattern for a fall wedding. I am currently 15 weeks pregnant so ordered the larger back up size I ordered last time (size 12). And theN One more larger as my back up this time (size 14). It fit PERFECTLY! I ended up wearing the 12 and was comfortable all night.

links_reviews_title: This is the best dress I've ever rented from RTR!
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'6" and 170lbs, and it fit perfectly! I wore 1" heels, and the length was just right. So long and flowy, great for dancing. Lots of compliments. I will definitely rent this dress again :)
The fit was amazing and it was absolutely perfect for the wedding we attended. It was so comfortable!

links_reviews_title: I am 5’8 and more of a slender frame, 6 fit perfectly! Was perfect for a black tie optional wedding
links_reviews_text: Perfect length, tighter on hips/waist

links_reviews_title: Great dress, exactly what was called for.
links_reviews_text: At 5'8" with 1.5" heel, length was perfect.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. It was perfect for an early September outdoor wedding.
links_reviews_text: The zipper was a little difficult to get up - not because the dress was tight - just a "sticky" zipper. Size 14 was the perfect length for me. 5'7 and wearing 2" wedge sandals. The bottom of the dress was about 1/2 inch off the floor. I got a lot of compliments and thought the dress was fantastic!
Simply put this dress is stunning and comfortable. If I could have one dress for all weddings until the end of time it would be this one.

links_reviews_title: The dress stood out! In a sea of solid blues, reds, and blacks, I loved the festive, floral vibe.
links_reviews_text: I was 31.5 weeks pregnant when I wore this and while it did fit, the rib cage was tight. I normally wear a 12, and there were lots of reviews from pregnant women, including third trimester, so I ordered a 12 and a 14 as a backup. BUT it's not a maternity dress per se and I have been having issues all pregnancy with items being tight in the rib cage, so I really wish I had ordered the 16 and the 14 as I am guessing that the 16 would have fit perfectly. Anyway, the dress did fit and was cute and I got tons of compliments, but I would size up 1 and 2 sizes if you're pregnant, third trimester, and you know that you don't want the dress to be too tight in the rib cage.
Beautiful dress but very long (I'm 5'6 and wore 3.5 inch heels) and it was a struggle when dancing! Not sure I'd rent again as a result.
I was so comfortable and loved the lines and the movement of this dress. The colors are gorgeous, too. I got a lot of compliments!
Very comfortable but looks like a million bucks. The length was perfect with a pair of 1.5in wedges. I am tall so it is nice to find a long dress I can still wear something other than flats with.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Good for a formal night and so comfortable
links_reviews_text: excellent fit.

links_reviews_title: A perfect dress for a summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: It was very comfy! I ended up sizing up and it was perfect. The fees got so many complements and the colors are gorgeous!
Loved this dress. I've also rented it in red in the past and this one fit just as well. Very flowery, great for dancing, even scored a couple of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous dress for a summer formal wedding!
links_reviews_text: Great fit. I wore a supportive/lifted bra with halter top option as the shoulders of the dress come in. I'm about 5'6" , 123lbs, and the 8R was close to too long, but worked out fine.

The dress fit perfectly and provided enough coverage and support that I didn't have to wear a bra. It was a little long, but probably my fault since I tried it on in heels and then ultimately decided to wear sandals the day of. Got a ton of compliments!
Comfortable high waist was forgiving. I was happy that I could wear a X back bra under this. It's very long so had to take care not to trip. Beautiful fabric!

I have rented tons of dresses from RTR, but I think this may be my favorite ever! I wore this dress to a wedding 6 months pregnant and it was awesome. I sized up one size and it fit perfectly over my new shape. If you are pregnant or trying to hide a new bump (or just a love of burritos) this dress is perfect. It fits well on top, and the bottom if flowy enough to hide anything but still be flattering. The band around the ribs does not have any stretch, but it wasn't super tight and was comfortable all night. If you are on the fence, definitely get this dress!

links_reviews_title: Loved this style and floral pattern.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit well in general, however the zipper was veryyyy difficult to get over the seem/waist band. I had to only unzip partially to get in and have a friend zip up the rest. Would not recommend if you don't have someone to help you zip in/out of the dress. Overall, I was comfortable and received a lot of complements on the dress. Was a good choice for an outdoor summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Rented for a formal gala in the wine region I work in. Beautiful!! Comfortable!!
links_reviews_text: I was so happy that it fit like a glove, and comfortable. No pulling, adjusting needed, stayed where it needed and didn't have to bother. I loved how the dress flowed while walking and made me feel amazing. Good length, I had block heels which were about 1.5 inches and worked great with the dress

links_reviews_title: I was able to wear this dress 7 months pregnant
links_reviews_text: Being 7 months pregnant I was worried that I would have an issue. Dress was super accommodating to my belly and so light and airy. Absolutely loved this rental and would definitely rent again (in a smaller size) after the pregnancy!

I wore this for my brother's wedding and got so many compliments on it. I'm 5'7", 240 and wore the 20WL. The 20R wasn't available otherwise I would have gotten that. I wore 3 inch wedge heels and was still a touch too long. I fit into the 18R but it was a little snug across my back so opted to size up. The colors were so vibrant and beautiful! Only complaint was zipper on both dresses was very hard to zip up through the waist otherwise it was perfect.

This dress was very comfortable and flowy and fit very well. I am 5'8", and with a 1.5" platform sandals it was perfect. The 22WL was WAY too long. The print is beautiful, and colors are more vibrant than the photos, but not garish. I received many compliments. Would definitely rent this style again!

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for my baby shower. I received so many compliments & felt beautiful all day.
links_reviews_text: Fit is true to size. I wore 12 R. Length was perfect even with flats (I’m wearing flats in the picture). Very well made. Would highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous. I received a ton of compliments and it is extremely flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a wedding. I ordered a 6R and an 8L as a backup (8R was unavailable). The 6R fit perfectly, and I would have been able to wear flats with it (it was just brushing the floor) or heels would have looked fine. Unfortunately I had an issue with the zipper not working at the last minute, so I ended up wearing the 8L for the event. I barely noticed a difference in size, aside from the length, and the bust was a little looser, but it looked fine and fit well in the waist. It was long on me, so I wore 3" heels. I felt like a million bucks and was comfortable all night (aside from my shoes!). Loved this dress and I would rent it again, probably in a 6R or 8R!

This dress was wonderful for a summer out door wedding. I was cool and the fit was comfortable and flattering. I got so many compliments on this dress. I am 6ft tall and the long skimmed the ground exactly where i wanted (which is hard to find)! There is a fair amount of room for busty girls as well.

Rented this originally for the rehearsal dinner portion of the wedding weekend but this dress ended up being the true MVP. I got so many compliments and would 100% rent it again. Super comfy - did have to wear a strapless bra but otherwise was super simple.

I rented this dress for a June wedding and it was perfect. It was very flattering and I got tons of compliments! The only small things were that it was slightly too long and I had to size up because the waist was a smidge too small, but the bigger size was too big for my bust. Overall, it was a great dress and I would definitely recommend it!

links_reviews_title: Soft, flowy, ethereal, beautiful, there aren't enough adjectives for how great this dress was!
links_reviews_text: This dress made me feel beautiful. I wore it for my sister's bridal shower and it fit the garden party theme perfectly. I was 23 weeks pregnant and this dress was form-fitting and flattering on top, and loose around the stomach and hips - exactly what I was looking for. All my family was complimenting me - my aunt kept telling me "everyone would be pregnant all the time if they could look as good as you!" and I attribute that to this dress making me look and feel amazing. I loved it and would highly recommend it!!

I wore this dress for an outdoor evening wedding. It's a bit long, and requires heels for my height--5'6". I have a large bust and I felt like it accentuated that which made me a bit uncomfortable. If you don't like to call attention to your bust, this dress isn't for you. But, it was fun to dance in, not too hot for summer, and the colors are super vibrant. I would wear it again.
Love this dress. It's very flattering & is a thick material would definitely rent again.
Super cute dress and really fun to wear. The only problem I found is that it was a bit unforgiving in the midsection.

This dress is beautiful. It has clean lines, a classic neckline, and the carwash detailing at the bottom makes it a standout. I wore this for my bridal shower and got so many compliments. I was concerned that it would be a little too conservative or frumpy, but the fit of it was flattering on my waistline and the slits in the bottom went up high enough to give a tasteful sexiness. Solid rental!

Rented this for work expecting the slits to start about 4-6 inches lower. Thankfully it is raining and I threw on a raincoat. It has some stretch up top, but it loose in the waist. Biggest complaint is the high slits make it a bit inappropriate, especially when seated.

links_reviews_title: This was such an amazing dress!
links_reviews_text: My only issue is that even the 2 was slightly large. I’m usually a 2/4. I’m 5’5” and 125 lbs, bigger butt and legs but flat stomach and a 32B bra size.

I wore this to my bridal lunch and got lots of compliments. My measurements are 34-25-37 and the size 0 was way too big in the waist. It also had a really high neckline. Had I known how big it was going to be, I would have gotten another dress. The skirt on this sure is pretty, though!

links_reviews_title: Love the way the bottom flows when you walk
links_reviews_text: Very sexy but appropriate for work. No stretch to fabric. Close fitting

I really loved this dress if it wasn't so expensive and distinctive I would have bought it. Very flattering fitted on top and then releases gently into a really fun skirt. Beautiful detail in back as well sexy but modest at the same time. Would be appropriate for many many occasions.

links_reviews_title: Almost want to buy this one. Lots of complements. Sophisticated with a twist!
links_reviews_text: Fits well. I paired with a coordinating belt. Love the bottom flaps and semi open back. Perfect for work and just enough covered up. The flaps are almost too high cut on me but I'm tall.

Wore this for the Kentucky Derby and it was perfect! Very slimming as well. I typically wear a 14 sometimes 12 and the 12 was very flattering! I would not recommend this dress if you are shorter as it may look a little frumpy, but I am 5'9" so it elongated the tassels on the bottom. Would absolutely rent again for a lawn party or similar occasion.

links_reviews_title: Material and Style were a win-win
links_reviews_text: PRO - Everything, the material, the length, the fit - you name it! CON - I felt a little funny sitting only because it was my bridal shower so all eyes were on me (the strands at the bottom kind of splay out) but for any other case no one would ever notice.

This is a fitted dress with unexpected detail on the back and panels starting at the knee that sashay when you walk. It is so simple, so well done, and pretty comfy. Strapless bra and shapewear are needed to keep the column look going (not yet wearing shapewear in this photo). I was at a fundraiser of 250 people and stopped by total strangers (including men) every 5 minutes. It's a wonderful dress for a older woman who wants to feel contemporary but appropriate. Nude/dusty rose slingbacks, a clutch and you're good to go. Has some stretch so you can still sit, eat and enjoy yourself.

So cute! I love this dress! This runs true to size and is great for any cup size. This is fitted throughout the midsection and hips, so curvier women should absolutely size up. This dress is tea length! You can absolutely wear a standard bra.

Classy, just afraid that something was going to spill on it because it has a material things tend to stick to it. Very classy, felt like i was wearing a runway dress. I see why it was called the carwash dress because of the bottom.
Although I wore it, a size up would have probably looked better.

links_reviews_title: Runs a tad small but flattering!
links_reviews_text: I would not say this runs an entire size small, just holds you in, in the mid section. It was mostly comfortable, classy, and the bottom adds just enough interest. Dressed it up with a long pearl necklace and gold heels.
shoulder too tight, make me look thick arms. I'm 5'5", 115 lbs, 34C, size 2 fits me well. I don't think this is suitable for work.

This dress was great for dancing -- the "fringe" flares out when you twirl, and I had a great time wearing it. The overall fit was a bit looser than I expected. I am pear shaped and thought the size I chose might be loose on top but tight in the hips; in fact, it was a bit loose all over. This made it comfortable, though, and the dress is cut with enough shape to not look large/boxy/wide.

links_reviews_title: Got many compliments on the fit & style
links_reviews_text: True to size

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous movement! Loved this so much. V memorable.
links_reviews_text: This fit me well, but it does show everything - so be aware!
Fantastic dress, wore it for my wedding, runs one size larger.....beautiful , elegant, unique...

links_reviews_title: Cute on a hot summer day
links_reviews_text: This dress was a little on the loose side. I am shapely and still had some room in the middle. This dress does wrinkle. I had to steam it prior to wearing it. It was cute, simple but still unique with the "flaps" on the bottom. The fabric is quality and thick so you don't have to worry much about visible panty lines. But not so think that it doesn't work in warm weather. I wore this dress on a 100 degree day to a board meeting. I would recommend it and would rent again.
Pretty tight fit around the hips... it's a semi-drop waist effect so really wasn't the best look for me, a curvy belly lady.

links_reviews_title: Cute design, but slits run higher than the photos lead you to think...
links_reviews_text: Super cute design. I love the details in the skirt "strip" panels. And that same design carries up to the top in the bodice too. Very fun to wear. Chic and playful. However...note that the slits run fairly high up - I would say at least halfway up the thigh. You might want to consider if that's appropriate for your event - alas it was not for my event so I didn't pick this for my event. I also don't think I have nice legs / thighs so the slit design that ran up so high along my leg/ thigh area just was not flattering on me. Probably would be fine for most of anyone else who tries this dress. Sad I couldn't wear it because it has a lot of fun personality to it. Color, fabric and inner lining are lovely too.
Beautiful, comfortable, distinctive. So fun to wear!

This dress fit true-to-size and was very flattering. I loved the detail and movement of the skirt part. The back was kind of an odd fit, but I liked that the dress overall was different. This dress is slightly off white and more structured.
The material is stretchy and so was comfortable. The color did not work well for me.

links_reviews_title: It was a great dress for a party in the Caribbean. Fit well
links_reviews_text: Dress is not pure bright white but still good

links_reviews_title: This dress is gorgeous in every way. The fabric is to die for!
links_reviews_text: I want every Halston Heritage piece now.

links_reviews_title: Hoped to wear this to a formal black and white party.
links_reviews_text: The back of the dress poofs out oddly, and the material under the panels stands out in that section. I also found that the length in the photo was shorter than it was on me, and it hit me at an odd spot. Pretty dress, but not on me.
I really liked this dress but it was definitely too short for work on someone curvy

The dress ran slightly large and so wasn't quite as fitted as I would have liked, but I got compliments on it all day. I wore it to work and several people stopped me in the sidewalk to comment on the dress. The only slight downside was that the slits in the dress go up pretty high when sitting. Otherwise it's an amazing dress!

links_reviews_title: Literally feel like I am the Carwash!
links_reviews_text: Initially threw on this dress for work, and didn't like it at all. But I was late to catch my train so I went with it. I ordered thinking it would be very "Donna Paulson" - SUITS fans know what I mean! I literally feel like I am the Carwash every time I walk. Don't feel great about wearing it to work. Also, the slits run a bit high so when I sit it is not appropriate for work. Sweater on the lap all day! If these slits were sewed up a few more inches I think this could be a hit - but as is it's a miss for me. Also using the Ladies room is problematic to say the least! Sorry TMI - but it's challenging and I think you should know! I will say for a white dress it is not see through at all which is great.

I did not end up wearing this dress for the event I had in mind but it was a really beautiful dress. It shapes your figure nicely and cuts in at the waist which is a plus! I also love the way the skirt moves as you walk. It looks and feels expensive and would be great for a variety of events. Give it a try! I would for sure wear this for something else in the future.

Absolutely loved loved this dress! I'm between a 4 and 6 so went for the 6 and it was a little loose but think the 4 would've been too snug. I have never received so many compliments. It's really classy but the flaps at the bottom give it a fun flirty edge. Wore to work and a dinner party. Only complaints is the little hook in the back and the side zipper were broken so I had to safety pin the back. There were a few random spots on the dress too but not noticeable enough to matter. Would 100% rent again!

links_reviews_title: Great quality dress! Wore it my rehearsal dinner
links_reviews_text: Thick material, very classy dress!
! Love the ruffles on the bottom!
Clean beautiful fabric, great fit
Slits are too high for work, too snug on the bum!

links_reviews_title: I rented this as another option but did not wear it. Not pressed well.
links_reviews_text: Great fit, if a little long for someone 5'3". The seaming can be a bit awkward and my main issue was that it was horribly wrinkled and I did not have enough time before the event to get it pressed. There is great movement in the dress when you walk with the car wash pleats. If your looking for something elegant and fun (and have enough time to get it pressed) should work great.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable and I felt amazing in it!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great for a curvy girl! The zipper was a little hard to get up (not due to size) even laying on the hanger the zipper was hard. The sleeves were a little loose but they covered a lot without taking away from the look!

links_reviews_title: I loved the lace & the fit was very flattering. It's SUPER long so I had to make sure to hold it up!
links_reviews_text: Because of the length, when I ascended the stairs by the stage, I had visions of tripping! :-) But as long as I held it up for that moment, it wasn't a problem the rest of the night. The zipper did stick pretty badly, though. Thankfully I had someone at home to help zip it up! I would have never been able to do it on my own!

This actually ended up coming as my backup when my first choice couldn't be shipped on time, and after trying it on, I was all about it. It was true to size, a little long for me as I'm only 5'4," but I just picked up my dress when walking - the beautiful train was worth it! Definitely would rent again!
This dress was perfect for a formal event in January. It was comfortable and flattering. I received several compliments throughout the evening.

I wore this to a NYE wedding. The fit was pretty TTS. I used some fashion tape to keep the zipper from bowing out so much in the back and it worked well. The dress was very comfortable to move and dance in all night long. I received several compliments throughout the evening!
Great dress. Only issue was that the zipper broke and I had to squeeze myself out of the dress in order to not rip the dress. But still loved it and would recommend it.

links_reviews_title: It was a very pretty dress, and I will rent again. But I wish it for better.
links_reviews_text: First I thought I ordered the correct size. Turns out the dress was extremely long and the lace was baggy. Did not fit how I thought. Disappointed

I rented this dress for a Halloween-themed singing gig. The material is lightweight and comfortable, and the dress and waist fit perfectly. However, the lace bodice was ENORMOUS. It was so large compared to the rest of the dress that it just fell off of me, and I had to pin and tape myself into it. I don't know if this will be an issue with other sizes, but it was with mine.

I really adored this dress, but unfortunately it was too large up top. I had a ton of fabric tape but it doesn't stick very well to the lace. As I rented with Unlimited I didn't have a backup size, but proba la a size down would have been perfect. I got a TON of compliments and felt like I stood out in this dress!

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was uncomfortable to wear. I was not able to lift my arms up in it as it was very tight across the shoulders.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress. Small in the busy area
fit perfectly and the height was perfect for me. im 5'4 and I wore heels. will rent it again
links_reviews_text: compliments all night long

links_reviews_title: Love how easy and accessible everything is.
links_reviews_text: The dress is beautiful, I'll be renting again a size up my for my event

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on my dress and I loved it!
links_reviews_text: Pros: very comfortable, sleeve length was perfect. Cons: the top was big but I pinned it and it was good *note I am 6'1 the length was perfect for a small heal

links_reviews_title: Very nice dress with classic lines
links_reviews_text: While I did not wear this dress as it was a backup, it fit nicely and was lovely. The only issue was the zipper being very difficult to get up, even with help. There is a seam across the bottom of the bodice that makes zipping it very hard whether on the body or on the hanger. I definitely could not choose this for an event where I would not have someone to help me get dressed. Nonetheless a lovely dress.

This dress is beautiful! Size 2R fit me great and I am 5'7", 130 lbs. The zipper on the back was the only problem. It was very difficult to get it past the spot where there was fabric gathered for the waist. Also, the zipper wouldn't lay flat no matter how hard I tried! It bowed out in the middle and looked odd, but I wore it anyway and no one seemed to notice. Otherwise, it was perfect! I received lots of compliments on it.

This dress is so classy!! I was so upset that it ran too big on me. I would have loved to have worn it to the weeding we attended. If this dress every becomes available in a smaller size, I am definitely getting this dress again!!

Waist of the dress was true to size but the top was way too large. I tried pinning & taping the top but it did not look right and I decided not to wear the dress. Think this dress is made for women with large breasts...definitely not for this barely B-cup gal.

links_reviews_title: Great dress! Long so will need high heels. I received many compliments
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly and was comfortable to move in.
This was so fun to wear for a Valentine's Day date. It felt a little over the top in just the right way!
Love the red color. Wore it for a work meeting. It is a heavy shirt but it didnt bother me at all. It was missing the ribbon to tie at the waist which would have helped since it does run larger.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blouse for a holiday party! I wore a nude cami underneath. It was perfect!
links_reviews_text: Fit true to size.
LOVE the bow, needs a tank underneath, the lace is see through but the red is so vibrant and super flattering fit, perfect for holidays !
Wore it to a Christmas party and felt very festive! This red pops. I felt it lacked some structure, however, maybe because it did not have the belt?

links_reviews_title: All wrapped up with a bow!
links_reviews_text: I didn't love the top but id was festive for a holiday party. It wasn't that flattering but I received a ton of compliments. I think if your really thin or busty this would work. If your average the shirt wears you!

Loved this top, it was beautiful. It comes with a belt you're supposed to tie in a bow, which for the life of me I couldn't do...but it looks so pretty without it that I wasn't upset about it. I felt so festive wearing it!
I'm more typically a M and could have used a M in this top, but it worked with the tie waist. Super cute!

links_reviews_title: The red is a vibrant color.
links_reviews_text: The belt helped to cinch the shape.
Beautiful shirt, so many compliments.

After reading the other reviews, I went with the small and glad I did! The shirt fit fine, but was a bit short for a tall girl. It is also totally see-through so I had to pair it with an under shirt. It is a beautiful top, nice vibrant red, and I recieved lots of compliments when wearing it (just wish my bow tying abilities were better!)
Great flirty shirt for a night out. Wore this one a few times...but it would be good for average to larger chests. I felt like it swallowed me there but I'm small-chested
Beautiful color and design. Wore this to work and out for happy hour/dinner with friends. Lots of compliments! Only caveat: The top was shorter on me than it appears on the model.
I did not end up wearing this top because I went with my other rental. It felt frumpy, didn't do anything for me. I think this would be much more flattering on someone with a petite figure.

links_reviews_title: Unfortunately the bow wasn't delivered, so I wasn't able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: Fit great, wish it had the bow!
Received several compliments. I wish I had a good picture with me wearing this. I loved this shirt. Will rent again.

links_reviews_title: It was very pretty! I used a low cut tank and wore it backwards so the necklines matched up.
links_reviews_text: It ran a little large, but the sash helped cinch the waist. Super pretty and perfect for the holidays or Valentine's Day.

links_reviews_title: normal work day shirt, comofrtable and true to size.
links_reviews_text: the material is nice, you will need a tank top under the shirt because it is see-through,
I loved this and would rent it again.

links_reviews_title: This is so cute and feminine.
links_reviews_text: It fit well.
Love the color! Perfect for the weekend! I wore a nude cami underneath. Received several compliments
Super cute design but less fitted than I expected
