As others have mentioned, it does seem to fall a little shorter than on the model, but other than that it's a lovely shirt! It's mostly see-through so I had to wear a cami underneath.

links_reviews_title: I did not get to wear it
links_reviews_text: Did not get to wear it
Fits true to size. Can wear it out or for work. I wore it work with jeans and heels and it looked so cute. I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful shade of red that can be dressed up or down.
links_reviews_text: Fits well, slightly heavier than most lace tops. Must have a tank underneath. Gave it 4 stars because the bow doesn’t lay as well as it does in the pics. Definitely can be worn without it.
Weird cut. Too heavy and not flattering.
Pros- the color is beautiful and the material is great quality Cons- I didn't end up wearing this out of the house bc it fits wide and boxy. And the belt was weird.
lovely
For true to size. Was very beautiful. I ended up not wearing it though.
I received the style and it was missing the red belt
Belt was missing

For being lace, this top is weighty. I wore a black cami underneath because it is not lined, and paired it with a pair of Valishenko pants from RTR. A bit flashy for work, but still functional and moved easily to rooftop bar for happy hour. I probably could have gotten away with the medium and I wasn't crazy about the belt because I suck at tying decent bows, but nice otherwise.
I LOVE the color, but the style is boxy. It wasn't flattering on my petite frame.
I never wore it. the sheerness was too much, couldn't figure out the perfect cammy under to make it look right. I didn't want to wear white or black or red. Nude was fine, but not great.

links_reviews_title: Too short for my torso and adds a lot of volume to your waist. I didn't like the way it looked.
links_reviews_text: Didn't work for me.
The fit was ok. The belt was strange. And there is no cover under neath . It is straight see through lace. Make sure to have a tank to wear under it.
The fit was a tad big but the sash helped with that. It was very festive and the color is great

links_reviews_title: Did not wear it made me look huge
links_reviews_text: Not fitted well at all
Cute top, but it came without a bow? Also, too tight for my bust size (34DDD). Didn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty tailored dress. Easy to style
Liked it more than I thought!
links_reviews_text: I didn't think I'd be too big of a fan of this but was a bigger fan of it on than I anticipated! Cute dress for sure and flattering but comfortable.
The fit was awesome and I loved the zipper... even though it was short i felt aged in this dress. It's a odd fabric too.
This dress is fitted and made me feel super sexy. You could play down the sexiness with zipping it up. I had a fun night in Vegas with this outfit going from dinner to the clubs.
I wore this for a work photo shoot, but went to dinner and drinks after and pulled the zipper down a bit to give it a different vibe. Looks great if you have a chest!
Loved that the zipper allows you to control just how sexy you want to be. It was a little short but not too bad for date night. I am 5'6" and I would not have wanted it much shorter.
Sized up and this still was extremely tight. Very sexy although the liner made it ride up when walking.
Fit just right and can be dressed up or down!
Loved this. Shows off curves spectacularly!!!
I wore this for Easter mass. It's super comfortable, easy to put on with a zipper, and very flattering. I got lots of compliments.

Dress fit like a glove! Having the zipper was super fun to spice things up on our bachelorette trip. Sexy, comfortable, and eye catching! Not a lot of give in the material which may work for you either way.

My very first rental with RTR. I had an amazing in-store experience in Las Vegas and hate the store is no longer there. The fit was a bit snug but nothing shape-wear could not fix. I received compliments the entire night. Thanks RTR for a memorable evening!!

links_reviews_title: Super cute! It fit comfortably and looked great!
links_reviews_text: Fit was good, I went with the 12 because my chest fit better, it has a little stretch. Perfect for the night of dancing and partying!
This dress is amazing! I wore it for a night out in NYC. It has no stretch but true to size. I'm 5'2" and the length was perfect. I was also able to wear a regular bra. Definitely renting again!
The dress is fabulous

links_reviews_title: Loved that I could turn into into something sexy!
links_reviews_text: The hips were a little loose but I don't have much of a booty

links_reviews_title: Hot white dress for the night!
links_reviews_text: This dress is made to fit tight and form fitting. It's perfect for a date night out. Wore this dress in NYC to dinner and received so many compliments. It zips all the way up the front so you can adjust the zip how you would like. It's a thick material, not see through even with all the city lights.
Fabric was thick enough that it wasn't see-through. Did run a bit on the tight side, so I sized up to the 4.

links_reviews_title: Cute but longer than I wanted
links_reviews_text: Nice material, comfortable, easy to wear but I didn't like where it hit my 5'4 frame. I could have also sized down for a tighter fit.

I wore this for my bachelorette party. The 6 fit, but was pretty snug. The 8 fit very comfortably. Loads of compliments, short but party appropriate. Zipper goes all the way down. Be careful if you have inappropriate friends like mine, they were unzipping the dress all night!
Fit true to size. Wore this for bachelorette brunch. Fun to wear out or during the day. Very comfortable, easy to wear.
Wore this for my bachelorette and loved it!

links_reviews_title: Compliments & free food lol in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Runs small. Wore 0 but 2 would be perfect (very tight in 0). Some Stretch & Nice thick lining. Nude undies & nipple covers worked well. Zipper great to control cleavage level. Wore hair down & w/ grey snakeskin pumps & silver hoops to mirror the zipper pull. My husband love bed it!!! Restaurant owner liked my dress & gave my friend & I free food , lots attention.

I wore this to my bachelorette and loved the true to size fit! It had a zipper that made it easy to get in to as well as gave you control of how much cleavage you want to show. I love how it enhanced my siloutte because of the fitted style. It also stood up well to dancing - didn't ride up or feel stiff. :)

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect dress for my Vegas bachelorette party!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly snug and the zipper stayed put, which was a huge relief. The material was high quality. I loved this dress and would recommend it to anyone.
Fit perfect in all the right places:) many compliments
I loved the way this dress fit me! It was flattering, sexy, elegant and comfortable. Perfect for my bachelorette party. The zipper stayed firmly in place for the entire day and night

I am usually a 4 or 6 but ordered this in 6 and 8. Just got back from vacation so I'm sure I had a few extra pounds on me! The 8 actually fit better but it really had no give or stretch so it ended up not working for the white party I was attending at a golf course. But had the event been dressier I would have worn it. It's definitely fitted!! And zips all the way up the front. But a cute LWD overall!

links_reviews_title: I'm so sad I didn't get a full picture but it fit perfect and made my bachelorette night a hit!
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a size 10 so the backup size 12 worked perfectly!!

links_reviews_title: Sexy & classy! The perfect dress for a night out.
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my bachelorette party and received so many compliments on it. I accessorized with a black lace balconette bra to spice it up. Highly recommend for a night out.

I loved this dress! I wish I had more occasions to wear it! I usually wear a 6, 8, or medium and the 8 fit me perfectly! It was not bodycon tight and it was well lined so I didn't need any spanx or slip. It's not too short and the zipper is sexy but I couldn't get it to stay where I wanted it because it would just unzip wayy to much while I walked. If I didn't wear a bra I think the zipper would stay put better. I can't wait to rent this dress again!

links_reviews_title: My boyfriend called it sexy. He never uses that word.
links_reviews_text: After seeing Gal Gadot in "keeping up with the joneses" I've been dying to find a great white dress. This is it! It's sexy but restrained. All in all it is fabulous.

This dress was perfect in every way. Fabric, fit, and style. Compliments all evening. My bust didn't fit too well when zipped up but this event was the appropriate time to unzip a little lower and still look classy. Loved this dress!!

links_reviews_title: This was the perfect Bachelorette party dress.
links_reviews_text: I'm usually an 8 but in this dress I went with the 10 because it was a bit shorter than what I would normally wear. I highly recommend this as a party/cocktail dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress! I got so many compliments all night!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit amazing. It was definitely on the short side so I wouldn't recommend this dress for a conservative event. It was tight enough that I didn't have to wear a bra which was nice. The material was also thick enough that it hid any small lumps or bumps.
True to size
Loved this simple yet versatile dress. Could rock this at a barbecue, work, or even Las Vegas! Fit well and comfy.

Loved this dress! Would rent again- got so many compliments. It isn't too short, probably right above the knee for someone who is 5'3. The material is high quality, thick, and stretchy. The lining is thick too so you can't see undergarments through it. Loved loved loved!
Can zip it up or down depending on the crowd ;)
I liked this dress but didn't love it. The bottom looks a bit boxy but it's still a fun dress to wear. Zipper makes it super cute and can be dressed up or dressed down
Loved this dress!!!! Felt good on and looked good. Got the L and XL. Wore the XL because it felt more comfortable. Very flattering for curvy short women.
This dress is super flattering and great for summer but wow it was so wrinkly. I steamed it for 10 mins and couldn't even get it near perfect, still ended up wearing and enjoying it!
It does wrinkle easily, but even with the wrinkles I had a lot of compliments!

links_reviews_title: Dress runs small... fit is a bit weird
links_reviews_text: Was able to make it work by layering with a blazer, but I wouldn't wear it alone... it's v cut but chest / shoulder doesn't fit (it's a bit loose) and then waist is really tight, was able to zip it up but can't eat much LOL. The single layer is also see through so you can see the seams underneath...

I liked this dress on the website for how flowy the dress was. When I got it, the material was extremely wrinkled. The bottom of the dress was pleated and flat, as if it was a tennis dress. I am busty and could not zip up the dress. I do not have a gut but in this picture, the dress makes me look like I have one. I was not impressed.
So this dress fit weirdly. I actually had to sew the shoulders in order for the top to fit correctly. Wouldn't rent again.

Super cute dress but wrinkles so easy. If you are using it for photographs it would be perfect but wearing to an event it would be super wrinkled by the time you get there. A bit short too but still cute.

links_reviews_title: Love it !! It was exactly how it appeared
links_reviews_text: #party #whitetheme

links_reviews_title: Fabric as a bit shiny for me and fit wasn't perfect. Shoulders and bust were a bit too big
links_reviews_text: Didn't end up wearing this.
Not great if you don't have a flat stomach
Would recommend sizing up

links_reviews_title: Fits very well liked but did not love.
links_reviews_text: The dressed fit was perfect. Did not love the fabric it wrinkled very easily and looked like it should have been the liner fabric not the actual dress. Did wear once, but would not rent again.
Super short so I didn't wear it. But amazing material.

links_reviews_title: Extremely small. I'm a true S and couldn't zip this dress up!
links_reviews_text: Was sad this dress didn't work out!
the picture makes this dress look like it ill have light, floaty fabric around the sleeves and hem. This is low quality poly fabric. Did not wear.
Wore this to my local theaters Oscar party. It was beautiful and very comfortable. I received so many compliments on it too which is always a bonus.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous!!! I received so many compliments on this dress. LOVE, LOVE, LOVE it!!!
links_reviews_text: Size up if you have a chest.

The picture of this dress does not do it justice. It's so much prettier in person. I was excited to get it home and try it on. When I did I was devastated to see that there was a hole in the seam of the dress. I had to order replacements. The dress had great structure and the sleeves have a ton of stretch to them too! Wish it would have worked out.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress but too small up top
links_reviews_text: Dress was beautiful and the material was comfortable, plus it has pockets!!! But if you have large breasts you'll be self conscious all night... Normally a 10, wore a 12 and still couldn't breathe without popping out of the dress.

I rented this dress for a fundraising gala and it did not disappoint. The color was rich and vibrant, It stood out in a sea of black gowns. It is TTS and the petite made it perfect for my short stature. No bra or spanx needed. Compliments galore!!

I rented this dress for a wedding, and I honestly think I was the second most complemented person there, after the bride of course. I decided to wear the dress with the sleeves, but I could easily tucked the sleeves in. I was still able to dance comfortably all night with the sleeves on. I thought the size 2 would fit my best, but the 0R fit just perfectly. I had intended to wear t his dress with heals, but sprained my ankle a few weeks before and went with flats instead. The back of the dress was just long enough that I did step on it a few times while dancing and getting low, but otherwise wasn't an issue.
Fit well! Very stretch and forgiving.

links_reviews_title: The dress was so comfortable and so free-flowing - LOVE POCKETS
links_reviews_text: It was a little snug in chest area but that just made it look form fitting although it was free flowing with pockets the material is soft but thick. The pockets are awesome. Just one of my favorites because it's easy to walk and dance and looks fantastic
It was snug across my chest (34c), my husband struggled to get the zipper up.

links_reviews_title: I received endless compliments on the dress. It fit well everywhere and had POCKETS.
links_reviews_text: Snug on top, had stretch to dance but never fell or felt like it was slipping. Comfortable to wear without a bra, and very flattering on my figure. I have an hourglass shape, and I normally wear a 12, fit perfectly. I’m 5’4’’ and didn’t have any issues with dragging or dancing (even without heels!)

links_reviews_title: Beautiful blue and gold off the shoulder
links_reviews_text: It was a little loose around the bust but it didn't bother me during the evening I just had to adjust every once in a while when it rolled on itself. Not too heavy for summer but it was an evening indoor event. I rented a gold necklace from RTR as well and it looked perfect together. I'm 5'7 160lbs and 36B and wore a 10R in this dress for reference
I thought this dress looked a lot better on than I expected but unfortunately it was slightly too small around my ribs. Typically I am always a size 6 but this size 6 did not fit me

links_reviews_title: Absolutely gorgeous color, cut, and fabric. Tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: This dress is so lovely. The fabric is relatively thick, but stretchy, and just gorgeous color of slate blue with the gold inside. (The inside hem that shows isn't a clean hem, but others can't really tell.) I could probably have gone bra-less because the fit was pretty snug, but I was able to fit a strapless bra underneath (bonus--because I engaged in a lot of dancing). The length was just a tad long; wore 3" heels and could've maybe gone another inch higher in order to keep the train off the ground. Tons of compliments all night, and the BEST PART ARE THE POCKETS--I kept lipstick and my phone in them all night and they didn't fall out, and it wasn't at all obvious because the fabric is so sturdy. LOVE this dress!!!

Wore this dress for a black tie wedding and it was perfect. The material is actually quite lightweight (great if you need to travel with it) and has a little bit of stretch. Very flattering and comfortable at the same time. And pockets! The only downside was that the bust area was large for me - but not a dealbreaker.

I rented this dress for my Nephews wedding in May. I am normally always a size 10. I am 5'5 1/2" and about 148lbs and a 36DD - I can not wear very high heels as my husband is not tall. I rented a 10&12 and ended up wearing the 12. The 10 fit but the 12 just fit nicer. The material is gorgeous and even after a 45 min ride to the church in the car I stayed wrinkle free. Plus - it has pockets !!! I was so comfortable all night long and received loads of compliments on the dress. I personally feel that someone who is taller would get more benefit from the Beautiful contrasting bottom - and someone with a longer torso would also fit the dress better but I still LOVED this dress and so did everyone else !!

links_reviews_title: A total aria of a number!
links_reviews_text: I wore this to the opera and felt amazing! The strangers who complimented the dress must have agreed. I loved the unusual silhouette, and the fabric is luxe in feel and quality. I was able to go without a bra, but may have felt a little more secure with one, as the neckline did ride a little low and the built-in bust was a touch small for me. That said, I'm wild to rent this again or just go all the way and buy this stunner!

links_reviews_title: Elegant, classy, comfortable, fabulous color, I got compliments all night. Thinking about buying it
links_reviews_text: I’m 5’7” and weigh 157 with most of my weight in my belly. The 10R was too tight in my middle and ribs. The 12R was loose in the arms and the bodice but zipper easily closed. The px I took are the 12R. The zipper did keep dropping, despite not being tight, so would consider pinning it. If you are smaller in the ribs but wider in the hips I bet you could wear a smaller size.

links_reviews_title: Rented this to wear in a wedding.
links_reviews_text: a bit big in the arms but otherwise fit great. Length was perfect with 3" heels. I got a ton of compliments, danced a lot, and felt awesome.

links_reviews_title: Wore this for a wedding. Beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: Petite women - even with heels, it will trail a little, so be aware. I wore size 4 and I am 5'1." However, the dress is absolutely gorgeous and I felt like a princess! So many compliments! And it has pockets!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for black tie wedding
links_reviews_text: Sleeves were a little tight, but still able to move well. Had a really nice "swish" to the dress.

I rented this for as my back up for an event but didn't end up wearing it. It's a super flattering fabric and cut. Makes your waist looks tiny! Don't let the arm holes worry you, they are very elastic. Movement isn't limited. No need to wear a bra. FYI - runs large. I'm typically a size 6 and this is a 4R. Hope this helps!

links_reviews_title: I wore this to my cousin's Black Tie Optional wedding - it was a hit!
links_reviews_text: First impression when I took it out of the bag was how lightweight it was. I knew it would be a great option for a day-night spring wedding. The fabric was also semi stretchy so even though the sleeves were holding my arms down - I could still totally dance like I normally would - lots of arms flailing! It was one of the most comfortable dresses I have ever worn. I didn't wear a bra because the wiring was plenty for my small cup size. I felt so chic and classy with this dress - and I loved glamming it up with gold sparkly shoes and earrings. I also had a smaller gold diamond necklace to complete the look. Overall, a fabulous dress and one I would definitely wear over and over again!!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable all night long
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress for a black tie event. It was perfectly appropriate and looked really nice. I am pretty much a size 6 right now and the dress fit comfortably. I could breathe and did not have to wear spanks or a bra. I danced and ate and had a lot of fun and never worried about the dress falling down. I loved the pockets. I kept my cell phone in the pocket all night since it did not fit in my mini dress-up purse. I am 5'1" and the length worked perfectly. Without shoes on, it did rest on the floor. However, I wore heels (i'm not sure how tall, but they were pretty high) and it was the perfect length. I highly recommend this dress. My husband wanted me to buy it but I would rather have the option of trying something new next time, or I could even rent this one again!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a gala in NYC, and got a TON of compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: Fit's great -but it's tight at the bust so make sure you pick based on that size over waist. I am a 34B and I couldn't wear a bra. ALSO - it has hidden pockets!
The fit was snug and form fitting but the stretchy material made it very comfortable. I felt very glamorous.
The dress(es) arrived 4 days before expected so it gave me time to try on and buy the perfect shoes. I received so many lovely comments. Rent the Runway is the way to go! I will use it again.
Normally a 6 and it fit ok. Just preferred the other dress better.

I know what you're thinking, it looks ok on the model but fantastic on everyone else in their photos. EXACTLY. Trust me, you can rock this dress just like we all did. I wore this for the Governor's Inaugural Ball. I received compliments all night and the days thereafter. I'm 5'9", 168 lbs, somewhere between a 36D-38D bra size. I'm super small in the waist which made the 12 too big. I also paired this with 3" gold heels and that worked great for my height as well. HIGHLY recommend.

Fit was true to size but slightly tight around the ribcage. Unfortunately someone with larger breasts wore it prior to me and stretched out the bust quite a bit. That being said, the dress was made really well! I received SO many compliments throughout the night.
This dress is easy to wear.. no straps to fall, no sucking-in needed.. pretty and fun to wear. Lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very pretty and chic dress. Comfortable and fun to wear!
links_reviews_text: Fits well.

I wore this to a company Christmas party and it was surprisingly super comfortable. I noticed that I never had to adjust the dress and I kept all my essentials, phone and lipstick in the cute pockets. Plus, the dress flares so you can't even tell that there was a phone in my pocket! It is a little hard to dance in bc you can easily step on the small train, but just keep moving forward and problem solved! I would rent this again bc it was in really good condition and I received many random compliments. Win!
Dress fit beautifully. Got a lot of compliments

links_reviews_title: I had the perfect dress for this occasion. A fresh look!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit great! My body type is best fit by an a-line. This dress was an amazing fit all around!

links_reviews_title: This dress was beautiful! I received so many compliments which helped me feel fantastic!
links_reviews_text: Typically I wear a 10/12 and ordered both. I wore the 12 as it was more comfortable and easier to zip up. Wore spanx underneath to slim down the belly! The gold lining wasn't as noticeable as I am 5'3". Loved the material on the arms to hid 60's arms. Overall I would definitely recommend this dress!

links_reviews_title: I got so many compliments on this dress, and it was super comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I almost always wear an 8 in everything, but needed a 6 in this dress. It was a stunner... I got so many compliments. It stayed up without being restrictive. Plenty of room in the mid section to actually eat dinner, and it was great for dancing. Would absolutely recommend!

This was my backup dress and while I didn't wear it for the event I did fall in love and am planning on how I can get an event on the books to rent this one! The sleeves are stretchy so any size arm will look elegant in this dress. The top seemed like it would stay up well and the waist hit at just the right area hiding any midsection problem areas. Comfortable and elegant, can't wait to rent this one as a first pick!

I loved this dress! It fit perfectly, and the boning made it so I didn't have to wear a bra, which is always a plus for me since I'm a 32DDD. The length was perfect--I'm 5'9" and word 4.5" heels. I got tons of compliements!

I received many compliments the entire evening and the pockets came in handy. For me, a size 2 would've been ideal due to my small chest. I wore a push-up bra and that fixed the problem. The length is just right and the dress was super easy to dance in. Highly recommend👍
Beautiful dress, color & fabric. Perfect for a fall wedding! Fit is true to size!

As there's a pandemic on and the need to go into work is slower, I'm just holding this piece to the side for the random appointments I have to go in for. It's super comfy and forgiving around the tummy area, as the pattern breaks things up visually.

links_reviews_title: My coworker wore this for a photo shoot spin off of Schitts Creek.
links_reviews_text: Fit her wonderfully. She said it was very comfy as well.

I love the stretchy material. I was 19 weeks pregnant and it worked really well. My only complaint is that my bra peeked out the sides. Luckily I wore it with a cropped leather jacket so no one could see. Overall great dress and I would rent it again.
Fit great, super comfortable, lots of compliments.
Great dress. Visually nips in the waist. Very comfortable for work. All day.

I was pleasantly surprised how well this fit and how comfortable it was. I traveled with it and it came out of my bag perfect and ready to wear. I wore it with a black jacket but it would also look great with a white or red jacket. Love this dress and I think I am going to purchase it.

This was my second time to rent this dress. I'm normally a 4/6 so I wear a medium but it was so tight last time I didn't feel comfortable wearing it to work. The large was perfect and still form fitting but without being too sexy for the office. I ended up wearing with a long black cardigan as well and it was perfect. Lots of compliments!

Advertised as bump friendly and it would be perfect except for the stripes / print. So comfy and I like the thicker fabric as it helps smooth you out but where the pattern was and my bump was just not flattering on me, perhaps on others though! I'm 15 weeks pre pregnancy size 8.

Ended up wearing the M, but could have worn the S. Just depends on how "tight" you want this dress to look. Since I was wearing it for work, thought more conservative was the way to go. Really cute dress, got compliments all day - and it was very comfortable. Put on a cardigan/jacket to make it more business ready, but can easily be worn as-is (or dressed up for after work cocktail). Will be renting this again.
Really liked the stretch in the dress. Also wore a red blazer with this dress. Fit was true to size and the print flattered contours.
Comfortable, cute, and very high quality. Will def rent again
The pattern and color were nice. The dress is a knit material but it fit perfectly and wasn't too tight.
This hugs your curves in all the right places and looks and fits great.
Perfect dress. Stretch knit hugs the curves and doesn't stretch out after a long day. The pattern is bold. A fun take on black & white.

links_reviews_title: Loves the fit of this dress.
links_reviews_text: This dress was body conscious and sexy yet appropriate for work. Was the perfect transition dress for spring. I'm a size 6 but fit easily into the small. Looked and felt like an expensive dress.

This was actually a very comfortable dress to wear. It's a thick, soft material so you don't feel smushed into the dress. It feels sexy but think you could also add a blazer and make it work appropriate.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for work. Could Totally dress it up for nighttime.
links_reviews_text: Fitted. Cute. Good for curvy body & chest.
Fits beautifully and is very comfortable. Material is thick, so doesn't show lumps and bumps. I felt chic and confident.
Fits great! The length is very professional, but the pattern keeps it fun. Stretchy, and comfortable. Will probably rent this one again.

Perfection. Thick, sweater material with stretch -- absolutely hugs curves but is completely work appropriate. Loved it so much I hunted it down online (and it was on major sale!) Look forward to wearing this over and over again!
This dress is so easy to wear. It's knit and stretchy, without being skin tight. I loved wearing it and will likely rent it again!

What a great dress with a more substantial fabric than last John + Jenn dresses I have rented. The pattern is eye catching and the silhouette is comfortable - body-hugging without feeling tight. I could have worn an XS but liked the S.
I wore this dress to work with a cardigan. The dress fits true to size and is comfortable. The material is thick and good quality! The design brings flare to your day to day wardrobe!
Cute but formfitting. I paired it with a black blazer, tights and booties. Showed by curves.

links_reviews_title: Thick, comfortable fabric and flattering print
links_reviews_text: The design of this dress is so flattering! The fabric is thick, and although the fit is definitely tight, any bulges were either pulled in or totally disguised by the linear print placement. I wore this to a family event and to work, and I got several compliments. It's bolder than the typical little black dress, but it's definitely conservative and classy. Definitely a fun rental!
The fabric is so good and hugsyoir body perfectly. Dress is comfortable but tight. I wouldn't wear it in the office. This is more like a dinner date style. I got lots of compliments on the dress.
Lots of compliments.
I liked this dress, but it capped a bit near the armpits so your bra shows. Comfortable. Cool pattern.
Fit perfectly. Not too tight for work appropriate, but still fitted and sexy. Print was fun and made it great for wearing out after work too. Easy to dress up or down and looked nice with blazer too.
Maybe I should've sized up, but the dress I received fit more like a body con dress than a shift dress. I didn't wear it to the work event I had planned to use it for.
does stretch, so sizing down might be wise!

links_reviews_title: I rented this item for work.
links_reviews_text: So. Many. Compliments! Love this dress!
n/a
Form fitting which was perfect for my petite figure. It ran a little long because I am short but I loved it.

links_reviews_title: Fun change from little black dress
links_reviews_text: Got lots of compliments on this one. Pattern was great and was great for work. Cons: a little long. Also stretched over the day. Probably should have sized down to xs for better shape.
I rented for work. Fit very well.... but not for work.... it's not very tight material. It was very comfortable
Different print but too big. Nice to change style and print up. Good for work . Need to wear small

links_reviews_title: Wore it to a networking event.
links_reviews_text: Looks chic, but runs a little bit small.
Great for work and cocktails. Form fitting without being too tight. Very flattering.
As others have said, arm holes a bit big, but not super problematic for me. Nice length, fun pattern...nice dress for work.

links_reviews_title: The perfect balance of casual, yet fashionable
links_reviews_text: The fit was good. There are quite a few buttons and no easy way to take this thing off so keep that in mind if you go to the bathroom often! Also keep in mind that this is a khaki material and seems to wrinkle easily. Still a cute jumper

Stretchable material that makes this jumpsuit fit so perfectly. Also very trendy with the shoulder action! While the jumpsuit is super comfy from the waist down, I did feel a bit restricted when reaching or lifting (there's no give).

Great fit, relaxed, and super comfortable. So many compliments! Didn't wrinkle as I was wearing it like I thought it would which was great. Obviously difficult for bathroom purposes! Also difficult to raise your arms up when you keep it off the shoulder, but I LOVED it! I'm tall (5'10") and thought the length was perfect.
As long as you don't have to use the restroom right away , lots of buttons.....

love thissss. i would say true to size. i'm smaller chested so i wore once with a bra which obviously filled out the top more and in the picture posted no bra but didn't mind the fit difference. the only cons for me were the sleeves, not much range since they hug your arms in pretty tight and all the buttons for restroom purposes lol. i probably could've sized down for a more fitted look but overall happy with the suit!!!

links_reviews_title: This jumpsuit made getting ready fast and easy!
links_reviews_text: The fit was a little snug in the waist but comfortable everywhere else!
I got compliments on the unique style. True to size but no stretch so beware. Tended to bunch up around the buttons and no reaching for high shelves because of the sleeves. Otherwise, super fun!

Loved it! Wore it for the Kentucky derby on a sunny warm day. And then also wore to work (pictured) on a rainy cooler day. Amazing garment. No give in fabric. Well-constructed. Not a lot of mobility in arms due to design, but also easy to take arms in and out of "sleeves" easily at any point without flashing someone.... could probably also be worn without arms in sleeves. The top would still stay up given construction.

links_reviews_title: Super cute but wrinkles easily and hard to get on/off
links_reviews_text: Wore this on a weekend trip to the Hamptons. I loved it and wish I could give it five stars. But it wrinkles crazy easily (see photo) and you can't lift your arms. Also, there are lots of buttons, both hidden and visible, which makes going to the bathroom a chore. Still, it's very flattering, especially for an hourglass figure - and jumpsuits can be tough for us.

links_reviews_title: So cute I busted out my Jazz hands
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is so stylish and cute. As with any jumpsuit you will be naked every time you need to use the bathroom. It's all buttons so you will not be quick. The top is off the shoulder so your arms can't go over your head. Basically it's terribly impractical but absolutely adorable. The fit was just right on me. I'm 5'7 140 with a 34b/c. Most jumpsuits are tricky if you are tall, but even with my long torso this getup worked.

This jumpsuit was flattering (in the picture I'm walking - awkward pose) and unique. Perfect for casual bridal shower in early early spring. It wrinkles easy. If you're between sizes - size up. There's no give.
Love love loved this jumpsuit! Super comfy, chic, and literally head turner! So happy I renter this!

Yes, I fed a giraffe in this. This jumpsuit was amazing, it fit well in all of the right places and survived the trip to Australia without wrinkling too much! The top flap sometimes has trouble staying up, and arm movement is a bit restricted, but that's to be expected with this style.

I absolutely love this feminine jumpsuit by Marissa Webb. Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and at the hips. Curvier women should considering sizing up for full hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra so you should wear a strapless bra. At 4’8”, the length hit floor length on me. I love the off the shoulder neckline and overall look of this jumpsuit. It can be dressed down with sneakers or up with cute wedges. This is perfect for the upcoming spring/summer months!
Greatest rental ... jumper stayed up on my bust- light weight material, weather was low 70s just perfect

links_reviews_title: Size up! But would be cute if it fits
links_reviews_text: I'm usually an 8-10 and I wish this was available in a 12 to wear. It was too tight to wear as a 10. Fabric pulled around buttons because it didn't fit right

links_reviews_title: Runs too small. I could barely button it closed.
links_reviews_text: Couldn't wear it. Too tight in torso/bust. Butt and legs were correctly sized.
Perfect for accentuating curves with small waist.
Ran super small. I'm normally a 6 and couldn't even get this up.
I am a true to size 6 and this was extremely tight. Also hard to put on.
Very cute jumpsuit, wrinkled easy, and the fit was a bit weird in the stomach area.

I normally wear an 8. Ordered an 8 and I was not even able to get it up on my shoulders. Wanted to take it with me on vacation. I guess not! Can't really provide any feedback on fit because couldn't get it on :-(

This jumpsuit is a perfect example of why I love rent the runway. I would never buy something like this because it is totally impractical. It looked completely adorable but not something you would wear much. If you're between sizes I would size up because there's not much give. I was pleasantly surprised that this worked for me and as a tall girl, that usually isn't the case with jumpsuits. Still, it wasn't the most comfortable thing to wear. You really can't raise your arms at all. And the flap at the top doesn't stay up. The off the shoulder pieces rest very loosely in the middle of your upper arm, and that felt a little bit bizarre. But I got a ton of compliments and looks.
Too small

links_reviews_title: Odd fitting. Very tight in some areas and super loose in others.
links_reviews_text: I loved the idea of this jumpsuit, but it just didn't translate in person. The cropped flare leg is perhaps not best for curvy girls.
Wasn't happy with the fit. Arms felt restricted, but would have worn if the fabric around the buttons laid flat.

It is a beautiful piece. I ordered in a size 2 and it was too small in the chest, so I ordered it again in a 4. It fit, but barely in the chest. The length was perfect with flats. I received a lot of compliments. I wore it on the weekend and it was comfortable.
I felt and looked like a PinUp girl in this snazzy jumpsuit, would definitely rent again. I would've easily bought it had if the sticker price wasn't so high!

This jumpsuit is epic - I got SO many compliments. If you're between sizes definitely size up since it's very fitted...not sure if I could've squeezed myself into my typical 6 for this one. Great piece to transition from work (perhaps with a blazer or cardigan if your office is more conservative like mine is) to a fun night out. I'll have a hard time sending this one back, that's for sure!

links_reviews_title: This could be sooooooooooooooo cute, but runs super small.
links_reviews_text: When I opened, it looks adorable. Comes a little rinkly, but that seems to resolve itself. I normally wear a 4R/P and this is supper small. I think I would go 6r or even 8 reg. Additionally, if you have larger bust, size up. Seems snug in bust, but the rest of it is amazingly cute. I can't wait for my exchanged size.
The fit is great and the fabric is so pretty. I was comfortable all night!

links_reviews_title: From work to dinner! Beautiful dress for a bump!
links_reviews_text: Im usually a size 4 in this dress, but at 24 weeks pregnant I went a size up and got tons of compliments at work. Super comfy and flowy and plenty of room for a 2nd trimester bump.
Rented for a summer rehearsal dinner. It was super comfy and fit well. The length though....I am 5'4'' and it was way longer than it should have been!

links_reviews_title: A perfect spring Graduation dress! The ruffles are fun and feminine.
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress so much I bought it elsewhere after renting from RTR! The ruffles are perfectly feminine and the colors on this dress are even better in person! A must-rent!
Love this dress - it's so comfortable and felt flattering. It goes past the knees and ties at the neck so very work appropriate. There's no zipper so it's very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Flattering, comfortable fit. Perfect for spring transitional weather.
links_reviews_text: Flattering fit for pear shaped. Well constructed, fully lined. Flowy, but didn't blow up in the wind. Perfect for transition weather--85 in day to 55 at night.
I rented this dress for Easter Sunday and it was a big hit! Looked amazing in our family photos. Fit perfectly and colors are so beautiful.
I wore this dress to the HOUSTON livestock show and rodeo with boots and a hat. I gots lots and compliments and am considering purchasing.

I LOVED this dress! The print is beautiful and it can be either dressed up or down. It was on the longer side for a midi (hit right above my ankles), but was super flowy and comfortable. I didn't feel like it was shapeless at all, it was extremely figure flattering in person. Shoshanna never disappoints!
I liked his dress better than I thought I would. I liked that you could tie the neck or Leave it open. I ended up wearing it for my family photos as well.

links_reviews_title: Feminine pattern and style, very long
links_reviews_text: This dress was beautiful but it wasn't very flattering. It's supposed to be a midi but it just looks oversized. Maybe size down if you want it to fit better

Wore this gem to the Shania concert. Such a fun dress! I was able to wear it to work and the concert. Just changed up the shoes. Shoulders run a bit small so size up if you have broad shoulders. Very comfy dress! Would highly recommend!

This dress wasn't my favorite, but this photo isn't as good as it could be (apologies!). The fabric was pretty but the material didn't breathe on a hot day, and the cut wasn't quite right for my body (I think it was made for someone who was more even on top and bottom since it pulled at my bust and hips, and the v neck didn't come down enough to be flattering). I did get compliments on it but just didn't agree :)
Fit perfectly and so fun to wear. I decided to keep it an extra week because I liked it so much. A hard one to part with!
I wore this to work and received several compliments, however I think it's a little fancier than needed for an office. But it was light and flowy and I really liked wearing it!
Loved the print - got tons of compliments

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a tea party.
links_reviews_text: I love this dress. It's the second time I've rented it. Great for the office in the spring/summer and great for a day time party or shower. Super comfortable no complaints.
Loose fit. Size down

links_reviews_title: Great fit but felt too matronly for my event
links_reviews_text: Fits great! Would be excellent for church or modest affair. It felt too matronly for the event I needed it for.

links_reviews_title: I was officiating a wedding on a mountain.
links_reviews_text: I ordered this as backup for a wedding that I was officiating and ended up wearing it instead of my first choice. The bride specifically asked me to wear a floral gown and this one was perfect because it's beautiful but also relatively modest. I felt super comfortable and was thrilled I ordered this dress for the event.
Lovely flattering fit

This was not as flattering in person as I expected it to be. My husband laughed when I put it on and said it was very matronly. It fit loosely and would probably be a great dress for someone else but I did not end up wearing it for my niece's baptism.
Received so many complements! The PERFECT spring/Easter dress! Comfortable, flattering and pretty!
This did not work for me, very unflattering. I looked pregnant with twins I felt. Not a style for me I guess.
This dress was a pretty fabric but the fit was huge. I couldn't even tighten the strings to make the medium look ok.
Love this dress. Very flattering. Perfect for daytime or evening. Lovely fabric.

links_reviews_title: Comfy Class for a Night Out
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a rainy evening trip to the theatre. I felt dressed up, but still comfortable driving for awhile and walking around downtown. I had planned to wear this with heels, but my sequin sneakers I was driving in looked so cute with it, I ended up leaving them on. The dress itself was very cute and flattering, not too tight anywhere which is how I like it. I think it would work well even for girls who are a lot curvier than I. Will definitely rock this to work at least once before returning, as well.

I didn't end up wearing this one and I regret it. It is so comfortable and flattering. Fabric is light and definitely will need to be ironed or steamed before wear. No zipper, goes on over head. Just gorgeous.

Loved the floral pattern in the photo and the fabric is really high quality and in good condition. Unfortunately the fit was pretty loose and bordering on frumpy - decided to return without wearing as it wasn't the most flattering cut.
I received many compliments on this dress. It's great for spring. Runs true to size

links_reviews_title: Great color and pattern for spring.
links_reviews_text: Light way, and figure flattering. I paired it with a belt to accent my waist. The dress was comfortable and unrestrictive. I could easily dress it up or down depending on the occasion.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and pattern and incredibly comfortable.
links_reviews_text: I loved the dress, but I think a 4 might have been better fit for me vs the size 6 i ordered.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress. Sooo comfortable. Beautiful floral print.
links_reviews_text: I loved wearing this dress, it was casual and flowy and incredibly comfortable. The longer length was very comfortable for a dinner and fit me perfectly. The print is beautiful. I think this dress is probably more flattering for someone with a smaller chest. Overall, loved it and would rent this one again.
n/a

links_reviews_title: Way too long for 5'4" - overwhelmed my frame and runs large. Cute dress, size down
links_reviews_text: Very long and runs large.
amazingly lightweight but not sheer- perfect dress to look nice for work and not die in the heat in the summer
Fit as expected and would rent again

links_reviews_title: I love this dress but need to size down one size.
links_reviews_text: love and need to order a 10

Fit fairly true to size. I'm 5'4" and it hit just above my ankles. Didn't love the color on me (I'm pale and the pale blue sort of washed me out) and it was also a little heavier than I expected (it's fully lined with what felt like a petticoat underneath). But it's a beautiful dress that flows in the wind. I felt really pretty.
Fit is true to size, fabric was nice and cool and comfortable for a hot summer night. Very comfortable. I liked the elastic waist for dinner and drinks, and my husband liked the dress too!
Fit is great but a little snug at waist. Someone will have to Hook and zip the back of Dress. The peek a boo skin in the back is fun but be mindful if you wear granny panties:-()

I loved this dress! Sexy with the exposed back and lace, but covered enough that it was appropriate for a work function. I have a small enough cup and it was fitted enough that I went braless. I loved the fit and received tons of compliments. One of my favorite designers and I was thrilled to wear this!

links_reviews_title: This dress was a great choice for a winter wedding as the material is a bit heavier.
links_reviews_text: I am 5’6” and weigh 140lbs and the 8 fit perfectly (normally I wear a 6).

True to size. Can't wear a bra or have to wear stickies. For me the top fit snug and not wearing a bra wasn't a problem. A bit itchy around the neckline. Nothing I couldn't deal with considering I liked the dress but if you're sensitive to that sort of thing it's something to consider.

links_reviews_title: Breathable head-Turner for a cocktail or dance party
links_reviews_text: Order a size up for this. You'll want a nude or strapless bra, as the lace shoes through a bit at the shoulders. The lining is tan. The lacework is beautiful. I danced for hours and didn't get itchy or sweaty. I did have an issue with the lining trying to pop up out of the gap at the small of my back.
I usually size up in marchesa to be safe. This dress is really beautiful but has confusing zippers In back so it's easier if you have someone to help.

This dress has so much detail. It will get you a lot of compliments. The only caution is if you have any back rolls or worry about the lower back area or need to wear shapewear because this dress has the back out and that means, no high waist Spanx, etc.. So a good fit it necessary.

Lots of heavy and detailed material which made the dress look high quality. Fit was slightly tight in the bust, so didn't need a bra (if you're top heavy, maybe try sizing up). Loved the cut open back, which made a pretty conservative dress a little sexy!

This dress was amazing. I recommend sizing up 1 size: I normally wear a 14 and the 16 fit like a dream. So flattering, curve hugging. I felt like a star at the jazz club that night. I received a lot of compliments.

Loved this dress. Received lots of compliments when I wore it to my company holiday party. This is a heavy dress, so it's well suited for winter semi-formal events. Be forewarned, you can't wear a bra with this because of the open back. I leaned into the vintage aspects of the dress and wore it with a petticoat underneath, which really helped emphasize the full skirt.

I didn't end up wearing this back-up dress because my husband voted for the red one but I was IN LOVE with this dress. Very understated but the back cut out makes it a little playful. The detail on this is incredible. The sleeves were silky and comfy. The length was a little long on me but appreciated for a winter work function. I wish I had another event this weekend that I could've worn both! It was a little loose on the top but I don't think I would've gone down a size. There's enough detail in the bust area that you can wear it braless or just with sticky boob things (no way to wear a strapless bra). Sorry for the weird face in the pic, always awkward asking the husband to take photos.

links_reviews_title: I wore this to a Catholic wedding ceremony as to feel modest and beautiful.
links_reviews_text: The details of this dress are to die for. I had read reviews that the bust was tight, and I’m so glad I sized up!! It actually fit just right, with the waist being slightly snug. This dress has two sets of zippers was a little challenging with no help to zip! I wore a cami underneath because there is a cut out in the back and I did not want that showing in church. The dress is heavy, so it was perfect for a cold rainy day. It is absolutely LOVELY and I want to wear it again.

This dress is everything. I wanted to wear it to work, to parties, to sleep in - I loved it so much. Actually wore it for a dinner party and then put on tights and a blazer to wear it to work for a presentation, and couldn't stop lovingly touching the fabric. It's thick but not heavy, slides over curves, and is surprisingly sexy with the cutout and sheer sleeves, while still seemingly modest. Wouldn't wear this for a professional event without a blazer on top, but I will absolutely rent again for any excuse I can find. Would be perfect for a wedding.
Fit perfectly. Very modest but fun with the back opening. Amazing detail. Would definitely rent again. My husband loved it.

LOVED. this dress. so so so much. I've rented a few times before but this was by far my favorite one to wear. The intricate lace/embroidery is absolutely stunning, if you look closely you'll see little insects, butterflies, and gorgeous flowers and textures and patterns. The skirt was so fun to dance in! Being spun around makes you feel like a princess. The sleeves were the perfect 3/4 length on my arms. I'm absolutely obsessed with every tiny detail about this dress. It was semi heartbreaking to have to send it back, but I consoled myself by saying I'd rent it again one day ;) Definitely size up if you have larger boobs; I fluctuate between an A and B cup, and the 0 had kind of squished my boobs flat. The 2 was a bit more comfortable, but I got the two sizes mixed up when I was packing to leave town for the wedding. Definitely have an extra person with you to help with the zippers because they're way too complicated to do on your own. Believe me, I read comments about that and stubbornly thought that I'd be able to handle it, but I was sorely mistaken lol. Could not recommend this dress more, especially for a fall/winter event, but do be wary of the open back/snugness of the bodice

I rented this for my birthday, and as soon as I put it on I knew it was perfect! The lace is so detailed, and the underlay was my EXACT skin tone. That literally never happens--it was kismet!!! It runs pretty true to size. I'd say just be careful with snagging the lace. It's not delicate by any means, but nerve wrecking nonetheless.
Runs small. Didn't end up wearing the dress. Lovely material, just didn't fit.

links_reviews_title: this dress is stunning, and truly a statement piece
links_reviews_text: it fits like a glove, and all the little details make it magical

I wore this dress to a friends birthday in Paris and it was so elegant, dreamy and beautiful! It fit really well and I got a lot of compliments on it! Marchesa consistently makes romantic, feminine dresses!

links_reviews_title: Need a large bust to pull this off
links_reviews_text: This Is a nice dress however you need a large bus to make the proportions work. I have more of a pear-shaped and frankly it made a 51 year-old woman look like she was pregnant because of the High waist line
This dress is beautiful in person, but the waist ran really small and pinch in an unflattering way. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful detailing -- a lot of dress.
links_reviews_text: This is an absolutely gorgeous dress, but I didn't end up wearing it to my event because it felt too formal and elaborate. It's definitely not a daytime-wedding piece (which I maybe should have guessed!), and the detailing could make it seem too heavy, especially if you try to wear it with tights. Would recommend for a holiday party or wintry evening event though.

links_reviews_title: Fun to wear something different - was tight and glad I ordered up

links_reviews_text: There is no stretch to the lace so the M was way too tight in the arms. The L allowed me to move, but was a little loose in the torso area. The red slip underneath was so short it didn't cover my booty so I ordered a red slip from amazon to wear underneath. It gave me the extra length I needed and no one could tell it wasn't part of the dress. Definitely would not have been able to wear this without the extra length from the amazon slip! Overall STUNNING dress - I received so many compliments.

Rented for a Valentine's Day fundraiser. Literally so many people complimented this dress and it felt so great to dress up 5 week postpartum. I felt like the dress ran really small (especially around chest and back), and I sent back the medium and got the large. It was still a little snug around chest, but I loved the fit. Also, the under dress/slip is very short for y'all girls. Just FYI.
High quality. Fit snug in all the right places. Perfect for a winter affair, wouldn't recommend for summer. The lace is beautiful but it's a lot fabric on top.
Got so many compliments, I got it for Christmas true fit and comfortable

I rented this to go our favorite restaurant in Las Vegas. I felt very sexy in it. The color is amazing and the lace is very high quality. There is no stretch and I found that to bother me in the elbows as I was eating. At the end of dinner I was so full I felt like I would pop out of the dress. Again, some stretch would have been nice. Overall, it looked amazing and I felt great in it. I would highly recommend!

This dress was amazing. I wore it to my work holiday party. I'm a curvy 5'4" 138lbs gal. This dress doesn't have much give so I ended up going with the large since the slip underneath was just a little too short on my not so little behind. I felt like a million bucks, and got a ton of compliments. I highly suggest this gorgeous dress!
It was a hit at the holiday party and I felt v sexy. Would 100% rent again if I didn't take so many pictures in it already!
Sexy and classy. Obsessed with this dress.
This is one of my favorite rentals ever. It fit perfectly and was super flattering. I got compliments on the dress the whole night.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress. Fit like a glove.
links_reviews_text: I wore the dress for the tea ceremony part of my wedding. It was Asian enough for the tea ceremony and also modern enough for my style. It was perfect and fit like a glove.

I love this dress so much but wasn't able to wear it. It was too much for my small frame and I little bit of an awkward length for my 5' frame. But it's jaw dropping in person. Definitely recommend for someone taller. And you will need help zipping it and taking it off. It was really everything I wanted. I just wish it fit.

links_reviews_title: Looks like crap on the hanger but fabulous on the body.
links_reviews_text: Red lace and fringe sleeves made for a playful yet very sexy dress. I'm 5'6" 130lbs.

As you can already see from pictures this dress is so pretty and unique lacy type material with adorable ruffles on the sleeves! I thought the medium fit well (I'm in between small and medium with this designer) the dress was pretty new when I rented it I'm guessing that's why the medium wasn't looser like other dresses by this designer. I did not have a bra on and felt it had good support but I'm also only 34b bra size. The slit I thought was pretty high and there is no way to cover it by the longer dress parts it is definitely made to show that leg! I actually didn't get to wear this out regrettably because I simply had no event going on that I thought would live up to this dress. I'd like to rent it for a special occasion. You'll absolutely be noticed in this dress.

This was beautiful and fit like a glove. It was hard to zip up by myself but I managed. The slip underneath does ride up a little bit and sometimes would ride up midway to my butt, however it really didn't bother me because you really can't tell from looking that it's riding up.
Runs true to size. Can wear strapless bra.
Dress fit like a glove. Just enough leg without being extra. I'm 5'10 and fit perfect! Sorry taken!

links_reviews_title: A modern take on the traditional Chinese dress
links_reviews_text: Beautiful details. Comfortable and great fit. The slit on the right leg is mid thigh. Perfect length. I wore it to two events. Received many compliments from strangers.
Probably the dress I have gotten more compliments on in the past few years! Fit was just amazing! The color is so perfect! Everyone in that event love it!

links_reviews_title: The perfect fun yet formal red dress
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for my petite frame. I loved the slit, sleeves, etc. Comfortable and flattering.

links_reviews_title: Great petite friendly formal/wedding guest dress
links_reviews_text: Little big on the top and waist.
Love it !

links_reviews_title: I wore this beautiful dress to my birthday dinner! I felt so beautiful, sexy and sophisticated!
links_reviews_text: The fit is true to size and hugs you in all the right places. My first time renting a dress and so pleased.

links_reviews_title: I loved everything about this dress
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on this dress, and approached my strangers to tell me it was stunning. It is perfect for a winter affair. Even though I'm short (5'), the dress was still looked good a little longer. The only downside is the sleeves, it helps to tuck them in if your eating!

links_reviews_title: Sexy stunning red lace & ankle / longer length at 5'2 which I loved.
links_reviews_text: Don't look at my lack of hair /makeup. Wanted to throw on for the review...Loved dress & fit perfect but decided to wear cocktail above knee for event instead. Has some stretch in bodice but could be tight on some arms. I could raise arms but only 80%. No bra or Nubra. Big busts may need size up? Will rent again for a sexy night out!

links_reviews_title: Loved so much! Sexy and comfortable
links_reviews_text: After renting 5 dresses this was the winner! I'm a size 10 and rented the XL. Anyway it was perfect and love tha color and edginess. I'm buying it too! Have to keep this one. Thanks RTR

links_reviews_title: You'll have the best dress in the place!
links_reviews_text: Fit like a glove in all the right places. The details such as the cuffs and the neck add details to this dress that will make it unforgettable!

I made some questionable choices when it came to work wear with this 🤪 I loved this dress. It's very sexy, the lace cutout and details are so perfect. It was giving me Asian, fusion vibes. I felt it was elegant and sexy. Would be perfect for date night or wedding party. I obviously wore it to work though and actually didn't feel too bad. Felt more modern and progressive in this dress during the work day. Could definitely rent again. See more pictures and videos of this look on my Instagram @Mrs.chicchanel
Comfortable, sexy, classic
The color is great in person, the website does it no justice! Such a great fit for any party event, I would recommend if you are curvy to size up because there is no give.

links_reviews_title: Stunning dress, received so many compliments
links_reviews_text: The only thing is that I’m 5’10 and the slit on the side was a little too high to wear in church without a coat. Otherwise very comfortable and easy to dance around in it.

I loved this dress! So much drama! And the color! Unfortunately I couldn't wear it to the event, even theXLR was too tight in the shoulder and arms : ( Good thing I went to the store to pick it up, so I was able to return it and get store credit. Thanks RTR !
I could not wear this dress because the slit was way to high and the lining way too short. This was not evident from the pictures and reviews.

links_reviews_title: This dress makes you feel just the right amount of sexy and classy!
links_reviews_text: It fits perfect!!!

links_reviews_title: I loved loved this dress and got a ton of compliments!!!!!
links_reviews_text: Fit perfectly. Hard to get the zipper up yourself but you dont need to use the zipper other than taking dress off or putting it on!
Gorgeous dress. Worn to dinner and felt stunning wearing it. Big hit with the boyfriend too.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear, but would rent again for another occasion
links_reviews_text: I rented a couple dresses through my Unlimited Subscription as potential wedding guest dresses, and I didn't chose this one because it felt a little too warm and formal for an outdoor summer mountain wedding. HOWEVER, I cannot wait to get invited to a fancier or colder weather event, because this dress is stunning. I loved it so much more than I expected to- it was a flattering length on my 5'1" frame, and the color was a true red. I loved the neck and sleeve detailing, and can't wait to order this dress to actually wear!

Ladies be careful. I tried on the L and the top was great but it didn't even cover my butt standing still! My back up was the XL and the top was ok and the slip barely covered my butt. I was unable to wear it and had to return it. Very sad because it's a beautiful dress.
This dress was nothing of what I expected. It was a little more fancy than I was expecting and it also had really long sleeves. If you have a butt at all this is not a good dress for you.

It's a snug fit. I'm a 10 and the XL was snug, but the dress looked great on. Unfortunately, when I turned around to look at the back of the dress in the mirror I realized that the lining/slip portion of the dress did not cover my bum. Lol. I'm 6' tall with a long-ish torso, but I'd say maybe the dress would be best suited for those 5'9" and under. It is a shame, because it is a very lovely and well made dress and I would have totally rocked it, had it covered my tush.

This dress fit me like a glove and I felt so glamorous in it! So many compliments! I am 5'5, 145 lbs, 34D cup and the 42R was a perfect fit. I did wear Spanx underneath to help flatten my tummy a little, but otherwise I felt very comfortable in it! I also didn't need to wear a bra as it was snug enough and had an extra layer of lining along the bust! (I am also a mom of 4, so that is saying something!) This is my favorite rental so far!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress! Got some many compliments all night long!

links_reviews_text: I wore this for a formal event in New York City. The color is fabulous and it fits like a glove. This designer often makes her dresses out of a scuba type material which doesn't require a zipper so it takes some wiggling to get into, but looks fantastic once you're there! I wore it with a stick on bra. Very pretty!
Great fit, and best part is that it's stretchy so it doesn't create any belly rolls! Beautiful color, would 100% own this dress.

I wore this to an award ceremony formal affair work event. I am usually a size 4 but ended up getting a 2 due to availability. I was nervous it would be too tight but the stretchy material made it fit like a glove. It was perfect!! I got endless compliments all night and was being called Princess Jasmine. Truly felt like the belle of the ball.
This dress was amazing! I got so many compliments, the bride even said I looked like a model!!! Rent this dress.

Rented this dress for a formal event in mid-January and have only great things to say! The dress was comfortable, flattering, and I received lots of compliments - all the things we want, right? The fabric was forgiving. Would recommend seamless, no-show underwear. I'm busty and am used to dresses being too tight in the chest, but wasn't the case here. Would highly recommend and rent again!

links_reviews_title: The color was stunning and the dress fit like a glove!
links_reviews_text: The material of this dress is so high quality, it just flows so perfectly with your body and when you walk!!! You feel like a mermaid!! The dress stayed put beautifully and I loved the shape of it!! It was SO comfortable!! I didn't think it would be a comfortable dress, but it sure was!! I loved it!!! The length was great with 4 inch heels! The color was stunning.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments on the color
links_reviews_text: I always rent this designer for the Golden Globes because being 5' it does work with platform 4 in heels. Always comfy and flattering too.
Loved! I was 24 weeks pregnant and the dress was very bump friendly. Wore it to a formal gala for the holidays.

links_reviews_title: I stood out in all the right ways!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect! It fit like a glove and smoothed all my curves.
the top part on the shoulder straps was a bit large, but overall very comfortable dress and it didn't wrinkle.

links_reviews_title: Stand out in a sea of black in this dress!
links_reviews_text: Exceptional fit (as always) from this designer. Fit is snug yet classy. I could have gone with a long in either a 42 or 44 (I am 5'7" and always wear 3+ inch heels) . Wore this to a holiday black tie gala. Color is exceptional and a stand out from the normal black gown. Compliments all night long and days after from all the photos!

This dress is perfect!! The fit is true to size, it hugged my curves and the thick material had some stretch yet held everything in in all the right places! I'm 5'4" so I chose the petite and it was a perfect length with heels. The color is stunning and very flattering!!
My original dress did not fit so RTR overnighted this to me - it's a long and i am 5'3 so didn't expect it to work but it ended up being great! Very comfortable and gorgeous color!

Gorgeous color, could have gotten away with sizing down but the seams are super flattering and so easy to wear braless or with a strapless bra! I had a baby a month ago and this dress was overnighted because my other selections just wouldn't work with my postpartum body. Would for sure recommend!

I HAD to show you a picture from the back. My waist looked killer in this dress. I wish I could walk around every day in it! I am a size 10 and 5'9, and it fit great. I did wear shaping undergarments . The dress just slips up too-no zipper or anything! Crazy comfortable for the silhouette you get. The lines draw the eye into the best part of the female shape. RENT this dress!
I wore this for a gala. Fit is smooth, you don't need spanx. I got a lot of compliments. Size down.

This dress was my backup, and I'm so glad the one I wanted was too small. I received so many compliments! Slightly large through the chest/back, but this was the most comfortable dress I've ever worn! Definitely needed shapewear to soften some bunching around the stomach area, but it gave me an hourglass figure when I typically don't have much of a waist. The dress is stretchy, and the regular length ended up being perfect with 3" heels. Rent this dress!
FABULOUS dress! Great fit, didn't have to wear a bra. Got tons of compliments and felt like a million bucks all night.

links_reviews_title: So many compliments! On the dress and the color!
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and feel of this dress. Received so many compliments on it, even from the bride herself! The one negative thing I have to say is that if it's going to be warm out, this might not be the dress to wear. I was sweating through it during the ceremony, and it showed. Once my spots were gone, it was an incredible dress to be wearing!

Wore this dress to a formal wedding, and absolutely LOVED it! As a tall female, I have a difficult time finding long, body-con style dresses because the hip area is often too high in the torso and looks silly. Did not have that problem with this dress! Material is thick but stretchy (easy to dance), and the color is beautiful. Im usually either a 6L or 8L, but I wore the 6L as this runs slightly big. Compliments all night long! Will definitely rent again!
It fit well, material was comfortable but still form fitting. Loved the dress and the color.
Everything about this was glamorous! I love this designer and the fit was perfect.

A beautiful azure color that stands out in the crowd. Very flattering trumpet fit with off the shoulder. Can be worn on the shoulder but looks better off. The fabric is very stretchy to fit nicely around curves. It has an inner lining so better for any panty lines etc. The fabric is thick so could be hot for hotter climates. This wedding was in the 90s. But worth it as the dress was so great

links_reviews_title: Wore this to a military ball. I got several compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: The dress was true to size. The length was perfect for me as I am petite at 5’0”. I was able to wear heels and not step over the dress or drag it. The only part that was a little loose for me was the bust area. Overall I was pleased with the size.

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments on that special night! I felt beautiful! Thanks RTR!!
links_reviews_text: I received lots of compliments on that special night! Thanks for allowing me to look so good! It does "fit like a glove", I just pulled up the dress and it was beautiful. I does show all your curvy hips and your belly, so be sure to suck in your belly for pictures. : D

links_reviews_title: Stand out in a crowd! Vavavoom!
links_reviews_text: This is a beautiful cobalt blue dress. I wore it to one of my best friend's weddings and it was a hit! It's double layered so it kept me warm in Vermont. I'm 5'7 and wore heels and the long was just the right length. The material of the dress is scuba-like which I also didn't mind, very stretchy and comfortable. I typically wear a size 4 in dresses but got a size 6 for this more conservative wedding. Simply gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress- the color is gorgeous!
links_reviews_text: Material was stretchy and surprisingly forgiving for being a form fitting dress.
The color was amazing. The fit was a little large. I'm normally a 0 and ordered the 38p. It was a little big in the midsection. Length wise it was perfect with heels.

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress for a black tie summer wedding!
links_reviews_text: Gorgeous dress! The color is stunning in person - like the cerulean blue Crayola crayon, and the fit was super flattering. It has a lot of stretch and doesn't zip - you just slip it right on. The fabric was thick and hugs all your curves, but it was also light enough for a summer wedding or formal affair. It was great for a black tie summer wedding - fancy enough for black tie and appropriate for wedding, but with a fun pop of color for the season (late August). The chest and arms were slightly big on me, but it wasn't noticeable. I'm 5'8 and wore 3-4 inch heels, so the long length was perfect. If you're shorter than 5'7 or 5'8, I would guess the regular length would work well. The mermaid style was a little out of my comfort zone, but I'm so glad I rented it. It was really easy to dance in, and I felt great in it. Didn't hurt that it got a ton of compliments, too! Definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful color and fabulous form-fitting fabric!
links_reviews_text: This dress hugged every curve miraculously. It was super stretchy and would be great for every body type. I felt super flirty and sexy in it and it was so comfortable. Loved it!

links_reviews_title: So comfortable! Fits like a wetsuit. So many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Good for curvy figure. I did need to wear spandex with it.

Was stopped with compliments twice leaving the hotel for the event, and they continued all night. Hugs the curves in a flattering way. Wore spanx and strapless bra. One of my favorite dresses I've worn in my life!
Rented this for a wedding and the fit was great. With the right shape-wear, this dress gives the best hourglass figure! Compliments all night long.
Sexy, sleek and elegant. Fit like a glove! So many compliments.

links_reviews_title: Color in a sea of black gowns
links_reviews_text: This dress was magical. It fit like a glove. The material is heavy enough to smooth over curves. The color is eye-catching. I wish I had a reason to wear it again and again.

links_reviews_title: Omg! Can you say perfect! This dress is everything.
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Didn't end up wearing it but fits great!
links_reviews_text: It's tight to your body and fit well. I didn't end up wearing it because I didn't want to be uncomfortable worrying about my food belly all night.

links_reviews_title: Rented this for a black tie wedding and I felt amazing in it!!
links_reviews_text: This is by far my favorite RTR rental. I'm 5'0 118 lbs. 34D, it fit like a glove and true to size. Rented it to a black tie wedding and I stood it like sore thumb in a good way ofcourse. Very stretchy material. I felt like a million bucks in it. Got compliments left and right. Although the material is thick , you need to wear some kind of undergarment cuz my belly button was showing through when I tried it without undergarment. I would rent this in every color if I could! Rent it ladies!!

agreeing with other reviews about the weird fit.. but i liked the top! for me it was definitely baggy in the chest area so i wore a bralette under. fabric is light and airy. paired with shorts for my casual event. probably wouldn't wear again just bc the need to always adjust the top, but definitely cute regardless!
Couldn't wear strapless bra - back is too low, super cute top but the bust was a little big and so were the straps

As other reviewers have noted, this top has an odd fit to it. I felt like I was constantly having to adjust it. That said, it was a cute top that looked great with leather leggings. Due to the low cut, I wore a pretty lace bralette underneath instead of a regular bra.
I really loved the way this too looked but it was such a pain. Every size seemed too big. The straps kept falling down major design flaw, but I got a lot of complements on it.
This shirt was so amazing and fun. The only thing was the straps on the shoulders were a little awkward/loose

links_reviews_title: Very cute, color is great. Hart to wear without a bandeau.
links_reviews_text: This is almost impossible to wear without some sort of bandeau underneath. The way that it fell on me, it was very open. It's a great color and very cute and different but you definitely need to test it out before wearing it!

links_reviews_title: So cute but way too big
links_reviews_text: Got this to wear casually but it was thin and way too big. With no adjustable straps there was no way to even try to make it work

I rented this in a small and I am very small chested and it was large int he chest. The straps do not adjust so I felt like I was constantly making sure the top was not gaping. This would be avoidable with some fashion tape but i could not find mine last minute! You can't wear a bra with this top but the open back makes for a fun summer top. I received a lot of compliments with this top!
The top was a strange fit, a little big in the bust but fitted in the armhole. Loved this top for date night or going out!

links_reviews_title: Did not work for my body.
links_reviews_text: Fit weirdly.

Get your double sided tape ready! You need it for this one. With the open back, I wore my sticky bra. Yet, the front moves a bit and kept exposing it. So i used double sided tape to keep it all in place. Despite this, I love the shirt! I wore it with jeans for girls night out. Everything stayed in place and I felt extremely sexy wearing it.
Cute summer top, but the straps and bust were too big.

links_reviews_title: Didn't get to wear it...too big, but really cute
links_reviews_text: straps are too big
Its the perfect color and I love the shape of this top but the straps were HUGE and there's really nothing I could've done to fix that. They were floating around my ears every time I sat down.

links_reviews_title: Cute top but straps kept falling down at side of arm
links_reviews_text: Straps kept falling down at arms despite tightening. Would definitely wear if fit well!

I sized down based on the reviews; however, I would size down even more. The top has one button closing it in the back, and that is it. If I were to get this top again, I would size down two, so it fits tighter on the chest.
Great for daytime

links_reviews_title: I wore this with fun red pants and loved it! the top is super flattering.
links_reviews_text: Perfect amount of sweet v. spicy!

links_reviews_title: unwearable due to the odd fit.
links_reviews_text: the waist fit (only one button holds the whole thing together) but the chest was too big and straps too long (but they cant be adjusted in any way). cant wear a bra, but even sticky boobs were visible because of the baggyness of the chest. shame because its a pretty color. just really bad fit.

links_reviews_title: Wore as a cute date top
