links_reviews_text: This shirt is really unique, I like the shape and interesting design. It will feel like you are barely wearing anything, wouldn't advise for a windy location ;) Comfortable and cute this is something I would rent again!
Although it fit around my waist the rest was far too baggy to be flattering. I didn't end up wearing it.
Felt like I had on a pink pillow case.

This top is extremely flattering and well cut, but runs large. I definitely could have used one size smaller, so that I wasn't messing with the straps all night. You definitely can't wear a bra with this, but you will need nipple covers.

links_reviews_title: Not the best for petite ladies.
links_reviews_text: runs large and is a very deep v cut.
So weird. Definitely not for big boobied gals!

The color is adorable and the top itself is amazing. The issue is that if you don't have large breasts it gapes horribly. If the top had adjustable straps it would be a 10/10 in my book. Probably a good piece to own (w/ alterations) but not a great rental for the itty bitty titty committee..

links_reviews_title: Cant be worn with a bra
links_reviews_text: Couldn't use it. See thru but impossible to wear w a bra

links_reviews_title: Straps are too long and not adjustable
links_reviews_text: Could not wear it and have it look flattering because of straps.

I loved the look of this top, but I was disappointed. Overall, it is a basic cotton blouse. The chest area was huge (I'm not), but the rest of the garment is true to size. The straps are also a bit awkward.

links_reviews_title: too big shoulders and chest. You need to have a very large chest to pull this off
links_reviews_text: too large
Runs large, couldn't wear it. Other wise it also didn' t travel well, one has to iron it extensively before wearing it.
Couldn't wear. Recommendation was to go a size up but it was so huge when I did that I think I would have gone a size down.
Great fit!
Loved it! Needed it for a work event!
This top was super cute on. The material is fairly thin so I felt like I needed a bra, which is difficult with the low back so I didn't end up wearing it out of the house.

Pretty pale pink cotton top. The deep v back makes it impossible to wear a bra, but it's also too thin to go braless - an adhesive bra is necessary. I don't think I could have gone down a size, yet the straps were a little loose.

links_reviews_title: The reviews are correct-the fit is just too odd.
links_reviews_text: Lots of slits revealing my waist and not a consistent fit overall. Very large on top-fitted waist. I did not wear.

This shirt has great shape and is a great color. I would have loved to wear it, except there was no-way I would have been able to wear a bra (at least the way it fit on me) and the material is WAY to thin to go braless. If the designer remade this top in a thicker material, I would rent it.
This is a very lightweight fabric. Not meant for larger boobs

links_reviews_title: loved it! but a tad big
links_reviews_text: one button in back didn't hold up around my body like I thought it would
Thus was a great dress for work. It actually fit a little snugger than I thought it would. It was form fitting at the hips. I didn't mind though. It just made me love it more.
Perfectly fitted; perfect dress for a work event
I loved the vibrancy of the color. Open back wasn't awesome for the work setting.

links_reviews_title: Bright red catches all the attention and all the complements in SoHo!
links_reviews_text: Love the color, love the dress! Gotta say though, the dress is very honest... definitely shows belly
Bright color, love the swish in the skirt. Fit well, very comfortable. Nice detail on the back.

links_reviews_title: Great color for a standout look
links_reviews_text: Probably a bit too fancy for work, would be a great dress for an after work event. Runs small.

links_reviews_title: Classic style with pop of color
links_reviews_text: Loved this dress! Wore for work and vacation. Nice weight high quality material. Color is bright orange (I originally thought it would be red). Was a great summer dress. Wore for work with a cream/gold blazer over it (back keyhole was too revealing for my office) little bit of a pain because the tie was bulky so I would untie when wearing under blazer. For dinners wore just the dress and loved it. The 0 was a little snug on my torso/chest/arms, which is true to size for me, but bustier women may find that to be an issue and want to size up. I also found the waist was a little high - meaning the curves for the hips fell above my own so for the best fit I had to tug the dress down. Still give it five stars. Would definitely rent again.
I got compliments, but I felt frumpy wearing this dress.

I wore this for a summer afternoon wedding at an upscale old fashioned hotel in the mountains. The size 4 fit just right, had to find a bra that didn't show with the open back but it wasn't difficult. Got so many compliments on the color which I would say is pretty close to what it looks like on screen, a definite orange/red. A fun, flattering dress to wear!

links_reviews_title: A business event with The Mooch
links_reviews_text: The dress was perfect and a little fun for a working event with several high profile individuals. It was professional, yet the back let my personality come through a bit. Before dinner, my stomach was flat, but after I had a meal, I was a bit self-conscious about how big my stomach looked in the dress (probably just in my head). Gorgeous dress with a fun little spin to it.

I loved this color and shape and thought the detail on the back was really pretty. But folks should be aware that there is zero give in the waist area and the material isn't super thick (though it's nice) so if you don't have an absolutely flat stomach, it shows.

links_reviews_title: This dress had a cheerful color and nice weight. The neckline was pretty.
links_reviews_text: It was very loose in the back, but I wore it anyway and still felt good in it.
Loved this dress. The color is bright and striking. Wore to work and received many compliments. Would have kept if it was a little less expensive.

links_reviews_title: A bit tight in the chest, vibrant color
links_reviews_text: You will need a partner to zip and tie the back. I found this to be a bit tight on top- no give to the material. If you are large chested, I'd size up. The dress is unlined and light, so it is perfect for summer.

Such a fun and flowy dress. The keyhole in the back is adorable and (bonus!) you can tighten/loosen the knot for your best fit. It's a longer length (consider that I'm 5'7 when you see where it hits me). The color is a bright red/orange but it photographs closer to a red. Would buy it in a heartbeat if it weren't so pricey!

links_reviews_title: This light radiated off this dress!
links_reviews_text: The light indeed radiated from this dress. Perfect dress for a formal work affair, but a little tight around the back end. I will be keeping this one forever.
I'm normally a 6 but a 4 fit really well. However I might be sliming down. The dress twisted all day but it's still so beautiful
Love the dress the fit everything. Was able to wear a regular bra with it too by tying the bow a little tighter.

links_reviews_title: LOVE the color, fit, design, quality etc.
links_reviews_text: So pretty and flirty! Perfect for Valentines Day dinner (and wore it all day at work). Really brought out nice curves. A bit tight on arms for sure, but thats fine.
This dress is NOT for short girls. It looked like a full length formal on my 5'1" body. I hate that because it fit great otherwise.
Couldn't wear, was too big, size down
First well but unforgiving around the waist. Light fabric for a hot day.
Nice dress. Good fabric. Liked the color. A bit long for me at 5'6" and the 14 was too big. I usually wear a 12-14.

links_reviews_title: Runs really narrow unlike most DVF
links_reviews_text: Since I have some curves I usually love DVF and own a lot of the wrap dresses. This is more of a sheath dress and runs really narrow. It's cut straight from top to bottom. I am in between and 8/10 and the 10 fit but wasn't flattering at all. Bummer-it's a beautiful color and length.

links_reviews_title: Extremely small through the chest. I am a 32 DDD.
links_reviews_text: Tight in the chest, bra shows.
I loved the length and stretch of this dress but ultimately it was too form fitting to wear.

links_reviews_title: beautiful color - would recommend going up a size
links_reviews_text: definitely go up a size. it fit in general but was a bit tight around the torso which made it unflattering. its the sort of dress that would still look great if a bit loose, so dont hesitate to go up a size.

links_reviews_title: Super simple and easy great color
links_reviews_text: Easy fit the back is too low to wear with a bra which made it not a great fit for work events
The body was incredibly tight as were the shoulders. Did not wear.
Material too thin/flimsy for the cut

The fit was a bit tight through the bust - I should've gone with the 6R but didn't feel like returning it so the 4 works okay. The color is lovely tomato red and the fabric is just thick enough to provide a smooth finish
Too big in the top but fit in the hips. Went with another option
Beautiful

links_reviews_title: It was too tight and I never wore it.
links_reviews_text: It was too tight and I never wore it.
Can't recommend for curvy girls. Looks like a cute style, but it wouldn't go over my hips no matter what!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, great fabric, drapes well, and versatile.
links_reviews_text: I ultimately couldnt wear it because it runs small and Im usually a size 0 but returned in to get a 2.

Due to the stitching the placement of the hips looked a little off on me because I'm short and have a shorter torso. I think if they offered a petite, it would've fit perfectly. Honestly no one would notice what I noticed but just being honest. It was stunning and even thought the fabric is light, it hides any flaws and covers so nicely.

Great color and very flattering cut, but tight. I normally wear a 6/8 and the 8 was very tight. It looked good, but definitely not the looser fit you see on the model. May have fit more like that if I tried a 10. I'm 5'8" and thought the length was perfect hitting just below the knee.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear. Open back not work appropriate.
links_reviews_text: Didn't wear. Open back not work appropriate.

I have a few DVF pieces that i own and there are some of my favorite, but this one just didn't impress me. The color was beautiful but the cut and neckline was just blah - the back was cute but I have to wear jackets for my line of work, so noone would have seen that detail. Fair warning, nothing is hidden around the middle with this dress - it was fine for me but wanted others to know.
Wore for a holiday party! Probably would've sized up to be more comfortable but the size 2 fit well enough to wear for a night!
Simple yet perfect mini skirt. Kept its fit all day, definitely recommend renting. Follow me on IG for more reviews - dolceand_banana.

Overall, I would say this is true to size, although it was a little loose for me in the waist. I appreciated the solid construction and that the slit was sewn firmly down. It was an appropriate length for me as a short woman, but I can imagine it may be too short for taller women. Will definitely rent again, and may even buy!
Love this skirt, high waisted, so flattering. Wore out to dinner and to work. I want to buy it!
Fits great, looks good. No complaints and would wear again.

Wore this for work and also paired it with a graphic t to dress it down. High quality material that stayed in place, didn't ride up like some skirts do and was very flattering. Would buy this skirt for sure.
It's was cute but didn't end up wearing it

links_reviews_title: Cute with a blazer for work
links_reviews_text: The color of my skirt was a little bit faded and had seen some wear. But the fit was great- not too long or too short (I am 5'4"). You could take it from work to drinks easily. Slit in the front is really flattering in person.

Great length! Not too long or short. Made of a nice material. I love that I can dress this up for a night out or wear it with sweater and sneakers when I want to be more casual. I ended up buying this.
Fit really nicely, high end material, not too tight, thought about buying but unsure I want to spend the $ right now
Loved this skirt. I probably needed the size 2 but wasn't sure what to order. If you're between sizes, I'd say size down.
classic design and perfect fit. sits highly on the waist. not too tight through hips and butt area. perfect length for a conservative office environment.
This skirt ran a little tight and short for me. I'm usually a 2 or 4 in pants, and 2 in skirts, but this size 2 wasn't really appropriate for the event I had in mind.
This skirt fit perfectly and looked great with over the knee boots and a tucked blouse!
such a flattering fit. i love this skirt and wear it to work all the time -- also great for when you're feeling extra dressy on a regular day too ;)
Definitely runs big - too large around my waist. I am a 24 in jeans and 5’3. I wish this came in a 00!
Great quality and nice length - fit nicely through the hips. Ran slightly small/tight; I usually wear a 6 and was very glad I ordered the 8 per other reviews.
Very flattering, high-waisted. Ran a little large around my waist, but hugged in the right places. Was rather short on me (I'm 5'8) and would not recommend for work - more of a date piece.
Skirt is quality. Loved it. Wish I could afford to buy it!
Super cute skirt. Wore with strappy sandals to work and was a showstopper

I am a nurse so when I was looking for a new job this was perfect for me! My work clothes usually consists of just scrubs so I needed something that made me feel confident. I also wore this to church and out with some friends on a weekend. I considered buying it! Would definitely rent again.
Has great stretch to it and sits perfectly on the waist
This skirt is super cute and fit wonderfully! I wore it for work and it was very comfortable. Not too short and the shape is very flattering.
Longer than I thought, if it was not so tight I could wear it to work

links_reviews_title: Perfect! Fits amazingly well and great length.
links_reviews_text: This skirt is longer that it looks on the model, so still suitable(ish) for work and incredibly flattering on the legs so perfect for date night.

I rented for a bridal shower. This jumper was super cute and comfortable. I do have a long torso and usually have issues with one pieces riding up, but this one was actually just fine! Would definitely rent again.

links_reviews_title: Awesome jumpsuit But not great for tall girls
links_reviews_text: I am 5'8" and wear a 34" inseam. I wore flat sandals with the jumpsuit however, If you were any taller than myself I wanted to wear wedges or heels, it looked awkwardly short and the length. It was fun to wear until the outfit broke while at my best friends birthday party in Nashville. That's the only reason I gave it a three star rating. However rent the runway did an amazing job by crediting me back the rental price! Always above and beyond when it comes to customer service.

Ugh such a cute jumper and really soft material, but horribly weird fit. The torso was so short and gave me both a front and back wedgie 🤣 this may look cute on shorter or just generally smaller ladies, but did NOT on me.
Lightweight, dressy without being fussy, super comfortable and easy to get in and out of!

I rented a 6 thinking that since I'm tall I should size up for a romper, but that left me with an undefined waist line and gaps by chest. Cute print, nice length, adjustable straps, light material. Just get your regular size for a better result (obviously).
Loved this jumpsuit for vacation and got lots of compliments!! Fits true to size - don't need a bra either because back is extremely low!
Nice and long through the legs with a sexy low back. The relaxed design resulted in slipping shoulder straps but a great jump suit
Would rent again
I love how soft and comfortable this jumpsuit is!

links_reviews_title: A pretty, lightweight jumpsuit ideal for summer
links_reviews_text: The fabric is lightweight so ideal for a hot summer day in New York. The straps are adjustable which helps to customize the fit based on bust size and desired look. I wouldn’t say the fabric is premium so it is better suited for a casual/daytime or informal event.
Super cute and comfortable. Easy to outfit. I am 5'9 and 130 and the 2R fit perfectly.

This casual jumpsuit was easy to wear to brunch but I would not have worn it to a more formal event due to the material. No bra is needed with the tie and the straps are adjustable. Keeping a bit longer for another casual event.

links_reviews_title: Finally, a jumpsuit that isn't too long
links_reviews_text: I have a tough time with full-length jumpsuits because I am short at 5'3. But, this is one I could finally wear with flat sandals and not trip all over the place. Loved the soft material and the tie up front -no undergarments needed for this one!
Fun, flowly, & flirty. Fit well and it was super comfortable.
I really wanted the outfit to work but my chest could not fit well enough in the chest area. It was a disappointment because the style was super cute.

links_reviews_title: I rented for vacation but ended up just wearing to a late night movie.
links_reviews_text: Very light fabric. I liked the outfit but I had a problem with the fit of the bust. Better for those with smaller bust. The length was perfect on me though.
didn't fit my body right

links_reviews_title: Didn't love how it fit me!
links_reviews_text: I tried this on and it fit but was too long for me. The pattern is really cute and the fabric is definitely very soft and on the casual side. It may have worked with heels but wasn't for me!

links_reviews_title: The fabric was so soft and the print was adorable.
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately, the 2R was too big on me so I didn't end up wearing it. It was too large in the waist and leg - I typically have this problem because of how short I am, but I was swimming in this one.
A little long need to wear heels
Easy, breezy weekend or vacation outfit for warmer temps that's also easy to pair with a jean/leather jacket. If you're bustier, you'll need a bra.
Don't do it. The fit is terrible baggy too long thin fabric I'll fitting top.
Really cute but straps and top that ties gaps a lot on the sides. Made for tiny tiny boobs.

I'm 5'5" -- so not super tall but definitely not short. This fit everywhere but was so long on my legs that I could wear it. Why do clothing designers insist on making their goods only wearable by supermodels???
Wayyyy too long to wear out. Cute otherwise! Not good for petites!

Give this 2 stars for pattern, wide leg cut, and adjustable straps. Minus 3 for: The whole top portion was so awkward. You can kind of tell on the model that the top rides inward on her chest- which I guess on a normal person with over a large B cup means it will give you side boob (but up top where it's not as flattering). Straps are adjustable which is awesome and the middle tie is also adjustable but in the 5 minutes I had it on, it loosened up in the chest. I'm a size 6, but read another review for this designer that said she 8 was fine and this was only available in the 8- glad I sized up. This thin AF fabric shows EVERY curve from Shoulder to bottom of butt. Then your only possible saving grace is the wide leg (which is rad) but I'm 5'3" and could have worn it with flats so makes me concerned for taller babes. Pattern is cute but might look best on a boyish/less curvy middle frame. I think if looks good on your mid & lower section that you could probably adjust all the strappage at top to make it look chic! Happy adjusting
Fit beautifully. Brought it on a bachelerotte weekend and everyone was obsessed.
Very cute, but not for me. Fabric is breathable but I wanted something with a little more substance
Wore this dress to a wedding- I was actually about 10 weeks pregnant but not quite showing yet. Gorgeous color for summer. Paired it with fun colorful earrings

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a warm weather wedding
links_reviews_text: Beware: I had to order this dress three times before it came without black stains on the bottom. It was a perfect fit, though! Got tons of compliments.
Great dress! Comfy but pretty. Brand runs small

Rented this for vacation in Hawaii, and it was perfect. The color is bright and fun. The cute flounce on the bottom balances out an otherwise short hem. There isn't much stretch, so if you are between sizes, I'd probably size up.
Really thin material but loved it for sister graduation

links_reviews_title: this yellow color is like sunshine & was perfect for my sisters summer wedding rehearsal dinner.
links_reviews_text: I love this brand, but was nervous about the length and fit, however it turned out to be very true to size. This dress fits like a glove and definitely gives you a nice hug. it's appropriate length for. Formal event and although it's simple, pairs really nicely with colorful earrings! Highly recommend.

Got so many compliments on this dress, the only downfall for me is that the dress had a couple of dirty spots when I picked it up. I advised an associate at the store and she said there was nothing she could do since the event was the next day and she apologized. I still wore the dress because of the ruffled bottom, the spots were well hidden. Great dress overall!

links_reviews_title: Lots of compliments , sexy but tasteful. Felt like a knockout
links_reviews_text: For was great runs small so wore a size up. Straps were a little long so I had to pin them but otherwise great dress!! Great color really stood out

This dress was form fitting but still so elegant. I loved the dress so much I wish I owned it! Runs small however so definitely order a size up courtesy dress. The only complaint I have is that the lining at the bust of the dress kept unfolding and popping out of the top of the dress. I kept it in place with a little fashion tape.

links_reviews_title: Life should be lived in warm yellows, and this was the best yellow dress to wear to an elegant event
links_reviews_text: Fits like a glove, color was different and beautiful, tons of compliments I would def wear it again!
This dress runs small!! I had to go up a size and the size up was snug! Great material, straps were a bit long so had to pin those as well! Otherwise a great rent for a summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for an outdoor August wedding! I got so many compliments on this dress.
links_reviews_text: Comfortable, true to size, fun color
The dress is tight, which from the pictures I was expecting, it hugged my body nicely, but I did wear Spanks underneath because it was not very forgiving on the stomach, beautiful color!

The fit of this dress was so great. I easily fit into both the size 4 and 6 and chose the size 6 just because it was a little less snug but either would've worked. It was so comfortable and easy to wear. I got lots of compliments especially on the color. Very trendy and fun right now! Perfect dress for an outdoor summer wedding.

links_reviews_title: true to size and a fun summer wedding color !
links_reviews_text: Great fit and fun and flirty design! Many compliments !

I wore this dress for a Bridal Luncheon. As other reviewers commented, the straps are long. I found a way to pin them discreetly so they didn't fall off. I normally wear a size 8 in pants and dresses and this size 10 fit perfectly. My stomach is not the flattest but with a spanx-esque slip underneath, I felt really good. I also appreciate that the material is on the thicker side which makes it more forgiving! I felt it did show any type of undergarments so found the slip necessary.

I am typically a 00, so I was nervous to order dresses since they all start at 0. The main concern was the bust, which ended up being ok minus that the straps fell a few times, but the dress was able to stay up fine all night.
Loved this dress, but the straps were unbelievably long!! I couldn't wear it.

links_reviews_title: Fabulous color for a spring wedding!
links_reviews_text: As many reviews said, it has long straps. I had to use safety pins to shorten the straps -- this worked super well. I usually wear a size 6, but wore my back up size 8. I would say this dress runs small! I have an athletic body type, I am 5'8", 135 lbs, and a 34C.
I wish I owned this dress because it fit wonderfully. The only issue I had was that the fabric in the top portion of the dress kept flipping up. Other than that, it fit perfectly.
This dress is amazing! I loved everything about it. The size, the material and let me talk about being the talk of the table!! Everyone loved this dress!

Overall I liked this dress but aspects of it almost made me not wear it. The straps are too long so I had to wear it very low so they didn't keep falling down. There was a small bump at my butt where the zipper ended but I think only I noticed it. I did receive compliments all night but I liked this one better online than when I received it.

links_reviews_title: Super sexy but large up top
links_reviews_text: Dress is super cute and fit relatively well! It was a little tight through hip/thigh area so if you're a bit larger down there I would size up. Straps were long, I didn't quite fill out the top but I pinned them down for the event. It was one of those dresses that was perfect for RTR. Wouldn't want to keep it but worked great for the event.

links_reviews_title: Felt like a spicy piece of sunshine
links_reviews_text: Got two sizes the 12 and 14, went with the 12 because the 14 was pretty spacious in the boob department. I usually steer away from form fitting dresses but this one was way too pretty to say no. I loved the yellow color, and received quite a few compliments which always makes a girl feel nice. I'm 5"11 and the dress was the perfect length! Love and would totes rent again.

links_reviews_title: Color is perfect for a summer wedding
links_reviews_text: Loved this yellow color and got a lot of compliments. It runs right, I ended up going with my bigger size option. Received tons of compliments and was comfortable the entire evening. My only complaint is the straps: they are a tad too long and slipped down a lot which got annoying. Other than that it's a great dress!
Best color ever!

links_reviews_title: The color of this dress was perfect for a spring wedding. I got tons of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress fit like a glove. I'm 5'0", 125lbs, ~36D right now without a flat stomach and this dress still looked amazing on me. The straps were INCREDIBLY long though -- we had to temporarily stitch them for the event. I wish I could buy it and wear it again and again. Definitely ran small though. I usually order a 4 and 6 but decided to order the 6 and 8 instead. I'm glad I did.
Felt so great in this dress! I rented a 4 and a 6 - the 4 fit better up top but I opted for the 6 so I could enjoy some food. Lots of compliments on the dress all night long.

links_reviews_title: this dress was absolutely stunning and nothing like i have ever seen before !!
links_reviews_text: wore this dress to my high school graduation and it was absolutely stunning the color was so vibrant and the dress fit perfect i am so happy with my order! this was my first time renting something from RTR and i am so impressed!! the only annoying thing about this dress was the straps and the top of the dress. there is a little flap of fabric that fold into the inside of the dress and it came out a lot but nothing a little fashion tape wouldn't fix! the straps were a tad long but it was okay!

One of my favorites!! I've rented several RTR dresses and this one was a simple and elegant show stopper. The fit was phenomenal, hugged every curve, showed the right amount of décolletage, right length (good for petite girls) not too long, not too short. I wore turquoise earrings and nude heels. The straps were a little long, but nothing a rubber band and safety pin can't fix. Felt classy and eye catching.
This dress fit like a glove! I got many compliments on it and I felt very comfortable in it. You can't wear a bra with it but I did wear sticky boobs which worked out fine.

links_reviews_title: This dress is made very well!! And feels so well!!
links_reviews_text: I am 165 lbs and 5’7’’. I carry my weight in my gut (yay beer) I have a pretty square bodyt, but I feel like this gave me a waist and def showed off the booty in a good way! (My butt is small and usually unnoticed but husband loved it in this) Anyway, I LOVED this dress. I never wear form fitting/tight things bc it don’t feel comfortable, but I felt great wearing this! The straps were slightly long but it doesn’t really matter bc the dress does require them to hold it up. It’s the perfect balance of sexy and flirty. The yellow is bright but not at all obnoxious bright. I got SO many compliments wearing this and would wear it again in a second!
The only con of this dress is that it bunches up every time you sit
Was flirty and fun, got lots of compliments. The straps were a tiny bit long but not too bad on my body type.

links_reviews_title: Fun, flirty, and definitely a stand out dress!
links_reviews_text: The back of the dress above my butt had a little extra fabric so would stick out slightly but only I noticed. I loved the spaghetti straps and the vibrant color. It was a slimming fit for sure and with the flair at the bottom, it made it look like I actually had a booty! I ended up on the cover of the online local newspaper, so I give credit to this dress!

Absolutely loved this dress. I wore it for my graduation party and received compliments all day. Runs a little small, couldn't fit into the 2. The 4 was snug but fit my body perfectly. I'm 5'7" and weigh 135 lbs.

links_reviews_title: Great spring wedding for a yellow dress.
links_reviews_text: Cute dress! Tighter fitting and pretty much true to size. I did not fill out the top and I am a size C so it was a little loose.

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous color and super fun fit
links_reviews_text: Color was really nice for outdoor wedding - straps are super thin though
I loved the color and the fit of this dress. It hugged all of my curves, but was comfortable enough to dance the night away! Wish I owned this dress!

It was very tight. Fit like a glove and ran. About small, but that’s kind of what I was going for. I got a ton of complements though, and overall I loved it. The straps are a bit long and aren’t adjustable so keep that in mind.

links_reviews_title: NYE sparkles, size down for a fitted look!
links_reviews_text: I'm a size 6 but so glad I sized down to the 4. It fit perfectly! It has a sparkle flair, the material is thin but comfy and flattering. I did wear shape-wear underneath and boob tape. I'm also wearing a small black 3/4ths sleeve shawl (pictured) since it was 55 degrees here in Austin, Texas on NYE.
Great stretchy fit, I could've probably sized down but this still fits perfect! Can't decide if I'm wearing it for New Years or Christmas Eve.

links_reviews_title: Very comfy and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: I took a chance on this, as it had no prior reviews. It was beautiful! Its a stretchy material so you can size down. It was the perfect length for small to medium height heels (im 5'5). I got a ton of compliments! Perfect fall outfit
slight cameltoe
Cutest and most comfortable romper. I went a size up just so I had some room and it was perfect.

links_reviews_title: I love love love it! Stretchy fabric so true to size. I am 125lb 5'6 wore a 2R comfortably.
links_reviews_text: I love love love it! Stretchy fabric so true to size. I am 125lb 5'6 wore a 2R comfortably. Recommend 1000%
Super cute, comfortable, yet glamourous and sparkly!

Wore this to a work party and it was a hit. I'm 5'4 and worried it would be too long, but with 2 inch booties it was a great length. Only thing missing from this is adjustable straps - would've made it perfect.
flattering, fit my long torso. Usually a 2-4 and the 2R fit perfectly

links_reviews_title: Perfect dress for a sunny day
links_reviews_text: XS was too small to button, S was the perfect fit. A great forgiving dress in the midsection while perfect at chest and overall length. Wish the buttons were a tad bigger or the hole a tad smaller, had to keep checking buttons throughout the day as they would come undone. Wanted to wear so much in the summer, bought it!

5'3", 32DD, 25in waist, 37in hips, usually size 0. I rented the XS and although it was pulling at the buttons around my chest (wore a lightly padded strapless bra), it was still comfortable and SO cute.
Loved it!

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress the night my boyfriend proposed to me. Unforgettable!
links_reviews_text: A little big in the chest, but otherwise so adorable. So glad I wore this on a night I'll never forget.
I absolutely love his dress! I have not had a chance to wear it out yet, so I'm holding on to it for a bit. Perfect fit!
Was so excited to wear this dress. Received so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Super cute but ran large in my opinion
links_reviews_text: I am between a small and medium, usually more toward a medium these days. Other reviewers said the dress ran small so I got the medium to be safe. It was way too big for me and I was only able to wear it by using two safety pins to bring it in in the back. Because it was so big it wasn't super flattering on me but I wore it anyway because I loved it so much. I will probably rent again in a small. For reference I am 5'1, 131 pounds, dress size small/medium, 34d, approximately 30 1/2 inches around my waist measuring across my belly button and definitely needed a small in this dress.

I typically wear a medium or a small in dresses. After reading the reviews saying the dress runs small, I ordered a medium and a large for backup. I tried on the medium and it was so baggy and stretched out I thought the large would never fit. I put the large on and it was actually more fitting and tighter than the medium. Ended up wearing the large. Very cute dress, a little snug on the legs when sitting down.

links_reviews_title: Absolutely LOVE this dress. So cute and chic. Rented this for a bridal shower and it was perfect.
links_reviews_text: This dress is so cute and the fit is perfect. Would totally re-rent this dress. Fabric is super light weight, perfect for hot days.

After reading all the reviews of this I decided to size up because I was nervous about it fitting my bust. Although the M fit perfectly, the elastic at the top stretched throughout the day and I was constantly pulling it up a few hours in. Very cute but plan accordingly!

links_reviews_title: In my opinion this runs very small ....
links_reviews_text: I ordered this on a whim on two reviews that said fit true to size - well I'm always a 4/6 and can wear Smalls and mediums with that sizing so I chose the medium as I only get one size erring on the side of caution, well when I just looked at this dress out of the bag I thought I ordered wrong and got the small and I definitely thought that as I tried to try it on. I am not a big person so I don't know if I got a bad batch but this is very tight on me and I don't think I can button the bottom two buttons and sit down anywhere.... I tried to show a pic of how tight the bust is as well and I'm only a 34b sometimes a C if I've eaten good recently. But seriously this is small and the buttons pull across the tight areas. I've literally never worn a large in anything but also never rented this designer. I'm about 128 pounds and 5'4" about 27 inch waist and 36 inch hips. This dress is adorable. But I wish it fit a little better for me to feel comfortable wearing it. I would have returned it for a different size but I was late trying my items on. The material is a light cotton which would be nice for warm weather and the sleeves are super cute but the buttons are small and like slippery I had a very difficult time getting it on, but that may be cause it's too small as well. I saw another review that agrees this runs small but then someone wore a medium that's 155 and 5'8" with huge breasts so I just don't know what to say other than good luck because the dress is super cute.
Perfect and true to size!

I love this trendy dress by J.O.A! Running true to size with no stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and roomie at the hips. It works for all cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear nubra or no bra since there is an open back. At 5’3”, the length hit mid-thigh on me. Beautiful yellow dress. You can dress it up or down!

links_reviews_title: Walked up and down the Clearwater beach!
links_reviews_text: Fit just perfect for me! Being that I am small chested. It's such a beautiful and fun dress just for a weekend getaway.

links_reviews_title: I picked this dress for a casual night out, and while it didn't fit, it was definitely cute!
links_reviews_text: I usually fit a medium, but the sizing for this dress definitely runs small. The material was nice, but the full outfit doesn't have much give.
Runs big since it's a strapless dress it needs to fit snug and it doesn't
super cute dress and great material but was too big for me

links_reviews_title: Wore this to an afternoon summer wedding. The style was perfect.
links_reviews_text: The dress itself was so cute and would have been extremely flattering but ran a little big on me.
Super cute dress but the sleeves hung weird. It was also just a tad too baggy

I am a pretty true medium. I am 27 in waist 37.5 inch hip 34 C bust. This is just too small. it was skin tight. and the buttons on the bottom would not stay closed. definitely meant for a think and short girl. cute print though!
Too big

links_reviews_title: Cute dress but not for busty girls
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'7 and busty so the ribcage and bust area the buttons wouldn't close...it fit perfectly over my thighs and booty so I was disappointed that it didn't work but if you are chesty this dress isn't for you.

links_reviews_title: Not for women with a larger bust
links_reviews_text: It looks very pretty in person, but the width of a large is too small. I could not get it over my boobs and I was afraid it would rip. If you have bigger boobs do not rent this dress.

I had the opposite experience of the other reviewer (so far). I am 5'8, 155 and 34DDD. When I put it on and started to button, I was thinking there was no way my massive chest was going to fit. But as I kept doing each button it closed beautifully. The medium was also bigger around the waist which is offset or not as noticeable because of the puffy sleeves. And there are pockets. This makes it a great dress for me to wear to vacation because I'll be able to eat in it. I think it's not as cute on the model because she has no hips which makes it look boxier than it is. But yes it doesn't sit flat at stomach area. Overall I would recommend this dress for sure. I am not sure if I would size up to the large. Sometimes the sizes aren't that different and a large might have fit me better or the large stomach area would have been entirely to big at that point. Can't wait to wear this on vacay!!!
Has Pockets!
Super cute but runs quite small!

I really wanted this to fit me because I was so excited for this dress. If you're busty, this dress is going to be wayyy too small for you-especially if you're anything more than a B/C cup. I ordered the large as I'm usually a size 8-10 and as soon as I saw it I knew there was no way it was going to fit me. I didn't bother putting it on all the way because I was scared it would damage.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: Great dress! 'Wore a stick-on bra which worked fabulous. Both the 4 and 2 fit but the 2 was a bit tighter so I wore that. Wish I had gotten a long (I'm just shy of 5'9") but wore 2" heels so it was fine... I danced a lot so you really couldn't tell it was a wee bit short! I wore it to a black tie optional wedding. Would wear again! I received a bunch of compliments too!
The dress fit true to size and was very flattering. The dress stayed up and didn't shift or fall. Perfect length with heels and I am 5'5. I would rent this dress again

The fit was great and had some give to it. I have wider shoulders and wear a size c cup, and the top portion of the dress had to be adjusted as it pulled and bunched toward the center of my decollete. I chose the long because regular was not available, and with 4 inch heels, it was just perfect enough to feel confident walking in it. The sheer panels were classy. The drawback on this dress for me was that it did not show well in pictures, but I got a lot of compliments and the dress paired with a Mae West necklace made me feel like a star.

links_reviews_title: Classy and elegant with a little sass!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for a formal awards show. It was comfortable to sit in for the 3 hour event and was comfortable for eating dinner as well. I wore an 8R and it fit all the curves. Im 5'7", 155lbs. Measurements are 41 hip, 29 waist, 34 bust. I wore flats with the dress which brought it just to the ground for me.

Perfect fit! Rented the 2 with a 4 as a back up but didn't even try the 4 on as the 2 fit like a glove. SO COMFORTABLE! Wore with higher rising Spanx, so the sheer panels didn't show any skin. Thankfully not noticeable because they were black, and the drape helped disguise some parts. No bra needed for me, but a larger bust might want to wear one. The regular length was perfect with a shorter heel - the dress reached the ground but I didn't worry about it dragging or getting caught in my shoes all night. Endless compliments all night, and I felt so sexy while still being covered for a family wedding!
Easy to wear and comfortable. As other reviewers mentioned you really can wear it without a bra because of how the overlay fits.

links_reviews_title: Loved it, one of a kind, just the perfect comfortable fit and yet so elegant!

links_reviews_text: This is one of my very favorite dresses that I've rented from RTR thus far! Very comfortable, and received several compliments while wearing this one.

Super cute popover detail, made the dress unique. Did receive a few compliments. Just wasn't a "wow" dress to me. Wore my normal size 8. Was kind of tight around the armpits but nothing that bothered me all night. Wore to a charity gala.

I'm just over six feet tall and the bottom skimmed the floor with flats. Fit is also great, body conscious but not restrictive and definitely true to size. Top overlay is the perfect detail to make this dress not like every other basic black dress. Would definitely rent again!

Super cute and incredibly flattering. It was comfortable to walk, sit, and dance in. It had a slight stretch that didn't make me feel uncomfortable. I was paranoid all night that my shapewear panties were going to show because of the sheer panels in the back. No one said anything so I might have been successful? I loved the neckline and the shoulders. I would definitely rent this dress again in a heartbeat!
Highly recommend. Very flattering and super comfortable. There was actually someone at the wedding who rented the same dress but different body type and also looked great in it!

This dress was so beautiful & elegant for a black tie wedding. Thankfully I didn't need a bra but if I had a larger bust I'm not sure how I would have pulled it off with the open back. The dress was long on me, which almost never happens because I'm 5'9", but didn't impede my dancing at all! Would definitely recommend!

The dress was comfortable and I was pleased the 4L fit as I was concerned about tightness in the midsection. I am small chested and did not fully fill out the top but did not matter with the overlay. This is was one of my top rentals! I am almost 5'8 and wore a 3 inch heel, length was perfect.

I wore this to a formal wedding in Atlanta in June. It was 80 degrees and I stayed cool since it has an open back and is not very heavy. I usually wear a size 10, but I sized up because the hips were snug. I also have a large chest and did not have to wear a bra because of the wavy overlay hiding some of the curves. It was PERFECT! The open back got a lot of compliments. I would also wear a long dangle earring with it.
True to size. Received lots of compliments. The overlay too adds a little to the classic black dress. Would wear again!
Beautiful shape and love the back!
True to size I'm 5'8", ~ 150 lbs and both the 6 and the 8 would have worked. The size was just tighter around my hips/butt. Very flattering cut

links_reviews_title: Nice dress! Formal, form fitting, and flattering.
links_reviews_text: The dress was a little short. I am 5'7" and had to buy a pair of flat sandals to wear, because with heels it would not reach the floor. It's also quite fitted through the tummy and hip area (as intended), so I wore some Spanx to keep everything smooth and pretty.

I loved this dress & would definitely wear it again. It is a bit on the long side - but with ~3-4" heels it barely kissed the ground. The detail in the top portion doesn't come through well in photos - but in person, its adorable. I got tons of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Unique take on the classic blank gown
links_reviews_text: Fit was perfect and I got a lot of compliments about this elegant but funky dress. It was the right combo of classy for a work event while still having an open back with some sheer sections. The only thing I didn't love was how the back flaps are just loose at the bottom. It was sort of like a cape. Was fun to wear once!

links_reviews_title: Classic Black dress with a twist!!!
links_reviews_text: I ordered 2 dresses and chose this one for a work awards dinner. This is dress is absolutely stunning. You will be the best dressed woman in the room! Fits true to size. The length was perfect with 3 inch heels.
I loved the fit of this dress. It was flattering and hid my tummy. I got lots of compliments. Beautiful

Loved this dress!!!! Only complaint was that it is extremely long! I'm 5'5 and had on 3 inch heels and still had to constantly hold the dress up. Other than that all was well! Would definitely rent again!

This dress fit like a dream and was so comfortable to wear to a black tie wedding. I wasn't sure what size so I ordered the 6R and 8R and went with the 8R. The 6R fit, but it was a little tight on my hips & stomach and I didn't want to feel self conscious since I knew I'd be eating a delicious meal at the wedding. It was long for my 5'4" frame and fit perfectly with 4" heels. It was glamorous and tasteful with a hint of sexy (thanks to the sheer back). Would definitely rent again!
Very comfortable, a little long for my height, so I think the petite size would’ve worked better but wasn’t available. Loved the lace overlay which was both fun and flattering. Overall great dress!

links_reviews_title: Amazing material and was very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I wear between a 0-4 and the 2R fit perfectly!
This was my first time renting. The dress was perfect.

Wore this to a Black Tie optional wedding. It was perfect and ran true to size. I ordered the OR and 2R. I wore the 2R because it was a bit tight around the hips in the 0R and 2R was more comfortable. The length was perfect for 3 inch heels. The bottom didn't drag on the floor. My husband loves it.

links_reviews_title: I loved everything about this dress ! It went perfect for the evening and was very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: It was very true to size .

links_reviews_title: This was a back-up to my back-up dress!
links_reviews_text: First off, RTR are rock stars in my opinion! I ordered two dresses from RTR for a mardi gras ball. Both ended up being too short - like way short. I called RTR with only 3 days before the event and was told "we are going to make you happy!" That day, I was shipped over-night two additional dresses. I ended up wearing this one only because the other back-up was way too big. It's a basic black dress, that I wanted to avoid as I was in a sea of black dresses, but my husband loved it and I received numerous compliments. The back is the sexiest part and to me made the whole dress an A+ as far as black dresses go.

Beautiful, beautiful dress! I ordered the 10R and it was big on me but then again I did loose 10ish lbs since ordering it. But the dress still fit great!!! I probably should have ordered an 8 but that’s my mistake. The top detailing is beautiful and the dress is very slimming! I could even wear a strapless bra with this dress! Would definitely wear again!!!

This dress fit like a glove. I usually wear a size 0 but it was unavailable so i went with the 2L. I'm 5'8 and wore heels so the dress skimmed the ground barely and didn't drag on it. I felt very elegant at a black tie wedding. The dress itself was easy to zip up in the back but the button closure for the mesh overlay was a bit difficult to get by myself. Maybe have someone help you to get it done quicker. But definitely not a con. I wore this dress for 12 hours and was comfortable the entire time. Would definitely rent it again.

links_reviews_title: basic black dress with a tony bit of flair
links_reviews_text: Flattering and a nice, comfortable fit. I didn't end up wearing it since I had a better alternative from RtR for the wedding, but it was my runner up. There is actually a bit of mesh on the waist which adds a bit of sexy. The only weird thing about the fit is getting the neck/collar part to lay flat at the top. I would have been fidgeting with it most likely.

Pretty dress I wore to the Governors Inauguration Ball. Very classic and form fitting, it definitely shows all your curves - the overlay is a nice difference along with the back detail. I would rent this dress again.
The dress fits like a glove. The fabric is somewhat heavy but very comfortable and easy to move around in! I wore it to a black tie wedding.

Unique and modern black dress. Super comfortable and very flattering. Substantial weight to the sheath portion of the dress. Only con is the collar buckles slightly... wish it laid down flatter. All in all a great dress perfect for a black tie wedding.

links_reviews_title: Wore this dress to a beautiful fall wedding in Palm Springs!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress for a formal wedding I attended! It was comfortable, flattering, and i got many compliments. I had a great time dancing and the length was perfect for me to wear flat sandals and not trip (rare for me due to my height). I usually oscillate between a 6 and an 8, and I wore the 6 for this affair (more fitted, the 8 would have been a little loose). Would highly recommend this dress to anyone.

I loved this dress. Good length for three inch heels. Very comfortable to move and dance in. Only note is you can not wear a regular bra with this dress or it will show through the sides. I was able to get away with a backless bra. Highly recommend if you are looking for a formal black dress with a little flair!

The dress was form fitting in all the right places and was long enough to wear 3 inch heels. I would have normally ordered a 2 but RTR was out, so I went with the 4L and it still looked amazing. There was no weird bulging spots in the back or sides either. Like I said... fit like a glove. Highly recommend! Wore a dangle earrings and a cusp bracelet for accessories.

I wore this to a charity event and I felt amazing. I got many compliments especially about the colour. It was on the long side to be a tea length dress because I am only 5ft 3 but it was still elegant.
Loved it!

I rented this along with a couple other dresses for an early fall wedding. I didn't end up wearing this one-- the bust was a little too big, and I thought it sat a little far down on my chest. It also hit right at the top of my feet, so didn't have the cute tea/ankle length on the model. It's a beautiful pattern and beautifully made-- would be great on a taller woman. I recommend sizing down if you're between sizes.

links_reviews_title: This dress was a knockout! Comfortable and memorable without being overpowering.
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size.

This dress was AMAZING! Compliments all night long and after. For an afternoon outdoor wedding this was a perfect dress. I am a true size 4 but have a large chest for my size and have difficulty with strapless dresses (too small on top). This fit perfect - maybe even a little extra room. I felt beautiful all night - perfect combo of fun and classy. Would rent again.
Showstopper dress perfect for summer.

links_reviews_title: The color, the detail in the fabric is exquisite
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly although I ordered one size down knowing that Marchesa runs larger than true size typically- and it fit like a glove. No slippage at the breasts. Did run longer than expected- a little longer than tea length so anyone under 5'6 might want to reconsider unless you want it to go to the floor.

Beautifully made dress! Got compliments all night and the next day. Paired with some Alexis Bittar green and blue earrings. Has pockets and ribbon is more purple in person than red as it appears in the model photo. However, it is large in the chest area (34C). I'm normally a 4-6, rented the 6 first but it was way too big. The 4 worked great and wore a padded strapless bra to fill it out.
Too big

links_reviews_title: My event is in 72 hours... just tried it on.
links_reviews_text: Tried it on. Didn't fit as I'd hope. My event is in 72 hours It looked better online and I don't see myself wearing it. Its looks cheap. Online it looks like cotton or linen.
The photos make it seem like a cute brunch dress, but it's really long, heavy, layered, and fancy. Probably great for a daytime wedding, but not for everyday.
the dress just fell off me. too bad. it's really pretty.
Loved that it has pockets

links_reviews_title: Chest was wayyy too big but dress is gorgeous
links_reviews_text: I love this dress, it is gorgeous and high quality, but unwearable. I'm a 34C/D and I felt like it was designed for a FF. If somebody were standing over me they could have seen everything. Wish I'd gotten a 6 or smaller.

links_reviews_title: I felt like a 1950's housewife, a pregnant housewife.
links_reviews_text: This dress looks so fun and summery, I thought it would be perfect for a fancy wedding shower...NO, just NO. The amount of material is dramatic, the material is shiny, polyester shiny,and VERY stiff, so no draping at all. The next layer is an actual scratchy net, old fashioned "crinoline" that makes the dress pouf way out,and made me look like a 56 yr old pregnant woman. Then there is a slip layer that is of way too tight polyester. I could not get it off fast enough. I had such high hopes for this frock, maybe someone else will have a better experience, I will watch for positive reviews.

links_reviews_title: Great summer wedding dress. The zipper is a bitch.
links_reviews_text: Tight fit on top. Didn't wear bra. Loved the pockets. You will need an extra pair or hands or two to zip up the dress because the zipper is hard to get over the ribbon part. Great color and slight sheen. One of my favorite silhouettes.

The dress is very well made and a unique color and pattern. The fabric is thick and the skirt is fuller than it appears in the photos. I did not end up wearing it simply because it felt too formal for my event. It would be great for a summer wedding!

I was drawn to the classic style and fun but natural yellow. In person the yellow is much closer to Belle in beauty and the beast and very shiny. In terms of fit the skirt was very large while the bust was very narrow.
Loved the shape of this dress and flow. Was slightly loose in the chest but not too horrible. I would purchase this dress
This has a really flattering fit and I loved that the fabric didn't really wrinkle at all. I wore to work with cardigan.

I loved this dress! So comfortable. I had rented it for a work conference but the straps were too loose and ended up showing a bit more cleavage than appropriate. So I saved it for an evening out for dinner.

links_reviews_title: So adorable that I had to keep it!
links_reviews_text: This dress is sooooo adorable. I wore it to work, but you can totally dress it up or down. I'm planning to put on tennis shoes and wear it to Disneyland soon. It's versatile. The dress has an amazing retro vibe. The skirt is so fun and has POCKETS! Ya! The top is a little loose and hangs low. Now that I own it I intend to have the straps shortened and I think that will solve it. Add this to your must rent/own list.
Perfect fit for my Venice vacation!

This dress is so versatile! I wore to work one day with wedges and to a concert the next with flip flops. Got so many compliments from perfect strangers! Really great dress and constructed well...I'm still considering buying it!

links_reviews_title: PERFECT SUMMER DRESS FOR ANY OCCASION OR NO OCCASION!
links_reviews_text: Loved this one! Wore it multiple times, got a ton of compliments everywhere I went. Sizing: Runs large - I am a dress size 6, wore a 2 in this and it was a perfect fit. I read the reviews and compared my size/weight to those who had reviewed (thanks ladies!) and determined 2 would probably be my best bet. I am not very busty, if you are, may need to go up a size. Highlights: POCKETS! The hip pockets were so roomy, my friend was joking they were like a clown car cos I just kept pulling more stuff out of them! I could actually get cell phone in one (though have to be careful when you sit it might pop out) keys, lip gloss and credit cards in the other for shopping. With the skirt being so full it didn't look too bulky with all of the items I had squirreled away. The buttons on front are decorative so no gaping - yay! It was a little low cut, but I just used my lowest cut standard bra. I didn't have trouble with straps falling down except when I sat in the car so no biggie. Fully lined and I did not find it too hot here in SW Florida on record setting hot days. Anyhoo, this one was a hit, I may have to buy it as I think it is just a summer classic.
Wore this a few times, very cute and comfortable but wish I had gotten a size down to be a little more form fitting.
Wore this for my birthday in June. We went wine and beer tasting all around Northern California wine country. This is a wonderful dress for ladies with a large bottom and narrow waist.

links_reviews_title: This dress was so comfortable and flattering.
links_reviews_text: I wore this for a brunch one Sunday! It is so comfortable and flattering. Love the pockets. Straps slipped down a lot and the chest area was a little big. Possibly consider sizing down if you are smaller chested.

The dress is a little more low cut than I like, but I added a layered necklace that hid it. Definitely cute and Dress with beautiful movement that can be dressed down with converses or dressed up with a wedge. It was a back up for a dress that didn't fit.
Great for picnic, Memorial Day type of event. Comfortable and flattering. Nice length. Was a bit loose so I wore a cami underneath the top and added a belt. Nicely lined.

This is the perfect summer dress. I bought it as soon as I tried it on! I've never gotten more compliments on an outfit, ever. The skirt is full and lovely and keeps you covered if you're a klutz like me and tend to trip and/or fall. It's a beautiful blue and SO comfortable.
Fitted, flattering, and fun! The pockets just make it that much more awesome. The only drawback is it's missing bra guides. I had to pin them to keep them from showing. Really liked this one!

links_reviews_title: Loved the gingham but runs large
links_reviews_text: I was disappointed that this ran large. Small cheat didn't fill it out and it was definitely too big around my waist. But I loved the v neck and large skirt with pockets!
Definitely runs bigger, I could have used a smaller size but wore anyways. Got lots of compliments, was great for a very hot summer day
This is a very cute dress. It's so wide though. Definitely needed to belt. If you have a large chest it'll be a little but risky. That being said, SOOO CUTE and tons of compliments.

Wore this for a bridal shower and felt very cute. 50s style with the full shirt which was fun as I don't usually go for that style. It's decently low cut so that kept it modern. Very on trend pattern. I'd say I'm usually more of a 4 in everything and this 2 had a bit of room around my waist but made it comfortable when sitting. Order size down for backup.
Was too big for me to wear without putting a sweater underneath, nice and thick fabric

I can usually wear a 4 or 6, but this 4 was too big for me. It wasn't enough of a big deal to get the 2 sent to me, and as you can see, I wore a jacket. I would get your regular size, then size down. I got tons of compliments on this RTR dress, as per usual when I wear Rent the Runway. Be careful though, as this dress comes down low and calls for some cleavage. It's s lovely spring dress!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for any pear shaped gals out there!
links_reviews_text: This was a lovely fit. I'm 5'9" and the waist was a teeny bit too high for me, but I loved the fitted top and flair at the bottom. Super flattering
Too tight in the rib cage. Could not zip. Nice dress! Flattering cut.

I usually wear size 0 which is what I rented. I am also small in the bust. But this ran very big and the waist was also very loose. I would recommend sizing down. If you are petite and size 0 like me, this probably is not going to fit as it will be big.
It was a little big, but comfortable. I loved the pockets and shape was flattering.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress for a backyard wedding!
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect for the late morning backyard wedding brunch that I attended. Standing up it looked perfect, but sitting down the neckline was a bit loose. I think if you're very busty or taller than me it would fit beautifully, but I was worried about exposing my brassiere and probably should've done some safety pinning. I loved the full skirt and it is nicely lined so it felt almost like a crinoline. Always thrilled to have pockets, too!

links_reviews_title: Nice dress, just a bit too low cut for me.
links_reviews_text: Dress was made of nice material, soft, and cute pattern. If you have more of a bust, size up. It exposes a lot of chest or has the potential to, especially if you're carrying a handbag.
Dress was very cute on but runs large, wasn't able to wear because it runs so big on the top of the dress. Could have been great in the right size.
I was swimming in this. Sizing down may not have helped. But cute dress.

i'm typically a small/size 2, but the 0 has plenty of room to spare, esp around the chest, which was also a touch low. it was almost indecent. fitted through the waist, but def runs large. love the pockets. overall cute dress.

links_reviews_title: This designer usually runs small expect for this dress. I should of ordered a size 0
links_reviews_text: Fun dress lots of complements.

The fit ran larger than I normally wear. I usually get the next size up just in case and for this one it ran larger. It was great for a summer wedding and lots of compliments on the dress. Would get this dress again for another less formal event.

links_reviews_title: Runs large and is low cut
links_reviews_text: Cute dress, probably better for weekends than work. I wore a cami underneath to make it work appropriate and wore it on a casual summer Friday. Definitely runs large, I'm typically a 6/8 and the 4 fit with a little room to spare.

This was the perfect dress. It for like a glove, no weirdness anywhere, the material was great quality and I got tons of compliments. However, ended up wearing BOTH a camisole and a summer scarf to cover the cleavage at work - if you are mildly busty (or more than mildly, as I am), this dress is extremely revealing in the chest.

This is a gorgeous dress - the fabric, weight and cut of the skirt are spectacular. As a short person I struggle with garments this length, but this one was amazing! The top of the dress is another story. It's super cute, but as others have said, this dress runs super large in the top. It definitely had extra room on me. I wore it over a white button down and pinned the dress' straps to my shirt so they'd stay put (it was too big otherwise, and I was wearing it to work so didn't want it to be too revealing). I loved the way it felt, but wouldn't buy it bc of the sizing issues. The waist fit me perfectly, but I have a slightly larger waist compared to the rest of my body, so others will likely find it large in the waist as well.

links_reviews_title: looked great , fun fit and pockets
links_reviews_text: adorable
I didn't end up wearing this. There's a lot of skirt here, and it seemed to make the gingham print feel even younger, like a child's party dress.
This is a cute dress. Nicely made. Didn't wear because was a bit tight in the bust, and very low cut....did not expect that.

links_reviews_title: Easy to wear casual dress for everyday
links_reviews_text: I found the dress to be a bit tight in the rib cage.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress with old school flare
links_reviews_text: Had a retro vibe. Very cute pattern. I'm large busted and still felt the top was large in the sense I wanted to adjust the straps so I wasn't hanging out. Overall, very cute dress
for sure size down. this was at least two sizes to big for me. had to send back without wearing. will certainly rent again in a different size though. was very cute and had pockets!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an outdoor wedding! Flattering and so comfortable.

links_reviews_text: This dress was a perfect fit! And made me not only feel comfortable but sexy too. Would definitely recommend
A beautiful wrap dress that is incredibly flattering and easy to walk in. No embarrassing wrap dress drama at the chest or having it fall away/part at the legs. Loved it so much, I bought it!

This dress made me feel so gorgeous and glamorous while I was 6 months pregnant. The fabric is great, and I was able to dance in it! I got tons of compliments. I LOVED wearing this dress, very flattering!
Loved this wrap dress! Comfortable and was formal enough to wear to a rehearsal dinner. I'm a 34C and didn't need to wear a bra.

I was right in between the XS and SR and could have gone either way. I went with the SR because it gave a little more length in the straps. The dress was super comfortable and so flattering because of the wrap. I did not wear a bra with it because I have a small bust, so I definitely appreciated the button close on the chest to prevent a wardrobe malfunction! Wish I could keep this one!

I wore this for grad school graduation and loved it. The medium was surprisingly a bit baggy and I ended up needing to pull up my dress often to make sure I wasn't exposing too much. Other than that it was perfect!

Wore this to a rehearsal brunch and it was a hit. Fits true to size/slightly large. I usually wear a small or a medium and the small fit great. Has a great little snap closure in the bust area to avoid over exposure. Also able to wear a bra comfortably without concerns of showing the straps which was a huge plus. This dress can be dressed up or down depending on the occasion. Very versatile! Will def rent again!
I wore this for a bridal shower. It was a very comfortable dress. I loved the fit of tighter up top and flowy bottom

I rented this for a wedding when I was 12 weeks postpartum and it made me feel so great. The wrap fit well, and there was a snap on the front if you don't want it as low (I'm probably a C cup now and it wouldn't stay snapped, but I had a black bra on under and you couldn't tell-- just FYI if you're a bit busty). I loved the feminine ruffle at the bottom and I feel like it could be dressed up or down. So comfortable and I would definitely recommend and rent again!

I love this dress and am SO glad I remembered to wear my DressWeights (pictured) with them. The NYC winds were so wild the night I wore this dress I would've surely been exposed had I not had them! The dress is flowy, flirty and fun. It's a great date night or everyday dress. I will definitely be renting this dress again and will surely be using my DressWeights with them!

links_reviews_title: This May Be My Favorite Ever
links_reviews_text: It says I wore a large, but it was a medium. It was true to size. Anyway, they sent me this randomly because the one I picked ended up not being available. I cannot say enough about how much I loved it. If you have curves, this is the dress for you!!!! I'm actually going to try to buy it!
I have a smaller chest, so the snap was much appreciated! Perfect for a rehearsal dinner.

I rented this dress for a wedding. I'm six weeks postpartum and this dress was amazing. It is, as my title says, very showing of the chest area. I also had to safety pin the sides together since it is a wrap dress and I felt like it wasn't held together that well just being tied. The pattern is great for fall and I paired it with a sweater. I really loved the details on the sleeves as well. Would rent again for a summer wedding!

links_reviews_title: Cute and flirty for casual fall wedding!
links_reviews_text: I ordered this dress for an outdoor fall wedding. I ended up sizing down, as the medium was a tad too large. Perfect for the evening! I loved that the dress was so easy to move around in and the pattern was perfect for the event.

Absolutely love this dress and style. It is a wrap dress and fits great unlike most wrap dress is where it falls around your cleavage area. This stress stays in place. The material is wonderful and the pattern on the dress is really pretty and dainty. It also looks really cute with a Jean jacket.
This dress is beautiful and was perfect for an outdoor wedding. I thought it ran a little big and wish I would have gone with the medium.

links_reviews_title: The color pops against the black
links_reviews_text: Very comfortable, true to size. A little low cut, but put a little tack in under the ruffle

Fit was true to size. I wore it dressed down for sightseeing and dinner but easily could be dressed up if you're thinking of wearing for a wedding/shower/etc. loved the print and detail on the sleeves too.

This dress is as comfortable and flattering as other reviewers said! It is a little low cut, but since I have a relatively small chest I didn't feel too exposed. I would absolutely recommend this dress.
Easy to wear!

I got this for everyday wear and it has been such a great piece. Took a last minute trip to Hawaii and it packed well and worked for everything from the beach to dinner and back again. Loved wearing it with the buttons undone on the straps. Also a huge plus for nursing mamas! I have a 4 month old and loved the Easy access and the clasp keeps things enclosed. Think I'm going to buy!

I should've gotten the small. No idea why I sized up but it took a lot of fashion tape to keep from having a wardrobe malfunction. Still, if you get the right size it's a solid summer dress. Wrap skirt doesn't blow open and the fabric is breezy.

Fits true to size, hits right above the knee. Casual enough for work, transitions well to dinner and drinks. Only one small button at the chest which popped open a lot for me (34D) during the day but other than that: perfect.
Loved this dress! Very comfortable! I also loved having two options to wear the dress (shoulders up or down).

I wore this dress 3 times. Once to Jazz Fest, once to a nice dinner, and once to a work party. Load of compliments each time. No need for a bra, has perfect coverage. The tie is a little long so you have to double knot it. Overall fantastic any time Dress.

Super comfortable, straps stayed up, bottom was super floaty and gorgeous. I got a compliment within 5 seconds of entering the restaurant. There is a button clasp to secure the top which is great. I would absolutely rent again!

I adore this dress and wish I could have kept it! It was super lightweight and the fit was extremely flattering. I felt great in it all night. I am usually a size 6 (but smaller on top) so I was able to wear the S in this dress with plenty of room in the hips. It's pretty low cut so I didn't wear a bra with it, but the top is snug so nothing moved. I did use a little fashion tape just in case!
So flattering and fun to wear!!! You can make the straps on piece or off the shoulder! I wore off the shoulder but there are buttons so you can wear it like the rtr model
This is a cute dress and is very comfy!

Loving this comfortable slimming style, it runs true to size and I recommend going one size up for a back up. This style is great for any cup size and has room at natural waist and hips. This dress can be worn with any standard bra and fits me tea length at a height of 5'2.
It's so slimming and beautiful. I'm 1000% renting again.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for daytime or dinner date
links_reviews_text: I got this dress in an XS and S. Decided to wear the XS because the small was less flattering. Will definitely rent this dress again. Originally rented for judging a rib cook off so I would have room in the belly area, but it was too cold so I ended up wearing it to dinner the following day.
So flowy and fun. Comfortable to wear and dance the night away!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an outdoor birthday at Tavern on the Green
links_reviews_text: Loved the fit and got lots of compliments. Relaxed and sophisticated vibe

I loved this dress and will definitely consider renting it again, especially since I didn't get any photos! I did wear a black bralette underneath, since it was too low cut for this particular church wedding, but I still felt subtly sexy. The material is flowy and makes it easy to dance!

I love this dress, so much that I want to buy it. It was flattering to my extra curves, showed just enough cleavage. I love that it gives options for sleeves up or off the shoulder. It is fun and flirty and perfect for a summer wedding or any other type of event. This is the perfect black dress for my wardrobe.
Absolutely loved this dress. Was so easy to dance in and the material felt amazing!!

links_reviews_title: Great look, easy to wear. Would absolutely recommend.
links_reviews_text: Needed to safety pin the front, but that’s kind of normal. Loved the wrap, very wearable. Got a ton of compliments.
Didn't wear because I would have had to use tape and it wasn't flattering at the bust
Runs small across chest. I should have gotten a size larger. Nice shape. Good for many occasions
Great fit, true to size. Good fabric. Needed someone to zip the back for me tho - nearly impossible to do solo. Slimming with black jeans.
I love this top and have considered buying it. The neckline is unique and sexy - great for a date night. I wore it on a week night to the theatre.

links_reviews_title: I absolutely love it! I am going to wear it with everything. I can dress it down or up.
links_reviews_text: It fits perfectly. Tibi is consistent with their upscale quality.

I loved this top! The top drapes beautifully on one side while there is some structure on the other side. It's gorgeous! The material is a heavier crepe and it is lined, so not ideal for a very hot day. But it fits beautifully and I got a ton of compliments! I will definitely rent again!
Just enough stretch to be comfortable but fitted enough to be flattering. Love the shoulder/strap details. I will be wearing this often through my RTR Unlimited.
Love this top! Will absolutely rent again or consider purchasing. I usually size up to 10 in most RTR pieces and the 10 fit perfectly.

links_reviews_title: My husband loved this shirt on me.
links_reviews_text: It wasn't a tight fit and the material was a little heavier than expected so it hid my mom belly a little, which is always a plus. I had to get used to the strapless sleeve. At first I kept feeling like it was falling down, hence 4 stars instead of 5. Overall, it's a nice top that can be paired with lots of styles.

Great black top that's super versatile! I wore it with jeans and wedges to a classic car show, but it could be dressed down or dressed very up with a pencil skirt and heels! It was snug because I have a larger chest, but still fit. I probably could have tried an 8 instead. Loved this top and wish I would've kept it longer to make more outfit creations with it.
Love this! Rent it!
Runs a bit short and a bit tight in arm holes. I'd size up by one size.

Love this silky black top with a twist! I love how luxurious the fabric feels and the quirky design at the shoulders. It definitely incorporates some trendy concepts so this is not your average black top. The fit is true to size and I would recommend a strapless bra. This is a must rent for your next GNO!

So hard to give this one back. I love Tibi. The quality is always great and they are classic with a bit of style. I wish this photo was better. We went to a hawaiian pig roast for a holiday party in NYC. As you can see, i didnt expect anyone would ACTUALLY dress up, but they did. Anyway, I loved this so much I wore it to a dinner the next night with off white crop pants. So many compliments and I felt sexy without being overstated. I love where it hits on the arm. Very comfortable. Sometimes Tibi runs big and sometimes small. I am normally a 10 but ordered the 12 and wish I had stuck with a 10.
Such a gorgeous drape on this top!
I wore to work party w leather jacket and scarf - ended up w 3 different looks throughout the evening as I lost the layers. Super fun top!
This top draped nicely but was fitted enough to stay in place. Cute!

I reviewed this top as running small because of the busy area. I have a full bust and felt like it could have had a little more room. It wasn't uncomfortable and didn't look too tight, but I had to wear a bra that didn't add any lift or it wouldn't have fit.

links_reviews_title: Good quality but hard to wear
links_reviews_text: This is a very well made shirt but it is a little awkward getting it on and making sure it is on the right way.

A nice thicker fabric. Liked the off the shoulder look but with the additional strap for security. I felt very feminine and sexy in it. Paired with jeans for simplicity with Cole Haan wingtip sneakers.
Great w jeans

links_reviews_title: NOT SILK as specified but still unique.
links_reviews_text: I dislike man-made fabrics for tops because they make me sweat. Also they don't biodegrade - horrible for the environment! So I purposely seek out cotton, linen and silk on RTR. What a disappointment when I rented this based on the description of silk but got polyester crepe. The design was unique and worked well with a strapless bra. Received compliments. Ok to rent if you are cool with this hanging out in a landfill for hundreds of years to come.
I am usually a 6 or an 8, but the 8 was wayyy too big. The drape sleeve draped so low you could see the side of my bra. I wish I'd gotten a 6 or even a 4.
Cute and classy

links_reviews_title: Loved this top. I got a lot of compliments.
links_reviews_text: It was perfect.

links_reviews_title: I wanted to love this top, but didn't
