links_reviews_text: I rented this top for a work party but didn't end up wearing it since it was a bit big and boxy. I didn't feel comfortable in it!
I wore this for my birthday and it looked great I love the intricate detail of the sleeves
This is a FABULOUS top. I make excuses to go out and wear it I love it so much. Super flattering and very sexy without showing a lot of skin.
Life's the weight of this fabric. It drapes nicely and doesn't cling at all. Ran small.

links_reviews_title: A simple and elegant piece for my date night! Love it.
links_reviews_text: #datenight #elegant #feminine
The left shoulder was so tight I could barely lift my arm.
I love this top because it's black, so it goes with everything, but it's also very unique. The off-the-shoulder style takes some getting used to, but be prepared for compliments!
Ended up wearing with a slip skirt and booties for NYE. Would rent again since the shirt is versatile and could easily dress up jeans or be worn with slacks and skirts
I liked that this showed some skin without being revealing. I really enjoyed wearing this top. I felt very confident in it.

I loved this top!!! I wore it with jeans out to drinks with some friends. It is a top that you can dress up or dress down. I am very narrow through my chest and the top was snug so consider ordering a size up.

links_reviews_title: It looked amazing on my long torso.
links_reviews_text: Hung nicely

Huge fan of the off shoulder style, this is extremely flattering with white jeans and wedges or heels. The material is thick crepe so you can wear without a bra easily as well. I am petite, i would not recommend for broad shoulders.
Size Down
love
Cute top, stayed in place well.
Easy to dress up or down.
Perfect dress! Got so many compliments! A true original!

Loved the material, thick enough to feel flattering and smooth, but also easy to move and dance in. Showed just the right amount of cleavage without needing to use tape. Also didn't wrinkle after being packed in a suitcase!

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress! Cute & Classy

links_reviews_text: The fit was perfect and it was nice and flowy so great in hotter weather even tho it's still long sleeved
This dress is great because you can dress it up or down. The neckline is a tad low for work but I was able to pin it - and it was easy to disguise because of the pattern. Loads of compliments.
Overall a great dress! Got lots of compliments on how unique the dress was. It was a very flattering fit but still comfortable! My only annoyance with the dress were the sleeves but would wear again!
Loved this dress It was a stand out since it was so unique. Flattering and comfortable it was easy to wear. Will rent again
Big fan of this dress! Really cute and fit like a glove.

links_reviews_title: Fit my body in all the right places
links_reviews_text: This dress was so beautiful, I got so many compliments not to mention I looked damn good in it too. My chest is a little big so the girls were trying to come out all night, but I didn't mind that. Definitely happy with this rental.

links_reviews_title: So feminine --great for alternative at the office!
links_reviews_text: Hugs your curves in a classy way!

This dress was so cute! Love the ruffles on the bottom. Only con was the arms were kind of constricting I thought. Other than that would definitely rent again! I wore this to work and then again out to dinner with my family.

links_reviews_title: It was a unique looking dress that was right for work
links_reviews_text: Good for work if you don't mind wearing colorful clothing. Probably most people will wear it for a cocktail
Fits great. It is super comfortable and flattering. Received compliments all day.

Loved the fit of this dress and that it doesn’t take anything crazy to pull it off. You can wear a normal bra and undies and you’re done. It moves beautifully for dancing. It hugs all the right places and made me feel ultra feminine. The fabric isn’t heavy yet it feels fancy. Love it!

The dress is beautiful overall and the cut is very flattering. The fabric is high quality, but it's fairly thick and doesn't breathe well, so I do not recommend wearing this during warmer months. The only downsides are how low cut the top is (for my personal preference), and for some reason, the dress kept twisting around, so I felt like I needed to keep adjusting it.

links_reviews_title: So flattering and so many compliments!
links_reviews_text: This fit pretty snug - but very flattering. Got tons of compliments. Such a stand out, one-of-a-kind dress.
Had a more casual wedding and this dress was perfect. I got so many compliments, the fit was beautiful, and I felt like I needed to buy it - so I did :)

links_reviews_title: The perfect dress for a bridal shower
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous. A bit low-cut but could be worn with a black cami to be less revealing. Received tons of compliments and stood out from the crowd!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous dress, not the best fabric
links_reviews_text: I rented this for a date night, but unfortunately didn't get to wear it out due to a snow storm. The XL fit with a little extra room and the L was too tight. I loved the mix of patterns and flattering shape and ruffles, but the material isn't as high quality as I usually get from RTR. I was able to wear this with a regular bra with no cleavage issues.
This dress! So pretty! This fit is super flattering and the print is like a garden party. Compliments galore!

This is a great dress. It is a pretty low cut if you are working in a conservative environment. If you have any kind of butt it is good to size up in this style. Overall great fall dress. I wore this to a pumpkin patch.

links_reviews_title: Flows beautifully and such a Stand OUT!
links_reviews_text: #ootd #workedit
Perfect fit, super flattering and fun

I love this floral style by Finders Keepers! Running true to size with some stretch to it, so I recommend sizing up for backup. It's a loose style, with comfortable room at the midsection and hips. Great for any cup size, and can be worn with any standard bra. It's a knee length style-I'm 5'8 wearing 3 inch heels. Perfect style for date night or any celebration! It's so unique, it can be worn during the day and night!

links_reviews_title: Spiced up a fun date night!
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for a date night with my boyfriend in hopes we would finally go dancing! (We didn't, but it was still fun to twirl around in the parking lot in this dress.) This style and print and completely out of my comfort zone, but the dress was SO comfortable and SO flattering - I didn't want to take it off. It is definitely a statement dress and definitely a confidence booster. Highly recommend. (: (Insta: @AWildHadden)
Not your average dress. So cute in person! Shows a lot of cleavage but felt great in it. The XL is a size 10 in this brand, and that fit true to size.

I loved this dress way more than I imagined when I picked it out on the site. The floral print mixed with the Polka dot ruffles are adorable and I got a ton of compliments. The dress felt a little large and it was more low cut than I realIzed but overall loved the dress and will rent again!

links_reviews_title: Feminine and flirty. Hugs your body in all the right ways.
links_reviews_text: This dress is a show stopper. My only reservation is how deep the neckline plunges, but a good bra and safety pin did the trick.

links_reviews_title: Loved this unique dress. It looked great on and I got a few compliments on it!
links_reviews_text: Fit great - the dress doesn't stretch but it fit well. The bells have a unique bell sleeve which I loved. The neckline is just slightly low so does show the tiniest bit of cleavage.

Look. I wear a size 12 dress in most dresses...sometimes 14 if they run small. If something is sized in S,M,L and XL......I am almost always a L and an XL will be a bit big.....THE XL in this dress had a 10 inch gap across my back and chest between sides of the zipper. I would need a XXXL in this dress.
Loved this dress! Super flattering! I thought the neck might be a bit low but it turned out to be perfect.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful, fit perfectly. So many compliments. I bought it!
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress. If you have a big busy and small waist, This dress is for you.￼
Cute but didn't fit

links_reviews_title: Cute, but ordered as a back up style and wore original dress instead due to fit.
links_reviews_text: Ran large and probably looks better on curvier and bustier girls.

Beautiful dress! Very well constructed--great movement & color. Alas, it was too tight in the rib cage/waist for me to comfortably wear to my event (even with my shapewear), but I will try it again in a M.
I received compliments as soon as I walked into the door. This dress hugs your curves perfectly and is sosososososo FLATTERING. I highly recommend.
It is soo pretty. I couldn't wear it ... bc I have an athletic build and saw the reviews I ordered a medium but it was too big.

links_reviews_title: I rented this one for work, got tons of compliments, very comfy!
links_reviews_text: I loved how this looked, however the cut in the neckline is a little deep for me. I wore a tank top underneath. The top was also too large, so it hung of my shoulders a bit.

Fit was great for my figure (more hourglass, not incredibly busty though) - loved the print duo and felt ultra feminine wearing it. Definitely a dress that looks more beautiful on than sitting on a hanger, in the best of ways!

links_reviews_title: Did not wear due to fit
links_reviews_text: This dress is adorable, but I could not zip it up over my chest! It fit perfect in the hips and waist. Very strange fit, so avoid it if you have any bust at all.

links_reviews_title: I had the best dress in the place!
links_reviews_text: I was a little nervous to order this dress because most women who reviewed it were a 0 or 2. I ordered a 6L and 8L and ended up wearing the 6. Such an amazing fit, fabric, and color. I got so many compliments on the color and design... It was comfy too! Loved that the straps were adjustable to fit my smaller chest better.

Wore this to a summer wedding, it's truly unique. The color is gorgeous, the cut outs are really cool. However it's pretty bare/backless. Definitely a sexier dress so be mindful of that! It also shows every little bump and curve so not forgiving in the slightest
This fit perfectly and I felt and looked so good! I loved the fit and the color is unique. I stood out in a sea of black! I got many compliments.
I loved this dress and thought the color was a standout. The fit was a little off for my body type. The 6 was too loose but the 4 felt a little tight.

links_reviews_title: Fun dress for a formal event!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so fun and flirty! I wore it to a work gala and was comfortable in it all night. I was worried about wearing a sticky bra (34DD) but the 8R top fit perfectly so I didn't need to. I ordered both the 6 and 8 but the 6 was a little tight on the bottom. The length for both was great. The color is more of a purple than the sample photo but was really pretty!
Beautiful fit and color.
Loved everything about this dress. It fit perfectly, was so flattering and received so many compliments. Must rent!
It was very comfortable, the color was stunning, and I felt very beautiful in it all night.
It is very form fitting but looked great on! I'm 5'7 with an athletic build and the long was the perfect length to wear with heels! The color is amazing in person!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress, made me feel like a princess!
links_reviews_text: This dress is absolutely stunning! I wore it to a black tie wedding and received compliments on it all evening. I am 5'3" and thankfully the 0 Regular wasn't too long, it was the perfect length with heals. Trust me, you won't regret renting this beauty!

Such a fun color for a Memorial Day wedding! The dress was long but I used temporary hem tape to bring it up a few inches. Also a little tight around hips in the 2R but 4R was big in waist. Overall was a great dress!

I'm 4'11 so it's hard for me to find floor length gowns. This was a good length. However, I did have to wear 4 inch heels so it wouldn't drag on the ground. Another plus about the dress is the adjustable straps and waist tie. It gives you the ability to tailor it to your body. The color is awesome. It would work with any skin tone. I wore this to a black tie wedding at a banquet hall. Would not suggest this dress for a church wedding because of all the skin showing in the back and the slit on the leg. You wouldn't be able to wear Spanx or a regular bra with this. I wore breast petals. The dress was wrinkled when I received it. Therefore I had to iron it but wasn't too difficult. I received lots of compliments throughout the night!

links_reviews_title: OBSESSED WITH THIS DRESS (even though it was my backup!)
links_reviews_text: I got so many compliments on the color / fit / cut. It's not very forgiving, but I found it incredibly flattering and confidence-boosting. The fabric was heavier than I expected, which was helpful for a smoother look. I chose to go bra-less and felt fine about the cutouts. It helped that my torso is a bit shorter than the dress was designed for, so it had a natural ruching camouflage around my abdomen. 5'6" and wore 2.5" wedges, had no issues with hem length. Didn't feel the need to adjust it throughout the 5+ hour event. I wish I took more pictures!!

links_reviews_title: Wore this to prom and it worked perfect
links_reviews_text: Love it so much !!! Very comfortable
Fits great!

The top was a bit small for me (32DDD). But once I got it buttoned up (need help to button), it was OK. I probably wouldn't have felt comfortable with my hair up as it was pretty revealing. The bottom was a bit big (could have taken in the waist-hip area about 2 inches) but it looked fine. Length was good. I am 5'7" and wore 4" heels.

links_reviews_title: Show off your body with this number!
links_reviews_text: Very deep side cutouts. No spanx or bra allowed. The color is gorgeous and I was getting compliments all night. But the openness of the cutouts is quite pronounced. Also the fabric is not that forgiving if you have hips and a booty. I felt too old for the dress but was happy I had rented because it was very fun once I was at the formal affair!

I wore this to a spring gala and the fit was perfect. It was a little long but with heels it was fine. I never tripped on my dress. You will need to go braless or use pasties. I also needed assistance buttoning the dress in the back. Not one you will be able to get on by yourself. Other than that it was perfect. I received many compliments throughout the night.

links_reviews_title: I got a lot of compliments!
links_reviews_text: The dress is more purple in person, I thought it was pink in the picture. But it was super cute and comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Loved the color and fit against my curvy body.
links_reviews_text: I wish it came in a petite size. Standing at 5'1, I attempted to lightly hand sew the bottom inside. The thread came off towards the end of the night and I had to keep holding the dress. I made sure not to ruin it and use as little thread as possible before returning it. I would've purchased it if I could have!

links_reviews_title: Lightweight, very comfortable, fit perfectly! Looked beautiful on.
links_reviews_text: Adjustable straps and sash made it easy to get the perfect fit. The lightweight fabric gave a nice look over curves without looking like it was stretched tight. Even though it was lightweight it was not see through. Very flattering look.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful and comfortable dress. Color is good for light skin.
links_reviews_text: The length is perfect for my height since I’m pretty short. The dress is fit on the top and comfortable below.

links_reviews_title: I got so many complements on this dress!
links_reviews_text: The one negative thing I'd say about it is that it was a little tight around the stomach, making it a little unflattering. But the color is beautiful and I love the back. I would definitely recommend renting this dress!
perfect for formal

I thought the dress fit me pretty well and was flattering on an athletic body type. I was definitely the only person at the event in a dress this color so if you're into standing out, this dress is for you. Lengthwise, I'm 5'8 and wore 3 inch heels with the long version of the dress which was perfect, but if I had worn flats the regular length would have exactly right. In terms of fit, being able to adjust the straps and the tightness of the bow was super helpful in getting the top part to fit, so I would say order size based on lower half. I was worried about the amount of skin showing at first but I didn't feel like the cut outs were too revealing. My only complaint is that the dress had some small rips when I received it, but altogether a good experience with this dress.
This dress is absolutely beautiful! I'd buy this and wear it again and again!

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress but better for spring
links_reviews_text: Beautiful dress but color was to pink for event

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a formal date party.
links_reviews_text: The dress fit perfectly. I ordered a size 2 and a 0 but ended up going with the 0. It was a little longer than I would have liked but with tall heels on it worked out!

This dress was my back up dress and I ended up going with my first choice. Nonetheless I loved this dress and regret that I didn't get to show it off. This dress is a good choice for a curvy woman who is comfortable with her stomach (the dress doesn't hide much in the middle). Also I'm 5'9 and the 12L was a perfect length.
Really beautiful dress. Color is great, even better in person. Only issue was that it was long even with heels on. Fitted well and the bow in the back helps with the fit.
I absolutely love this dress! I received many compliments throughout the event. The side cutouts do reach a little further front than I anticipated but I felt like a movie star in this gown!
This dress was amazing! It ran true to size and was so flattering. Fabric is thin - underwear lines were an issue.
Perfect fit, lovely color
It fit perfectly. It's long so I just had to wear higher heels, but totally worth it.

links_reviews_title: STUNNING COLOR, not one bit forgiving though
links_reviews_text: I rented this from the RTR flagship in DC when mine that had been delivered (other style) didn't fit, so they were kind enough to do it as a replacement for me. The color on this dress is SO beautiful. It's definitely not very forgiving, but that's bc it's a slinkier style dress, which is fine. I just did a lot of sucking in. But if I'd been in better shape / a little healthier when I wore it it would've been fine. Long story long: make sure you're real confident with your bod if you wear it.
The back of the dress was beautiful, it was a really gorgeous color. Super flattering!

I really loved wearing this dress, and I received so many compliments on it!! Even though RTR's pic makes it look like a light pink, I have to agree with other reviewers that it's really more of a fuchsia. Definitely a bold dress! I wore the 6R, which fit me very well. I'm 5'6" and wore kitten heels with the dress - if the heels had been much taller, I would have needed to get the 6L. I will say, this dress is not for the faint of heart - it's an attention-getting color, and because of the cutouts, it's difficult to wear a bra or any shapewear with. If you're not comfortable with your body, this is probably not the dress for you!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal event, great color!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, perfect length to use with heels.

links_reviews_title: You need to consider the length, and how much walking/ dancing/ terrain you will take it through!
links_reviews_text: I enjoyed the open back, but couldn't quite feel 100% confident I was wearing the bow correctly. The bow must be secure, or the dress design will fall off. I am 5'5 so length wise I did have to hold the fabric a lot walking around. It was still a fun dress, and I loved the sexy sides on top of the open bow back!! If you love bright purple you will not be disappointed. I worried since I'm 29 it would feel like a prom dress, but match it with some nice earrings and do ur hair laid back it can work for most ages. Wore this to a wedding.

This dress is HOT! Not only is the color so fab, but the back alone is why I wanted to wear it. The sexy cutouts at the sides added some spice to the front of the dress, plus I didn't need to wear a bra! The length was perfect for my tall-ish frame, and I could comfortably wear heels without sacrificing length. The only downfall is that the material is fairly thin so I was a little self-conscious about my cellulite showing through (you def can't wear Spanx) but I decided to channel my inner self-confident goddess and embrace it ;) It's all about the body positivity, ladies!

I dressed this down for work on a chilly day with a black turtleneck, tights, and booties, but I can just as easily see it in summer with strappy gold heels and a little clutch for a fancy event, or flat grecian sandals and a big tote on a weekend day. Got a ton of compliments! Glad I sized up because my usual size would have been too clingy.
This dress fit great, incredible quality, and elegantly sheik.
Quintessential missoni. Great color combo. SUPER comfy. Great for 1st/2nd trimester

So many compliments! Of course, most of my friends are Italian, so they instantly recognized the pattern :) Was classy & elegant. Wore with the matching cardigan for hosting Thanksgiving. The color palette was perfect for the Holiday, and the knit was so comfortable. Iconic and memorable!
It's missoni so of course it's beautiful but it was way too short and I am 4'11. This would probably be appropriate for a beach vacation to be worn to dinner with flats.
Flattering fit and gorgeous fabric
Lovely, but not flattering on my mermaid hips. Maybe would have been fine, but I felt self-conscious with the cling in that area.

Wore this out to dinner with friends. Very cute details - felt great in this dress !! I am trying to lose baby weight and this sort of hit in all the right places. Was surprisingly shorter than I thought. I wore with tights and black heeled booties & a leather coat- looked great ! Will also rent this again in the spring/Summer and pair with sandals. Versatile dress. Pattern is fantastic - very classic missoni
I don't typicallly wear floral patterns but this was a cute, bouncy fit. The straps were a little long but I loved the sweetheart neckline.
Very cute and pretty dress. Fit true to size. Fully lined and zipped up the back. Comfortable, no complaints with this dress.
Parker runs small. This was short but fit perfectly. Straps are a little long!

links_reviews_title: Cute dress - top is really big!
links_reviews_text: Super cute Parker dress - wore this to work in the summer months. My biggest problem is that the top was huge and I'm a 34D - it kept falling down all day and it was unflattering and annoying. Super cute dress but works best for big busted women!

This dress fit like a glove. I'm 5'6" and it was the perfect length. My only complain is that the straps were a little loose and slipped off my shoulder a few times while I was sitting down. I did not wear a bra because the fabric is thick enough to cover. I loved this rental!
Zips in the back and ties in the front. True to size and length was conservative. Wore with flats and jean jacket to dress it down
I'm not a flower pattern person but I loved this dress! The fit was great except I wish there was a way to adjust the shoulder straps, they seemed to slip off a little.

links_reviews_title: Classy enough for church & cute enough for brunch
links_reviews_text: Wore this for Easter bc I thought the print was fitting. I felt classy enough for church, but the fit kept it sexy and cute for the rest of the day! Some people complained about the fit, but i thought it was perfect-- definitely tighter around the midsection, but if you have bigger hips and a smaller waist you should be fine. I am typically a 4 and I wore a 6.
Great fit, fun and flirty! Has a little bit a stretch in the fabric too making it form fitting yet comfortable. Wore it for Easter and it was perfect!
Fit perfectly and was so comfortable! I did not have to wear a bra with this dress.

This is a really cute and flirty dress for warm weather. I paired with nude heels, gold accessories and a jean jacket. Husband loved it! Some reviews said its too short, but as a 5'2 lady this length was good.
This dress was so flattering and pretty! I dressed it down with a Jean jacket. Fits a little tight around the tummy which is why I wore the 6 so the sleeves were falling a bit but still looked great!
Loved this dress. It's very flirty and feminine without being too much. I wore it to a baby shower. The only downside was that it was a little large at the bust.

links_reviews_title: Perfect fancier sundress to wear to my daughters birthday party!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress. Perfect length, was concerned with it being too short but it wasn't bad at all. Little cleavage showing (only con was there was some extra fabric that seemed to bunch a bit under the arm pit...and I am heavier chested but still didn't fill it out just right), the fabric was really well made, a little heavier. Very flattering cut. A fun dress too, I enjoyed wearing it with the soft colors. I plan to wear it again to a work event with a sweater. Perfect for spring or summer parties!

I wore this dress on a summer vacation in Italy. It's a little on the short side, but I think the ruffle kept it cute and flirty. My boyfriend liked me in it a lot! Overall true to size. For me, it was slightly roomy up top (I'm a 32D) but fitted on the bottom.

This dress is a hot little number, yet not overdoing it due to the sweet, feminine floral pattern. It's pretty short, so just be cautious of how ya sit, but I loved it. Great for a daytime wedding, a polo match, a nice summer dinner or event, etc.

The fabric is gorgeous, it's perfect for spring/summer. But it was pretty tight on me, i don't think it's the best if you want to hide your stomach. The straps are very loose but I wore with a jacket.
Great dress, so many compliments, runs true to size.

links_reviews_title: Looked like a laura Ashley bedspread on
links_reviews_text: Not flattering

links_reviews_title: I love Parker dresses and this one was so comfortable and beautiful! The pattern is so pretty!
links_reviews_text: The pattern is so pretty and the lining makes this dress comfortable! Cute with nude shoes, I went with Jimmy Choo. Can be styled up or down !
I wore this dress for my engagement party. I loved everything about it. The straps were a tiny bit long on me and fell down a few times but other than that it was perfection!

Love the length and fit. Very true to size. The only thing was I couldn't figure out how to tie the belt without looking too juvenile. I don't like bows so I wrapped it around twice and knotted it which looked way better. This is a great summer dress!
Love the colors and fit of this dress. It fit great but I wish it was just a little bit longer.

links_reviews_title: Such a pretty dress but was short and snug
links_reviews_text: Typically a size 2 but this dress fit me like a glove with no breathing room - will try again in a size 4 as I really liked it.
This dress seemed cheap to me. The material felt strange and hot. Didn't wear.

links_reviews_title: Cute and fun for a rehearsal dinner!
links_reviews_text: I really liked this dress! It was a little large in the bust area and straps, however it still worked for me! I liked this much more in person than I expected and I was happy I was able to wear it. The material felt great and was heavier than I anticipated but I actually liked that about the dress because it helped in lay smoothly.
but the top part was a bit too large.

I initially ordered this in the size 0. The bodice fit like a glove, but it was too short for my taste. I re-ordered in a size 2 and the length was better, but it was a little loose in the body and the straps kept sliding down. Cute summer dress to wear with a jean jacket and wedges, if it fits you properly.

links_reviews_title: Super cute for date night out
links_reviews_text: Loved the design and style... it was a bit loose on the chest area for me though.

This dress fits true to size and has some stretch. The straps were a bit large and fell down a few times. I doubt I could have worn an 8 though because the waste would have been too tight. I have short legs and the dress was a perfect mini length on me. Fun little dress for a party or date night!
Loved the ruffle bottom and soft colors. It’s a very comfortable dress perfect for spring and summer.
I wore this for my nephew's christening with a cardigan. It fit very well and was not too short (on my 5'5 body). It did get a bit wrinkled throughout the day but overall I would wear it again.
straps were too long and the chest area was big. Rest of the dress fit true to size
Didn't end up wearing cause too big! Pretty pattern though

From reading the reviews, I thought this dress would be stiff. However, the material is stretchy, which makes it more comfortable. It's also thick and form-fitting — all together a flattering cut, but will feel tight throughout the night.
I loved this dress but it is very short so beware. I will probably rent it again but its definitely a vacation/night out on the town dress.

links_reviews_title: The ruffle skirt adds an extra feminine accent
links_reviews_text: other Parker dresses I've tried ran a little small, but this fits true to size

I rented a size 4 and size 6; the size 4 fit perfectly though I wish it would have been a tad longer. While the 6 was perfect in length, it was way too big up top and slightly big throughout. I tied it in the back instead of the front and added a cardigan since it was chillier than normal. My date loved the outfit and so did I. Great for dates or even a bridal/baby shower; I will say that this dress is short, maybe not one for the tall girls (I am 5'2").

links_reviews_title: Got lots of complements. Super cute and stretchy material
links_reviews_text: A little snug on the chest, but stretchy material made it wearable

Anytime I wear bell sleeves I'm always reminded why I'm not a huge fan. As adorable as they are...it's hard to eat or really do many common things without having to draw them up or get them dirty. This blouse though is adorable with great colors. Recommend, but you do have to watch the collar and pull up or down at times.

I loved the idea of this shirt more than the actuality of it. I do not think it is made for busty girls because the elastic part did not fully cover my chest, so when it moved up I had a weird draping of fabric on my boobs. I only got to wear it once, but it was fun for a night.
The shirt was super flattering but frequently would ride up and I had to keep pulling it down and adjusting it throughout the night.
This top is so fun!! True to size. Comfortable. Rent it!

links_reviews_title: Fits perfectly - a fun summer top
links_reviews_text: This top was really well structured and made - it just sat right the whole night. Fun and easy to wear.
Fit great and loved how it looked!

links_reviews_title: The sleeves are fabulous and the colors are perfect.
links_reviews_text: Really well made. Did not spend a lot of time pulling the sleeves down on my arms like most off the shoulder tops. Plenty long enough to cover midriff. Compliments each time I wore it. Loved it.

Super comfortable - was worried this would be too small bc I had worn the black and blue one in a Small but this was actually lighter and more breathable and have more give than the darker version of this.
Love how different this top is. Stays in place and really cute for summer.
This was such a fun top! The kind I always want to buy in boutiques but don't want to spend $100 on! Fits nicely, very comfortable, and received loads of compliments.

The colors are amazing and the sleeves complete the look! It stayed in place all night. There are two small hooks on the front side wear you can attach your bra and it was very comfortable. I had fun wearing this top and will definitely rent it again by the end of the summer.

I love this top! The shape is so flattering and super comfortable. I usually wear small in tops and only got the medium because the small was sold out at the time. It fit just fine because of the shape of the top. I would totally rent again! I love this brand.

Rent this now! I waited for this top to become available and ended up getting a medium (normally a small) because it was the only size available. It fit and looked great! Other reviewers suggested getting a bigger size if it's all that's available and I'm glad I listened. The stretchy part holds the top in place without being uncomfortable. The bigger size is just more flowy on the bottom. Perfect.
Perfect fit. Just a cute and fun shirt
Hits right at waist line. Super cute when pulled down the right amount. As all off the shoulder tops do, it rides up occasionally.

links_reviews_title: Adorable, casual top perfect for a weekend away.
links_reviews_text: Super cute cotton top, quite comfy to wear. Got lots of compliments and I'm debating buying it. My only word to the wise is to pair it with high waisted jeans and wear something to cover your nipples cuz dang that thing flies right up on a windy day! Made a few bystanders happy/mortified. Evidence in pic.
I got so many compliments wearing this! I love it!! I suggest pairing with jeans or shorts and cowboy boots.
I rented this for a chilly night to wear with jeans and loved it. It's a great end of summer transition piece and the smocking makes it really comfortable and easy to wear.

I love this top - it's beyond comfortable and literally the only off the shoulder style that doesn't ride up onto your shoulders when you move. It's stylish without being over the top. It's the first piece that I'm seriously considering buying.
I wore this top to a outdoor concert and loved being in it. It is beautiful and comfortable. I received compliments left and right!
This was a great shirt and so cute!! Got lots of compliments!!!
I absolutely loved this top!! I did have to remember to keep it pulled down across my chest. I am a 34DD soooooo....lol!
Perfect fit. Most eye-catching details. So fun for a trip to Disney (though I was hot lol)

That's it. This top is the. cutest. thing I have worn all summer. The colors are vibrant and the big, flowy sleeves add to the overall fun and comfy-ness of the shirt. If you want to try something a little out of the ordinary, give this one a shot!
I rented this top for vacation in Italy. It is a great effortless style that you can throw on with jean shorts or dress it up for dinner.

links_reviews_title: cute but unsure how to wear
links_reviews_text: I couldn't quite figure out if the stretchy part was supposed to be worn over the breasts, or scrunched up above. Also, it's a lot of fabric and is easy to get lost in. I received lots of "oh what a cute shirt" and it was perfect for a lunch date with a friend. I wouldn't wear it on a romantic date though.

Loved this top!!! Great everyday shirt that looks so cute. It’s true to size. I wore a size M and it fit perfectly. I would recommending sizing up for backup. There was comfortable room throughout the midsection. It’s great for any cup size. The fabric has no stretch and should definitely be worn with a strapless bra. Great for wearing it to lunch or a casual evening event with pumps or sandals. Overall, loved this top -- so fun!
I wore this shirt to a Sunday brunch- it was perfect!
Loved this OTS top so much! I received so many compliments
Adorable. Great top for everyday and going the lunch with girlfriends. Makes your arms look super tiny!

Okay, so I found this when I went into the Rent the Runway Store in Chicago, and I was OBSESSED with this top. I don't even want to return it, it's so cozy and cute. When I saw it, I took the only size available in store (L), but I would order it in a S next time. Honestly though, it just looked more flowy than a small, so order a different size (up) if yours isn't in stock! TRUST ME- you won't regret it!!! I got so many compliments on the shirt and it was so unique and like no other shirt I have! It's lightweight and perfect for a date night!

This top is absolutely adorable. I wore it with a strapless bra. Because I am a 30 D, I had to fidget with the ruching part the whole night to make sure it was staying in place. I loved this top but would probably not rent again because of my bust size. Other than that, great for petites.

I'm very sad that I do not own this top. It has an accordion style elastic top, which makes sizing a breeze. It fits true to size, so no need to size up or down. I just really need to own this.. bottom line :-)

I love this top for a cooler summer day or evening out. It's casual fabric, but with a chic and playful design. It's lightweight and stays in place on my shoulders. Perfect with white pants/shorts for a dressier look or distressed jeans/shorts for a more casual vibe. It's unique and will get you tons of compliments!

I'm a sucker for rainbow season! Very cute top. I'm small-chested and can't imagine anyone requiring the XS with the stretchy smocking. I'm not normally into this boho silhouette, but the rainbow sells itself.
I received so many compliments on this top! I am 5 months pregnant and this shirt is super cute and flirty! It fits great over my bump and is perfect for the summer!

I loved this top and will definitely rent this again. The fit is very easy and comfortable - I rented a small and it was not too tight although on the hanger it looks smaller than it does when you're actually wearing it. The statement sleeves aren't too over the top and the fabric makes it a great top for a day event. I wore this with white jeans and sandals but this could certainly be dressed up with heels and big earrings.

links_reviews_title: Pop of color perfect for summer!
links_reviews_text: It was difficult to keep from either riding up or falling down when I moved my arms. :( Not the most flattering top, but I still had fun wearing it!

links_reviews_title: Great colorful top-perfect for white jeans!
links_reviews_text: Top seemed stretched out-I will go a size down next time and would rent this again.

links_reviews_title: This shirt was flattering and comfortable!
links_reviews_text: I am 5'6, 160 lbs, I wore a size large. I got several compliments. Definitely plan to rent it again.

links_reviews_title: I wish I had bought this dress - STUNNER
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for an outdoor summer wedding and it did not disappoint. This dress will turn heads! Expect compliments. The back is absolutely lovely. I had no issues with the slit and didn't feel like it was too revealing. Great dress, really regretting not purchasing it and keeping it in my closet.

AMAZING! I loved it so much more than I expected. I actually rented this two separate times and have worn to so many different occasions. I wore it to an investor lunch, brunch, happy hour, work, vacation in Italy, running errands around town, etc. This is a versatile dress that looks so good paired with heels and a blazer to dress it up, or sneakers and a t-shirt for a fun, casual look. I love the slit up the front, it's enough to give it an edge but not so high up that it's inappropriate for the work place. The material feels silky & high quality. True to size, although it's a little tight in the chest; if you are busty I would size up. Very flattering dress! It hugs at the waist but loosens up around the stomach so no need to worry if your stomach is your problem area, this dress hides it well. The back is also super fun, & you can definitely wear a bra with this dress if preferred. Pictures do not do it justice, I will be purchasing!
Pretty fabric but totally underwhelming. The front slit was in the most awkward position. I think it would have been better off center. Not very flattering either.
I loved this dress! It was true to size. I wore it on a dinner date with my hubby. I will definitely rent it again.
Pro tip: pin the long straps, the. It's perfect at 5'3" this hits me tea length. Still loved it, tons of compliments. Try to size- I think sizing up of insure since there is no stretch. Loved it!!

links_reviews_title: How will I ever give this back??
links_reviews_text: It's hard for me to imagine a body type that would not look amazing in this dress. It's forgiving but sexy and the straps are thick enough that you can even wear a normal bra if you need some extra support. I have a large bust and it was perfect for me. Lots of compliments even though I dressed it down with sandals. It's cut straight but the slits add some flow if you have a stomach so it's not totally tight just a very smooth silhouette. I'm crushed that I have to give this back and I absolutely didn't expect to feel this way!

Very nice for date night. Pretty tight in chest. Was glad that the safety pins someone had used to shorten the straps were still there. Otherwise the straps would've been very very very very very long. For 36 d this was pretty busty. Nice slit in front. Very cute but just pretty tight in chest more than I usually like!
I am short and have a small torso so the straps were too long. They aren't adjustable so I couldn't wear the dress.
I absolutely LOVE this dress! The little back cut out and lace details make it special and it's feminine without being a huge floral print. Perfect!
Very pretty and wear in the fall with a turtle neck
Absolutely loved. So cute and comfy! Didn't need a bra! Got sooo many compliments!!
This dress fit very well, and had beautiful details along the upper waist and the peakaboo opening in the back really set it apart from other dresses.
As other reviewers said, the straps are super long. I don't have the right proportions for this dress and it ran a little small.
LOVE this dress. So comfortable and sexy. I should have been in a 6 but wore and 8 because that is what was available. It was a bit big on top but OK. Wish I did not have to return this.
Cute easy dress for a dressy casual event or dinner. Back cutout makes the dress super fun. Wore it to a dinner with family
I loved this dress on Instagram but you would definitely have to tailor it. The bust is big because the straps are so long but you can't tie them up because it's cut out. Hard to wear.

links_reviews_title: Really cute dress for fundraising event at winery
links_reviews_text: Cute dress for evening fundraising event at a winery. Lots of compliments. The straps are a little big and slipped down throughout the night which was a bummer. Iw sit designers would stick with adjustable straps . Material was silky and lightweight. Dress is more nave dark blue with black lace trim than fully black.

This dress was really nice and comfortable - it was slightly bigger in the chest but that may be because i wasn't wearing a bra - this caused the straps to slip a bit but overall i really liked it and got a lot of compliments - it was easy to dress up but could also be dressed down
OBSESSED with this dress. It fits like a dream, it is so flattering, and can be dressed up or down. Seriously did not want to return this - I wish I could buy it!
Ran small, did not get to wear. More of a slip dress feel to it.
I wasn't expecting to love this as much as I did.
I was unable to wear because the top straps for too long.
The style is pretty unique, it was easy to slip on for a put together look, no need for bra. It was comfortable for lounging and partying
Great fit, comfortable! Absolutely love it. Would rent again

I really like this jumpsuit. The plunging neckline is sexy while the bohemian print tones it down. I like in Denver and it's ideal for our style :) The large is too big for me, but it was all that was available. I am typically a medium or 6/8 and a medium would have fit perfectly. I was able to use the tie in the back to tighten.
Wore this in nashville. It was pretty cute. Probably wouldn't really wear otherwise (because it's not my style).

links_reviews_title: Cute, but runs large and not very figure flattering.
links_reviews_text: I was hesitant to get an XS but should've. For those that are smaller in the waist, it runs large in the back. It has a nice tie-back, but if you're small chested, there's a little too much wiggle room in the front.
Little big on the top but other then that super cute!!

Could easily wear this to any everyday outing. I loved the simple, but trendy style. People really liked the bandana print. I ordered an 8 because a 6 wasn’t available and it wasn’t too big on me with the straps tied tightly, but it did bunch up in the back. Made it work, but I definitely needed a 6. Overall, loved it and would rent again. - jasleigh

links_reviews_title: Super cute for an Austin weekend
links_reviews_text: A perfect piece for a fun, warm weather weekend in Austin. It fit true to size and the cut/fit was flattering for the stomach area (I feel like a lot of jumpsuits aren't). The chest area was a little ill-fitting, I had to keep readjusting all day. Overall, a good fit and a fun outfit.
Great fit and great material!

I wish this was available in a xsmall! I loved the pattern & it was so light weight. The straps were too long, but besides that I loved the jumpsuit! Also I have tiny boobs, so I couldn't fill out the top.

Literally such an easy and chic item to throw on and go. The fit was amazing and it was incredibly comfortable. I wore it very often. I am taller though (5'9.5) and it hit mid-calf, just FYI! Def recommend, light too

I felt so glam every time I wore this, because of the deep plunging neckline, but also the silk was super comfortable in an extremely hot and humid locale. Wore it all day several times. Never had an oops boob slip, and no need for tape, but I'm only a 32C/34B so YMMV. A little more snug in the crotch than other jumpsuits I've rented, which I assume means this may not be good for longer torsos. My torso is neither long nor short. Straps as pictured in my pic, not as in the model, and they are immovable.

This was the perfect piece for my recent trip to Tulum. I wore this jumpsuit over a little black bikini, so it doubled as a chic cover-up. Love that it looks like a dress, but has the comfort and practicality of a jumpsuit.

I rented this jumpsuit for a winery weekend with friends. It was super comfortable and lightweight for the summer. Couldn't wear a bra, but that wasn't a problem for me. The only complaint I have is the length- I am 5'9" and the pants were a little short. It ended up looking more like a midi dress which was fine with me! Would rent again.

links_reviews_title: Back is not as pictured. Need to make some adjustments to make it work
links_reviews_text: The back is not adjustable like the photo shows which kind of sucks. I had to make a few adjustments to make this work. I wrapped the strings around the front to make it tighter. And i pinned the front closed. I wore to dinner and didnt feel comfortable the whole time. But it was cute and looked great in pics

links_reviews_title: Cute and comfy. Neck plunge was too much for me
links_reviews_text: Love this jumpsuit except the neck plunge was so deep and made me a bit self-conscious. Would recommend it to anyone but felt like I had to keep adjusting.

I was absolutely comfortable in this romper from early morning past midnight in hot as h NOLA. The tie strings are NOT adjustable is my only complaint (so I couldn't make it tighter). It's gorgeous & cool and not too much trouble to get in and out of. You can't use tape because you'd be un sticking/sticking every bathroom break.

links_reviews_title: Easy outfit for a night out on the (vacation) town.
links_reviews_text: Needs to be tied *tight* to keep the ladies in place, but can be done solo or most easily with a friend. Lots of space through the hips for my sisters with booties :)
Very casual, warm weather
Cute day time jumpsuite. The top was a tad big but manangeable.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send back! Kept for a month!
links_reviews_text: I loved this - so comfortable. Airy but thick enough to not wear bra, tied in back so perfect when I ate too much one day and needed to loosen it out:) I almost bought it, but decided against it since summer has run out. Maybe if it becomes less someday $!

links_reviews_title: Awesome piece ... but beware of side boob
links_reviews_text: Really cool piece. The material has a nice silky/light feel. For sizing, I'm usually a 4/6 and the small fit really well. The only thing to be aware of is the cleavage factor. When sitting, the keyhole slot in the front buckles and there's a lot of side boob action. I'd def rent again to wear out, but not necessarily for a dinner with parents.
LOVED this RTR!!! Unique and comfortable. You can dress it up or down!

Loved this. Wore it out to dinner and my husband loved it. Fit was true to size. Material was light and flowed beautifully. Straps were a little bit long so they slipped a bit. There's not really any way to wear a bra with it, but I'm small up top so it wasn't an issue. Wouldn't recommend for someone with a larger chest. If you're looking for something more unique to wear out, this is your rental.
I loved this sundress/romper. Super cute and great material but straps do not X in the back as pictured and they are not adjustable.

links_reviews_title: Cute but maybe better for bigger chests
links_reviews_text: I loved this outfit and it looked great on me. I received so many compliments on it, everywhere I went. The challenge for me is that I'm an A cup and so I had to be careful about how I moved in it so that my adhesive bra didn't show. If I leaned forward at all, I felt like people could see a little too much. So perhaps a B cup or bigger would be a better fit

Jumpsuits are my thing and this one was super cute and fun!! I loved it! There was plenty of room for my thick athletic thighs and butt. I'm a 34DD and was fine with the low cut in the front, I didn't need tape or anything. It's just a great romper and perfect for almost any occasion, I wore it to a car show on a Saturday lol.

Absolutely LOVED this jumpsuit. It was so comfortable and trendy. The straps do not cross in the back as they do on the model. I had to kind of tie the straps in my own unique way so that the jumpsuit fit the way I wanted it to and be secure. I love the wide leg space! I didn't wear a bra with this outfit. I chose to dress this jumpsuit down and wear it casually. I receive so many compliments. This is a must have.

Rented this for dinner/ party and loved it! Tons of complements, very flattering culottes. Though the XS was a good size, S would have been to gappy in the front given my chest size. Would definitely recommend for any occasion though - loved it so kept it a little longer and wore to brunch which worked well too!

I loved this outfit on me… Unfortunately I was told I can go brawl us which I did and did not realize how much of my breast were showing until it was too late. I'm not quite sure how fast you would wear it, as for me the beauty of it was not seeing the bra and again I would not recommend going bra less. Outside of that I don't love the outfit!

links_reviews_title: I wore this out for a ladies' night dinner. Easily dress up with heels or dress down with flats.
links_reviews_text: I'm typically not an XS, but this fit around my ribs okay. Because I was wearing a size too small, I got some boob wings on the fabric and had to use fashion tape to keep them in check. I think I would have fit better into a size small, but it worked without climbing like rompers tend to do. I'm short too, but this romper didn't make me feel disproportionate at all.

Wasn't sure about this initially, but I actually loved it! Super light and comfortable! I'm tall but it wasn't too short in the torso area. I wore nud wear under it. I think it's great for small chests. Wore it to a party. Awesome because it has the look of a dress but you can move around more because it's a jumpsuit. Got compliments from strangers! I didn't give it 5 stars because as you tighten the top, the torso gets pulled up at the crotch area (not enjoyable) so I was checking the straps a lot. But definitely give it a try!

links_reviews_title: Needed work, but very comfortable & stylish in DC!
links_reviews_text: As you can see from my pose in this pic, you will never know that it's not a skirt and is actually a jumper. Perfect for a mom chasing a two-year-old around Washington DC Museums!Surprised no pockets because there's ample room. The fabric is extremely comfortable and I loved wearing this jumper all day. Threw on heels for dinner. Unfortunately , romper straps are sewn. U tie them in back, but don't adjust like triangle top bikini. Had to use safety pins under arms and on straps to make outfit work. Also, you could not wear a bra ...pasties or nothing at all. I think this works best for smaller busts.

links_reviews_title: Fun! Didn't realize it was shorts when I rented it.
links_reviews_text: Loved this. A little different from something I would normally wear but it was cute and fit was good. The mid section was a little big but threw on a decorative belt and it was adorable for work!

links_reviews_title: Very cute! Good quality and perfect for vacation.

links_reviews_text: Really Cute!
Based on reviews I was hoping this cute outfit might fit, but it was way to short for my long torso. Bummer!
The bottom half was a little tented for my liking

links_reviews_title: Lovely pattern and fabric - but revealing and fancy.
links_reviews_text: This was so lovely, but I got it for a basic weekend girl's trip in Houston. Unfortunately, it was just too revealing and a bit fancier than I needed it to be. The fabric was very nice, and it's clear that this was a piece for a special event. I didn't end up wearing it but would probably rent it again for something nice. The chest does cut low.
Beautiful dress, received lots of compliments. Tight though - a bit hard to breathe.

Like other reviewers, found this ran a little small. I'm usually a 26 jeans/2 but found the 4 to fit best. I'm also a 32DD so it was a tad tight but zipped up ok. Loved I was able to wear a bra with it! Received many compliments on the dress, the color and style. Marchesa Notte knows how to make a dress! If it were my dress, I would have hemmed it probably 1-2 inches as ran a little long on me. Overall, really loved this dress! #workparty

loved this dress!! the appliquéd flowers added a fun texture + dimension to an otherwise boring sheath. the color was stunning! the many layers of slip underneath made for an easy + gorgeous wear. it was modest enough without being boring. i worried a bit that you could see my bra but it blended in with the dress. i sized up to a 10 to accommodate my butt/thighs so that it would not be too tight for a religious event + it was perfect (other than being a little big up top). many compliments!!!

links_reviews_title: LOVE THE FLOWERS and the COLOR just wish it was shorter
links_reviews_text: This was the first dress to catch my eye. Love the texture and color of the flowers, but as a short girl the length just didn't give me the feeling I wanted. I did adjust the skirt to see what it would like like shorter and loved it. If the designer made a shorter version I would rent it for sure!

I really loved this dress and all its floral dimensions. I wore it to my friend's bridal shower because the floral appliques reminded me of some of my favorite elements from my wedding party attire, but with a semi-formal twist! I got sooooo many compliments. I got the dress in a size 4 (I size up from my usual 2) since reviews said it ran small. The 4 was slightly loose in some places, but just barely, the 2 would have definitely been too tight.
Perfect dress for a black tie optional summer wedding. Easy to dance in, loved the power shoulder, got compliments from strangers and friends all day

The 10 fit (usually wear an 8) and it looked pretty good. I liked the appliqués; they're very detailed and unique. I didn't wind up wearing the dress though because it added so much bulk/volume to my figure. I felt like I looked 2 sizes larger than I actually am because of how the appliqués stuck out from the dress. I think this dress would look better on someone very thin.
Loved this dress for a wedding I attended. It was very hot that day but the dress was lightweight enough and so easy to dance in. I got lots of compliments. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Stylish, Elegant, and Ready For The Party
links_reviews_text: Rented this for the reception of a "Black Tie Optional" wedding. I could not have been more pleased with this dress. I normally wear a size 8 and was happy I listened to other reviewers regarding the fit, I went with the 10. The dress fit perfect, with a bit of extra room left over to enjoy dessert! There is a bit of stretch in the fabric. I think the floral rosettes overall really give the dress an elegant look. I went with a contrasting red silk d'orsay heel for a bit more editorial vibe.
The dress fit perfectly and it was exactly what I was looking for.
Gorgeous dress that I got many compliments on, but wasn't very comfortable - I should've sized up because the ribcage area was quite tight. Lovely color and construction of the dress, though!

I was worried about size, but ordered a 10 and have been in 10'a lately and the dress fit fine. A little tight maybe but a size up would have been too large. My only qualm was that (to be honest) I looked a little more ridiculous than stunning in this dress...the appliqué flowers stood out a bit more awkwardly than elegantly in my opinion. May just have not been my style.

links_reviews_title: LOVE this dress!! So many compliments. Overall beautiful dress.
links_reviews_text: No real cons, this dress was awesome! Sturdy, comfortable, and beautiful. Fits true to size.The detail of the dress was to die for.

I wore this for date night with my husband and overall I really liked it. I received multiple compliments. Overall it fit well. I am very petite and so the shoulders were a littler loose and slid down several times. I would still recommend the dress though. The flowers are 3D and the color is great!
Rented this for a wedding. It was pretty but just not what I was looking for.
Fit me in the waist. Size 10 but my DD no way! No stretch. Showing a pic. Literally couldn't zip the top half.

I rented this dress for a dinner event honoring friends of ours. I’m usually a 2 or 4 in a dress; the 4 was a perfect fit! I got lots of compliments. If I could, I would have taken 1/2 star off for the zipper. Very difficult to zip up past the waist-almost didn’t get to wear it because of this. Otherwise, beautiful dress with a great fit!
I normally wear an 8, but the chest would not accommodate my DD girls so needed the 10; received lots of compliments, can easily go bra less

I rented this dress for a black tie optional wedding. Definitely order at least a size (or probably 2 sizes up). I usually wear a 6/8 and the 10 fit but was tight. You will need a buddy to zip you, it's a really tough zipper. I appreciated this dress because you can wear a normal bra with it-score! The lace looked great and was high quality. There were flowers that kind of stuck out, which I kept going back and forth on whether I liked them or not. Definitely a unique dress.
I wore this dress to a NYE gala. It was so comfortable to wear and I felt amazing in it! I received compliments all night!

My only complaint about this dress was that it was tricky to get the size right. I wear a size 4 American. I tried a 6 in the store which looked fabulous but was uncomfortably tight. I chose an 8 which was a little lose but I use garment tape to hold shoulders in place. Otherwise the dress was exquisite. Fabric was unique and feminine. The style was very flattering and form fitting but had some give. I received many compliments and "where did you get that dress" questions even in the elevator. So glad I rented this one.

This dress was so dreamy for fall wedding! It's super comfortable, and flattering. They detail flowers brought such a unique texture to the dress that everyone came up to me adored it! I am a 36DD and did not need to wear a bra. I would absolutely recommend this dress and would love to rent it again!

This dress is the color of beautiful royal blue! I thought it'd make me look old but it didn't. The only flaw is that the back slipper is a bit weird, there's a tough spot where the fabric keeps getting caught in the zipper

links_reviews_title: Absolute loved the dress! The fit and color was perfect!
links_reviews_text: The only con was that the zipper was very difficult to use.
This dress was a scene stealer and definitely a compliment grabber. The fit was perfect and it was unique and comfy

links_reviews_title: I received a plethora of compliments on this lovely dress. Would rent again!
links_reviews_text: This dress does run a bit small as others have commented. However, I was able to wear my normal size of 10. I ordered the 12 as a back up, but I found that it was too lose on top. I tend to go up a size to accommodate my hips. The beautiful flower design helped to draw attention from the hips. I was repeatedly complimented and felt lovely in this dress. The color is a knock out!
Flattering for straight and narrow body types!

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, unique dress with floral detailing
links_reviews_text: I typically wear a 6 but the 6 was a bit tight even though I could zip it. This dress is gorgeous and I received so many compliments. It is perfect for anyone who is busty. The color is the flowers is a brighter blue and the dress is very classy.

links_reviews_title: I rented this dress for a pageant as a former titleholder and received SO MANY compliments on it.
links_reviews_text: I ordered a size 10 and should have ordered the 8 (size I normally wear) and it was a little big on me, but since I an 6' tall without heels I wanted the length to be good and it definitely was. The detailing and color of this dress was FABULOUS! I felt amazing in it. So happy!!!!

My friend wanted to dress up and go to the library and disney-bound (yes it's a thing) and I thought-oh cute blue floral dress- this will be something like a formal verision of Belle's blue dress- and my friend claps excitedly when she sees it- the floral 3-d effect giving me rather broad shoulders and broader hips and goes "You're dressed up as the Beast!"- not what I was going for- so maybe petite girls will look more like a fairy decked in flowers- but I did not.

I'm glad I ordered a size larger, but it fit perfectly. Was supposed to get another dress that fell through and this was the only one I was remotely interested in with only 24 hours before my event! I got so many compliments on the dress and the color! I'm not usually a fan of fitted dresses, but this one made me feel beautiful!
Very flattering, classy dress. Lightweight. Good for a wedding. I did not need to wear a bra.
This dress looks very gorgeous thanks to the lace and the colors. I could wear regular bra with it and it fit true to size. Wore it for our anniversary date night in the city. Was very comfortable.
So comfortable, can wear a real bra. Lining felt substantial. Very well made.

Loved this dress! It's much prettier in person than it photographs but it was comfortable and just a really fun pretty dress! It 100% runs small. I'm generally a 6, but even an 8 was tight arojnd the waist. You can tell it's slightly large in the tummy area because I needed to size up just for the waist. Anyways, very pretty!
Runs small. Size up one size. Blue nice, but not too flashy.

links_reviews_title: Loved this dress. Wore it for special fancy Birthday dinner, felt like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: I normally wear size 6, but the 6 was too tight. The 8 was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: Blue Flowers at a Christmas Wedding!
links_reviews_text: The fit is perfect. The dress is true to size. The blue flowers add a stunning pop of color. I enjoyed wearing this dress to a winter wedding!

I loved this dress and it was pretty and comfortable. I felt sexy in it, but it photographed badly. I wore a 6. I think the fluffy flowers made me look big! I looked bigger than everyone else in photos and I'm actually smaller. Maybe vein, but it matters. I would still rent again. It's really nice.

This dress looks and feels so expensive and high quality! It was so beautiful and perfect for any formal occasion. It does run small though! I wore a size 10 and it fit perfectly, even though I'm typically a size 8. I also liked that I could wear a standard bra, but do be aware that this fabric has no stretch. I think this dress is so beautiful and it is clearly a well-made dress. I highly recommend it!
It was flowy and easy to wear. Highly recommend!
Fit perfectly! Loved this jumpsuit.

This was a fun jumpsuit for a trip to a very hot Austin in the summer, as well as for a street festival I went to a couple weeks later. The fabric was light and breezy, fit true to size, and the top portion of the jumpsuit was adjustable so it stayed put really well.

links_reviews_title: Adjustable straps were a life saver
links_reviews_text: So glad this jumper had adjustable straps because I'm tall so that helped this fit much better. The color and print were fun and got a couple compliments.

Wore this for my son's first birthday picnic aka We survived the first year of parenthood party. The yellow and bright colors popped in front of the park backdrop, as did my cleavage (as a smaller busted woman, this was a welcomed change). True to size fit, adjustable straps, moveable light fabric, lots of compliments.

I ordered this hoping to wearing it for work and a festival I was going to. I ended up wearing it to the festival and loved it. The fabric is super light and flowy - even more so than expected, but that was great for the festival setting. Unfortunately I wasn't able to wear it to work and it shows a lot of cleavage even on my small bust.
It was cute! Comfortable for a day out with my nephew- though it was difficult to zip myself. Was true to size though someone with a large bust may have trouble fitting into this!

links_reviews_title: Fun print, great fit, cozy material. Plus, no insane acrobatics to get in and out of jumpsuit.
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit was perfect for a pre-wedding party. The print is cute and the color pops. I did not have issues with the straps falling down as some other reviews noted. You can opt to wear this jumpsuit with or without a bra. The fabric is perfect for the summer, I wore this during a heat wave weekend. The best part of this jumpsuit is that the zipper is easily manageable solo, which is huge win in my book. I also loved the culotte style pant, which is perfect for shorties like me.

links_reviews_title: Great all day outfit for the dessert heat
links_reviews_text: Super flattering and comfortable. The material is soooo soft and breezy. I wore it all day to the Grand Canyon in 100+ temperature and felt fine! The zipper wasn't too hard for a jumpsuit. The color is so great!

links_reviews_title: Very comfortable. Nice fit for curvy petites.
links_reviews_text: Fit surprisingly well for my curvy petite frame. I have wider hips so sized up to XL and the adjustable straps allow some customization for the top. Very cute. Comfortable after wearing all day.

links_reviews_title: Bright print, but a little too much cleavage
links_reviews_text: Got a lot of compliments on this jumpsuit! I felt super sexy and pretty in it but if you're not comfortable showing a lot of cleavage then I would not rent this if you are a busty woman. The pockets were a great addition and it was super comfortable to walk around in all day!
This jumpsuit is so perfect; it has pockets (!!), and it's loose, but still flirty. And I received compliments within minutes of stepping out my door ;)

Loved this romper! Color and print is so summery and sweet. The fabric is very light, so just fine in warmer weather. The top fit beautifully. The culottes part was so flowy and felt nice in the wind. The length was just right as well. Got complements. Had to wear flats since we did some dancing in Nashville. Would rent again!

I am five feet tall and although I'm petite, I have huge boobs so it definitely showed off the girls. I got lots of compliments though on the bright color. It was a little tight in the chest area but it was a great fit. Since I'm so short it was more like a full length romper on me! The fabric isn't super soft but I'm glad I rented it.
I have a pretty small chest and wore the L for my hips. I can't imagine someone with larger boobs being able to fit into the top.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful yellow jumpsuit, just not for those too curvy
links_reviews_text: I thought this was so cute, but it didn't fit my chest. I liked the print!

links_reviews_title: Ok for a casual day but nothing special
links_reviews_text: This was cute enough but overall just seemed cheap to me. the fabric is very thin and wrinkles easily. It has to be worn braless, and was ok, but would be better with an extra layer of fabric or two in the bust.
Wore to a rehearsal dinner. Fit okay. The top is meant for more busty women but I still wore it and received compliments. Thank goodness the straps were adjustable.
Jumpsuits are generally hard as a tall pear. This didn't work for me.

links_reviews_title: Fun, comfortable, can dress up or down
links_reviews_text: Fit was true to size, except for chest which ran a little small. I wore this both as a casual daytime outfit and also dressed it up at night with heels.
Thin material, great for warm weather. Adjustable straps and breast bow. Legs are short but has cropped look. Fun pattern! Doesn't look too high end, casual feel.
Great colors, super comfortable, many complements. I ordered a larger size after reading reviews and I needed it.

this is super cute, but i wasn't able to wear it. i'm typically a 2 and the small fit fine w a decent amount of room to spare because the back is stretchy. the biggest issue was the bust. there are clear cup outlines and if you're more busty your boobs will not fit and the chest will look silly. i wld not recommend this to someone with a c cup or even a large b cup.

links_reviews_title: Love this jumpsuit so much. I wore it 3 times and got so many compliments.
links_reviews_text: Great fit around the bust, nice and flowy fit at the bottom
It fit great! Highly recommend. I will rent again!
Loved this jumpsuit. It is light and flowy for summer and still so feminineZ

links_reviews_title: Beware of how low the busy is
links_reviews_text: Absolutely love this romper, but not appropriate for work as it's impossible to hide your cleavage...even if you have a small bust.
I wore this for my fiesta themed bridal shower and it was absolutely perfect, so comfortable and flattering. True to size.
Super lightweight, lovely colors, lots of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Very cute, passes for a dress!
links_reviews_text: This jumpsuit is adorable! I could see this dressing up for a garden wedding or down for a casual picnic at the park. FIT: Pant length on a 5'4 frame was ok. I wore it during the later half of my first trimester and it was very comfortable. I couldn't find a bra that went with it, but it looks fine (maybe a tad lucious) bra-less. CAVEAT: the fabric wrinkles VERY easily, so I wouldn't travel with it anywhere without a steamer and consider that, if you sit down in it, it WILL wrinkle from behind as well. Something to keep in mind.

links_reviews_title: Really cute (until you sit, wrinkles easily)
links_reviews_text: Loved it! Very cute & glad I took pics right when I got to the party because after I sat down for a bit, I went to the bathroom and realized it was VERY wrinkled. Still cute but I wish the fabric didn't wrinkle so easily. Just stand as much as possible haha :) very cute & lots of compliments

This jumpsuit is pretty, and fits comfortably. I liked it fine, but I didn't find it to be anything special. It was a little thinner than I would like, which also made it feel a little cheap. I couldn't get the straps to stay up when moving around, despite fiddling with the length. Overall I give it a B -- It could make someone feel special, but didn't do it for me. (I'm 5'8 and medium build)

This fit well, though the top part was a bit tight initially. It did have some stretch, which was nice. The jumpsuit is super breathable but wrinkles when you just look at it too hard, so beware. There was also a seam right across the boob that I had not noticed before. If you have small girls, it probably will lay where it is supposed to, but it looked a little weird going across my 32D chest. However, it wasn't too noticeable with a military style jacket over it, and the color/pattern made it all work. I got lots of compliments on it, so overall pretty good.
The material was on the thicker side. Very comfortable. I loved the colorful outfit for a February event. Received many compliments, I would wear it again.

links_reviews_title: Cut leaves something to be desired
links_reviews_text: I love the look of this dress in pictures and the reviews were pretty good but the cut of this dress did literally nothing for my body. It didn't look bad, but it didn't get me excited. The fabric also wasn't as structured as I had expected and it ran big, so I ended up not wearing because it wasn't as tight as I had wanted it to be. The neckline is higher than I would've preferred also
I wore to a birthday brunch and got a ton of compliments. But it runs large and was loose all over. I will rent again and order a medium. It also stretches out quite a bit as you wear it.
This dress is so cute and the button/slit detail elevates it past the normal sweater dress. Runs really large, recommend sizing down by 1 or 2.
Love it want it so so great!! Easily accommodates strapless bra.
This dress was perfect for a polo event with a big hat

links_reviews_title: Fun colors and easy to wear
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a dinner in Montreal, but wore it out to the comedy festival and a taping of a podcast and was super comfortable and cute for all three. I went with sticky bra and felt presentable. The medium was more than large enough and on rtr I am often creeping into a 10. I mostly size up for broad shoulders so no issues their but it wasn't too tight around the waist or booty.

I absolutely loved this dress so much I bought one for Myself at Bloomingdales! I received so many compliments!! Get a size down!! Dress runs big! I'm Usually a size Large/12 and a medium fit me Perfect!
A little large in the back.Loved it still! Really nice colors.

This dress is just amazing. The fit is body con that hugs comfortably and the back adds loads of sexiness. I wore it w/o a bra although the strap across the back makes wearing one easy. Can't wait to rent it again.
Super cute, lots of compliments! Bright colors. I wore strapless bra with design. Flirty dress fun to wear

This dress was everything and wore it for a dinner out with husband. It was so comfortable and fun to wear with extra room in the tummy but fitted on all the curves. A home run for a plus size girl and the strap across the back covered a strapless perfectly. The only con was the dress began to loosen significantly as the evening wore on; I could've worn a large and it be perfect all night.
I LOVED this rental. Rented for a Kentucky Derby themed fundraiser for the police department. Received compliments continuously. Runs VERY LARGE so size down. The back is fun and flirty.

links_reviews_title: This was for a Kentucky Derby Party and I had many compliments.
links_reviews_text: It fit perfect and was very comfortable.

links_reviews_title: I loved this dress. So easy to dress dress up abs dress down. Perfect for spring/summer.
links_reviews_text: #gno
Form fitting in a very flattering way, this is an attention grabbing dress & I love it! It's extremely cute & comfortable- so many compliments on it!

This dress was so cute and super flattering. I love that the length is work appropriate with a sweater, and also perfect for a night out or happy hour. The back and pattern and unique and fun. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Very sexy with almost entire back out
links_reviews_text: I didn't have an opportunity to wear this dress but it was a stunner. I was surprised that almost the entire back of the dress was exposed - maybe I should have looked at the pics more closely.
Fits well, loved the back. Comfortable and true to size. Will absolutely rent again (besides, I need to justify the red shoes I purchased to go With the dress!)
Omg I want to rent this again! I didn't wear a bra with it and it was so comfortable

links_reviews_title: too big to enjoy it on
links_reviews_text: though i wore it since I was certain it would fit beautifully it did not way too big bunched up and it made me look heavy. would not recommend unless you go a size smaller
Looked awesome. A little loose in mid section. But overall very nice

links_reviews_title: I've been a fan of this style of dress but was afraid my body type wasn't right for it. I was wrong
links_reviews_text: The dress is so faltering to curves it's amazing to say the least. The bust is supportive which was surprising as I am a larger busted woman and that is very rare in a stretch material. It was flattering to my shape and accentuated all the right areas.
This is a very nice dress for a curvy girl. The top of the dress was a teensy bit too big. But, I was able to work with it. The dress hit just below my knees.
The XS fit perfectly. However, it looked too much like table cloth material and I did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Love the material and the cut.
links_reviews_text: This dress was comfortable and I received many compliments however it was loose. I'd rent the next size down.

links_reviews_title: Cute dress for 4th of July picnic
links_reviews_text: I was worried about the plaid being unflattering, but it's super cute and comfy. The only downside for me that the back was more exposed than I wanted, so I threw a little tank on underneath.
Sadly, this was so unflattering on my body there was no y I could wear it. The fit, the cut and the print made for a bad combo.
love, great material, will wear a couple of times before I send back
Way too big up top, and I'm not small.
Comfortable and curve lovin'! Very flattering and stands out! I typically wear 8 or 10. Ordered Lg because med wasn't avail. Not a bad fit for Lg. Med would have a more snug fit. Fun dress!

links_reviews_title: Tradeshow with Blazer during day. Party at night. Perfect
links_reviews_text: Had to tape bra to dress in back but it worked!
Very cute. Wish I sized down bc its very stretchy. Fabric is soft and comfortable
I am an 8 and the M was too big around my back & hips. Wore it with a jacket just to get 1 wear from it.
Too big for me to wear out.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress ... once you get into it. ;-)
links_reviews_text: This dress definitely runs small. I'm a solid size 8 and could have worn the medium, however, would have been uncomfortable all night so I opted for the large.
