Maneuvering the straps appropriately when putting it on was a challenge and there is no zipper. Now that I know what I'm getting myself into with this dress I would definitely rent it again. It was a head turner and my nephew's graduation.
This looked so cute on the model but not so much on me. The body fit well but the bust area was too big and just sagged. I tired adjusting the straps but couldn't make it work.

I should have known better, but as a tall, slim, pear I thought I might be able to pull off this adorable dress. Unfortunately it managed to exaggerate everything. My hips looked bigger, and my chest looked smaller. Hourglass figures will look amazing, but pears stay away.

I waited so long for this dress to become available in my size and was so disappointed when it came in. The colors are great and despite other reviews I do feel the picture shows the true color. It's nice because the chest area is lined since you cannot wear a bra with the open back, but the fit is so off. I am a true size 0 with 32DD chest and the busy on the extra small was huge on me. Overall the materials super stretchy and I think you could probably size down, but the top area just did nothing for me.
Looks very cute in the photos but runs quite large and I wasn't able to wear it. Fabric likewise feels cheap.
The picture is not accurate with this top. It's waist length and very festive looking. It was cute on me and I received a lot of compliments.

links_reviews_title: Worn on NYE to a museum and party.
links_reviews_text: so many compliments and such a fun material and color. A bit itchy when you get too warm. But overall a great piece.

This was cute and festive. My husband teased that it looks like one of those metal kitchen scrubbing pads; which is accurate. However I think around the holidays it can be pulled off. I rented this as a backup for a party and ended up going with something else that was more classic. Later I tried wearing it out one day to run errands and go to lunch, but it was so itchy I didn't get out the door in it. If you love the look of this I'd plan to wear an undershirt. I wouldn't worry about the reviews that say it's too short/cropped. I'm 5'9 and this didn't show my stomach at all.

I was on the fence about the sweater, but I am so happy I had it for the holiday season. People love it, though beware they may compare it to a Brillo pad. It isn't as long as it is on the model, as you can see, it was a crop style on me.

I wore this out for a snowy date night and it was perfect. I opted to wear the small instead of extra small for the length. This sweater reminded me of tinsel as its very sparkly - perfect for that bit of sparkle on cold nights.
This sweater ran EXTREMELY short!!! I am only 5'3" and i could not lift my arms without showing my stomach. The picture on RTR has it lookinh like it is a longer, slightly below the waste sweater.

The images of this sweater are misleading because you can't see how sparkly this sweater is. The sweater is super sparkly and GORGEOUS! I wore an XS and it was a little short on me. I'm usualy a small and I think a small would have been a bit longer.

links_reviews_title: Festive, glittery sweater - perfect for holiday parties
links_reviews_text: I loved the color - SILVER -- like tinsel on Christmas trees. I thought it might be too flashy for the party I was going to, but everyone loved it. Tons of compliments. Not something for every day, but perfect for a party!

I ended up not wearing this sweater because of the tinsel look. It's hard to tell in the picture. It just didn't work with my complexion. On the plus side the sweater was soft and not itching. It was a little more cropped than I anticipated too.
Loved this sweater. It's really soft and very sparkly. I wore it to a dinner party. A little too sparkly for everyday but pair nicely with black jeans and heels.
LOVED the color, SO Sparkly! I think dry cleaning may have shrunk it a little - it was closer to a cropped sweater than a long one as it looks on the model. Not itchy.
This sweater doesn't at all look like it does in the photos. It's really silvery ... like Xmas tinsel as a sweater. Not at all comfortable and runs really small. I didnt wear this.

I didn't look at the review pictures close enough and the official picture is not accurate. The shirt is shorter than it shows in the official picture. Had to wear high waist jeans and couldn't wear to work. But super sparkly!!
Sparkly and festive for a holiday party, but fabric doesn't breath so I felt like I was overheating wearing it. Maybe better for an outdoor event where you want to keep warm.
I sent this right back once I saw the material it was made of. I thought it would be a fuzzy grey sweater, but it's a shimmery tinsel plastic sweater.

links_reviews_title: Unique piece. I received a lot of complements
links_reviews_text: This is not nearly as long as the picture shows (or maybe it's b/c I have a larger chest). On me, the sweater hit 2-3 inches higher.
It was a really cropped sweater. I wasn't expecting that
Really warm--almost too warm for winter in the South. Kind of itchy. But lots of complements!

This sweater turned out to be short. I had to wear a t-shirt underneath to not show my belly during winter. It was shimmery/sparkly, but the material was scratchy. Not soft. If you want a short shaggy sparkly sweater and don't mind it being scratchy, go for it!

links_reviews_title: I received many compliments. It looks like tinsel, but it is soft.
links_reviews_text: Everyone wanted to touch the sweater. It was a fun item to wear to a holiday work party.

links_reviews_title: This sweater was cute and unique. It literally looks like silver tinsel.
links_reviews_text: Fit was different than what the pictures imply in that it was shorter than I thought. Still fit me well though.

links_reviews_title: It was a little more flashy, shiny than I wanted. Not what I was looking for. I did not wear it.
links_reviews_text: It was a little more flashy, shiny than I wanted. Not what I was looking for. I did not wear it.

links_reviews_title: Too short and interesting metallic color
links_reviews_text: Unfortunately the color in the online photo doesn't really match the color of the sweater. It is truly metallic and not at all what I was expecting. The length was extremely short on me although I am 5'8". Due to the fit I wasn't able to wear the item, but the metallic material was not what I was hoping for.

Super cute sweater, but the photo is very misleading. The model must be wearing an XL, because the length of the Medium is probably about 4 inches shorter than the picture. I had to wear another shirt underneath so my stomach wouldn't show. It's also a lot more tinsel-like in person, which is very cute, but isn't shown in the picture.
This sweater is basically a crop top....size up one maybe even two sizes. Was adorable but I couldnt wear it because it was WAY too small

links_reviews_title: This looks nothing like the picture. It is a lot shorter and it is made of tinsel!!!
links_reviews_text: This looks nothing like the picture. I bought it for everyday, but it is more like a NYE sweater with a lot of silver tinsel.

The description and picture were not accurate. The picture shows this sweater to be longer, to the hip, however it was more like a crop top, it hits right above the belly button. The color was also not accurate, as the fringe material was a lot more sparkly in real life. Would not recommend this to anyone.

Sparkling sweater! I thought it would be longer, so I can wear it with leggings (just like the picture). However it was actually short. I had to wear it with high-rise jeans. Besides this, it was really sparkling and pretty sweater.

links_reviews_title: tinsel. Also much shorter than appears in the picture.
links_reviews_text: maybe ok for a holiday party, but very glitzy.
This is a very festive and fun sweater, styled with back pants it was great for a holiday event!

It's a little campy and out there in the best possible way. You could wear it if you wanted to be the chic one at an ugly sweater but still convince people you were on theme. I wore it the same way as the model and it was an effortless yet eye-catching look.
Very silvery and shiny!! Could be great for a holiday party, but didn't realize how flashy it is from pictures.

links_reviews_title: This dress is super cute and sassy courtesy of the open back. I love the lace detail on the sides.
links_reviews_text: I love this little sexy dress! Great choice for a petit athletic build. This dress will definitely showcase your back and legs. I have broad shoulders so it felt a little snug across the chest, but not enough for me to size up. I was concerned about being bra less but pasties did the trick. Im sad I didn't get to wear it more. I would have bought this dress if not for stay at home orders.
Short, no stretch.

This dress was amazing. Love the open back - low, but classy. I'm really tall and it was short but not trashy short. The fit is amazing; super slimming! I'm a 4-6 and the 6 was perfect! Would buy if I rent again.
Gorgeous dress, super classy and sexy at the same time! Runs a little big IMO. I normally wear a 4 and ended up wearing the 2. Would definitely rent again!

links_reviews_title: Dress fit nicely, flattered my curvy figure.
links_reviews_text: This dress fit very well. The tummy area is very forgiving and the ruffles help show off the legs.

links_reviews_title: This dress was perfect for a black tie wedding.
links_reviews_text: The dress was so comfortable and made me feel like a million bucks!
Beautiful dress, received several compliments. However, this dress is very short.

This dress is so cute. It was perfect for a date night during colder weather. Paired it with black tights, booties, leather jacket, and red lips. I don't know which i liked more...the open back (strap you see is just my crossbody bag) or the lace side panels. I gave it 4 stars because of the fit, mainly the arms. The 2 fit my in the torso but the arm holes seemed shallow, it was hard to move my arms. The 4 was much better, but a little bigger in the back and torso. Over all loved it!

One of my most favorite rentals to date! Great fit, super flattering. I will say I am on the shorter end and I still was being conscious about the length in the back, the "peplum" part at the bottom of the dress made it feel super short in the back, even though it didn't appear too short. Overall I received a ton of compliments on this dress and i would definitely rent it again!
The perfect club, party or date dress. Fabric has some stretch. Sexy and yet classy.

This dress was great! Nice fabric and love the open back and lace sides. The sleeves were way too long for me so I had to roll them. The 12 was a bit too big so the back puckered a bit and was loose around my bust. I didn't order a size 10 but I think if I had it would have fit perfectly. It was very comfortable and the skirt has great movement. I got tons of compliments and was overall very happy!!

links_reviews_title: Did Not Work For My Body Type
links_reviews_text: I rented this dress for my birthday dinner in San Francisco. Sadly it did not work for my body type at all. The first thing I noticed, when I opened the this dres is that the shoulder pads are huge in it. Seriously huge like 80s huge. I felt a little like a linebacker wearing it. The next thing I noticed is that there are zippers for some reason on both of the arms, I'm not quite sure why they exist, but they were really uncomfortable on and dug into my skin. The next thing that didn't work for me what is the neckline being so hi, it rubbed against my neck and created a bright red rash, not a good look at all. Lastly, the dress did not work with my rear end at all. I have a little bit of a bigger rear than most, and this dress hit it in all the wrong places. It flared out right as my rear end, making me feel exposed and trying to pull it down constantly. Some pros about this dress I thought it's made of really warm high quality fabric that feels quite luxurious. The open back was absolutely beautiful and the lace was in perfect condition and really stunning. Ultimately, I think if I was a slightly different body type and enjoyed the bold shoulder look more, this look might have work for me but sadly it was a no and I went with another option. For reference I am 5'8, Dress size 2, Jean Size 27.

links_reviews_title: Perfect little black dress to have in your closet. Very versatile.
links_reviews_text: I love the open back. Super sexy but conservative. Perfect for date night or event. I rented this dress twice and ended up buying it! Perfect little black dress to have in your closet. You can wear this a million different ways

Loved the dress but it didn't work for me. I'm in between sizes so I wasn't sure it was going to work and it didn't. The dress would ride up since I have hips which would make the dress really short since I have a butt. The back puckered on the sides near the opening. Ended up not wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Didn't want to send it back!
links_reviews_text: I honestly loved this dress so much. Sending it back was so sad! I was a little nervous at first because there were no reviews, but I ended up taking a chance and ordering my regular sizes--2 and 4. I wore the 2, but the 4 probably would have been okay. The dress was a bit tight in the shoulders, so if you're broad, you might want to size up!

I wore this dress twice before sending back. I absolutely loved the open back and side lace design. Very comfortable. It was a little big on the top part. I probably should have ordered the size 8. Check your accurate measurements before ordering. (:
Literally LOVED this dress. I got so many compliments and this dress made me feel so fab! Would so rent this again. The cut out back just makes this dress
Ordered this for a NYE party and it's cute but it fits oddly- the shoulders are puffed out and back isn't tight enough so the fabric sticks out. I wished it worked out!

links_reviews_title: Wouldn’t have wanted any other dress!
links_reviews_text: I bought 6 dresses for a formal work event and FINALLY found this one which ended up PERFECT. It runs a little snug but fit like a glove. I loved what it did for my hourglass figure and the shoulder pads were not at all bad like some of the reviews I read. They were subtle and just added structure to the shape. I have fairly narrow frame and shoulders so this looked fine on my body type. The open back and side peekaboo meant no bra which was very doable because of the cut and thickness of material. I did use athletic tape to tape my boobs so they would land closer together than they do naturally because I did not want any side-boob since this was a work event. If it had been a party with friends I would have gone without the tape! I got so many compliments and felt amazing. Will rent again!

I loved the look and feel of this dress, but sadly it was too small for me. The bottom portion fit perfect but the top, because I'm 32DD, was too tight and I like to dance. I was afraid I wouldn't be able to move much and would tear the dress.

links_reviews_title: Ended up not going, didn't get to wear the dress. It's stunning though, I would rent again for sure!
links_reviews_text: Perfect fit. Amazing details.

links_reviews_title: Amazing fit, cozy yet breezy due to the open back
links_reviews_text: Fit really well and the open back really helped me stay cool hostessing on a VERY busy Saturday night.

The 8 as a perfect fit in the bust but way too tight in the hips. The 10 was PERFECT in the hips, but just not tight enough in the bust. Beautiful dress. Maybe not for someone curvy on the bottom but needing a little tightness on top.
Did not wear due to large shoulder pads. Rest of dress fit ok.
I really wanted to love this dress, but it was just hanging on me.

links_reviews_title: Felt like it was made for me!
links_reviews_text: LOVED this dress. Rented for a formal work event; the open back was just sexy enough without being over-the-top. I was surprised that the 0 was too small, since I almost always take that size. But the 2 was just right and SO flattering. I wish I could have kept this one!
Love the open back and zip up sleeves. Adorable!

links_reviews_title: unfortunately couldn't wear the dress- my usual size 6 was way too small - didn't fit me at all
links_reviews_text: would order a size 8-10

links_reviews_title: Tonya Harding in a good way
links_reviews_text: A bit small weird on the arms but so charming besides
Loved it the top is a bit larger but super flattering fun dress
I went a size up, but should have stayed with my usual size. It was too big.

links_reviews_title: Super cute dress, but no way I could wear it.
links_reviews_text: Granted, I am tall, 5’11, but this dress is super short!! There is no way I could have worn this in public. Bummer because it was exactly what I was looking for. Nice thick fabric too with a bit of stretch.
Beautiful dress just a tad short for me. Wasn't able to wear it.

links_reviews_title: Great dress, fit perfectly! The dress is super cute and I loved the open back!
links_reviews_text: This dress was so cute, I loved it! There is a small amount of "side boob" that shows if you are busty, like me. But it looks good! Great fit, fun dress!

The dress is very cute but I'm a little wider in the hits than my top half. I wore the dress with thigh high boots to balance it out because it was a little short on me. Top portion did feel loose through the sleeves and bust area. Over all I liked the dress although I would not wear it again it just didn't fit me well.

links_reviews_title: I wasn't able to wear it.
links_reviews_text: I so wanted this dress to work but the fit was very awkward. I am thin but broad shouldered and this dress has shoulder pads which just made me look like a line backer. The quality was very good and if you are a petite person, I think it would work well,
it was too large on the sides
super fun but not the most flattering if you have a tummy
This dress is beautiful, but looks a bit different IRL. The shoulder pads are pretty prominent and it doesnt give you much leeway in the waist/thigh areas.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it. I should've gone up a size.
links_reviews_text: The 6 didn't work for me. I probably should've gone up to an 8 or 10. Loved the details.

links_reviews_title: Wore to a Mardi Gras ball. It fit wonderfully and I received many compliments.

links_reviews_text: I adored this dress. It fit well and accented me in all the right places. I'm ungodly short so the tea length hit me at my ankle. It was heavy, but great for a winter party. My only qualm was that because I'm bigger busted, I had to make sure I didn't fall out of the top all night. But I loved it. I got compliments all night and it was so swingy when I was dancing. 10/10 would rent again

links_reviews_title: The pockets are a HUGE PLUS. Got more compliments on the pockets from men than I did women, lol.
links_reviews_text: Fit - would have been perfect if not for the bust area. I debated including the 2nd pic because of the embarrassing way my boobs are being pulled down (this is not the way my cleavage looks in fits), but it's a good warning for reference if you have a similar problem with dresses fitting great everywhere but your bust/upper back. (That cut is from fashion tape that moved around all day) I have broad shoulders and a (slightly) above average size chest area, so getting the dress pulled as far up as I needed first was a challenge. A 6 would be slipping and too big, but the 4 was just tight enough in my upper back that I had problems keeping it all the way up on my chest because it would threaten to slip down! Wish there was a size in between 4 & 6. CONS - The dress lasted me 12 hours of wear, but after a solid 8 hours, the last 4 were a struggle with fashion tape moving around and not sticky anymore. During the reception I had to keep subtly pulling it up my chest as I walked around because of the heavy material pulling down, and I didn't want low cut cleavage showing. By the end of the night when the tape had given out, my boyfriend was even helping me keep it from pulling down while we danced! We were drunk and turned this into a funny game on the dance floor, but I would NOT recommend risking this fit if you have the awkward bust problem with formal dresses. I rented a 2 as my backup because I read a lot of reviews saying to size down, but I don't recommend sizing down if you're a bit more top heavy. PROS - All that said, the dress is beautiful and the thick material was perfect for attending a formal winter wedding in Chicago. It's elegant and subdued color, which I think is perfect for wedding guest. I felt very pretty, tea length was perfect, and I'm 5'8 and have long legs. Overall, would recommend but consider the dress being strapless and heavy material before choosing a size.

The fit was perfect and I loved the colors! It was a little long on me, but I didn't need to keep pulling it up all night. It was unique, yet simple. Fabric is a little heavy and wouldn't be good for warmer months. Highly recommend!

links_reviews_title: This dress is absolutely incredible. Seriously.
links_reviews_text: The dress fits SO perfectly. It has pockets!! It hits about mid-calf on me, and I wore a 5 inch heel. It might be one of my favorite things I've ever worn in my life, and when and if it ever goes on sale, I will buy it. I got SO many compliments on it. I have a smaller chest, so if you have a larger bust, you'll likely be able to fill out the top a little more. This dress is amazing!!!
Great quality fabric; perfect for a fall or winter wedding. I wore it on the dance floor and it held up really well for a strapless dress.

links_reviews_title: Was told I was best dressed wedding guest!
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress! I wore it to a NYE wedding, and it was a perfect fit to disguise my newly pregnant belly. I received tons of compliments and it was comfortable enough to wear well into the evening.

links_reviews_title: wonderful fit and style for black tie wedding!
links_reviews_text: Many of the reviews mentioned sizing down but this was pretty true to size for me. I wear a 6 in J. Crew dresses and a size 6 fit really well! I liked how thick the fabric was, loved the pockets, and enjoyed the detail on the dress.

Wore this dress to a November wedding. I loved the colors and the detail in the fabric. I got a lot of compliments on the dress throughout the night as well. I was in between sizes so I went with the smaller to have a tighter fit in the torso since the bottom of the dress was so full. It was a bit tight and needed some adjustments throughout the night but being small chested I didn't want the top to be loose.

links_reviews_title: I'm in love with this dress!
links_reviews_text: I absolutely loved this dress and was sad to send it back. It's a heavy dress and kept me warm for a fall wedding. Due to it being heavy I sized down to keep it in place throughout the day and dancing. By the end of the night the though the dress was falling a bit but nothing major.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress if it fits you-
links_reviews_text: The color and pattern of this fabric is rich and lovely. I am petite and unfortunately I didn't have the busy size to make it work. It is heavy as many reviewers point out and even with a padded bra I couldn't keep it up! If it came in a size smaller I would've worn it.
Beautiful unique fabric and soooo comfy!

I loved the dress and got so many compliments. The only complaint that I have is I expected to be a size 4 or 6, as I'm usually one of those two sizes, and really could have gotten a 2. Other than that the dress was gorgeous!

links_reviews_title: Love the color, feel, & fit. It has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Dress was perfect for a warmer fall/winter Florida formal wedding. Boning under the left arm slightly popped out & is the only reason I didn't rate it 5 stars. Fabric did not feel or look cheap. Loved the dress other than boning issue

links_reviews_title: Tons of compliments. Loved how it spun out when I was swing dancing!
links_reviews_text: Fit was good, a bit tight in the chest area.

A great dress that received many compliments. The pockets were spacious and useful. The dress stayed up without need for tugging, as a high quality strapless dress should. By the end of a night full of dancing, some of the boning was rubbing at my back.

This dress is super flattering. It's heavy so I had to use a decent amount of fashion tape to keep it up, especially since it wasn't right around my rib cage. If I hadn't done that it would've fallen down all night. Otherwise amazing dress and gotta love having pockets!!

The dress runs large. Since the material is heavy it needed to pull it up a few times during the evening. I also wore it with the little straps that are used for the hanger as I liked how it looked better with straps. Very pretty dress.

heavy brocade material that hangs very well. If you are pear shaped like me this dress is a dream in that is highlights all the good things. However, as a short person, be prepared for an ankle length dress.

The dress itself is beautiful, but I wish it had straps. The material is so heavy that it pulls down, so I had to constantly pull it up from the bust. Felt uncomfortable with my chest very exposed from this problem. Would not rent again.

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: Similar to other reviews, I found the dress was a bit big in the bust, but it stayed up through dancing and a full day of wedding festivities (though I do feel like I was pulling it up every 10 minutes). It's a slightly heavier material - just something to keep in mind if you're attending an outdoor summer wedding. Really lovely fit overall, it has pockets which are cool, and the length was perfect for me (technically it's tea length but it fit me like a full length dress - didn't have to worry about any part of the dress dragging on the floor, etc.)

The dress was beautiful and I received so many compliments. Fit wise, the corset part of the dress was really long and it was meant for a taller woman (or a woman with a long torso). Also, the plastic liners in the corset were scratching my back and I had to add additional fabric to cover the problem area.

The dress was beautiful and perfect for a wedding. However, it runs a bit big. I am normally a 2 put the 0 was a bit loose on top. It's nice a roomy in the hip/thigh area, which is nice. I would size down for your extra size. I'm 5'8" and it hit me just below mid-calf.

Originally, this was my back-up dress for my brother's wedding. It should have been my first choice from the beginning. The dress is so comfortable. It has pockets! Great for sitting, dancing, and going through many transitions with photos. The length was a little longer than expected. It hit me at my ankles. I did wear 3" heels with the dress. I received so many compliments from the guests. I think having a bit of a bust helped keep the dress up. I wasn't pulling it up all night.
Loved this dress- Perfect option for someone who is tall. Runs a bit large- I could have used the smaller size especially in the chest. Got so many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, but didn't like the fit on me
links_reviews_text: This is a review for the size 2. I had a couple issues with this dress. The top didn't have enough structure to wear without a bra. I tried wearing it with a strapless bra, but it felt too bulky and I still kept having to pull it up. I am a 32D and rarely have this problem with strapless dresses. The dress is very heavy, so perhaps that was part of the problem. I was planning on wearing it to a wedding, but there was no way I could have danced in it without having to adjust it every minute. Also, the dress was a bit too long. I am 5'4" and it wasn't quite tea length on me.

The dress was unlike any other at this black tie wedding. I loved the neckline. The dress stayed perfectly in place all night....even through dancing and picking up kids. I found it to be very comfortable. The pockets were deep and SO helpful. It's a great, very formal dress.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress for a formal wedding
links_reviews_text: I really loved this dress - and it has pockets! I'm normally a size 2 regular, but was a 0 in this dress. The fabric is stunning - and a bit heavy - so it's helpful to go a size down. Totally happy with this rental and got many compliments!

links_reviews_title: Prettier in person but not a perfect fit
links_reviews_text: This dress is beautiful. The pattern and material are top notch, however the fit wasn't perfect. I went with the 8 because the cup size was small on the 6. I wore it to a 2pm church service and changed for the 5:30 black tie reception. I was happy to make the switch, I like to dance and this dress would not have stayed up well.

I absolutely LOVED this dress. I wore it for a wedding in March, so it was a bit chilly still, but the fabric is on the thicker side so it kept me warm. Plus, this dress has pockets! So convenient to stash my phone ( and everyone else's for that matter!)

Heavy fabric. Nice pattern like pictures show. It was just too long for me. Hit me at the ankles which felt awkward. Although the pockets seem nice, it made me look wider and seemed like a lot of extra fabric on the bottom.

Wore this for a Black is optional wedding and it was a hit! So many compliments. The fit was perfect and true to size. Did not even have to wear a strapless bra or anything and felt well supported all night. Dress hem was torn but I take that as fault to a previous renter and multiple wears, not the quality of the dress. I was able to safety pin it without notice though. Would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Lovely dress, lots of compliments and loved having pockets
links_reviews_text: Runs a little big
Love the fabric. I was given plenty of compliments. It's runs a little big, but was a joy to wear!

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress, sort of weird fit
links_reviews_text: Such a gorgeous dress - heavy fabric perfect for a winter/cool wedding, beautiful detailing, tea length (meant for tall girls... would be too long for someone short) ; however just a weird fit for me. It was tight up top which sort of flattened/squished the chest area (not for a larger-chested girl), which was ok since the fabric was so heavy I don't know that the dress would have stayed up otherwise. Also the boning in the bodice was pretty painful throughout the night - no one noticed and it was still a gorgeous dress; just not very comfortable.
I typically wear a 6 but fit into the 4. Such a great dress! Thick material that's perfect for the winter. Loved the pockets.

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a formal winter wedding!
links_reviews_text: The fit was true to size - I wear a 4 in most clothing and the 4R was just right! My only complaint was that there were a few wires around the waist in the back that were sticking out and poking me.

This is one of my all time favorite dresses. Expensive looking material and a perfect mix of classy and sexy. Only complaint is that it photographs as nearly black so it's difficult to appreciate the beautiful pattern.

links_reviews_title: Beautiful dress with amazing details. A little heavy, perfect for a winter party! It has pockets!
links_reviews_text: Con- heavy strapless dress = some fidgeting throughout the night. Pro- pockets and warm!

I didn't need to wear a bra but I felt very secure even during dancing, walking, spinning, etc. The quality was unbelievable and fit like it was made for me. The purple and blue pattern was so unique and gorgeous for a formal holiday party.
Cute dress but very low cut so be prepared for that one

It's extremely flattering. The shaping and the colors make this dress so fun to wear. I loved it. I do have to say that it ran a bit longer, as expected because I'm on the shorter end in height. And if my bust was any bigger I don't think it would have fit as well. But the 2R was a perfect fit on me. If your very endowed with a larger torso, you may need to size up.
Paired it with a thigh-high boot and leather jacket which made it perfect for Fall!

links_reviews_title: Maybe the best dress ever made
links_reviews_text: I loved this dress so much and wore it manyyyyy times during my rental period. So comfy. So bright. Perfect length. Def a little bit of a plunging neckline so I didn't wear it to work. But basically if I wasn't at work I was wearing this dress. Rent it!!!!

links_reviews_title: Effortlessly elegant while still being able to wear it in whatever setting. Super cute!
links_reviews_text: This fit like a glove. Even though the chest area is more revealing than I would like, it was still comfortable. Its supposed to be a midi but considering I'm short, it was a little closer to floor length but still looked great. I would buy this!
Super cute dress for an everyday look. It's super comfortable as well. It is a bit low cut, but other than that it's perfect! Great summer look!
It fit true to size and was so flattering!
Rented for date night - looks amazing, fabric on point and clinches onto your waist like no body's business. May want to size up due to the waist being quite tight.

I'm naturally small busted 34B and my frame is fairly small. I normally wear a size 4 and that's what I ordered. It was a perfect fit for me, but I could see this being a difficult dress for bustier girls. Personally, I absolutely loved this dress. I was so comfortable and confident all night because it was so flattering. Highly recommend! Loved it so much that I bought it!
I received so many compliments wearing this dress.
Runs small in the waist, might be cute in really tall skinny ladies with no boobies.
This dress fit nicely. It was too low-cut for work so I had to wear a bandeau, but it worked well that way. It's for sure midi, I'm 5'10" and it hit me mid-calf. Definitely pretty.

links_reviews_title: I love this Photo as much as I love this Dress
links_reviews_text: The fit is amazing - small waist but a beautiful length. I'm petite but the cut and fit was amazing!!

Flowy but no give in the waist. Only weird thing for me was the neckline folded outward. Love the deep dive though - went to my sternum. Works well for small chests even though it seems to be cut for bigger ones.

Looooove this dress! Perfect for summer, and could be transitional to fall, and here is why/what you need to know: I have a wider rib cage and wear 34B, so after reading reviews about how tight it was in the rib cage, I decided to size up (I'm usually size 8 and went with size 10): even though my breasts don't fill out the chest area, the pattern and colors made it appropriate to wear without a bra. There is a hidden clasp in the front to pull the chest area in just a bit more, or leave it unclasped for an even deeper v in the front. I decided to clasp it. This worked for me, perhaps because I also have broad shoulders so that helped to make the chest area seem less big. I wore this dress while riding my motorcycle (I know, not proper riding gear) from Brooklyn into Manhattan and I didn't flash anyone, so yay :) I paired with gray huarache mules (wore boots while riding and then changed) and received lots of compliments on the dress. Colors are gorgeous!! The dress is the perfect length and the material is lightweight to make a 90 degree day bearable! To transition into fall, I'd pair this dress with black leather boots and a leather jacket. Really want to make this dress mine but right now it's only 10% so I'm gonna be hopeful and wait it out.
Such an interesting dress. Loved the plunge neck line and sleeves! I wish I would have kept it forever. Highly recommend it. Check out my Insta for more @FarahPink
Small boobs don't win in this dress, could've been so much cuter if I filled it out!

links_reviews_title: Best dress ever for compliments. Needs a bralet or no bra situation
links_reviews_text: Wore this for my bday dinner And it's fits perfectly with the top laying flat with such a soft lux material. Very flattering and easy to wear

links_reviews_title: Chest too tight and too deep cut
links_reviews_text: The dress just didn't fit my chest. It was awkward to try to button it on the chest. The sleeves were awkward. I was going to wear this dress with a top over it to hide the awkward top but the print was so loud nothing I have went well with it. I never ended up wearing it.
I loved the pattern and overall style. It was very low cut and tight in the chest. There is a clasp in the front that was pulled very tightly. I wish I could have worn it!

I loved this dress. Wore it to a backyard birthday party and got a ton of compliments. It's low cut but I have a flat chest so it was fine. The dress fit true to size (I'm usually between a 4 and 6) and was very comfortable. A nice soft yet structured material.
Was a little snug so if between sizes probably go up! I didn't wear a bar with it because it was snug in the bust and I'm a 34B. super light and airy. Def want to keep

links_reviews_title: I wish this dress fit me
links_reviews_text: Absolutely beautiful dress but unfortunately it did not zip up on me and size 10 is the largest size they have available.
I thought this dress absolutely beautiful in person. However, I wasn't able to fit into it correctly. It felt overly tight at the waistband.

links_reviews_title: absolutely love this dress but runs really small in the ribs and chest. im a 34B and it was tight
links_reviews_text: the rib and chest area are very tight i couldn't even zip it up and I am a 34B, 5'6 110 lbs. The dress itself is absolutely beautiful though. Kinda bummed it didn't fit. get a size up

links_reviews_title: Perfect sundress for a warm day
links_reviews_text: This dress was perfect - I'm 5' 1'' and it was definitely still a mid-length dress on me. I wore it with sneakers to walk around a new city, but you can definitely dress this up with nicer sandals or heels. The only issue was with the clasp on the chest area - because it was a little tighter the clasp was coming undone and made the V neck look a little weird. It's definitely low cut, so not sure if bigger chested women can get away with it but it worked out well for me (I'm a 36C)

This dress was exactly what I was looking for: pretty, casual, feminine, and comfortable. I wore it to run errands and for date night at a local brewery. It got suddenly chilly here, so I paired it with leggings. My only complaint is that where the fabric gather just below the empire waist, highlighted my stomach pooch a little, but I guess I can't blame the dress for that. I would have worn the dress without a cami underneath for date night, but I didn't have a bra with a deep enough V.
Wore this dress to a birthday party during the day and it transitioned perfectly to date night. I was tempted to buy this dress.
This is a gorgeous dress and very flattering. Could have gone one size up, but made it work.

links_reviews_title: Way too revealing for everyday use
links_reviews_text: I am 5'2", 138lbs, 32DD. I ordered this dress to wear every day, and as other reviewers mentioned, it's just way too revealing. It's a casual fabric and print and seems ridiculous to show that much cleavage in a casual dress. There are a small hook and eye, but even that doesn't help. I wouldn't even wear this to dinner with my BF's parents, so it's going back. Keep in mind, I am not conservative or afraid of some cleavage, it's just out of place with this dress for my purposes.
I love this dress. Well made and comfortable but runs small! I wore this to work with a cami under it and with heeled sandals.

links_reviews_title: Couldn't zip up and looked like cheap curtains.
links_reviews_text: Too small.
Most of it fit well, but it was way too tight in the chest area. I loved the print so exchanged for one size up
Rented the 2 and will rent again one size up...2 was way too tight in chest and rib cage

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a waterfront cocktail hour!
links_reviews_text: This was so light, flowy, and comfortable. I rated it small as I normally wear a US 2 and found the 2 to be very tight around the rib cage, which is unusual for me. The 4 was perfect, but I did have to use some body tape to make sure it didn't move at the bust (I'm fairly small-chested, 32C).
This dress is incredibly flattering and accents the waist. I found the cut on the top to be perfect, a small amount of cleavage but not too much (I'm a 32D). Size up, runs small.
Dress was comfy and feminine. Great for NYC summer days.
This was so cute and fit perfectly. Definitely good for tall women
Loved the material. This is low cut, even with the additional clasp. Great colors!

links_reviews_title: Flowy floral-very nice summer day dress.
links_reviews_text: Super feminine with it's flouncy sleeves and waist hugging bodice. Beware of the plunging neckline. I wore a cami beneath to make it work-day appropriate. The fabric isn't quite as vibrant as pictured but it was fine for a one-time wear.
Wore for New Years Party in Miami - light material, looked amazing and subtly sexy
This dress fits so nice. It fits your curves, but also camouflages areas that you want to hide because of how the material gathers.
Really cool cuts to this dress. It's definitely a bit tight, and the fabric is cotton so there's not much stretch. But overall really classy.

links_reviews_title: Very thin fabric- this is a light weight T-shirt drsss

links_reviews_text: I rented this to wear to a whimsical Oscar Party - at a friend's apartment, not in LA - and needed help getting the dress on .... and then off. The cape like thing that is supposed to drape to one side looked like some kind of long saggy udder hanging off my boobs. Also the dress was hella long. I am 5'6" and the dress puddled at my feet - I needed spike heels to even attempt to get the hem off the ground. The spaghetti strap was also inches too long and hung off my shoulder. Sad panda.

Rented for NYE and by the look of the photographs posted, I was excited for it to arrive. Unfortunately, it's a very thin cotton material which does not look like it does in the photo. It's not terrible, but I will not be wearing this for any special occasion and I'm glad that I ordered other dresses to choose from. I just didn't feel good in it when I put it on.

links_reviews_title: I choose another dress from my RTR Unlimited choices but this is an amazing dress.
links_reviews_text: Incredibly comfortable.
Absolutely stunning. Was a little casual but perfect for what I needed. Loved wearing this piece.

I received many compliments on this rental! It is so jazzy. I usually wear a 6 but based on reviews, I ordered 8R with a 6 as my backup. Needless to say, I could barely fit the 6. The 8 was perfect. The only thing I didn't like was the slip kept riding up. 5'5, 34A, athletic build, 150 lbs. Highly recommend.

My original order wasn't available, so RTR sent this to me instead. I never would have chosen it on my own but I'm so glad they sent it. I looked and felt amazing all night long. The built in slimming foundation is absolute magic. I'm a 36DDD, hourglass figure, 5'7", and wear a street size 10/12. Size 10R fit well and was exactly the right length for 4" heels. I wish I could have kept it forever - you won't be disappointed in this dress.

I chose this dress for an awards Gala my office put on. This is one of the most beautiful pieces I have worn in a while. I received so many compliments on this dress. It was eloquent and edgy all in one. I'm 5'3" about 125lbs and full 34D and normally wear a size 4. The size 6 was very form fitting and didn't need to wear a bra. Absolutely loved this dress and will rent it again.

I'm 5'3 107 lbs and ordered size 0. The length was perfect no matter what size height your shoes are because as I read in another review of this dress, you can play with the material of the dress and gather it higher or pull it lower. It was super tight because of the built in spanx but it didn't affect me being able to breathe like some dresses. I received many compliments throughout the night and was even told "you have the best dress here"!
Perfect length and fit. Runs true to size. Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Perfect for an Annual Work Party
links_reviews_text: This was stylish enough to my liking and yet sophisticated for a winter formal event. Length wasn't bad for petite, but I did wear it with about 4inch platform strapped by heels. Would rent again!
Feel flawless--no matter what type of flair you decide to put on the look #formfitting #comfortable #sexy

Originally I wanted the size 4R but it was not available so I had to make do with the 2L which would not zip up, if it wasn’t for the shape wear in the dress I probably could have fit in the 2L but it was just way too tight. Luckily someone returned a size 4R just in time for me to rent it as a back up and it fit perfectly like a second skin. I got so many compliments! The main thing I loved about the dress was the built in shape wear! No need for a bra or spanx!!!!!! It was so comfortable, never needed to adjust the dress at all. I will definitely rent again, might even purchase it!
This picture doesn't do this dress justice due to the poor lighting but I absolutely felt like Angelina Jolie in Mr and Mrs Smith lol! A sexy undercover spy!
Dress was sexy tight and very forgiving. Felt like a torch singer. Performing in this dress.
Have NEVER received more compliments in my entire life. Such a unique dress and showstopper!
Absolutely loved this dress. Wore to a masquerade gala but would for sure rent for a winter wedding next year. It was so comfortable and the ruching was great too.

Loved the built in foundations on this gown. It was perfect to a holiday house party that involved a lot of food and booze. Sexy yet comfortable! Styled with yellow suede Manolo pumps and a black clutch and gold Alexis bittar cuff (also RTR)
No complaints! Felt like a zillion bucks. So comfortable! Kept getting compliments all night.

This was the sexiest dress I've worn yet showing very little skin...the neckline and asymmetrical sleeves made this dress unforgettable! The jersey fabric had lots of stretch. I've worn other cinq a self dresses in the past but this one doesn't seem to follow the brands 'typical' narrow sizing. Would highly recommend to anyone in need of a black tie gown

I am glad I selected the 6 because this dress was tight. Would have been perfect if there was a petite option, the length and proportions would definitely work better on someone taller but I made it work with platform heels.

I'm a Medium/6-10 in dresses and I didn't come close to doing up the size 8 zip on back torso. Good dress for winter event. A bit gothic...so instead of ordering a bigger size I'm gonna look at other options for dressy festive holiday party.

Loved the built in shaping effect of this dress. I have a short torso and did feel the torso part of this dress was a bit to long for me, which made the back bunch up a bit. But overall it was comfortable to wear all night, looked awesome in photos and in real life and was the right amount of chic and edgy.

links_reviews_title: "Stunning. Gorgeous. Sexy." You'll hear it all
links_reviews_text: Dress was a total winner for the night. Wore it to a formal fundraiser and it was perfection. Dress runs small though so make sure you size up. I'm 5'9" and ordered the size 8L which was a perfect length. My heels caught on the back a bit when I walked. Although the dress is super comfortable, the lining underneath rides up a little bit. Regardless dress was still stunning

This dress was so flattering and comfortable! I sized up, as other reviewers suggested and the fit was perfect! It was very forgiving on my post babies tummy, but still looked super sexy and classy! Wish I owned this dress.

links_reviews_title: I was quite comfortable. I'm 5'9"/148 lbs. i thought 8R would be too short, but it was perfect!
links_reviews_text: True to size...8R was a perfect length being that I'm 5'9". The dress has built in undergarments (yay)!
Great fit, sexy snd comfortable. Beautiful dress!

links_reviews_title: I received lots of compliments! Great fit!
links_reviews_text: I was worried about the length but it was perfect with a mid- size heel.

I felt amazing in this! It's totally eye-catching, hugs in all the right places, and is super comfortable. It looks very expensive (someone asked me if it was vintage Gucci) . I got a ton of compliments all night. If you want to feel like a dime, rent this one!

links_reviews_title: The way the dress made me feel. I felt confident, strong and sexy.
links_reviews_text: The dress fabric was thick but stretchy, sucked in all the parts you wanted hidden and flirted with the parts you would want shown! I felt beautiful in this dress and it was perfect for a winter wedding! I highly recommend.

links_reviews_title: This dress was amazing! It fitted me like a glove
links_reviews_text: I felt amazing in this dress! Honestly, I don't know that I have ever felt more glamorous in my life. My husband, who doesn't notice clothes at all normally, loved it, and I got lots of compliments all night. This dress was a standout and I was so happy with it. I wish the photo showed the dress more clearly--in person it was better! The fabric was a heavy crepe jersey, but a good quality jersey that arrived with no wrinkles. This one travels and wears well--which in my case was good because it didn't arrive till about 2 hours before I had to wear it (UPS problems...) The fit was definitely a close, fitted one. In fact, at was I was really nervous I was not going to be able to zip it! I switched out a padded (strapless) bra for silicone breast cups and pulled on a pair of Spanx and after much gymnastics, finally got the zipper up. If I had had someone to zip me up from behind, this probably have gone more smoothly! It was a 2 person job for sure. That being said, once it was on and finally zipped, to my great surprise it did not feel tight. In fact, it felt very comfortable all night. The leg slit was sexy, yet discreet at the same time. I was able to sit and not have the fabric splayed out everywhere. I normally wear a 6-8. This one fit me (just) in the 8.
Comfortable, elegant

links_reviews_title: A little stretch + ruching in center + the perfect side slit make it extremely flattering.
links_reviews_text: My size wasn't available so I wore a size down and it was still incredibly flattering. If they would've had my size I probably could've worn it without the spanx lol. The slit is perfect, it stays open on its own and is high enough to show your entire leg but low enough so you don't have to worry about exposing anything. It holds in everything you want held yet is comfortable enough to wear all night.

I'm a 2-4 and went with a 4 for this dress. The only issue is that string that dangles at the thigh. I get that it's necessary to drape the fabric, but it cheapens the look a little bit. If you can figure out how to hide it, go for it, because this is comfortable, breezy, and shows off the curves.

I'm 5'4 140 pounds. Size up for sure. I was expecting to wear the 6 but when it arrived it looked TINY! The size 8 was a more comfortable fit. It was an absolute showstopper! Got so many compliments. Very elegant and extremely comfortable. Nice thick fabric which holds you in. Just a heads up the slit is stitched and not adjustable.
The fit was great!

links_reviews_title: I felt sexy and classy wearing this unique piece to a fancy work Christmas party!
links_reviews_text: This dress was very flattering, unique, and sexy while also being classy and elegant. I got lots of compliments throughout the night! I have large breasts and this fit me very well! Because of the design of the top half, I was able to easily wear a supportive bra underneath and feel sexy but not ridiculously exposed like some other dresses. I would highly recommend this dress!
Love this dress. As soon as I put it in I felt like I was channeling DianaRiss in Mahogany.
This dress is so elegant! It is classy and stylish. I got compliments all night. It is form fitting, but not revealing. I loved wearing this dress and would definitely recommend.

The dress got rave reviews! The length was perfect. I'm 5'3 and wore three inch heels. I love that the split wasn't too high. The one sleeve was a bit too long. I just bunched it up, so it didn't cover my whole hand. I recommend!

links_reviews_title: My dress arrived a day early!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit like a glove! I was able to wear the 2 which is my normal dress size. Received several compliments on this dress!

links_reviews_title: ❤️Flattering on my 5’11” 160lb body! Very chilly spring evening=pink scarf☺️
links_reviews_text: This gown runs 2 sizes too small. I usually wear a size 8 dress and ordered a size 10 and 12 in this dress. The size 12 was comfortable and perfect! No slip needed as this gown has a “spanx” built into it! I felt tall, lean and confident wearing this gown. Highly recommend this classy, sexy gown.

links_reviews_title: Great quality dress! Intro to brand and impressed.
links_reviews_text: Stretchy material but thigh slit make is wearable for all sizes. Top is tight but breathable.
Fits like a glove!

links_reviews_title: This was the most comfortable and headturning dress I've worn!
links_reviews_text: This dress fit perfectly. It was a little tight going over my hips due to the internal shape-wear, but once on it fit like a glove. It is definitely the most comfortable dress I've worn, and is a real head-turner in person. This is a show-stopper of a dress and will definitely turn heads in person! I tend to wear a 12 in most sizes and I was afraid this dress would be too small since it doesn't come in a larger size so I couldn't have a back-up size. The 12L fit perfectly though! 10/10 recommend.

links_reviews_title: I rented this for a morning city hall wedding
links_reviews_text: The fit was good - I'm 5'2", size 34b, weigh 115lbs. You definitely don't need a padded bra in this dress, but Spanx might help for the profile view (it's fine from the back or from the front). I ended up going with a different dress but this one was very nice.

I got lots of compliments on this dress, BUT (1) it runs small. I'm a 6, and the medium (which usually a 8-10) fit well, (2) the fabric is thick but shows all lines, so shapewear is a must, and (3) there was some pilling on the hip. But it's a beautiful dress.
Love this dress. Nice thick material. Beautiful zigzag detail. The reason I gave it four stars is it's a little big in the hips. However that is a common problem for me.
Great fit

Thick high-quality material that doesn't wrinkle easily. The cut-outs are more fun than you notice in the pics. I am 5'10 and 145 lbs - the length was appropriate for work and it was form-fitting through the hips. It shows everything in you midsection.
Beautiful dress. Thick fabric. Does run small. I'm usually a 10, maybe 12 but the 14/16 just fit with wearing spanks.

I have wide hips so this bunches up and I kept having to tug it down. Would be better for someone with smaller hips. Wasn't a super bright white dress and not super crisp clean looking. Wore in softer yellow lighting for the party so wasn't a big deal, but wouldn't have been my bridal shower choice if my first choice was cuter on.

Thick stretch material, hugs all your curves well and tight. I usually wear an XS in Milly but since this one is brand new , I guess, was extremely tight and you could see my underwear but without underwear , you could see my nipples. It definitely requires spanx. I returned it without using it, I will rent again but I will size up. It is very classy and the white is beautiful.

links_reviews_title: I got compliments from complete strangers
links_reviews_text: I'm usually a 2 or a 4, but I first rented this in a XS (0-2) because the S (2-4) wasn't available. The picture is actually of the XS. Think they looked very similar but the S was more comfortable and easier to get on and off. I loved this dress and got so many compliments, even from complete strangers on the subway. I wore it to a Passover Seder and it was perfect for the occasion.
Runs really small! Hugs every imperfection. I'm a size ten and got a large. I'd recommend a size six wearing a size large.
You will be showered in compliments. This dress is a dream

I wore for an engagement party brunch and it was comfortable and easy to wear. The fabric is heavy so during the summer it may be a little hot but the fit and flare is beautiful. The dress is not pure white.
The dress was ok, fabric was heavy and worn. Not very forgiving shows every flaw.

I liked the design of the dress and the relatively thick material but not ideal for my height. Everything hung a little too low...I am 5'4". If you are curvier then it might be ok even if you are shorter. I am returning without wearing it.

links_reviews_title: Fit like a glove and very comfortable!
links_reviews_text: Rented this for a bridal shower. It is tight, but fit perfect and wasn't uncomfortable at all. I loved it!
Hugs every curve- too tight for my liking. Material is heavy and feels expensive, though.

links_reviews_title: Didn't wear it because it was too tight in the boobs
links_reviews_text: Loved the dress but it was too tight in the boobs
Good fit and not see through like a lot of whites.

links_reviews_title: Very difficult to get on and off because the zipper does not go past the bra.
links_reviews_text: Really an unflattering fit. I did not wear it. I looked like a tube in it. The material is also weirdly thick But not in a good way that flatters your figure

links_reviews_title: Hated the thick material and see through dress
links_reviews_text: This is probably the least favorite thing I have ever rented from RTR. The material was thick and see through, form fitting in all the wrong places! I wouldn't recommend it to anyone
I'm 5'2 and the dress is long on me. Very comfortable and nice fit.

links_reviews_title: very pretty. material is little heavy
links_reviews_text: na

links_reviews_title: I had to get a large because a medium wasn't available, however the fabric is body con so it worked!
links_reviews_text: Wore to a luncheon. Absolutely LOVE this dress. Will definitely rent again.

This dress was absolutely gorgeous on the hanger. I absolutely couldn't wait to wear it. Unfortunately, the dress ran small and was extremely see through. I was stuck in quite the pickle... I couldn't wear underwear without every line and color showing through the fabric and I couldn't go commando without showing the world my goodies. With much regret, I hung the dress back on the hanger and I sent it back to RTR. I wish this story could have been different

links_reviews_title: I did not wear this dress. I usually wear a 4-6 and ordered a 6. It was tight and not flattering.
links_reviews_text: I did not like this dress due to the fit. It looks great in the picture but was a bit too long for the fit. I sent this one back.

Gorgeous dress, fantastic material. However, runs very small in bodice, arms and neck and back great. I am an XS, 00 (5'4, 98 lbs) and this is the first thing I have rented that was too small. Would be hard to wear underwear without all lines showing, including belly button. Not at all uncomfortable, just too revealing. But I am adverse to anything too tight so may be fine for others. May try in a size up but feel the style of the dress would be compromised.

I could not wear this dress. Upon closer inspection of this off white dress there were large discolorations along the hem on the wrong side of the dress. Truly disappointing as the fit and style were flattering on me. I would rent again if I can get a clean dress.
Too big and bulky material
I am 5'4 120 lbs and 32B - Very form fitting up top and a bit long for me.

This is a very pretty and well made dress. It runs big though. And the fit in the torso area is very boxy and big. It should be more form fitting to make it look better. I'm tall and have a long torso and it still seemed long on me in the torso area.

links_reviews_title: Super tight and shows every line
links_reviews_text: Really pretty dress but it is super tight and the fabric is thin for the tightness so you better have a magic bra and seamless underwear to pull it off. Even with both of those things I didn't end up wearing it. The design is cute though.

links_reviews_title: Super thick material and too tight
links_reviews_text: Wanted to love it but the material is a thick tight stretchy material that felt like a sausage casing! Unfortunately did not wear..
Clean look dress. It is tight in the middle area and ill show your middle part as it is without contouring.. so i didn't like the fit.
Too tight

links_reviews_title: Cheap but makes for a nice photo
links_reviews_text: Dress looks and feels cheap in real life. Might as well be wearing a soft paper bag with a floral print on it. The shoulders aren't structured and the dress is poorly made.. but I got a ton of likes on insta for this pic which is why I'm giving 3 stars and not zero tbh

This is my second time renting this dress. It's an easy dress to throw on for work and then wear out after for socializing. I probably could have fit into the 6 but appreciated the roominess of the 8.
Cute, sort of baggy at the waist.

I absolutely loved this sweet dress. It is beautifully cut with great lines and detail. I loved the subtle floral print that incorporates yellow and soft pink- two colors I'm loving this spring. The length was perfect and I had no issue with the fabric being see-through. It is light cotton, however, so you will keep cool despite the sleeves.

links_reviews_title: I really liked this for work. The structure is unique - I am keeping it for a second month.
links_reviews_text: Easy summer dress. Lightweight.

Brought this on a vacation to the west coast to wear as a day dress. Fell in love with the puff sleeves and pintuck detail, but wish the skirt and bodice were lined. The fabric is super lightweight and almost see-through. However, it will be perfect for when it heats up in NYC this summer because it's made a of such a light cotton.
Very comfortable and cute but a little plain. Loved the cut and puffy sleeves!
I wore this to church and work. It was very cute and comfortable but a little sheer.

I'm obsessed with this dress. The fit is perfect—the sleeves and detailing on the bodice make it feel sophisticated, but the fabric is incredibly lightweight and comfortable. I loved it and would definitely rent again.
I love this dress! So cute and girly for summer. I wore a belt because it ran a little big. Next time would size down.

I normally rate 'See by Chloe' items very highly. This one totally missed the mark. Looked cheap, the pattern wasn't cute, material was a little see they and whatever they were trying to do with the sleeves just looked odd. No thank you.
Overall sweet dress. No stretch. Not too short. Unique and perfect for looking a little special running errands.
Super comfy and chic

This dress is super cute, light and breezy. Perfect for Summer. I wore it with a nude bra and a nude slip underneath, for modesty, because it is unlined and slightly see through in bright sunlight. The base color of the dress is a pale white, not a bluish optic white. I paired it with wine colored ballet flats, to bring out one of the colors in the dress and a Sunflower yellow Jimmy Choo bag.
Very cute. Hit just above the knee on me, and was work appropriate. So cute, belted under the bust to give more shape. I got a lot of compliments!
There really is nothing special about this dress, the fit isn't very flattering and it is quite see-through.

links_reviews_title: Wore this twice to work. Love it. Has a slightly grungy 90s vibe to it.
links_reviews_text: Ran true to size for me. Not too short for work. Wore with beige AF1s/converses and a leather jacket.
cute pattern but very straight and not flattering especially around the bust area.
This was a cute everyday dress. Nothing super special but nice and flattering.

I felt graceful in this dress! Note it doesn't photograph well and wrinkles easily. But it looks great on! I didn't need a bra but did need a slip as the bottom is very see through, even with nude undies.
Lightweight and cute... embroidery went from light to dark at each tier which at first looked off to me
So unique and fresh for summer. (Must iron.)

links_reviews_title: Gorgeous, many compliments, want to keep forever
links_reviews_text: I wore this dress 3 times. To church, a family reunion event, and for family photos. Received compliments from everyone. I sized up since it was the only size available. Originally thought it was too small in the chest, but went without a bra and it was perfect!! The overlay makes going without a bra simple and comfortable. I wore nude colored underwear and had no problems seeing through it. Was sad to return it!
It's a very flowy dress. I wish I ordered a size down. Love the colors and quality

I loved this dress. It was perfect for my masters graduation. It is beautifully designed and very flattering to the waist. I loved the details of tiny bits of yellow and tan, as well as the stitching. I felt beautiful in this dress!

The fit was perfect for a petite girl! This dress felt great on. It was breathable, which was ideal for warm weather. It's very well made and not see through. The neckline was low so I wore a lace tube top underneath. Otherwise I loved this piece and I would rent this again!

I love this dress and am contemplating purchasing it. Wore it in 95 degree heat for an outside event and the dress held up well. I did not find it transparent and got lots of compliments. Great for hiding any midsection worries!

links_reviews_title: I love love love this dress. It's a perfect fit and the details are so beautiful. Feels expensive.

links_reviews_text: Looked terrible on the hanger and then suprisingly absolutely loved this on. Got so many compliments.

This dress was so beautiful and perfect for beach trips that I kept it for most of the summer. Strangers walked up to me to comment and ask where I got it, was it from France? Italy? The details and cut are so pretty and refined. Would have purchased except I know that white cotton will not hold up very long
Fit: cinched waist with forgiving top layer Fabric: easy breezy cotton Style: gorgeous brunch outfit
Fit is true to size. Top is great for a fuller bust and completely bra-friendly. Length works for petite girls. Skirt is not too full. Very flattering and easy dress.

links_reviews_title: It was gorgeous but at least one size too big
links_reviews_text: This is gorgeous and how I wish I could feel every day in summer. Even one size too big it was gorgeous.
Perfect fit!

links_reviews_title: Better for taller ladies with small to medium chests
links_reviews_text: I liked this well enough to wear it a music festival one day, but I didn't feel amazing. I'm short so the hemline engulfed me, and the top was a bit tight for a 34D. I was happy to get out of it at the end of the day .

links_reviews_title: Elegant and easy for graduation party
links_reviews_text: I really enjoyed wearing this dress and got lots of compliments. A little tight in chest but not noticeable. Will rent again!
It's a pretty dress and it fit, It just wasn't a good style for me.

I really love this dress. I thought about removing one start for it being a bit see through, but it's so incredibly cute and made me feel pretty. I wore a slip under it. The way the top flows over the bottom of the dress, makes your waist look and feel small. Can be dressed up or down with sandals or heels. It's a really sweet and pretty dress.
Fit beautifully. Stunning dress! Wanted to buy....

This dress is absolutely beautiful and looks and feels GREAT. The embroidery gives it almost a vintage French feel, and it has a very flattering fit to show the smallest part of your waist. It definitely is see-through, but I paired it with a slip underneath and no issue. Paired with lace up espadrilles and worn on a cruise - got a ton of compliments and felt so pretty!
Very flattering

links_reviews_title: Incredible comfortable, great to wear in the NY heat
links_reviews_text: I'm 5'3 and 140 got a 38R and fit perfectly. It felt heavy but was super breathable in the heat. Fit my curves really well
Super pretty dress, amazing detail. Ended up wearing this to lunch with my family and got tons of compliments. Really comfy and easy to wear!
I ordered this to wear on vacation but the weather didn't cooperate with me. For great but it is see through so you need very nude underwear or no show
Wore for Easter- the dress is gorgeous and gorgeously made.

I was nervous to rent this with no reviews but I loved the style so much. It came with tags on but it was really see through. Maybe if you owned a white full body slip that would help though. I also rented my normal size but it was at least one if not two sizes too big. It was really baggy up top and not flattering at all. Returned without wearing

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress that is see through as all hell
links_reviews_text: This dress is gorgeous and incredible but it's unlined so... its see through city. I wore it with nude underwear and you could STILL see my secrets. I guess get a slip?

I was a little worried about the hem line of the dress and what that might look like on but it was very pretty! Great fabric - to be expected, but you never know with white. Did run big. Wish I had a size 32.

links_reviews_title: Loved, loved, loved the comfort and fit
links_reviews_text: This was not my first choice, but when the pantsuit I had chosen wasn't available, I had to pick something else. I read the reviews and they were good, so I decided to go for it. It fit like a glove, so if you don't want body hugging, this isn't your dress. It had some stretch, which made it comfortable for the entire evening. It was short, but not too short since I am only 5'2". My husband, who does not freely offer compliments, loved it. Sorry for the partial pic, but it does show the length for my height, which is again 5'2", and you can see that it needed to be pulled down a bit.
My event got canceled so I didn't get to wear this dress but it is definitely something I will rent in the future. It does run big and tight.

This was shorter on me than I expected and coupled with the stretchy material overall a bit more provocative than I'd imagined. It's possible that the size up might have been a bit longer but I preferred a more form fitting look. Overall a flattering, albeit not super forgiving dress. I felt confident all night.
Arrived wrinkled, hung up and all wrinkles fell overnight, was fantastic. Good stretch but quality fabric. So comfortable and so many compliments.
Love this dress. Fit like a glove! True to size. Received tons of compliments.
Dress was so comfortable and fit well. I'm usually a 4/6 and with the stretch in the fabric it was perfect. It was a nice thicker fabric too, so felt comfortable with no lines showing underneath.

I was worried since it was a family wedding and I have a bigger butt that it wouldn't look appropriate but it was perfect! My parents loved it and I felt amazing! Stretchy and flattering, I would definitely recommend!

links_reviews_title: My replacement came to the rescue
links_reviews_text: I love RTR so, so much. This dress was my REPLACEMENT dress for a wedding. My original dress came in on Wednesday and once I put in the order for a new dress, this was at my doorstep a day later, for just the price of shipping. It was chilly so I put a cover up over the dress, but it was gorgeous. It runs a bit small, but has some stretch so it hugs curves very well. And I fell in love with the split sleeves. I got compliments all night on this dress! It's the perfect little black dress!

This dress was a simple, classy, and elegant black dress. Hugs your body in all the right places. Dress was very comfortable. No issues with dancing. I went with the Large, as the Medium was shorter and tighter around thighs and bottom.

I wore this for a formal event and it was great! The fabric is extremely soft and comfortable. I ordered both the L and the M, and while the M definitely fit (it had more of a "sexy" look), I opted for the more comfortable size L. The neckline would sometimes creep up to become more of a boatneck than an off-the-shoulder, but that's MUCH better than it slipping downwards. The neckline itself doesn't have much stretch to it, which is why it feels so secure. I would rent again!

links_reviews_title: Amazing dress! Fit great! Felt wonderful in it!
links_reviews_text: Excellent dress
I loved this dress it's elegant yet still sexy. It fit me like a glove and it was perfect for outdoor / indoor wedding!

links_reviews_title: One of those perfect little black dresses!
links_reviews_text: Loved this little black dress! The strapless look and open sleeves are beautiful. The dress is fitted like the other reviews mentioned, but overall this dress is a total winner!
This was a fun take on a basic black dress. The off the shoulder and open sleeve gave it elevated from a basic black.

Very cute and comfortable dress. The stretchy fabric was breathable and the collar stayed in place all night. I did have to wear spanx because the fabric is rather unforgiving, so if you have any areas of your midsection that you're not a huge fan of be aware that you will likely have to wear shapewear. The sleeves made me feel like a wizard, very fun!

links_reviews_title: Everyone loved the dress! It was also very comfortable to wear for such a long event.
links_reviews_text: I attended a catholic wedding, so a lot of sitting, standing and kneeling, so the dress kept rising which lead to me constantly pulling it down. The material is super soft and stretchy.
I'd buy this dress if I could. Loved everything about it. Medium fit but being that I was going to an elaborate meal, the large seemed like a better idea.
Love this dress! Comfortable, classy and cute!
I am normally a small, but wore the medium!
Fit was great no issues. Simple LBD with unique sleeves to keep me warm. I rented the 0 which was a tiny bit snug.

Everything about this dress is perfect. Slightly stretchy fabric so it contours the body, doesn't ride up. Didn't have to wear a necklace because of the awesome neckline. I'm 5'2" 135lbs and wore a size Med. A+

So comfy, perfect material for April, Friday night, rainy spring wedding. Loved the material. Both the medium and large fit but I went with the large, a little roomy in mid section and a tad bit longer. I could have done the medium but would have needed spanx to smooth things out.
Tight fitting but so fun! I got many compliments on this dress. Slimming and fun!

I loved this dress and received so many compliments on it, but as a 6 ft woman it was MUCH shorter than expected. I wore this to an event without dancing so I didn't encounter any issues with raising my arms. Plus the dress is very stretchy!
Didn't love the material, and it was a little shorter than I was expecting, especially because I'm 5' tall with a short torso. With that being said, it still photographed well and got the job done.
Incredible dress. Fits well and holds in all the right places so it looks incredible without a bra. Just perfect amounts of sexy and classy.

links_reviews_title: I actually wore this for what ended up being my proposal. I wish I could keep the dress now!! :)
links_reviews_text: Firstly, So sorry that the only pics I have are from my proposal, but I hope it helps you ladies to see how it fits! It was extremely comfortable, moveable, and true to size! The material was very nice, soft, and great quality! I absolutely loved this dress!
5'4" and 150lbs -- I used a medium and it was still a little right for me. It's stretchy and looks super cute but would've ordered a large to be a little more loose.

links_reviews_title: Great LBD for a night out at a community event!
links_reviews_text: This was a great dress for a winter night at a community event. I had worn sequins to the event last year and wanted something fun, but classic this year. The sleeves made it fun and still dressy. The dress was very comfortable for helping with set-up and then dancing into the night! I did have to wear Spanx AND control top tights to suck everything in. With stretchy material and being a mom with some weight to lose it showed a lot of imperfections. But overall it hit in the right places and hid the right places too!

links_reviews_title: Super comfortable and mad me look slim!
links_reviews_text: Medium fit perfectly. Wasn't too tight. I am 139 and 5'5. The off the shoulder look is so flattering. And it was the perfect length.

I love this classic yet edgy dress by Amanda Uprichard. Running true to size with a lot of stretch, I recommend wearing your true size for your primary size and going up for your back-up. This style is fitted throughout the midsection and at the hips. It works best for A-C cup sizes. You are not able to wear a standard bra with this dress so you should wear a NuBra or strapless bra since it is off-the-shoulders. At 4’8”, the length hit just above the knee on me. The slit sleeves and off-shoulder-neckline give this classic LBD some edge. Pair with stiletto pumps and a subtle necklace to complete your outfit!
It was snug so I wore spanx. My favorite part was the the neck line and sleeves! I would rent this again!

links_reviews_title: Perfect for a work party! Made me feel classy and like a million bucks!
links_reviews_text: The fit was great. It was snug, didn't ride up, and very flattering. I wore spanx underneath and the material was thick enough that you couldn't see a line. It hit just above my knees, and I am 5'3 and was wearing about a 3 inch heel. I'd recommend for any upscale, classy affair!

links_reviews_title: Not appropriate for a work party
links_reviews_text: This dress is soooo sexy!!! I didn't get a picture because I did not wear this for the occasion I ordered it for...a Christmas work party. Wayyyy to right and short for work. I don't think the sizing is off I just think the dress is meant to be worn tight through the body. It's stretchy which is great and I will order again for a fire night...my husband requested to see this one again!
Fit true to size and I loved it!
This dress was really pretty, but super comfy, too. And even though it is an off-the-shoulder dress, it didn't ride up or slip off (even while dancing)!

links_reviews_title: Very fitting and short on tall girls
links_reviews_text: Wasn't sure this would work and My instincts were right... it's very fitting and short. Being 5'9" with a few curves I did not feel comfortable wearing this to a work event. If you're straight and narrower and looking for a sexy LBD this is for you.

This dress is gorgeous. Subtle ioff the shoulder perfect date dress. Love the sleeves. Subtle slit simple & elegant. Makes this dress that subtle special little black dress. Buying this.... PS. my fiance loved this paired with red 4" heels.

links_reviews_title: LOVED THE DRESS! I got many compliments and it was very comfortable! I want to wear it again!
links_reviews_text: Fit great, very comfortable!

links_reviews_title: Very soft and comfy! Love the shoulder cut and the boning on the chest slit.
links_reviews_text: Loved the softness and comfortability of the fabric, but this didn't really strike me as designer quality. It's not a super high end piece, so it's great for any occasion really. What's keeping me from eating this 5 stars is the way it accentuated my tummy. Really no forgiveness with this material, and everything showed. Also a thread was loose on the waist stitching and I had to cut it off. Would look great on someone a tad taller and slimmer.

The fit was really comfortable, especially since it was pull-on with no buttons or zippers. I styled it with a loose sweater and belt for a party and got a ton of compliments. I got even more when I showed off that it was a jumpsuit and not just pants!

links_reviews_title: Wow first thing I've ever tried from RTR and it fits like a glove. So comfy with no zippers!
Loved it so much I bought it!
links_reviews_text: This is perfect for the office and beyond. I work in a corporate setting so I wore with a bright red blazer to work. I met a guy for happy hour after work and then went to the club with some girlfriends. It's a perfect transition outfit and without the blazer I felt sexy! I didn't pronounce tummy and with spanx it would've even been better. Love it and fits true to size.

The material feels like loungewear but it looks completely polished and professional. I wore this to work two days in a row (different offices, different people), got lots of compliments both days, and was as comfortable as if I was wearing PJs. There's no zipper, you just pull the whole thing on and off. Bathroom trips were easier than other jumpsuits I've worn. Highly recommend!
One of my favorite jumpsuits ever! So flattering and fit perfectly. Will definitely rent again
Nice style, the material was too thin

links_reviews_title: Not enough structure for my body type
links_reviews_text: I'm an apple shape with large chest. I ordered XL but should have went large. The XL was too.big but also didnt have a lot of structure or shape. Its cute overall, but just didnt look great on me
easy to wear and easy to put on.

links_reviews_title: I loved loved this jumpsuit. Felt terrific!!!! I bought it that is how much i loved it!
links_reviews_text: there was nothing negative to say about this jumpsuit. I am 144lbs and 5 foot 2 inches and it was perfect. It was classy yet a little sexy - I wore it for a night out during a convention and it was a perfect statement.
